[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/rgyud 'bum na pa bzhugs so//
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D507}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga tA d+hiSh+ThA na hr-i dA ya gu h+ya d+hA tu ka raN+Da nA ma d+hA ra NI ma yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[1b.2\]]kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[1b.3\]]'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA na dri ma med pa'i kun dga' ra ba dang rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /_
[\[1b.4\]]nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_
[\[1b.5\]]mi ma yin pa bye ba mang po rnams dang /_yul gyi mi 'bum phrag du ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas 'khor gyi nang de na bram ze 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu mkhas pa/_mdzangs pa/_gsal ba yid gzhungs pa/_mthong na dga' ba/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su bzung ba/_dri med legs snang zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de yang gcig tu dkon mchog 
[\[2a.2\]]gsum la dad cing gus la phyag byed pa'i dge ba'i bsams pa dang ldan pa/_zhib mo brtags pa/_sems can thams cad dang dge ba'i don la brtson pa/_nor che ba/_longs spyod che ba/_phyug pa/_rdzas mang ba/_yo byad phun sum tshogs pa yin 
[\[2a.3\]]no/_/de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas yang bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /_bdug pas mngon par mchod do/_/na bza' rin 'bum ri ba 
[\[2a.4\]]yang gsol/_bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal 'bum ri ba yang gsol nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sras tshogs 
[\[2a.5\]]kyi 'khor dang bcas pa/_bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren na de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad par ci gnang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis spyan drangs par thugs su chud nas cang mi 
[\[2a.6\]]gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo /_/de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas des rings pa rings par rang gi khyim du song ste/_de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang /_zhal zas dang /_yo 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]byad dang /_zhal zas ro brgya pa/_mang po bshams nas bkod pa chen pos bkra shis kyi gzhal med khang dang /_gzhal med khang chen po sna tshogs dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa khyer te/_'khor mang po dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 
[\[2b.2\]]'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la dus la bab par gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gshegs pa'i dus lags te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[2b.3\]]gshegs pa'i dus kyi tshod la bab na bdag la gnang bar mdzad par ci gnang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang dbugs phyung nas nyid kyi 'khor la gzigs te bka' stsal pa/_'khor ji ltar lhags pa thams cad deng don chen po 
[\[2b.4\]]mdzad par 'gyur gyis tshur sheg_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer tha dad pa sna tshogs byung ste/_'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[2b.5\]]thams cad snang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang dag par bskul te/_gzigs nas gshegs par shes so/_/de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis mchod pa dang /_bkur sti chen pos mchod cing bcom ldan 'das kyi gshegs shul 
[\[2b.6\]]mdzes pa cher byas so/_/'khor mang po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_dbang phyug 
[\[2b.7\]]chen po dang /_sred med kyi bu dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang gshegs shul mdzes par byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang mi ring ba'i lam gyi bar gyi nang zhig na skyed mos tshal bde byed ces bya ba zhig yod do/_/skyed mos tshal de'i nang na mchod rten 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]rnying pa chen po zhig yod de/_zhig pa/_tsher mas gang ba rtswa dang /_shing dang /_gyo mos kun tu gang ba phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu zhig yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du gshegs pa dang /_mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta 
[\[3a.2\]]bu de yang kun nas 'bar zhing 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog sna tshogs pa dag byung ngo /_/phyag dar dang gyo mo'i phung po de las kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa legs so legs so/_/deng ni gshegs pa'i ltas bzang po'o/_/
[\[3a.3\]]bram ze chen po de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs pa na yang khyod legs so/_/deng khyod la don chen po mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la yan lag lngas phyag mdzad nas lan gsum 
[\[3a.4\]]bskor ba mdzad nas/_nyid kyi sku las na bza' gsil nas mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis mchi ma byung ba chen po phyung bas bshums pa mdzad nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa bstan to/_/'dzum pa bstan pa des 
[\[3a.5\]]phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lag mthil na bzhugs pa bzhin du mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'od zer bkye ste/_mchod rten rnying pa'i phung po chen po der zhugs so/_/de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag ya mtshan chen por 
[\[3a.6\]]gyur cing yid ches te 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje lus ni 'dar/_snying ni 'gul/_rdo rje ni gsor zhing rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[3a.7\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bshums pa'i snga ltas chen po gda' ba gang gis na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan mchi mas gang bar bstan pa'i snga ltas gda' ba bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]'di'i nang du zhu ba 'di skabs dbye bar ci gnang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag na rdo rje ring bsrel gyi phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba til gyi gang 
[\[3b.2\]]bu snyed thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i mchod rten gyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod de/_lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na gnas pa der/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa khar yas khar yas zhes bya ba snyed 
[\[3b.3\]]kyi sku gdung ring bsrel rnams gnas so/_/chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gnas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gtsug tor dang /_spyi bo yang de bzhin du gnas so/_/lag na rdo rje gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas 
[\[3b.4\]]pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du lung bstan to/_/lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'di ltar phan yon che zhing mthu che ba yin no/_/lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phan yon che ba yin no/_/lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bkra shis thams cad 
[\[3b.5\]]rdzogs par byed pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das las 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la/_de nas nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral lo/_/kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras 
[\[3b.6\]]bu thob bo/_/kha cig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/_/kha cig gis ni rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu'o/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas so/_/
[\[3b.7\]]kha cig gis ni byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo/_/kha cig gis ni sa dang po'o/_/kha cig gis ni sa gnyis pa'o/_/kha cig gis ni sa gsum pa'o/_/kha cig gis ni sa bzhi pa'o/_/kha cig gis ni sa lnga pa'o/_/kha cig gis ni sa drug pa'o/_/kha cig gis ni 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]sa bdun pa'o/_/kha cig gis ni sa brgyad pa'o/_/kha cig gis ni sa dgu pa'o/_/kha cig gis ni sa bcu pa la gnas par gyur to/_/kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs so/_/bram ze chen po de yang mngon par shes pa lnga thob cing dri ma 
[\[4a.2\]]dang bral ba dang /_ser sna dang /_phrag dog dang bral bar gyur to/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 
[\[4a.3\]]rnam grangs kyi mtshan thos pas kyang phan yon gyi yon tan gyis brgyan pa 'di lta bu thob na/_bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du phu dud dang /_bkur sti shin tu mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/_bcom ldan 'das de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu yang mthong bar 'gyur/_
[\[4a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje nyon cig_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dri bar byed na/_lag na rdo rje des de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum 
[\[4a.5\]]phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis rjes su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig klog par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[4a.6\]]thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams bcang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /_phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[4a.7\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur zhing /_nyin gcig bzhin gzigs par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang /_khong du chud par byed pa dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_me tog 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]phreng rgyud dang /_byug pa dang /_na bza' dang /_lhab lhub dang /_rgyan gyis mchod pa byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma des phyogs bcu dang /_phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til 
[\[4b.2\]]gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_me tog phreng rgyud dang /_byug pa dang /_na bza' dang /_lhab lhub dang /_rgyan gyis mchod par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod 
[\[4b.3\]]pa'i sprin rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ri rab chen po tsam gyi phung po'i yon tan byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi 
[\[4b.4\]]ma yin pa de rnams dang /_sems can gyi tshogs chen po de rnams kyang ya mtshan du gyur nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar dang /_gyo mo'i phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po 
[\[4b.5\]]ston pas mthu che ba yin no zhes zer ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di sus phyag dar gyi phung por bgyis pa las rin po che'i mchod rten du gda' bar bgyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[4b.6\]]stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje 'di phyag dar gyi phung po ma yin gyi 'di ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i rin po che'i mchod rten chen po yin no/_/lag na rdo rje 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ston pas nub par gyur gyi/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[4b.7\]]ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten rnams ni 'jig pa'am/_'gyes par mi 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po'i sku ji ltar 'gyes par 'gyur/_'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par snang ba las kyang nub par gyur to/_/lag na rdo rje gzhan 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]yang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/_sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang /_sdig pa can dang /_dmyal ba la gzhol ba shin tu tshabs cher 'byung bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas ma yin/_chos ma yin/_dge 'dun tshol ba ma yin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang bskyed par mi byed de rgyu de 
[\[5a.2\]]dang /_rkyen des dam pa'i chos nub bo/_/lag na rdo rje de'i phyir nga'i mig gnyis mchi mas gang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mchi ma byung ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nub par 'gyur gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni ma gtogs te/_
[\[5a.3\]]de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog na dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[5a.4\]]ci zhig skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po ring bsrel gyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[5a.5\]]kyi gzungs kyi snying po gsang bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor dang /_spyan gyi mchod rten du byin gyis brlabs par 
[\[5a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan nam/_mchod rten thams cad kyi nang du 'jog par byed na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo'i phreng ba dang /_dril bu g.yer ka'i 
[\[5a.7\]]dra bar sbrel ba dang bcas pa dang /_bkra shis dang /_char kab kyi gzugs dang /_dril bur bcas pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang byin gyis brlabs dang /_
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]bden pa dang /_dam tshig gis byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag mchod rten de la phu dud dang /_bsti stang byed pa de dag nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[5b.2\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/phyag 'tshal ba gcig dang /_bskor ba byed pa gcig gis mnar med pa thug pa la sogs pa rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[5b.3\]]gnas gang na mchod rten nam gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu gnas pa'i sa phyogs de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs der klu mi srun pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/_sad dang ser bas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/_gnas der 
[\[5b.4\]]srog chags mi srun pa'am gdug pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/_gcan gzan gyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/_bya mi srun pa dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_byi ba dang /_sre mo dang /_sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu dang /_bye ba dang /_sbrang ma mchu gsum pa dang /_mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_
[\[5b.5\]]rta bla'i 'jigs pa'ang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/_sbrul gdug pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs der yams kyi nad dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrug pa'ang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_'dre dang /_
[\[5b.6\]]brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/_gdon thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/_rims thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/_nad thams cad dang /_'bras dang /_phol mig dang /_lhog pa dang /_mtshan bar rdol ba dang /_rkang shu dang /_
[\[5b.7\]]g.yan pa dang /_mdzes kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing mchod rten de mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs der ba lang gi nad dang /_phyugs nad dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gi nad dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]bu mo'i nad kyis kyang nam yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/dus ma yin par 'chi bas kyang dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi 'gyur/_dug gis ma yin/_mtshon gyis ma yin zhing me dang /_chus kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 
[\[6a.2\]]'jigs pas ma yin/_lo nyes kyi 'jigs pas kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur/_rgyal po chen po'i dmag gi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sa phyogs der srung bar byed/_yongs su skyong bar byed do/_/gnod 
[\[6a.3\]]sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]chen po'ang nyin mtshan mthun par byed par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i rgyal po thams 
[\[6a.4\]]cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mdangs mi 'phrog cing legs pa kho nar char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad kyang mchod rten chen po de la phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bkur sti bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis nas dus gsum du 'ong ngo /_/yul 
[\[6a.5\]]na gnas pa thams cad kyang mchod rten dang /_gzugs brnyan de'i drung du dus gsum du 'ong ngo /_/stod par byed/_skor ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kyang lha'i bu mo dang /_lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod rten nam/_
[\[6a.6\]]gzugs brnyan de'i drung du nyin mtshan dus gsum du 'ong ste/_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_mchod pa la 'ong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rtag par dgongs pa dang /_byin gyi rlob par 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten dang /_gzugs brnyan ji lta ji lta bu las byed pa'i 
[\[6a.7\]]sa'i'am/_rdo'i'am/_shing gi'am/_dngul gyi'am/_gser gyi'am/_zangs kyir byed pa dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang bris te/_de'i nang du bzhag na bzhag ma thag tsam gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/'phang dang /_them 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]skas dang /_kha ran dang /_'khor lo'i phreng ba dang /_bkra shis dang /_gdugs dang /_dril bu 'phyang ba dang /_ba dan dang /_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bzhi kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[6b.2\]]gzugs brnyan gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten rin po che dang /_sku gdung gi snying po'i mchod rten dang /_mchod gnas su 'gyur ro/_/sku gzugs dang /_mchod rten de 'og 
[\[6b.3\]]min gyi gnas kyi lhas kyang yongs su bskyang ba dang /_mchod pas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur 
[\[6b.4\]]'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs yin te/_lag na rdo rje des na mthu 'di ni yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis 
[\[6b.5\]]brlabs pa yin no/_/rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje nyon cig de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa 
[\[6b.6\]]dang /_da ltar byung ba dang /_gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni gsum ste/_chos kyi sku dang /_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /_de bzhin du sprul pa'i sku ste/_dus gsum pa thams cad kyi ring 
[\[6b.7\]]bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/_/na ma s+t+rai ya d+hI kA nAM/_sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nAM/_oM b+hu bi b+ha bAn ba re ba tsa Tau/_tsu lu tsu lu/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA/_d+hA tu d+ha re/_pad+ma gar+b+he/_dza ya ba re/_a tsa le/_sma ra ta thA ga ta/_d+har+m+ma tsakra/_pra brta na/_badzra bo d+hi 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]maN+Da a laM kA ra/_a laM kr-i te/_sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/_a d+hiSh+Thi te/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/_bud+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/_sa~M bo d+ha ni sa~M bo d+ha ya/_tsa la tsa la/_tsa lan+tu sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni/_sarba pA pa~M bi ga te/_hu ru hu ru/_sar+b+ba sho ka bi ga te/_sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/_
[\[7a.2\]]badzri Ni/_sam+b+ha ba sam+b+ha ba/_sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ye/_ng+hA ra Ni mu dre/_bud d+he/_/su bud d+he/_sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/_d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/_sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/_d+hA tu mu dre swA hA/_su pra tiSh+Thi ta stUpe ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/_hU~M hU~M swA hA/_oM 
[\[7a.3\]]sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha d+hA tu mu drA Ni sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu bi b+hU Shi ta a d+hiSh+Thi te hu ru hu ru/_hU~M hU~M swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu phyogs bcu dang /_phyogs re re kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba 
[\[7a.4\]]khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu gshegs nas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi don du 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gter bzhag pa dang /_ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten byin gyis 
[\[7a.5\]]brlabs pa legs so/_/legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /_byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/gang na ring bsrel gyi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di ston par byed dam/_mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog gam/_gzugs brnyan 
[\[7a.6\]]gyi nang du 'jog par byed pa der/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gcig tu rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'brang zhing bzhugs par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gzungs bshad pa dang /_
[\[7a.7\]]ji tsam na mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten du mngon par 'phags shing 'phang dang /_legs par rnam par 'byes pa dang /_'khor lo'i phreng ba dang /_bkra shis dang bcas par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas de 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 
[\[7b.2\]]'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi snying po gsang ba'i ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha wa dang /_
[\[7b.3\]]lo ts+tsha ba gtsang de wen+d+ra rak+Shitas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D508}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bo d+hi maN+Da s+ya yak+ShA lang+kA ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/_rgya nag skad du/_phu thi Tha dra I TA nga yanra tho lo ni/_bod skad du/_byang chub snying po'i 
[\[7b.4\]]rgyan 'bum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul wA rA Na sI'i grong khyer chen po'i skyed mos tshal rgya chen po na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po lnga stong 
[\[7b.5\]]thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_rang gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa sha stag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs lnga brgya bcas dang thabs cig tu bzhugs 
[\[7b.6\]]so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dkar po'i phyogs kyi zla ba nya bas tshes pa'i dus gcig na 'khor rnam pa bzhi la chos ston cing mchog tu dga' bas tshim par byas so/_/yang 'khor der sems can tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po 'dus pa 'di lta ste/_rgyal rigs 
[\[7b.7\]]dang /_bram ze'i rigs dang /_rig byed smra ba rnams dang /_gcer bu pa dang /_ya mtshan can gzhan dag rtog ge pa mang po dang /_sgyu rtsal shes rigs dang /_dur khrod pa dang /_tshem bu pa dang /_glang ru'i brtul zhugs can dang /_ri sul na gnas pa'i brtul zhugs can dang /_
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]dbang phyug pa'i tshogs thams cad dang thabs cig go/_/de la 'dus pa'i tshogs der gang zag 'ga' zhig lta ba log pas bslad de lam gol ba dang the tshom gyi dra bar chud pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba chen pos gang ji lta ji snyed zhus pa'i don 
[\[8a.2\]]legs par rab tu ston cing the tsom ma lus pa bsal bar mdzad do/_/gzhan yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i tshogs kyis mdun nas bltas 
[\[8a.3\]]shing yongs su bskor te/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu'i 'khor mang po dang bcas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du nye bar lhags so/_/de bzhin du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_lha'i bu nyi ma 
[\[8a.4\]]dang /_lha'i bu zla ba dang /_lha'i bu stobs bzang dang /_gnod sbyin nor bu bzang po dang /_gang ba bzang po la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams dang /_dbang phyug dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang /_rgyal po chen po 
[\[8a.5\]]bzhi dang /_dpal gyi lha mo dang /_dbyangs can ma dang /_'phrog ma dang /_dung skyong ma dang /_me tog so ma dang /_'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya rnams kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_klu'i rgyal po nye dga' la 
[\[8a.6\]]sogs pa'i klu'i rgyal po chen po rnams so so'i klu'i rigs kyi 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu mang pos bskor ba dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po rnams kyang rang rang gi 'khor grangs su med pas yongs su bskor zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du lhags te/_phyag 
[\[8a.7\]]'tshal ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_rim gro byed cing chos mnyan to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na pa tha ri'i grong khyer na gnas pa'i bram ze chen po bi Nu dat+ta zhes bya ba phyug pa dbyig nor sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/_longs spyod rnam thos kyi bu dang 'gran bzod pa/_
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]mang du thos pa/_shes rab che ba/_dbang po rno ba/_rnam dpyod yangs pa/_dge ba'i chos la dga' ba/_dad pa brtan pa/_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba'i dge bsnyen thams cad kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa la bu med pa zhig yod do/_/lan cig bram ze chen po des 'di snyam 
[\[8b.2\]]du sems par gyur te/_bdag longs spyod 'di tsam che zhing rigs 'di ltar btsun pa la bu med pa ci ltar rung /_bram ze'i rigs shing sbal chen po lta bu 'di rgyun chad na ci ltar rung /_bdag gson kyang don re chung ngo snyam du bsam zhing nyin mtshan mang por sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/yang lan 
[\[8b.3\]]cig 'di ltar sems par gyur te/_lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi pha yin no/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bu yin no/_/yang dag pa dam pa'i chos ni bdag gi ma yin no/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi tshogs ni bdag gi phu nu yin no/_/skye ba 'dir stes 
[\[8b.4\]]bzang pos bkra shis pa'i dpal gyi 'byor pa 'di lta bu rnyed na/_skye ba phyi mar yang don ldan du bya bar byed pa'i phyir/_chos gang gcig la bslabs pas dkar po'i chos kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'dus shing tshegs chung ngus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bya ste/_
[\[8b.5\]]dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yun ring du rgyun mi 'chad par gyur pa dang /_dge ba'i las gang gi rgyu rkyen la brten nas bu tsha rigs rgyud 'phel bar byed pa'i thabs ci'i phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mi zhu/_da ni bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam du bsams so/_/de nas bram ze chen po 
[\[8b.6\]]bi Nu dat+ta des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing lan gsum bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ston pa bcom ldan 'das chos gang gcig la bslabs na dkar po'i chos kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[8b.7\]]thams cad 'dus par gyur cing tshegs chung ngus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba dang /_bu tsha rigs rgyud 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i thabs shig bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_de skad ces 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze bi Nu dat+ta la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/legs so legs so/_/bram ze chen po khyod kyis don legs pa 'di 'dra nga la dris pa ni shin tu legs so/_/bram ze chen po legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig 
[\[9a.2\]]dngangs khyod la bshad do/_/bram ze chen po rtog pa'i rgyal bo chen po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/_gzungs de ni dkar po'i chos kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skrun par byed/_skyed par byed/_yongs su rdzogs par byed/_re ba thams cad skong bar byed pa ste/_
[\[9a.3\]]ngas rjes su dran pa sngon 'das pa'i dus na pa tha ri'i grong khyer gyi shar sgo'i phyi rol du skyed mos tshal chen po zhig yod de/_skyed tshal de'i ming ni a su ri zhes bya ba'o/_/de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i srin po'i bu mo zhig yod de/_ming ni lha min mdzes ma zhes bya'o/_/srin mo de rang bzhin ngan pa 
[\[9a.4\]]gdug rtsub che ba/_khor yug dpag tshad stong gi nang rol na gnas pa'i khye'u dang bu mo rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog cing bcud brkus/_srog kyang phrogs par byas pas/_pa tha ri'i grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo pho mo phal cher srin mo de'i gnod pas gtses pas sdug bsngal bar gyur/_yun ring du 
[\[9a.5\]]'jigs pa dang ldan par gyur/_nyam nga bas nyen par gyur to/_/de nas dus gcig na de dag phan tshun du bltas shing thabs ci 'dra zhig gis sdug bsngal 'di las grol bar 'gyur zhes bgros so/_/de'i tshe skye bo'i tshogs 'dus pa'i khrod na rgan rabs rgyus yod pa 'ga' zhig gis/_skye bo de dag la 
[\[9a.6\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po dag nyon cig_/da lta de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas 'tsho zhing gzhes bzhin bzhugs te/_de'i drung du mjal te 'dri bar rigs so/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[9a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis/_khyed cag gi mgon po dang skyabs su 'gyur la 'jigs pa dang sdug bsngal thams cad bsal bar mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_skye bo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de yul phyogs gang na bzhugs zhes dris pas/_rgan rabs dag 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]gis lan btab pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dus skabs da lta na lnga len gyi ljongs na bzhugs zer ro/_/slar dris pa/_bzhin bzang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de dang mjal ba'i thabs bstan du gsol/_smras pa/_khyed cag slar log la/_dben zhing gtsang ba'i gnas shig 
[\[9b.2\]]btsal te sa phyogs der ba lci bsres pa'i sa gtsang gi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mtha' logs cha mnyam pa bzhengs/_spos 'dam dang ba byung lngas byug la/_me tog sna tshogs gcal du bkram nas bdug pa'i spos phor bzhi dang /_dri bzang gi chab kyi bum pa bzhi dang /_zhal zas sder 
[\[9b.3\]]ma bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/mar me bzhi bud par bya'o/_/dbus su dri bzang gi chus gang ba'i bum pa dmar ser cig bkod la/_de'i khar so shing gcig gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la mngon par dad pas dmigs te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams 
[\[9b.4\]]la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_sang nyin bsod snyoms kyi dus la bab pa na gnas 'di nyid du gshegs par ci gnang zhes gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /_mos pa 
[\[9b.5\]]dang /_bya ba spyod pa ji lta ji snyed thams cad yongs su mkhyen cing gzigs pa ste/_sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su ltung ba rnams kyang thabs mkhas pas thar bar mdzad/_phan pa dang bde ba'i thabs ston par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar byas pas de 
[\[9b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa des mngon par mkhyen cing gzigs nas/_rdzu 'phrul thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyis 'khor dang bcas pa khyed cag gi bsti gnas su 'byon par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_skye bo de rnams kyis thos pa ji lta ba bzhin blo la bzung nas slar log ste 'du 'dzis 
[\[9b.7\]]dben zhing gtsang la mtho zhing ngos yangs pa'i gnas shig btsal nas/_ba lci bsres pa'i sa gtsang gi dkyil 'khor bshams te/_me tog sna tshogs bkram/_dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bum pa bzang po dang bza' btung gtsang ma sna tshogs dang byug pa dang bdug spos dang mar me rnams 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]bkod nas snyan pa'i rol mo sna tshogs kyang dkrol/_dbus su rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i gser gyi bum pa dmar ser dri bzang gi chus bkang ba so shing dang bcas pa bzhag la/_thams cad yid mthun/_mos pa mthun/_spyod lam mthun par dad 
[\[10a.2\]]pas kun nas bslang ba'i dbyangs snyan la skad gsang mthon pos mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/_/
[\[10a.3\]]sems can thams cad la brtse ba dang skyob pa'i bdag nyid can/_thub pa chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das khyed la phyag 'tshal lo mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/_/chos nyid bsam mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba'i bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das khyed la phyag 'tshal lo 
[\[10a.4\]]mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/_/bdag cag mgon med skyabs med cing sdug bsngal gyi 'dam du byings pa'i sems can rnams la rjes su brtse ba'i slad du/_sang bsod snyoms kyi dus tshod la gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol lo/_/gshegs shing bzhugs nas kyang bdag cag gis legs 
[\[10a.5\]]par sbyar ba'i mchod pa rnams bzhes la bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen mdzad du gsol/_phan pa dang bde ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i lam bstan du gsol/_'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad dang /_nyam 
[\[10a.6\]]nga ba thams cad bsal du gsol/_de ltar gsol ba btab ma thag tu sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/bum pa yang 'gul zhing sa la 'gyil to/_/bum chu sa la phos te pad+ma'i rdzing bu chen por gyur to/_/de yang lha'i chu dang mnyam pa/_dri bzang 'thul ba/_gtsang ba/_ha cang mi grang ha 
[\[10a.7\]]cang mi dro yid du 'ong ba/_yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa rdzing bu yongs su gang ba'i gting gser gyi bye ma brdal ba/_ut+pa la dang pad+ma dang pad+ma dmar po dang /_puN+Da rI ka la sogs pa rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis khebs pa/_dbus su gser gyi sa gzhi'i gling chen po/_phyogs 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]bzhir rin po che sna tshogs kyi them skas dang lam bzhi yod pa/_dkyil na so shing gnas 'gyur ba'i rin po che'i ljon shing srid du dpag tshad brgyad yod la chu zheng gab pa/_rtsa ba dang sdong po dang yal ga dang lo 'dab dang me tog dang 'bras bu rnams rin po che sna bdun las grub pa/_gnas 
[\[10b.2\]]de shin tu gtsang zhing tha gru yangs pa logs bzhi'i ngos re la dpag tshad bcu gnyis re yod pa'i dkyil 'khor ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba/_skye bo thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba blta na sdug pa phyogs mtshams rnams su chu skyes thang skyes kyi me tog sna tshogs dang /_ta ma la'i shing dang /_tsam+pa ka'i 
[\[10b.3\]]shing dang /_ku shu'i shing dang /_mya ngan med dang /_a ti muk+ta ka dang /_su ma nA dang /_ka dam+pa'i shing dang /_n+ya gro d+ha dang n+ya gro d+ha chen po dang /_ga bur gyi shing dang /_se rgod tsher ma can gyi shing dang /_shug pa dang /_yu ti ka dang tin+tu ka'i shing la sogs pa'i ljon pa'i phreng bas brgyan 
[\[10b.4\]]pa/_de rnams kyi steng na ne tso dang rma bya dang ka la ping+ka dang shang shang te'u la sogs pa bkra shis pa'i bya sna tshogs gser gyi mchu dang gser gyi gtsug phud can/_spu dang gshog sgro thams cad rin po che sna bdun las grub pa/_snyan cing 'jebs pa'i skad sna mang po sgrogs pa/_de thams 
[\[10b.5\]]cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu dang /_byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs sngags rig pa'i byin rlabs las byung ba sha stag go/_/de nas pa tha ri'i grong khyer gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad shin tu ngo mtshar bar gyur nas phan 
[\[10b.6\]]tshun du gcig gis gcig la 'di skad ces 'dri mol byed do/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar che'o/_/grogs po dag 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po sngon chad mthong ma myong thos ma myong ba 'phral du byung ba 'di su zhig gi mthu yin/_rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di sus bstan pa yin/_gor ma chag par dzam+bu gling 'dir 
[\[10b.7\]]bkra shis pa dang phan pa dang bde ba phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ram zer to/_/de'i tshe rgan rabs dag gis skye bo'i tshogs de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/cho 'phrul chen po 'di ni gdon mi za bar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi mthu yin no/_/de bzhin 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]gshegs pa des sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir khyed cag gi bsti gnas la gshegs pa'i ltas su rdzu 'phrul 'di bstan pa yin no/_/bdag cag so so'i gnas su log la rang rang gi nus tshad la dpag pa'i zhal zas bzang po'i bye brag mang po bshams te 
[\[11a.2\]]sang nyin de bzhin gshegs pa de la gdugs tshod 'bul zhing mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/de nas skye bo de dag thams cad rings pa rings par rang rang gi khyim du song nas mtshan mo'i ring de la dri zhim la ro bda' ba'i zhal zas bza' btung sna tshogs sbyar zhing dri zhim po'i me tog dang /_dri'i byug pa 
[\[11a.3\]]dang bdug spos dang phye ma phur ma dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa dang /_rol mo pheg rdob pa'i bye brag mang po bshams nas lam rnams su nye bar lhags te de bzhin gshegs pa bsgugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan des lnga len gyi ljongs su 'khor 
[\[11a.4\]]mang po le chos ston cing bzhugs pa'i skabs shig glo bur du rin po che sna bdun gyis spud pa'i bum pa so shing dang bcas pa cig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byung bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis bum pa so shing dang bcas pa gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/zhal 
[\[11a.5\]]'dzum pa mdzad nas kyang rtsibs stong 'khor los mtshan pa'i phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang ste bum pa so shing dang bcas pa phyag tu bzhes la cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_e ma bkra shis pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta bu phyogs gang nas byung /_
[\[11a.6\]]yul phyogs gang zhig tu bcom ldan 'das gdan 'dren pa'i mtshan ma zhig yin snyam zer to/_/de'i tshe 'khor gyi nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam dag dam pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig 'dus par gyur te stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[11a.7\]]phyag 'tshal zhing g.yas skor du lan gsum bskor ba byas thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bkra shis pa'i mtshan ma 'di phyogs gang nas byung /_bum pa so shing dang bcas pa'i rgyu mtshan ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol zhes gsol pa 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bum pa so shing dang bcas pa 'di pa tha ri'i grong khyer chen po nas 'ongs pa ste sa phyogs de rang spyan 'dren pa'i phyir ro/_/rnam dag dam pa'i blo gros khyod 'khor rnams la 'di skad du/_nga'i phyag phyir bsod snyoms la 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams 
[\[11b.2\]]tshul shing longs shig ces 'grems shig_/sang snga bar pa tha ri'i grong khyer chen por rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro'o zhes gsungs so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam dag dam pa'i blo gros kyis tshul shing bzung nas 'dus pa'i 'khor 
[\[11b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad la brim zhing /_rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi yul la 'jug nus pa rnams tshul shing longs shig bcom ldan 'das kyis sang snga bar pa tha ri'i grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la cha'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[11b.4\]]rnam dag dam pa'i blo gros kyis de ltar tshul shing bri mas tshar nas slar bcom ldan 'das la gsol zhing bcom ldan 'das gdan 'dren par bskul to/_/de nas de'i sang zhogs snga bar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis chos gos gsum legs par gsol nas/_dpal 
[\[11b.5\]]dang gzi brjid kyi rgyan mchog tu 'bar zhing /_'dus pa'i 'khor mang po dang bcas rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par rol ba'i stobs kyis bar snang la 'phags te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i 
[\[11b.6\]]'khor gyi tshogs mang bos rol mo dang sil snyan sna tshogs dkrol zhing bdug spos dang /_me tog dang byug pa dang phye ma phur ma dang na bza' dang rgyan la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs kyis mchod pas yongs su bskor bzhin par nam mkha'i lam nas yud tsam gcig la pa tha 
[\[11b.7\]]ri'i grong khyer chen por phebs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/_/'khor thams cad kyang rang rang gi sprul pa'i pad+ma'i khyim gyi theg pa dang bcas 'dus te 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas pa tha ri'i grong khyer gyi skye 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]bo thams cad rab tu dga' zhing mgu nas/_rang rang gi legs par bshams pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das dang /_'khor byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang /_lha klu sde brgyad kyi tshogs thams cad la mchod 
[\[12a.2\]]pa byed do/_/gdugs tshod kyi dus la babs pa na/_kha dog dri ro phun sum tshogs pa'i zhal zas sna tshogs 'bul zhing brim ste/_ci bde bar tshim par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pas gdugs tshod legs par bzhes nas bkru bshal mdzad de/_spyod lam dag 
[\[12a.3\]]par mdzad la 'khor rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas gral stan la [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]'tsham par 'khod do/_/de nas pa tha ri'i grong khyer gyi skye bo de dag thams cad slar yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag dang bskor ba byas nas don gyi rgyu las brtsams te/_snga ma'i 
[\[12a.4\]]gnas tshul 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gsan du gsol/_grong khyer 'di'i shar sgo'i phyi rol na a su ri zhes bya ba'i skyed tshal zhig yod do/_/grong khyer de'i nang na srin po'i bu mo lha min mdzes ma zhes bya ba rang bzhin ngan pa gdug rtsub che ba khro zhing gtum pa gcig 
[\[12a.5\]]gnas te/_rgyun par khye'u bu mo rnams kyi mdangs dang gzi brjid 'phrog cing srog kyang 'phrog par byed pas bdag cag rnams nyin mtshan med par 'jigs pas nyen te sdug bsngal zhing bde ba'i go skabs cung zad kyang mi thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba chen 
[\[12a.6\]]pos dgongs la sdug bsngal 'di bsal ba'i thabs bstan du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo/_/de ltar gsol ba btab pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan des/_skye bo'i tshogs de dag la brtse ba'i dgongs pas zhal 
[\[12a.7\]]gyis bzhes te cang mi gsung bar gnang nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'dzum pa mdzad pas zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog brgya stong du 'phros/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su khengs pas sems can thams cad dbugs phyung bar mdzad cing khyad par 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]a su ri'i skyed mos tshal de rdzu 'phrul gyi 'od zer me'i phung pos bsreg kun tu rab tu sreg go/_/der gnas pa'i srin po'i bu mo 'khor khri phrag mang po dang bcas tshom bu tshom bur phral nas phyogs bzhir 'thor zhing rgyug go/_/skad chen pos ngu zhing cho nge 'debs/_kye ma kyi hud bdag cag rnams 
[\[12b.2\]]su la skyabs su 'gro/_su zhig gis sdug bsngal 'di las skyob nus zer zhing 'o dod 'bod de ngu bar gyur to/_/de nas bar snang na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod rnams de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi drung du song la phyag 'tshal 
[\[12b.3\]]zhing skyabs su song na sdug bsngal 'di las thar bar gyur te bde ba dang yid bde ba 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/de nas lha min mdzes ma 'khor khri phrag mang po dang bcas rings pa rings par pa tha ri'i grong khyer gyi sprul ba'i dkyil 'khor ga la ba der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das 'od 
[\[12b.4\]]zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing /_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams bskyab tu gsol/_'jig rten mgon po bskyab tu gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bskyab tu gsol/_deng phyin chad bdag cag gis sems can la gnod pa mi bgyid do/_/
[\[12b.5\]]sems can la 'tshe bar mi bgyid do zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar dgongs pas zhal gyis bzhes nas/_byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum rnam par rol pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi byin rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de las langs te 
[\[12b.6\]]byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs gsungs so/_/de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang gzungs sngags kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang de na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad lham me lham mer mngon sum du snang bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas de dag 
[\[12b.7\]]thams cad kyis rang rang gi 'khor rnams la chos ston pa yang lhang lhang thos par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas so so'i zhing na bzhugs 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]bzhin mgrin gcig dbyangs gcig gis legs so legs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan khyed kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs gsungs pa legs so legs so/_/legs par gsungs so zhes 
[\[13a.2\]]gsungs so/_/de nas srin mo lha min mdzes ma 'khor dang bcas pa btul zhing dge ba bcu'i lam la 'god/_skye bo'i tshogs grangs med pa mang po yang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'god do/_/de nas grong khyer de nyid rin po che sna bdun las grub par gyur te/_rin po che sna bdun gyi char 
[\[13a.3\]]yang babs so/_/dzam+bu gling gi skye rgu thams cad kyang sdug bsngal med pa'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa la longs spyod par gyur to/_/bram ze chen po nga de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u lo bdun lon pa zhig ste/_gzungs sngags 'di thos pas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i bstan pa la rnam par 
[\[13a.4\]]dag pa'i dad pa thob cing da lta bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes pa yin no/_/bram ze chen po khyod kyis the tshom dang yid gnyis ma byed cig_/bram ze chen po khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na srin mo lha min mdzes ma zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de'i dus dge ba'i sems ma 
[\[13a.5\]]bzung zhing sems can mang po la gnod pa byas pa'i 'bras bu bskal pa grangs med du mar ngan song myul sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa myongs so/_/mthar de bzhin gshegs pa de la skyabs su song zhing bslab pa bzung bas da lta bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes shing shes rab che la longs 
[\[13a.6\]]spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur/_'on kyang las kyi lhag mas bu tsha med par gyur pa'o/_/bram ze chen po de'i dus kyi pa tha ri'i grong khyer na gnas pa skye bo de dag ni/_da lta nga'i 'khor du byung ba'i lha klu gnod sbyin dri za lha min mkha' lding mi'am ci la sogs pa'i 'dus pa'i 
[\[13a.7\]]tshoms chen po 'di dag go/_/bram ze chen po khyod de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lha min mdzes ma'i 'khor khri phrag mang po de dag da lta gzhan su dag yin nam snyam pa'i yid gnyis dang /_nem nur byed na bram ze chen po de ltar ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lha min 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]mdzes ma'i 'khor khri phrag mang po ni/_da lta nga'i 'khor 'dus pa chen po'i nang du byung ba'i bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rig byed smra ba rnams dang /_gcer bu pa dang /_rtog ge pa gzhan dag sgyu rtsal shes rigs dang /_dur khrod na gnas pa'i brtul zhugs can dang /_tshem 
[\[13b.2\]]bu pa dang /_glang ru'i brtul zhugs can dang /_ri sul na gnas pa'i brtul zhugs can 'di dag go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba rnams de ltar bshad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas 'khor 'dus pa chen po de dag gis sngon gyi sbyor ba'i 
[\[13b.3\]]rgyu rkyen de lta bu thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar bar gyur te dga' zhing mgu nas/_bdug spos dang me tog dang byug pa dang phye ma phur ma dang /_me tog gi phreng ba dang na bza' dang /_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs bsnams nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing 
[\[13b.4\]]g.yas skor du bskor ba lan gsum byas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshig gcig gis mthun par gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_rtog pa'i rgyal po 
[\[13b.5\]]byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/_rig pa'i rgyal po de ni sems can thams cad kyi dmigs bu dang sgron mer gyur pa ste/_khyad par du yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya'i tha ma la babs 
[\[13b.6\]]pa'i tshe sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang nas/_zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'phros/_
[\[13b.7\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsal bar byas te/_de dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du lham me lham mer snang bar gyur to/_/de dag gi chos bshad pa yang lhang nge lhang nger thos par gyur to/_/gnas de nyid rin po che'i ljon shing rtsa ba sdong po yal ga lo 'dab me tog 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]'bras bu rnams rin po che sna bdun las grub pa yid du 'ong ba'i lha'i shing sha stag gi tshal chen pos phyogs mtshams brgyan par gyur to/_/dzam+bu gling gi sems can thams cad kyang lha'i bde ba la longs spyod par gyur pa la sogs pa'i rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rol pa'i 
[\[14a.2\]]byin rlabs kyi snang ba 'jig rten 'di na mngon sum du gyur to/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshul de dag mthong nas dga' bas 'dzum pa mdzad cing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis te phyag 'tshal zhing lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom 
[\[14a.3\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba rgya chen po rgyun mi 'chad pa 'byung ba'i phyir rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[14a.4\]]'das kyis cang mi gsung bar zhal gyis bzhes nas sangs rgyas thams cad la nye bar blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khams ma lus par mngon sum du snang bar gyur te/_
[\[14a.5\]]sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa thams cad mda' 'ben gcig gis tsam du nye bar gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad mgrin gcig dbyangs gcig gis 'di skad du legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa khyod 
[\[14a.6\]]kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di gsung bar brtsams pa shin tu legs so/_/legs par gsungs shig_/rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa khyed kyis gsungs pa'i dus la bab bo/_/bdag cag 
[\[14a.7\]]thams cad kyang rjes su yi rang ngo zhes gsungs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lhung bzed gcig bsnams nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad der bsdus te bcom ldan 'das la phul to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas phyag tu bzhes la mdun gyi nam mkhar por to/_/de nas lhung bzed des nam mkha'i dbyings kyi khyon gang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur gyur te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su gang bar gyur nas de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[14b.2\]]mgrin gcig dbyangs gcig gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa legs so legs so zhes gsungs shing /_de dag thams cad re re'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang /_shAkya thub pa so so'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal lhung bzed 'bul 
[\[14b.3\]]bzhin pa re re snang bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'ubs kyis 'dus shing rnam 
[\[14b.4\]]par spros pa 'di su'i don du yin/_'di'i rgyu gang /_rkyen gang /_ci'i phyir 'od zer 'gyed la rnam par 'phrul ba 'di bstan/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_ci phyag na rdo rje khyed kyis 'od kyi snang ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyu rkyen mi shes sam/_phyag na rdo rjes smras pa/_'jam dpal mi shes so/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[14b.5\]]pa thams cad 'dus pa dang rnam par spros pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di 'dra bdag gis sngon chad ma mthong ma thos shing de ring bdag la thog mar ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/_rdo rje gsor zhing bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas bcom ldan 
[\[14b.6\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/chos gang zhig bstan par brtsams pas deng 'dir sngon chad mthong ma myong thos ma myong ba'i rdzu 'phrul ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu zhig ston/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje re zhig sgug cig_/skad cig yud tsam na mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs 
[\[14b.7\]]ma thag rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i mchod rten dpangs su dpag tshad bdun stong dang rgyar dpag tshad lnga stong yod pa zhig sa brtol te byung bar gyur to/_/mchod rten de ni lha'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis sbud pa 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba/_lha rdzas kyi gos kyi dar dpyangs 'phyang ba/_nor bu rin po che mu tig gi dra bas 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]khebs cing rin po che'i phyang 'phrul dang /_gser gyi dril bu dang dril bu'i g.yer kha las snyan pa'i sgra skad sna tshogs byung ba'o/_/de'i tshe bar snang nas lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas lag na mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs thogs pa babs te/_rin po che'i mchod rten de la 
[\[15a.2\]]mchod pa dang phyag dang bskor ba byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la mchod rten de'i sgo phyed par bsgos so/_/sgo phyed par bsgos pa dang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje sku las ye shes kyi me'i phung po rab tu 'bar ba/_rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_lag 
[\[15a.3\]]na rdo rje gsor zhing zhal khro gnyer bsdus pa'i nyams can/_'jigs su rung ba'i dpa' byad dang ldan pa des rin po che'i mchod rten de'i drung du song nas phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste mchod rten de'i sgo 'phar rab tu phye'o/_/phyed pa dang de'i nang na dzam+bu chu bo'i gser las grub pa'i seng ge'i khri rin po che sna 
[\[15a.4\]]bdun gyis spa ba lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs kyis khebs dang ldan pa'i stan la/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu rgyas pa'i gser zhal mchog tu dpa' ba'i 'od zer rgyal mtshan gyi tog ces bya ba bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs bzhin pa 
[\[15a.5\]]snang bar gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas shin tu rgyas pa'i gser zhal mchog tu dpa' ba'i 'od zer rgyal mtshan gyi tog des 'di skad ces bsngags pa mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa legs so legs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa khyed kyis 'di lta bu'i ngo mtshar che ba'i rdzu 'phrul 
[\[15a.6\]]bstan cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa dang spros par mdzad cing /_don dam par chos thams cad 'du 'bral yong ye mi mnga' bzhin 'jig rten 'di na rdzu 'phrul ngo mtshar 'di lta bu bstan pa 'di ni/_sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la yang ma byung ngo /_/da lta bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa khyed 
[\[15a.7\]]kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das khyed kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir rjes su brtse bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mngon sum du snang ba'i rnam par rol pa'i rdzu 'phrul bstan pa dang nga'i mchod rten sa 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]steng du byung ba'i rgyu rkyen 'di nyid kyang byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs kyi mthu dang byin rlabs las byung ba lags pas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'chad pa'i dus la bab bo/_/de skad ces gsungs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[15b.2\]]pa shin tu rgyas pa'i gser zhal mchog tu dpa' ba'i 'od zer rgyal mtshan gyi tog gis bskul ba dang du bzhes nas/_rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gsungs so/_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/_bi pu la ba dan kAny+tsa no ta k+Ship+ta/_pra b+hA sa ke tu mUr+d+ha ne/_ta thA ga tA ya/_
[\[15b.3\]]ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/_na mo b+ha ga bA te/_shAkya mu na ye/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_bo d+hi bo d+hi/_bo d+hi ni bo d+hi ni/_sarba ta thA ga ta go tsa re/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_ha ra ha ra/_pra ha ra pra ha ra/_ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta d+ha re/_tsu lu tsu lu/_Sha Ta rasmi sa h+tso di te/_sarba ta thA ga ta b+h+riShik+te/_gu Ne 
[\[15b.4\]]gu Na ba te/_sarba bud+d+ha gu NA ba b+hA se/_mi li mi li/_ga ga na ta le/_pra tiSh+Thi te/_sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/_na b+ha sta le/_sha me sha me/_pra sha me pra sha me/_sarba pA paM pra sha ma Na/_sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne/_hu lu hu lu/_ma hA bo d+hi mArga saM pra tiSh+Thi te/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_su pra tiSh+Thi te shud+d+he 
[\[15b.5\]]swA hA/_rtsa ba'i sngags so/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'di gsungs ma thag tu/_phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis legs so legs so/_/legs par gsungs so zhes bsngags pa mdzad do/_/
[\[15b.6\]]sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis kyang legs so legs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa khyed kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir gzungs kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs pa legs so legs par gsungs so zhes mthun par bsngags pa mdzad ma thag tu sa chen po 
[\[15b.7\]]'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/lhas me tog sna tshogs kyi char phabs so/_/de bzhin du byug pa dang phye ma phur ma dang /_na bza' dang nor bu rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang /_dbu rgyan dang phyag gdub dang do shal dang ska rags la sogs pa bsnams nas mchod cing snyan cing 'jebs pa'i glu len/_rol mo 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]sna tshogs dkrol/_me tog gi char de yang 'di lta ste/_ut+pa la dang pad+ma dmar po dang pad+ma le brgan rtsi dang buN+Da rI ga dang /_man+dA ra ba dang man+dA ra ba chen po dang /_me tog ro tsa dang many+dzu ka dang many+dzu ka chen po dang su ma nA dang /_wA R+shi ka dang tsam+pa ka dang sau gan+d+hi ka la sogs 
[\[16a.2\]]pa'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char babs shing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang bstod bsngags byas so/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs chen po'i nang /_gzungs kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs pas la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur to/_/la la ni dgra bcom 
[\[16a.3\]]pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/la las phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_la las lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_la las rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'ga' zhig ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/'ga' zhig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to/_/'ga' zhig bla na med pa'i 
[\[16a.4\]]byang chub tu lung bstan thob po/_/sems can la las lhar skye ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/sems can dmyal bar skyes pa rnams ni sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar gyur to/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ltung ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba thams cad kyang so so'i skye gnas kyi 
[\[16a.5\]]sdug bsngal las grol te mi'i lus thob nas byang chub kyi lam la zhugs par gyur to/_/de ltar dzam+bu gling 'dir ngo mtshar ba'i rdzu 'phrul byung zhing sems can thams cad phan pa dang bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thob par gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang bdag phyag 
[\[16a.6\]]na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'o/_/dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_rigs kyi 
[\[16a.7\]]bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog po dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni ji tsam zhig lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]pa/_legs so legs so/_/gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis don 'di 'dri ba ni shin tu legs so/_/dri ba 'di ni mchog go/_/dam pa'o/_/'on kyang khyod song nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la dris shig dang des khyod la legs par ston par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces gsungs pa 
[\[16b.2\]]dang /_phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi thad du phyin nas g.yas skor du bskor ba byas te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu gang la la zhig gis/_byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_
[\[16b.3\]]gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni ji tsam zhig lags/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/_phyag na rdo rje legs par nyon cig_/dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed yod pa'i sa gzhi ri dang thang dang /_
[\[16b.4\]]la dang sgang che chung thams cad brgya cha stong cha tha na spu tsam gyi bar gshag cing phye yang rdul phra rab kyis ma khyab pa'i gnas shig mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ngas lha'i mig gis bltas pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i cha thams cad kyang ring bsrel gyis khyab pa 
[\[16b.5\]]ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i cha thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi ring bsrel dang /_rus pa'i ring bsrel dang /_sha'i ring bsrel dang /_yungs 'bru lta bu'i ring bsrel gyis stongs pa'i gnas shig ngas ma mthong ngo /_/phyag na rdo rje mngon par shes pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[16b.6\]]rtsal dang ldan pa'i skye bo zhig gis de'i grangs ji tsam bgrang bar nus na/_phyag na rdo rje skye bo de blo gros dang shes rtsal phun sum tshogs pa zhig lags sam/_phyag na rdo rjes smras pa/_de de bzhin no/_/'jam dpal de de bzhin te/_skye bo de ni blo gros dang shes rtsal phun sum tshogs pa ngo 
[\[16b.7\]]mtshar du gyur pa zhig go/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_phyag na rdo rje nyon cig rdul phra rab de dag dang ring bsrel de lta bu'i grangs dang tshad ni bgrang ba dang dpag par rung gis/_phyag na rdo rje rdul phra rab dang /_ring bsrel de dag gi grangs rnams de ltar bgrang ba dang dpag pa ji lta ba bzhin du/_de 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pas bskal ba'am/_bskal ba las lhag gam/_bskal pa stong du bzhugs te gsungs kyang /_rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs kyi phan yon bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni dpe'i sgo nas kyang rdzogs par bstan par mi nus 
[\[17a.2\]]so/_/phyag na rdo rje rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di ni de lta bu'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o/_/gang zhig gzungs 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa dang /_kun chub par byad pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan pa dang /_tshul 
[\[17a.3\]]bzhin yid la byed pa lta zhog_/glegs bam la bris te mchod pa bkur sti tsam byed pa'i skye bos kyang tshad med grangs med dpag gis mi langs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po zad mi shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor der 'dus pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma 
[\[17a.4\]]yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i tshig de thos nas ma lus par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to/_/la las ni bla na med pa 
[\[17a.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu a la la legs par bshad do zhes bsngags nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su 
[\[17a.6\]]mchi'o/_/ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul la dbang bsgyur ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mdzad pa dang phrin las kyi bdag nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o zhes ched du brjod do/_/de 
[\[17a.7\]]nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal ji lta bur byang chub rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'di la brten nas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskrun pa dang bskyed par mdzad/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_phyag na rdo rje 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]tshul 'di ni bcom ldan 'das la gsol bar rigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul 'di ma lus par mkhyen to/_/de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[17b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das tshul ji lta bur byang chub rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'di la brten nas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskrun par mdzad bskyed par mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig_/lag na rdo rje gzungs 
[\[17b.3\]]'di la brten nas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskrun pa dang skyed par byed pa'i thabs ngas khyod la bshad do/_/'di lta ste/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_
[\[17b.4\]]lus dang yan lag bkrus shing gos gsar gtsang ma gon te/_ba lci dang dri bzang bsres pa'i sa gtsang gis maN+Dal gru bzhi pa byas la/_ba byung lnga dang dri bzang gi chus legs par chag chag gdab/_me tog legs par bkram zhing mchod pa yang bsham/_gzungs 'dis byin gyis 
[\[17b.5\]]brlabs pa'i chus sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la khrus bya/_de bzhin du gzungs 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa'i tsan+dan dkar po'i phye ma sbyar ba'i gur gum gyis byug_/de nas ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa 'bul zhing bskor ba dang phyag byas nas sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar 'dug la gzungs sngags lan 
[\[17b.6\]]cig brjod cing mar me gcig bud par bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang bskyed pa'i ngas dpe gcig ston gyis nyon cig_/dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i klu'i rgyal po chen po thams cad kyis so so nas char gyi thigs pa rdul phra rab tsam 
[\[17b.7\]]pa'i char chen po 'bebs par byas te/_de la mi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod la/_mi des char de'i thigs pa re re nas bgrangs pas de'i grangs dang tshad rtogs nus kyis/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sngar bstan pa ltar mchod pa dang phyag byas pa la sogs pa'i phan yon gyi grangs dang tshad ni de bzhin gshegs pas bskal ba'am/_bskal pa las lhag gam/_bskal pa brgya stong gi bar bzhugs te char 
[\[18a.2\]]gyi thigs pa bgrangs pa ji lta bur gsungs kyang rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje gong du bstan pa'i sku gzugs la khrus gsol ba tsam gyi bsod nams kyi tshad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mi mkhyen to/_/lag na rdo rje gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang bskyed par 
[\[18a.3\]]bya ba dang /_bsam pa'i don 'grub par byed pa'i las tshogs kyi rten 'brel grub pa'i tshul mdo tsam zhig bshad kyis nyon cig_/lag na rdo rje gang la la zhig gis byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'di gro ga la bris te/_phyag mtshan gyi rdo rje'i nang du bcug pa'am/_sku gzugs 
[\[18a.4\]]kyi nang bcug pa'am/_khog par bris pa'am/_lha khang gi gan+d+ho la'i nang bcug pa'am/_mchod rten gyi nang bcug na/_des mchod rten gcig byas pas 'bum byas par 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten de snyed bzhengs pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ngam/_dge slong 
[\[18a.5\]]ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di bris te lam gyi bzhi mdo'am/_ri mthon po'i spo'am/_chu chen po'i 'gram mam/_grong khyer gyi sgo'am/_theg lam chen por mchod rten chen po 
[\[18a.6\]]gcig byas la char khebs sam gdugs kyi nang du gzungs 'di bcug na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des ngas sngar dpe drangs te bstan pa ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi sku'i ring bsrel dang /_chos kyi 
[\[18a.7\]]dbyings kyi ring bsrel dang /_rus pa'i ring bsrel dang /_sha'i ring bsrel de dag thams cad la mchod rten byas pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas dkyil 'khor yin no/_/mchod rten zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku'i sku gdung gi bang so yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i gsung dang ldan pas de ltar gsungs so/_/lag na rdo rje gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_de lta bu'i mchod rten de dag la me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa mchod pa'i 
[\[18b.2\]]yo byad ci 'byor pas mchod pa byed pa'am/_thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal ba'am/_lan gcig tsam bskor ba byas kyang /_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig kyang rung ste de'i bskrun pa dang bskyed pa'i 
[\[18b.3\]]bsod nams kyi phung po ni gzhal du med cing bgrangs su ma mchis pa'o/_/sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas ni rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 
[\[18b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/mchod rten 'ba' zhig mchod par gyur pa ma yin gyi/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams la yang lha rdzas kyi mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags dang mtshan ma'i rgyan 
[\[18b.5\]]gyi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du lus rnams par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba ni nam yang chud mi za bar 'gyur ro/_/slar yang mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin no/_/lag 
[\[18b.6\]]na rdo rje skye bo gang la la zhig gis lder bzo'am/_thang kar bris pa'am/_shing ngam rin po che'i rigs kyi rdo la brkos sam/_dri bzang gi sman 'dam las byas pa'am/_zangs btul ma'am/_gser dngul zangs te lcags gsum bsres pa'am/_lcags sam/_dngul 
[\[18b.7\]]'ba' zhig gam/_gser rkyang ngam/_de dag gang yang rung bas mchod rten nam sku gzugs byas la/_rgya shog gam/_dar dkar po la gzungs sngags 'di bris nas mchod rten nam sku gzugs kyi nang du bcug ste/_phyag dang /_mchod pa dang /_bkur sti rim gro byed na/_
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]lag na rdo rje dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi tshad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis gzhal/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pas dpag_/
[\[19a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pas sngar bstan pa'i ring bsrel gyi grangs ji snyed pa dang /_rgya mtsho chen po'i chu thigs ji tsam gyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i mchod rten dang sku gzugs byas pa dang /_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen 
[\[19a.3\]]ma'am/_gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des mchod rten nam sku gzugs gzungs 'dis snying po can gcig la phyag bya ba dang mchod pa byas par mi 'gyur la/_mchod rten de snyed dang /_sku gzugs de snyed pa phyag dang mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu thob par 
[\[19a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di ni dpal dang gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pa lags so/_/bkra shis dang phan yon chen po dang ldan pa lags 
[\[19a.5\]]so/_/rdzu 'phrul dang nus stobs chen po dang ldan pa lags so/_/gzungs sngags 'di'i ming tsam 'dzin pas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bskyed cing bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje dge slong ngam/_dge 
[\[19a.6\]]slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po yongs su rdzogs par kun nas bslangs pas/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag dang mchod 
[\[19a.7\]]pa dang bsnyen bkur byed par 'dod par gyur tshe/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di yi ger bris nas za ma tog tu bcug la/_nyin re bzhin dri bzang gi chus khrus 'bul ba dang /_mchod pa dang phyag dang bskor ba byed na/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas sngar bstan pa'i dpes bsdus pa thams cad la spyod lam rnam pa bzhi yis bar ma chad par bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[19b.2\]]rigs kyi bu mo de la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis lung ston par 'gyur/_de dag thams cad kyis dbugs dbyung bar 'gyur ro/_/skye bo de myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[19b.3\]]las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang /_rgyal po chen po sde bzhi rnams la bka' stsal pa/_de ring ngas rgyal ba'i sras po khyed cag la gzungs 
[\[19b.4\]]sngags rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di yongs su gtad do/_/rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya'i tha mar 'jig rten du snubs par ma byed cig_/legs par bsrung ba dang sba bar byos shig_/gzungs sngags 'di 'chang ba'i skye bo rnams legs par bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba 
[\[19b.5\]]bar mdzod cig_/phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin dang cho ga tshul bzhin du nyams su len pa rnams la byin gyis rlobs shig_/'dod pa rnams bsgrub par byos shig_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_gsang ba'i bdag 
[\[19b.6\]]po phyag na rdo rje dang /_rgyal po chen po sde bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' yang dag par nos 
[\[19b.7\]]so/_/rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di 'chang ba'i skyes bu chen po de bdag cag gis bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sbed par byed cing /_de'i 'byor pa thams cad phun sum tshogs par byed do/_/mgon med pa skyabs med par gyur pa rnams kyang dbugs dbyung zhing mgo 'dren par bgyid cing /_
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]byang chub snying po la bzhugs shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur pa'i bar rnam pa thams cad du bsrung ba dang bskyab par bgyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang 
[\[20a.2\]]rgyal po chen po sde bzhi la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas legs so legs so/_/khyod cag gis dam bcas pa de bzhin du byos shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa chen po la thun mong du bka' stsal pa/_gzungs sngags 'di ni las thams cad grub par byed pa/_dngos 
[\[20a.3\]]grub thams cad ster ba/_sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad pa/_don thams cad thogs pa med par 'grub par mdzad pa ste/_lus dag par bkrus la gos gsar gtsang ma gon nas nyin re bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byed na/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[20a.4\]]zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad ring du spang bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i sa la gnas pa thams cad kyis skyob par 'gyur ro/_/gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang rgyal po chen po sde bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas rtag tu bsrung zhing skyong ba dang 
[\[20a.5\]]sba bar yang byed do/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/skye zhing skye bar rin po che'i pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing /_mngal gyi skye gnas yongs su spang ba yin no/_/skye ba thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/lan nyi shu rtsa 
[\[20a.6\]]gcig bzlas na dmyal bar ltung nges kyi sdig pa'i las thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/nam yang ngan song du lhung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dgra thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/lan bdun bzlas na rtsod pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes bco lnga la nyin mtshan 
[\[20a.7\]]thog thag gcig tu smyung bar gnas shing /_khrus byas la gos gsar gtsang ma gyon nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la/_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_mar me la sogs pas mchod nas/_byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'di lan stong du 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]bzlas brjod byas tshe/_bzlas pa zin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pas phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas sgrub pa po'i spyi bor bzhag ste dbugs dbyung bar mdzad cing legs so legs so/_/rig pa 'dzin 
[\[20b.2\]]pa chen po/_skyes bu chen po khyod kyis bsgrub pa'i byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs legs par grub bo/_/rig pa 'dzin pa chen po khyod snying stobs chen po'o/_/'bad rtsol chen pos dka' thub byas te dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa thob bo/_/gang 'dod pa'i 
[\[20b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bgrod par gyis shig ces gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar gsungs ma thag tu rig pa 'dzin pa de'i lus la 'od zer gyi phung po chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas sngags kyi rgyud thams cad las ji snyed gsungs pa'i dngos grub thams cad ma lus par grub par 
[\[20b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dzin pa des sngon mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa yin kyang de'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad nyin mtshan thog thag gcig la smyung ba byas zhing bzlas brjod byed pa des yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/dngos 
[\[20b.5\]]grub thams cad tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba'i dmar phyogs kyi tshes bcu bzhi la lus legs par bkrus la gos gsar gtsang ma gon nas nyin mtshan thog thag gcig smyung ba byas shing sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zangs kyi snod gcig yungs kar gyis gang bar 
[\[20b.6\]]byas te/_gzungs sngags 'di lan stong bzlas brjod byas pas byin gyis brlabs nas las sbyor gyi dus su klu gnas pa'i rdzing bur yungs kar de spar gang blugs na/_klu de dag dga' zhing rig pa 'dzin pa de'i dbang du 'gyur/_klu'i pho brang du gdan 'dren nas zhabs la phyag bgyid nas 'dod pa 
[\[20b.7\]]thams cad ster bar 'gyur/_gang du gnas pa'i sa phyogs su phyi bzhin 'brangs la bka' nod par 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar de phyogs bzhir gtor na rdzi char drag po bzlog go/_/sha sbrang dang /_ne tso dang /_khu byug dang /_cha ga pa la sogs pa'i srog chags ma rungs pa thams cad 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]kyi kha bcing bar 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar me la btab na me mi sbar ro/_/chu klung la btab na chu rgyun 'chad do/_/tshong pa'i nor rdzas la btab na chom rkun gyis mi khyer/_sgrib shing du yang 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo la gtor na rgyal po dang /_btsun mo 
[\[21a.2\]]dang /_blon po 'khor dang bcas pa dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/nya ma pho mo'i tshogs la gtor na thams cad bdag la mchod pa dang bkur sti byed par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs la gtor na dgra thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/_/lam du zhugs tshe 'phrang sgor gtor na srung mis 
[\[21a.3\]]mi mthong ngo /_/zhing la gtor na srog chags ma rungs pa'i kha bcings par 'gyur ro/_/than pa byung tshe klu gnas pa'i chur blugs na gru char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/ser ba dang rdzi char drag po babs tshe bar snang la gtor na mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/dgra'i khyim la gtor na 'khon yongs su 
[\[21a.4\]]zhi bar 'gyur te phyin chad mdza' bshes su 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer gyi sgo la gtor na de'i nang gnas kyi sems can gang dag gnod pas gtses pa thams cad gnod pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams ni phyogs su byer bar 'gyur ro/_/g.yul sprad pa'i 
[\[21a.5\]]tshe pha rol po'i phyogs su gtor na dgra bo pham zhing rang phyogs pa rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/gshags 'gyed pa'am rtsod pa byed tshe khar bcug na ngag btsan zhing chos phyogs thob par 'gyur ro/_/chu la blugs nas nad kyis zin pa dag la 'thung du bcug na nad de zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gdon 
[\[21a.6\]]kyis zin pa rnams la yungs kar dang kar bsres pas bdugs na gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/ba lang la sogs pa phyugs kyi rims dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i rims ngan thams cad la yungs kar sa dang bsres nas lam gyi bzhi mdor bsregs na rims nad thams cad zhi 
[\[21a.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/gtsug phud kyi nang du bcug na gang du phyin sar skye bo thams cad dga' zhing mgu nas bdag la mchod pa dang bkur sti byed par 'gyur ro/_/ci zer ba mnyan par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rig pa 'dzin pas tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo'i cha nas brtsams te lag pa gnyis 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sku gzugs kyi zhabs la 'jus shing phyi nyin tshes bco lnga'i tho rangs kyi bar du/_bar mi chad par bzlas brjod byas na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'ongs nas 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/
