[\[21b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i zhabs la 'jus shing /_gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pa'i gu gul dang zhun mar sbyar bas bdug pa phul na/_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje de'i mdun du lus snang bar byas te/_'dod pa thams cad stsol bar 
[\[21b.3\]]byed/_las thams cad grub par byed/_bu bzhin du skyong zhing gsang sngags kyi rgyud yongs su gtad par byed do/_/gnod sbyin nor bu bzang po la 'jus shing bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na nor gyi phung po rgya chen po dang bcas lus snang bar byas te nor chen po ster bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam 
[\[21b.4\]]thos kyi bu'i mgo la bzhag ste/_a ka ru nag po'i dud pas bdug cing lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/dpal gyi lha mo'i gdong la blta zhing stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na yang gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang tshon sna lngas gnod sbyin gyi gzugs 
[\[21b.5\]]bris la lan stong dang nyi shu bzla zhing sardza ra dza'i spos kyis bdugs na gnod sbyin mo mdun du byung nas mngags gzhug tu khas blangs te/_ci bcol ba'i las rnam pa brgya'am stong yang rung ste ma lus par grub par byed do/_/da ni ras bris kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/_ras bris la brten nas 
[\[21b.6\]]las thams cad sgrub pa'i thabs la/_kha tshar ma nyams shing longs ma spyad pa'i ras gtsang ma srid du khru bzhi yod pa zhig lpags pa las byung ba min pa'i sbyin gtsang mas btul zhing legs par brdar ba la bzo bo gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la gnas shing gtsang sbra dang ldan pas bri 
[\[21b.7\]]bar bya ste/_dbus su shAkya thub pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i byang chub ljon shing gi drung na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/_/de'i steng na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya can bri bar bya'o/_/g.yas su 'phags pa 'jam 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_pad+ma'i gdan la pus mo btsugs te lag pa gnyis kyis lhung bzed bzung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'bul ba'i rnam pa can bri bar bya'o/_/g.yon na 'phags pa gsang ba'i bdag po lag na 
[\[22a.2\]]rdo rje khro 'dzum brjid bag can rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lag na rdo rje gsor ba'i tshul gyis bsnams pa/_pad+ma'i gdan la pus mo gnyis btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba bri bar bya'o/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rgyab tu rin po che'i mchod rten mtho zhing yangs 
[\[22a.3\]]pa bri bar bya'o/_/de'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rgyas pa'i gser zhal mchog tu dpa' ba'i 'od zer rgyal mtshan gyi tog seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs shing dbugs dbyung mdzad pa'i rnam pa can bri bar bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje'i rgyab tu byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi glegs bam 
[\[22a.4\]]rin po che sna tshogs kyis spa ba'i rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang du bcug pa mtha' 'jags su sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bris pa seng ge'i khri la bzhag pa bri bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu rdo rje pho nya khro bo'i gzugs can bri bar bya'o/_/mchod rten gyi 'og tu dpal gyi lha mo bri bar bya'o/_/shAkya thub 
[\[22a.5\]]pa'i 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi rin po che'i go cha gyon pa dpal zhing brjid pa'i nyams can bri bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag pa g.yon pa na spos snod thogs pa g.yas pas bgrang phreng bsnams pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la blta ba bri bar bya'o/_/de ltar bris sku bsgrubs pa tsam 
[\[22a.6\]]gyis dam pa'i chos spangs pa dang /_'phags pa la skur pa btab pa dang mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa la sogs pa ngan song gsum du ltung bar gyur pa'i las thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[22a.7\]]ras bris bsgrubs pa tsam gyi phan yon de ltar na de'i mdun du sgrub pa byed pa'i phan yon smos kyang ci dgos te de bzhin gshegs pa dang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di bshad do/_/'di'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]bzhengs par 'dod pas gtsug lag khang ngam/_lha'i khang pa'am/_ri sul la sogs dben zhing gtsang la yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su rgyud nas gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin sa blangs la/_gzungs sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa gtsang dang ba lci bsres pas khor yug tu khru bcu 
[\[22b.2\]]drug yod pa'i stegs bu byas la/_der gtsang sbra dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o/_/de'i dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang /_grwa bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi bri bar bya'o/_/sgo bzhi'i nang rin po che'i ljon shing bris la 
[\[22b.3\]]de dag gi drung na lha mo bzhi bri bar bya ste/_shar sgor ni lha mo dpal mo'o/_/lho sgor dbyangs can ma'o/_/nub sgor dung can ma'o/_/byang sgor me tog so ma'o/_/de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ngos la 'bras ma grugs pa dang yungs kar dang dus kyi me tog bkram par bya'o/_/dri bzang gi byug pa dang 
[\[22b.4\]]phye ma phur ma yang bsham mo/_/zur bzhir dri bzang gi chus gang ba'i bum pa bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/zhal zas bza' btung bzang po sder ma bzhi yang bkod par bya'o/_/sgo bzhir bdug spos kyi pog phor bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/me tog sna tshogs kyi chun po dang dkar gsum gyi gtor ma yang 
[\[22b.5\]]bsham par bya'o/_/yang zur bzhir mar me bzhi bud par bya'o/_/rig pa 'dzin pa kha shar du bltas te bzlas brjod bya bar bya zhing /_mtshan gyi thun tha ma la lus bsrung ba dang mtshams bcing ba sogs byas nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya la/_dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang 
[\[22b.6\]]sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/dngos grub thams cad bde blag thob pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rtag tu dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/'byung po thams cad 
[\[22b.7\]]kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad kyis bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar byed cing sgrub pa'i stong grogs byed par 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta byA ba lo ki te/_dza ya dza ya swA hA/_snying po'o/_/
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]oM hu ru hu ru dza ya mu khe swA hA/_nye ba'i snying po'o/_/oM dza le ni dza ye swA hA/_nye regs kyi sngags so/_/oM sa man+ta pUr Na dza ye swA hA/_mtshams bcing ba'i sngags so/_/oM maN+Da la dza ye swA hA/_dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bcing ba'i skabs kyi sngags so/_/oM si rI 
[\[23a.2\]]mi rI dza ye swA hA/_gtor ma'i sngags so/_/oM sa wa san+d+ha ri mi ri dza ye swA hA/_spyan 'dren pa'i sngags so/_/oM bud+d+ha ku su maM swA hA/_me tog 'bul ba'i sngags so/_/oM dza ya yan+ti swA hA/_bdug spos 'bul ba'i sngags so/_/oM bi dza ya ga pI swA hA/_dbang bskur ba'i sngags so/_/
[\[23a.3\]]oM ta thA ga ta dza ya swA hA/_gtsug tor bcing ba'i sngags so/_/oM dza ya u ri ti swA hA/_gos byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so/_/oM gu ru d+ha ri swA hA/_slob ma bsrung zhing rjes su 'dzin pa'i sngags so/_/oM d+ha ra d+ha ra mi ri dza ye swA hA/_slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/_/oM 
[\[23a.4\]]su sam+b+ha wa dza ye swA hA/_phreng ba byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so/_/oM su na ri dza ya ye swA hA/_gdan 'bul ba'i sngags so/_/oM su ri dza ye swA hA/_bgegs bcing ba'i sngags so/_/oM pra wa rA dza ye sid+d+hi swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i sngags so/_/oM 
[\[23a.5\]]rak+Sha ni dza ye swA hA/_lus bsrung ba'i sngags so/_/oM dza ya di pi ni swA hA/_mar me 'bul ba'i sngags so/_/oM ma le bim la dza ye swA hA/_sbyin sreg gi sngags so/_/oM sa ra sa ra dza ye sid+d+hi swA hA/_yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i sngags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[23a.6\]]'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/da ni snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste/_snying po 'bum bzlas na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/ldong ros zangs kyi snod du bzhag la snying po stong bzlas pas brlabs nas dpral bar thig le byas na nam 
[\[23a.7\]]mkha' la 'gro zhing lha srin sde brgyad thams cad kyi khyim sgo ngang gis phye bar 'gyur te sgrub pa pos ci dgar 'jug pa dang bgrod par 'gyur ro/_/so bIr mig sman la 'bum bzlas nas mig la byugs na an+ta na 'thob par gyur la 'byung po thams cad kyi khyim du rang dbang gis 'jug nus par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]gzhan yang khri bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten gyi srog shing gi rtse mo'i gdugs la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bteg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel ma lus par bzhugs pa'i mchod rten chen po'i rang 
[\[23b.2\]]bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gyi phyag mtshan lhung bzed blangs nas de la sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la'o thug gis gang bar byas/_slar 'jam dpal gyi phyag la 'jog ste gdugs tshod 'bul na bsod snyoms pa stong yang tshim par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rgyud gzhan dag nas gsungs 
[\[23b.3\]]pa'i las tshogs thams cad kyang gzungs sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs na 'dod pa thams cad 'bad med du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/da ni phyag rgya'i rim pa bshad par bya ste/_lag pa gnyis thal mo gan rkyal du byas la snying ga'i thad du thal mo g.yas pa'i mthil na g.yon pa yang gan rkyal du 
[\[23b.4\]]bzed de bzhag pa ni byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di bcing ba tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbugs dbyung bar mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[23b.5\]]bskul bar 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya de nyid las lag pa g.yas pa bteg ste phyag rgya gzhan gang dgos su bsgyur bas phyag rgya thams cad byung bar gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[23b.6\]]phyag rgya de nyid las lag pa g.yas pa bsgyur nas lte bar bzhag pa'i mtheb chen dang mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun du sbyar ba ni phyag rgya las thams cad pa'i phyag rgya ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang 
[\[23b.7\]]chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzungs 'di bsrung zhing mtshams sbyor ba'i gzungs sngags 'di smras so/_/na mo many+dzu shrI ya ye/_ku mA ra b+hU ta ye/_tad+ya thA/_dza ye/_bi dza ye/_dza ya shrI/_dziSh+Ti/_hU~M swA hA/_sgrub pa pos thog mar 'jug pa'i skabs dang /_las 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]la sbyor ba'i skabs rnams su sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas na sgrib pa dang bgegs med par 'gyur zhing myur du grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes rig pa chen po'i gzungs 'di smras so/_/tad+ya thA/_badzra muSh+Ti/_ha na da ha pa tsa badzra hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_sngags 
[\[24a.2\]]'di yungs kar la lan bdun btab nas phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams bcing gi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis sngags 'di smras so/_/tad+ya thA/_d+h+ri ti hri mri sa ra pra sa ra bi ri bi ri swA hA/_sngags 'di yungs kar dang bcas pa'i chu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la spyi bo nas 
[\[24a.3\]]blugs na gnod byed 'byung po thams cad dbang du gyur nas sgrub pa po'i rkang par mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rang gnas su gdengs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ngas mdo 'di bshad pa ni bsod nams zhan pa dang /_ma dang pha 
[\[24a.4\]]dang /_lta ba log pa dang /_the tshom za ba dang /_mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_tshe thung ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_mtshams med par 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag gi phyir gzungs 'di bshad do/_/kun dga' bo phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe khyim na 
[\[24a.5\]]gnas pa dang /_dge slong las phal cher gzungs 'di mi klog pa dang /_mchod par mi byed pa rnams ji ltar khyim pa rnams sdug bsngal bar bshad pa de bzhin du rab tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/de ste de bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod cing 'di la brten pas mchod rten gcig 
[\[24a.6\]]byas na chos kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/sdong pos brgyan pa bklags shing kha ton du byas par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[24a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_gsang ba'i bdag po chen po phyag na rdo rje dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_bram ze bi Nudat+ta dang /_lha dang klu la sogs pa'i sde brgyad mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//thang gur gyi dus the tsin zhi hung lu khing go sa can rgya gar byang phyogs kyi mkhan po sde snod gsum pa rig 'dzin don yod rdo rjes bka' yis bskul ba dang du blangs te/_
[\[24b.2\]]rgya gar gyi dpe las rgya nag tu bsgyur bar mdzad pa las da lta chen po ching gur gyi lo tsA ra sgro btags pa bod yig gi slob grwa'i mi bzang jing gir rigs las rim pa dang po'i tha'i ji mgon po skyabs kyis thob chin wang gis gzungs bsdus gsar ba bzhengs skabs 'phros don las brtsams te bskul ba ltar/_rang 
[\[24b.3\]]gnas nyid dga'i skyed tshal du bsgyur ba lags shing /_legs sbyar gyi sgra la ma byang bas sngags tshig gi lci yang sogs la rtog dpyod byed pa'i ngal ba spangs te snga rabs pa dag gi mdo gzhan gyi yi ge ji ltar ngo sprod gnang ba sor bzhag kun dga' bo'i tshig lhug cig ni rgya nag mar mi snang yang bod mar yod pas chad 
[\[24b.4\]]dam snyam pas bod ma nas tshur bsabs/_de yang gzhung gi bka' 'gyur bar mar dga' bo zhes pa 'dug kyang /_bris ma 'ga' zhig na kun dga' bos snang ba 'thad dam snyam du sems pa ltar bris pa la/_badzra A yu She'i sngags ni rgya nag gi dpe cha na med cing /_bod dper yod kyang snying po dang nye snying gi rjes la byung 
[\[24b.5\]]mod/_rang tshugs kyi ming mi gsal bas re zhig gzhag te/_khi'an lung gnam lo brgyad pa zla 4 tshes 1 la rdzogs par bsgrubs so/_/dge ba 'di yis skye bo kun/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags shing /_/bsod nams ye shes las byung ba'i/_/dam pa sku gnyis thob par shog/_//'og gi byang chub 
[\[24b.6\]]snying po'i rgyan 'bum 'di yang 'di las zur phyung zhig yin 'dug pas logs su bri ma dgos kyang /_sngar gyi rnams su gong ma ma rnyed pa'i skabs su bris 'dug pa ltar bzhag go/[ {D509}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bo d+hi gar+b+hA lang+kAr lak+Sha d+ha ra NI/_bod skad du/_byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi 
[\[24b.7\]]gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba te bi bu la ba da na kAny+tsa nota k+Ship+ta/_pra b+hA sa ke tu mur+d+ha ne/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aD+ha te samyak+saM bud ng+hA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te shAkya mu na ye/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud ng+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_bo d+hi bo d+hi/_bo d+ha ni 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]bo d+ha ni/_sarba ta thA ga ta go tsa ri/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_ha ra ha ra/_pra ha ra pra ha ra/_ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta d+hA re/_tsu lu tsu lu/_sha ta ra smi sany+tso di te/_sarba ta thA ga tA bi Shik+te/_gu Ni gu Na pa te/_sarba bud+d+ha gu NA ba b+hA se/_mi li mi li/_ga ga na ta le/_sarba ta thA ga ta ng+hISh+Thi te/_na b+ha sta le/_sha me sha me/_pra sha me pra sha me/_sarba pA paM pra sha 
[\[25a.2\]]ma ne/_sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne/_hu lu hu lu/_ma hA bo d+hi mArga sa~M pra tiSh+Thi te/_sarba ta thA ga ta su pra tiSh+Thi te shud d+he swA hA/_rtsa ba'i sngags so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta bya ba lo ki te/_dza ya dza ya swA hA/_snying po'o/_/oM hu lu hu lu/_dza ya mu khe swA ha'/_nye ba'i snying po'o/_/oM badzra a yu She swA hA/_dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen 
[\[25a.3\]]nam dge bsnyen ma'am/_gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di bris te/_mchod rten byas la mchod rten de'i nang du gzungs 'di bcug na/_des mchod rten gcig byas na 'bum byas par 'gyur ro/_/lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_
[\[25a.4\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan la sogs pas kyang mchod par 'gyur te/_mchod rten 'ba' zhig mchod pa ma yin gyi/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams la'ang mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis mchod par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo ngas mdo 'di 
[\[25a.5\]]bshad pa ni bsod nams zhan pa dang /_ma dad pa dang /_lta ba log pa dang /_the tshom za ba dang /_mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_tshe thung ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_mtshams med par 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag gi phyir gzungs 'di bshad do/_/dga' 
[\[25a.6\]]bo phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe khyim na gnas pa dang /_dge slong las phal cher gzungs 'di mi klog pa dang /_mchod par mi byed pa rnams ji ltar khyim pa rnams sdug bsngal bar bshad pa de bzhin du rab tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/de ste de bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod cing 'di las nyan pas 
[\[25a.7\]]mchod rten gcig byas na chos kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/sdong pos brgyan pa bklags shing kha ton du byas par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang zhugs par 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan 'bum las btus pa 'bum gyi gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D510}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ra smi bi ma la bi shud+d+he pra b+ha nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems 
[\[25b.2\]]dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi pho brang gi 'khor gyi khyams chen po na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/_
[\[25b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_lag na rdo rje dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang /_'jam dpal dang /_shes rab 'od dang /_byams pa la sogs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa rnams dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_
[\[25b.4\]]gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa grangs med pas bcom ldan 'das la zhe sar byas/_ri mor byas/_bkur stir byas te/_yongs su bskor ba la chos ston cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe ser skya'i grong khyer na gnas pa bram 
[\[25b.5\]]ze chen po ser skya'i zla ba zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la yid mi ches shing log par lta ba zhig gnas pa de dus gzhan zhig gi tshe gzhan zhig gi rmi ltas su rmis te/_bstan pa bram ze chen po khyod da ste zhag bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba thos nas/_bram ze de shin tu yang mi dga' ste/_'jigs skrag nas 
[\[25b.6\]]yid la bsam pa/_da bdag gis srog gi skyabs su la btsal bar bya/_yang dge sbyong gau ta ma thams cad mkhyen pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhig yin no zhes grags na/_bdag de'i gan du song ste/_de thams cad mkhyen pa yin yang dag nang 'jigs pas nyam thag par 'gyur ba'i skyabs mdzad pa'i phyir chos ston gor ma chag go snyam bsams 
[\[25b.7\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du song ba dang /_rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar ma spobs te sems shing 'dug pa la/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dus gsum mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]pa/_sgrib pa mi mnga' bas bram ze de'i bsam pa mkhyen nas byams pa'i thugs kyis brtse bar dgongs te/_bka' stsal pa/_bram ze chen po khyod da ste zhag bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byas nas ngan song ngan 'gro mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[26a.2\]]de nas yang rim gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po bcu drug tu kha brgyud de skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de las thar nas kyang rigs ngan shan pa'i lus su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas shi 'phos nas yang phag gi lus su skye bar 'gyur te/_rtag tu ngan skyugs mi gtsang ba za zhing 'dam 
[\[26a.3\]]rdzab kyi nang du yang yun ring du gnas te/_rgyun du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas gal te mi'i lus thob na yang shin tu dbul ba dang /_mi gtsang ba dang /_dri nga ba dang /_mdog mi sdug cing gnag pa dang /_lus rid cing nyam chung ba dang /_mdze nad can du 'gyur 
[\[26a.4\]]te/_skye bo yongs la mi sdug cing rtag tu bkres pas nyam thag pa/_skye bo yongs kyis smad pa/_rtag par brdeg btsog bya zhing shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa de thos nas/_bram ze de shin tu 'jigs skrag ste/_yid gdungs pas dus nas bcom ldan 
[\[26a.5\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang /_skyabs mdzad pa lags na/_bdag ni sdig pa'i las thams cad 'chags te/_deng slan chad bcom ldan 
[\[26a.6\]]'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyid na bdag ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i sdug bsngal las skyabs mdzad par gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bram ze chen po khyod song la grong khyer ser skya'i lam gyi sum 
[\[26a.7\]]mdo na mchod rten ring bsrel can rnying pa ral ba zhig yod pa de slar brtsigs te/_mchod rten gyi rtse mor srog shing btsugs la/_gsang sngags yi ger bris pa de'i nang du bcug ste mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags lan bdun bton na khyod kyi tshe yang phyir nur te 'phel bar 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]'gyur la/_'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi gnas longs spyod che ba rnams su skye ste/_bskal pa stong phrag brgya'i bar du bde ba'i longs spyod kyang phyir 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur/_de nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[26b.2\]]yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur te/_bskal pa brgya stong du mar bde ba chen po myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang shi 'phos nas rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der yang bskal pa chen po stong phrag brgya'i bar du bde ba'i longs spyod mi zad pa myong 
[\[26b.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs gang du skyes pa'i gnas kun tu yang yid gzhungs shing tshe'i bar chad med pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad nas nam du yang sems can dmyal bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams dang 
[\[26b.4\]]phrad cing rjes su dgongs par mdzad do/_/bram ze chen po gzhan yang dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la tshe thung ba'am nad mang ba zhig yod na des mchod rten rnying pa bcos sam/_
[\[26b.5\]]gsar du brtsigs kyang rung ste/_gsang sngags 'di bris la nang du bzhugs nas dkyil 'khor byi dor byas te mchod na de dag gi yon tan ni tshe zad pa yang tshe slar nur zhing ring ba dang /_nad kyis btab cing sdug bsngal ba yang nad do cog las thar ba dang /_nam du yang ngan song ngan 
[\[26b.6\]]'gro sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bar mi 'gyur te/_de dag gi sgra rna lam du yang grag par mi 'gyur na de dag tu skye ba lta ci smos/_de nas bram ze des de skud thos nas shin tu yi rangs te/_mchod rten zhig pa bcos par 
[\[26b.7\]]bsams nas de 'khor de nas langs te song ngo /_/de'i tshe 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba zhig stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di ji lta bur bgyis na yon tan dang /_legs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gsang sngags chen po rnams kyi yang mchog bdag nyid che ba dri 
[\[27a.2\]]ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'di dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga bzhin byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/la la zhig gis gsang sngags 'di thos na mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i 
[\[27a.3\]]sdig pa yang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/ser sna dang /_brnab sems dang /_phrag dog la sogs pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'byang bar 'gyur te/_tshe zad pa las kyang tshe ring du nur ba dang /_bkra shis dang /_legs pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 
[\[27a.4\]]'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad kyi srog gi skyabs mdzad 
[\[27a.5\]]pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug 
[\[27a.6\]]tor gyi steng nas 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po byung nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'od kyis khyab par mdzad de/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang mkhyen par mdzad nas 'od zer de dag slar 'dus te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i 
[\[27a.7\]]gtsug tor du nub bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing bya ka la ping+ka'i gsung dbyangs kyis gsang sngags bka' stsal pa/_namaH_sa p+tA nAn/_sa~M mya ka sa~M bud+d+ha ko TI nAn pa ri shung+d+he ma na si/_a b+h+yA rtsi ta pa/_TiSh+Tha tu nAn/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a mr-i ta A yu Sha s+ya/_
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]ta thA ga ta s+ya/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta shud+d+hi/_A yur bi sho d+ha ne/_saM ha ra/_ma~M ha ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta bIr+ya ba le na pra ti sa~M ha ra/_a yuHsA ra sA ra/_sarba ta tha' ga ta sam ya/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya ma ma sarba pA paM A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he/_
[\[27b.2\]]bi ga ta ma la~M/_tsha ra su bud+d+ha bud+d+he hu ru hu ru swA hA/_'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags te/_gang la la 'di'i cho ga byed par 'dod na tshes brgyad dang bcu gsum dang bcu bzhi dang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga rnams gang yang rung ba la mchod rten ring bsrel can la lan bdun cu rtsa bdun bskor la/_gsang sngags 
[\[27b.3\]]'di lan bdun cu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod byas te/_khrus byas la dkyil 'khor byas nas gsang sngags kyi yi ge bdun cu rtsa bdun bris te/_de'i tshe gsang sngags 'don pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba yang khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon te/_lus spos kyis byugs nas kha zas 
[\[27b.4\]]gtsang ma zos la/_me tog dang /_bdug pas mchod de/_de la rin po che sna bdun yang yon du phul lam/_yang na bdag gi nyams kyis ci 'byor par phul yang rung ste/_sems mgu bar bya'o/_/chos btsun par bya ba'i phyir bsti stang dang /_ri mo cher bya'o/_/gsang sngags 
[\[27b.5\]]kyi yi ge la yang dkon zhing rin po cher 'du shes bzhag ste/_mchod rten che chung ji tsam nus pa bdun cu rtsa bdun gdab par bya zhing /_de re re'i nang du gsang sngags bcug ste/_sems rtse gcig tu mchod pa chen po byas na tshe zad pa las tshe slar nur te tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon 
[\[27b.6\]]gyi las kyi sgrib pa tshe rabs grangs med pa'i sdig pa thams cad byang nas nam du yang sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas thams cad du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang du skye ba'i gnas thams cad du yang sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par 'gyur/_
[\[27b.7\]]yid la bsam pa thams cad kyang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/_nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig nad tshabs po ches btab ste/_'chi ba'i 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]dus byed pa la thug na dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par byas la/_de'i steng du tshon sna lngas ri mor bris te/_dbus kyi char ni 'khor lo dang /_rdo rje dang /_dung dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa dang /_g.yung drung ris dang /_pad+mo rnams bri'o/_/grwa bzhir yang pad+mo re re 
[\[28a.2\]]bris te de'i steng du spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa re re grwa bzhir bzhag go/_/bdug spos kyi snod bkang ba spos sna tshogs 'thul ba yang gzhag go/_/kha dog sna lnga'i snod du kha zas sna tshogs dang /_zas dkar gsum dang 'bras chan du sbyar ba bzhag_/yang dri'i chu dang /_me tog 
[\[28a.3\]]dang /_'bras sam/_'bru'i snod bkang ba phor bu re re blugs pa dang /_yang kha zas sna tshogs sbyar ba'i gtor ma spos chu bum pa gang dang sbyar te/_dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzhag go/_/gtor ma de dang 'bras kyi drung du nye bar tshogs kyi bdag po'i gzugs bris la de'i spyi bo'i 
[\[28a.4\]]steng du mar me gzhag go/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi nub phyogs su nad pa bzhag la/_dkyil 'khor gyi nang du kha bstan pa'i nad pa'i mdun du yang mchod pa'i bshos bzhag ste dbul du gzhug go/_/de nas sngags mkhan gtsang sbra cher byas te/_nad pa de la gsang sngags 
[\[28a.5\]]bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis btab ste/_cho ga 'di ltar byas na nad pa tshe zad de 'chi ba'i dus byed du nye ba zhag bdun nas dran pa nyams shing 'khrul bar 'gyur ba yang tshe slar nur zhing tshe ring por 'gyur ro/_/rmi lam gyi sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig gis 
[\[28a.6\]]gtsang sbra cher byas te/_nyin gcig bzhin rtag par gsang sngags lan re re ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bton na de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas longs spyod dang /_bde ba mi zad pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag par dus thams cad du bzlas brjod byas na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i 
[\[28a.7\]]zhing du skye bar 'gyur zhing /_tshe rabs rjes su dran par yang 'gyur ro/_/dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dang /_/sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/yang gang la la zhig gis mi shi ba'i ched du phan par 'dod pas sems thag pa nas gsang sngags lan bdun cu rtsa bdun bzlas 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]brjod byas na shi ba de ngan song gi gnas su ltung na yang de'i mod la las kyi sgrib pa rnams zad nas mtho ris kyi lha'i gnas su skye zhing bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags yi ger bri ba gzhan gyi ming nas smos te/_mchod rten gyi nang du 
[\[28b.2\]]bcug la nan tan du mchod pa byas na shi ba gang yin pa de ngan song gi gnas nas thar te mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[28b.3\]]kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis mchod rten de la bskor ba byas sam/_phyag byas sam/_mchod pa phul yang rung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams kyang 
[\[28b.4\]]ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/tha na bya dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]la sogs te gang dag la mchod rten de'i grib ma phog pa de dag kyang nam yang dud 'gro la sogs pa ngan song gi gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang la la mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa chen po dang ldan pa yang mchod 
[\[28b.5\]]rten de la reg gam/_de'i grib mas phog kyang rung ste/_de'i sdig pa thams cad byang zhing zad par 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten de'i gnas na 'byung po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za la sogs pa lus la 'jug cing gnod pa dang /_gcan 
[\[28b.6\]]gzan khro bo dang /_thog 'bab pa dang /_sdig sbrul kha gdug pa dang /_sbyar dug la sogs pa thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs shing med par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang pha rol kyi dmag tshogs dang /_mtshon dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_ser ba dang /_mu ge dang /_dus ma 
[\[28b.7\]]yin par 'chi ba dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_bkra mi shis pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/yul der ltas ngan zhig byung na yang mchod rten dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'od zer chen po byung bas/_ltas ngan dang /_bkra mi shis 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]pa thams cad zlog par 'gyur ro/_/gang gzhan zhig bsam pa ngan pas dmag dang /_chom rkun gyi gnod pa bya bar sems sam/_dgra rgol ba zhig byung na yang gnas der mchod rten de la 'od zer chen po 'byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 
[\[29a.2\]]me lce kun tu 'bar bas bskor ba'i nang nas dmag gi dpung dang /_mtshon cha'i char mngon par bstan pas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zhi zhing phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyis kyang bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa byas te/_phyogs bzhir dpag tshad 
[\[29a.3\]]brgya tshun chad du mtshams bcad de bsrungs pas de'i nang du 'khrug pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_phyugs nad thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/'thab cing rtsod pa mi 'byung /_chos ma yin par spyod pa med par 'gyur ro/_/'di la gsang sngags gzhan gyis bcad pa 
[\[29a.4\]]dang /_mnan par mi nus te/_gsang sngags thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/yang mchod rten de'i srog shing gi gsang sngags bshad pa/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta bi pu la yaSh+Ti/_ma Ni ka na ka rA dza ta/_bi pu Shi ta yaSh+Ti d+hu ru d+hu ru/_sa man+te pi lo ki te/_sa 
[\[29a.5\]]ras ra/_ma ma sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ni/_saM bo d+ha ni/_pra bar yaSh+Ti/_pa ri ma Ni duSh+Ta hu ru tsi ra ma la bi shud+d+he hU~M hU~M swA hA/_rigs kyi bu ci nas kyang gsang sngags 'di nan tan du dgu bcu rtsa dgur yi ger bris te/_mchod rten gyi srog shing gi ngos bzhir gzhug go/_/
[\[29a.6\]]de yang cho ga'i gzhung 'di nyid kyang bris te srog shing gi nang du gzhug go/_/cho ga de ltar byas na mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong gi srog shing btsugs pa dang 'dra 'o/_/de'i gong du yang mchod rten ring bsrel can dgu khri dgu stong bzhengs pa dang 'dra 'o/_/de'i yang 
[\[29a.7\]]gong du rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong byas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i yang gong du de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir chos bzang lha'i mdun sa dang 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang gi mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong brtsigs pa dang 'dra 'o/_/yang 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]gang la la zhig gis 'jim pa las mchod rten chung ngu zhig byas te/_de'i nang du gsang sngags 'di dag bcug na yang rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong brtsigs pa dang 'dra 'o/_/yang gang la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di la bskor ba byas sam/_phyag 
[\[29b.2\]]byas sam/_thal mo sbyar ram/_me tog phul lam/_byug pa dang /_bdug spos phul lam/_dril bu dang /_ba dan dang /_gdugs 'ga' zhig phul na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgu khri dgu stong gi mchod rten la phul ba'i bsod nams dang mnyam pa yin 
[\[29b.3\]]no/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpal dang /_mthu stobs rgya chen po thob par 'gyur te/_tha na bya dang sbrang ma la sogs pa mchod rten de'i grib mas phog na yang de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen cing rjes su dgongs par mdzad do/_/bla na med pa 
[\[29b.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par yang 'gyur ro/_/yang gang la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di lta bu rmi lam du rmis sam/_rgyang nas mthong ngam/_dril bu'i sgra thos sam/_mchod rten bzhengs pa rna bar gtam thos pa 
[\[29b.5\]]de dag kyang mtshams med pa lnga la sogs te/_sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad byang ste/_rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsrung ba dang /_rjes su dgongs pa mdzad de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam yongs su dag pa thob par 
[\[29b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags 'di ni mchod rten gyi srog shing gi gsang sngags zhes bya'o/_/yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten bya ba'i gsang sngags de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta/_ma la bi sho d+ha ni/_ru d+ha ba le pra ti saM skA ra/_ta 
[\[29b.7\]]thA ga ta d+hA tu d+ha re/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_san+d+ha ra san+d+ha ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_gang la la zhig gis mchod rten bdag nyid kyis byas sam/_gzhan byed du bcug gam/_mchod 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]rten rnying pa bcos legs byas kyang rung /_sa 'jim las mchod rten chung ngu byas sam/_so phag gam/_rdo ba las byas kyang rung ste/_dang po gsang sngags kyi snying po stong rtsa brgyad tshad du bzlas brjod byas te/_de'i 'og tu mchod rten sen mo gang tsam gyis 
[\[30a.2\]]la byas sam/_khru gang gi tshad du byas sam/_dpag tshad gcig tsam gyi tshad du byas na yang rung ste/_gsang sngags kyi mthu dang /_sems rtse gcig tu byas pa'i stobs kyis mchod rten de la yang spos kyi ngad ldang ste/_tsan+danadang /_ga bur dang /_gla rtsi dang /_gur 
[\[30a.3\]]gum la sogs pa'i dri bro'am/_lha'i spos dri zhim po'i ngad ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag dang gzhan mchod rten gyi las byed pa dang /_bzlas brjod byed pa de bsam pa thams cad kyang yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsags par 
[\[30a.4\]]'gyur te/_yon tan dang /_legs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur/_tshe thung ba'i las shig yod na yang tshe nur zhing ring bar 'gyur/_nam 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na yang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i zhal mthong zhing /_de 
[\[30a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rjes su dgongs te/_skye gnas phyi mar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur zhing mngon sum du lung ston par 'gyur/_der yang tshe lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thub par 'gyur te/_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /_lha'i 
[\[30a.6\]]mig dang /_lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa 'thob cing /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /_'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba shes pa 'thob bo/_/lus las tsan+dan gyi dri'i ngad 'byung zhing kha nas ut+pa la'i bsung ldang bar 'gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 
[\[30a.7\]]lam thob nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang dri'i byug pa yungs 'bru tsam yang rung ste/_gsang sngags bzlas nas mchod rten la bskus na yang de dag gi yon tan dang /_legs pa sngar bshad pa bzhin du thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang dge slong dang /_
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis bdag nyid gtsang bar byas te/_gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dkon pa dang /_rin po cher 'du shes pas gzung na de de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar dad par bya ste/_gsang sngags rnams la 
[\[30b.2\]]gus pa bskyed nas yi ger bri bar bya ste/_gong du bshad pa bzhin du gsang sngags dang phyag rgya cho ga bzhin du bris nas mchod rten gyi srog shing gi rtsa bar snying po bcug ste/_mchod rten byas na de dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsags par 'gyur te/_yon tan dang legs 
[\[30b.3\]]pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga 'di dag bshad pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad nas gsungs pa/_yang 
[\[30b.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sems can mnyam par dgongs shing /_thams cad chos kyi dbyings la bkod nas gsang sngags chen po'i phyag rgya'i cho ga'i byin gyi rlabs 'thob par bstan pa ni legs so legs so/_/shin tu yang legs te/_dge ba'i 
[\[30b.5\]]rtsa ba de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid na/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po 'dus 
[\[30b.6\]]pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_'jig rten skyong ba'i mes po tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_ku be ra dang /_de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul 
[\[30b.7\]]che ba'i lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de thos nas bdag cag rang rang gi spyod yul la skyo zhing yid byung bar gyur te/_mthar gyis yon tan chen po thob par 'dod pa'i phyir gcig la gcig bos te smras pa/_kye ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]shin tu yang rnyed par dka'o/_/de'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos thos pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka' gsang sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa thos pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/_'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar to zhes 
[\[31a.2\]]smras so/_/de nas de'i tshe bram ze ser skya'i zla ba zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i gsang sngags dang cho ga'i yon tan chen po de dag thos shing thob nas sems kyi sgrib pa'i rdul dang rnyog pa rnams dang bar gyur/_'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang /_sdig pa dang /_las kyi sgrib 
[\[31a.3\]]pa thams cad kyang dag par gyur/_tshe yang phyir nur te ring bar gyur nas dga' mgu yi rangs te yid bde ba chen po thob par gyur to/_/de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyang sems dang zhing rjes su yi rang bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[31a.4\]]sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'khor der rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig mngon par sprul nas/_chos la dga' ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la phul te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 
[\[31a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu rnyed par dka' ba sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba rnams kyi mchog 'dzam bu'i 
[\[31a.6\]]gling gi sems can sgrib pa che ba rnams kyi don du bshad de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing tshe ring ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad las thar bar mdzad pa lags na/_de 'dir bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad 
[\[31a.7\]]la gsol te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yang dag pa'i ye shes chub par bgyid pa'i phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags kyi tshig bshad par 'tshal lo/_/na mo b+ha ga ba te/_na ba na ba TI nAM/_saM myaka saM bud+d+ha ko Ti ni yu ta sha ta sa ha srA NAM/_namaHsarba ni ba ra Na bi skam+bi ni 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]bo d+hi sa twA ya/_oM tu ru tu ru ma ma sarba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni/_sarba ta thA ga ta A yur ba lA ni/_bi pu la ni ra ma le/_sarba sid+d+hi na ma skr-i twA/_ba ra ba ra/_sarba satwA a ba lo ki ni/_o~M sarba ni bA ra Na/_bi skam bi Ni/_ma ma sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ni ku ru swA hA/_bcom 
[\[31b.2\]]ldan 'das bdag gi gsang sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus bshad pa lags te/_gang la la zhig gis ma yengs pa'i sems kyis rtse gcig tu byas te/_skad cig gcig bton na yang sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/yang gang la la 
[\[31b.3\]]zhig gis gsang sngags 'di cho ga bzhin du dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na mchod rten de la/_la la zhig gis phyag byas sam/_tshig snyan pas bstod dam/_spos dang /_me tog dang /_byug pa dang /_mar me 'bul na rigs kyi bu de de'i 
[\[31b.4\]]tshe 'di nyid la sdig pa thams cad byang zhing las kyi sgrib pa thams cad bsal te/_bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du grub par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgya stong grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur 
[\[31b.5\]]ro/_/de bzhin du mchod rten ring bsrel gyi snying po can brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po sogs par 'gyur ro/_/yang dge sbyong gang zhig gis tshes brgyad dang /_bcu bzhi dang bco lnga gang yang 
[\[31b.6\]]rung ba la khrus dang gtsang sbra byas te/_gos gtsang ma gyon la zhag gcig smyung ba'am/_yang na zas dkar gsum zos te/_mchod rten la bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /_mtshams 
[\[31b.7\]]med pa lnga byas pa yang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/_gzhan yang las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba bdag nyid kyi lus mngon par bstan te/_bsam pa thams cad dngos grub tu sbyin par mdzad 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]cing /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gang la la zhig gis nyis brgya rtsa brgyad bton na ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis sum brgya rtsa brgyad bton na sgrib pa thams cad byang ste/_phyir mi 
[\[32a.2\]]ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis bzhi brgya rtsa brgyad bton na rgyal chen ris bzhi'i rgyal po chen po dag kyang nye bar 'ongs nas lus mngon par bstan te/_bsrung ba dang /_skyabs par byed cing shes rab kyi stobs kyang bskyed nas bsod nams thams cad nye bar 
[\[32a.3\]]bsgrub bo/_/gang gis lnga brgya rtsa brgyad bton na dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis 'dus ma byas kyi lam la gnas pa thob bo/_/yang gang gis drug brgya rtsa brgyad bton na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/_nam mkha' la rig 'dzin gyi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis 
[\[32a.4\]]bdun brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bton na legs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis brgyad brgya rtsa brgyad bton na gzhan gyis bsgo ba med pa'i rang dbang 'thob ste/_sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis dgu brgya rtsa brgyad du bton na 
[\[32a.5\]]phung po lnga rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis stong rtsa brgyad du bton na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/gang gis nyis stong tshang bar bton na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/gang gis sum stong tshang bar bton na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob 
[\[32a.6\]]bo/_/gang gis bzhi stong tshang bar bton na dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis lnga stong tshang bar bton na rang sangs rgyas kyis 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis drug stong tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi gnas 'thob par 'gyur 
[\[32a.7\]]ro/_/yang gang gis bdun stong tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis brgyad stong tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa gnon par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis dgu stong tshang bar bton na rig sngags dang /_gsang 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]sngags rnams kyi bdag po gsang ba pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis khri tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mi g.yo ba gnon par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis nyi khri tshang bar bton na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 
[\[32b.2\]]thob par 'gyur te/_seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang la la zhig gis pha ma'i don gyi phyir bsod nams kyi las bya bar 'dod na/_mchod rten rnying pa ring bsrel can zhig ral du gyur pa gsos la bcos legs byas te/_g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byed 
[\[32b.3\]]cing sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang gi bar du bskor ba byas na bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_legs so legs so/_/
[\[32b.4\]]rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nga'i grogs byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sngags kyi cho ga tshul bzhin du bshad pa de kho na bzhin no/_/de nas gnod sbyin thams cad kyi rgyal po gsang ba pa'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags 
[\[32b.5\]]kyi rgyal po gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 'dra ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku las byung ba lags na/_bcom ldan 'das snying po dam pa 'di dag 'dzam bu gling na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa thams 
[\[32b.6\]]cad bsal nas de phyin chad bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la bka' stsal pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang de bzhin 
[\[32b.7\]]gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzhugs pa dang 'dra ba yin no/_/ngas cho ga ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byas na las kyi sbyor ba chung ngus kyang 'bras bu chen po 'grub cing phan yon che bar gnas par 'gyur na/_las kyi sbyor ba cher byas pa lta ci smos te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags par 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na de dag gi yon tan ni de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bshad kyang mi rdzogs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis mkhyen cing gzigs par zad do/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos gsol pa/_
[\[33a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das las tshegs chung ngu ji lta bu zhig bgyi na bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po 'grub cing bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i phyir legs pa nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/_/dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_
[\[33a.3\]]dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po thob cing yon tan thob par 'dod pas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du byas te/_dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris la sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten gyi mdun du dkyil 'khor gru 
[\[33a.4\]]bzhir byas la ba'i lci bas byugs te/_grwa bzhir dri'i chu phor bu bkang ba re re gzhag_/bdug spos kyi snod du ba 'thul ba yang bzhag nas snod chen po'i nang du me tog dang /_dri'i chu dang /_'bras skam po rnams blugs te/_dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzhag pa dang /_yang 
[\[33a.5\]]til nag po dang /_sran ma ma sha dang /_'bras rnams bsres te btsos pa'i 'bras thug kri sar zhes bya ba dang /_zas dkar gsum dang /_'di rnams bum pa'i nang du blugs pa dang /_yang shing tog sna tshogs 'bras bu dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /_kha zas ming gis smos 
[\[33a.6\]]pa 'di rnams dang /_spos dang /_me tog la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bkram la/_gsang sngags kyi yi ge mchod rten gyi srog shing gi nang du bcug nas mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhir phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du dmigs te phyag byas la sems 
[\[33a.7\]]rtse gcig pas gsang sngags 'di dag gdon par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_o~M bi pu la/_bi ma le/_pra ba re dzi na ba re/_sa ra sa ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta d+hA tu gar b+he/_a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_A ya ta to ba Ni swA hA/_sarba de ba Ni ba ha ya bi bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha Na sam ye swA hA/_bdug 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]spos 'thul ba rgyun mi 'chad par bya zhing /_gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa brgyad bton na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_tshangs pa dang /_dbang 
[\[33b.2\]]phyug chen po dang /_sred med kyi bu rnams de'i mod la mchod rten de la mchod pa dang /_rim gro byed de srog shing brtan par byed do/_/de bas gong du yang sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang gnas der gshegs te/_
[\[33b.3\]]mchod rten de la mchod pa dang /_chos kyi skur byin gyis rlob cing ring bsrel dang ldan par mdzad do/_/de ltar sems thag pa nas cho ga tshul bzhin du byas na yon tan de dag dang /_gzhan yang mchod rten de yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur 
[\[33b.4\]]te/_rin po che'i rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las mchod rten byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan zhing lus rnam par dag la tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang /_bgegs thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/gang gzhan la la 
[\[33b.5\]]zhig gis mchod rten 'di mthong ngam/_mchod rten de'i dril bu'i sgra thos na yang las kyi sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/_mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang yongs su byang nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye'o/_/gang la la 
[\[33b.6\]]zhig gis mchod rten de'i ming tsam thos pa yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam 'thob par 'gyur/_tha na bya dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]la sogs pa sems can gang gis mthong ba de yang tshe 'phos nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs te/_bsod nams dang ldan pa'i lus thob 
[\[33b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par spyod par 'dod pa des snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/_sa dang lci bas byugs la de'i steng du spos kyi skyong nul gyis byugs te/_dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir dri'i chus bkang ba'i snod re re gzhag 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]la/_sngar bstan pa'i gsang sngags bzhi po dag las rnam pa gcig kyang dgu bcu rtsa dgu bris te/_rang gi lag gis mchod rten chung ngu dgu bcu rtsa dgu gdab cing gsang sngags rnams gcig kyang re re'i nang du gzhug go/_/de nas yang gsang sngags 'di dgu bcu rtsa 
[\[34a.2\]]dgu yi ger bris te/_mchod rten gyi 'phang lo rnams kyi nang du bcug la/_mchod rten rnams dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag ste/_me tog dang /_byugs pas mchod la/_lan bdun bdun du bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di yang gdon par bya'o/_/namaHna ba 
[\[34a.3\]]na ba tI nAM/_ta thA ga ta gaM gA naM dI bA lu kA naM/_ko Ti ni yu ta sha ta sa ha srA NAM/_oM bo ri/_tsa ri Ni tsa ri/_mo ri go ri tsa la bA ri swA hA/_cho ga 'di ltar byas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par spyad par yang ma zad de/_des ni rin po che'i mchod rten bye ba 
[\[34a.4\]]khrag khrig brgya stong gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byas par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i gong du yang lha thams cad kyis mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs 
[\[34a.5\]]bsdus te/_mchod rten de la yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang dang /_yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par 'gyur te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag snyed kyis mkhyen cing gzigs te byin gyis rlob par mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[34a.6\]]'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i bsod nams dang /_yon tan thams cad thob par mdzad do/_/yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di snying po ma nor bar yi ger bris la rtag tu bton te/_mchod pa'i las byas la lus la thogs na rig pa de nyid 
[\[34a.7\]]kyis bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa mdzad de/_phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra thams cad dang /_shar gnyer ba rnams dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]la sogs pa thams cad kyang gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur te/_'jigs shing skrag nas so sor 'byer bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]gang la la zhig gis rig pa 'don pa de dang gtam byas pa yang mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig gis sngags pa de'i sgra thos sam/_grib mas phog gam/_lus la reg kyang rung ste/_de'i tshe rabs gzhan gyi las 
[\[34b.2\]]kyi sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang rig pa 'don pa de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs/_mes mi tshugs/_chus khyer bar mi 'gyur/_gdon thams cad kyis kyang glags mi rnyed/_thog 'bab par mi 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[34b.3\]]kyis bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa mdzad cing spyan ras kyis 'tsho bar mdzad do/_/lha thams cad dang /_dam tshig can thams cad kyis kyang de la bstang grogs byed par 'gyur te/_gzhan gyi rig sngags dang /_byad dang /_sbyor ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[34b.4\]]de lta bas na rig pa 'don pa gnas gang na 'dug kyang gsang sngags 'di'i cho ga don du gnyer bar bya ste/_gsang sngags yi ger bris la lam gyi bzhi mdo'am/_sum mdo skye bo mang po phan tshun 'gro ba'i gnas su mchod rten byas la/_de'i nang du bcug na 'gro ba thams 
[\[34b.5\]]cad dang /_bya dang /_sbrang ma dang /_tha na grog sbur yan chad kyis mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_reg pa dang /_de la phog pa'i sa dang /_rdul dang /_rlung dang /_grib mas phog na yang byol song dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_ngan song log par ltung ba sems can 
[\[34b.6\]]dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral zhing /_'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde 'gro mtho ris lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bas tshe rabs rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur zhing phyir mi ltung ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[34b.7\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_dbang phyug chen 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]po la sogs pa'i lha rnams la bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa dag ngas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po 'di dag khyed rnams la yongs su gtad kyis rtag tu rim gror bya zhing yongs su gzung bar bya ste/_rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang du chug la gnas thams 
[\[35a.2\]]cad du bsgrags te/_nam du yang rgyun ma bcad par sems can la ston cig_/mthong zhing thos par byas na mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_gsang ba pa'i 
[\[35a.3\]]bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang /_tshangs pa dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_sred med kyi bu dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[35a.4\]]zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas tshig mthun par smras te/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te gsang sngags 'di'i cho ga dang /_mchod rten bgyi ba'i cho ga ji skad gsungs pa rnams sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du 
[\[35a.5\]]bdag cag kun gyis bsrung zhing rim gror bgyi/_rtag par gzungs su gzung zhing mi bskyud par bgyi/_yi ger bri ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_mchod pa'i las rnams kyang bgyi ste/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos shing khong du chud nas ngan 
[\[35a.6\]]song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pas na/_bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin spyi bos blangs pa'i slad du gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag rim gror bgyi/_btsun par 
[\[35a.7\]]bgyi/_gus par bgyi/_rin po che'i 'du shes gzhag par bgyi/_rgya cher 'phel bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi/_nam du yang nub par mi 'gyur zhing ci nas kyang rgyas par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan bgyi bar 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa rnams dam tshig la gnas pas gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag bsrung ba dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_yongs su gzung bar khas blangs pa ni legs so legs so/_/shin tu yang legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[35b.2\]]de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po 
[\[35b.3\]]bad+yA ka ra sing+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de dpal gyi lhun po'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/_/jo bo a ti sha dang dge bshes 'brom ston pas sngags rnams dag par bsgyur ro//_//
[\[35b.4\]{D511}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dwA da sha bud+d+ha kaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU traM/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis 
[\[35b.5\]]thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong gi byang 
[\[35b.6\]]chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum 
[\[35b.7\]]phrag brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mu tig can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]tog gi 'od me tog pad+ma bai DUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa spos mchog dam pas mchod pa sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa rab sprul bkod pa chen 
[\[36a.2\]]po chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/su rgyal ba de'i mtshan 'dzin pa de bskal pa chen po 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal par 'khor ba las ldog go/_/
[\[36a.3\]]des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dra ba med ces bya ba lung bstan te/_de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi 'od me tog pad+ma bai DUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i 
[\[36a.4\]]gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa spos mchog dam pas mchod pa sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal 
[\[36a.5\]]po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos nub ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[36a.6\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu lha gzhon nu nyi ma'i sgron ma zla ba'i me tog pad+ma gser sdug nam mkha' lta bu'i sku ldan rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer rab brgyan 
[\[36a.7\]]thogs med 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur 'od zer rab 'byin 'jig rten khams kun snang byed tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shar phyogs de nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]bkod pa thams cad dri med 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/tshig 'don to/_/phyag bya'o/_/lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa'i rgyan la dgongs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/yid la bya'o/_/
[\[36b.2\]]nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri med zla ba'i tog gi rgyal po grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi bkod pa snang bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/shar 
[\[36b.3\]]lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog gi tog grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/nub byang gi phyogs 
[\[36b.4\]]mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs bral bag tsha mi mnga' spu zing mi byed ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/
[\[36b.5\]]'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bsgyings pa'i mid pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od gzi brjid 'jigs bral rgyal po zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/byams 
[\[36b.6\]]pa dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi mtshan brjod la nyi ma bcur sdig pa thams cad kyi nyes pa bshags par bya/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su 
[\[36b.7\]]yi rang bar bya/_sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/'on kyang sdig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/_/las kyi sgrib 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]pa thams cad rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa dang /_
[\[37a.2\]]gzungs phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob bo/_/ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob bo/_/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa'ang myur du yongs su 'dzin to/_/bla na med 
[\[37a.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe na'ang kun du mdzes pa dang /_de'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_
[\[37a.4\]]rus phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_ris 'dra ba'i skye bo'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'ang yongs su 'dzin to/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang dang gang du skyes pa yi/_/tshe rabs tshe rabs thams cad du/_/mthong na dga' zhing dga' byed dang /_/
[\[37a.5\]]'od byed pa dang mthu chen dang /_/'byor pa chen por 'gyur ba yin/_/gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams kyang brjod par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_a khe ma khe sa man+ta mu khe/_sau ti yuk+te/_ni ruk+te pra b+he/_sa ma yo ge/_tsit+ta tsit+ta/_a khe ma khe/_pa da ne/_bi brte/_sa man+ta gu Ni/_
[\[37a.6\]]sat+ya ra me/_yuk+te pra yuk+te/_hi li mi li/_ma sa le/_A na le/_tsa me/_a tsi ti/_tso tse/_a ra he/_ba hu ts+tshe/_mA yu gra he/_he ma ba ti/_dz+yo ti ba ti/_d+harma tsi te/_tsUta pang ke a bi k+Sha pe ra d+h+r-i k+Sha me/_skan+d+ha bi b+hak+te/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 
[\[37a.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gzungs 'di dag ni bzung byas na/_/phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i/_/bye ba drug cu'i drang srong rnams/_/de dag de la dgongs par 'gyur/_/
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]skye ba dag ni kun du yang /_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]dge ba gang yin pa/_/don rnams thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/_/pad+ma'i snying por bzhugs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon sum mthong /_/gzungs 'di dag ni 'dzin byed pa/_/mkhas pa 
[\[37b.2\]]dpal ldan rdzus te skye/_/dran dang blo gros rtogs pa dang /_/mos pa shes rab rab tu 'phel/_/thos pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur/_/thos pa thams cad 'dzin mi nyams/_/'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi/_/mtshan rnams su zhig rjod byed pa/_/ngan 'gro thams cad 
[\[37b.3\]]spangs nas ni/_/bzang 'gror myur du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi mchog_/de dag de la mngon par 'gyur/_/byang chub rab tu de 'tshang rgya/_/zhing ni bye ba phrag stong dag_/gser gyis bkang ste sbyin byin pas/_/gang zhig de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi/_/
[\[37b.4\]]mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa yi/_/bsod nams phung po de ches mang /_/rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/mi khom thams cad rnam spangs te/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes rnyed/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed/_/dad pa 
[\[37b.5\]]bla na med pa 'thob/_/sangs rgyas rnams la rab dad cing /_/mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes byed de/_/mthong nas ston la rab tu dad/_/'jig rten sgron ma mthong nas ni/_/mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin 
[\[37b.6\]]byed pa/_/bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/_/'khor ba rnam par spangs nas su/_/byang chub myur du 'tshang yang rgya/_/nyin zhag bdun du tshang bar ni/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed na/_/gang gis 'dren rnams mthong 'gyur ba'i/_/rgya chen mig ni sbyangs par 'gyur/_/
[\[37b.7\]]'jig rten mgon po de dag gi_/mtshan rnams mi gang 'dzin byed pa/_/skye ba gang dang gar skye bar/_/de ni phyag bya'i 'os su 'gyur/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/_/bkur sti ma yin thob mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten dag na grags 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]pa 'thob/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/de la bskal pa du mar ni/_/lha rnams bsti stang byed par 'gyur/_/byang chub myur du 'tshang yang rgya/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/mos med shes rab 'chal mi 'gyur/_/g.yo dang sgyu ni 
[\[38a.2\]]rnam par spangs/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong /_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/lha dang dri za klu dbang dang /_/mkha' lding lha min gsang ba pa/_/rtag tu de la srung bar byed/_/gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs/_/nor chen khyim du skye bar 
[\[38a.3\]]'gyur/_/sems can kun la sbyin par byed/_/dpa' zhing gtong phod ser sna med/_/bskal pa bye ba brgya mang por/_/lha yi tsan+dan dmar po dang /_/shin tu dri zhim spos kun gyi/_/spos ngad de yi kha nas 'byung /_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/bskal pa bye bar 
[\[38a.4\]]sgra skad ni/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/_/rtag tu chos rgyal tshul dang ldan/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/rin chen sna bdun pad+ma'i 'dab/_/bye ba stong phrag mang yod las/_/'byor chen de skye lha gzugs ldan/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag su 
[\[38a.5\]]'dzin pa/_/de ni pha ma spun sdug dang /_/skye bo dag gi tshogs rnams dang /_/'bral bar 'gyur ba mi mthong ngo /_/drang srong chen po rnams kyi mtshan/_/bud med kyis ni gzung byas na/_/bud med lus la ma chags nas/_/skyes pa blo gros ldan par 'gyur/_/mi yi 
[\[38a.6\]]lus ni thob gyur nas/_/bla med byang chub thob 'gyur te/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas/_/'dod pa ji bzhin mya ngan 'da'/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/_/de yi lus la mtshon dang ni/_/dug dang me dang rgyal po dang /_/g.yon can rnams kyis mi tshugs so/_/
[\[38a.7\]]mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/_/de yi sems la nam yang ni/_/dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa yi/_/bdud kyis glags rnyed mi 'gyur ro/_/'di dag gi ni mtshan gyi rnams/_/mi gang 'dzin par byed pa de/_/zhing ni bye ba bsam yas par/_/nam mkha' las ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]sangs rgyas bstan pa rnams mchod nas/_/'jigs pa med par zhu ba zhu/_/de dag de yi bsam mkhyen nas/_/rgyal ba de dag lung ston 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mgon po de dag las/_/lung bstan pa ni thob gyur nas/_/de ni shin tu yi rangs te/_/rgyal ba'i bstan la the tshom med/_/mtshan rnams 
[\[38b.2\]]'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/'jig rten mgon po rnams las ni/_/zab mo'i chos ni thos 'gyur te/_/thos nas thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur/_/de nas pha rol phyin pa dang /_/mi 'jigs pa dang stobs rnams dang /_/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams/_/ma lus par ni rdzogs par 'gyur/_/
[\[38b.3\]]sangs rgyas de dag rnams kyi ni/_/gang gi zhing du 'dod gyur pa/_/der ni bla med yang dag rdzogs/_/byang chub rtogs nas 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/_/skyes pa'am ni bud med gang /_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa yi/_/yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag kyang /_/sangs rgyas bskal par rgyun du 
[\[38b.4\]]gsung /_/bag yod ldan par gyur nas ni/_/yon tan phun sum 'di thos nas/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/_/de dag mtshan rnams 'dzin par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 'di dag dpal snying po/_/sprin gyi rgyal po mi yi mchog_/'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi/_/mtshan ni bskal par 
[\[38b.5\]]gang nyan dang /_/gang dag 'di rnams mtshan nyan cing /_/thos nas gus par byed 'gyur ba/_/de dang de dag shes rab che/_/rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/drang srong chen po de dag gi/_/'di 'dra'i mtshan dag thos gyur nas/_/bag yod ldan zhing mkhas gyur la/_/shes rab ldan pa su mi 'dzin/_/
[\[38b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[38b.7\]]kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D512}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sap+ta bud+d+ha kaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i 
[\[39a.2\]]mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ti se'i ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas na drang srong gi spyod pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 
[\[39a.3\]]'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang /_kun tu bzang po dang /_mtha' yas me tog dang /_kun nas me tog dang /_
[\[39a.4\]]de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod de nyid na dge slong zhig 'byung pos zin nas brdol zhing gcer bu gos med pa lag pa sgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug pa 
[\[39a.5\]]gzigs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[39a.6\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil na kyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa 'di dang /_dge slong gcer bu gos ma mchis la lag pa bstod pa cig shos 'di yang su zhig lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 
[\[39a.7\]]'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni nad kyis btab pa yin no/_/cig shos 'di yang nad kyis btab pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/nad thams cad rab tu 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]zhi bar bgyid pa dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas sprul pa mdzad de/_de nas nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa drug byung ngo /_/bdun pa ni bcom ldan 
[\[39b.2\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 
[\[39b.3\]]'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud+d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM ha la ha la/_hi la hi lA ya/_na mo dza ga na mi tsa nA ya/_na mo na maHswA hA/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di 
[\[39b.4\]]skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed na/_de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/_chu dang me'i sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 
[\[39b.5\]]'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de dug zos kyang zas bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/zas dang skom la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te zos na pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo /_/nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro/_/ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/thos pa 'dzin par 
[\[39b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas la sna ma'i mar sbyin no/_/mdze dang skrangs nad kyis btab pa rnams la sna ma'i mar dang /_ut+pa la sngon po dang /_shu ti dang /_nye'u shing pa rnams bsres 
[\[39b.7\]]pa'i mar byin na nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/_/las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_'byung po 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud+d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_oM pa tsa pa tsa pA tsa ya pA tsa ya/_sarba b+hU tA nAM/_ts+tshin+d+ha ya/_kI la ya/_ba ra bid+yA nAM swA hA/_nam mkha'i snying po sems can thams 
[\[40a.2\]]cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_bsgom nyes pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying po 
[\[40a.3\]]'di zung shig nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig nga'i snying po 'di nyin lan gsum yid la byed na/_de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[40a.4\]]'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'di'i cho ga gzhan ni nad thams cad la skud pas bcing bar bya'o/_/'dus pa las gyur pa la sna ma'i mar la bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no/_/chus phyogs bcing bar 
[\[40a.5\]]bya'o/_/skud pas bdag bsrung ngo /_/byis pa rnams kyi gdon dag la skud pa sngon po gdags so/_/mtshon btab pa'i rna bar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o/_/gzhan dag la yang rang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gi nam mkha' 
[\[40a.6\]]la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud+d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_oM ka la ka la/_ki li 
[\[40a.7\]]ki li/_ku lu ku lu/_ku lo ta sA d+ha nA nAM/_ku ru sarba gra hA NAM swA hA/_nam mkha'i snying po gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis gsungs shing ngas kyang da ltar bshad 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]pa ste/_nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig_/gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed na de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/_dug gis mi tshugs/_dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/_rims nad kyis mi 'debs shing /_
[\[40b.2\]]chu dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /_gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/_sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/_dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig nang par langs nas mgo bkrus te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 
[\[40b.3\]]lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/_de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de la sems can sdang ba gang dag rgyal po rnams thog mar smra bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang du yid la bya'o/_/'thab pa dang /_'thab 
[\[40b.4\]]me dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad du skud pa dkar po gdags so/_/mig nad la shing 'o ma can las skud pa byas te rna ba la gdags so/_/dmag rengs par byed par 'dod pas zho dang /_sbrang rtsi la btags pa'i 'bras yos la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/rA dzA nAM 
[\[40b.5\]]rA dzA mA tram+bA ba shI ka ra tu kA me na/_'o ma can gyi shing gi sbar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin sreg bya'o/_/bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /_sdig pa sbyang zhing dpal chen po dang /_nor gyi phung po chen po bsgrub par 'dod na 'o ma can gyi shing 
[\[40b.6\]]gi sbar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin sreg bya'o/_/sdig pa ji snyed pa thams cad sbyang bar 'dod pa dang /_rig sngags thams cad 'grub par 'dod pa dang /_bdag bkru bar 'dod pas shu ti dang /_na la dang /_khre dang /_shi ri sha dang /_rgya spos dang /_gur 
[\[40b.7\]]gum dang /_gla sgang dang /_in dra ba ru na dang /_byang chub kyi shing dang /_a mra'i mgo thogs dang /_'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bya zhing bum pa sar pa bzhag ste/_zla ba nya la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar snying pos lan stong 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]rtsa brgyad bsngags la khrus bya'o/_/dug mi gdug par byed par 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar seng ldeng gi thur ma ba'i lci bar smyugs pa brgya rtsa brgyad ming nas smos te sbyin sreg byas na dug mi gdug par 'gyur ro/_/gdon dang /_srung ba dang /_'byung po la 
[\[41a.2\]]sogs pa'i las thams cad la yang sbyar bar byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_
[\[41a.3\]]'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud+d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_na maHkra ku ts+tshan ya/_ta tha ga ta ya/_a ra ha te saM myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_oM ka Ta ka Ta/_ka Tha ka Tha/_ki Ti ki Ti/_ki Thi ki Thi/_ki TA pa 
[\[41a.4\]]ya na maHswA hA/_nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel ces bya ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'i snying po 'di khyod kyis zung shig_/blangs shing bzung ste kun chub par 
[\[41a.5\]]byas na phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rnyed nas khrus byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dag gis mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa 
[\[41a.6\]]brgyad brjod 'byor par 'gyur te/_tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang na mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs na de mir skye ba tha ma thob par 'gyur te/_'di 
[\[41a.7\]]nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la yang rtag tu brjod na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/zas dang skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun sngags te zos 'thung na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur 
[\[41b\]]
