[\[41b.1\]]ro/_/ji ste skom zhu bar 'dod na bza' thams cad la lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya'o/_/lhog rgal bcad na zangs khab kyis bya'o/_/'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_bcings pa thams cad las thar bar bya na lan bdun bzlas brjod byed na rtag tu nor yang 'phel bar 
[\[41b.2\]]'gyur/_bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na des phyogs gtsang mar 'jig rten gyi 'khor sar dkyil 'khor bskus la a ga rus bdugs te/_lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/_de'i drung du sngas 
[\[41b.3\]]shar phyogs su bstan te nyal na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/yid la ci snos pa de thams cad ston to/_/tshe'am stobs sam/_pham rgyal thams cad kyang ston to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams 
[\[41b.4\]]cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir/_gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud+d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_na maHka na ka mu na ye/_ta thA ga tA ya/_a ra ha te saM 
[\[41b.5\]]myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM sa ra sa ra/_sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri/_si ri si ri/_si rA ya/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_d+hu ma d+hu ma/_d+hu ma d+hu mA ya na mo na maHka na ka mu na ye/_ta thA ga tA ya/_a ra ha te saM myak+saM bud+d+ha ya swA hA/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis byang chub 
[\[41b.6\]]sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig snying po 'di 'dzin cing rtag tu bzlas brjod byed pa de la mtshon gyis 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_me dang /_chu dang /_lce 'bab pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_dug thams cad 
[\[41b.7\]]kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/_dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/_tshe ring bar 'gyur/_longs spyod che bar 'gyur/_rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pas byin 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ste pha rol nad las thar bar byed par 'dod na ci nus su gtor ma gtong zhing pog gam/_a ga ru'i bdug pas bdugs la bza' thams cad 
[\[42a.2\]]la khrus bya'o/_/mdze dang /_skrangs nad dang /_mchin skran la shu dag 'jam po btags la sbrang rtsi dang bsres te/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la bskus na mdze nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bzhi pa la sangs rgyas 
[\[42a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba la lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te mi'i mgo la bcing na zhag bzhi pa'i rims sos par 'gyur ro/_/mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas na/_brjed byed las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lus srul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas 
[\[42a.4\]]la phul ba'i me tog gis bdug go/_/de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de/_las thams cad pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba 
[\[42a.5\]]dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud+d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_oM ha ra ha ra/_ha ra ha ra/_ha ha ha/_na maHkA sh+ya pA ya/_ta tha ga ta ya/_a ra ha te/_saM myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_sid d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa 
[\[42a.6\]]da swA hA/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i snying po snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs 
[\[42a.7\]]pa ste/_nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis kyang snying po 'di zung shig kun chub par gyis shig_/gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_nyin mo'am/_mtshan mo lan gsum gsum bzlas brjod byas na mdor na rmi lam na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur te/_sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so/_/las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/mdze dang /_sha gar la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad 
[\[42b.2\]]bsngags te/_bklags shing bkrus na sos par 'gyur ro/_/klad pa na ba la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/_/thams cad du yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[42b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud+d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_g+hu me g+hu me/_ma hA g+hu me/_ta le ta le/_ma hA ta le/_
[\[42b.4\]]tsa le tsa le/_ma hA tsa le/_d+hu re d+hu re/_ma hA d+hu re/_ti ri ti ri/_ma hA ti ri/_ki li ki li/_ma hA ki li/_tsu ru tsu ru/_ma hA tsu ru/_mi li mi li/_ma hA mi li/_ti li ti li/_ma hA ti li/_d+hu me d+hu me/_ma hA d+hu me/_tsa le tsa le/_ma hA tsa le/_khi ri khi ri/_ma hA khi ri/_tsi li tsi li/_ma hA tsi 
[\[42b.5\]]li swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i snying po klad pa'i nad bsal na mtshon dang lag mthil gyis bya'o/_/sprin bzlog na shing ka ra bI ra'i 
[\[42b.6\]]lcug mas bya'o/_/dug sbyong na chus bya'o/_/las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o/_/khrus kyi cho gas sbyar bar bya'o/_/cho ga thams cad kyis thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i 
[\[42b.7\]]snying po yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]{D513}]@##/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba bud+d+hAng+ga ba tI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos 
[\[43a.2\]]pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung chen po'i 'gram na 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po dag skyes pa 
[\[43a.3\]]dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo rnams la 'jigs pa chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'byung ngo /_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_rgud pa dang /_'chi ba'o/_/de la yang 'jigs pa chen po gcig ste/_'di ltar 'chi bdag gi 'jigs pa 
[\[43a.4\]]chen po ste/_brtsam pa med pa/_gnyen po med pa/_rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'o/_/rgyal po chen po dag de la 'jigs pa chen po gcig po de'i gnyen po ngas 'dir brjod par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[43a.5\]]'das gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis srog rab tu stsal bas/_skye dgu rjes su bzung ba 'di ni deng bdag cag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs su thugs mngon du phyogs te bzhugs nas/_se gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[43a.6\]]thams cad la bskul te/_'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gi 
[\[43a.7\]]grogs mdzod cig_/des na bdag cag 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas sems can thams cad kyi dus ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu bzlog par bgyi'o/_/sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa yang bskor bar bgyi'o zhes gsungs 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]so/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_steng dang /_'og gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te/_'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i don du 
[\[43b.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo /_/de bzhin du phyogs mtshams rnams su yang 'di skad ces gang gi phyir 'di dag tshe dang /_stobs dang /_kha dog dang ldan pa 
[\[43b.3\]]yongs su 'grub cing dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar sangs rgyas thams cad bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo /_/de nas phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang bar gyur pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag 
[\[43b.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang ste/_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i grogs mdzad par zhal gyis bzhes nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad 'di skad ces gsung ngo /_/tad+ya thA/_tsa lA tsa lA tsa le/_bi na ti/_swa sti ke/_tsakra ang+ga ti/_
[\[43b.5\]]pra sha man+tu/_sarba ro ga a na tre/_ku na Te ma hA ku na Te/_tsa re tsa re re/_he ma gi ri/_he ma gau ri/_he ma ni shun+ti/_he ma si si/_kau ra be kau ra ba be/_he ku ra re/_ku ra re/_ku ma ti/_bi Sha sa ma Ne/_shi Shu bi/_tsa le tsa le/_bi tsa le/_mA bi lam+ba hu mu hu mu swA hA/_
[\[43b.6\]]gsang ba pa'i bdag po ji snyed pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang nye bar 'dug nas de dag gis smras pa/_hU~M hU~M si si swA hA/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po 
[\[43b.7\]]chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/dus ma lags par 'gum pa las bzlog par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_shwe te shwe te/_le li li/_'phags skyes 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]pos kyang smras pa/_mA tang+ge mA tang+ge/_mA tang+gi ni/_shU mA shA mu/_yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras pa/_tsa re tsa re re swA hA/_mig mi bzang gis kyang smras pa/_ba lam+pi pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po 
[\[44a.2\]]dag gang la la zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i rig sngags 'di nyin re la lan re 'don na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[44a.3\]]'dis sems can thams cad kyi srog la phan btags par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig sems can thams cad kyi don du nyin gcig bzhin du tshig tu 'don pa dang /_gang yang 'di klog pa de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med do/_/de'i lus la nad ngan pa 'byung bar 
[\[44a.4\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/mes ma yin/_mtshon gyis ma yin/_dug gis ma yin/_lce 'bab pas ma yin no/_/gang na rgyal ba'i bu dag rig sngags 'don pa'i sa phyogs de sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 
[\[44a.5\]]kyis dgongs par rig par bya'o/_/yi ger 'dri'am/_/yi ger 'drir 'jug pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rim gror bya ba thams cad kyis bsti stang byas par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can rnams la rim gro byed pa ni sangs rgyas la rim gro byed pa 
[\[44a.6\]]yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsung ba'i phyir ro/_/su zhig gis 'di bris nas yan lag la btags na de'i yan lag thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_thams cad dang 
[\[44a.7\]]ldan pa'i 'khor de de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[44b.2\]{D514}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bud+d+ha hr-i da yaM nA ma d+hA ra NI d+ha rma bi par+yA ya/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag 
[\[44b.3\]]gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul chos kyi dbye/_dgon pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/_ye shes kyi rnam par dpyad pa/_sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_sems can thams cad kyis 
[\[44b.4\]]mngon par bstod pa/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su spyod pa kun nas 'od kyi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]dbus na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang 
[\[44b.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas lung bstan pa/_thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa/_thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/_thams cad kyang gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs thob pa sha stag gis yongs su 
[\[44b.6\]]bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas thabs cig tu bzhugs te chos ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya chen po la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la 
[\[44b.7\]]thugs brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]grangs yod do/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/_'dzin tam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab 
[\[45a.2\]]tu ston tam/_dad dam/_lhag pa'i bsams pas mos par byed na/_de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/_chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 
[\[45a.3\]]'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_bskal pa stong du 'khor ba'i srid pa'i rgya mtsho phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/_
[\[45a.4\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_de la 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad bsrung bar 
[\[45a.5\]]'gyur/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/_de'i lus la nad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/_pha rol gyi gnod 
[\[45a.6\]]pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_de la bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur te/_gang 
[\[45a.7\]]du yid la byas pa der bdud kyi ris kyi lha de dag thams cad skrag cing dngangs la dngangs par 'gyur zhing phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig go/_/sangs rgyas kyi tshig chen po'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshig chen po'o/_/sangs 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]rgyas thams cad kyi tshig go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshig yin no/_/tad+ya thA/_bud+d+he su bud+d+he/_ma hA bud+d+he/_i ha bud+d+he/_ta tra bud+d+he/_bud+d+he bud+d+he/_bud+d+he/_bud+d+he ma ti bud+d+he/_sarba bud+d+ha/_a nu ma te/_sarba bud+d+he/_a nu dz+nyA na te/_bud+d+ha/_bud+d+ha/_
[\[45b.2\]]bud+d+ha/_bud+d+ha/_bud+d+ha/_bud+d+ha/_bud+d+ha/_bud+d+ha/_bud+d+ha/_bud+d+ha/_sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' yas te/_chos bstan pa yang mtha' yas mod kyi/_gcig tu yid la bya ba ni mdor na chos sgom pa'o/_/gzungs 'di ni sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir 
[\[45b.3\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa ste/_chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya yin no/_/tad+ya thA/_shud+d+he/_su shud+d+he/_su shud+d+he/_shod+d+ha ni/_saM shod+d+ha ni/_saM shod+d+ha ni/_nirma le ma la a pa ga te/_ga te sa mA ti kran+ti/_kra me sa sa ma sa re/_sa rA sa ra pa re a sho ke_/bi 
[\[45b.4\]]sho ka_/sho ka sha ma ni/_shAn+te/_u pa shAn+te/_pra shAn+te/_a ba b+hA se/_sarba pu N+ye pa ri miN+Di te/_sarba d+harma pra ti maN+Di te/_ha ra ha ra/_ma la ha ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_saM tsa ra/_tsa la tsa la/_saM tsa la/_ta la ta la ma ta la/_sa ma ta la/_ri Ne ri Ne/_su ri Ne/_sa 
[\[45b.5\]]ma ri Ne/_ri Na ma ti lo ka d+ha re/_lo ka d+ha ri Ne/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_Da ra Da ra/_ro d+ha ro d+ha/_ma ha bi dza ya/_bA hi ni/_ha na ha na/_sarba bud+d+he/_hri phre shi tra si/_sarba dz+nyA pa the/_sarba dz+nyA pa ra mi te/_ma ha pra ti b+hA na/_saM pan+ne/_sa man+ta/_a lo ke bud+d+he/_bi Sha ye/_
[\[45b.6\]]bud+d+ha/_pra ti maN+Di te/_b+ha ga ba te/_sa ra sa ra/_pra sa ra pra sa ra/_bi sa ra bi sa ra/_pra sa ra sarba sho ka a pa ga te swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi snying po'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad ma thag tu ri dang gnas su bcas pa dang /_tshal 
[\[45b.7\]]rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams kyis yang g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos so/_/rgya mtsho chen po yang 'khrugs/_rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/_/ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang ldeg cing 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]'gul to/_/bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang skrag nas/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams dang /_bdud sdig can rnams shin tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur nas nyam thag go/_/sems can gang dag sa chen po g.yos par mthong ba de dag gis de 
[\[46a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum ched du brjod do/_/lha gang dag sangs rgyas la 
[\[46a.3\]]mngon par dad pa de dag gis lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gtor/_mngon par gtor nas/_gang dag sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyes so/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_shAkya seng ge 
[\[46a.4\]]yang dag rdzogs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas skyob pas skad cig yud gang la/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni snying po yi/_/gzungs 'di dag ni rab tu bshad pa yi/_/skad cig yud der sa yang rnam drug g.yos/_/rgya mtsho 'khrugs shing bdud kyi gnas kun kyang /_/
[\[46a.5\]]rab tu g.yos nas bdud kyi ris rnams kyi/_/lha dag rab tu dngangs shing 'khrugs par 'gyur/_/bdud yid mi bde sdug bsngal mya ngan non/_/de tshe lha rnams ngo mtshar rab thos nas/_'jig rten mgon la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_/nam mkhar gnas nas me tog man 
[\[46a.6\]]dA 'thor/_/gang dag sangs rgyas mngon dang gzhan rnams kyi/_/se mo do dang do shal spos rnams dang /_phye ma dag dang byug pa gos rnams dang /_/rgyan dang dpung rgyan dag kyang rab tu 'bul/_/brgyad po 'di dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'o/_/
[\[46a.7\]]brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rgyan dang /_thos pa thams cad yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa'i rgyan dang /_chos zab mo rnam par nges pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rgyan dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]mchog ma yin par shes pa'i rgyan dang /_ji ltar thos pa dang ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin so sor rtog cing dpyod pa'i rgyan dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang /_rgyan de yang 
[\[46b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis thabs la mkhas pa'i rgyan dang /_gzungs thob pa'i rgyan te/_brgyad po de dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 'di rtag par rgyun du yid la bya'o/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/
[\[46b.3\]]gzungs kyi gzhi 'di dag rnams yid la byas na las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob bo/_/nad thams cad dang /_na ba thams cad la lag pas byab par bya'o/_/bzlas brjod kyang dpag tu 
[\[46b.4\]]med par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[46b.5\]]'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus 
[\[46b.6\]]te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D515}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bud+d+ha hr-i da yaM nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i 
[\[46b.7\]]gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi skyed mos tshal na sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi shing ljon pa kun nas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/_
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]lha'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po dka' thub bzang po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag de'i phyir legs 
[\[47a.2\]]par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyi ma'i dus na/_'khor bzhi bsdu ba dang /_rjes su gzung ba dang /_kun tu rjes su gzung ba dang /_khyad par du 'gro bar bya ba dang /_don thams cad dang /_chos thams cad 
[\[47a.3\]]dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams rnam pa thams cad du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs ston to/_/'chang ngo /_/
[\[47a.4\]]de khyed kyi zung la da ltar dang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas phyi ma'i dus na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i 'khor rnam pa bzhi rnams la ston cig_/shod cig_/yal bar mi dor bar nges par bstan par bya/_bsgrag par bya'o/_/ji tsam du phongs 
[\[47a.5\]]par gyur pa rnams dang /_sgrib pa dang ldan pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bskyang zhing nges par bstan par bya/_bsgrag par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bgyi ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad bka' stsal pa de 
[\[47a.6\]]bzhin du 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin 'di nan tan gyis yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/_tad+ya thA/_a ma le/_
[\[47a.7\]]nirma le/_sarba A kA ra ar+tha pa ri brAp+te/_a sa man+ta sarba ku na A kA re t+r+ya d+h+wa/_a saM ga a nA br-i te/_sa man+ta da sha di sha_/pa ri pUr+Na dz+nyA ne/_sarba a saM ga dar+sha na brAp+te/_sarba d+harma ma bi sha ta pa ri pUr+Ne/_sarba A kA ra/_a saM ga sa ma n+wi te/_sa man+ta a pra 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]ti ha ta dze t+r+ya d+h+wa da sha su/_di k+Shu pa ri brAp+ta ar+the/_shAn+ta/_pra shAn+ta/_u pa shAn+ta/_sa ma shAn+ta/_bi mo k+Sha a nu brAp+te/_su pra ti bud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu/_a t+yan+ta su ni sri te/_sarba A kA ra ni sa sa rA Na/_a na ba she Sha pA rang+ga te/_bi pra muk+ta/_a saM yo ga_/
[\[47b.2\]]bi pra yo gas+thi te d+harma te/_ga ga na sa ma/_pra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+ha/_nirma le/_a sa man+ta/_t+r+yad+h+wa a nu ga ta/_su brAp+te pU rban+ta/_a pa ran+ta/_ma d+h+ya t+r+ya d+h+wa sa man+ta a nu brAp+te/_a na ba she Sha/_pa ri dz+nyA pra ha na/_b+ha ba na/_sa k+ShAd kri ya pa ra ma pa rang+ga te/_ya 
[\[47b.3\]]thA bA di ta thA kA ri/_sarba A kA ra sam pan+ne/_sarba A kA ra ma hA/_mai tri ma hA ka ru NA/_sarba A kA rA sa ma sa gra ha a nu brAp+te/_lha'i bu dag 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs te/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs 
[\[47b.4\]]pa'i 'khor bzhi po las rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis lus la thogs sam/_legs par kha ton du byas te 'dzin pa des dman pa'i sems su mi bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag gi spyi gtsug gi steng gi mtshams su 
[\[47b.5\]]gnas par 'gyur ro/_/kha cig ni nges par sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/kha cig ni thos par 'gyur/_kha cig ni chos ston par 'gyur/_kha cig ni gzungs mi brjed par 'gyur/_slob pa lam la gnas pa rnams ni lam gyi rgyun mi 
[\[47b.6\]]'chad cing chos ston pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur/_kun tu 'dzin pa mi brjed par yang 'gyur/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grub par 'gyur/_de dag dang ldan na thos pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gzungs thob par 'gyur/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 
[\[47b.7\]]'gyur ba nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/_/khyed kyis tshe 'di la nga'i bstan pa'i dgongs pa khong du chud par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang nges par 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]bstan par bya zhing bsgrag par bya'o/_/yal bar mi 'dor/_phyi bshol mi bya/_brjed par mi bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam 
[\[48a.2\]]grangs 'di slad ma'i dus na 'khor bzhi rnams la phyi bshol ma mchis pa dang /_mi bskyud par bstan par bgyi/_bshad par bgyi'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang nges par bstan par bgyi zhing bsgrag par bgyi'o/_/de na de bzhin 
[\[48a.3\]]gshegs pa'i bka' lung dang mthun par 'gyur/_bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang don chen po dang phan pa'i dngos po chen por 'gyur lags so/_/bcom 
[\[48a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag de'i phyir ji skad smras pa de bzhin gyis shig_/'di ni khyed la rjes su bstan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dbang phyug chen po dka' thub bzang po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris 
[\[48a.5\]]gyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_
[\[48a.6\]]dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D516}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya puSh+pa kU Ta nA ma d+hA ra NI/_
[\[48a.7\]]bod skad du/_'phags pa me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros pa na/_klu'i rgyal po ma dros 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]pa'i khang pa na/_dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dus pa/_byang chub sems dpa' stong du tshang ba thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/_
[\[48b.2\]]ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa/_de ma thag tu rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/_go cha chen po bgos pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad la the tsom med pa sha stag dang yang thabs cig go/_/de'i 
[\[48b.3\]]tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par rtse zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par rtse stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo 
[\[48b.4\]]g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis na 
[\[48b.5\]]de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par rtse la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 
[\[48b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyi na de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur zhes seng ge rnam par rtse khyod de skad ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa/_ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa/_shes rab dpag tu med 
[\[48b.7\]]pa/_rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dpag tu med pa ste/_seng ge rnam par rtse ba gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de'i phyir de la mchod 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]pa'i rnam par smin pa de yang dpag tu med par shes par bya'o/_/seng ge rnam par rtse ba gang la la dag de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/_mchod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_nyan thos 
[\[49a.2\]]kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_/theg pa chen po'am/_theg pa gsum las theg pa gcig gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/seng ge rnam par rtse yang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[49a.3\]]mthong nas sems dang bar gyur la/_dad pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang /_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad dang /_bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsti stang du byas shing /_ri mor byas te mchod cing rjed la/_rim 
[\[49a.4\]]gror byas pa dang /_gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gyi mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa'i rnam par smin pa ni mnyam par shes par bya ste/_bye brag gam tha dad du bya ba med do/_/seng ge rnam par rtse ba byang chub sems 
[\[49a.5\]]dpa' khyim pa gang zhig gis nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam 'bul bar phul ba bas byang chub sems dpa' gang rab tu byung nas kAR+ShA pa Na gcig tsam 
[\[49a.6\]]dbul bar phul la/_phul nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des dge ba'i rtsa ba phyi ma'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_
[\[49a.7\]]bskrun pa dang /_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/seng ge rnam par rtse ba gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la lo gcig gam/_lo brgya'am/_lo stong yang rung ste/_bde ba'i yo byad thams 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la byang chub kyi sems kyis yang dag par zin pas de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i phyir me tog 'ga' 'bul lam/_chu snyim pa gang tsam 'thor ram/_
[\[49b.2\]]byug pa'i thig le 'dri'am/_me tog gi nyal nyil 'phyag gam/_byug pa 'bul lam/_spos 'bul lam/_me tog 'bul lam/_bdug spos 'bul lam/_phreng ba 'bul lam/_rol mo'i sil snyan 'bul lam/_gdugs 'bul lam/_dril bu 'bul 
[\[49b.3\]]lam/_dpyang ba 'bul lam/_rgyal mtshan 'bul lam/_ba dan 'bul lam/_dar 'bul lam/_mar me 'bul zhing /_phul nas dga' ba'i sems kyis gom pa'i gar stabs 'ga' bor te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smra ba 
[\[49b.4\]]de dag ni/_seng ge rnam par rtse bskal par ram/_bskal pa brgya'am/_bskal pa stong du'am/_bskal pa 'bum du yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba de'i gnas med de/_'di la dogs pa'am/_yid gnyis sam/_the tsom za bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[49b.5\]]seng ge rnam par rtse me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod kyis skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang /_mi'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir de bshad par bya'o/_/seng 
[\[49b.6\]]ge rnam par rtse gang la la zhig me tog brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_yid la byed dam/_kun chub par byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par 'chad pa de rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_de ngan 'gro log par ltung 
[\[49b.7\]]bar mi 'gyur/_dal ba rnyed par 'gyur/_nam du yang dkon mchog gsum dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_nam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_nam du yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_nam du yang byang chub sems 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]dpa' dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_nam du yang byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_nam du yang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/_nam du yang rigs dma' bar skye bar mi 'gyur/_spobs pa sna tshogs zab mo phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_
[\[50a.2\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_d+hA ra NI/_d+hA ra NI/_mu ni pra b+hA swa re/_sid+d+hi tsaN+De nA ma tsi ni he ri a ro ga ba ti/_bud+d+ha ma ti d+har+ye/_oM ka re te ga ga ra te/_te dzo ba ti/_pi 
[\[50a.3\]]pu la bud+d+he/_d+harma a ba b+hA se/_a k+Sha ya kalpe/_kalpa ba ti/_a mr-i ta kalpe hu tA sha ne/_te dzo ba ti/_ni r+ya saM hI te/_te dzo gra bA tiSh+Thi na dra ye/_tiSh+Thi na dra ye bun+d+hi swA hA/_seng ge rnam par rtse gang la la zhig gis me tog brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di'i ming dang 
[\[50a.4\]]yi ge dang /_tshig mtha' dag shes te/_kun chub par byed pa de dpyid zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]dang /_dbyar zla ra ba dang /_ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]yar ngo'i tshes brgyad nas bzung la bco lnga'i bar du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/_nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum 
[\[50a.5\]]bsam zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa rtse gcig tu yid la byas la/_bcom ldan 'das la spos dang /_me tog dang /_mar me dang /_bdug spos kyis mchod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing chos kyang ston pa bco lnga mthong bar 
[\[50a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/gzungs rab tu thob par 'gyur/_dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur/_rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_blo dang ldan par 'gyur/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/thos pa thams cad dang /_
[\[50a.7\]]bstan bcos thams cad dang /_bzo thams cad dang /_las thams cad rab tu shes par 'gyur/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang de'i sems las rnam par dag par 'gyur te/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni ma gtogs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de dag ni zag pa med 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]par gtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par rtse dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 
[\[50b.2\]]'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D517}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bi ma la nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_
[\[50b.3\]]'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[50b.4\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal pa/_blo gros rnam par dag pa tshul khrims yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/
[\[50b.5\]]blo gros rnam par dag pa bzod pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa phan pa'i dngos po yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa byams pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[50b.6\]]yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa snying rje yongs su dag pa dang /_dga' ba yongs su dag pa dang /_btang snyoms yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye 
[\[50b.7\]]shes mthong ba yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa stobs yongs su dag pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa la su zhig me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan 
[\[51a.2\]]la sogs pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_byug pa rnams kyis bsti stang du byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/_de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum po las theg pa gang yang rung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa ma gtogs par bsod nams 
[\[51a.3\]]kyi phung po de phyi ma'i mthar yang zad par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo gros rnam par dag pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshad med pa de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba yang tshad med do/_/mtha' yas so/_/bsam 
[\[51a.4\]]gyis mi khyab bo/_/mtshungs pa med do/_/grangs med do/_/dpag gis mi lang ngo /_/brjod du med do/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la bsti stang du byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_ri mor byed pa 
[\[51a.5\]]dang /_mchod pa dang /_rjed pa dang /_phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la bsti stang byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_ri mor byed pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_rjed pa dang /_
[\[51a.6\]]yang dag par sems nye bar bzhag ste/_byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang /_phyag byed pa dang /_bsti stang byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_ri mor byed pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_rjed pa dang /_gsol ba dang /_bsngags pa dang /_
[\[51a.7\]]skor ba byed pa des phan yon lngar shes par bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_myur du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_mthong 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]nas kyang dad pa skyed par 'gyur ba ste/_phan yon lnga po de dag tu shes par bya'o/_/de nas gzhan yang chos bzhir shes par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i tshig so sor 'dzin pa dang /_de dag kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub 
[\[51b.2\]]pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang /_myur du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba ste/_chos bzhi po de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 
[\[51b.3\]]bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rigs che ba dang /_btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byed pa dang /_phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang /_rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[51b.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba ste/_blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems 
[\[51b.5\]]dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas dad pa skyed de/_pus mo gnyis ka'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa de 
[\[51b.6\]]ci 'dra bar bdag kyang de 'dra ba'i lus thob par gyur cig ces de ltar mos pa bskyed na/_blo gros rnam par dag pa bsod nams kyi phung po de'i mtha' brjod par mi nus te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal 
[\[51b.7\]]po nyid dam/_brgya byin nyid dam/_tshangs pa nyid dam/_nyan thos nyid dam/_rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang zad par byar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo gros rnam par dag pa rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]mo des bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ba yin te/_blo gros rnam par dag pa 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa grong khyer du 'jug 
[\[52a.2\]]gam/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_grong du 'jug kyang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rgyu yang rung /_'chag kyang rung /_'greng yang rung /_'dug kyang rung /_chos ston kyang rung /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can lha'am/_
[\[52a.3\]]klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_dri za'am/_lha ma yin nam/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_mi 'am ci'am/_lto 'phye chen po'am/_mi'am/_mi ma yin pa'am/_shing ngam/_ri'am/_khung bu'am/_bya skyibs kyang rung ste/_thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ga 
[\[52a.4\]]la ba de logs su 'dud pa dang /_rab tu 'dud pa dang /_kun tu 'dud pa mi byed pa de gang yang med de/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa la byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_
[\[52a.5\]]grong rdal lam/_yul 'khor ram/_pho brang 'khor na rgyu ba la sems can rnams 'dud/_rab tu 'dud/_kun tu rab tu 'dud par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/a mi tA a mi te pra b+ha be ma ha pra b+he/_pra b+ha ba ti/_
[\[52a.6\]]pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_bcom ldan 'das mthus bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das mthus bstan du gsol/_tad+ya thA/_ma ti ma ti/_ma ti ma ti/_ma ti ma ti/_ma ti

[\[52b.1\]]na ya/_sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/_sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/_sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/_sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/_sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/_sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/_sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/_sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/_shi khi shi khi/_shi khi shi khi/_shi khi shi khi/_shi

[\[53a\]]

[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de dag gis kyang bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la nad med pa dang /_zhi bar mngon du bsrung du gsol/_lho phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa

[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]lha rnams kyis ni brjod pa yin/_/'di ni dus gsum brjod byas na/_/nad rnams las ni yongs su thar/_/mi ma yin gyis gang byas dang /_/sdig pa gang dag sbyor byas dgrol/_/de dag dran pa brjed mi 'gyur/_/bzung ba rnams kyang chud mi za/_/
[\[54a.2\]]de dag skye ba rnams su yang /_/rtag tu sangs rgyas 'bral mi 'gyur/_/su zhig dri ma med pa'i gzungs/_/'di ni dga' bas 'dzin byed pa/_/zhing rnams kun tu rgyu ba na/_/dpal ldan pad+ma'i snying por byung /_/mtshan rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan/_/yan lag 
[\[54a.3\]]'od zer dra ba 'byung /_/tad+ya thA/_ku Ti ku Ti/_kuts+tsha lo/_e la e la/_muk+ta/_ko ta thA lo/_e ri ri/_ri mri ti swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par dag pa dang /_lha dang /_
[\[54a.4\]]mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la 
[\[54a.5\]]dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D518}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tsan+dan ang+ga nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod 
[\[54a.6\]]skad du/_'phags pa tsan+dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dge slong khri nyis stong 
[\[54a.7\]]lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang /_gzhan yang lha khyad par can mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul gyis lham me/_lhan ne/_
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]lhang nger bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol 'jig 
[\[54b.2\]]rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na tsan+dan gyi dpal zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan+dan gyi yan lag ces 
[\[54b.3\]]bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/gang 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba sha stag ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[54b.4\]]rgyas tsan+dan gyi yan lag des sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir tsan+dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi gsungs pa 'di thos nas phyir mi ldog pa de dag sdig pa dang bral zhing byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[54b.5\]]pa tshe dpag med dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang /_gzhan yang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang sngan chad gsungs te/_ngas kyang khyed rnams la bshad kyis/_sems can thams 
[\[54b.6\]]cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe thams cad chos dang mi ldan pa/_mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos la smod pa dang /_mchod rten 'dral 
[\[54b.7\]]ba/_dge 'dun gyi rdzas la rku 'phrog byed pa dang /_dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba slob dpon dang /_mkhan po spong ba dag 'byung ste/_de dag rjes su gzung ba'i phyir tsan+dan gyi yan lag gi gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]brlabs pa 'di bshad kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams nga la nyon cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bskul ba/_byang chub sems 
[\[55a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_gzhan yang sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum rnams la thugs brtse ba dang /_sdig pa byang bar bgyi ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pa bshad du 
[\[55a.3\]]gsol/_bdag cag gis kyang gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi de dag gzung bar bgyi ste/_sems can thams cad kyi don du rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_tsi rA te/_ma rI tsI ki/_
[\[55a.4\]]dur da me/_dur dA na te/_du ra nu/_pra biSh+Te/_tsan+da nAng ga dze/_sa man+ta pa ri sho d+ha ni/_bi shud+d+ha shI le/_tsa ri tra ba te/_a na tse d+ya pra ti b+hA ne/_sarba bud+d+hA d+hiSh+Thi te/_b+ha ga ba te/_pA pak+Sha yaM/_A shA me pa ri pU ra ya swA hA/_rigs kyi bu pho 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la 
[\[55a.5\]]zhig gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_ston tam/_kun chub par byed na/_de tshe 'di nyid la mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/thos ma thag tu sdig pa las rab tu grol bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis 
[\[55a.6\]]brlab par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_zla ba phyed kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa mthong bar 'gyur/_mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig byas pa yang 'byang bar 
[\[55a.7\]]'gyur/_skye ba dran par 'gyur/_tshe brjes nas kyang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/_khyim bdag chen po skyid pa dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur/_skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar sa chen po ma lus pa 'di ni grum par 'gyur yang srid/_rgya mtsho ni skams kyang 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]srid/_de bzhin du ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni 'jig par 'gyur yang srid/_rlung ni zhags pas bcing du rung yang srid/_zla ba dang nyi ma ni sa'i steng du ltung yang srid/_nam mkha' ni lag pa gnyis kyis mnan du rung yang srid/_me ni chur 'gyur yang srid/_'byung ba chen po 
[\[55b.2\]]bzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid/_sems can thams cad kyi sems ni gcig tu 'gyur yang srid/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa ni gzhan du 'gyur mi srid de/_sus kyang bskyod pa'am/_bsgul bar mi nus so/_/'di la ni bdud 
[\[55b.3\]]sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gzungs 'di'i cho ga bshad par 
[\[55b.4\]]bgyi'o/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa'am/_sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/_me tog sil ma gtor la tsan+dan gyi bdug pas bdugs te/_zla ba tshes pa nas brtsams nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du 
[\[55b.5\]]dus gsum du khrus bgyi zhing gos kyang lan gsum du brjes te/_kha zas bsreg bya 'tshal zhing /_gso sbyong dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas zla ba nya'i nyin par zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/_rtswa bam gyi steng na mchis shing /_rtswa bam bting 
[\[55b.6\]]ba'i steng du nyal nas sems rtse gcig tu bzlas pa bgyid cing me tog dri zhim pos lan rgya stong du gtor nas g.yo bar 'gyur/_bdag nyid kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur/_gzungs chen po 
[\[55b.7\]]thos ma thag tu ci 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur/_/thos pa 'dzin pa yang 'gyur/_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa tsan+dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[56a.2\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D519}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya pra tI t+ya samu da pA da hr-i da 
[\[56a.3\]]ya bi d+hi d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos gang rgyus byung de dag ni/_/rgyu la 'gog pa gang yin pa/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[56a.4\]]pas bka' stsal to/_/de skad gsungs pa dge sbyong che/_/tshig 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/_/sems can rnams la phan byed pa/_/las kun grub par byed pa'i phyir/_/de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs/_/rigs kyi bu dag gang gis ni/_/dang por bcom ldan 
[\[56a.5\]]sangs rgyas la/_/gus shing dad pa'i sems bskyed nas/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rten 'brel zab mo'i cho ga bshad/_/thams cad las dang mthun par gsungs/_/dang por 'jug pa'i tshig gsungs pa/_/'di ltar las dang nyon mongs yod gyur 
[\[56a.6\]]na/_/sems can rnams ni 'khor bar 'gro 'gyur la/_/las dang nyon mongs med na 'khor ba las kyang ldog_/bden pa 'di yis bdag gi bsam pa 'grub gyur cig_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[56a.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa'i 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/brtul zhugs grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can rnams kyi sman pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nor bu grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di lta ste/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_oM ye d+ha rmA he tu pra 
[\[56b.2\]]b+ha bA he tu n+te ShAM ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/_te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM ba dI ma hA shra ma NaHswA hA/_las rnams kun gyi cho ga la/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod/_/bsam rgyud rang gi lag mthil la/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan 
[\[56b.3\]]gyis brgyan/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras/_/me yi khams la zhugs par bsgom/_/de ni lha dag rjes su dran/_/da ni sbyor ba'i las bshad de/_/rim pa bzhin du so sor bstan/_/rims kyis btab nas na ba dang /_/klad pa na dang mig na dad dang /_/khong nad la 
[\[56b.4\]]sogs nad rnams la/_/tshigs bcad 'di dang snying po 'di/_/mang por bzlas shing langs nas ni/_/lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis/_/dbyung ba'i thabs su byab par bya'o/_/nad rnams thams cad sos par 'gyur/_/nyin gcig nyin gnyis nyin gsum dang /_/nyin bzhi 
[\[56b.5\]]rtag pa'i rims rnams la/_/bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba yi/_/skud pa dkar po sum sgril la/_/bzlas brjod nyi shu brgyad brgyad bzlas nas/_/mgul du btags na bde bar 'tsho/_/nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la/_/gzungs sngags 'di dag bzlas shing btang /_/snying nad rtsib 
[\[56b.6\]]logs na ba dang /_/khong na nad rnams ci yod la/_/chu la sngags 'di mang bzlas nas/_/blud na phan zhing bde bar 'gyur/_/nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la/_/bzlas shing btang na 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/g.yan pa dang ni 'brum bu dang /_/phol mig dang ni rma red la/_/grog 
[\[56b.7\]]tshangs la snying po 'di/_/mang du bzlas shing btab na 'tsho/_/gzhang 'brum gzhang nad za gu dang /_/pho mtshan skrang zhing na ba la/_/skyer pa'i khaN+Da'i ril bu 'am/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ril bu la/_/nyi shu bzlas shing bskus na phan/_/nad kyi rnam pa gang na yang /_/nad 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]tshabs che chung tshod brtags nas/_/tshigs su bcad pa'i bzlas brjod la/_/mang nyung nad dang sbyar nas kyang /_/lu la byab cing bzlas na phan/_/'khru bag nad kyis btab pa la/_/sman nam ril bu kha zas la/_/bdun nam nyi shu bzlas nas kyang /_/khong 
[\[57a.2\]]du btang na phan par 'gyur/_/de yi bzlas brjod snga ma ste/_/'di dag rab tu bzlas par bya/_/na mo ra t+na tra yA ya/_oM ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/_te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaHswA hA/_de dag bzlas na nad rnams 'tsho/_/de ni nad rnams 'tsho 
[\[57a.3\]]ba'o/_/de nas yang ni bka' stsal pa/_/nas dang gro dang sran ma dang /_/'bras dang sran chung mon sran dang /_/shing tog rgun 'brum a ru ra/_/de dag kun la za ba yi/_/srin bu sbur bu phye ma leb/_/bye'u dang byi ba ne tso dang /_/lo tog za ba kha bcing na/_/zhing gi khyon dang 
[\[57a.4\]]sbyar nas kyang /_/bye ma sa dang thal ba dang /_/bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/_/zhing dang shing tog gtor byas na/_/de dag kun kyang kha bcings 'gyur/_/ha cang char pa ches pa na/_/bcom ldan 'das la phul ba yi/_/me tog dman ma re re la/_/bzlas brjod nyi shu 
[\[57a.5\]]rtsa gcig bya/_/gtsang zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus dag tu/_/bum pa gang ba'i steng dag tu/_/kham phor gtsang ma'i nang du yang /_/me tog gtsang ma bzlas pa de/_/bsregs na char pa 'chad par 'gyur/_/ser ba drag po 'ong ba na/_/
[\[57a.6\]]se ba nya mig lcug ma la/_/bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/_/ser ba gang nas g.yo ngos su/_/klad la bskor zhing byabs na 'chad/_/yang na thal chen yungs kar la/_/bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya/_/thum po byas te lcug ma la/_/btags te btsugs na ser ba 
[\[57a.7\]]'chad/_/'byung po sha za [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_/brjed byed gdon gyis zin pa la/_/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/_/bum pa gtsang ma lnga bzhag ste/_/gu gul dud pas bdugs nas kyang /_/yungs kar ga pur tsan+dan dang /_/gla rtsi la sogs sman sbyar te/_/bzlas brjod 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/_/gos dang zas ni dkar po sbyar/_/dkyil 'khor de yi nang du gzhug_/bum pa'i chu yis bkru bar bya/_/sangs rgyas sku bsil byas pa'i chus/_/bkru zhing blud na rab tu phan/_/nad dang gnod pa kun las thar/_/'byung po brjed byed sha za yis/_/
[\[57b.2\]]glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/byis pa gdon gyis 'jigs pa la/_/gi wang la ni sngags bzlas nas/_/snying po stobs chen 'di bris gdags/_/oM badzra kro d+ha ma ha' ba la/_ha nad ha/_pa tsa bi d+h+wa na sa ya/_dza Ti laM r+b+ho d+ha ra/_u ts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha hu~M phaT swA hA/_gtsang sbra 
[\[57b.3\]]byas te mgul par gdags/_/de bzhin yungs kar dag la yang /_/bzlas brjod byas te gtums la gdags/_/mkha' 'gro'i gdon gyis zin pa na/_/yungs kar dang ni gu gul la/_/sngags gnyis lan ni bdun bdun bzlas/_/dud pas bdugs na 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/
[\[57b.4\]]de la the tsom mi za'o/_/byis pa gdon dang nad las thar/_/bud med bu ni thogs gyur na/_/chu la bzlas brjod lnga bdun byas/_/blud na legs par btsas par 'gyur/_/bud med mo gsham bud med la/_/sangs rgyas sku bsil byas pa'i chu/_/de la sngags brjod nyi shu bya/_/
[\[57b.5\]]khrus byas lus ni gtsang ma la/_/chu de blud na bu tsha 'phen/_/rigs rgyud dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_/lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na/_/skud pa dang ni gos kyi grwar/_/bzlas brjod bdun bzlas mdud pa bdun/_/mdud bcing bzlas te song ba na/_/bde bar 'gro zhing don yang 'grub/_/
[\[57b.6\]]dgra dang nye zho med par 'gyur/_/yid ni gzhungs par 'dod pa na/_/shu dag tshon gang tsam pa dang /_/mar srang sum brgya drug cu la/_/bzlas brjod byas te bsres nas kyang /_/bum pa cig tu blug la dkrugs/_/nyi ma re re lo gcig tu/_/shu dag gi ni dum re dang /_/mar srang 
[\[57b.7\]]dag ni re re la/_/bzlas brjod re re bya zhing bza'/_/des ni yid gzhungs blo ldan 'gyur/_/de bzhin pa ni ser skya ma'i/_/mar dang 'o ma dag la yang /_/bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad du/_/bzlas te 'o thug dkrug cing bza'/_/yid gzhungs pa yi mchog tu 'gyur/_/mi dang 'grogs 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]shing mdza' 'dod na/_/gang dag yid dang 'thad pa la/_/me tog dang ni rtswa shing la/_/'bras bu 'am ni 'ji ba dag_/lag pa g.yas pa'i chang bar bcug_/bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa gcig gdab/_/gang gi lag tu byin pa na/_de dang rtag tu mdza' bar 
[\[58a.2\]]'gyur/_/rta la sogs pa'i phyugs rnams kun/_/'chi bar nye bar gnas pa na/_/chu dang yungs kar bcas pa la/_/bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya/_/de la gtor na sos par 'gyur/_/yang na yungs kar brgya brgyad la/_/bzlas pa'i thum po mgul du gdags/_/
[\[58a.3\]]de ni nad med bde bar 'gyur/_/mi rnams 'chi bas 'jigs gyur na/_/yungs kar la ni bzlas brjod bya/_/thum po byas te sgo la gdags/_/bzlas brjod brgya stong 'bum yang bzlas/_/mi nad dang ni phyugs nad kun/_/ming yang med cing bde bar 'gyur/_/de dag kun 
[\[58a.4\]]gyis bzlas brjod ni/_/'di dag kun du rgya cher gsungs/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_o~M ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tu n+te shan+ta thA ga to h+ya ba da ta/_te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaHswA hA/_rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na ni/_/bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/gnod pa cis 
[\[58a.5\]]kyang tshugs mi 'gyur/_/dam chos yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni/_/mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/_/cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni/_/gang la dad pas yid ches na/_/'grub par the tsom med par 'gyur/_/bzlas brjod 'bum ni byas 
[\[58a.6\]]gyur na/_/dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/ston pa shAkya'i thugs rje 'di/_/dge slong ner ban rak+Shi tas/_/tho gar yul nas rnyed pa ste/_/'gro ba kun gyi dpal du shar/_/'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[58a.7\]{D520}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya pra tI t+ya sa mut+pa da nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas na ar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo leb la/_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams dang /_'phags pa byams pa dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_phyag na rdo rje la 
[\[58b.2\]]sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pas brgyan pa rnams dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang /_sred med kyi bu dang /_dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_dri za'i rgyal 
[\[58b.3\]]po zur phud lnga pa la sogs pa dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ri rab kyi rtse mo la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[58b.4\]]'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha 'di dag ni mchod rten bgyid par 'tshal ba sha stag ste/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir mchis na/_ci nas tshangs pa'i bsod nams 'phel ba dang /_
[\[58b.5\]]lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu las dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar 
[\[58b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la chos bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/_ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/_te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH
[\[58b.7\]]chos gang rgyus byung de dag gi/_/rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te/_/dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di lta ste/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]yin te/_sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la zhig gis mi gnas pa'i sa phyogs su mchod rten ni skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam/_srog 
[\[59a.2\]]shing ni mo khab tsam/_gdugs ni ba k+ku la'i me tog tsam zhig byas la/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba chos kyi dbyings kyi tshigs su bcad pa nang du bcug na/_/des tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskyed par 'gyur te/_'di nas shi 'phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas tshangs pa'i 
[\[59a.3\]]'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_nyan thos de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs 
[\[59a.4\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//[ {D521}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya pra tI t+ya sa mut+pA da hr-i da ya nA ma/_bod skad du/_
[\[59a.5\]]'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos gang rgyus 'byung de dag gi/_/rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te/_/dge sbyong chan po 'di skad gsungs/_/ye d+harmA 
[\[59a.6\]]he tu pra b+ha bA he tun te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/_te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH/_snying po 'di lan gcig brjod pas sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad zhi zhing bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/dngos po gang la dmigs te brjod na sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[59a.7\]]sku'am/_mchod rten du byas par 'gyur mchod pa gang la dmigs te/_brjod na 'jig rten gyi khams gang bcom phul bar 'gyur ro/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po rdzogs so//[ {D522}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dz+nyA no lko nA ma d+hA 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]ra NI sarba ga ti pa ri sho d+ha nI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa ye shes ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 
[\[59b.2\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ta la la la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od brtsegs snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rgyal po la phyag 
[\[59b.3\]]'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de 
[\[59b.4\]]dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zla ba dang /_nyi ma'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de nas lha'i bu zla ba dang /_nyi ma gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ga la bzhugs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag ga la ba der song nas de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[59b.5\]]rnams rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa rnams dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan brtsegs pa dag gi nang na byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khod pa yang mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu zla ba dang /_nyi ma gnyis gcig la gcig sems te/_ji ltar 
[\[59b.6\]]byas na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams las sems can thams cad la snang ba sbyin pa dang /_mun pa mun nag bsal ba'i phyir shar ba'i gzungs sngags phyogs bcur khyab pa'i blo can zhes bya ba gang gi mthus bdag cag 
[\[59b.7\]]sems can thams cad la snang bar byed pa 'thob par 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis lha'i bu zla ba dang /_nyi ma de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa de dag gis gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal pa/_s+yAd ya the dan/_tsak+Shu ra da da/_tsak+Shu sh+shu b+ha d+hu la me thA ka lat+tha/_it+than+sa/_sU raT+Ta sU raT+Ta/_sut+thA ya/_it+than+sa/_be lA be lA/_pA Ni tsa ru mUrti ni/_A ra Ni/_A ra Ni/_kA la pA Ni/_kA la pA Ni/_du ru du ru/_si 
[\[60a.2\]]tu ru du ha si/_d+ha su ti d+ha su ti/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ra d+hu ra/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_kA la kA la/_sat+thA sa/_gI la gI la/_gI la pa ya/_gI la pa ya/_d+hu su d+hu su/_sun+d+hu sun+d+hu/_sat+thA su/_at+thA su/_e thA su/_e thA sA bA ni/_yu tsu ri d+he/_su d+ha re/_ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku ru ku ru/_kurma kurma/_kurma pA Ni kurma pA Ni/_ke lu ke lu/_ke 
[\[60a.3\]]la pA Ni ke la pA Ni/_karkA ri karkA ri/_la ru bud+d+he/_d+hu ru d+he d+hu ru d+he/_ma hA d+hu ru d+he/_ka ra ka ra/_ki ra ki ra/_pi hu si/_pi hu si/_d+ha su d+ha su/_ha su ha su/_ha su pa ni swA hA/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos lha'i bu zla ba dang /_nyi ma gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kyai rigs kyi bu dag gzungs 
[\[60a.4\]]sngags 'di ni sems can ngan song du 'gro ba rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhes gsungs pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu dag u dum ba ra 'i me tog ni ches rnyed par sla'i/_gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni de lta ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzungs sngags 
[\[60a.5\]]kyi tshig 'di dag ni ches rnyed par sla'i/_'di dag ni 'chang ba'am/_klog pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni ches rnyed par sla'i/_gzungs sngags kyi chig 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni de lta ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag gal te sems can mnar med pa na 'khod pa bskal par gnas 
[\[60a.6\]]pa/_mtshams med pa lnga byed byed pa/_dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa'i sems can de dag gi phyir gzungs sngags kyi chig 'di dag zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjod na/_de'i tshe gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi mthus sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa kha 
[\[60a.7\]]brgyar 'gyes par 'gyur la/_sems can de dag kyang yongs su thar bar 'gyur na/_'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams lta ci smos te/_gang dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag gis ni bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po rnams dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]rnams kyis yongs su zin pa yin no snyam du shes pa kho nar bya ste/_'di la som nyi'am yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_d+hu na Ti d+hu na Ti/_ma hA d+hu na Ti/_su ru su ru swA hA/_shukla bi sho d+ha ni/_ta ra ta ra swA hA/_dz+yo tiSh+p+ra dI pe/_tu ru tu ru swA hA/_pad+ma mA li ni/_sat+ya ta ra bud+d+hi/_hu ru hu ru swA hA/_sat+ya bud+d+hi/_
[\[60b.2\]]sat+ya a ba lo ki ni/_ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri swA hA/_d+ha ra na pu Ti a pra ti ha ta bud+d+hi/_tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/_lak+Sha Ni tsi te/_d+hU ma pa ri/_ha re/_hu ru hu ru/_khu ru khu ru swA hA/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_mA d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+ha ra yan+ti ye swA hA/_su pra ti/_su ma ti/_a pra ti ha ta/_bud+d+hi/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+ha ra yan+ti ye swA hA/_bcom ldan 
[\[60b.3\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ta la la la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od brtsegs snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/swA hA/_'phags 
[\[60b.4\]]pa ye shes ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba rdzogs so//[ {D523}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA ma hIn+d+ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sa'i dbang po chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 
[\[60b.5\]]'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu'i gnas lha dang ldan pa na bzhugs te/_de nas bram ze sa'i dbang po shing sA la chen po lta bu bcom ldan 'das yang dag par 
[\[60b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze sa'i dbang po shing sA la chen po lta bus bcom ldan 
[\[60b.7\]]'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab lags na/_gang gis bdag skye ba dran par 'gyur/_bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]brjed par mi 'gyur ba'i thabs de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la legs par bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od kyis bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[61a.2\]]to/_/de'i phyir bu khyod gal te de ltar smon na/_de'i phyir kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po gang zhe na/_tad+ya thA/_A mo da ni/_pra mo da ni/_bi mo da ni/_saM mo da ni/_pri yaM ka ra Ni/_shrI 
[\[61a.3\]]ka ra Ni/_shrA ka ra Ni/_bo d+hi ka ra Ni/_a nut+ta ra s+yaM samyaskaM bud+d+ha ka ra Ni/_a nut+ta ra Ar+ya ka ra Ni/_a nut+ta ra pradz+nyA ka ra Ni/_a nut+ta ra ba shI ka ra Ni/_a nut+ta ra sarba kle sho pa kle sha bi d+ha ra Ni/_a ba d+yA na d+ha ka ra bi d+ha ma ni/_a nut+ta ra bid+yA a lo kot+pA pa da ni/_a nut+ta ra shai k+Sha shI la bing+yA tsa ra Na/_bi muk+ti gu Na ga Na/_
[\[61a.4\]]saM b+ha d+ha ni/_a nut+ta ra sarba ku sha la mU lod+d+ha ni/_a nut+ta ra b+ho na mU la ni/_a nut+ta ra rA ga do Sha mo ha na mU la ni/_a nut+ta re shai k+Sha ma na a bid+yA/_an+d+ha ka rA bi d+ha ma ni/_a nut+ta rA sI a pra ti ha ta ba la tsakra/_a nut+ta rA sarba lA ra ba bi drA ma ni/_twaM hi b+ha dre/_a nut+ta rA ba la b+ha dra/_su b+ha dra/_shrI b+ha dra/_a nut+ta ra b+ha dra/_sa 
[\[61a.5\]]man+ta b+ha dra/_a sa ma sa ma b+ha dra/_a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha b+ha dra/_a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha se bi tA/_a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha a nu brta nI/_a nut+ta re ma hA pu ru Sha d+harma de shi kA/_a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha d+ha rma ko Sha saM bA d+hi kA/_a nut+tar ma hA pu ru Sha ni rbA Na/_a nu ta pra taR+Sha kA/_twaM hi b+ha dre/_gang gA si ta pak+Shu/_samyak+saM bud+d+he/_
[\[61a.6\]]A se bi tA/_b+hA bi tA/_ba hu lI kro d+ha/_stu ta/_stau pi ta bar+Ni tA/_pra sha sta/_bu 'di ni kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po yin te/_de bas na bu khyod kyis kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di 'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba na yang yid la gyis shig_/bu gang la la zhig kun tu 
[\[61a.7\]]'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di ming dang /_rigs dang /_rigs kyi bye brag gang yid la byed dam/_skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u'am/_bu mo'am/_lha'am/_lha mo'am/_klu'am/_klu mo'am/_dri za'am/_dri za mo'am/_lha ma yin nam/_lha ma yin mo'am/_mi'am ci'am/_mi'am ci 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]mo'am/_lto 'phye chen po'am/_lto 'phye chen po mo'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo'am/_sha za'am/_sha za mo'am/_grul bum mam/_grul bum mo'am/_lus srul po'am/_lus srul po mo'am/_kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di 'chang ngam/_klog gam/_
[\[61b.2\]]lung dbog gam/_ston tam/_'chang na de tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/de ji srid 'khor gyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyur ro/_/lhar gyur kyang rung /_mir gyur kyang rung ste/_de mtshon cha'am/_dug gam/_
[\[61b.3\]]chu'am/_mes bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang

[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]dbang po chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//[{D524}]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_@#/_/bod skad du/_

[\[62a.3\]]'das bdag lha ma yin rnams kyis rgol zhing gtses te/_bdag dang lha ma yin dus yun ring por mi mdza' zhing dgrar gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ci nas kyang yun ring por phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de lta bu'i chos bdag la bshad du gsol/_de skad ces 
[\[62a.4\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de'i phyir kau shi ka khyod kyis nga'i snying po gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di long shig_/tad+ya thA/_urba pa/_nirbi sirbi/_ur+pu r+pu re/_hU le hU le/_de khu me/_pra t+yaM ga ma A gats+tsha ma hA ma 
[\[62a.5\]]yA ri nA ma/_bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_'tshe ba thams cad dang /_'khor thams cad dang bcas pa la srungs shig_/srungs shig_/sarba kA ya bA ka ma nash+tsa ri te swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_brgya byin lha'i dbang po yid dga' ste/_

[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe zla ba gsum po 'di dag 'das nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dran pa dang ldan 
[\[62b.2\]]zhing mkhyen bzhin du tshe'i 'du byed dag btang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod song la stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na/_dge slong ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal chen po khang pa brtsegs 
[\[62b.3\]]pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'dir bsdus shig_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no/_/zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_skad cig de nyid la rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis ri rab kyi rtse mo la 'dug ste/_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams

[\[62b.6\]]mthus/_skad cig de nyid la 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba gang mngon par 'du bya bas/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can nam/_theg pa chen po can yang rung ste/_dge

[\[63a.1\]]rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de mngon par 'dus byas pas/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can nam/_theg pa chen po can yang rung ste/_dge slong ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad

[\[63a.4\]]dpa' chen po ngan song thams cad spong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba 
[\[63a.5\]]can gyi 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang /_byang chub

[\[63b.3\]]zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa'am/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'am/_phyir mi ldog pa'am/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'am/_dad pas mos pa ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang 
[\[63b.4\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'dir bsdus shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/_bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/zhes gsol nas/_skad cig de nyid la ltas de lta bu byas te/_ltas de byas pas tshal chen po'i khang pa 
[\[63b.5\]]brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs su[,]bzang du[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa dag lhags par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag

[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]de mthong nas/_skad cig de nyid la 'di snyam du sems te/_zhus pa lung bstan pa ji lta bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gis som nyi thams cad spong bar 'gyur ba dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang spobs pa myur du thob par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[64a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad las chos bstan pa thos par 'gyur ba dang /_thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[64a.3\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du brjed par mi 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang yin pa bzhi po de dag rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can yongs su dag pa dang /_chos yongs su 
[\[64a.4\]]dag pa dang /_smon lam yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ste/_de dag rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_gya nom pa yid du 'ong bar byed pa'i chos bzhi rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus yid du 'ong ba dang /_ngag yid

[\[64a.6\]]la mkhas pa'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa dang /_las dang rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa 'dus ma byas kyi gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa dang /_chos zab mo la bzod pa'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba/_de lta bu'i zhu ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[64a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag gis zhu gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus zhu ba ji skad smos pa ji ltar yid la bzung ba/_ji ltar yid la byas pa/_ji ltar kun chub par byas pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la rgya cher gsol to/_/'di skad ces kyang gsol te/_
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba ji skad smos pa ji ltar bzung ba/_ji ltar yid la bgyis pa/_ji ltar kun chub par bgyis pa 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi spyod pa ji ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_
[\[64b.2\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu legs so legs so/_/shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu bar sems pa khyod yang legs so/_/shA ri'i bu de'i phyir khyod legs par 
[\[64b.3\]]rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[64b.4\]]dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad khas mi len cing len par mi byed pa des/_gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M a Ne ma hA ra Ne/_a khe/_mu khe/_mu khe/_sa man+ta mu khe/_sau me sa/_sau r+ya ra me/_gau ti yu ga me/_ni ru ga ti pra b+he hi le hi le/_ka la pe 
[\[64b.5\]]ke la pa/_si sa le/_sa ra ba ti/_hi le hi le/_hi le hi le/_hi li hi li li/_ma hA hi le le/_tsaN+De tsa pa ne/_tsa ra tsa ra Ni/_a tsa le/_ma tsA le/_a na~M te/_a na~M ta mu khe/_a na~M ta ga te a ra Ne nir ma la de/_ni ra ba la ne/_nir ba d+ha na te/_d+harma d+ha re/_nir ha re/_gi mi le shrI ma bi sho d+ha ni/_pra kr-i
