[\[64b.6\]]ti d+hi pa ne/_b+ha ba be b+ha ba ne/_a sa~M ge a sa~M ge/_/bi ha re/_da me sa me/_pi ma le/_bi ma la pra b+he/_sa~M ka ra Sha Ni/_d+hi re d+hi d+hi ri la hA d+hi d+hi re/_ye She ya Sho ba ti/_tsa le a tsa le/_ma tsa le/_sa ma tsa le/_Ta d+hi Tu d+ha san d+hi s+thi ra/_a sa~M ge a sa~M ge/_bi ha re/_a sa~M ga ni ra ha re/_ni ra ha ra/_bi ma le/_ni ra 
[\[64b.7\]]ha Ta sho ta ni Ta d+hi so me/_s+thi re s+thi me/_s+tha ma ba ti/_ma hA pra b+he/_sa man+ta pra b+he/_bi pu la pra b+he/_bi pu la rasmi sa~M b+ha be/_sa man+ta mu khe/_sarba tra ya bu ga te/_tshe d+ya ya na ta tshe d+ya pra ti b+ha ne/_d+ha ra Ne/_Ni Ta ne/_d+harma ni d+ha na go tra/_sa man+ta b+ha dra/_sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya a d+hISh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_shA ri'i 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs 'di dag 'dzin pa ni 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la rlom sems su mi byed/_dmigs par mi byed/_smon par mi byed/_btang snyoms su mi byed/_len par mi byed/_brtson par mi byed de/_de 
[\[65a.2\]]dag thob par bya ba dang /_spang bar bya ba dang /_bsgom par bya ba dang /_rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir mi byed/_'gyur bar mi byed/_mngon par 'du mi byed/_mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong /_ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang mi mthong ngo /_/chos rnams kyi skye ba 
[\[65a.3\]]yang mi mthong /_'gag pa yang mi mthong /_'das pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong /_ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong /_chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'bri ba yang mi mthong /_chos gang yang sogs par yang mi byed/_'grib 
[\[65a.4\]]par mi byed/_'dogs par yang mi byed/_rnam par rig par yang mi byed par sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'ba' zhig sgom ste/_de bsgom pa na gzugs su ma yin/_gzugs med par ma yin/_mtshan du ma yin/_mtshan med par ma yin/_dpe byad bzang por ma yin/_dpe byad 
[\[65a.5\]]bzang po med par ma yin/_rnam par shes par ma yin/_rnam par shes pa med par ma yin/_nyon mongs par ma yin/_nyon mongs pa med par ma yin/_tshul khrims su ma yin/_tshul khrims med par ma yin/_ting nge 'dzin du ma yin/_ting nge 'dzin med par ma yin/_shes rab 
[\[65a.6\]]tu ma yin/_shes rab med par ma yin/_rnam par grol bar ma yin/_rnam par grol ba med par ma yin/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar ma yin/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba med par ma yin/_skye bar ma yin/_skye ba med par ma yin/_rigs su ma yin/_rigs 
[\[65a.7\]]med par ma yin/_rus su ma yin/_rus med par ma yin/_'khor du ma yin/_'khor med par ma yin/_gnas par ma yin/_gnas med par ma yin/_thob par ma yin/_thob pa med par ma yin/_mngon par rtogs par ma yin/_mngon par rtogs pa med par ma yin/_nyon mongs pa 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]zad par ma yin/_nyon mongs pa ma zad par ma yin/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched du ma yin/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched med par ma yin/_shes par ma yin/_shes pa med par ma yin/_chos ston par ma yin/_chos mi ston par ma yin/_
[\[65b.2\]]bdag rnam par dag par bya bar ma yin/_gzhan rnam par dag par bya bar ma yin/_sems can rnam par dag par bya bar ma yin/_sems can med pa rnam par dag par bya bar ma yin/_bdag gi don du ma yin/_gzhan gyi don du ma yin/_chos su ma yin/_'dul bar ma yin/_
[\[65b.3\]]lus rnam par dag par ma yin/_ngag rnam par dag par ma yin/_yid rnam par dag par ma yin/_spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha'i spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/_da ltar byung ba'i spyod pa rnam par dag 
[\[65b.4\]]par ma yin/_bdag gi rnam par dag par ma yin/_gzhan gyi rnam par dag par ma yin pa 'di ni/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/_/don dam pa bsgrub par chos 
[\[65b.5\]]thams cad yang dag par 'du ba la mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/gcig tu nges pa thob pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i ye shes bsgrub pas/_chos kyi 
[\[65b.6\]]gter mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rigs zil gyis mi non par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/dam pa yongs su tshol ba la mkhas pas bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sgo mtha' yas pas 
[\[65b.7\]]bsgrub pa'i gzungs 'di'i don thob par 'gyur ba de dag ni phyir mi ldog cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad ni chos dang yon tan gyi gter nges pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]dmigs pa med pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di nyid las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rab tu dbye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/chos rnams stong par dogs med 
[\[66a.2\]]cing /_/byang chub ched du spros mi byed/_/chos dbyings 'khrug par mi byed na/_/de'i phyir gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur/_/mdo sde 'di ni nyan par bya/_/'di la gzungs ni zad pa med/_/ye shes 'byor 'di 'di la ste/_/de nas byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems 
[\[66a.3\]]dpa' 'jigs med pa/_/gzungs 'dir rab tu bzung byas na/_/phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas kyi/_/chos bstan pa ni thos par 'gyur/_/don dang tshig 'bru bskyod kun gyi/_/mchog gi chos ni rnam par shes/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer ji snyed pa/_/de snyed tshig rnams shes par 
[\[66a.4\]]'gyur/_/gang dag chos kyi mchog 'gyur ba/_/rlabs chen gzungs kyi sgo rnams te/_/gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin de la/_/thams cad rtag tu mngon du 'gyur/_/gal te sems can thams cad kyis/_/de la bskal par dogs dris te/_/the tsom thams cad chad gyur kyang /_/de 
[\[66a.5\]]yi ye shes mi zad do/_/mdo sde 'di la gang dga' ba/_/de ni chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/_/byang chub mchog la nye ba ste/_/yid brtan gyur dang chos 'dzin pa'o/_/gzungs 'di 'dzin par su byed pa/_/de la sems can thams cad dga'/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyang de la dgyes/_/
[\[66a.6\]]grags pa 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur/_/su zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa/_/de ni 'chi ba'i dus byed tshe/_/sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu mthong /_/lag pa de la nye bar 'jog_/gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa ni/_/bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/_/sngon chad sdig pa gang byas pa/_/zla ba 
[\[66a.7\]]gcig gis byang bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang /_/bskal pa bye bar bsgrubs pa kun/_/gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa yis/_/zla ba gcig gis zil gnon 'gyur/_/khams gsum sems can ji snyed pa/_/gal te thams cad bdud gyur kyang /_/mdo 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]sde 'di ni gang 'dzin pa/_/de la bar chad byed mi nus/_/byang chub 'tshang rgya bar du ste/_/dran dang blo gros rtogs ldan 'gyur/_/gzungs kyi dam pa gang yin pa/_/de yi lce yi rtse mor gnas/_/ji ltar mdo sde 'dzin de la/_/gzungs 'di so sor nges pa bzhin/_/'di las thams cad 
[\[66b.2\]]mkhyen pa bstan/_/'di las byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang /_/mar me zhes byas nga lung bstan/_/skad cig de la sangs rgyas ni/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed mthong /_/gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/bstan pa 'dir ni rtogs 'dod cing /_/
[\[66b.3\]]mdo sde 'di la bsten pa des/_/thams cad myur du thob par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam dag dang /_/nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/'od dang mtshan kyang rnam dag pa/_/mdo sde 'dis ni byed par 'gyur/_/de bas bag ni yod gyur na/_/zhag bdun bar du 'di sems pa/_/
[\[66b.4\]]sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu yis/_/de yi 'og tu gzungs sbyin 'gyur/_/bsam bya sems par mi bsam ste/_/bsam bya min pa'ang mi bsam mo/_/soms shig 'gal bar ma sems shig_/de yi 'og tu gzungs thob 'gyur/_/dper na rgya mtshor phyin pa'i mi/_/nor la som nyi 
[\[66b.5\]]med pa ltar/_/de bzhin gzungs 'di thob gyur nas/_/bde ba la yang som nyi med/_/'di las rdzogs pa'i byang chub nye/_/de bas 'di la sbyor bar gyis/_/zhi ba'i gnas ni thob gyur nas/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[66b.6\]]shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/_gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa rnams la lhag par chags pa med pa yin/_sems can thams cad la phrag dog med pa yin/_bdog 
[\[66b.7\]]pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing 'gyod pa med par sbyin pa'i tshul can yin/_nyin mtshan du chos la dga' zhing chos 'dod pa yin te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ngan cing bdud kyi spyod yul ba/_/'dod pa dri nga spang bar byos/_/de dag sems can dmyal ba'i rkyen/_/ngan song rnams kyi rgyu yang yin/_/shes kyi khe dang rnyed dang grags pa'i phyir/_/pha rol dag la 
[\[67a.2\]]phrag dog mi bya ste/_/dga' ba'i mig gis sems can blta byas na/_/mthu che ba dang gzugs kyang mdzes par gyur/_/sems can gang dag kha cig rtsod 'gyur ba/_/de yi gzhi rtsa yongs su 'dzin pa ste/_/de ltar gang la sred par 'gyur ba spongs/_/sred pa spang ba byas na gzungs 
[\[67a.3\]]su 'gyur/_/gal te byang chub 'dod na gzhan ma sems/_/nyin dang mtshan du chos ni btsal bar byos/_/chos tshig 'di 'dra 'di dag rten byed na/_/de la gzungs ni mngon du 'gyur bar 'ong /_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/_
[\[67a.4\]]gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dgon pa dang dben pa la gnas pa dang /_chos zab mo la bzod pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dag la lhag par chags pa med pa dang /_sdug pa'i dngos po thams cad la 
[\[67a.5\]]mi lta zhing tha na lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong ba ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/rgyal bas bsngags pa'i dgon 
[\[67a.6\]]par gnas par gyis/_/de la gnas pa gzhan la brnyas pa med/_/zab mo'i bzod pa 'dun pa bskyed nas su/_/bag yod mgo la 'bar bzhin gnas par gyis/_/'di ltar tshul 'chos byed kyi gzhir gyur pa/_/shes khe rnyed pa rnams la gnas ma byed/_/bya dang 'dra bar ngan ngon dag 
[\[67a.7\]]gis chog byas te/_/mir gyur pa yi 'bras bu yod par byos/_/kye ma sangs rgyas bstan pa legs par rnyed/_/sdug bsngal mang po'i rtsa ba khyim yang spongs/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyang yongs dag pas/_/sangs rgyas dang ni chos la gus par gyis/_/rnyed 'dod dran pa ma yin shes rab 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]min/_/dad dang tshul khrims ma yin chos sems min/_/de ni byang chub ring ste gnam sa bzhin/_/de ltas rnyed pa yongs su spang bar bya/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[67b.2\]]lta ste/_yi ge 'bru brgyad kyi don khong du chud par bya'o/_/brgyad po de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pa zhes bya ba don dam par chos thams cad la bdag med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_la zhes bya ba mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po med par de 
[\[67b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_ba zhes bya ba byis pa'i chos rnams dang /_mkhas pa'i chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gnyis su med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_dza zhes bya ba skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba 
[\[67b.4\]]med pa'i 'gro ba'i mi skye mi 'gag pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_ka zhes bya ba las kyi rnam par smin pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_d+ha zhes bya ba gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_
[\[67b.5\]]chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_sha zhes bya ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang /_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong med par chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang /_k+Sha zhes bya ba chos thams cad skad cig pa ste/_gzod ma nas zhi ba'i phyir zad pa med pa 
[\[67b.6\]]dang /_'jigs pa med pa dang /_rgyu ba med pa dang /_chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par 'jug pa khong du chud pa ste/_de ltar yi ge 'bru brgyad po de dag gi don khong du chud par rtogs par bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa dang po'o/_/gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par 
[\[67b.7\]]bris te/_gzung bar bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa gnyis pa'o/_/zla ba phyed phyed cing gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtag tu klog pa dang /_rjes su dran par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa gsum pa'o/_/gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang /_yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa dang /_yang dag par gzengs bstod pa la gzud pa'i phyir brtson par bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa bzhi pa ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub 
[\[68a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/_gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/yi ge 'bru brgyad 'di dag bsam par bya/_/mdo sde 'di ni bris nas bcang bar bya/_/zla ba 
[\[68a.3\]]phyed cing rtag tu bklag par bya/_/sems can rnams kyang 'di 'dzin gzhug par bya/_/shes rab rgya chen byang chub nye ba ste/_/phyogs bcu rnams na sangs rgyas gang su dag_/bzhugs pa thams cad des ni mdun du mthong /_/de'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed de 'di la bslab/_/shA ri'i bu bzhi 
[\[68a.4\]]po 'di dag ni gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan yon yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad de la dgongs pa dang /_de la bdud kyi las mi 'byung ba dang /_de'i las kyi sgrib pa 
[\[68a.5\]]myur du 'byang ba dang /_spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa myur du 'thob pa ste/_shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan yon yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/
[\[68a.6\]]sangs rgyas kun gyis de ni yid la mdzad/_/de la bdud kyis glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur/_/de yi las kyi sgrib pa myur du 'byang /_/spobs pa mtha' yas rnams kyang thob par 'gyur/_/shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/_yangs pa rgya 
[\[68a.7\]]cher gyur pa/_tshad med dpag tu med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[68b.2\]]'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po snang ba 'dzin zhes bya ba mi'i dbang po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo /_/de'i bu yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang /_des sgo mtha' yas pas 
[\[68b.3\]]bsgrub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de las thos te/_des gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/_/des 
[\[68b.4\]]lo bdun khrir rmugs pa dang /_gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to/_/de lan 'ga' yang rgyal srid la dga' ba'am/_nor la dga' ba'am/_bdag la dga' bar ma gyur to/_/de lo bdun khrir lan 'ga' yangs la glos ma phab ste/_gcig tu nges par nang du yang dag 
[\[68b.5\]]'jog la gnas so/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu las chos bstan pa thos te/_thos nas kyang thams cad bzung ngo /_/bzung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de nyid 
[\[68b.6\]]las rab tu byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung nas de lo dgu khri 'das pa dang /_des sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i gzungs 'di bsgrubs te/_bsgrubs nas kyang sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bshad do/_/des tshe gcig po de nyid la sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu 
[\[68b.7\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du btsud cing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod par gyur to/_/shA ri'i bu 'khor de na tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya ba zhig yod de/_des sgom tha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos smra ba'i dge slong 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]de las thos so/_/thos nas kyang rjes su yi rang bar gyur te/_de rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/_sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu las chos bstan pa thos so/_/thos nas kyang thams cad bzung ngo /_/thams cad du yang gzungs thob pa rnams 
[\[69a.2\]]kyi mchog dang /_tshig btsun pa rnams kyi mchog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa rgyun mi chod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/_/des bskal pa gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mnyes par byas so/_/
[\[69a.3\]]mnyes par byas nas kyang /_bskal pa gsum 'das pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/_tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi'am/_yid 
[\[69a.4\]]gnyis sam/_the tsom za bar gyur na/_shA ri'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de'i tshe de'i dus na/_tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya bar gyur to/_/shA ri'i 
[\[69a.5\]]bu de'i tshe de'i dus na yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i chos smra bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du som nyi dang /_yid gnyis sam/_the tsom za bar gyur na shA ri'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[69a.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med de/_de'i tshe de'i dus na/_dge slong chos smra ba yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur to/_/shA ri'i bu nga dang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 
[\[69a.7\]]kyang de'i tshe/_gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so/_/thos nas kyang rjes su yi rangs te/_rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/_ngas bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag bzhi khrir 'khor ba phyir bsnyil to/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu las chos bstan pa 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]yang thos te/_thams cad du yang gzungs thob pa rnams kyi mchog dang /_tshig btsun pa rnams kyi mchog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[69b.2\]]chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/_tha na gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rjes su yi rang bar yang brtson par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bla na med 
[\[69b.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang /_chos smra ba dag mgu bar byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur na/_gang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_lung 'bogs pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_gzhan dag 
[\[69b.4\]]la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa lta ci smos te/_bsod nams kyi phung po de'i tshad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par sems can thams cad kyis kyang shes pa'am/_bsam par mi nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/mdo 
[\[69b.5\]]sde thos nas rjes su yi rang dang /_/yi ger bris dang gzung dang bklags pa yis/_/bsod nams chu bo ji tsam bskyed pa ni/_/sems can kun gyis shes par yong mi nus/_/de ni tshe rabs kun tu rgyal ba mthong /_/de dag las kyang dad pa bsam yas rnyed/_/mdo sde zab mo tshul yang 
[\[69b.6\]]shes par 'gyur/_/de ni myur du byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya/_/bla med byang chub ma reg par du yang /_/de ni ting nge 'dzin dang mngon shes dang /_/gzungs rnams dang ni gzugs dang longs spyod dang /_/sangs rgyas mthong las nyams par yong mi 'gyur/_/rjes su dran pas sngon gyi tshe 
[\[69b.7\]]rabs na/_/tshong dpon bus ni gzungs 'di thob gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas gang gA'i bye snyed mthong gyur te/_/des ni 'dod bzhin byang chub rnam sangs rgyas/_/mar me mdzad pa de tshe tshong dpon bu/_/sngon tshe tshe rabs 'od zer mtha' yas gyur/_/de tshe chos smra sangs rgyas tshe dpag 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]med/_/nga ni bskal pa bzang dang bcas yi rang /_/byang chub myur du reg par su 'dod dang /_/bdud rnams myur du gzhom par su 'dod dang /_/bsod nams brgya yi mtshan bzang su 'dod pa/_/'di la brtson na rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed 
[\[70a.2\]]'jig rten khams/_/gang gis rin chen bkang ste sbyin byin yang /_/bris dang bzung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa/_/de la sbyin pas dper yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltas thos na rtse gcig bag yod par/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas 'di bzung ngam/_/gzungs 'di 
[\[70a.3\]]bris shing sems pa de dag ni/_/byang chub rnyed pa dka' ba med par bshad/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus 
[\[70a.4\]]la gang sa la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin brgyad po gzi mdangs 'jug cing nyin mtshan du srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed par byed do/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gnod sbyin dpa' bo zhes bya ba dang /_brtan po dang /_bdag po dang /_sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang /_spyod pa'i blo gros dang /_
[\[70a.5\]]thub dka' dang /_'jigs su rung ba dang /_gnod sbyin lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba dag ste/_gnod sbyin rgyal po brgyad po de dag 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir shin tu khrus bya ba dang /_gos shin tu gtsang ma bgos pa dang /_'chag sar 'gro ba dang /_sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i 
[\[70a.6\]]sems su bya/_gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang yid la byas te/_de ltar yid la byas na de la gnod sbyin brgyad po de dag myur du bzhin ston par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa brgyad po 'di dag kyang de la 
[\[70a.7\]]sems par 'gyur te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang /_snang byed dang /_shes rab 'od dang /_nyi ma'i 'od dang /_yang dag skul byed dang /_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs byed dang /_skar ma'i rgyal po zhes 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad po de dag des gzungs thob par bya ba'i phyir/_mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 'di la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[70b.2\]]chen pos kyang /_bden pa'i dam bca' bar bya'o/_/byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa tshor ba can dang /_chos 'dod pa dang /_chos la dga' ba dang /_zab mo'i chos la bzod pa la mngon par brtson par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs la brtson pas kun 
[\[70b.3\]]'gyed pa'i ngang tshul can du byas te/_de la ji ltar chung ba dang /_ji ltar nyung ba las kyang sbyin pa sbyin par bya na mang po las lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i 
[\[70b.4\]]klung gi bye ma snyed sum cus ni/_sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i gzungs 'di thob ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin gyi skye dgu sngon sems ma bskyed pa dkrigs pa/_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 
[\[70b.5\]]drug cus ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[70b.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de'i phyir/_khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i gzungs zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu nges par mngon par 'phags par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bdud thams cad rnam par 'jig 
[\[70b.7\]]par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/gcig tu nges par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu thob par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D526}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_
[\[71a.2\]]Ar+ya Sha Da mu kha nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil 
[\[71a.3\]]na gnas pa rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu rnam par phye bas spras pa na/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan 
[\[71a.4\]]pa dang bde ba'i phyir sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di zung shig_/de ni 'di lta ste/_'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i skye gnas gzhan dag tu bdag gis sdug bsngal gang ci myong ba de sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du mi shes pa'i mtshan nyid du ma gyur cig_/bdag gis 'jig rten 
[\[71a.5\]]pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba gang ci myong ba de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du yongs su spyod par gyur cig_/bdag gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las gang ci byas pa de so sor bshags pa bla na med pas so sor ma bshags par ma gyur cig_/bdag gis bdud kyi las gang ci 
[\[71a.6\]]byas pa de yongs su shes pas bla na med pas yongs su mi shes par ma gyur cig_/bdag gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yang rung gang ci yod pa de thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bur gyur cig_/bdag gi 
[\[71a.7\]]rnam par grol ba gang ci yod pa des sems can thams cad rnam par thar bar gyur cig_/'khor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la bdag gnas par ma gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_oM k+Sha me k+Sha me/_k+ShAn te k+ShAn te/_da me da me/_dAn te dAn te/_b+ha dre b+ha dre/_su b+ha dre su b+ha dre/_tsan+d+re tsan+d+re/_su tsan+d+re 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]su tsan+d+re/_tsan+d+ra ki ra Ni/_tsan+d+ra ba ti/_te dzo ba ti/_ya sho ba ti/_d+harma ba ti/_prah+ma ba ti/_sarba kle sha bi sho d+ha ni/_sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/_sarba ar+tha pra sha ma ni/_pa ra mar+tha sA d+ha ni/_kA ya bi sho d+ha ni/_bAka bi sho d+ha ni/_ma naH_saM sho d+ha ni swA hA/_rigs kyi bu dag de ltar na rigs kyi bu dang /_
[\[71b.2\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum bklags na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang nas skye ba bdun gyi bar du de skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 
[\[71b.3\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/
[\[71b.4\]]'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D527}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba d+harma gu Na byU ha rA dza nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 
[\[71b.5\]]theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po 
[\[71b.6\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stong nyis brgya thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/_chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba/_spyod yul chags pa med pa/_thabs mkhas pa/_khams gsum thams cad la sems snyoms pa/_phan pa dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs 
[\[71b.7\]]pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam 'dri ba sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mnyam pa nyid la 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi g.yo ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[72a.2\]]po spobs pa mtha' yas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab gnon blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong nyis brgya dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[72a.3\]]'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang /_klu'i rgyal po rnams dang /_srin po'i bdag po thams cad dang /_gnod sbyin mo sum brgya dang /_gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa drug stong dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po bdun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_
[\[72a.4\]]de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog gi char mngon par phab bo/_/tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char yang mngon par phab bo/_/lha'i sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[72a.5\]]mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir bsgrags so/_/gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mngon par dad pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[72a.6\]]cad zad par bgyid pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ste legs so legs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa rdul med pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sa chen po 'di mtho ba dang dma' bar 
[\[72a.7\]]byas te/_'gul rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul/_g.yos rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg_/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/_'ur 'ur/_rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/_chem chem/_rab tu chem chem/_kun tu rab tu chem 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]chem mo/_/lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char yang bab bo/_/lha'i me tog gi char yang bab bo/_/lha'i 'od kyi snang ba yang byung ngo /_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can gang su dag ngan song du skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang ngan song rnams las yongs su grol bar gyur to/_/
[\[72b.2\]]lha'i dbang po dang /_klu'i dbang po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /_srin po'i dbang po dang /_mi'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyi gnas rnams kyang snang bar gyur to/_/lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra dag kyang grag go/_/lha'i 'od dag kyang snang bar gyur to/_/lha'i spos kyi ngad kyang ldang bar 
[\[72b.3\]]gyur to/_/de nas de dag thams cad kyang cho 'phrul chen po de mthong nas ya mtshan du gyur te 'di snyam du sems so/_/gnas 'di dag snang bar gyur pa 'di dang /_cho 'phrul chen po snang bar gyur pa 'di dang /_sa chen po g.yos pa 'di dang /_me tog gi char chen po bab pa 'di su'i mthu yin/_
[\[72b.4\]]su'i byin gyis brlabs yin zhig gu snyam nas/_de dag thang cig cang mi zer sems nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin no/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yin no zhes smras so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[72b.5\]]bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'dong gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i dbang po dang /_klu'i dbang po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /_srin po'i dbang po rdzu 'phrul che zhing 
[\[72b.6\]]mthu che ba de dag thams cad kyis lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad+ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad+ma dkar po dang /_dri mchog dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dag khyer nas 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags 
[\[72b.7\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mchod de phyag byas so/_/me tog gi char chen po des kyang sa chen po 'di pus mo nub tsam du khyab par 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag du mas bskor cing /_lha bye ba phrag du mas bskor te/_rig sngags 'chang brgya phrag du mas mdun du bdar bas rdzu 'phrul dang mthu chen po 
[\[73a.2\]]dang /_bkod pa chen po dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_bdug pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa la mngon par mchod do/_/de nas 
[\[73a.3\]]de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal pos lha'i bkod pa dang /_bkod pa'i mthu dang /_me tog gi char chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po byas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'dus pa chen po de mthong nas/_chos kyi 'bel 
[\[73a.4\]]ba'i gtam 'dod par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu song la sa chen po 'di ltos shig_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[73a.5\]]dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal pos sa chen po bltas so/_/bltas nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sa chen po bltas lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i 'dus pa chen po mdzad pa mthong lags 
[\[73a.6\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bkod pa'i rgyal po srog chags drug khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu deng kho na lung bstan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 
[\[73a.7\]]gtugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_mi dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu mang po 'dus lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa sems can mang po 'dus lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]chos mnyan pa'i dus ni 'di lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa chos mnyan pa'i dus ni 'di lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab 
[\[73b.2\]]ste/_bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/_/bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa grub par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das 'gyod pa bsal ba dang /_sems can thams cad la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du chos thams cad kyi yon tan 
[\[73b.3\]]bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'i mdo/_nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par bgyid pa/_bdud thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa/_sdig pa thams cad zad par bgyid pa/_sems can ma dad pa rnams dad par bgyid pa/_mu ge'i gnod pa zhi bar bgyid pa/_nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid 
[\[73b.4\]]pa/_dus ma lags par 'chi ba thams cad zlog pa/_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa glog snang ba las thos nas/_thos pa'i mod la chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur cing /_ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad de/_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa gang lags 
[\[73b.5\]]pa de bstan par gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe sems can nga'i bstan pa la ma dad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde dag la mngon par ma dad cing yid 
[\[73b.6\]]mi ches la/_tshig 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde ma yin no/_/'di la ni legs par byas pa dang /_nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ci yang med do zhes zer ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag ni chags pas zil gyis non nas/_mchod 
[\[73b.7\]]pa yang mngon par 'du byed par mi 'gyur la/_chos smra ba de dag la yang mchod pa byed par mi 'gyur te/_de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la yang 'khrug pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur la/_phyis kyang sems can dmyal ba rnams su btso bar 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]yab yum dang 'dra la/_las thams cad zad par byed pa'i mdo sde'i rgyal po chen po mnyan pa'i dus ma yin te/_gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu de dag dang /_sems can mang po gzhan dag kyang ngan song du 'gro bar 'ong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de dag 
[\[74a.2\]]ni mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la dad par mi 'gyur te/_'dod pas ldongs pa'i yid kyis khyim yongs su skyong bar byed cing /_rmo rko dang /_tshong dang /_g.yul 'gyed pa dang /_'thab pa la sred par 'gyur ro/_/de nas shi 'phos nas kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po dag tu btso 
[\[74a.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe srog chags brgyad khri stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dad par bgyid lags so/_/mngon par mchod par bgyid lags so/_/rgyas par yang bgyid lags 
[\[74a.4\]]so/_/'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_nyan du stsal ba dang /_'don pa la spro bar bgyid lags so/_/slad kyis chos ma lags pa'i dus de la bab na/_spyo ba dang /_brgyad bkag pa dang /_bsdigs pa bzod par bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bka' drin 
[\[74a.5\]]gzo bar bgyid kyi/_bka' drin mi gzo par mi bgyid de/_bdag cag slad kyis 'gyod par 'gyur bar mi bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'i mdo bstan du gsol/_'di ni slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe de bzhin 
[\[74a.6\]]gshegs pa'i phrin las bgyid par 'gyur ba lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i bshes gnyen ji ltar yongs su btsal bar bgyi/_bcom 
[\[74a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i bshes gnyen la lta bar 'dod pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /_chos 'dod par byas te/_chos bzhi po de 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa na gnas pas ji ltar bgyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[74b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di lta ste/_khyim na gnas pa yongs su spang ba dang /_mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du 'dzi yongs su spang ba dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 
[\[74b.3\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas ngan song du mchi bar 'gyur ba de ma mthong ste/_de ni gnas ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /_
[\[74b.4\]]'di la phyag 'tshal ba de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba lags na/_gang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa bgyid pa dang /_chos smra ba de la yang gos dang /_rgyan 
[\[74b.5\]]rnams kyis mchod par bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su lung bstan pa kho na lags so/_/chos smra ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar 
[\[74b.6\]]blta bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin te/_legs so legs so/_/chos smra ba de la ni ngas kyang mchod par bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du yang lung bstan par bya'o/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa la bla ma'i sri zhu byed 
[\[74b.7\]]cing me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_gos dang /_rgyan rnams dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed pa de ni dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]'jigs pa yang med/_mu ge'i gnod pa'i 'jigs pa yang med/_bu las gyur pa'i yid mi bde ba yang med/_chung ma las gyur pa'i yid mi bde ba yang med la/_bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[75a.2\]]rnams 'byung ba dang /_mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di thos pa ni dka'o/_/rigs kyi bu grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_khyim mam/_dgon pa'i gnas gang la lar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de ni de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bzung ba yin no/_/de 
[\[75a.3\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bgyi ba ci'i slad du de skad ces bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang gi phyir 'di ltar 'jig rten thams cad la lta 
[\[75a.4\]]bar byed/_rtog par byed/_tshim par byed/_yongs su skyong bar byed/_yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed cing /_snying rje'i sems dang /_bde ba'i sems dang /_byams pa'i sems dang /_snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan la/_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas 
[\[75a.5\]]na de'i phyir spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming tsam la rtog pa gang lags pa de yang bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur na/_gang dag de bzhin gshegs 
[\[75a.6\]]pa la mngon par mchod pa dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mngon par dad pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /_gos dang /_rgyan gyi mchod pa chen po dag gis mchod par bgyid pa dang /_rgyan gyis brgyan nas yi ger 'dri 
[\[75a.7\]]ba dang /_yi ger 'drir stsol ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mthu che ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]las bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/_de ni nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbyangs las blangs te/_thob pa'i mod la yangs bcu thob par gyur la/_srog 
[\[75b.2\]]chags stong phrag du mas kyang chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs mthu chen po bstan par gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bya ka la ping ka'i sgra dang gdangs 
[\[75b.3\]]sgrogs pas gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/_tad+ya thA/_dza ya dza ya/_dza ya ba ha/_kha ba ha/_dza ya ba ha/_hu lu hu lu/_pad+ma be/_a ba ma ba me/_sa ra sa ra Ne/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_de ba tA a nu pA lA ni/_yud+d+ha ut+tA ra Ni/_pa ra tsakra ni pa ra Ni/_pU ra ya b+ha ga bAn sarba A shA na/_ma ma sarba karma 
[\[75b.4\]]k+Sha pa ya/_bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA nen swA hA/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs yin te/_sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa/_nor dang /_'bru rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs zlog par byed pa/_mu ge'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_tshe nur bar byed pa ste/_
[\[75b.5\]]'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yab yum dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/_/rigs kyi bu la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /_gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing bsam pa yongs su dag pas mchod par byed de/_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi 
[\[75b.6\]]ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_mchod pa chen pos chos smra ba de la mchod pa de ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/_/dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di nyid la yang bde ba myong bar 'gyur te/_bus yid bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_chung mas yid bde bar 
[\[75b.7\]]'gyur ba dang /_khyim gyis yid bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_rgyal srid kyis yid bde bar 'gyur la/_bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]rnam grangs 'di la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos smra ba de dag dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba rnams dang /_'chang ba rnams dang /_klog pa rnams la yang mchod par 'tshal lo/_/gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bgyid pa dang /_chos smra ba de 
[\[76a.2\]]dag la yang gos dang /_rgyan rnams dang /_gdugs dang /_bzhon pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyid pa de dag gis ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yang mchod pa'i mchog 
[\[76a.3\]]gis mchod pa bgyid pa lags so/_/rgyal srid thams cad la yang bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/rgyal srid thams cad la yang mchod par 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos nyan pa de dag gi 
[\[76a.4\]]don du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams rjes su stsal bar 'tshal lo/_/bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/snying blas su yang bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir smros shig_/de nas byang chub 
[\[76a.5\]]sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so/_/namaHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_namaHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/_namaHsarba ma hA ra d+hi ke b+h+yaH/_tad+ya thA/_hu hu he he/_ma ti ma ti/_ma hA ma ti/_badzra ma ti/_dr-i D+ha badzra ma ti/_ta thA ga ta a nu 
[\[76a.6\]]pa ri pA li te/_sa ra sa ra/_a yo mu khi b+h+r-i ku Ti/_b+h+r-i ku Ta mu khi/_kri pe kri pA mu khi/_sat+ya ba tsa na/_ma nu sma ra/_b+ha ga bAn badzra pA Ni/_sarba karma A ba ra NA ni k+ShA pa ya/_sarba A sha ya pa ri pU ra ya/_de hi me bar ma/_bud+d+ha sa t+ye na/_b+ho d+hi sa twa sa t+ye na swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la byang chub 
[\[76a.7\]]sems dpa'i sa btsal 'tshal ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba dang /_rgyal srid dang /_longs spyod 'tshal ba dang /_yul gru 'tshal ba dang /_nor 'tshal ba dang /_'bru 'tshal ba des ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /_chos smra ba de la mchod pa chen pos 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]mchod par bgyi'o/_/gang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa de la yang spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_gos dang /_rgyan rnams dang /_gdugs dang /_bzhon pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das de la ni bdag 
[\[76b.2\]]gis bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal srid thams cad la yang ches mchod par 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du sems dang /_yid bde bar bgyi'o/_/bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/gang la la bdag mthong bar 'tshal ba dang /_stobs kyis 
[\[76b.3\]]'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang /_thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_khams rnam par smin par 'gyur ba dang /_lus mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang /_nam mkha' las mchi bar 'tshal ba des ni zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la nyin mtshan du smyung ba bgyis la 
[\[76b.4\]]gzugs bgyid du stsal te/_rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_zhi ba'i tshul can sku gdung dang ldan par bgyi'o/_/dbus su ni de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bzhugs par bgyi'o/_/g.yas logs su ni 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[76b.5\]]gzigs dbang phyug lag pa bzhi pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_sku gdung dang bcas pa gzhag go/_/g.yas g.yon dag tu ni rgyal po chen po bzhi mchod pa bgyid pa gzhag go/_/sgrub pa po'i rigs kyi bu des kyang gtsang sbra bgyi ba dang /_dus gsum du khrus bgyi ba dang /_dus 
[\[76b.6\]]gsum du gos brje bar bgyi'o/_/sems can thams cad la yang byams pa'i sems su bgyi'o/_/zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/_zla ba phyi ma nya ba tshes bco lnga'i bar du zas su nas kyi 'o thug 'tshal zhing /_dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/bdug pa ni a ga ru 
[\[76b.7\]]dang /_tsan+dan dang /_ce pog dang /_gu gul dbul lo/_/lan sum 'bum gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi ste/_de ni sngar bsnyen pa bgyi ba lags so/_/sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nam/_dgon pa'i gnas su spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog sna tshogs dang /_ba dan 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]sna tshogs kyis kyang mchod par bgyi'o/_/dkar bag gi lha bshos dag kyang dbul bar bgyi'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang yi ger 'drir stsal cing /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub dang /_gdugs dang /_bzhon pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa 
[\[77a.2\]]bgyi'o/_/de nas zla ba nya ba tshes bco lnga'i bar du sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_dus gsum du khrus bgyi ba dang /_dus gsum du gos brje bar bgyi ste/_dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ba lang gi lci bas bskus la me tog sna tshogs kyis khebs par bgyi ste/_
[\[77a.3\]]bum pa gang ba bcu drug dang /_mar me bcu drug kyang gzhag par bgyi'o/_/gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan sna tshogs kyis kyang sa phyogs de brgyan par bgyi'o/_/ro sna tshogs sbyar ba'i lha bshos rgya chen po phab la spos chab kyis phyogs der chag chag btab nas/_nam 
[\[77a.4\]]sku gzugs dang /_sa gzhi 'gul ba dang /_bdag nyid kyang dga' bar gyur pa'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas des 'di ni gcig tu nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro snyam du shes par bgyi'o/_/de nas de'i 'og tu bdag gis rmi lam du bstan par bgyi zhing 'bel ba'i 
[\[77a.5\]]gtam bgyi'o/_/bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi ste/_gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma dad cing spong bar bgyid pa ni ma gtogs so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[77a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje khyod kyis tshig de skad ces smras pa legs so legs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 
[\[77a.7\]]sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi yul na spyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ni sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyis yi ger 'dri ba'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'am/_'chang ba'am/_klog par mi nus te/_de dag la bdud kyis bar chad byed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]bzhi po 'di dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_nyan du 'jug pa'i bdud kyi las yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_le lo dang /_ma dad pa dang /_bla ma la sri zhu med pa dang /_chos smra ba'i sems mi brtan pa ste/_rigs kyi bu des de la 'di ni bdud 
[\[77b.2\]]kyi las yin no/_/snyam du shes par bya'o/_/gzhan yang bdud kyi las bzhi yod de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la 'dun pa med pa dang /_yid la mi byed pa dang /_khengs pa'i tshig smra ba dang /_'jig rten 'di la sems pa ste/_'di snyam du 'jig 
[\[77b.3\]]rten 'di la yang 'jigs pa med do/_/'jig rten pha rol la yang 'jigs pa med do/_/sdig pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang med do/_/bdag la tshig mi gsal ba yang med do/_/yid rtul ba yang med do/_/bdag ni mdzes pa yin no/_/bdag ni dbang phyug 
[\[77b.4\]]dang ldan no snyam du sems shing /_khyim dang bu smad rnams la zhen to/_/de dag ni bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/_bzhi po de dag ni de dag gi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par blta bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang bdud kyi las bzhi yod de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[77b.5\]]nor la brkam pa ste/_de dag bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_de dag mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang dgod cing smra ba dang /_chung mas yid bde ba dang /_chos nyan pa de dag gi 'dun pa zlog par byed pa ste/_'di lta ste/_blon po dang /_'khor rnams 'dus pa de 
[\[77b.6\]]dag gi thad du lhags nas 'di skad du sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa med do/_/chos smra ba 'di ni sdig pa byed pa dbang phyug gi rgyags pas myos pa 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa/_phra ma la dga' ba yin te/_'di ni khyod kyi srog gi bar chad byed par 'dod la/_khyod ni chos la gnas 
[\[77b.7\]]pa ste khyod kyis chos mang du byas so/_/khyod ni mdo sde klog pa dang /_'drir 'jug pa yin no zhes 'dzer te/_de dag mdo sde 'di yi ger 'drir 'jug par mi byed/_mchod par mi byed de/_de dag la ni tshe 'di nyid la yang bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur la phyi ma la yang sems can dmyal 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]bar btso bar 'gyur te/_de yang rigs kyi bu des bdud kyi las yin par rig par byas la de'i dbang du 'gyur bar mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag ngas lan gnyis lan gsum du tshig gis bsgo ste/_bag yod par gyis shig_/
[\[78a.2\]]phyis sems can dmyal ba dag tu btso ba na 'gyod par gyur ta re/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ngas ni mdo sde'i rgyal po mang po bstan/_/byang chub la ni sems can du ma bkod/_/sangs rgyas tshul yang nga yis bstan 
[\[78a.3\]]par gyur/_/de thos nas ni bag kyang yod par gyis/_/khyod rnams phyi dus rab tu 'jig pa'i tshe/_/log par ltung bar 'gro bar gyur ta re/_/mdo 'di la ni rtag tu gang dad pa/_/de ni nges par nga yi bu yang yin/_/mdo 'di la ni rtag tu gang mchod pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas 
[\[78a.4\]]zhing du'ang skye bar 'gyur/_/gang phyogs mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa/_/der ni 'byung po gnod sbyin srin po dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]grul bum lto 'phye chen po dang /_/gshed byed byad stems rnams kyis yongs mi tshugs/_/de ni bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing /_/de 
[\[78a.5\]]ni bde bar byang chub 'tshang yang rgya/_/de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/_chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma blags te/_lus 'dar bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[78a.6\]]'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis chos smra ba de la mchod par bgyi'o/_/chos nyan pa de dag la yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /_gzungs 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun 
[\[78a.7\]]chub par bgyid pa dang /_chos smra ba de la yang gos dang /_rgyan dag gis mchod pa bgyid pa de la yang bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/de'i yul yang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/nor dang 'bru thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/_/bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]bar bgyi'o/_/g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad du yang mdun du mchi bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal srid thams cad du yang ches bkur stir bgyid par 'gyur bar bgyi ste/_bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bka' drin gzo bar bgyid kyi bka' drin mi gzo bar mi bgyid lags so/_/
[\[78b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mchod par mi bgyid pa dang /_chos smra ba de dag la yang mchod par mi bgyid pa de la ni bdag cag gis sems mi bde bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag la legs so zhes bya 
[\[78b.3\]]ba byin te/_rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so/_/rgyal po chen po dag khyod legs kyis rtag tu khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig_/de nas dri za'i bdag po chen po yul 'khor srung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[78b.4\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe sems can mi dge ba spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ma dad cing glo bar ma chud pa dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin par mi bgyid/_klog par mi bgyid/_yi ger 
[\[78b.5\]]'drir stsol bar mi bgyid/_sbyin pa sbyin par mi bgyid/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la yid mi ches shing /_'jig rten 'di'i bde ba la lta bar bgyid de/_sems can de lta bu de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po chen po 'di bka' stsal to/_/
[\[78b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos gnyis kyis sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed de/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang ste/_rigs kyi bu chos de gnyis kyis sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu chos 'di bzhis ni bde 
[\[78b.7\]]'gror 'gro bar byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang /_bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]'di dag bka' stsal to/_/rgyal chen sbyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che/_/ngan song ngan 'gro kun las rab grol byed/_/rmongs pa'i sems can rtag tu 'dod la chags/_/chags pa sna tshogs brgya yis de dag myos/_/mdo sde 'di la dad par mi byed cing /_/sangs 
[\[79a.2\]]rgyas bstan la sbyin pa sbyin mi byed/_/sems can de 'dra ba dag ngan song sar/_/skyes nas tshor ba dag kyang myong bar 'gyur/_/sems can de dag la ni phan pa'i phyir/_/de ltar mdo sde mthu chen rab tu bstan/_/mdo sde 'di la rtag tu dad pa gang /_/de la gshed byed med cing sdig 
[\[79a.3\]]byed med/_/'byung po grul bum lto 'phye chen po med/_/rgyal po de la sdig pa byed pa med/_/legs 'dri nyan du 'jug dang mchod pa dang /_/legs par 'dzin pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa/_/sangs rgyas ye shes kyis ni bsngags pa de/_/sems can kun gyis bskal mang 
[\[79a.4\]]brjod mi nus/_/gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub rnams/_/rjed cing mchod pa byed pa de dag dang /_/la la gzhan 'gas mdo sde 'di nyid las/_/yi ge 'bru gcig tsam yang legs bris na/_/de la bsod nams snga ma de yis ni/_/de yi brgya stong char yang mi phod do/_/de nas 
[\[79a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad de/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog 
[\[79a.6\]]phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis mngon par mchod pa dang chos smra ba de dag dang /_'dri ba rnams dang /_'dzin pa rnams la mchod pa chen pos mchod pa bgyid pa de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la yon tan dang phan yon mang po thob par 'gyur te/_de'i lus 
[\[79a.7\]]la mig nad dang /_rna nad dang /_sna nad dang /_lce nad dang /_rims nad dang /_dug dang /_mtshon dang /_mes mi tshugs lags so/_/de dag la pha mas yid bde ba dang /_bu dang chung mas yid bde ba dang /_khyim gyis yid bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/_/g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]du yang rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/'gum pa'i tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/_kye mi khyod tshur shog_/'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song shig_/skyes bu chen po khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar ba dang ldan te/_gang du 'dod 
[\[79b.2\]]pa'i gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag pa ni de bzhin 
[\[79b.3\]]gshegs pa'i phrin las bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rig sngags chen po 'di ni las thams cad rnam par dag par bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can bsod nams chung ngu dag gi yul na spyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[79b.4\]]sems can bsod nams chung ngu dag gis thos par mi 'gyur lag du 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus gang gi lag tu 'ongs sam/_de bzhin gshegs pas nyan du bcug na/_des thos pa'i mod kho na la bri bar bya/_yi ger 'drir gzhug par bya/_bklag par bya'o/_/
[\[79b.5\]]rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming tsam thos na yang ngan 'gros 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las yig 'bru gcig tsam mam/_ming tsam nyan du bcug gam/_phyogs sam/_yul 'ga' zhig tu lung 
[\[79b.6\]]'bogs par byed na/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar mchod par bya'o/_/de ni pha ma dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po rnams kyis gsungs so/_/
[\[79b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/lha thams cad kyis rjes su bzung ngo /_/yongs su bskyangs so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha ma lta bu'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par thams cad rdzogs par/_gang du spyod par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas 
[\[80a.2\]]dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas su thams cad rdzogs par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/lho phyogs su yang spyod par 'gyur ro/_/'dzam bu'i gling du ni cung zad tsam gnas par 'gyur te/_gnas kha cig tu ni spyod kha cig tu ni mi spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[80a.3\]]'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya ba dang /_bklag par bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba dang /_nyan du gzhug par bya ba'i phyir khyod la gtad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi 
[\[80a.4\]]rnam grangs 'di nub par gyur ta re/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba byed pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi ba dang /_bklag par bgyi ba dang /_mchod 
[\[80a.5\]]par bgyi ba dang /_nyan du gzhug par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis gzung lags so/_/chos smra ba de dag la yang mchod par bgyi/_rjed par bgyi'o/_/gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /_chos smra ba de dag la mchod par bgyid pa de ni bdag la yang mchod par bgyid pa lags te/_de 
[\[80a.6\]]ni bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi/_yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/_bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bka' drin gzo bar bgyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis de ltar 
[\[80a.7\]]gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos nyan pa de dag dang /_yi ger 'dri ba rnams dang /_'dzin pa rnams dang /_
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]klog pa rnams dang /_nyan du 'jug pa rnams la yang mngon par mchod par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can bsod nams chung ngu dag gi yul du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byung ngam/_gal te rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pa'i yul du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byung ste/_spyod pa na 
[\[80b.2\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rgyal po de mchod par mi bgyid/_dad par mi bgyid la/_chos smra ba de dag dang /_yi ger 'dri ba rnams dang /_'dzin pa rnams dang /_klog pa rnams dang /_nyan du 'jug pa rnams dang /_lung 'bogs pa rnams la yang mchod par mi bgyid/_bla ma'i 
[\[80b.3\]]'du shes skyed par mi bgyid na/_des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par 'gyur lags so/_/de'i yul du sdig pa'i chos mang po dang /_yid mi bde ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur te/_des na rgyal rigs rgyal po des bdag gi yul du chos nub par gyur to snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi ste/_
[\[80b.4\]]des chos spyad par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/de ni de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu dper na/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[80b.5\]]sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la lo brgya'am lo stong gi bar du bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod pa byed la/_'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po ches yongs su gang bar byas te/_nyan thos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa dang /_bdag nyid yongs su gtong ba gang 
[\[80b.6\]]yin pa dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa dang /_gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa'am/_yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'am/_klog pa'am/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng ba rnams kyis 
[\[80b.7\]]mchod de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir zho'i brgyad cha cig tsam sbyin pa byin na de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma shos de ni brgya'i char yang mi phod na/_gang bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed de/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]dang /_ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed cing /_chos smra ba de dag la yang gos sam/_rgyan nam/_gdugs sam/_bzhon pa'am/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_sa gzhi ba lang gi rmig rjes tsam yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir sbyin pa byed la/_lus 'di 
[\[81a.2\]]ni snying po med pa'o snyam du shes shing rmi lam lta bu'o/_/sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/chu'i chu bur lta bu'o snyam du shes te/_lus 'di la ni snying po med do/_/chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o snyam du shes na/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa kho na yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[81a.3\]]pas dbugs phyung ba kho na yin no/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa yin no/_/phyis kyang mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_
[\[81a.4\]]lha'i dbang po rnams dang /_klu'i dbang po rnams dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po rnams dang /_mi'am ci'i dbang po rnams kyis tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/_bcom 
[\[81a.5\]]ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang gcig tu mthun par bgyis te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod par bgyi'o/_/yul de yang bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/chos smra ba de la yang mchod 
[\[81a.6\]]par bgyi/_bsrung bar bgyi/_lung bstan par bgyi/_dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o/_/gang la la chos smra ba dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa de la bla ma'i 'du shes skyed pa dang /_pha'i 'du shes dang /_bu'i 'du shes skyed pa de la ni bdag cag gis kyang 
[\[81a.7\]]pha'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o/_/gal te chos kyi rnam grangs de ma rungs par bgyid na ni de'i yul thams cad du bu dang mchis brang dang pha ma yid mi bde bar 'gyur la/_de'i 'og tu sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]lha'i dbang po nas mi'i dbang po'i bar de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so/_/grogs po dag khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan du gzhug pa dang /_mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyod la gtad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang 
[\[81b.2\]]'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du nub par gyur ta re/_la la zhig gis spangs te/_sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde bar 'gyur ba'o/_/khyed phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan 
[\[81b.3\]]pa na/_sa chen po 'di g.yos te/_g.yos rab tu g.yos so/_/srog chags drug stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[81b.4\]]ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par ston pa dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_
[\[81b.5\]]byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis mchod par bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur lags/_gang du ni skye bar 'gyur lags/_de nas bcom 
[\[81b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di zhus pa ni legs so/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_
[\[81b.7\]]ngas khyod la bshad do/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed pa de ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang la las stong gsum 
[\[82a.2\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po ches yongs su gang bar byas te/_nyan thos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa bas ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_chos smra ba de dag la yang 
[\[82a.3\]]me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa la sogs pas mchod pa 'di rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/_rigs kyi bu snga ma gang yin pa des ni de snyed bsags pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[82a.4\]]gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad de/_bu dang /_bu mo dang /_chung ma yongs su gtong ba dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig dang /_mgo bo yongs su gtong ba bas ni gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba'am/_
[\[82a.5\]]yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_klog gam/_dad par byed pa 'di bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/_rigs kyi bu snga ma gang yin pa des ni de snyed bsags pa ma yin no/_/chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar blta bar bya'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[82a.6\]]gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar mchod pa mngon par 'du bya bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang /_mi dang /_
[\[82a.7\]]lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so/_/chos smra ba de la yang phyag bgyi ba dang mchod par bgyi ba'i 'os lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba lags te/_de bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gus par bgyis te mnyan par bgyi'o/_/gus par bgyis te yid la bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/_/sa phyogs de ni 
[\[82b.2\]]mchod rten du gyur par blta bar bgyi'o/_/sa phyogs de ni lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu sa phyogs de ni lha 
[\[82b.3\]]dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya ba'i gnas yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang 
[\[82b.4\]]mchod pa bgyid la 'di'i slad du mchod pa dang bkur sti la brtson pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa yungs 'bru tsam stsal na/_de'i mtshams med pa lnga'i las rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur la/_bskal pa dgu khri'i bar du longs spyod che ba'i rigs rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa 
[\[82b.5\]]brgyad khri'i bar du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gshis ngan du 'gum par mi 'gyur ro/_/ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur/_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom 
[\[82b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi ye shes mtha' yas pa chags pa 
[\[82b.7\]]med cing rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal po'i tog ces bya ba byung ste/_der ngas bram ze'i gzugs kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so/_/thos nas kyang sems can rnams la bshad do/_/der ngas rnyed pa'i mod la chos la bzod pa thob ste/_chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/_/
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]sems can gang dag gis thos pa de dag thams cad kyang ngan song thams cad las yongs su grol te/_nam yang ngan song du mi 'gro bar 'gyur la/_chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag ste/_sems can de dag thams cad mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[83a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu ngas kyang lo mang po/_/lo brgya phrag mang po/_/lo stong phrag mang po/_/lo 'bum phrag mang por sems can 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti 
[\[83a.3\]]mug gis dkris pa rnams kyi phyir nor dang /_'bru dang /_'gron bu dang /_gser yongs su gtong ba byas nas/_mthar gyis lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig dang /_mgo bo dang /_sdug pa'i bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bu mo'i bar du yongs su gtong bar byas so/_/rkang 
[\[83a.4\]]dang /_rus pa yongs su gtong ba dang /_khyim dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang yongs su gtong ba byas so/_/lo 'bum phrag du mar tshangs par spyod pa yang spyad do/_/khyim pa dang 'dris par ma byas/_rgyal srid la 
[\[83a.5\]]dga' ba dang /_nor la dga' ba dang /_yul 'khor dang /_pho brang 'khor la dga' ba dang /_bu dang bu mo la dga' ba dang /_chung ma la dga' bar ma byas so/_/gcig tu nges par tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa brten to/_/gcig tu nges par sbyin pa byin no/_/gcig tu nges par 
[\[83a.6\]]sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun rnams la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byas so/_/gcig tu nges par ngas chos smra ba rnams la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal 
[\[83a.7\]]mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas so/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po yang ngas bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de yang ngas 'khor ba la skyo ba'i lugs kyis lus rnams byin la/_mig rnams dang /_rang gi sha rnams dang /_rkang 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]dang /_rus pa rnams dang /_rang gi pags pa rnams kyang byin na/_phyi rol gyi dngos po gzhan dag lta ci smos te/_nga 'gyod par gyur pa yang med do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha'i dbang po rnams dang /_klu'i dbang po rnams dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 
[\[83b.2\]]rnams dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang /_mi'i dbang po rnams dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi tshul 'di thos nas/_chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma blags te/_de dag thams cad kyis chos la 
[\[83b.3\]]bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/'di ni sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba byed pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[83b.4\]]gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa dang /_mchod pa bgyid pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni dkon lags so/_/gang dag gi sug par mchis pa 
[\[83b.5\]]de dag ni sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi 
[\[83b.6\]]ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_chos smra ba de dag la yang me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed pa de dag ni dkon te/_de 
[\[83b.7\]]dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar blta bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa mi byed pa dang /_'dzin par mi byed pa dang /_klog par mi byed pa dang /_sbyin pa mi byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag ni bskal pa du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]dang /_bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba na 'khor bar 'gyur te/_sdug bsngal ba mang po sdug bsngal brgya dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste dper na bud med sbrum ma zhig yod la/_bud med sbrum ma de'i lto na bu chags pa de yang khye'u'am/_bu mo zhig tu gyur na/_
[\[84a.2\]]bud med de'i bu de gang gi tshe zla ba gcig lon nam/_zla ba gnyis lon nam/_zla ba gsum lon nam/_zla ba lnga lon nam/_zla ba tshang ba'i bar du gyur pa de tsam du bud med de'i lus non par 'gyur te/_tshigs kyang 'bye bar 'gyur/_lto yang chung bar 'gyur/_skad kyi gcom yang chung 
[\[84a.3\]]bar 'gyur te/_tshor ba de dag gis yongs su gzir ba'i lus kyis de tsam du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bzhin du lus 'dzin par byed de/_bu btsa' ba'i dus kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong ngo /_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang gi tshe bdag gi bu btsa' bar gyur 
[\[84a.4\]]pa de'i tshe/_bdag bde bar btsas par gyur na de'i tshe tshangs par spyad par bya'o snyam mo/_/de phyis yang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis chags par gyur pa na sdug bsngal de dag phyis mi dran te/_bde ba'i 'du shes skyed par byed do/_/de bzhin du phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na sems can 'byung 
[\[84a.5\]]bar 'gyur ba de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad par mi byed/_mchod par mi byed/_'dzin par mi byed/_klog par mi byed de/_de dag sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag kyang 'dod chags kyis 
[\[84a.6\]]myos nas/_tshor ba de dag bzod par gyur te/_bdag cag gis khyim dang /_bu smad yongs su bskyang bar bya'o/_/chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo yongs su bskyang bar bya'o snyam mo/_/gang gi tshe yang sems can dmyal bar skyes pa de'i tshe ni 'gyod par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe phyir 
[\[84a.7\]]thar par gyur pa de'i tshe ni 'dod chags kyis chags nas sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal brjed par 'gyur te/_sbyin pa yang sbyin par mi byed/_tshul khrims kyang srung bar mi byed do/_/'di lta ste dper na mi chang gis ra ro zhing myos te/_tshabs cher ra ro zhing myos la gtu lum par gyur na/_
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]mi des sems kyis kyang khyim tshol mi nus/_lam yang mi tshol/_pha ma dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo'i 'du shes kyang med/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun yang mi dran te/_de chang gis myos pa'i mthus dur khrod na 'dug na yang 'jigs pa med la/_'di snyam 
[\[84b.2\]]du sems te/_lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nga skrag par byed nus pa su zhig yod snyam mo/_/de bong ba dang /_shing dang /_rtswa dang /_tsher ma'i lam gzhan dag la bde ba'i 'du shes skyed pa las/_lus sor chud cing ra ro ba de sangs nas gang gi tshe dran pa rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe 'gyod 
[\[84b.3\]]par byed de/_bdag ni srog la thug kyang bla/_bdag gis chang 'di btung bar mi bya'o snyam mo/_/de bzhin du sems can 'dod chags kyis rgyags pas myos shing /_khyim na gnas pas rnam par 'khrul pa nor gyis sems myos pa rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 
[\[84b.4\]]'dun yang yongs su tshol bar mi byed/_sbyin pa yang mi dran/_mtho ris su skye ba dang /_rgyal por 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba yang yongs su tshol bar mi byed de/_'khor ba de nyid na 'khor zhing sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 
[\[84b.5\]]'jig rten rnams su skyes pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur la/_'di snyam du 'dzin te/_bdag gi lus ni bde ste/_sdug bsngal ba med do snyam mo/_/gang gi tshe sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas thar te/_brgya la brgya lam na 
[\[84b.6\]]mi'i lus thob par gyur pa de'i tshe mngal na gnas pas lus yongs su gzir cing mun nag gis skyo bar gyur pa'i lus la bad kan dang /_mkhris pa dang /_ljan ljin dang /_khrag dang /_phyi sas bangs pas skyo bar gyur nas/_'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag lo brgya'am/_bskal 
[\[84b.7\]]pa'am/_bskal pa brgya'am/_bskal pa stong ngam/_bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du 'khor ba na 'khor zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi bzad cing yid du mi 'ong ba myong la/_gang du yang bdag cag gis skyabs med pa 'di las gang dag gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yin zhig gu/_bdag 
[\[85a\]]
