[\[85a.1\]]cag gis kyang sngon sdig pa mang du byas so snyam ste/_de ltar mngal na gnas nas sems can dmyal ba dang 'dra bar 'gyod pa skyed par byed de/_gang gi tshe bdag cag mngal na gnas pa'i sems can dmyal ba 'di las thar bar gyur pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang 
[\[85a.2\]]dge 'dun la mi phyed pa'i dad pas bsgrub pa dang btsal bar bya ste/_ci nas kyang bdag cag phyin chad mngal gyi sems can dmyal bar gnas par mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de dag phyis mngal gyi gnas rnams las thar nas bag med par byed de/_de dag yang sems can dmyal 
[\[85a.3\]]ba rnams su sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na nams kyang bag med par mi bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_
[\[85a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can thams cad kyi skyabs byed pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/byang chub sems dpas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bkod pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zung 
[\[85a.5\]]shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos chen 
[\[85a.6\]]po de dag dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/
[\[85a.7\]]'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nya bar ma dang /_su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]{D528}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a gra pra dI pa d+hA ra NI bid+ya rA dza/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po sgron ma mchog gi gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig 
[\[85b.2\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_lha dang mi 'bum phrag du ma dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_
[\[85b.3\]]yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma mchog 
[\[85b.4\]]ces bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa des byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po dang /_'od dpag med ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir btang ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[85b.5\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum 
[\[85b.6\]]bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag 'bum 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bgyi 
[\[85b.7\]]ba de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma mchog ces bgyi ba da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]sgron ma'i mchog des bdag cag gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir btang ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog des/_bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_
[\[86a.2\]]bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang /_bde ba dang /_kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa la reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo/_/'di skad ces kyang gsung ngo /_/'di na mi'am/_mi ma lags pa'am/_'byung po'am/_sha za'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_srin po'am/_grul bum mam/_grul 
[\[86a.3\]]bum gyi sde dpon nam/_rgyal po'am/_blon po chen po'am/_chom rkun nam/_sbrul lam/_srin bu'am/_srin bu lu ta'am/_sbrang bu lcags phye'am/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yang rung bdag 'tshe bar bgyid pa 'ga' yang ma mchis sam zhes gsung ngo /_/sems 
[\[86a.4\]]can rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba dang /_mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_bsrung ba 
[\[86a.5\]]dang /_sba ba dang /_bskyab pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog des gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang bskur te/_'di lta ste/_dz+wA le dz+wA le/_dz+wA le ga te/_huk+ku/_muk+ku/_saM ma te/_ma hA saM ma te/_ma 
[\[86a.6\]]hA dz+wA le/_dz+wA ba la me/_sa he sa he/_ma hA dz+wA le/_uk+ke/_muk+ke/_sha me/_saM ma he/_ma hA saM ma he/_ma hA sha me swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig_/long shig_/chong shig_/
[\[86a.7\]]lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig_/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/_/gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag 'dzin pa yang shin tu rnyed 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]par dka'o/_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la ni gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /_len pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs bdun du tshe 
[\[86b.2\]]rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun 
[\[86b.3\]]cu rtsa bdun gyis gsungs te/_gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa stan las langs te/_gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i 
[\[86b.4\]]lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba dang /_mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_gzi 
[\[86b.5\]]brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_bskyab pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod 
[\[86b.6\]]par bgyi'o/_/'di lta ste/_at+te/_bat+te/_nat+te/_ku nat+te/_puk+ka se/_ku puk+ka se/_ka se/_a na ka se/_nA ma ka se/_a nu ta/_pra nu ta/_kha dze/_ma hA kha dze/_sad pa phe/_ta Da phe/_tu Da phe/_hi li mi li ti le swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal 
[\[86b.7\]]pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig_/long shig_/chong shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig_/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/_/gzungs 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa 
[\[87a.2\]]dang /_len pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs bcu gnyis su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang 
[\[87a.3\]]dag par 'da' ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyis gsungs te/_/gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa ni de 
[\[87a.4\]]dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/_gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[87a.5\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba dang /_mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_
[\[87a.6\]]stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_bskyab pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/de 'di lta ste/_ak+khe/_bak+khe/_na dzi te/_nA gA sa re/_na hi li/_dza hi li/_dza hi li ba te/_tsaN+DI la 
[\[87a.7\]]ba te swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig_/long shig_/chong shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]cig_/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/_/gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[87b.2\]]gang la las gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /_len pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs bcu gsum du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi 
[\[87b.3\]]las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyis gsungs te/_gang gzungs kyi 
[\[87b.4\]]gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_mdangs dang ldan par bya ba 
[\[87b.5\]]dang /_gzi brjid dang ldan par bya ba dang /_grags pa dang ldan par bya ba dang /_yon tan dang ldan par bya ba dang /_stobs dang ldan par bya ba dang /_mdog dang ldan par bya ba dang /_bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_bskyab pa'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bshad do/_/
[\[87b.6\]]'di lta ste/_aT+Te/_baT+Te/_na T+Te/_ku na T+Te/_Ta ke/_e Da ke/_ta ta be/_tu Da be/_ra Ta ke/_lo le/_hu le/_hi li/_mi le/_ti le/_shI le/_shI la/_a D+he/_ba D+he/_na D+he/_ku na D+he/_a Dab tI/_pa na ba tI/_ka se ka se ka se/_pha se pha se pha se/_ma hA pha se pha se swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[87b.7\]]dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig_/long shig_/chong shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig_/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/_/
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag ston pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin 
[\[88a.2\]]pa dang /_len pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs bcu bzhir tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las 'da' ba dang /_
[\[88a.3\]]'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis gsungs te/_gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no/_/
[\[88a.4\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag gis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag shing skam po gsher bag med pa la bsrung ba byas te/_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_bcing ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba byas na shing de la lcu 
[\[88a.5\]]gu dang /_lo ma dag kyang skye bar 'gyur te/_me tog dang /_'bras bu rnams kyang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur na/_mir gyur pa lta ci smos/_namaHsarba bud+d+he b+h+yaH/_sid d+ha n+tu d+hA ra NI/_man+t+ra pA da ni swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[88a.6\]]dag sems can rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_mdangs dang ldan par bya ba dang /_gzi brjid dang ldan par bya ba dang /_grags pa dang ldan par bya ba dang /_yon tan dang ldan par bya ba dang /_stobs dang ldan par bya ba dang /_mdog dang ldan par bya ba dang /_
[\[88a.7\]]bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_bskyab pa'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi gzhan dag kyang bshad par bya'o/_/de 'di lta ste/_at+te/_mat+te/_pa ke pA ra ke/_pe ke DA/_dra ma ti/_ta ra ma ti/_Tu Da ma Ti/_Tu Da ma Ti/_Tu Da Tu re/_su re/_hi le/_mu le/_ti le swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig_/long shig_/chong shig_/klogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig_/kun 
[\[88b.2\]]dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/_/gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi 
[\[88b.3\]]gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /_len pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams 
[\[88b.4\]]cad las 'da' ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig la bsrung ba byas na de la yang 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci 
[\[88b.5\]]dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/sbrul dang /_srin bu dang /_srin bu lu ta dang /_sbrang bu lcags phye thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/rims rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_'dus pa dang /_dus tshigs 'gyur 
[\[88b.6\]]ba las byung ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/zhag gcig pa'am/_zhag gnyis pa'am/_zhag gsum pa'am/_zhag bzhi pa'am/_zhag bdun pa'am/_zla ba phyed pa'am/_zla ba gcig pa'am/_lo gcig pa'am/_nad rgyun [{]rings sam[,]ring ngam[}]/_skad cig pa rnams kyis mi 
[\[88b.7\]]tshugs so/_/'bras sam/_phol mig gam/_rkang shu'am/_lhog pa'am/_me dpal lam/_shu ba'am/_khyi rngo'am/_g.yan pa'am/_mdze thams cad dam/_lhog pa thams cad dam/_gshed byed thams cad dam/_sgyur ba'i las thams cad dam/_byad thams cad 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]dang /_ro langs thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs so/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs te/_gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni de dag thams cad la 
[\[89a.2\]]'khus pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni rgyal po'i pho brang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/_/chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/_/srin po'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/_/gcan gzan khro bo'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la 
[\[89a.3\]]bya'o/_/'brog dgon pa'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/_/klung dang bgrod dka' ba na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/_/me'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/_/chu'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/_/de yid la byas pa de rnams las 'jigs pa de dag thams cad mi 'byung 
[\[89a.4\]]ngo /_/des dug zos pa thams cad kyang kha zas nyid du 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa ni 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]thams cad dang /_srul po thams cad dang /_gshed byed thams cad dang /_sgyur ba'i 
[\[89a.5\]]las thams cad dang /_byad thams cad dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs te/_kun dga' bo mdor na de la gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/kun dga' bo gsad pa'i rigs pa ni chad pas bral bar 'gyur ro/_/chad pas gcad pa'i rigs 
[\[89a.6\]]pa ni brdegs pas/_brdegs pa'i rigs pa ni brgyad pas/_brgyad pa'i rigs pa ni bsdigs pas/_bsdigs pa'i rigs pa ni mig tshugs su bltas pas thar par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis gang la bsrung ba byas pa'am/_
[\[89a.7\]]yongs su bskyab pa byas pa'am/_yongs su gzung bas bcings pa'am/_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba de ni gnas med de/_lha dang bcas/_bdud dang bcas/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram zer bcas pa'i 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]skye dgu dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin gyi nang na yang ngas ma mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrug pa thams cad las nges par 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas chos 
[\[89b.2\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di rdzogs pa'i rjes la rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher rgyas par bgyi ba dang /_chos smra ba de dag rjes su yongs su gzung ba dang /_dam pa'i chos ci 
[\[89b.3\]]nas kyang yun ring du gnas pa dang /_bdud thams cad tshar gcod pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams rjes su stsal bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la legs so zhes bgyi ba gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po 
[\[89b.4\]]bzhi la thugs brtse ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ste/_rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang bar rig nas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de ni 'di lta ste/_da naT+De/_de naT+De/_ma hA naT+De/_dzam+b+ha ne/_stam+b+ha ne/_Ta Te/_
[\[89b.5\]]Ta Ta ne/_ma hA Ta Ta ne/_kuT+Te/_kuT+Ta ne/_ma hA kuT+Ta ne/_d+harma le/_tsarma le swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gzungs 'di'i 'khor gyi tshig lta bur gda' ba lags te/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /_bzlas te bton 
[\[89b.6\]]nas 'chang ba 'di ni sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las 'da' ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/_/de la ni dam pa'i chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba la yang bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[89b.7\]]kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la grogs po dag khyod bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis de dag rdzu 'phrul che bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]phan yon che ba dang /_byin che bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/long shig_/chong shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rgyas par 
[\[90a.2\]]bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis gzung lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gzungs sngags kyi ni mdo sde 'di/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa ste/_/sems can rnams la 
[\[90a.3\]]phan pa'i phyir/_/de ni ngas kyang bshad pa yin/_/gang zhig gzungs sngags mdo sde 'di/_/'dzin tam yang na klog byed pa/_/tshe rabs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/_/de ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_/gzungs sngags 'di rjod byed de la/_/mi min gang yang rung ba 
[\[90a.4\]]dang /_/gnod sbyin grul bum srin po dag_/nams kyang bar chad mi byed do/_/gzungs sngags 'di rjod byed de la/_/'dod khams dbang phyug gang yin pa/_/sdig can bdud de nam du yang /_/bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin 
[\[90a.5\]]byed de yi/_/pha ma dang ni phu nu dang /_/sring mo mdza' bshes gnyen dag kyang /_/log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de phyir gzungs sngags mdo sde 'di/_/'jigs med gang gis thos gyur nas/_/gzungs sngags 'di rjod byed pa des/_/nams kyang 'jigs par 
[\[90a.6\]]mi bya'o/_/gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed de yi/_/bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/_/sgrib pa'i las ni gang byas pa/_/zhag bdun gyis ni byang bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang /_/bskal pa bye bar bsgrubs pa kun/_/gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed 
[\[90a.7\]]pa des/_/zhag bdun gyis ni zil gyis non/_/phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba bo/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag_/lus ngan dang ni yul 'khor srung /_/mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan/_/'khor bcas blon bcas de dag kyang /_/
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]gzungs sngags 'di ni rjod byed pa/_/de la rtag tu srung bar byed/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_'phags pa byams pa dang /_'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[90b.2\]]dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po sgron ma mchog gi gzungs 
[\[90b.3\]]rdzogs so//[ {D529}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gzungs chen po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_
[\[90b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo grong khyer gnas bcas su dbyar gnas nas dbyar zla 
[\[90b.5\]]ba gsum 'das pa dang chos gos byas te/_chos gos zin nas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 
[\[90b.6\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_stobs dang /_gzi brjid kyi phyir gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig_/chong shig_/long 
[\[90b.7\]]shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/yid la zung shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams ni rnyed par dka' zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]'byung ba yang rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir te/_dper na u dum ba ra'i me tog lta bu yin gyis/_zung shig_/chong shig_/long shig_/lhogs shig_/yid la zung shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[91a.2\]]kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'chang ngam/_'dzin tam/_klog gam/_yid la 'dzin tam/_kun chub par byas na de mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_dug gis ma yin/_mes ma yin/_chus ma yin/_
[\[91a.3\]]rgyal po'i chad pas ma yin te/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_klu dang /_rlung lha dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri za dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_grul 
[\[91a.4\]]bum dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po dang /_'byung po dang /_brjed byed dang /_smyo byed dang /_gnon po dang /_grib gnon dang /_gshed byed dang /_gnod byed dang /_byad kyis mi tshugs/_de la mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams kyis mi tshugs/_de la rigs pa'i las 
[\[91a.5\]]dang /_ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las kyis mi tshugs/_de la rims nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa dang /_rtag pa'i rims dang /_'byung po'i rims dang /_yud tsam pa dang /_rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_
[\[91a.6\]]bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no/_/tad+ya thA/_dz+wA le/_ma hA dz+wA le/_dz+wA la ne/_ma hA dz+wA la ne/_tA pa ne/_ma hA tA pa ne/_dz+wA li te/_u ga ge/_bu ga ge/_swaM b+ha de/_ma hA saM 
[\[91a.7\]]b+ha de/_tsakre/_ma hA tsakre/_bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig swA hA/_kun dga' bo gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]gyis gsungs te/_nga yang da ltar 'chad cing rjes su yi rang ngo /_/kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_yid la byed dam/_kun chub par byed dam/_de 
[\[91b.2\]]tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/de byang chub kyi sems las mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no/_/tad+ya thA/_an+te/_ban d+he/_k+Sha me/_k+Sha ma me/_d+hA na se/_ba da ne/_a da ne/_hu le/_ma hA hu le/_ka re gaM 
[\[91b.3\]]b+hI re/_duSh+pus te/_bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/_kun dga' bo gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 
[\[91b.4\]]brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyis gsungs te/_nga yang da lta na 'chad cing rjes su yi rang ngo /_/kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'chang ngam/_'dzin tam/_klog gam/_yid la byed ma/_kun chub 
[\[91b.5\]]par byed na/_de tshe rabs bcu bzhi'i bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/de byang chub kyi sems las mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no/_/tad+ya thA/_aT+Te/_baT+Te/_ag ge/_bag ge/_thag ge/_Thag ge/_d+ha ke/_d+hA ra 
[\[91b.6\]]d+ha ga ke_/Ta ke Ta ke_/a ka si/_sa ka si/_ma ka si/_i li mi li/_ti li mi li/_rau ra be/_ma hA rau ra be/_b+hU taM ga me/_b+hU ta pa rA ya Ne/_ti mi gi se/_ma hA ti mi gi se/_saM b+hA be/_ma hA saM b+hA be/_bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad dang /_
[\[91b.7\]]nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/_kun dga' bo gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs te/_nga yang da lta na 'chad cing rjes su yi rang ngo /_/kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'chang ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_yid la byed pa/_kun chub par byed pa de tshe rabs nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/de byang chub kyi sems las 
[\[92a.2\]]phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no/_/tad+ya thA/_ru le/_ma hA ru le/_he he ri/_mat+ta ri/_dzaM b+ha ni/_staM b+ha ni/_kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di 
[\[92a.3\]]dag gi shing skam po bsrung ba'am/_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba dang chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug bsad pa dang /_mtshams bcad pa dang /_nam mkha' bcing 
[\[92a.4\]]ba dang /_sa bcing ba byas te/_de la srad bus bcings na de'i rtsa ba yang skye bar 'gyur/_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_lcug ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu yang skye bar 'gyur na rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_kun dga' bo sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni 
[\[92a.5\]]ma gtogs so/_/kun dga' bo nyi zla 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba/_'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di gnyis ni sa la ltung yang srid do/_/kun dga' bo ri'i rgyal po ri rab gnas nas g.yo yang srid do/_/kun dga' bo rgya mtsho chen po 'di ltar zab pa/_'di ltar rgya che la 'di 
[\[92a.6\]]ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba bzhi po 'di dag ni skams shing yongs su zad de mthar thug par 'gyur yang srid do/_/kun dga' bo sa chen po 'di ni rnam pa stong du 'gyes kyang srid/_chu ni gsher ba nyid 'dor yang srid/_me ni tsha ba 'dor yang srid/_rlung ni grang ba 'dor yang srid kyi gzungs 
[\[92a.7\]]chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni slu mi srid do/_/kun dga' bo lha'am/_klu'am/_lha ma yin nam/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_rlung lha'am/_dri za'am/_mi'am ci'am/_lto 'phye chen po'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_srin po'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_sha za'am/_grul bum mam/_srul 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]po'am/_lus srul po'am/_'byung po'am/_bram ze'am/_srin po'am/_grib gnon nam/_mi dang mi ma yin pa gang la la zhig gam/_gzhan su yang rung ba zhig gis gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed na/_tad+ya thA/_ag gi le/_/tsag gi 
[\[92b.2\]]le/_bal le/_mal le/_o hA ni/_mo hA ni/_dzaM b+ha ni/_staM b+ha ni/_bdag dang sems can thams cad la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/_rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yang lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur pas 
[\[92b.3\]]de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gems so/_/rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_rnam thos kyi bu yang lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba/_kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gems so/_/lha'i dbang po 
[\[92b.4\]]brgya byin yang rdo rje 'phen to/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gems so/_/de rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du gnas su mi dbang ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i 
[\[92b.5\]]dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/
[\[92b.6\]]'phags pa gzungs chen po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D530}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_
[\[92b.7\]]Ar+ya swalpA k+Sha ra pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba la sogs 
[\[93a.2\]]pa lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/_dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar 
[\[93a.3\]]nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_'dzum mul te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu la bsod nams che ba/_gang thos 
[\[93a.4\]]pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs ma mchis par gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[93a.5\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa legs so legs so/_/de'i phyir rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la 
[\[93a.6\]]zung shig dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu la bsod nams che ba gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs med par 
[\[93a.7\]]sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]kyis de'i tshe sems can thams cad dgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/mnyam par bzhag pa des smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i phrag nas 'od zer 'bum phrag du ma byung ste/_'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab par gyur to/_/sems 
[\[93b.2\]]can gang dag 'od zer des reg pa sems can dmyal ba pa yan chad sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du lha'i 
[\[93b.3\]]tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char yang phab po/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsungs pa 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpas mnyam pa'i sems dang byams pa'i sems dang byas pa gzo ba dang /_sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems su bya'o/_/shes 
[\[93b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di yang gdon par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA/_ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed pas bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[93b.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chen po las khyod kyis 'di nyid thob pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/_/khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[93b.6\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas nyid du lung yang bstan to/_/gang dag khyod kyi ming nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa dang /_
[\[93b.7\]]glegs bam du bris nas mchod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_dza ya dza ya/_pad+ma b+he/_a ba me sa ra sa ra Ni/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_de ba tA nu pA la ne/_bud+d+ha ut+ta ra Ni pU ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/_sarbA sha ma sha ma sarba satwA nAM/_sarba 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]karmA ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ya/_bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na swA hA/_don dam par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i yum 'phral du sdig pa 'phrog pa/_byang chub sbyin par byed pa ste/_'di lta ste/_bskal pa bye ba brgyar 
[\[94a.2\]]yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phan yon brjod par mi nus so/_/'di bklags pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[94a.3\]]gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thabs sla ba'i phyir te/_sems can gang dag spro ba chung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[94a.4\]]tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_yi ge 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de dag thams cad thabs sla bas byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur te/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[94a.5\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji tsam du sems can thams cad la sman pa dang /_sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[94a.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[94a.7\]]de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]{D531}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_b+ha ga ba tI pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA hr-i da ya/_bod skad du/_bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po/_bam po gcig go/_/bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig 
[\[94b.2\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/
[\[94b.3\]]yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa nyid la rnam par lta zhing /_phung po lnga po de dag la yang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par lta'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[94b.4\]]shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des ji ltar bslab par bya/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_
[\[94b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des 'di ltar rnam par 
[\[94b.6\]]blta bar bya ste/_phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par yang dag par rjes su blta'o/_gzugs stong pa'o/_/stong pa nyid gzugs so/_/gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin/_stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du 
[\[94b.7\]]shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na chos thams cad stong pa nyid de/_mtshan nyid med pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa/_dri ma med pa/_dri ma dang bral ba med pa/_bri ba med pa/_gang ba med pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na stong pa nyid la 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]gzugs med/_tshor ba med/_'du shes med/_'du byed rnams med/_rnam par shes pa med/_mig med/_rna ba med/_sna med/_lce med/_lus med/_yid med/_gzugs med/_sgra med/_dri med/_ro med/_reg bya med/_chos med do/_/mig gi khams 
[\[95a.2\]]med pa nas yid kyi khams med/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang med do/_/ma rig pa med/_ma rig pa zad pa med pa nas rga shi med/_rga shi zad pa'i bar du yang med do/_/sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam med/_ye shes med/_
[\[95a.3\]]thob pa med/_ma thob pa yang med do/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams thob pa med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing gnas te/_sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag pa med de/_phyin ci log las shin tu 'das nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 
[\[95a.4\]]mthar phyin to/_/dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/_rig 
[\[95a.5\]]pa chen po'i sngags/_bla na med pa'i sngags/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sngags/_sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags/_mi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pas na bden par shes par bya ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags smras pa/_tad+ya thA/_ga te ga te pA ra ga te/_pA ra saM ga 
[\[95a.6\]]te/_bo d+hi swA hA/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[95a.7\]]phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad par bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/bcom ldan 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi 
[\[95b.2\]]rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang /_lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen sdes bsgyur 
[\[95b.3\]]cing /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge blo dang nam mkha' la sogs pas zhus te gtan la phab pa la//_//dpal bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag gi dge rgyas bye ma gling gi rtsig ngos la bris pa dang zhu dag legs par bgyis so//_//
[\[95b.4\]{D532}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bud+d+ha b+ha ga wAn aSh+Ta sha ta nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das snying rje'i tsan+dan dri zhim po'i spos kyis byugs 
[\[95b.5\]]pa'i sku/_zhabs pad+ma lha dang lha ma yin gyi nor bu'i cod pan gyis gtugs pa/_rang byung sel mdzad bla ma 'jig rten thams cad la phan par mdzad pa/_ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa nyes pa dang bral ba/_zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/_gzugs mdzes pa/_mtshan gsal ba'i gzi 
[\[95b.6\]]brjid can/_sku dpe byad kyis brgyan pa/_yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/pad+ma rgyas pa ltar zhal bzhad de/_tshems dkar zhing snyoms la thags bzang bas rab tu rgyas shing snang la nor bu dri ma med pa ltar 'od gsal zhing mdzes te/_spa zhing gsal ba nyi ma 'od 
[\[95b.7\]]zer stong 'bar ba mang po'i 'od snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zil gyis gnon pa/_thub pa'i mchog stobs bcu dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'dud do/_/rab tu 'dud do/_/bstod do/_/oM b+ho hU~M hU~M hU~M/_A A/_hI hI/_shi ba shi ba/_shAn+ti shAn+ti/_sha ma sha ma/_sha mA pa ya/_ta thA ga tA nu ga ta/_swa b+hA ba/_a 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]b+hA ba/_sa mut+tA ya/_a sa ma ba la/_a bI ra la ba la/_a mi tA ba la/_a ti ba la/_hU~M g+huM g+huM/_d+h+ro d+h+ro/_b+h+rau b+h+rau/_b+h+re du b+h+re du/_hI hI/_b+ha ga bAn/_b+ha bAn+ta ka su ra ta b+ho ga ma hA shAn+ti ka ra/_pA pa kilpi Sha nA sha ka swA hA/_de nas dpe byad mtshan gsal bas/_/yan lag 
[\[96a.2\]]thams cad rab brgyan cing /_/nyi ma bzhin du gsal ba bo/_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba/_/grags shing dri ma rab spangs la/_/dri med skyon bral chos kyi blo/_/khyab bdag chen po stobs bcur ldan/_/rdul bral dpal dang ldan pa po/_/rin chen sa gzhi chen po la/_/
[\[96a.3\]]pho brang rtse mo rdo rje'i rtse/_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams gnas gyur pa/_/nor bu du ma rab 'phro zhing /_/'od zer dri med gsal bkod pa'i/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor pho brang na/_/thub pa'i longs spyod sa gzhi la/_/seng ge'i khri chen yangs la bzhugs/_/nor bu dbyig gi sa gzhi dang /_/khri chen 
[\[96a.4\]]rab spa de nyid la/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes chen gyis/_/phun sum tshogs pa rgyan bkod lta/_/thub pa me zla nor bu'i 'od/_/nyi zer non pa'i 'od ldan pa/_/bde blag shin tu bkra shis tshul/_/'od gsal skyil mo krung bcas nas/_/sku 'od 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor can/_/
[\[96a.5\]]'od gsal rgyas pas thub dbang gi/_/dri med 'od zer bkye ba ni/_/mi g.yo rdo rje can zhes bya/_/dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yi/_/rdo rje can dag rab 'dul ba/_/gang yin de kun dag byas nas/_/dkyil 'khor dri med skor bar byed/_/ngan song dam tshig dri ma kun/_/
[\[96a.6\]]legs par shin tu dag byas nas/_/srid gsum dkyil 'khor rgya che la/_/rnam pa du mar 'od gsal ba/_/'gro dang mi 'gro ma lus pa/_/bskor nas bde chen rdo rje can/_/rdo rje ral gri thogs pa de/_/cod pan ma g.yos nang du zhugs/_/de nas 'jigs pa'i sgra skad kyis/_/
[\[96a.7\]]'gengs shing mig ni log ltar 'gyu/_/rig sngags hU~M zhes sgrogs pa po/_/rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs byed pa/_/bzhin mdzes 'dzum gyis rnam par brgyan/_/sdig med mig rtsa rgod gyur cing /_/stan las langs te phyag 'tshal nas/_/legs par mchod byas smras pa ni/_/kye ma skye ba'i 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]phyogs 'joms shing /_/bskal pa du ma'i dri ma sel/_/rig sngags yon tan sgrub byed pa/_/thub mchog rnams kyis rab tu gsungs/_/de gzigs dge ba du ma brnyes/_/sangs rgyas blo gros rgyas par gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros che/_/bskal pa gcig tu spyod pas 
[\[96b.2\]]kyang /_/rgyud mar sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing /_/spyod pa du ma 'byung ba yi/_/yon tan brgya yi spos ldan 'di/_/thos pa spro bar mi nus so/_/longs spyod rgya mtsho chen po can/_/byang chub sems mchog dkyil 'khor du/_/rgyal mchog rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'i/_/phyir 
[\[96b.3\]]mi ldog pa'i chos can ldan/_/'di thos sangs rgyas spyod pa yis/_/sems can kun gyi sdig pa rnams/_/ma lus rab tu bsal nas ni/_/blo chen dri ma med par 'gyur/_/zhi zhing dag byed bkra shis la/_/rdul med brgyan te zhi bar byed/_/dge zhing mya ngan thams cad sel/_/
[\[96b.4\]]sdug bsngal thams cad nges par 'joms/_/dbang byed gsang sngags dam pa ste/_/sa stengs sdig pa thams cad sel/_/ma smad 'bras bu nges par sbyin/_/bstan pa yin te sdang ba 'dul/_/nyes pa byas pa sel ba yin/_/gzungs 'di gang gis thos gyur des/_/sangs rgyas rnyed par 
[\[96b.5\]]dka' ba yang /_/ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur/_/sgrib pa thams cad rab zhi zhing /_/khyab bdag nyon mongs kun sel ba/_/gang zhig nyon mongs zhi byed pa'i/_/gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa yis/_/kun tu bzang po nyid dang ni/_/lag na rdo rje nyid kyang 'thob/_/rig sngags 
[\[96b.6\]]'chang gi bdag po yang /_/'di thos pas ni thob par 'gyur/_/'jig rten kun na lham me ba/_/bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyang /_/dkyil 'khor dam pa gting med pa/_/'di ni ji srid ma gsan par/_/rab zhi nyon mongs 'dul ba yi/_/rang byung go 'phang ma brnyes te/_/rnam par dag 
[\[96b.7\]]phyir gsan gyur nas/_/gsan ma thag tu rnam par dag_/de phyir phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/legs par 'dod pas brjod par bya/_/gzhan gyis mi thub gzungs gsan nas/_/thub pa kun gyis gang brnyes pa/_/'khor ba 'dir ni nam du yang /_/bdud kyi las dang 'khrug med dang /_/mya ngan med cing 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]'thab med pa/_/gzungs la gnas pas thob par 'gyur/_gnas kyi dam pa thob nas kyang /_/thub pa dri ma med pa'i blo/_/gzigs pa bzang rnams gar gshegs pa'i/_/bzang 'gro der ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/legs pa 'dod pa rnams kyis ni/_/tshig gi mdo 'di mnyan par 
[\[97a.2\]]gyis/_/nyon mongs zad par bya ba la/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i gzungs 'di mchog_/sdig pa byed cing dge la sdang /_/sdig pa'i rang bzhin rab 'jungs pa/_/gang gis thos nas de spang ba/_/nga yis mngon sum 'byor bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa gzhan yang mi bya zhing /_/snga ma rnams kyang 
[\[97a.3\]]bshags par bya/_/gzungs mchog 'di yi mthu stobs kyis/_/sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur/_/tshe rabs gzhan ni stong dag dang /_/tshe rabs bye ba phrag brgyar yang /_/sdig pa mi dge gang byas pa/_/dag 'gyur 'di la the tsom med/_/yar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad dang /_/de bzhin 
[\[97a.4\]]tshes ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la/_/bsnyen gnas legs par lhur blangs la/_/cho ga bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod/_/de nas rmongs pa med par yang /_/nyon mongs dgra ni rab 'joms shing /_/shin tu thub dka' dpe med pa/_/nyes pa zlog pa'i gzungs brjod na/_/thub pa'i zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od/_/'bar 
[\[97a.5\]]ba nges par mthong bar 'gyur/_/de nas tshogs rnams rdzogs pa yi/_/rgyal ba'i sras po nyid du 'gyur/_/'od dpag med la mnga' ba yi/_/yon tan mtha' yas rab brgyan pa/_/bskal pa bye ba stong du yang /_/mtha' mi rtogs pa thob par 'gyur/_/de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyi tshig_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[97a.6\]]dag na gnas rnams kyis/_/thos nas rgyan rnams sna tshogs pa/_/bcom ldan 'das la 'bul bar byed/_/rdo rje ral gri la sogs pa/_/lha bdag gsal ba thams cad dang /_/ri bo ti se ri rab la/_/gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang /_/de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po na/_/
[\[97a.7\]]'khod pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang /_/ma la ya yi ri bo la/_/gnas shing rgyan 'bar thogs rnams dang /_/khyab 'jug lha chen la sogs pa/_/lha yi bdag po rnams dang ni/_/lag na rdo rje la sogs pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen rnams/_/nor bu'i dpung rgyan rna cha dang /_/
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]rgyan rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i lus/_/rab tu bskyod de langs nas ni/_/sdig bral mnga' bdag rgyal ba la/_/phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar byas nas/_/kun gyis sa yi dbang phyug po/_/thub mchog dam pa de la ni/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod/_/mnyam nyid chos de de bzhin 
[\[97b.2\]]nyid/_/shin tu rtogs pa lam me ba/_/dul ba brtan pa dri ma sel/_/dri ma med pa skyon bral ba/_/thub pa sangs rgyas shin tu zhi/_/'jig rten mgon po skye dgu'i bdag_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs thul/_/de bzhin rgyal ba rdul bsal ba/_/ston pa ston mdzad brtan pa ste/_/
[\[97b.3\]]sdig pa med pa rdul dang bral/_/'jig rten mgon po snang mdzad pa/_/dag pa zhi ba zas gtsang sras/_/nyon mongs rab bcom phan 'dogs pa/_/ston pa po ste dri ma sel/_/spyod tshul dri med tshul bzang ba/_/zab pa rnam par gnon pa brtan/_/btsan po thugs brtse rnam par rgyal/_/
[\[97b.4\]]mgon po de bzhin mgon mdzad pa/_/zhi ba'i bdag nyid zhe sdang bral/_/bcings pa las grol nges par grol/_/'jig rten kun mchog 'khra ba'i sa/_/bdag gir mi 'dzin dri ma med/_/nyon mongs sel ba dpal dang ldan/_/dpal mdzad de bzhin phan pa mdzad/_/mnyam pa med pa dpe med 
[\[97b.5\]]pa/_/khyab bdag nyon mongs las rnams spong /_/khengs pa med pa dman pa med/_/mnyam pa de bzhin mi mnyam mnyam/_/snang ba brnyes pa snang byed med/_/'jig rten snang mdzad sdig med pa/_/sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ste/_/'jig rten kun la phan par brtson/_/dpa' bo zhi ba zhi mdzad 
[\[97b.6\]]pa/_/nyon mongs dgra rnams zad par mdzad/_/mnga' bdag thabs mkhyen thabs che ba/_/sems can kun gyi 'khra sa lags/_/don yod rnyed dka' blo dang ldan/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thub par dka'/_/skyob pa 'jigs sel tshangs pa ste/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas chos 'dzin pa/_/dpa' 
[\[97b.7\]]bo chen po 'jigs pa med/_/gzugs bzang mtshan rnams gsal ba ste/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba/_/chos kyi longs spyod rgya mtsho lags/_/dpe byad bzang po bkod pa yis/_/spras pa'i bdag nyid ya mtshan ston/_/dka' ba med pa'i ston pa po/_/de bzhin des pa bde sbyin pa/_/
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]mthu can yangs pa rgya che ba/_/bdud bzhi'i stobs rnams sel mdzad pa/_/brtson chen spro ba che ba ste/_/dgyes pa chen po stobs po che/_/mthu brnyes brtan pa chen po ste/_/gnas ldan dbang gis dar ba lags/_/gsal ba gsung ldan dpe med pa/_/dge ba 
[\[98a.2\]]stong pa nyid kyis rgyal/_/rab tu zhi ba mun pa med/_/blo gros chen po chos 'dzin pa/_/phun sum tshogs ldan sa chen brnyes/_/'dod pa rnams ni 'dul mdzad pa/_/dpal mdzad dpal mnga' dpal dang ldan/_/dpal gyi longs spyod shin tu rgyas/_/bcom ldan legs bsgos bsgo 
[\[98a.3\]]bar mdzad/_/gsung ldan bkra shis rgyal ba'i gnas/_/mnyam nyid mnyam pa nyid mkhyen pa/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan dpag med/_/rab tu dgyes la longs spyod gsal/_/gzhi bcas sems pa mnyam pa lags/_/blo dag blo ldan dri ma spangs/_/gnas chen brtan par ldan pa ste/_/
[\[98a.4\]]rgyas par longs spyod dri ma med/_/thub pa thugs rje'i rgyan mnga' ba/_/skal ba bzang po 'jigs pa'i skyabs/_/de bzhin 'jigs med nyon mongs sel/_/dri med skyon bral longs spyod can/_/sna tshogs 'od ldan dkyil 'khor mdzes/_/sku bzang dge ba'i rim pa mchog_/thugs rje'i 'od 
[\[98a.5\]]ldan 'od bzang ba/_/mi gnas longs spyod dam pa lags/_/chos kyi rgyu ste yon tan gnas/_/rjed 'os mchog gnas longs spyod che/_/nam mkha' mtshan te rnam dag blo/_/rin chen gzugs 'dra bkra shis pa/_/khyu mchog che spyan ba rdzi ma/_/rgyal ba skyon bsal shes rab can/_/shes 
[\[98a.6\]]rab thabs dang ldan pa ste/_/'jig rten mi dge kun las 'das/_/dag par longs spyod brtan pa can/_/sa dang stobs dang ye shes bzod/_/pha rol phyin pa kun la mnga'/_/ting 'dzin mnyam par longs spyod pa/_/rnam thar sgo la mngon sum pa/_/gtong ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/_/
[\[98a.7\]]chos chen bde bar 'char ba lags/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul las 'das/_/spyod yul sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po rgyal/_/dam pa'i don te tshul che ba/_/shes bya'i yul rnams mtha' dag la/_/sgrib pa med par 'char ba brnyes/_/rigs chen mthun par 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]skyes pa ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i gnas/_/khyad par brnyes pa mnyam nyid brnyes/_/mi mnyam sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/_/don chen shin tu mthar phyin pa/_/nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'/_/dge sbyong sdig pa sbyong mdzad pa/_/gnod pa med par bde bar 
[\[98b.2\]]'byin/_/blo rgya che ba thams cad mkhyen/_/thos pa'i mtshon cha ma lus gsan/_/dkon pa bde ba thob 'gyur ba/_/mnyam pa khyad par yul dang ldan/_/'jig rten thams cad dar mdzad mgon/_/zhi gnas mtshon cha thub par dka'/_/bsam gyis mi khyab bsam yas yul/_/
[\[98b.3\]]dpe med pa ste dper bya ba/_/'od bzang rab dgyes dpal dang ldan/_/legs gsung blo yi stobs kyis 'byung /_/mkhas pa zhal bzang bde sbyin pa/_/rab dgyes 'das pa'i spyod yul can/_/gsung ba chen po ye shes che/_/gnas chen bkra shis chen po ste/_/mchod par gyur pa 
[\[98b.4\]]yul las 'das/_/bya ba'i mtshan nyid med pa po/_/sangs rgyas yul du skyes pa ste/_/shes bya'i spyod yul rgya che ba/_/kun mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu can/_/'jig rten dbang 'das spyod yul ba/_/kun mkhyen yul gyi snang ba ste/_/thabs mnga' phun sum tshogs ldan pa/_/rdzu 
[\[98b.5\]]'phrul rol pa'i thabs dang ldan/_/chos kyi gar thabs ston pa po/_/rab ston yon tan sgyur mdzad pa/_/spyod pa ma lus 'dul bar mdzad/_/yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par da ga_/sangs rgyas spyod yul rnam sangs rgyas/_/bgegs byed ma legs byed pa bcom/_/bdud kyi dregs pa 
[\[98b.6\]]sel bar mdzad/_/g.yul ngor rnam par rgyal ba brnyes/_/dpa' bo chen po pham med stobs/_/theg pa chen po'i shing rta bcibs/_/blo chen brgal bar dka' ba yi/_/nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i pha rol gshegs/_/theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/_/theg pa mchog la longs spyod pa/_/
[\[98b.7\]]nyan thos 'das pa'i spyod yul can/_/rang rgyal las kyang 'das pa ste/_/sangs rgyas sa yi 'bras bur gnas/_/gong nas gong du khyad par mkhyen/_/khyod ni nam mkha'i gnas na bzhugs/_/bde 'byung sa dang zhing rnams kyi/_/mtsho chen dag la longs par spyod/_/sangs rgyas dbang po 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]rgyas pa la/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas/_/de la lha sogs tshogs rnams kyis/_/phyag byas mgo smad phyogs gcig 'khod/_/de nas dkyil 'khor chen po na/_/gnas pa ma lus chem mer 'khod/_/thod du rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba/_/langs nas cod pan rab tu g.yos/_/
[\[99a.2\]]dkyil 'khor mthon po thams cad du/_/skad ber chen pos yongs bkang nas/_/nor bu'i rgyan ni rnam g.yo zhing /_/ha ha grags pa'i sgra sgrogs te/_/kye ma sangs rgyas yon tan che/_/bskal pa grangs med gsum bsags pa/_/byang chub sems sogs mchog rnams kyis/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[99a.3\]]legs par brjod/_/kye ma rnyed dang bde 'byung ba/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos nas kyang /_/gang zhig klog cing rgyal la bstod/_/'bras bu chen po 'grub par 'gyur/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags bcas pa/_/bcom ldan 'das drung brjod na ni/_/sgrib dang kun nas nyon mongs dang /_/sdig pa thams 
[\[99a.4\]]cad dag pa 'thob/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na/_/sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhing /_/nyon mongs mtha' dag rnam par spong /_/shes rab chen po nyid du 'gyur/_/de ni longs spyod chen po dang /_/bde ba las kyang nyams mi 'gyur/_/de ni tshe rabs thams cad du/_/blo ldan tshe rabs dran 
[\[99a.5\]]par 'gyur/_/de nas rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba/_/yon tan mtha' yas sras de la/_/bcom ldan bdud las rgyal ba yis/_/mngon sum gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/_/rgyal ba'i sa 'di zhi ba ste/_/nga rgyal la sogs nyon mongs 'joms/_/'jig rten bde ba kun las 'das/_/de bzhin gshegs bde 
[\[99a.6\]]mngon du phyogs/_/gzhan gyis mi tshugs gzungs dang ni/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan byed pa/_/de dag rnam dag bdag nyid de/_/sems can kun la bde 'dod pa/_/lan cig thos pa tsam gyis kyang /_/de dag sa chen 'bras bur gnas/_/ring por mi thogs dga' 'gyur na/_/'chang sogs lta la 
[\[99a.7\]]ci zhig smos/_/de phyir rtag tu rab bsgrims la/_/gtan du bde ba 'dod pa yis/_/yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i gzungs/_/mnyan par bya zhing bcang bar bya/_/gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod/_/bdag nyid kyis kyang bton na ni/_/de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur la/_/gnod pa dang yang phrad mi 'gyur/_/
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]'di ni yon tan kun gyi snod/_/dge ba phun sum tshogs sbyin pa/_/kun mkhyen bla med 'bras bu'i mchog_/bde 'byung thob par byed pa yin/_/'bras bu 'byor pa ci yang rung /_/thob par mi 'gyur dogs pa med/_/kun mkhyen go 'phang thob gyur nas/_/dpe med gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/
[\[99b.2\]]de ni dge zhing 'bras bur ldan/_/sangs rgyas sa yi 'bras bu sbyin/_/yid du 'ong zhing yon tan ldan/_/snying rje dri ma med sbyin pa/_/'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo/_/'jig rten kun nas dga' ba ste/_/'jig rten kun gyi bde ba 'byung /_/'di dang 'dra ba gang yang med/_/ston pa sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[99b.3\]]ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//_//[{D533}]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_mu ni mu ni ma hA mu na ye swA hA/_lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na bskal pa bye ba brgya 
[\[99b.4\]]phrag brgyad khri'i bar du sdig pa byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa shAkya thub pa'i snying po'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//[{D534}]dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags 
[\[99b.5\]]pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ka la ka la/_ki li ki li/_bi ri bi ri/_hu ru hu ru/_bai ro tsa na rasmi sany+tso di te A gats+tsha/_Ar+ya A kA sha gar+b+ha ma hA kA ru Ni kA pU ra ya ha shA na/_
[\[99b.6\]]d+hA ra ya bud+d+he bish+tsa ya na/_tsa ra tsa ra/_tsi ri tsi ri swA hA/_bton pas 'grub ste/_mtshon cha dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_dug dang /_dug sbyar ma dang /_byad stems rnams kyis mi tshugs so/_/rgyal po dang /_chom rkun la sogs pa thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do/_/gang du bris te bzhag pa der 
[\[99b.7\]]yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_'go ba'i nad thams cad mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//[{D535}]zla ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_tsan+d+re tsan+d+re/_su tsan+d+re/_ma ti tsan+d+ra tsan+d+ra ki ra Na/_si ri si ri/_bud+d+hA ng+hiSh+Thi te/_ki li ki li/_d+harmA d+hiSh+Thi te/_ki li ki li/_saM g+hA d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rtag tu nang par langs te/_zla ba'i 
[\[100a.2\]]'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dran par byed pa de ni bskal pa bzhi khrir tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/_de ni ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rjes su dran pas yon tan de rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs so//_//[{D536}]namaHsarba 
[\[100a.3\]]ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/_a nu ga te oM ku ruM gi ni swA hA/_'di lan cig bzlas pas kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang zad par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyi'i snying po rjes su dran pa rdzogs so//_//[{D537}]sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 
[\[100a.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na shi khi ne/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_rat+ne rat+ne rat+na shi khi ne swA hA/_'chi ba'i tshe dran na ngan song kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_/'chi 'phos nas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar skye'o/_/sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi 
[\[100a.5\]]mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs so//[ {D538}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_pU dza me g+ha nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_mchod pa'i sprin zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_badzra sA ra pra marda ni/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[100a.6\]]oM badzre badzre/_ma hA badzre/_ma hA te dza badzre/_ma hA bid+yA badzre/_ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta badzre/_ma hA bo d+hi maN+Do pa saM kra ma Na badzre/_sarba kar+m+ma A bar Na bi sho d+ha na badzre swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_dran pa tsam gyi mod la phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i 
[\[100a.7\]]klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyur zhing zhabs la phyag byas par 'gyur ro/_/me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan thams cad dang /_gdan dang /_gding ba dang /_na bza' dang /_spyan gzigs 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]dang /_bshos gtsang ba la sogs pa dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong bas yang dag par dbugs 'byin 
[\[100b.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang /_lag na rdo rje la sogs pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams phyi bzhin yang dag par 'brang zhing 
[\[100b.3\]]srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed par byed do/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/_yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag ni ma bsgrubs par lan cig dran pa tsam gyis thob par 'gyur ro/_/mchod pa'i sprin zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//[{D539}]oM na 
[\[100b.4\]]mo b+ha ga ba te rat+na ke tu rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M rat+ne rat+ne ma hA rat+ne rat+na bi dza ye swA hA/_zhes lan brgyad brjod pas phyag bya'o//_//[{D539a}]na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo ng+hi sa twA nAM/_sarba tra saM ku su mi dA b+hi dz+nyA rA si ni na mo stu te swA hA/_zhes lan brgyad brjod pas bstod pa'o//_//
[\[100b.5\]{D539b}]o~M sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza me g+ha pra sa ra sa mU he s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na kaM hU~M zhes pas mchod pa byin gyis brlab po//_//[{D539c}]na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo ng+hi sa twA nAM/_sarba thA ut+ga te s+pha ra na i maM ga ga na khaM sa man+ta swA hA/_zhes lan brgyad brjod pas mchod pa'i sprin 'byung ngo //_//[{D539d}]na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo ng+hi 
[\[100b.6\]]satwe b+h+yaH/_sarba bi ta pU ra pU ra/_a brtA a b+ha ye swA hA/_zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa dang nye gnas dang zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas par 'gyur ro//_//[{D539e}]dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M sma ra sma ra/_bi sma na ska ra ma hA dza ba hU~M zhes brjod cing rin po che 
[\[100b.7\]]brdar bas rin po che'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i char dpag tu med pa nam mkha'i khams gang bar bsam la dbul lo/_/rin po che brdar ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//[{D539f}]dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M ta ra ta ra/_ti ri ti ri/_tu ru tu ru/_ka la ka la/_ki li ki li/_ku lu ku lu/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_b+hi ri b+hi ri/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_b+ha ya b+ha ya/_
[\[101a.2\]]ku ru ku ru/_sarba karma A bar Na dza ni me sha pra b+ha ya swA hA/_dz+wa la ni bi d+ha ni bai swA hA/_ku ru pany+tsa li swA hA/_sA ga ra saM bi re swA hA/_sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_nang par langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig lon pa'i tshe 
[\[101a.3\]]las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/_/spyan lnga yang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/de la mig nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lus la nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yid kyi nyes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/spyan lnga yang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du yid rnam par dag 
[\[101a.4\]]pa lnga yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_chos thos pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa dang 'bral bar mi 
[\[101a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/lus mdzes par 'gyur ro/_/sems dang bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D540}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_su rU pa nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_su rU pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal 
[\[101a.6\]]lo/_/namaHsu rU pA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saMmyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM su ru su ru/_pra su ru pra su ru/_ta ra ta ra/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/_sma ra sma ra/_san+tar+pa ya san+tar+pa ya/_sarba pre tA nAM swA hA/_gzungs 'dis chu dang bcas pa'i zan la lan bdun yongs su bzlas te lag pa g.yon pas se gol 
[\[101a.7\]]gyi sgra lan gsum du byas nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]thams cad la dben pa'i sa phyogs su sbyin par bya zhing /_'di skad kyang brjod par bya ste/_skabs tshol ba dang glags lta ba rnams dengs shig_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams la bza' ba 'di bdag gis sbyin par bgyi'o zhes pa'o/_/
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]zas ma zos pa'i sngon rol nyid du sbyin par bya'o/_/de ltar na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]thams cad la 'bras bre bo che re re'i bza' ba so sor byin par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar byas na skye ba nas skye bar yang nyam chung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dbul por mi 'gyur ro/_/stobs che ba dang /_mdzes pa dang /_mthong na dga' ba dang /_phyug 
[\[101b.2\]]cing longs spyod che bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gzugs legs zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs 
[\[101b.3\]]so//[ {D541}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya aSh+Ta ma hA b+ha ya tA rA ni nA mad+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la 
[\[101b.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsal dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mchog la phyag 'tshal 
[\[101b.5\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'jigs pa med par byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_d+ha re d+ha re/_d+hA re d+hA ra NI/_ra na ko te a b+ha 
[\[101b.6\]]yA kalpe/_kalpe ni ga Ni/_a nan+ta kalpe/_a mr-i ta kalpe/_hu tA sha re/_a nan+ta mu khe/_a nan+ta tsak+Shu sa mut+ga te/_o~M b+ha swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag ni sems can ngan song du 'gro ba rnams kyi don gyi phyir/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis 
[\[101b.7\]]gsungs pa dang /_byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa de 'jigs pa brgyad po sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /_bgrod dka' ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /_skye ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /_nad kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /_'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas 
[\[102a.2\]]pa dag las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/sems rnam par g.yeng ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byed cing /_sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur/_zad mi shes pa'i lus thob par 'gyur/_
[\[102a.3\]]sprul pa'i lus kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/namaHsarba bid+yA/_sid d+h+y+ha na tu me man tra pA da swA hA/_'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D542}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bi she Sha ba ti nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa khyad par can 
[\[102a.4\]]zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das sbrul gyi lo'i dgun zla ra ba'i tshes nyi shu la yul phug ron can na/_grong khyer siny+tso zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/_
[\[102a.5\]]de'i tshe dge slong tshe brjod ces bya ba don cig gi phyir grong khyer gnas song zhes bya bar song ste/_dge slong de rgya yul gyi grong khyer nas dpag tshad brgya'i lam du phyin pa dang /_dge slong des bar der mi lus chen po khrun du mtho sum cu yod pa/_bzhin mtho bzhi pa zhig rgyang ring po nas mthong 
[\[102a.6\]]ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dge slong tshe brjod des mi de lta bu de la 'di snyam du bsams te/_kye ma mi 'di ni lus che ste/_'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin du nges so snyam nas/_des pus mo gnyis ka'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_mi lus chen po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_
[\[102a.7\]]mi lus chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ste/_'di na gda' 'am/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_dge slong de de bzhin no/_/dge slong des smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci'i slad du 'di na gda'/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/_dge slong 'dzam 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]bu'i gling 'dir sems can rnams la nad rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ste/_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri za rnams ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ngos gcig la gnas so/_/des nyi zla'i 'od kyang mi mngon/_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_gza' dang /_rgyu skar rnams kyang nam mkha'i bar 
[\[102b.2\]]skabs na mi snang ngo /_/de'i tshe lha dang /_lha ma yin kyang g.yul 'gyed de/_g.yul bkye ba dang /_lha rnams ni pham/_lha ma yin rnams ni rgyal te/_de'i tshe 'byung po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams la nad gtong ste/_'di lta ste/_lkog ma'i lha gor dang /_'brum 
[\[102b.3\]]phran dang /_me dbal dang /_lto na ba dang /_rims nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa dang /_rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_klad pa na ba dang /_phol mig dang /_g.yan pa dang /_
[\[102b.4\]]tshad pa dang /_mig nad la sogs pa nye bar sgrub bo/_/'di lta ste/_char ches pa dang /_than pa dang /_dus ma yin pa'i char gyis lo tog phun sum tshogs pa'i 'ongs 'phrog sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog_/tshe dang /_stobs dang /_mdog dang /_gzugs 'phrog ste/_de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na 
[\[102b.5\]]sems can thams cad nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su nyen to/_/gtum po seng ge dang /_spyang ki dang /_stag dang /_sbrul la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog ste/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la dus ma yin par chud za ba nye bar gnas pas sems can rnams nad 
[\[102b.6\]]las thar bar bya ba yang dka' ste/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rgan pa dang /_bar ma dang /_gzhon pa dag las dkrigs phrag sum cu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir nga dge slong khyod kyi gan du 'ongs kyis/_khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[102b.7\]]'di sgrogs shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad ni 'di snyam du bdag cag ji ltar sdug bsngal gyis bcings pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur snyam du re ba'i phyir ro/_/de lta bas na dge slong khyod kyis sems can thams cad la mdo 'di sgrogs te/_sems 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir nan tan gyis shig_/dkon mchog gsum la rtag par rgyun du dad par gyis shig_/lha rjed cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams sam/_sku gzugs rnams la spos dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa rnams 
[\[103a.2\]]kyis mchod par gyis shig_/khyad par can gyi gzungs kyang lhogs shig_/nyi ma bdun yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong la nye bar gnas par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo yangs zab mo 'brug bsgrags rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_
[\[103a.3\]]bi pu la gardzi te/_bi pu la swA re/_bi pu la yo ni she/_a na la se/_a na la sam b+ha be/_a na la sa ga tiM ga te swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_he ma he ma/_ha ma ha ma swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[103a.4\]]tad+ya thA/_a mi tod+b+ha be/_a mi ta saM b+ha b+ha be/_a mi ta bi krAn+te/_a mi ta pi krAn+ti ka re/_a mi ta ga ga na kIrti ka re swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ga ga na sa A ka ra/_ga ga na saM b+ha bi/_ga ga na kIrte ka re swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 
[\[103a.5\]]spos mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sa ma sa me swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis 'brug bsgrags gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_a sa ma sa me swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa nga rgyal gnon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[103a.6\]]tad+ya thA/_ma na bi shud+d+he/_pad+me shwa re/_pad+ma saM b+ha be/_king ka re/_hi ta~M ka rI ye swA hA/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrib pa thams cad rnam 
[\[103a.7\]]par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_shwe ta ka ra b+he dz+wa li ne swA hA/_dzaM b+ha ne/_sta~M b+ha ne/_mo ha ne swA hA/_pauN+Ta ri kA ya swA hA/_ho me d+harme/_d+harmA tsan+tA ye swA hA/_d+ha re b+hi d+ha re/_ka la bing+ka ru ta yai swA hA/_shAn+te kAn+ne ni rbA pa N+ye swA hA/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_bi du ru d+hi ye swA hA/_
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]bi ma la pra tsun+dA yai swA hA/_a ba lo ki ta/_bi lo ki tA yai swA hA/_Adz+nyA na pi d+ha ma n+yai swA hA/_pad+ma swa re/_pad+ma sa~M b+ha be/_king ka re hi tang ka rI ye swA hA/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_tsan+d+ra pra b+he/_tsan+d+ra na 
[\[103b.2\]]gar+b+he/_tsan+d+ra na tsUr+Ne/_ke kai la sa ba ti/_sarba bud+d+ha/_a d+hiSh+Thi ta a nu mo di te swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_dza ye dza ye/_dza ya la b+he/_dza yam hA ma he swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[103b.3\]]po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ga ga na ar+ye/_ga ga na sa mung+ga te/_ga ga na bi krAn+ta/_bi krAn+ta/_e dzi me dzi/_pad+mo dzi swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_he b+ha dre/_ma hA b+ha dre/_a 
[\[103b.4\]]ti b+ha dre/_sa man+ta b+ha dre/_bi ga ta rA dza se/_ma hA bi ga ta rA dza se/_a ti bi ga ta rA dza se/_he ma ba ti/_karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_mai tri mai tri/_mai tri ma na se swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags 
[\[103b.5\]]pa nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_gar+b+he/_gar+b+he/_gar+b+ha bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ak+Sha ye nu/_ak+Sha ye phu/_ak+Sha ya karma bi sho d+ha ne phu swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med 
[\[103b.6\]]par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_kIrti tA/_sarba dzi nai/_a b+hi kIrti tA/_sarba dzi nai/_badzrA ka re/_badzra sa~M b+ha be/_badzra be dA kA re swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sarbA pa ra Na bi ska~M b+hi n+yai swA hA/_d+hA tu bi 
[\[103b.7\]]ka ra N+yai swA hA/_me g+ha bi s+pho Ta me swA hA/_a pa rA dzi ta kA yai swA hA/_ba la da da n+yai swA hA/_bo d+h+yang da da n+yai swA hA/_karma ni r+b+ha bi ta kA yai swA hA/_e kA rA mA yai swA hA/_yo ga tsA rA yai swA hA/_sarba bud+d+hA b+hi Shik+tA yai swA hA/_brah+mo pa ku tA yai swA hA/_sarba d+harmA b+hi Shi k+tA yai swA hA/_sarba bud+d+hA 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]b+hi Shik+tA yai swA hA/_e ka shring gA yai swA hA/_a shring grA yai swA hA/_b+hU tA yai swA hA/_a sa~M b+hU tA yai swA hA/_sarba duHkho pra sha ma n+yai swA hA/_zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_tsan+d+ra pra b+he/_su pra b+he/_pra b+hA ka re/_pra b+hot+ga te/_pra b+hot+ga te/_pra b+ha ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_d+harma bi shud+d+he/_
[\[104a.2\]]karmA bi shud d+hir+b+ha ba tu me swA hA/_tshe brjod gang la la zhig rig sngags 'dis nyin zhag bdun du nyin lan bdun mtshan lan bdun du byab pa byas na/_des las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong bdun la zan sbyin no/_/me las me spel bar bya'o/_/mtshan mo mar 
[\[104a.3\]]me thogs te mchod rten la bsti stang du byas la bskor bar bya'o/_/dam pa'i chos bri ba dang bklag pa la brtson par bya'o/_/gal te yams kyi nad cher byung na khyim nas khyim dang /_grong nas grong dang /_grong khyer nas grong khyer du gan d+ha ra sa'i bdug pa dang gtor ma dang /_lha bshos kyis 
[\[104a.4\]]mchod par bya'o/_/nad pa gang yin pa des kyang cho ga 'di bzhin byas na de myur du nad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[104a.5\]]'di 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston na de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces 
[\[104a.6\]]smras so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas skye bo thams cad kyi rna lam du grag par 'gyur bar yul nas yul dang /_grong khyer nas grong khyer dang /_grong nas grong du bskur bar bya'o/_/yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe brjod rigs kyi 
[\[104a.7\]]bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lan gcig bklags na de bdag nyid thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sus lan gnyis bklags na de bu dang chung ma dang lhan cig thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sus lan gsum bklags na de rtsa lag gi tshogs kyi skye bo dang bcas te thar bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]sus lan bzhi bklags na/_de yul 'khor thams cad kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sus lan lnga bklags na/_de nye 'khor gyi rgyal po dang bcas pa thar bar 'gyur ro/_/yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[104b.2\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du yul gzhan dag tu bskur bar bya ste/_der yang yon tan 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe brjod gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos la mi 'dzin tam/_mi klog gam/_yi ger mi 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir mi 'jug gam/_kun 
[\[104b.3\]]chub par mi byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu mi ston tam/_yul gzhan du mi 'byin tam/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te mi nyan tam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su mi sngo na mtshams med pa
