[\[104b.4\]]lnga byed pa rnams kyi 'gro ba ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar mngon par 'grub ste/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis smad pa'o/_/yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe brjod su zhig 'di tshad mar mi byed pa de ni ngas 
[\[104b.5\]]thog ma nyid du dad par byas pa ma yin no/_/'di ltar 'dzam bu gling pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/_nga ri'i rgyal po ri rab la song ste/_lha dang /_dri za rnams la rjes su bstan pa dang mthun par sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan bya'o/_/de skad 
[\[104b.6\]]ces smras nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/dge slong tshe brjod kyis kyang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa la mngon par bstod de bzung nas song ngo /_/'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs 
[\[104b.7\]]so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]{D543}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya many+dzu shrI mU la tan+t+ra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi 
[\[105a.2\]]nam mkha'i dkyil na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs so so tha dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba/_so sor rab tu gnas pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i 
[\[105a.3\]]bu dag khyed cag nyon cig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 
[\[105a.4\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba/_tshe dang nad med pa dang dbang phyug dang /_yid la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i sngags kyi gzhi dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir bshad par bya ste/_de shin du legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas bshad par 
[\[105a.5\]]bya'o/_/de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dang /_sa chen po thob par bya ba dang /_rdo rje'i gdan gnon pa dang /_bdud gdul ba dang /_
[\[105a.6\]]chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba dang /_lha rnams dang mi rnams su skye bar bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_dbul ba dang /_nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa/_longs spyod kyis phyug pa 'dren par byed pa/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten 
[\[105a.7\]]las 'das pa'i sngags kyi spyod pas phongs par mi byed pa/_re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung 'bras bu med par byed pa ma yin pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i thugs dang /_phan pa'i thugs dang bdag dang sems can thams 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]cad la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas bcom ldan 'das de bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams dang gnas gtsang ma'i gnas la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas/_dag pa'i yul la 'od rnam par spros te/_yul rnam par 'jigs pa 
[\[105b.2\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu mdzod spu nas me tog kun tu skyes pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od phyung ste/_'od bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor gyis bcom 
[\[105b.3\]]ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas/_byang shar gyi phyogs su brgya stong gi gang gA'i klung gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/_me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rjes su zhugs te/_gang na me 
[\[105b.4\]]tog kun du skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par ro/_/der yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa dang ldan pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par gyur to/_/'jam dpal 
[\[105b.5\]]gzhon nur gyur pas 'od zer gyi snang ba de mthong nas/_bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag la smras pa/_rgyal ba'i sras dag 'od 'di ni nga la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yin gyis/_khyed cag g.yeng ba med par gyis shig 
[\[105b.6\]]ces smras so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mig mi 'dzums shing kha bye bas/_'od gang na ba de logs su mngon du bltas nas 'dug go/_/de nas bskul ba'i 'od des me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen 
[\[105b.7\]]pos snang bar byas te/_me tog kun du skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor nub par gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/_
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das me tog kun du yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das me tog kun du skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po la 'di skad ces 
[\[106a.2\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la dgongs te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_sngags thams cad kyi spyod 
[\[106a.3\]]pa dang /_sgrub thabs dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_cho ga dang /_gsang ba dang /_cho ga zhib mo dang /_cho ga'i ngo bo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang /_gsang ba dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dbang bskur ba bstan pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad 
[\[106a.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas mchi bar 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces bcom ldan 'das me tog kun du skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs pa na/_
[\[106a.5\]]phyogs bzhi mtha' yas mu med pa steng dang 'og dang thad ka thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyogs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag par gang bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dang bcom ldan 'das dang bcas pas/_rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/_/'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[106a.6\]]gyi khyad par la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi nus/_byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa dang /_sa bcu la gnas pa dag gis kyang snyoms par zhugs par mi nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog kun du yang dag par skyes 
[\[106a.7\]]pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par bgros te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba/_don thams cad sgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa ni yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba/_
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]sems can thams cad kyi las thams cad byed pa sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par can bzang po yang sgrub par byed pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa yud tsam zhig cang mi gsung bar gyur te/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[106b.2\]]thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang yang dag par dgongs nas/_byams pa'i thugs kyis sngags gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM aM maM/_'di ni 'jam dpal gyi snying po mchog yin te las thams cad byed pa'o/_/de nas 
[\[106b.3\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang /_brkyang ba las bskum pa'am sel gol gtogs pa tsam mam/_mig 'byed 'dzums tsam la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi shugs blo ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i 
[\[106b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su chas te slar 'khod nas/_steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na nor bu rin po che rab tu gnas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams gnas su 'dug ste/_gnas gtsang ma'i 
[\[106b.5\]]gnas de thams cad 'od chen po'i snang bas gsal bar byas te/_'od kyi rin po ches rab tu brgyan cing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_
[\[106b.6\]]rin po che'i gdugs dang dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du ma rgya che ba'i lha'i gos dang /_dar mang po'i tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/
[\[106b.7\]]'on kyang nga'i bkas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa nyung ngam/_nyam nga ba chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhu bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas 'jam 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gzhan yang gzhon nu gang gA'i klung brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi sngags kyi spyod pa dang /_dkyil 'khor dang cho ga zhib mo dang 
[\[107a.2\]]gsang ba dang /_dbang bskur ba dang phyag rgya'i tshogs dang cho ga dang sbyin sreg dang /_bzlas pa dang brtul zhugs bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa/_'od rin po che'i tshogs kyis rab 'byam 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs 
[\[107a.3\]]pa'i shes pa rgyal po'i dbang phyug lung ston par byed pa/_sngags bzla ba yul gyi mthar 'gro bar byed pa mi snang bar byed pa dang /_dus dang dam tshig rab 'byam gyi tshogs thams cad dang /_'jig rten pa ma lus pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[107a.4\]]dpa' dang 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'byung ba'i spyod pa mthar thug pa gsungs pa dang /_gsung ba dang /_gsung bar 'gyur ba yin te/_de ltar rjes su yi rang ba nyid de/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 
[\[107a.5\]]mngon sum du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur te/_khyod kyang ston par 'gyur ro/_/'dir yang gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_a tsin t+ya a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_oM sma ra sma ra a pra ti ha ta shA sa na ku mA ra rU pa ha ri Na/_oM hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[107a.6\]]pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs la/_gsung zhing gsung bar 'gyur la/_khyod kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas/_dbye ba dang rnam par dbye ba rgya cher ston par 'gyur te/_de bzhin 
[\[107a.7\]]gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya bas kyang las thams cad byed pa 'di rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/'dir snying po mchog tu gyur pa ni/_oM bA kye daM na maH/_'dir nye ba'i snying po ni bA kye hUM/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas gnang nas/_bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang rgyu mthun pa/_byang chub kyi snying po thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog rnam par bkod pa dang /_rgyal 
[\[107b.2\]]mtshan dang ba dan dang phreng ba'i tshogs dang /_rin po che'i dril bu'i dra bas 'brel pa snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par byed pa/_lha'i dri dang byug pa dang phreng ba dang phye ma'i char 'bab par mngon par sprul to/_/de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis 
[\[107b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas/_ba spu ldang zhing gnas g.yo ba mthong nas snying 'dar zhing dngangs te/_ci bdag cag gi 'byor pa nyams par ma gyur tam zhes phan tshun du rings par 'gro zhing skad mthon pos smra ba rtsom par byed de/_'di skad 
[\[107b.4\]]du bcom ldan 'das yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_/shAkya thub pa yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig_/byang chub sems 
[\[107b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan snga nas nga la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_don chen po'i spyod pa dang sngags kyi tshig dang /_rgya che zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi tshig ston pa'i 
[\[107b.6\]]phyir 'ongs pa yin no/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing zhabs gnyis la btud de/_tshig 'bru 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/_/skyes bu bskyed pa khyod 
[\[107b.7\]]phyag 'tshal/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skyes bu gtso bo khyod phyag 'tshal/_/spyod pa thams cad don sgrub pa/_/skyes bu seng ge khyod phyag 'tshal/_/phung khrol thams cad zlog byed pa/_/dpa' bo chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/_/ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig byed pa/_/skyes bu pad 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]dkar khyod phyag 'tshal/_/kun nas bsod nams dri ldan pa/_/skyes bu pad+ma khyod phyag 'tshal/_/srid gsum 'dam ni rnam dag byed/_/rnam grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sdug bsngal ma lus rnam grol byed/_/zhi gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thams cad ldan pa 
[\[108a.2\]]legs 'dul byed/_/thams cad grub pa khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sngags kyi spyod pa'i don sgrub byed/_/bkra shis khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa/_/sangs rgyas kun la khyod phyag 'tshal/_/chos kun rnam par rtogs mdzad pa/_/chos thams cad kyi de bzhin 
[\[108a.3\]]nyid spros pa med pa'i ngo bo la yang dag par rjes su zhugs shing ston par byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shes pa dang shes bya'i dngos po thams cad dang /_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang /_theg pa gsum gyi lam dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jog 
[\[108a.4\]]par byed pa dang /_gnas par byed pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig 'bru 'di dag brjod pa'i bstod pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di nas gang gA'i klung brgya phrag stong gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig 
[\[108a.5\]]rten gyi khams 'das nas/_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na me tog yang dag par skyes pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mchis te/_de na me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang du bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[108a.6\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa de chos ston te/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po tshig 'bru 
[\[108a.7\]]bzang po/_/ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su dkar ba tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par ston to/_/de da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/sngags kyi spyod pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang /_lam gsum gyi spyod pa'i 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]lam sgrub par byed pa/_skyob pa dang gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang /_bde ba dang shin tu mthar thug pa dang shin tu yongs su mthar phyin par byed pa sems can rnams la ston te/_bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis rjes su gnang nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung 'dir mchis so/_/bcom 
[\[108b.2\]]ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de yang /_bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri'o/_/'di skad kyang gsung ste/_gang du 'di lta bu'i snyigs ma lnga'i dus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub 
[\[108b.3\]]pa 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar to zhes so/_/de yang lam gsum dang byang grol dang mir skye ba thob pa nyid kyi chos ston par byed do/_/gang du'ang sems can gyi ris skal ba med pa dang /_srid pa gsum yang dag 'joms par byed pa'i lam dang gtan tu grub pa dang bde ba dang /_mthun pa'i mya ngan 
[\[108b.4\]]las 'das pa la sems can rnams dgod par byed pa'i bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i brtson 'grus ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen par 'gyur gyi/_bdag gis ci 
[\[108b.5\]]zhig 'tshal ba rngo thogs/_dbang phyug gis rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_rmad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa shes par ram/_'tshal bar ram/_thugs kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i sgrub pa dang /_
[\[108b.6\]]spyod pa 'tshal bar ram mdor na bskal pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi bar du'ang bstan par mi nus so/_/gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bsdus pa'am/_tha dad ma lus pa'i ngo bo 'di ni chos 'dus ma byas su blta bar bya ste/_mthong bas 
[\[108b.7\]]spang bar bya ba la brten pa'am/_yon tan ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kho nas mkhyen pa yin gyi bdag gis ni ma lags so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pas rin po che'i pad+ma sprul pa la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]la blta zhing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs sngon du 'gro ba mdzad nas chos bstan pa dang rjes su mthun 
[\[109a.2\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub pa dang rjes su mthun pas tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /_ka la ping ka'i skad dang 'brug sgra dang /_rnga bo che'i sgra skad kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod legs par 'ongs 
[\[109a.3\]]sam/_/sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsgrub pas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don thob par byed pa/_sngags thams cad kyi tshig dang gsang ba dang bcas pa dang /_dbang bskur ba dang phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor dang cho ga dang /_
[\[109a.4\]]dbang bskur ba dang tshe dang nad med pa dang /_dbang phyug dang bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_sgrub pa'i thabs thams cad dang ldan pa rgyud shes pa dang /_shes bya dang dus dang mi snang ba dang /_rgyal po'i zhing du gyur pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba shes par 
[\[109a.5\]]byed pa mdor na sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_rang gi yon tan dang mthun pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su 'jug pa/_sems can gzhan dga' bar byed pa mi snang bar 'gro ba/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba/_chu la mi nub par 'gro ba/_yid gzhungs 
[\[109a.6\]]par byed pa/_'gugs par byed pa/_sa 'og tu 'jug pa/_mngon du spyod par byed pa/_'dod pa thams cad thob par byed pa/_gnod sbyin dang /_gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang /_mngag gzhug pa dang sha za dang 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/_byis pa dang /_rgan po dang gzhon 
[\[109a.7\]]nu gnas ci lta ba bzhin 'jog par byed pa/_mdor na las thams cad byed pa ste/_yid la re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa/_mngon spyod dang rgyas pa dang /_zhi ba'i las dag rab tu byed pa ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che/_bskal pa 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]chen po'i rin po che'i le'u rab 'byam 'di ngas kyang rjes su gnang zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang gsungs te/_sems can dag pa'i rang gi sngags spyod pa'i don gyi chos kyi mdzod/_skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams dang /_sems can thams 
[\[109b.2\]]cad kyi don du bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'od kyi snang ba bkod pa'i rgyan yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu dag pa'i sems can gyi 'od 
[\[109b.3\]]kyi snang bas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing /_'og min gyi gnas kyi bar dang /_mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po'i bar du khyab par byas te/_sems can gang su dag shin tu sdug bsngal ba de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar 
[\[109b.4\]]gyur to/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yang dag par bskul nas/_'od de yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/_/'dir gang dag shar phyogs na rnam 
[\[109b.5\]]par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'od zer rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi reg pa'i bya bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yang dag par bskul te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi zla ba dri snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi lha bai DUr+ya'i 'od dang /_de bzhin 
[\[109b.6\]]gshegs pa dpal kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin 
[\[109b.7\]]gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa ye shes rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa dag la mi mjed kyi 'jig 
[\[110a.2\]]rten gyi khams kyi gnas gtsang ma'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston pa dang /_sngags kyi tshig gi don gyi le'u 
[\[110a.3\]]rab 'byam ston te/_de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang byang gi phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang steng dang 'og dang thad ka thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bar byas te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa gong bar byas nas byang chub sems 
[\[110a.4\]]dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun gyis bltas te/_gnas gtsang ma'i gnas su sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid chen po blta bar 'dod pa dang /_sngags kyi spyod pa bsgrub pa dang /_ting nge 
[\[110a.5\]]'dzin gyi khyad par dang /_le'u'i tshogs dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa/_gsal bar 'dod pas chas pa ni 'di lta ste/_lag bzang dang /_rin chen bzang po dang /_brtul zhugs bzang po dang /_spyan mdzes dang /_bzang dga' dang /_chos 
[\[110a.6\]]bzang dang /_don thams cad grub pa dang /_thams cad du 'phags pa dang /_chos 'phags dang /_rin chen 'phags dang /_rin chen dpal dang /_lhun po'i dpal dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal dang /_'od byed dpal dang /_'od dpal dang /_don 
[\[110a.7\]]thams cad kyi dpal dang /_thams cad phyag na rin po che dang /_phyag na gtsug gi rin po che dang /_phyag na lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rnam par snang mdzad snying po dang /_rin chen snying po dang /_ye shes snying po dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don gyi snying po dang /_chos 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]'phags kyi snying po dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi tog dang /_tog bzang dang /_mtha' yas tog dang /_dri ma med pa'i tog dang /_mtha' dag gi tog dang /_nam mkha'i tog dang /_rin po che'i tog dang /_'brug sgra dang rnga bo che'i skad kyi rgyal po dang /_mtha' yas par snang ba'i ye 
[\[110b.2\]]shes kyi rgyal po dang /_mun pa mun nag thams cad 'joms pa'i rgyal po dang /_gnod pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i rgyal po dang /_spyod pa thams cad kyi yul shes pa'i rgyal po dang /_'jig rten gyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_mngon par rtogs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal 
[\[110b.3\]]po dang /_rnam par 'joms par byed pa'i rgyal po dang /_nges par g.yo bar byed pa'i rgyal po dang /_nyi ma'i rgyal po dang /_dngos po med pa yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang /_mi mthun 
[\[110b.4\]]pa'i phyogs med pa'i rgyal po dang /_rang bzhin gyi 'od dang /_bsod nams 'od dang /_'jig rten 'od dang /_dpag med 'od dang /_mtha' yas 'od dang /_spyan bzang 'od dang /_'byung med 'od dang /_don gyi 'od dang /_mi tshugs pa dang /_bzod par dka' ba dang /_
[\[110b.5\]]las med dang /_'og min dang /_dri med dang /_me dang /_'od dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bde ba'i mu khyud dang /_mu khyud tog dang /_'dod pa'i lha dang /_lha dang lha yul na yod pa dang /_lte ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_'jig rten zhi ba dang /_nye bar 'dod 
[\[110b.6\]]pa dang /_rnga bo che dang /_grub pa dang /_dkar po dang /_grags bzang dang /_bzod par dka' ba dang /_rnyed par dka' ba dang /_gdul bar dka' ba dang /_bsnyen par dka' ba dang /_ring du song ba dang /_ring ba'i don dang /_ring ba la gnas pa dang /_mtho ba dang /_
[\[110b.7\]]shin tu mtho ba dang /_srin bu me khyer dang /_kun tu snang ba dang /_snang med dang /_khyu mchog dang /_kun nas 'od dang /_shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang /_yid bzang dang /_lha chen po dang /_dri med bzang po dang /_dri ma mthar byed dang /_dul ba dang /_zhi ldan dang /_mtshan 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]bzang dang /_rgyal mtshan dkar po dang /_tshad ldan dang /_ci smra dang /_tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]dang /_sel byed dang /_'tsho ba dang /_legs skyes dang /_du ba'i tog dang /_rgyal mtshan tog dang /_dkar ba'i tog dang /_tog bzang dang /_nor lha'i tog dang /_nor 
[\[111a.2\]]lha'i bu dang /_mes po dang /_pha dang /_mthar byed dang /_'jig rten grags pa dang /_kun nas grags pa dang /_grags pa chen po dang /_dpal ldan dang /_pham byed dang /_'od byed dang /_mngag gzhug pa dang /_zhi byed dang /_'jig rten byed dang /_lha byed dang /_mtho ris byed 
[\[111a.3\]]dang /_mar me mdzad dang /_'byung po mthar byed dang /_don thams cad mdzad dang /_grub mdzad dang /_gsal mdzad dang /_snang bar mdzad pa dang /_rnga bo che'i sgra dang /_skad kyi sgra dang /_sgra snyan dang /_mtha' yas pa'i sgra dang /_tog gi sgra dang /_ngan spong gi bu dang /_
[\[111a.4\]]gser thub dang /_'khor ba 'jig dang /_'od srung dang /_gtsug tor can dang /_thams cad skyo ba dang /_rnam par gzigs dang /_shAkya thub pa dang /_'di dag dang /_gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang po dag gis gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang snang bar 
[\[111a.5\]]byas te pad+ma'i gdan dag la bzhugs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyang de lta bu'i tshul du lhags par gyur te/_'di lta ste/_phyag na rin chen dang /_phyag na rdo rje dang /_mnyam pa'i phyag dang /_nam mkha'i phyag dang /_mtha' yas phyag dang /_sa'i phyag dang /_
[\[111a.6\]]snang ba'i phyag dang /_dri med bzang po dang /_bzang brtsegs dang /_rab mang brtsegs dang /_nor bu brtsegs dang /_rin chen brtsegs dang /_rin chen phyag dang /_kun nas phyag dang /_dri ldan phyag dang /_legs 'gro dang /_dri med 'gros dang /_'jig rten 'gros 
[\[111a.7\]]dang /_mdzes pa'i 'gros dang /_mtha' yas 'gros dang /_grags pa mtha' yas dang /_grags pa bzang po dang /_grags pa'i dri ma bral dang /_grags pa'i 'gro ba dang /_grags pa dri ma med pa dang /_grags pa dang /_grags pa 'dren pa dang /_mgon po dang /_
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]mgon por gyur pa dang /_kun nas mgon po dang /_rgyun shes kyi bu dang /_mtha' yas rgyun shes kyi bu dang /_kun nas rgyun shes kyi bu dang /_byams pa'i bu dang /_byams pa bzang po'i bu dang /_byams pa'i bu ma yin pa dang /_dus gsum rgyun shes kyi bu dang /_rgyun 
[\[111b.2\]]shes kyi bu 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang /_rgyun shes kyi bu dkon mchog gsum dang /_rgyun shes kyi bu skyabs gsum dang /_rgyun shes kyi bu theg pa gsum dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa dang /_yid 'ong bzang po dang /_gsung snyan ldan dang /_chos kyi dbang phyug dang /_
[\[111b.3\]]dngos med dbang phyug dang /_'jig rten dbang phyug dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_legs gzigs dbang phyug dang /_rnam gzigs dbang phyug dang /_'jig rten mchod 'os dang /_legs mchod dang /_sgra sgrogs dbang phyug dang /_rnga chen dbang phyug 
[\[111b.4\]]dang /_sna tshogs sgra'i dbang phyug dang /_rnam 'jig dbang phyug dang /_mthon ka bzang po dang /_sku mdzes dang /_grags ldan dang /_nyi ma'i 'od dang /_khyab 'jug bdag po dang /_bdag po'i ngang tshul dang /_nam mkha' dang /_nam mkha'i snying po dang /_don thams 
[\[111b.5\]]cad kyi snying po dang /_thams cad 'byung ba dang /_ngan song spong ba dang /_phyir mi ldog pa dang /_chos ma yin pa gcod par byed pa dang /_de dag dang /_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gnas gtsang ma'i 
[\[111b.6\]]gzhal med khang na bzhugs so/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med kyi gzugs 'chang ba rnams te/_spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i don/_'jig rten sgrub pa'i don/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa phyir mi ldog pa'i lam la dgod pas bsam 
[\[111b.7\]]gyis mi khyab pa'i rig pa'i tshig dang /_sngags kyi tshig dang /_gzungs dang /_sman gyi cha byad 'dzin pa dang /_'dab chags kyi tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_nor bu dang /_sngags dang /_rin po che'i rgyal po dang /_sems can thams 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]cad kyi lus kyi grangs su rjes su yang dag par 'jug pa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /_sems can gyi bsam pa ci ltar 'dul bar byed pa de bzhin du byed pa rnams dang /_de dang rjes su mthun pa'i ming dang 'brel ba rnams dang /_rig pa'i rgyal po'i nye 
[\[112a.2\]]bar bstan pa dang /_chos ci lta ba bzhin du rtog pa las nges par 'byung ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_pad+ma dang /_rdo rje'i rigs dang /_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rigs kyi rjes su zhugs pa/_dam tshig las mi 'da' zhing tshig gis lam la 
[\[112a.3\]]'jog par byed pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcod par byed pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_gtsug tor dang /_mngon par 'phags pa dang /_mngon par mtho ba dang /_gdugs dkar po dang /_'dab ma mtha' yas dang /_'dab ma brgya pa dang /_rgyal 
[\[112a.4\]]ba'i gtsug tor dang /_'jig rten mthon po dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang /_mngon par 'phags pa'i gtsug tor dang /_pad+ma'i 'od dang /_me tog pad+ma'i 'od dang /_me tog ka ta ka'i 'od dang /_'od dkar po dang /_bkod pa'i gtsug tor dang /_
[\[112a.5\]]gser gyi phung po dang /_dkar po'i phung po dang /_gzi brjid phung po dang /_nor bu'i phung po dang /_kun nas phung po dang /_rnam par grags pa'i phung po dang /_'byung ba'i phung po dang /_bden pa'i phung po dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo'i phung po dang /_de kho na nyid 
[\[112a.6\]]kyi phung po dang /_de dag dang gzhan yang gtsug tor gyi rgyal po chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa la rab tu zhugs pa/_sems can gyi bsam pa rab tu rdzogs par byed pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi snying po dang ldan pa gtsug tor kyi rgyal mo bskal pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi bar du yang 
[\[112a.7\]]bgrang zhing mthar thug par mi nus so/_/stobs dang pha rol gnon pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bdag nyid kyang bstan par mi nus so/_/mdor bstan par bya ste brjod pa ni rig pa'i rgyal mo'i 'dus pa brjod par bya ste/_'di lta ste mdzod spu dang smin ma dang spyan dang rdzi ma dang /_
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]rna ba dang mgrin pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang snying rje dang byams pa dang /_brtse ba dang shes rab dang 'od zer dang sems pa dang /_'od dang dri ma med pa dang sgrib pa dang /_mchog sbyin thams cad dang /_de dag dang gzhan yang rig pa'i rgyal mo mtha' yas mu med pa dag 
[\[112b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las spros pa dag ni 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snod dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims mal dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 
[\[112b.3\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i brla dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tog dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag mtshan dang /_de dag dang gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags 
[\[112b.4\]]brjod pa rig pa'i rgyal po dang /_rgyal mo dang mngag gzhug pa dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_pho nya dang /_pho nya mo dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_gnod sbyin mo dang /_sems can dang /_sems can ma yin pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rgyu mthun pa las byung 
[\[112b.5\]]ba'i rgyan gyi tshogs kyi khyad par dang /_'khor brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa dang /_rig pa'i rgyal po rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyi gong nas gong du yongs su gnas pa de dag kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang der gnas par gyur to/_/rig pa'i 
[\[112b.6\]]rgyal po pad+ma'i rigs kyang 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das phyag bcu gnyis pa dang /_phyag drug pa dang /_phyag bzhi pa dang /_hA la hA la dang /_don yod zhags pa dang /_rta mgrin dkar po dang /_mgrin pa mtha' yas dang /_mgrin sngon dang /_mgrin bzang 
[\[112b.7\]]dang /_/mgul bzang dang /_mgul dkar dang /_mgul sngon dang /_'jig rten mgul pa dang /_rnam par lta ba dang /_lta ba dang /_kun tu lta ba dang /_dbang phyug dang /_'od zer stong ldan dang /_yid dang /_yid las byung ba dang /_rnam par grags pa'i 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]yid dang /_pad+ma dang /_phyag na pad+ma dang /_yid la bsam pa dang /_dbugs 'byin dang /_rab tu rgod pa dang /_skra bzang dang /_skra mthar byed dang /_rgyu skar dang /_rgyu skar gyi rgyal po dang /_zhi ba dang /_bskal pa bzang po dang /_'dul byed mchog

[\[113a.3\]]phyug gi sku'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba/_'di lta ste/_sgrol ma dang /_sgrol ma bzang po dang /_gar mkhan ma dang /_khro gnyer ma dang /_'gro ba mtha' yas dang /_'jig rten 'gro ma dang /_sa thob par 'gro ba dang /_dri ma med par 'gro ba dang /_dkar mo dang /_

[\[113a.5\]]ma dang /_longs spyod ldan ma dang /_longs spyod che ldan ma dang /_'ug pa ma dang /_'ug pa ma ma yin pa dang /_dri med mtha' yas ma dang /_kun nas mthar byed ma dang /_sdug bsngal mthar byed ma dang /_'byung po mthar byed ma dang /_dpal byed ma dang /_dpal byed chen mo dang /_
[\[113a.6\]]mchod dpal dang /_mtha' yas dpal dang /_'jig rten dpal dang /_rnam par grags pa'i dpal dang /_'jig rten ma dang /_kun tu ma dang /_sangs rgyas yum dang /_chu bo ma dang /_shing rta bzang mo dang /_shing rta ldan ma dang /_glang po 'dul byed ma dang /_
[\[113a.7\]]'dul byed ma dang /_'byung po ldan ma dang /_dpal byed ma dang /_phreng ba ma dang /_longs spyod phreng ba ma dang /_'gugs byed ma dang /_rmad byung ma dang /_'od can ma dang /_ro bzang ma dang /_nor chang ldan ma dang /_dga' ldan ma dang /_'od ldan ma dang /_
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]dpa' mo dang /_kun 'gro ma dang /_zla 'od ma dang /_zla ba ma dang /_zla ldan ma dang /_rma bya ma dang /_rma bya chen mo dang /_nor ldan ma dang /_nor sbyin ma dang /_lha ldan ma dang /_'jig rten ldan ma dang /_me chen ma dang /_chen mo nyid dang /_skra mdzes ma dang /_dga' 
[\[113b.2\]]bzang ma dang /_nor sbyin ma dang /_dpal mo dang /_dpal ldan ma dang /_nad mthar byed ma dang /_nad thams cad gso bar byed ma dang /_mnyam med ma dang /_lha mo dang /_grags byed ma dang /_dbang du byed ma dang /_myur du byed ma dang /_bde sbyin ma dang /_
[\[113b.3\]]bkra shis ma dang /_bkra shis byed ma dang /_zla ba ma dang /_zla mdzes ma dang /_zla ldan ma dang /_bdag dang gzhan yang rig pa'i rgyal mo dag la ri khrod ma lo ma gyon ma dang /_mya ngan las skyes ma dang /_yid las skyes ma la sogs pa grub pa mtha' yas pas chos kyi 
[\[113b.4\]]dbyings nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i ngo bo dang /_sems can gyi spyod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa gnas pa las byung ba'i yid dang /_pho nya dang /_pho nya mo dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_mngag gzhug pa dang /_mngag gzhug ma dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_gnod sbyin mo 
[\[113b.5\]]dang /_srin po dang /_srin mo dang /_sha za dang /_sha za mo dang /_pad+ma'i rigs dam tshig la rjes su zhugs shing rjes su spyod pa rnams dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gzhal med khang sems can dag pa gang na 'dug pa der phyin par gyur to/_/phyin nas 
[\[113b.6\]]kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i las la brtson pa'i yid kyis gnas par gyur to/_/der gnas pa na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i nye ba na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa'i tshogs rnams la smras pa/_nga'i rig pa'i 
[\[113b.7\]]tshogs kyis bskor ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po dang rgyal mo khro bo'i rgyal po dang /_pho nya chen mo dang bcas pa khyed cag 'dir 'dus par gyis shig_/dran pa tsam nyid kyis rig pa'i tshogs thams cad 'dus par gyur pa ni 'di lta ste/_rig pa mchog dang /_rig pa bzang 
[\[114a\]]

[\[118a.1\]]thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/_lhag pa'i bsam pa dag dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo dang /_chos kyi dbyings dus gsum las yang dag par 'das par mkhyen nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal

[\[118a.3\]]pa'i tshig dang /_cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa dang rnam par mi rtog pa'i mnyam pa nyid thob par byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu kun gyi stobs dang /_bdud thams cad kyi stobs zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sgoms shig ces so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[118a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/_de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'di dang 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong du ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i stong gsum 
[\[118a.5\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par rab tu g.yos te/_snang ba chen pos gsal bar yang byas nas/_rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs skyed pa ston te/_rang gi sngags kyi tshig kyang ston pa la/_namaHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba mung+ga tA nAM/_namaHpra t+ye ka bud d+hA nAM Ar+ya 
[\[118a.6\]]shra ba kA nAM/_na mo bo d+hi sa twA nAM/_da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Thi te shwa rA nAM/_bo d+hi sa twA nAM/_ma hA sa twA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/_duSh+Ta sa twa da ma ka a si mu sa la par+shu pA sha hasta/_tsa tur+b+hu dza/_tsa turmu kha/_Sha Ta tsa ra Na/_gats+tsha gats+tsha/_sarba big+h+na big+h+nAn+te ka_/bi krI tA nan/_sarba b+hU ta b+ha yaM kar/_aT+TAT+Ta 
[\[118a.7\]]hA sa ni nA di ne/_bya g+h+ra tsarma ni bA sa na/_ku ru ku ru/_sarba d+harmA na/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/_sarba man+t+rAn/_b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/_pa ra mu drAn/_A kar+Sha ya/_A kar+Sha ya/_sarba b+hU tAn/_nirma tha nirma tha/_sarba duSh+Ta na/_pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/_maN+Da la ma d+h+ye/_bai ba swa ta dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra/_ku ru ku ru ma ma 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]sarba kAr+ya ma/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_mA bi lam+ba/_mA bi lam+ba/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_hUM hUM phaT/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_sarba A sha pa ri pU ra ka/_he b+ha ga bAn kiny+tsi rA ya si ma ma sarbAmar+thaM sA d+ha ya swA hA/_'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i khro bo chen po gshin rje'i gshed 
[\[118b.2\]]ces bya ba yin te/_gshin rje'i rgyal po yang 'joms pa dang /_'gugs par byed pa yin na/_sems can gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/_/khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gzungs sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sems can thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags par gyur te/_'jigs pa dang 
[\[118b.3\]]nyam thag pa dang /_dngangs pa dang yid skyo ba dang snying 'gas par 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ma gtogs par skyabs gzhan med skyob pa gzhan med dpung gnyen gzhan med par gyur to/_/de nas gang su dag sa la gnas pa dang chu la 
[\[118b.4\]]gnas pa dang /_nam mkha' la gnas pa dang /_brtan par gnas pa dang /_mi brtan par gnas pa dang /_mngal nas skyes pa dang /_sgo nga las skyes pa dang /_drod gsher las skyes pa dang rdzus te skyes pa'i sems can gyi grangs su gtogs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa 
[\[118b.5\]]dag na rnam par gnas pa steng dang /_'og dang thad ka dang phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu skad cig de dang yud tsam de la gab cing gnas pa dag skad cig de nyid la/_khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'di nyid du bkug par gyur to/_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags 'di ni 'dod chags dang ma bral ba rnams kyi 
[\[118b.6\]]mdun du brjod par mi bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/_skam par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/dam tshig la dmigs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar 
[\[118b.7\]]bzlas par bya'o/_/yang na las gzhan gyi ched du brjod par bya ste/_gang de dang de dag tu ni brjod par mi bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ltas ngan chen po dang /_mya ngan chen po dang /_bdag nyid 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/thugs rje mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kho na'i spyod pa rjes su bsgrub cing bstan pa dang /_sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba dang /_chos kyi tshul yang dag par gnas par bya ba dang /_sems can gyi khams mtha' 
[\[119a.2\]]dag mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par thob par bya ba dang /_bstan pa med pa dag tu bstan pa dang /_lam gsum la yang dag par sbyor ba dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi bcad pa dang /_sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir dang /_thugs rje chen po'i mthu'i rgyu mthun pa'i thugs kyi 
[\[119a.3\]]bdud kyi stobs zil gyis gnon pa dang /_bgegs chen po rnam par gzhig pa dang /_rgyal po ma rungs pa rnam par gzhom pa dang /_bdag gi stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_gzhan gyi stobs rnam par gzhig pa dang /_rengs par bya ba dang gsad pa dang /_mi snang bar bya ba 
[\[119a.4\]]dang /_rab tu bstan pa dang /_nye bar sgom pa dang /_dga' bar bya ba dang /_rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa rab tu bstan pa dang /_tshe dang nad med pa dang dbang phyug mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_myur ba'i las rjes su bsgrub pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang btang 
[\[119a.5\]]snyoms chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po'i yang dag par sdom pa la gnas pa dang de dag gi rgyu mtshan du rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems kyis smras so/_/de nas klu dang klu chen po de dag dang /_gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin chen po dang /_srin po dang srin po chen po 
[\[119a.6\]]dang /_sha za dang sha za chen po dang srul po dang srul po chen po dang lus srul po dang lus srul po chen po dang /_ma mo dang ma mo chen mo dang /_grul bum dang grul bum chen mo dang /_gcan gzan dang gcan gzan chen po dang /_ro langs dang ro langs chen po dang /_kam+po tse'i mi dang /_
[\[119a.7\]]kam+po tse'i mi chen po dang /_srin mo dang sring mo chen mo dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro ma chen mo dang /_gzhib pa dang gzhib pa chen po dang /_g.yengs byed dang g.yengs byed chen po dang /_byis pa dang byis pa chen po dang /_bran pa dang bran pa chen po dang /_nad dang nad 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]chen po dang /_brjed byed dang brjed byed chen po dang /_gdon dang gdon chen po dang /_nam mkha'i ma mo dang nam mkha'i ma mo chen mo dang /_gzugs can ma dang gzugs can ma chen mo dang /_ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang /_grib gnon dang grib gnon chen po dang /_sbod

[\[119b.3\]]dang rims mi bzad pa dang /_rtag pa las byung ba'i rims dang /_yud tsam las byung ba dang rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_gcong chen po dang /_grub pa dang grub pa chen po dang /_rnal 'byor 
[\[119b.4\]]dang ldan pa dang /_rnal 'byor dang ldan pa chen po dang /_drang srong rnams dang /_drang srong chen po rnams dang /_mi'am ci dang /_mi'am ci chen po dang /_brang 'gro dang brang 'gro chen po dang /_dri za dang dri za chen po dang /_lha dang lha chen po dang /_mi dang mi chen po dang /_yul mi 
[\[119b.5\]]dang yul mi chen po dang /_rgya mtsho dang rgya mtsho chen po dang /_chu bo dang chu bo chen po dang /_ri dang ri chen po dang /_gter dang gter chen po dang /_sa dang sa chen po dang /_shing dang shing chen po dang /_'dab chags can dang 'dab chags can chen po 
[\[119b.6\]]dang /_rgyal po dang rgyal po chen po dang /_brgya byin dang brgya byin chen po dang /_nor lha'i bu dang /_ngu zhig dang 'byung ba chen po'i bdag po dang /_dbang ldan dang /_gshin rje dang /_tshangs pa dang tshangs pa chen po dang /_lha sna tshogs bzo bo dang /_nor sbyin dang /_yul 'khor skyong dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_

[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]dang /_chu dbang dang /_'jig rten dbang po dang nye dbang dang /_gsang ba pa dang /_gsang ba pa chen po dang /_g.yo dang /_g.yo byed dang /_chu na spyod pa dang /_g.yung drung ri dang /_zla ba'i ri dang /_ri bo chen po dang /_brtsegs mig dang /_mgo bo gsum pa ste/_
[\[120a.2\]]de dag dang gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnod sbyin bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas 'dus par gyur

[\[120a.4\]]rna ba dang /_gshin rje dang rnam par 'jigs byed dang 'jigs byed dang mi bzad pa dang sdig ldan dang /_dbang po rgyal dang 'thab pa dang legs par 'thab pa dang /_mdung dang mdung rtse gsum pa dang /_mgo gsum pa dang mgo mtha' yas pa yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus

[\[120a.6\]]dang /_gzi brjid bzang po dang mi bzad pa dang mi bzad pa'i gzugs can yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur to/_/gang yang klu'i rgyal po chen po klu bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rdzu 
[\[120a.7\]]'phrul gyi stobs kyis bkug pa la 'di lta ste/_dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo dang /_la ba dang nye ba'i la ba dang /_nor ldan dang /_mtha' yas dang /_'jog po dang pad+ma dang /_pad+ma chen po dang 'dus pa skyong dang /_dung dang dung skyong dang kak+ko Ta dang /_rigs 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]ldan dang /_rigs med ldan dang /_nga rgyal can dang /_bum chu can dang /_rdo rje can dang me tog tsam pa ka las byung ba dang nor ldan klu dang /_nga rgyal 'joms dang /_mtshon dpus dang nye ba'i dpus dang /_dbyig pa dang dbyig pa chen po dang /_dkar po dang dkar po bzang 
[\[120b.2\]]dang /_sngo ba dang chu sbyin sngo ba dang 'o ma'i chu dang sog ma med dang /_rgya mtsho dang nye ba'i rgya mtsho ste/_de dag dang gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa de dag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus shing 'khod par gyur to/_/gang 
[\[120b.3\]]yang drang srong dang drang srong chen po de dag la 'di lta ste/_rgyun shes kyi bu dang /_gnas 'jog dang /_gau ta ma dang /_b+ha go ra tha dang /_dza h+nu dang /_ang gi ras dang /_a ma ti dang /_pu la sti dang /_ri byi dang /_rgyas pa dang /_nag po dang /_gau ta ma nag po dang /_me 
[\[120b.4\]]dang /_me'i rgyud dang /_dza ma da g+ni dang yod pa pa dang thub pa mchog dang /_gos can dang bai sham pA yA na dang rtsib logs skyes dang /_mo mtshan gnyis las skyes dang dgra sta dang rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang /_shing pi pa la gnas pa dang /_shing pi pa la za ba dang /_grog

[\[120b.6\]]snod mnyan pa'i phyir dang /_rjes su yi rang ba'i don du 'khod par gyur to/_/gang yang lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der chos mnyan pa'i phyir rab tu zhugs te/_'khod pa la 'di lta ste/_e raN+Da dang /_te raN+Da dang /_'od zer gyi bu 
[\[120b.7\]]dang 'od zer dang snang ba dang snang ba bzang po'o/_/gang yang nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po de dag kyang nam mkha' lding brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa la 'di lta ste/_'od bzang dang /_'dab dkar dang /_rkang med 'gro dang /_'dab 'gro 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]dang /_'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]skyes dang /_'dab med skyes dang /_yid ltar mgyogs dang /_klu rnam 'jigs dang /_rnam 'dud bu dang /_ba ra dwa dza dang /_bya dang /_bya chen po dang /_'dab ldan tshogs te/_de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'du bar gyur to/_/gang yang mi'am 
[\[121a.2\]]ci'i rgyal po mi'am ci'i 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma dang ldan pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa la 'di lta ste/_ljon pa dang nye ba'i ljon pa dang ljon pa bzang po dang /_ljon pa mtha' yas dang 'jig rten ljon pa dang ljon pa bral dang /_brang rgyas dang brang chen po dang gzi brjid chen 
[\[121a.3\]]po dang rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_khyad par sgra dang /_skad snyan dang yid du 'ong ba'i sems skyed par byed pa dang rigs mtho ba dang mtho sgra dang /_btang snyoms pa dang /_snying rje ldan dang chu lha dang /_de dag dang gzhan yang mi'am ci'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che ba mi'am ci'i 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma dang ldan 
[\[121a.4\]]pa chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus par gyur to/_/de bzhin du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_tshangs pa chen po dang /_'od gsal dang /_'od kyi sgra dang /_dag pa'i 'od dang /_bsod nams 'od dang mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_'og min dang 'og bzang 
[\[121a.5\]]dang /_/ci yang med pa dang /_ci yang med min dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas dang legs ldan dang legs ldan mthong dang /_sprul pa bzang po dang yongs su sprul pa dang gnas gtsang ma dang /_dga' ldan dang 'thab bral dang sum cu rtsa gsum dang rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris dang /_rtag 
[\[121a.6\]]tu myos dang phreng thogs dang gzhong thogs dang pi bang gsum pa dang ri bor gnas pa dang khang rtseg gnas pa dang /_rtse mor gnas pa dang lcang lo can na gnas pa dang grong khyer na gnas pa dang gzhal med khang na gnas pa dang bar snang la gnas pa dang /_sa la gnas pa dang shing la 
[\[121a.7\]]gnas pa dang khyim na gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab tu tshim byed dang /_stobs ldan dang thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang shin tu bkra dang bde bkra dang rig byed bkra dang /_sgra gcan dang lag pa dang de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]dang ldan pa 'gros sna tshogs dang /_nor sna tshogs dang lha dang 'thab pa'i lha ma yin de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus par gyur to/_/

[\[121b.3\]]mtshan dang /_mi bzad dang dud ldan dang dud pa dang rdo rje dang 'byor pa dang /_char 'bebs dang nye ba'i char 'bebs dang /_nor 'dzin dang mi snang byed dang rgod ldan dang rting bar ldan dang 'dod pa dang /_ma rungs pa dang 'jig rten mthar byed dang rnam par ltung byed dang /_kun du ltung byed dang /_
[\[121b.4\]]rtog pa dang gla sgang can dang dus kyi mtha' dang dur khrod dang sha drag ldan dang dkar po dang /_byi bzhin dang byi bzhin gyi bu dang byams ldan dang gzer bu dang /_gzer bu gsum dang rngon pa dang gseng phrom dang /_brtan pa dang 'jig byed dang stobs ldan dang mi bzad pa dang skya rengs dang rnam par 
[\[121b.5\]]rgod pa dang 'chi ltas min dang /_skem byed dang kun bged dang /_nye ba'i kun bged dang /_gzhon nu dang /_rtse med dang /_rgod byed dang /_rab tu rgod byed dang /_sems par byed pa dang /_gar byed dang /_'theng po dang /_gzugs ngan te/_gza' chen po de dag kyang rgyu skar brgya stong phrag du

[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]dang /_'jig rten mgon po dang /_chang ldan dang /_rgyal byed dang /_nor ldan dang lha don te/_de ltar rgyu skar gyi rgyal po de dag kyang de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang du rgyu skar brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis

[\[122a.4\]]dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_bde ba dang /_byang chub dang /_so so gcig dang /_nyan thos dang /_dmyal ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang /_gzi brjid chen po dang /_gzi brjid chen po ldan dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha ma yin dang /_sha ldan dang /_sha za 
[\[122a.5\]]dang /_/gnod sbyin srin po dang /_'byung po thams cad pa dang /_'byung ba pa dang /_phyogs kyi glang po dang /_steng 'gro dang /_thad kar 'gro dang /_kha bye ba dang /_bsam gtan 'gro dang /_rnal 'byor 'gro dang /_rab tu gnas dang /_mchog dang /_bar ma dang 
[\[122a.6\]]tha ma ste/_khyim chen po de dag kyang khyim brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa gang na gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang gang na bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der lhags shing phyin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas rang rang gi gnas su 'khod 
[\[122a.7\]]par gyur to/_/gang yang gnod sbyin mo dag gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa la 'di lta ste/_mig bzang ma dang /_smin bzang ma dang /_skra bzang ma dang /_skad snyan ma dang /_blo bzang ma dang /_dge ldan ma dang /_sna tshogs mig 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]ldan ma dang /_rdzogs byed ma dang /_gsang ba ma dang /_bzang po ma dang /_ska rags bzang po ma dang /_pad+ma ltar smra ba dang /_'jigs byed ma dang /_mi 'jigs sbyin ma dang /_rgyal ma dang /_rnam par rgyal ma dang /_nam gru ma dang /_sgra gcan ma dang /_sgra mthar byed ma dang /_
[\[122b.2\]]rlung ma dang /_yid 'phrog ma dang /_yid ldan ma dang /_me tog ldan ma dang /_me tog gi grong khyer la gnas ma dang /_ser skya ma dang /_'phrog ma dang /_dpal ldan ma dang /_dpa' mo dang /_dpa' bzang mo dang /_shin tu mi bzad ma dang /_mi bzad ldan ma dang /_lha mdzes ma dang /_
[\[122b.3\]]ro bzang ma dang /_gsang ba dam pa ma dang /_shing la mu la gnas ma dang /_mya ngan med ma dang /_mun par mdzes ma dang /_snang bar mdzes ma dang /_'od ldan ma dang /_lhag par ldan ma dang /_gzugs mdzes ma dang /_dkar med ma dang /_zhi ba ma dang /_phyogs mtshams ma dang /_
[\[122b.4\]]stug ma dang /_dga' byed ma dang /_nye ba'i dga' byed ma dang /_'jig rten las 'das ma ste/_gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'di dag gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rgyang ring po nyid nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing 
[\[122b.5\]]'khod par gyur to/_/gang yang sha za mo dag sha za mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rgyang ring po nyid nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/_sdud ma dang phyag dar khrod kyi sha za mo dang /_sha za mo drag 
[\[122b.6\]]mo dang sha za mo skar mda' ma dang sha za mo 'bar ma dang thal ba za ma dang sha za ma dang /_dug ma dang bung ba ma dang rmongs byed ma dang sdigs mdzub ma dang /_dmar ldan ma dang glang dmar ma dang 'jig rten nye gnas ma dang thal bar nye gnas ma dang shing pi lu dang ldan ma dang /_mang ldan ma dang mang ma dang 
[\[122b.7\]]gdul dka' ma dang /_e la ma dang mtshon byed ma dang du ba la gnas ma dang du ba ma ste/_sha za mo chen mo 'di dag sha za mo'i 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus shing rab tu zhugs par gyur to/_/gang yang ma mo dang ma mo chen mo dag 'jig 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]rten gyi rjes su rnam par spyod cing /_sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing /_gtor ma dang /_me tog dman ma la spyod par byed pa dag la 'di lta ste/_tshangs pa ma dang /_dbang phyug chen mo ma dang /_khyab 'jug ma dang /_gzhon nu ma dang /_rgan byad ma dang /_
[\[123a.2\]]phag mo dang /_dbang mo dang /_gshin rje mo dang /_me phyogs ma dang /_nyi ma'i bu mo dang /_'jig rten mthar byed ma dang /_chu lha ma dang /_dbang ldan ma dang /_rlung phyogs ma dang /_gzhan gyi srog 'phrog ma dang /_mgo bregs ma dang /_bya ma dang /_bya ma chen mo dang /_
[\[123a.3\]]srul mo dang /_lus srul mo dang /_skem byed ma ste/_ma mo chen mo de dag kyang ma mo'i 'khor bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i tshig 'don cing 'khod par gyur to/_/de bzhin du mi dang 
[\[123a.4\]]mi ma yin pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang /_sems can dang sems can ma yin pa nas dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du thams cad kyang skabs 'dir nam mkha'i dkyil du snang bar gyur to/_/sems can gyi ris na srog chags su la yang phan 
[\[123a.5\]]tshun mi mthun pa med par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul gyi rgyan gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sems can thams cad kyi spyi bo'i gtsug na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[123a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_dag pa'i sems dpa' sngags kyi spyod pa'i don rnam par gtan la dbab pa dang 
[\[123a.7\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u rab 'byam byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gang 'di bshad pa'i dus la bab par sems na shod cig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rjes su gnang bar mdzad pa na/_nam mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]mthug cing sra ba'i rgyud bkod pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang de dpag tshad brgya stong du ma rgya che ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin du lhag par gnas par gyur to/_/gang 
[\[123b.2\]]du gnod sbyin dang srin po dang dri za dang rlung lha dang sha za de dag dang /_mdor na sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gzhal med khang de dag rdo rje'i nor bu rin po che lta bur gyur te/_der rab tu zhugs nas 'khod par gyur kyang phan tshun rnam par 
[\[123b.3\]]'tshe bar byed pa med do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de 'dus par gyur par shes nas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed la smras pa/_kye khro bo chen po sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rjes su nges par 'byung bar 
[\[123b.4\]]byed pa/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di'i sems can thams cad la srungs shig srungs shig_/dbang du gyis shig ma rungs pa gdul bar gyis shig sems can zhi ba dag sad par gyis shig_/sems can thams cad dad par gyis shig_/ci srid du nga'i rang gi 
[\[123b.5\]]sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod rgya che ba dag las sngags spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'chad par byed pa de srid kyi bar du 'di dag gi phyi rol du song la srung ba gyis shig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos bka' mnyan nas/_khro 
[\[123b.6\]]bo chen po'i gzugs kyis sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung ba dang rjes su bstan pa'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed khro bo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma phyogs bzhi kun dang steng dang 'og dang thad ka dag tu shin tu mi bzad pa'i sgra rab tu 
[\[123b.7\]]'don cing gnas par gyur to/_/de nas sems can de dag zhi ba dang yid dang sems bzang po dang ldan par gyur te bka' las mi 'da' bar byed par gyur to/_/'di lta bu'i sgra yang thos par gyur te/_gang dam tshig 'di las 'da' bar byed pa de dag ni a rdza ka'i 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]dog pa bzhin du mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyang de yin no/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa'i don du chos kyi tshig smras pa/_chos gcig la yang dag par 
[\[124a.2\]]bsams na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/_gcig po gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i rnam par rjes su mthong ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis la rab tu gnas na sngags 
[\[124a.3\]]'grub par 'gyur te/_gnyis po gang zhe na byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba nyid dang /_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'o/_/chos gsum dang ldan na sngags kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_gsum po gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad yongs 
[\[124a.4\]]su mi gtong ba nyid dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa srung ba dang /_rang gi sngags yongs su mi gtong ba nyid do/_/chos bzhi dang yang dag par ldan na dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/_bzhi po gang 
[\[124a.5\]]zhe na/_rang gi sngags yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang /_gzhan gyi sngags rjes su spyod pa med pa nyid dang /_sems can thams cad la byams pas gnas pa nyid dang /_snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i sems pa nyid do/_/chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na dang 
[\[124a.6\]]po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug cing sngags kyi spyod pa sgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_lnga po gang zhe na/_rnam par dben pa'i phyogs yang dag par bsten pa nyid 
[\[124a.7\]]dang /_/bas mtha' dgon pa sten par byed pa nyid dang /_sems can gzhan la zhe sdang med pa nyid dang /_'jig rten pa'i sngags la mi lta ba nyid dang /_tshul khrims dang thos pa dang spyod pa la gnas par byed pa nyid de chos lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na sngags spyod pa'i don 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/chos drug dang ldan na sngags kyi spyod pa 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_drug po gang zhe na/_dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rjes su mi gcod pa nyid dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la dang ba rjes su mi gcod pa nyid dang /_
[\[124b.2\]]'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags la kun du dga' ba nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa la lta ba nyid dang /_theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab mo'i tshig gi don mi spong zhing skyo ba med pa'i sems nyid dang /_sngags kyi spyod pa yongs su btsal ba dang /_dge ba'i 
[\[124b.3\]]phyogs yongs su mi gtong ba nyid de/_chos drug po 'di dag dang ldan na rig pa'i spyod pa dang sngags 'grub cing yang dag par sgrub pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/chos bdun dang ldan na rig pa sgrub pa'i dus kyi thabs thob par 'gyur zhing /_sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su spyod pa nyid du 'gyur 
[\[124b.4\]]te/_bdun po gang zhe na/_theg pa zab mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid sgom pa dang /_klog pa dang /_ston pa dang /_'don du 'jug pa dang /_'dri ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mos pa nyid dang /_dus dang /_phyogs dang /_nges par sdom pa dang /_bzlas 
[\[124b.5\]]pa dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_mi smra ba dang /_dka' thub la gzhol ba nyid dang /_rtogs pa dang /_blo dang /_dran pa dang /_shes rab dang /_bstan pa la bsnyen pa nyid dang /_byang chub kyi tshogs dang /_theg pa chen po dang zab pa'i chos kyi tshul la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa 
[\[124b.6\]]nyid dang rang dga'i sngags dgug pa'i bya ba la mkhas pa nyid dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po nyid yongs su bsgom pa nyid dang spros pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug 
[\[124b.7\]]pa gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol ba nyid dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang theg pa dman pa la dga' ba med pa nyid de/_chos bdun po de dag gis ni rig pa dang sngags 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/chos brgyad dang ldan na rig pa dang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don 'grub cing lam du 'gro bar 'gyur te/_brgyad po gang zhe na/_mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu dag la blta ba dang sems par 'dod pa nyid dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu dang bcas 
[\[125a.2\]]pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa nyid la the tshom med cing dang ba nyid dang /_phyin ci ma log pa'i sngags gzung ba dang bla ma la gus pa nyid dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi sngags dang /_rgyud dang spyod pa bstan pa mi slu ba bzung zhing bdog pa thams cad 
[\[125a.3\]]yongs su gtong ba nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rmi lam na mthong ba rab tu ston pa la mkhas pa nyid dang /_ser sna dang gnyid dang rmugs pa mtha' dag dang bral bar byed cing rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la 
[\[125a.4\]]bdag nyid 'bul bar byed pa nyid dang /_mdor bsdu na dge ba'i rtsa bas chog mi shes shing go cha chen po bgos pa dang /_bgegs thams cad rab tu sel bar 'dod pa nyid dang /_byang chub kyi snying po gnon pa dang longs spyod chen po dang /_dbang che bar grags par bdag 
[\[125a.5\]]nyid 'dod pa nyid dang dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag la bsnyen pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mi 'bral bar bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la nye bar gnas pa nyid de/_chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na sngags spyad pa'i don 'grub 
[\[125a.6\]]pa'i yang dag pa'i lam du 'gyur ro/_/grogs po dag mdor na byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang mchog tu sdug bsngal zhing tshul khrims nyams pa la yang mi skyo ba'i yid kyis rtag tu mngon par brtson pa la/_nga'i sngags 
[\[125a.7\]]kyi le'u rab 'byam mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i yid las byung ba 'grub par 'gyur te de las gzhan du shes par bya ba ma yin no/_/rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid du byas nas nyam sad pa'i phyir yang bsgrub 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]par bya ba yin no/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag gis 'di skad du tshig rjod par byed de kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/_/sngags kyi 
[\[125b.2\]]spyod pa'i don rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya ba chos kyi tshul la rjes su 'jug pa dang mthun zhing chos bstan pa legs par bstan pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa dang rjes su mthun zhing sngags kyi 
[\[125b.3\]]spyod pa dang rjes su mthun pa legs par bstan pa nyid do/_/rgyal po chen po gang la la zhig 'dus pa'i le'u 'di klog par 'gyur ba dang /_'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_yid la byed par 'gyur ba'am/_g.yul gyi thog mar glang po che'i steng du bzhag pa dang /_me tog dang /_
[\[125b.4\]]bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par byed na/_de la bdag cag byin gyis rlob par byed cing phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra bo dag kyang dbang du 'gyur la gzhan gyi dmag gi dpung yang gzhig par bgyi'o/_/glegs bam la bris 
[\[125b.5\]]pa byas te rang gi khyim tu bzhag na de la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'am rgyal po'am rgyal po chen po'am rgyal mo'am rgyal mo chen mo'am/_dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma dag la srung ba chen po dang longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang /_tshe 
[\[125b.6\]]ring ba nyid dang /_nad med pa nyid dang /_longs spyod rtag tu mngon par 'phel ba nyid kyang bgyi'o/_/de skad ces smras nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/theg pa chen po sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i cho ga zhib mo chen po las/_byang 
[\[125b.7\]]chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u rab 'byam rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo las 'dus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la bltas 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]nas/_/sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su 'jug cing kun du lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhug ma thag tu lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs nas 'od zer bye ba brgya stong du ma'i 'khor 
[\[126a.2\]]dang ldan pa'i 'od zer phyung ste/_sems can gyi khams thams cad kun du snang bar byas nas slar log ste/_gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang snang bar byas nas 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[126a.3\]]gyur pa la smras pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u rab 'byam gyi spyod pa sgrub pa/_sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa/_khyod kyi sngags kyi tshogs gang du sems can yang dag par zhugs na 'jig rten dang 
[\[126a.4\]]'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags 'grub pa yang dag par thob par 'gyur bas/_sems dpa' chen po khyod smros shig smros shig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mchog tu gsang 
[\[126a.5\]]ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud smras so/_/rig pa thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston par yang byed do/_/lag pa g.yas pa bteg nas sor mo'i rtse mos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la ston par byed de/_sor mo'i rtse mo de las rig 
[\[126a.6\]]pa'i rgyal po bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma byung ste/_byung nas kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad snang ba chen pos gnas par gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi snying po las thams cad byed pa dang /_dpa' 
[\[126a.7\]]bo gcig pa spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol ba dang /_zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang /_mngon spyod dang mi snang ba dang /_nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang /_chu la mi nub par 'gro ba dang dgug pa dang /_rnam par dbye ba dang dbang du byed pa 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]dang /_/dri thams cad dang phreng ba dang /_mar me dag kyang rang gi rgyud kyi sngags kyis sbyin par byed de/_mdor na ji lta ji ltar sbyar ba de lta de ltar sgrub par byed pa ni yi ge gsum zhes bya ba/_stobs chen po don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/_khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags smras pa de 
[\[126b.2\]]gang zhe na/_o~M AHhU~M/_'di ni khro bo chen po de'i snying po ste las thams cad byed pa dkyil 'khor thams cad dang sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis smras te/_bgegs thams cad 'jigs par byed pa'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal 
[\[126b.3\]]gzhon nur gyur pas lag pa g.yas pa bteg ste/_khro bo'i spyi bor gzhag pa byas so/_/'di skad du yang smras te/_sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol/_gang su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 
[\[126b.4\]]gyi khams na rnam par gnas shing mtha' yas mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dam tshig la lhag par gnas par gyis shig_/de skad ces smras nas/_khro bo'i rgyal po la lag pa bskor nas btang bar gyur to/_/khro bo'i rgyal po chen po btang 
[\[126b.5\]]ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas/_skad cig tsam gyis gang dag sdang ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rdzu 'phrul che ba dag tshar bcad cing der bkug par gyur nas/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po gnas gtsang ma'i 
[\[126b.6\]]gzhal med khang der yang dag par bcug ste/_gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par byas nas sems can ma rungs pa dag la yang kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i tshogs su byas shing /_spyi bo la yang dag par gnas par byas so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 
[\[126b.7\]]'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de la yang bltas nas/_sems can khyed cag thams cad nyon cig_/gang yang dam tshig 'di las 'das par gyur na de la khro bo'i rgyal po 'dis chad pa gcod par 'gyur te gang gi phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig ni 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/_sngags kyi don gyi tshig gsang ba byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi mdor bstan pa brjod par bya yis/_de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/_a~M ra ra 
[\[127a.2\]]smra ra a pra ti ha ta shA sa na/_ku mA ra rU pa d+hA ri Ne hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_grogs po dag 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags yin te 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes bya ba yin no/_/phyag rgya ni gtsug phud lnga pa zhes grags te de la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/rtsa ba'i sngags 'di ni las thams cad pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[127a.3\]]snying po'i sngags 'di ni las thams cad byed cing shes pa yin te/_oM bA kye daM na maH/_'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug phud gsum zhes bya ba yin te/_longs spyod thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa'o/_/'dir nye ba'i snying por 'gyur ba ni/_bAkye hU~M/_'dir phyag 
[\[127a.4\]]rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug phud gsum pa zhes grags pa yin te/_sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed pa yin no/_/'dir snying po mchog tu 'gyur ba ni maM/_'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni rma bya'i gdan zhes bya bar bstan pa yin te/_sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa'o/_/
[\[127a.5\]]gzhan yang phyag rgya thams cad kyi snying po dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba yi ge brgyad yod de/_dpal mchog tu byed pa/_dag byed chen po srid pa gsum gyi chos nye bar gcod par byed pa/_ngan 'gro thams cad zlog par byed pa/_zhi ba thams cad byed pa/_las thams cad byed 
[\[127a.6\]]pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par byed pa/_sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/_mchog tu gsang 
[\[127a.7\]]ba'i ngo bos nye bar gnas pa re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_gang du dran pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga yang yongs su sbyong bar byed na bzlas pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de yang gang zhe na/_oM A bI ra hU~M/_khe tsa ra/_grogs po dag 'di ni yi ge brgyad 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]po dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba/_gsang ba'i snying po'i bdag nyid yin te/_sangs rgyas nyid bzhin du rab tu nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/mdor na bya ba thams cad la yon tan gyi mtha' rgya chen po brjod par ni bskal pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du mar yang mi nus te/_'dir phyag 
[\[127b.2\]]rgya yang stobs po che zhes par rnam par grags pa/_re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/spyan drang ba'i sngags ni/_oM he he ku mA ra bi shwa rU pi NI/_sarba bA la b+hA Shi ta pra bo d+ha ne/_e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/_e h+ye hi ku mA ra/_krI Da nut+pa la d+hA ri Ne maN+Da la ma d+h+ye tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha sa ma ya 
[\[127b.3\]]ma nu sma ra/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM hUM/_mA bi laM ba ku ru phaT swA hA/_'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi spyan drang ba'i sngags so/_/sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang /_
[\[127b.4\]]lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_sha za dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po thams cad kyi'ang yin no/_/tsan+dan gyi chur byas te/_lan bdun bsngags nas/_phyogs bzhi 
[\[127b.5\]]dang /_steng dang /_'og dang /_thams cad du gtor na sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang nyid 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang /_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad dang /_sngags dang de bzhin du 'byung po'i tshogs 
[\[127b.6\]]dang sems can thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro/_/na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_oM d+hu d+hu ra d+hu ra d+hu ma bA si ni/_d+hu ma ra tsi shi hUM tiSh+Tha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/_bdug pa'i sngags so/_tsan+dan dang /_ga pur dang /_gur gum gcig tu byas te/_bdug pas bdugs na 
[\[127b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad bdug pas tshim zhing dgyes nas bzhugs par 'gyur ro/_/'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni/_/pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes grags pa/_/thams cad 'gugs byed zhi ba yin/_/spyan 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]drang ba yi sngags la yang /_/pad+ma'i phreng ba bzang po zhes/_/bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di nyid do/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad byon pa la mchod yon dbul bar bya ste/_ga bur dang tsan+dan dang gur gum chu dang sbyar nas/_
[\[128a.2\]]me tog ku su dang ma li ka dang /_dbyar gyi me tog dang me tog pun nA ga dang me tog ba ku la dang /_me tog paN+DI ta ga ru 'di dag gang yang rung ba'i me tog gam/_dus ci lta ba'i me tog dri zhim po bcug ste/_sngags 'dis mchod yon dbul bar bya'o/_na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/_
[\[128a.3\]]a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_he he ma hA kA ru Ni ka bi shwa rU pa d+hA ra ni/_ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha pa ya/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_maN+Da la ma d+h+ye pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/_sarba b+hu tA nu kaM pa ka grih+na grih+na hUM/_aM ba ra bi tsA ri Ne swA hA/_'dir yang phyag rgya ni gang ba zhes bya bar 
[\[128a.4\]]grags pa sems can thams cad dang rjes su mthun zhing brtan pa'o/_/'dir yang dri'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni/_na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_na maHsa man+ta gan+d+hA ba b+hA sa shri ye/_ta thA ga tA ya/_tad+ya thA/_gan+d+he gan+d+he gan ng+h+yA de/_gan+d+ha ma no ra the/_pra tIts+tsha pra tIts+tsha maM/_gan+d+haM sa ma tA nu tsA ri 
[\[128a.5\]]Ni swA hA/_'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni lo ma zhes bya ba re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/'dir me tog gi sngags su 'gyur ba ni/_na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_na maHsaM ku su mi ta rA dza s+ya/_ta thA ga ta s+ya/_tad+ya thA/_ku su me ku su me ku 
[\[128a.6\]]su mA d+h+ye/_ku su ma pU ra bA si ni/_ku su ma ba ti swA hA/_bdug pa'i sngags 'di nyid dang gong du bstan pa'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o/_/sku ni rmad byung bsam mi khyab/_/sangs rgyas thams cad phyag 'tshal te/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yi/_/gtor ma'i 
[\[128a.7\]]sngags ni bshad par bya/_na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_he he b+ha ga bAn/_ma ha sa twa sarba lo ki te i maM ba li gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM/_sarba bi shwa ra ra Ta Ta s+pha Ta swA hA/_'dis ni bshos dbul bar bya ste/_'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma yang bya'o/_/
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni/_/mdung zhes bya ba ma rungs pa/_/thams cad zlog par byed pa'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_sarba ta mo \u0f85n+d+ha kA ra bid+hAn sa nAM/_na maHsa man+ta dz+yo ti gan d+hA ba b+hA sa shri ye/_ta thA ga tA ya/_tad+ya thA/_he he b+ha ga 
[\[128b.2\]]bAn/_dz+yo ti ra smi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra bi kurba bi kurba ma ha bo d+hi sa twA sa man+ta dz+wa lod d+yo ti ta mUr ti khurda khurda/_a ba lo ka ya/_a ba lo ka ya mAn/_baM sarba/_sa twA nAM tsa swA hA/_mar me'i sngags te 'dis mar me dbul bar bya'o/_/kha bye ba zhes bya ba'i phyag 
[\[128b.3\]]rgya ni/_/sems can kun gyis mthong ba'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_dz+wa lA ya dz+wa lA ya/_hUM bi b+ho da ka ha ri kr-iSh+Na ping+ga la swA hA/_me'i bya ba byed pa'i sngags so/_/'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni/_/sems can kun 
[\[128b.4\]]la 'od gsal byed/_/kha sbyar zhes byar 'jig rten grags/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyir/_/thub pa mchog gis sngon bshad pa'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la smras pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngags kyi tshig 'di 
[\[128b.5\]]ni gsang ba dang bcas shing mchog tu gsang bar bya ba yin te/_khyod bu 'jig rten rnams grags pa'i/_/mi bzad pa ni gang yin pa/_/sngags rnams dag ni thams cad kyis/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis bsgrubs pa ste/_/spyi bo'i gdu bu zhes grags pa/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i 
[\[128b.6\]]rigs kyang yin/_/de ni rnam par gzhig bya'i phyir/_/rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_oM ka ra ka ra/_ku ru ku ru/_ma ma kAr+yaM b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_sarba big+h+na da ha da ha sarba badzra bi nA ya kaM mUr+N+ha ga TaM dzri bi tAn+ta ka ra ma hA bi kr-i ta 
[\[128b.7\]]rU pa d+hA ri Ni/_pa tsa pa tsa sarba duSh+TA na/_ma hA ga na pa ti dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra ban d+ha ban d+ha sarba gra hAn/_ShaT mu kha ShaT b+hu dza/_ShaT tsa ra Na ru dra mA na ya/_biSh+Nu mA na ya bra h+mA d+ya de ba mA na ya mA bi laM ba/_la hu la hu maN+Da la ma d+h+ye pra be sha ya/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M s+pha Ta s+pha Ta 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]swA hA/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i sngags chen po gdong drug pa zhes bya ba yin te/_khro bo'i rgyal po bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa ste/_'di brjod pa tsam gyis sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas 
[\[129a.2\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jigs par byed pa yin na/_bgegs ma rungs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos 'di brjod pa tsam nyid kyis srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/_/'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni/_/nag po chen po zhes bya ba'i/_/bgegs rnams thams cad 'jig byed 
[\[129a.3\]]pa'o/_/'di nyid kyi khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po ni/_oM hrIHSh+TIHbi kr-i tA na na hU~M sarba sha trUM nA sha ya staM b+ha ya phaT phaT swA hA/_sngags 'di brjod pas dgra thams cad zug gzer chen po dang /_nad chen po dang nyin bzhi pa'i rims kyis thebs par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu dga' ba 
[\[129a.4\]]med pa dang /_byams pa med pa dang /_snying rje'i sems thob par mi 'gyur te/_bzlas pa zin gyi bar du grol bar mi 'gyur zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dag la bya'i/_zhi ba'i sems yod pa gzhan dag la ni ma yin no/_/phyag 
[\[129a.5\]]rgya ni rtse gsum chen po zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya'o/_/'dir nye ba'i snying por 'gyur ba ni/_oM tri kA la rU pa hU~M khaM swA hA/_phyag rgya ni rtse gsum chen po zhes bya ba nyid sbyar bar bya'o/_/ma rungs pa thams cad la gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur ro/_/snying po'i mchog sangs rgyas
