[\[129a.6\]]thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i yi ge gcig pa zhes bya'o/_/hU~M/_'di ni las thams cad byed pa'o/_/phyag rgya yang rtse gsum chen po zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o/_/phung khrol thams cad zlog par byed pa/_'byung po thams cad dbang du byed pa ste/_mdor na khro 
[\[129a.7\]]bo'i rgyal po 'di ni las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzlas pa byas na grub pa'i dus su khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur ro/_/'dir gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni/_na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]dza ya dza ya su dza ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka bi shwa rU pi Ni gats+tsha sarba bud d+hAsh+tsa/_bi sar+dz+dza ya sa pa rI bA raM swa b+hA ba nAM tsa pra be sha ya sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sarbAr+thAsh+tsa me sid d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa da ma no ra thany+tsa/_me pa ri pU ra yan+tu swA hA/_'di ni gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags te/_las thams cad la 
[\[129b.2\]]sbyar bar bya'o/_/phyag rgya ni bzang po'i gdan zhes bya ba yin te/_'dis gdan la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/yid kyis bzlas pa bdun byas te gshegs su gsol lo/_/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang sngags grub pa dag dang /_
[\[129b.3\]]dam tshig dang /_bzlas pa dang /_dus dang nges par sdom pa dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la yang bltas te/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang /_rang gi rig pa'i tshogs kyi sngags kyi le'u rab 
[\[129b.4\]]'byam smras so/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta gA trA NAM/_oM ri Ti ni swA hA/_'di ni 'jam dpal gyi rjes su 'brang ba skra can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa/_las thams cad byed pa/_phyag rgya chen po gtsug phud lnga zhes bya ba dug gi las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/_/
[\[129b.5\]]na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_oM ni ti Ti/_'di ni nye ba'i skra can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa yin te las thams cad byed pa'o/_/phyag rgya ni kha bye ba zhes bya ba gza' thams cad kyi las la sbyar bar bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta ga tI nAM/_laM ni/_rig 
[\[129b.6\]]pa 'di ni pad+ma can zhes bya ste/_las thams cad byed cing dge ba'o/_/phyag rgya bzang po'i gdan zhes bya ba dang ldan pas gnod sbyin mo nges par dgug par bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NAM/_oM Sh+Tai Sh+Tai swA hA/_phyag rgya mdung ni bsdam pa yis/_
[\[129b.7\]]mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'joms par byed/_/sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyis/_/thams cad gzugs can rab bsngags pa/_/rig pa thod can zhes bya ba/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa yin/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta tsa rI NAM/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]oM ba ra de swA hA/_/phyag rgya gtsug phud gsum nyid ni/_/dpal sbyin byed pas sbyar bar bya/_/gzugs mnga' 'chang ba lha mo ni/_/myur du longs spyod sgrub byed pa'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NAM/_oM b+hu ru swA hA/_phyag rgya mdung rtse yang 
[\[130a.2\]]dag sbyar/_/rims nad thams cad rnam 'jig yin/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA NAM/_a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NAM/_oM tA re swA hA/_rig pa phug ron zhes bya ba/_/las rnams kun la rab tu bsngags/_/phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis/_/bgegs ni 'joms par byed pa yin/_/
[\[130a.3\]]na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM bi lo ki ni swA hA/_/rig pa snang ldan zhes bya ba/_/'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed/_/bde ba thams cad sbyin byed pa/_/gdong gi phyag rgya sbyar bar bya/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NAM/_
[\[130a.4\]]tad+ya thA/_oM bi shwe bi shwe saM b+hA be bi shwa rU pI Ni ka ha ka ha a be shwa be sha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ru ru tiSh+Tha swA hA/_rig pa chen po stobs chen 'di/_/'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa ste/_/mche ba'i phyag rgya ldan byas na/_/sems can thams cad 'bebs shing dge/_/'byung po kun la 
[\[130a.5\]]mchog sbyin pa/_/thams cad ces ni yang dag bsgrags/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI nAM/_oM shwe te shrI ba su swA hA/_rma bya'i gdan gyi phyag rgya yis/_/rnam dgod las ni thams cad byed/_/dkar mo chen mo zhes bya ba/_/rmad byung bsam med 
[\[130a.6\]]gzugs can te/_/'jig rten rnams kyi skal ldan byed/_/skyes pa bud med dbang du 'gyur/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM khi khi ri khi ri b+hang gu ri sarba sha truM staM b+ha ya dzam b+ha ya mo ha ya ba sha mA na ya swA hA/_rig pa 'di ni rig chen 
[\[130a.7\]]po/_/rnal 'byor ma zhes rab tu bstan/_/phyag rgya gdong gsum sbyar byas na/_/ma rungs sems can 'dul bar byed/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shAk+ti pra tsa rI NAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM shrIH/_rig pa 'di ni dpal chen mo/_/'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa ste/_/
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]phyag rgya kha sbyar sbyar byas na/_/rgyal srid chen po sbyin byed pa'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_sarba satwA b+ha ya pra da yi nAM/_oM a dzi te ku mA ra rU pI NI e h+ye hi A gats+tsha ma ma kAr+yaM ku ru swA hA/_rgyal byed ma zhes rnam grags pa/_/gzhon nu bdud rtsi las byung ba/_/rdzogs pa'i 
[\[130b.2\]]phyag rgya ldan pa yis/_/dgra rnams thams cad zlog par byed/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM dza ye swA hA/_bi dza ye swA hA/_a dzi te swA hA/_a pa rA dzi te swA hA/_sring mo bzhi zhes rnam grags pa/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rjes 
[\[130b.3\]]'gro ba/_/sa rnams thams cad kun 'gro zhing /_/kun la rjes su 'dzin byed pa'o/_/ming po gtum bu ru zhes grags/_/'di dag gi ni rjes su 'brang /_/gru yi bzhon pa la zhon nas/_/rgya mtsho la ni gnas pa yin/_/khu tshur phyag rgya bcings pa yis/_/bsam pa thams cad 
[\[130b.4\]]yongs rdzogs byed/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_lo kA grA d+hi pa tI nAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM ku mA ra ma hA ku mA ra kri Da kri Da/_shaM mu kha bo d+hi satwA nu dz+nyA ta/_ma yU rA sa na/_shak+to d+ya ta pA Ne/_rak+tAM ga rak+ta gan d+hA nu le pa na pri ya/_kha kha khA hi khA hi hUM nr-i t+ya nr-i t+ya/_rak+ta puSh+pA rtsi ta mUrti sa ma 
[\[130b.5\]]ya ma nu sma ra/_b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/_b+h+rA ma ya b+h+rA ma ya/_lA hu lA hu mA bi lam+ba sarba kA Ni me ku ru ku ru/_bi tsi tra rU pa d+hA ri NAM/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M sarba bud d+hA nu dz+nyA ta swA hA/_skyob pa byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na/_/sa rnams ma lus rnam drug tu/_/
[\[130b.6\]]kun nas yongs su rab tu g.yos/_/sems can kun gyi don phyir dang /_/ma rungs sems can zlog pa'i phyir/_/mi bzad dbang phyug bu'i gzugs su/_/gdul ba'i don du 'dir ston te/_/skem byed dang ni mig dmar gyi/_/phyag mtshan gyis ni mtshon pa ste/_/snying 
[\[130b.7\]]rjes thugs ni brlan pa yis/_/'jam pa'i ngag gis gsungs pa yin/_/sems dpa'i nang na bdag nyid che/_/byis pa rnams la phan byed gang /_/sems can spyod phyir brtson pa ni/_/'gro ba kun la rnam par spyod/_/phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis/_/bdag nyid chen pos 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]sbyar na ni/_/tshangs pa sogs pa'ang 'gugs byed na/_/mi rnams la ni smos ci dgos/_/gzhon nu'i sems su mtha' dag ni/_/bsdus nas yongs su bshad par bya/_/smin drug bu dang 'jam dpal gyi/_/sngags su 'di ni yang dag bstan/_/sems can 
[\[131a.2\]]rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/_/byang chub sems dpar 'di ston to/_/yig gsum zhes bya'i snying po ni/_/'di yi sngags su brjod pa yin/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/longs spyod 'dren pa'i mchog de yin/_/phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis/_/bkod na las kun 
[\[131a.3\]]byed pa yin/_/oM hUM dz+dzaH/_sngags 'di mdo ru bsdu byas na/_/mi rnams kyi ni don byed do/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_sa man+ta d+yo ti ta mU rtI nAM/_oM bi kr-i ta gra ha hUM phaT swA hA/_'di yang nye ba'i snying po ste/_/de bzhin phyag rgya mdung ldan pas/_/'byung po thams cad 
[\[131a.4\]]'gugs byed cing /_/de bzhin gza' dang ma mor bcas/_/phyag rgya kun gyis phyag rgya la/_/bkod na 'bras bur bcas par 'gyur/_/'byung po rnams ni dngangs byed cing /_/ma rungs 'jug pa zlog par byed/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i gdong drug gi bu 
[\[131a.5\]]zhes bya ba'i 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i rjes su 'brang ba ste/_las thams cad byed pa ste/_bzlas pa tsam kho nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/'byung po thams cad dngangs par byed pa dang /_skrag par byed pa dang /_'gugs par byed pa dang /_dbang du byed pa 
[\[131a.6\]]dang skem par byed pa dang /_'jig par byed pa dang rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM bra h+ma bra h+ma bar tsa sa shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/_sngags 'di tshangs pa chen po ste/_/
[\[131a.7\]]byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin/_/'byung pos zhi gyur rab tu thob/_/skad cig nyid la bsil bar gyur/_/phyag rgya gtsug phud lnga sbyar na/_/myur du dge legs thob par 'gyur/_/mngon spyod dag ni thams cad la/_/srid srung gi ni rig byed 'dod/_/'di ni 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]mdor bsdu bstan pa ste/_/'di yi cho ga bsdus pa yin/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM ga ru Da bA ha na tsa kra pA Ni/_tsa tur b+hu dza hUM hUM sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_b+ho d+hi satwa A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal 
[\[131b.2\]]pa/_/zhi ba'i don ni myur byed yin/_/'byung po rnams ni rnam 'jig cing /_/khyab 'jug gzugs kyi lus can yin/_/phyag rgya gtsug phud gsum sbyar na/_/las rnams kun byed brtan pa yin/_/gang dag khyab 'jug rgyud la ni/_/bya ba rgya cher bstan pa dag_/
[\[131b.3\]]thabs kyis gdul bya'i sems can la/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa yin/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nAM nAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM ma hA ma he shwa ra b+hU tA d+hI pa ti br-i Sha b+ha d+h+wa dza pra laM ba dza Ta dza Ta mu ku Ta d+hA ri Ne/_si ta b+hasma d+hu sa ri ta mUrti hUM hUM phaT phaT bo d+hi sa twa A dz+nyA 
[\[131b.4\]]pa ya ti swA hA/_sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/_/sngags 'di bdag gis smras pa ste/_/phyag rgya mdung rtse gsum sbyar na/_/'byung po thams cad rnam 'jig pa'o/_/bdag gis sngon ni gang bstan pa/_/'di yi cho ga sngon byung ba/_/sems can sa steng gnas pa la/_/
[\[131b.5\]]zhi ba pa zhes brjod pa ste/_/yon tan sna tshogs rgya che ba/_/zhi ba'i rgyud las nga yis bstan/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM shA ku na ma hA shA ku na/_pad+ma bi dA ta pa k+Sha sarba pan+nA ga na shA ga kha kha khA hi khA hi sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ha tiSh+Tha bo d+hi 
[\[131b.6\]]sa twa A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_sngags 'di'i mthu ni chen po ste/_/nam mkha' lding zhes rnam par grags/_/gdul dka' 'dul byed rnams kyi mchog_/gdengs ka can gyi dug rnams 'joms/_/phyag rgya che dang sbyar byas na/_/phung khrol shin tu mi bzad 'joms/_/
[\[131b.7\]]gnas dang 'gro ba'i dug dag ni/_/gso bar byed la the tshom med/_/sems can gdul bya'i thabs su ni/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag bka'/_/nam mkha' lding gzugs sa la spyod/_/'dab chags dbang po 'od chen ldan/_/ci srid nam mkha' lding rgyud 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]du/_/cho ga rgya cher bstan de dag_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/thams cad nga yis bstan pa ste/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' lding /_/dul ba'i don du 'di bstan to/_/gdengs can dug ni gzhom bya'i phyir/_/'dab chags tshul gyis 
[\[132a.2\]]rnam par rgyu/_/'jig rten sngags ni ji srid pa/_/cho ga 'di ni bstan pa na/_/sems can gdul bya'i don du ni/_/de lta de ltar rnam par rgyu/_/gang yang de bzhin gshegs sngags dang /_/rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang /_/nga yis cho ga rab 'byam dang /_/mdo dag kyang ni 
[\[132a.3\]]bstan pa yin/_/ji ltar ma mo mang po ni/_/'bad pas byis pa rnams srung ba/_/de bzhin byis pa'i blo can la/_/sngags kyi tshul gyis nga yis bshad/_/sngon ni stobs bcu ldan pas bstan/_/da ni nga yis bstan pa yin/_/sngags rgyud don ni ma lus pa/_/'od chen gzhon nus 
[\[132a.4\]]bstan pa yin/_/rgyal ba mchog gis gang gsungs dang /_/stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras gsungs dang /_/rmad byung bsam mi khyab tshul gyis/_/'jam dbyangs kyis gsungs de dag go/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i 
[\[132a.5\]]gzhal med khang dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas/_dam tshig thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/gang du ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sems can mtha' dag gi sgrub pa'i spyod 
[\[132a.6\]]pa sems la rab tu zhugs par gyur to/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che sna tshogs pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te/_bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad 
[\[132a.7\]]du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa dang /_sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa dag gis kyang dkyil 'khor de bri ba'am 'drir gzhug par mi 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]nus na so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i sems can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang po de grub pa'i gnas skabs la gnas pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzigs nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang /_rang sangs 
[\[132b.2\]]rgyas thams cad dang /_'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa/_rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba thams cad dang /_spyod pa la zhugs pa thams cad dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa thams cad 'jam 
[\[132b.3\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyi thugs las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs par bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes par gyur to/_/
[\[132b.4\]]sems can so so'i skye bo'i yid kyis kyang de dmigs par mi nus na bri ba'am 'drir 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dkyil 'khor chen po bzang po de la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can de dag la smras pa/_grogs po dag nyon cig 'di ni de 
[\[132b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin na/_sems can gzhan 'phags pa dang /_'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gas gsang ba pa'i 
[\[132b.6\]]bdag po phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras mi las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa/_yid las byung ba ni bstan to/_/mi rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das na'ang /_sems can 
[\[132b.7\]]rnams gang du yang dag par zhugs na/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/_rgyal ba'i sras gang de dus la bab par shes na 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]gsungs shig gsungs shig_/shAkya seng ge mgon po ni/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das 'og na/_/sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas nyid/_/sa steng khyod kyi dkyil 'khor byed/_/mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig rten na/_/sngags ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/_/
[\[133a.2\]]mi shes cho ga nyams pa'am/_/dam tshig bdag por ma gyur na/_/bdag nyid chen po tshangs pa yang /_/sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/sngags la dad pa med pas ni/_/'bad pa du ma byas gyur kyang /_/sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur bas/_/ma rungs dam 
[\[133a.3\]]tshig mi bstan to/_/dam tshig sbyor ba nyams pa ni/_/rab 'byam brgya byin yin na yang /_/sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur na/_/mi rnams smos kyang ci zhig dgos/_/dam tshig bstan bcos de nyid shes/_/las kyi spyod pa sgrub pa la/_/'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/_/
[\[133a.4\]]sngags rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ni/_/las kun byed la rab zhugs na/_/bstan pa la ni gzhon nu bzhin/_/sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sems dpa' chen po de 
[\[133a.5\]]la gsol ba btab pa/_kye sems can chen po sems can gyi don gyi phyir mdor bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs shig ces so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas sems can gyi don gyi phyir/_dkyil 'khor 
[\[133a.6\]]gyi cho ga smras pa/_re zhig dang po cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed dam dpyid zla 'bring po'am dpyid zla tha [{]chungs sam [,]chung ngam [}]zla ba yar ngo 'am/_nyin zhag dge ba dang gza' bzang po bltas te/_rgyu skar bzang po dang ldan pa yar ngo'i tshes gcig dang /_zla ba nya ba'am dus gzhan la 
[\[133a.7\]]dbyar gyi dus spangs la/_snga dro sa byin gyis brlab par bya ste/_gang du grong khyer chen po la brten pa'am/_dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon rang nyid 'dug par bya'o/_/rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa'i gnas sam/_rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang nye ba'i grong khyer chen po'i byang shar 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]gyi phyogs su ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi nye bar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon song ste lo ma'i spyil bu byas pa la zhag bdun nam zla ba phyed kyi bar du gcig pu rab tu gnas par bya ste/_gang gnas de dag tu'ang gtsang ma'i sa phyogs rdo ba med pa/_gyo mo dang thal ba dang sol ba 
[\[133b.2\]]dang /_/phub ma dang rus pa spangs pa shin tu gtsang ba shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa'i sa phyogs su srog chags med pa'i chu la ba'i rnam lnga'am/_tsan+dan dang ga pur dang /_gur gum gyi chus bsres pa khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_gtsug phud lnga'i 
[\[133b.3\]]phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas sa phyogs der phyogs bzhi dang steng dang /_'og dang thad ka dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du bsang gtor bya'o/_/de nas phyogs der kun nas gru bzhir khru bcu drug gam khru bcu gnyis sam khru brgyad pa bya ste/_de la chen po ni khru bcu drug 
[\[133b.4\]]pa'o/_/'bring ni khru bcu gnyis pa'o/_/chung ngu ni khru brgyad pa'o/_/dkyil 'khor 'di ni rnam pa gsum/_/thams cad gzigs pas gsungs pa yin/_/rgyal po 'dod pas chen po ste/_/'bring ni longs spyod 'phel byed pa/_/chung ngu'i dam tshig yang dag srung /_/las 
[\[133b.5\]]rnams kun byed zhi ba yin/_/de dag las yid la gang 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba ni de la sa phyogs der khru do tsam brkos la/_der rdo ba dang sol ba dang thal ba dang rus pa dang skra la sogs pa dang /_srog chags kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs gal te mthong na/_sa'i phyogs 
[\[133b.6\]]gzhan du brko ba byas na gnod pa med pa dang 'tshe ba med par 'gyur ro/_/ri bo'i rtse mo dang chu bo'i ngogs dang rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang chu bo chen po'i ngogs su bye ma'i phung po chen po rnams 'bad pas/_shin tu so sor brtags te/_shin tu gtsang ba dang srog chags med par byas 
[\[133b.7\]]la bri bar bya'o/_/sa phyogs de yang srog chags med pa'i chu la ba'i rnam lnga bsres te/_chu bo'i klung gis gtsang ma'am/_grog mkhar gyi sa gang du srog chags med pa'i sa des dgang bar bya'o/_/bkang nas kyang legs par brdungs te kun nas mnyam par byas 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]la dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum gang 'dod par bya'o/_/seng ldeng gi phur ba bzhi la khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags lan bdun bzla zhing phyogs bzhir gdab bo/_/tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la khro bo'i snying po lan bdun bzlas pa byas te/_dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi kun 
[\[134a.2\]]nas bskor bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du dbus kyi gnas su nang du yang zur bzhir bya'o/_/dbus na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis rang gi rig pa rtsa ba'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o/_/gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis grogs po dang /_
[\[134a.3\]]bdag nyid bsrung bar byas la/_sngags zlo bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu byung ste/_dkyil 'khor de la g.yas su bskor ba byas nas kha shar phyogs su bltas te/_ku sha'i stan la 'dug par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid la 
[\[134a.4\]]byas te/_dkyil 'khor de'i gru bzhi kun du ku shas bskor zhing dgram par bya'o/_/de nyid kyi phyi rol du yang ba rnams zhag gcig gnas pas bsnyal zhing dbyung bar bya'o/_/de la dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngon du bya ba rnams byas nas rang gi rgyud kyi sngags la 
[\[134a.5\]]mkhas pa dang /_sems can gyi don gyi thabs kyi phyir theg pa chen po la mos pa dang /_zhag gcig smyung bar byas pa dang grogs bzang po dang ldan pa dang /_bstan bcos sna tshogs kyi las mthong bas/_tshon sna lnga'i phye ma zhib mo shin tu gsal zhing legs par 
[\[134a.6\]]sbyar bar byas la/_yi ge drug pa'i snying po mngon par bzlas pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o/_/phyi rol du yang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba dang rta babs bzhis brgyan pa chu shing 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis g.yur za ba dang rnga bo che dang rdza rnga 
[\[134a.7\]]brdung ba dang dung gi sgra dang dga' ba dang /_bkra shis pa'i sgra sgrogs pa dag bya'o/_/zur bzhi nas chos mnyan pa dag la bshad par bya'o/_/phyogs bzhir theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bklag par bya ba la 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lho 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]phyogs su bklag par bya'o/_/'phags pa zla ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin nub phyogs su bklag par bya'o/_/'phags pa sdong pos brgyan pa byang phyogs su bklag par bya'o/_/'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde shar phyogs su bklag par bya'o/_/glegs bam dag med na mdo sde bzhi 
[\[134b.2\]]po shes pa'i gang zag chos 'chad pa po la chos mnyan pa'i phyir bskul bar bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon langs nas tsan+dan dang ga pur dang gur gum bsres pa'i me tog dri zhim pa dkar po la rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te/_dkyil 'khor de thams cad du chal par dgram par bya'o/_/
[\[134b.3\]]mngon par bkram pa byas nas phyi rol tu byung ste/_zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i kha zas bsten pa'i ri mo mkhan gnyis sam gsum byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gso sbyong nye bar bsten pa mkhas pa dag bcug ste/_rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gtsug phud bcing ba byas la/_de nas gser 
[\[134b.4\]]dang dngul dang zangs dang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las tshon sna lnga shin tu mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba'i phye ma zhib mo rab tu blangs te longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dag 'drir gzhug pa byas na/_dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis nges par byang chub 'thob pa yin 
[\[134b.5\]]na/_/sngags sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_shAkya'i skyes mchog 'das gyur nas/_/sems can bsod nams chung ba la/_/'di 'dra'i longs spyod ga la yod/_/de bas cho ga 'di bstan bya/_/'jam dbyangs 'od chen ldan pa yis/_/skye bo phongs par gzigs 
[\[134b.6\]]nas ni/_/nyung zhing dkyil bsdus dkyil 'khor ni/_/mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin/_/'bras sA lu dang thug po che'i phye ma shin tu zhib pa'i tshon sna lnga bzang po/_dkar ba dang ser ba dang dmar ba dang nag po dang ljang gu dag gis bsgyur te/_sngar bzhag pa'i tshon gyi phye ma slob 
[\[134b.7\]]dpon rang gis blangs nas/_gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te/_rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas phye ma de la phyag rgya bcing ngo /_/sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs su cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]thab khung bya ste/_rgyar khru do la zabs su khru gang ba kun nas 'khor bar pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra ba/_phyi rol yang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra ba shing pa la sha'i yam shing gis me sbar bar bya/_shing bil ba'i yam shing mtho gang tsam rlon pa la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /_mar la 
[\[135a.2\]]btags pa la rtsa ba'i sngags 'bru drug pa'am snying pos khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings te me lha spyan drang bar bya'o/_/spyan drangs nas sngar bstan pa nyid kyi rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge gcig pa'i snying pos phyir yang brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis cod pan dang 
[\[135a.3\]]'tshog chas byas nas bdag nyid dang ri mo mkhan yang rtse gcig par byas nas sbyin sreg byed du gzhug go/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid la byas te/_sngar bstan pa'i bdug pas bdugs nas thal mo sbyar te byang chub 
[\[135a.4\]]sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu btud nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yang phyag byas te/_tshon gyi phye ma blangs nas sku'i gzugs kyis bcad pa la/_ri mo mkhan gyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/cho ga 'di dag gis dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[135a.5\]]shAkya thub pa nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na chos ston cing bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon ri mo 'dri ba na 'dir sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis slob dpon bdag nyid 
[\[135a.6\]]bsrung ba'i phyir/_rtsa ba'i sngags kyis 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma gtang bar bya ste/_phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhi dang steng dang 'og dag tu gtor bar bya'o/_/de nas khrus byas te thab khung du nye bar song nas gos gtsang ma bgos te/_gtsang sbra dang srung ba'i cho ga byas 
[\[135a.7\]]nas gur gum dang bsres pa'i mar gyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas bzlas pa bya ste/_de nyid du gnas par bya'o/_/yungs kar la khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bsngags la kham phor kha sbyar 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]gyi nang du gzhag par bya'o/_/bgegs kyi rnam pa 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can mi bzad pa'i sgra rnam pa du ma rlung dang char dang yul ngan gzhan dang gzhan gang gi yang rung ba mthong na/_khros pas yungs kar kham phor nas phyung la chang par bcangs te lan bdun sbyin sreg byas pa des ni 
[\[135b.2\]]bgegs rab tu 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/mi'i bgegs la ni lan lnga chang pa nas sbyin sreg byas na skyes bu de rengs par 'gyur ba'am/_nus pa med par 'gyur ba'am/_'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/_skad cig de nyid la mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur ba la nams kyang the tshom med de/_
[\[135b.3\]]brgya byin yang 'chi bar byed na ma rungs ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i mi'am/_bgegs tha mal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi 'jigs pas bgegs rnams phan tshun du 'bros shing mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis de nyid du ku sha'i 
[\[135b.4\]]khres la gnas nas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi bzlas pa byed cing gnas par bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs kyi g.yas ngos su/_rang sangs rgyas nyid pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o/_/de gnyis kyi 'og tu 
[\[135b.5\]]nyan thos chen po gnyis chos nyan par bya'o/_/de dag gi yang g.yas su bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_ston ka'i 'dam bu'i mdog ltar dkar ba/_pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/_phyag g.yon pa na pad+ma 
[\[135b.6\]]bsnams pa/_phyag g.yas pa na mchog sbyin pa/_de'i yang g.yas na bcom ldan 'das ma yum gos dkar mo phyag g.yon pa na pad+ma bsnams pa/_phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal ba pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa gser gyi cod pan 'chang 
[\[135b.7\]]ba dar la dkar po'i na bza' mnabs pa/_thal ba nag pos thig le gsum byas pa de bzhin du sgrol ma dang /_khro gnyer can yang rang rang gi gnas su spyod lam dag gis gnas par bya'o/_/de dag gi steng du ni bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang /_
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan dang gtsug tor gyi rgyal mo rnams bya'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug bya ba la 'di lta ste/_kun tu bzang po dang /_sa'i snying po dang /_nam mkha' mdzod dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_ngan song 
[\[136a.2\]]rnam par sbyong ba dang /_byams pa rnga yab lag na thogs shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_dri ma med par 'gro ba dang /_dri ma med pa'i tog dang /_nor bzang dang /_zla ba'i 'od dang /_dri ma med par grags pa dang /_nad thams cad gso bar byed pa dang /_
[\[136a.3\]]chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang /_'jig rten 'gro ba dang /_blo chen po dang /_blo bzang po ste/_sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni lus shin tu zhi ba dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o/_/rig pa'i rgyal po'i gtso bo dang /_rig pa'i rgyal mo dang 
[\[136a.4\]]pad+ma'i rigs gzugs dang phyag rgya lung ci lta ba bzhin du gnas ci lta ba ma lus pa dag tu bri bar bya'o/_/mtha'i gru bzhi'i gnas dag tu ni gnas rnams gzhag par bya'o/_/pad+ma'i me tog legs par byas pa dang rig pa'i lha gang dran pa yang de dag tu gzhag par bya'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[136a.5\]]du lho phyogs su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang rang sangs rgyas gnyis ni/_ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du dkyil 'khor kyi shar du bdag nyid blta ba dang /_thams cad la yang 'jug pa'i sgo rnams bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya 
[\[136a.6\]]thub pa'i g.yon gyi phyogs su rang sangs rgyas gzhan gnyis te/_tsan+dan dang grub pa zhes bya ba gnyis bri bar bya'o/_/de gnyis kyi 'og tu nyan thos gnyis ni 'od srung chen po dang kA t+yA ya na chen po bri bar bya'o/_/de dag gi'ang g.yon du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ut+pa la 
[\[136a.7\]]ltar mdog sngo bsangs gzugs shin tu mdzes pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_lag pa g.yas pa na rnga yab thogs pa/_g.yon pa khro bo'i lus kyis gnas pa rdo rje khu tshur ma rdo rje lcags kyu ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma dpung bzang ma rdo rje sde ma cha byad ci lta ba bzhin du bgegs 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]kyi gdan la gnas pa/_rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad dang rig pa'i rgyal mo 'khor dang bcas pa bzlas pa dang /_phyag rgya dang ldan pa ji ltar shes pa bzhin bri bar bya'o/_/de dag gi yang g.yon du zur bzhir sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bri bar bya ste/_bris nas kyang gnas gang du rig 
[\[136b.2\]]pa'i tshogs ma dran pa'i gnas de dag kyang 'dir bzhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/de'i steng du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_bcom ldan 'das yum mA ma kI bri bar bya ste rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_gzugs shin tu mdzes par bya'o/_/de dag gi steng du gtsug 
[\[136b.3\]]tor gyi rgyal po brgyad kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas rang rang dag gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su bri bar bya ste/_gser gyi mdog can dbang po shin tu dul la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa la zur 
[\[136b.4\]]gyis blta ba dag la/_'di lta ste/_gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang /_gtsug tor gdugs dkar po dang /_rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang /_pad+ma'i gtsug tor dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang /_
[\[136b.5\]]gzi brjid phung po'i gtsug tor dang /_gtsug tor mthon po ste/_brgyad po 'di dag ni gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rnams so/_/g.yon du bri ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnams so/_/'jug pa'i phyogs kyi sgor ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyis bya ste/_g.yas phyogs su ni 'jig 
[\[136b.6\]]rten las 'das par 'gro ba zhes bya ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/_lus zhi ba lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin pas phreng ba 'dzin pa/_lag pa g.yon pas spyi blugs 'dzin cing sgo la mngon du phyogs pa bzhin cung zad khro gnyer dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/_'jug 
[\[136b.7\]]pa'i sgo'i g.yon phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya ba bri bar bya ste/_lus rab tu zhi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/_lag pa g.yon pa na dbyig pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa/_lag pa g.yas pa na mchog sbyin pa phreng ba 'dzin 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]pa bzhin cung zad khro gnyer dang ldan pa sgo la mngon du phyogs pa bri'o/_/seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'bar bas khyab pa/_de'i 'og tu rin po che'i gzhal med khang de la gnas pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[137a.2\]]nur gyur pa/_gzhon nu'i gzugs can sku mdog dmar skya zhi ba'i gzugs dang /_mdzes pa'i gzugs can cung zad zhal 'dzum pa/_phyag g.yon pa na ut+pa la sngon po bsnams pa phyag g.yas pa na bil ba bsnams pa/_byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_gtsug 
[\[137a.3\]]phud lngas nye bar mdzes par gyur pa mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs pa dar la'i stod g.yogs mnabs pa dar gyi na bzas smad g.yogs mdzad pa 'od kun nas 'phro ba 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun nas khyab pa pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed la 
[\[137a.4\]]gzigs pa dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon du phyogs pa blta na sdug pa bri bar bya'o/_/de'i g.yas phyogs kyi ngos kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed bri bar bya ste/_mi sdug pa chen po'i gzugs can kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/_bka' len 
[\[137a.5\]]cing 'dzin pa/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i phyogs su lta ba'o g.yon phyogs kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu'i gzugs can/_byang chub sems dpa' lnga bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/_shin tu dri med dang shin tu dul ba dang dag pa dang mun sel dang kun 
[\[137a.6\]]tu snang ba'o/_/de dag thams cad kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na 'dug pa/_rin po che du ma 'bar ba'i rdo'i steng dang 'dra ba kun nas 'bar ba me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal bkram pa shin tu mdzes pa bri bar bya'o/_/phyi rol 'khor yug tu zur bzhi'i rnam par byas 
[\[137a.7\]]te/_rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa phyogs bzhi nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshon sna lnga gsal bas ri mo shin tu drang ba dang ldan pa nang gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/_/shar gyi bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du ri mo'i dbus su me tog kun nas skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs cung zad chung bar bya'o/_/'od kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/_mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa/_skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_de'i g.yas su gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya bri bar 
[\[137b.2\]]bya'o/_/g.yon du ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi steng du ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[137b.3\]]ma'i phyag rgya'i g.yas su bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs can bya ste/_phyag mchog sbyin pa/_pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/_de'i yang g.yas phyogs su ni lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi 
[\[137b.4\]]phyag rgya bya'o/_/de bzhin du mthar gyis 'jug pa'i gnas la ni pad+ma'i phyag rgya bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon phyogs su gtsug tor gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri ste kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i 
[\[137b.5\]]phreng bas khyab pa/_de'i g.yon phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog bya ste/_rin po che'i ri bo'i steng du chos ston cing bzhugs pa/_bai DUr+ya sngon po dang margad dang pad+ma rA ga rnam pa sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba'i kun nas 'od dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o/_/de'i 
[\[137b.6\]]yang g.yon phyogs su rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa bri'o/_/de'i yang g.yon phyogs su chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba dang ldan pa bri'o/_/de'i yang g.yon phyogs su 'khar gsil dang /_spyi blugs dang phreng 
[\[137b.7\]]ba dang bzang po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya bri'o/_/mthar gyis sgo'i gnas su rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyis ka la yang kun nas 'bar ba bri'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i 'og tu phyag rgya chen po gtsug phud lnga zhes bya ba dang /_ut+pa la'i phyag rgya 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]kun nas 'bar ba 'di gnyis phan tshun 'brel ba bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor kun nas sgo bri bar bya'o/_/sgo dag ni rgyab kyis lta ba dang /_'jug pa na ni mdun gyis blta bar bya'o/_/phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gyur ba yang kha dog lnga'i tshon shin tu gsal ba sna 
[\[138a.2\]]tshogs blta na sdug pa/_zur bzhis rnam par 'byes pa/_rta babs bzhi'i rnam pa phyogs bzhir khru gnyis tsam nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su tshangs pa chen po bri bar bya ste/_gdong bzhi pa gos dkar po bgos pa la stod g.yogs gos dkar po dang /_tshangs 
[\[138a.3\]]skud dkar po thogs pa/_kha dog gser 'dra ba/_ral pa'i cod can 'dzin pa/_lag na dbyug pa dang /_spyi blugs 'dzin pa/_de'i g.yas phyogs su 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu bya ste/_mdog gser 'dra ba bsam gtan khyad par can gyi gzugs can/_dar la'i gos bgos 
[\[138a.4\]]pa dar la'i stod g.yogs byas pa/_bzhin shin tu gsal ba ral ba'i cod can 'dzin pa mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/_skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa lag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/_de'i g.yas phyogs su 'og min gyi lha'i bu bya ste/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_
[\[138a.5\]]lus rab tu zhi ba bsam gtan gyi rnam pa'i cha byad can/_dar la'i gos bgos pa dar la'i gos kyis stod g.yogs byas pa/_skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa lag pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/_mchod phyir thogs dkar pos byas pa/_de'i rim gyis dga' ldan dang /_
[\[138a.6\]]'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_'thab bral dang /_brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu bri bar bya ste/[ {]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji lta ba dang cha byad dang dbyibs ci lta ba bzhin du'o/_/brgya byin gyi 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris la rtag tu myos dang /_phreng thogs 
[\[138a.7\]]dang /_lag na gzhong thogs dang /_pi bang gnyis pa dang sa bla'i lha'i bu dag [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji lta ba dang /_cha byad ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs su mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang shin tu mthong ba dang gya nom snang dang /_dge chung dang bsod nams skyes 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]la sogs pa'i lha'i bu cha byad dang dbyibs ci lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o/_/nub phyogs dang byang phyogs su yang de bzhin te/_de dag ni rim pa 'og ma gnyis la brten te bri bar bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gsum par 'gyur ba la/_mthar gyis phyogs 
[\[138b.2\]]bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi ste/_byang phyogs nas 'jug pa'i g.yas ngos su gter nye bar gnas pa la/_nor sbyin rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_gtsug phud cung zad 'dud pa gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can/_de'i g.yas su nor bu bzang po dang gang ba bzang po gnod sbyin gyi 
[\[138b.3\]]bdag po gnyis bri'o/_/de bzhin du mthar gyis gnod sbyin ma chen mo 'phrog ma yang bri'o/_/de bzhin du mthar gyis nub phyogs su chu lha lag na zhags pa thogs pa dang /_klu dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo dang /_'jog po dang /_nor rgyas la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po chen po brgyad 
[\[138b.4\]]po bri'o/_/de bzhin du rim pa gnyis la gnas pa'i mthar gyis gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_drang srong dang /_grub pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_nam mkha' lding dang mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dang /_sman dang 
[\[138b.5\]]nor bu rin po che'i bye brag dang ri dang chu bo dang gling dang mthar gyis gtso bo thams cad bri bar bya'o/_/lho phyogs su ni gshin rje ma mo bdun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/_/shar lho mtshams su me kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/_dbyug pa dang spyi blugs dang 
[\[138b.6\]]phreng ba lag na thogs pa/_ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa/_gos dkar po bgos pa/_dar la'i stod g.yogs byas pa/_mchod phyir thogs dkar po thogs pa/_mdog gser 'dra ba thal ba'i thig le gsum byas pa/_de bzhin du rgyan dang mtshon cha dang cha byad 
[\[138b.7\]]dang dbyibs dang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa rim pa gnyis pa la brten te bri bar bya'o/_/thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo'i phyi rol du dka' zlog gi bdag po khyu mchog la zhon pa/_lag na mdung rtse gsum thogs pa lha mo dka' zlog ma kha dog sna tshogs 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_smin drug gi bu rma bya'i stan la 'dug pa mdung thogs pa/_gzhon nu'i gzugs can gdong drug pa lus dmar por snang ba/_gos ser po bgos pa/_gos ser po'i stod g.yogs can lag pa g.yon pa na dril bu dang ba dan 
[\[139a.2\]]dmar po thogs pa/_mthar gyis b+h+ring gi ri ti shin tu rid pa 'dra ba dang /_tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang /_dga' byed dbang phyug dang nag po chen po dang /_ma mo bdun po rgyan dang mtshon cha dang kha dog dang dbyibs ci lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o/_/nor lha brgyad dang drang srong bdun 
[\[139a.3\]]dang khyab 'jug lag pa bzhi na 'khor lo dang dung dang ga dA dang ral gri thogs pa/_gdan nam mkha' lding rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_gza' brgyad dang rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun dang /_gang yang nye ba'i gza' brgyad sa steng gi dkyil 'khor na rab tu rgyu ba yang bri bar bya'o/_/
[\[139a.4\]]mthar gyis tshes grangs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga dang yar ngo dang mar ngo'i phyogs dang /_khyim bcu gnyis dang dus drug dang zla ba bcu gnyis dang lo tshigs dang /_sring mo bzhi gru la zhon pa dang ming po lnga gru la zhon zhing chu la gnas pa ste/_mdor na phyag rgyar gzhag par bya ba yang yin no/_/lha mo 
[\[139a.5\]]de dag mthar gyis rim pa gnyis pa la brten te bya ba yin no/_/slob dpon bdag nyid phyi rol tu byung nas dkyil 'khor de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_mdor na dkyil 'khor gsum yang dkyil 'khor la brten cing bri bar bya ste/_dkyil 'khor gsum char yang gru 
[\[139a.6\]]bzhir rnam par gnas par bya ba yin no/_/mdor na 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi mgon po ni nges par bri bar bya'o/_/pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang nges par bri bar bya'o/_/rdo rje'i rigs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'ang 
[\[139a.7\]]nges par bri bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtso bo 'phags pa kun du bzang po'ang nges par bri bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang nges par bri bar bya'o/_/lhag ma rnams ni ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/_/'di ni nang gi dkyil 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]'khor ro/_/dkyil 'khor bar ma la yang shar phyogs su ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'od gsal ba ni lho phyogs su'o/_/'og min gyi gzugs can rnams lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par ro/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar ni 
[\[139b.2\]]brjod par mi bya'o/_/byang phyogs su brgya byin lha'i rgyal po dang /_rab 'thab bral dang /_yongs su dga' ldan dang /_rab 'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_'od chung la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams nges par lha'i rgyal po re re bya'o/_/lhag ma rnams ni phyag 
[\[139b.3\]]rgyar gnas par bya'o/_/de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gsum par yang byang phyogs su 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan dka' thub zlog ma dang bcas pa nges par bri'o/_/'jam dpal gyi sgo gnyis pa'i sgo'i drung du ni smin drug gi bu rma bya'i stan yod pa lag na mdung thogs pa/_
[\[139b.4\]]lus kyi kha dog dmar ba/_gos ser pos stod g.yogs dang gos byas pa lag pa g.yas pa na dril bu dang ba dan thogs pa/_gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyi 'khor la lta ba'o/_/shar phyogs su ni nam mkha' lding 'dab chags kyi gzugs can dang /_drang srong gi nang 
[\[139b.5\]]nas mar ka Na Da nges par bri bar bya'o/_/lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o/_/shar lhor ni gzhon nu ma bzhi dang /_ming po gzhon nu dang bcas pa/_gru'i bzhon pa la gnas pa/_rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par rgyu ba dang /_me lha'i rgyal po yang nges par 
[\[139b.6\]]bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs su ni srin po'i bdag po las ni grong khyer lang ka'i bdag po bi b+hi sha na shing pi tsu marda la gnas pa dang /_dzam b+ha la chu dbang zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' nges par bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du mthar gyis gshin rje'i 
[\[139b.7\]]rgyal po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rdzu 'phrul chen po nges par bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du sha za'i rgyal po rnam par g.yengs byed ces bya ba nges par bri bar bya'o/_/lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams su ni klu'i gtso bo dga' bo dang /_nye dga' 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]bo nges par bri bar bya'o/_/gza'i gtso bo nyi ma bri bar bya'o/_/nub phyogs su ni drang srong thub pa'i mchog gcer bu pa mu stegs kyi mchog gcer bu'i gzugs bri bar bya'o/_/lhag ma ni ci ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o/_/nub byang mtshams su ni gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po 
[\[140a.2\]]mchog sbyin dang /_dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa nges par bri bar bya'o/_/lhag ma ni gnas ji lta ba dang /_dbyibs ci lta ba bzhin du phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi po phyi rol du ri mo lngar bkod de/_phyag rgya'i phreng bas nye bar mdzes par 
[\[140a.3\]]byas pa/_zur bzhi nas rta babs bzhi dang rgyal po chen po bzhis brgyan pa ci ltar gnas pa la 'di lta ste/_phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sgor 'jug pa la ut+pal sngon po bri'o/_/g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyogs su ni pad+ma rdo rje dgra sta/_ral gri mdung dang mdung rtse gsum pa dang /_ga dA dang 'khor lo 
[\[140a.4\]]dang swa sti ka dang /_bum pa dang /_nya dang /_dung dang /_gdub kor dang /_spyi blugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_zhags pa dang /_dril bu dang /_chu gri dang /_gzhu dang /_tho ba dang /_'di dag rnam pa 'di dag 'dra ba'i mtshon cha'i mchog gi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs su 
[\[140a.5\]]kun nas khyab par bya'o/_/de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir rgya mtsho chen po gzhag par bya ste/_byang phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bya ste/_sna tshogs rdo rje rtse gsum yod pa kun nas 'bar ba bya'o/_/shar phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs can byas te bzhag la kun nas 
[\[140a.6\]]'bar ba'i pad+ma'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa'o/_/lho phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor zur gsum pa byas te kun nas 'bar ba'i lhung bzed kyis mtshan pa'o/_/nub phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor kun nas zlum por byas te/_ut+pa la sngon po sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang bcas pa kun nas 'bar bas 
[\[140a.7\]]mtshan pa'o/_/phyogs mtshams bzhir yang phyag rgya bri bar bya ste/_nub byang gi phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor zlum po bya ste/_zhags pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o/_/lho nub mtshams su ni dkyil 'khor gzhu 'dra ba bya ste dbyug pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o/_/shar 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]lho mtshams su ni dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa bya ste/_dgra sta 'od zer kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o/_/byang shar gyi mtshams su ni ral gri 'od kun nas 'bar ba gzhag par bya'o/_/de ltar thams cad bris nas steng dang 'og dang thad kar phyag rgya gsum dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol sgo dang nye 
[\[140b.2\]]bar phye ma dang bri bar bya la 'di lta ste/_na bza' dang rnga yab dang lham 'od zer kun nas 'bar ba bri bar bya'o/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo can gyis/_/sems can rnams la phan bzhed nas/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga rnams/_/'dir ni mdor bsdus bstan pa yin/_/de nas 
[\[140b.3\]]dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dang po nyid du slob ma gzung bar bya bya ba la/_dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang yan lag thams cad mdzes pa dang /_bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_theg pa chen por zhugs 
[\[140b.4\]]pa'i rang bzhin can dang theg pa dman pa mi 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can dang /_sems dpa' chen po dang dad pa dang ldan pa dang /_dge ba'i chos can dang rgyal po chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang longs spyod chung ba la smod pa dang /_longs spyod chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[140b.5\]]bzang ba dag dang dul ba dang ldan pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams yang dag par sdom pa la nges par gnas pa dang /_gso sbyong la nye bar gnas shing sdom pa la gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[140b.6\]]dpa' chen po la zhe mi sdang ba dang /_phyogs chen po dang rigs mthon po dang rang bzhin nyid kyis chos spyod pa dang zhag gcig smyung ba byas pa dang /_gos gtsang ma bgos pa dang skra dri zhim pa dang /_dus gsum du khrus byed pa dang /_de'i nyin zhag la ga pur dang gur gum dang 
[\[140b.7\]]li shi la wang ga'i dri zhim pos dri zhim par byas pa/_rtag tu nye reg dang ldan pa dang /_ku sha'i khres la 'dug pa dang srung ba'i cho ga byas pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa dang bden pa dang ldan pa dang dus mtshams las rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol de nyid du ha cang yang mi nye ha cang mi ring bar 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]gzhag par bya'o/_/shin tu gtsang ba dang shin tu gtsang sbra dang ldan pa gcig nas brgyad kyi bar te de las gzhan ma yin pa de dag kyang phan tshun gnyen du 'brel ba/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po dag gi bu gzhon nu ma'am gzhon nu ma grong 
[\[141a.2\]]gi chos mi shes pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal ni byis pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa/_gzhon nu'i rol pa la dgyes pa des na dang po nyid du gzhon nu nang du gzhug par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po mngon par 'phel 
[\[141a.3\]]ba dang tshe dang nad med pa dang /_dbang phyug dang skal ba chen po mngon par 'phel ba yin te/_khyad par du byis pa rnams la nges par sngags grub pas grub pa gnas pa yin te/_de dag sngar bzhag pa byas nas/_grogs po bag yod pa bzang po dang ldan pas/_dkyil 'khor 
[\[141a.4\]]gyi slob dpon gyis ga pur gyi bdug pas bdugs te/_rgyab kyis phyogs pa ma yin pas phyi rol du byung bar bya ste/_byung nas dus dang ci ltar mthun pa'i chu legs par gtsang sbra byas pa dang /_srog chags med pa la rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas te/_gtsug phud 
[\[141a.5\]]lnga'i phyag rgya chen pos phyag rgyar byas pa'i chus khrus byas la nye reg byas nas/_gos gtsang ma bgos pa'i gtsang bas me thab kyi drung du song ste/_ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas byang shar gyi phyogs su mngon par bltas te/_mar gyi sbyin sreg ga pur dang gur gum dang /_tsan+dan dang 
[\[141a.6\]]bsres pas stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/sngar bshad pa'i cho gas spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol ba byas te/_yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o/_/nges par yang bum pa gang ba brgyad ras gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan pa/_shing a mra'i lo ma dang 'bras bu dang ldan pa gser dang /_
[\[141a.7\]]dngul dang rin po che dang /_'bras dang 'bru nang du bcug pa gcig bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la dbul lo/_/gnyis pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la'o/_/gsum pa ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos la'o/_/bzhi pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad la'o/_/
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]lnga pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal la'o/_/drug pa ni lha thams cad la'o/_/bdun pa dang brgyad pa ni dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo khang la gzhag par bya ste/_/gcig ni 'byung po thams cad la'o/_/gcig ni sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur par bsngos nas 
[\[141b.2\]]gzhag par bya'o/_/de bas na sngar bshad pa'i cho gas spyan drang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang /_mar me dang lha bshos kyang sngar bstan pa nyid kyi las kyis dbul bar bya ste/_thams cad kyi thams cad du [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bya'o/_/mar me 'dzin pas mar 
[\[141b.3\]]gyi mar me gzung bar bya'o/_/'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa thams cad la lha bshos zhes smos pa ni/_'bras sA lu'i chan zho dang bcas pa dang sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa'i 'o thug khyad par can gyis nye bar sbyar ba'i mar la btsos pa'i snum khur gyi 'breng bu la sogs pa dang /_khaN+Da la 
[\[141b.4\]]sogs pa'i bza' ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o/_/mar gyis gang ba dang tsan+dan gyi thang chu sbrang rtsi'i snying po dang 'o mar btsos pa'i bza' ba ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang 'phags pa'i 
[\[141b.5\]]lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du gar+b+hod u lo pi ka ri ka dang /_khyad par du snum khur gyi yo byad 'byung po thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad la sngags dang ldan pa'i cho gas sbyin par bya'o/_/de bzhin du me tog dri zhim pa sna ma'i me tog dang rgya spos dang /_klu'i 
[\[141b.6\]]me tog dang me tog pun nA ga la sogs pa sngar bstan pa sangs rgyas dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang 'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/_/khyad par du ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[141b.7\]]pa'i rigs la ni sna ma'i me tog dang /_pad+ma'i rigs la ni me tog pad+ma dang /_de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs la ni me tog ut+pal dang /_lha gzhan dag la ni gzhan gang yang rung bas dbul bar bya'o/_/ga pur gyi bdug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o/_/tsan+dan ni pad+ma'i rigs 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]la'o/_/de bzhin du gu gul ni gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la shes par bya'o/_/lha gzhan thams cad ni bdug pa tha mal pas bya'o/_/mar gyi mar me 'phags pa rnams/_/thams cad la ni dbul bar bya/_/'phags min lha ni thams cad la/_/dri zhim 'bru 
[\[142a.2\]]mar dbul bar bya/_/cho ga ji bzhin rim pas ni/_/bdug pa mthong ba'i rgyu yis so/_/de ltar gsungs pa de bzhin dri/_/sngags rnams kun la rtag tu bya/_/spyan ras gzigs la gang gsungs dang /_/gang gsungs phyag na rdo rje la/_/rang rang gi ni sngags dag gis/_/sngags spyod 
[\[142a.3\]]don du bsgrub pa'o/_/cho ga gcig pu blta bya ste/_/rtag tu rjes su mthun par bya/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngar mthong ba'i cho gas spyan drang ba dang /_mchod pa dang bdug pa la sogs pa byas nas/_gtsor mthun pa'i bya ba byas te de'i 'og tu sgrub pa'i grogs 
[\[142a.4\]]mchog gis mkhas pa dang /_myur bas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sha med pa/_kun nas rnga pa Ta ha dang dung gi sgra dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs pa la sogs pa des bdug pa dang spos dang me tog dang phreng bas brgyan pa'i phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad steng dang 'og dang thad ka thams cad du 
[\[142a.5\]]dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bskor ba bya zhing /_'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma rgya cher gtong bar bya'o/_/de nas khrus byas te yang zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis bsgos pa'i sA lu dang /_'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge drug pa dang snying pos stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/
[\[142a.6\]]sbyin sreg byas nas dkyil 'khor la rjes su bcug cing sngar bzhag pa'i sems dpa' chen po la srung ba byas nas/_dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi slob ma nyid du khas blangs pa/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gso sbyong byas pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid 
[\[142a.7\]]kyi lus phul ba/_dngos grub kyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi nye bar longs spyod pa dang yongs su longs spyod pa thun mong du gyur pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po gnon par bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thob par bya ba la 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o/_/bstan pa tsam nyid kyis sdig pa'i rnyog pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/_mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'i skye bo yang de ma thag tu grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis ras ma nyams pa thag mas btags ma thag pa 
[\[142b.2\]]skra med pa la/_rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lan gsum bzlas te/_dri zhim po'i tsan+dan dang gur gum gyis bsgos pa'i ras kyis gdong g.yogs par bya'o/_/dang por byis pa lo gsum nas lo bcu drug pa'i bar zur phud lngas nye bar mdzes pa'am/_gtsug phud gcig gis nye 
[\[142b.3\]]bar mdzes pa'am/_gtsug phud gsum gyis nye bar mdzes pa skra dang ldan pa/_rgyal po'i bu spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'am/_rgyal rigs kyi bu'am gzhan bdag nyid chen po rgyal po chen po 'dod pa dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la phyin 
[\[142b.4\]]pa na gdong g.yogs par bya ste/_ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcings nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags lan cig brjod du gzhug ste/_me tog dri zhim po tsan+dan dang gur gum dang bsres pa shin tu gtsang bar byas pa/_lag pa gnyis su byin la me tog 
[\[142b.5\]]'dor du gzhug go/_/gang du de'i me tog babs pa der de'i sngags sbyin par bya ste/_sngags 'di ni de'i yin par bstan te/_skye ba brgyud pa nas de dang rjes su 'brel pa yin te/_de nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub kyi snying po la gnon pa/_byang chub sems dpa' chen 
[\[142b.6\]]po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i don du mngon par sgrub par byed pa/_longs spyod chen po dang rgyal po chen po dang grags pa chen po dang /_gang zag rtse gcig par mngon par sgrub pa yin no/_/tshe 'di nyid la yang chos thams cad la yang the tshom med par 
[\[142b.7\]]bsgrub par bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mthar gyis dngos grub 'dod pas brgya rnyed kyi bar du bya ste gzhan la ni ma yin no/_/gzhan dag la ci ltar sdig pa spang ba'i phyir dam tshig tsam sbyin par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dbang bskur na/_dang por 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol ha cang yang mi nye ha cang yang mi ring bar byang shar gyi phyogs su rtsa ba'i sngags kyis dag par byas pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/rgyal po dbang bskur ba bzhin du bdag nyid sems pa dang gcig tu sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun 
[\[143a.2\]]la dad cing dad pa dang /_spro ba chen po dang ldan pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral ba dang /_theg pa chen po la zhugs pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la phan par byed pa dang /_dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang ma smad pa dang /_tshe 'di nyid la sngags grub par 'dod pa 
[\[143a.3\]]dang /_bsam pa bzang po dang sngags kyi spyod pa la spro ba dang /_blta bar 'dod pa'i rang bzhin can dang sad par 'dod pa'i phyir yang sngags kyi don la rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /_der gtad pa'i yid dang gcig la sogs pa nas lnga'i bar du dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/lhag 
[\[143a.4\]]ma ni spang bar bya'o/_/shes rab can dang spyod pa la rmongs pa med pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa la dbang bskur bar bya'i/_gzhan dag ni ma yin no/_/de nas rgyal po thams cad dbang bskur ba bzhin du yo byad thams cad bsogs te/_slob dpon mkhan po mnyes na/_de nas 
[\[143a.5\]]bla re chen po bres te/_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan mthon po bsgreng zhing gdugs dkar po dbu la 'dzin pa dang /_rnga yab dkar pos g.yob pa dang /_bkur sti chen pos dung dang /_rnga bo che'i dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs shing rgyal ba'i sgra dang /_bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[143a.6\]]dang bde legs dang rab tu bsngags pa'i tshigs su bcad pa/_rgyal bas gsungs pas mngon par bstod pa dang /_dkyil 'khor de la bskor ba byas te/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas/_'di skad du slob dpon bdag ni sangs rgyas 
[\[143a.7\]]dang byang chub sems dpa'i sngags kyi spyod pa sgrub pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i gsang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi rgyal srid thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]nyid rtogs par 'dod pa dang /_mdor na sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/_shar gyi phyogs su phyogs te dkyil 'khor la blta zhing /_dang por re zhig rig pa'i dbang bskur ba byin te phyag rgya chen po gtsug phud lnga 'ching du 
[\[143b.2\]]gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas rang 'dod pa'i sngags gang dang gang la dga' ba gro ga'i 'dab ma la gi wang gis bri bar bya ste/_bris nas kyang tsan+dan dang gur gum gyi chus lag pa dang kham phor kha sbyar bkrus la/_de nas gro ga'i 'dab ma de kham phor kha sbyar ba'i nang du gzhag par byas 
[\[143b.3\]]pa dkyil 'khor gyi nang du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi zhabs drung du gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas ku sha de la gnas nas rig pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad snga ma nyid du bzla bar bya'o/_/de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug pa la dbang bskur bar bya ste/_phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[143b.4\]]la gang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa'i bum pa gang ba sgo dang nye bar sngar bzhag pa blangs te/_slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i sngags brjod pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/gzhan dag la ni ci ltar 'dod pa'i chus so/_/de nas kham phor kha sbyar de de la sbyin par bya ste mar 
[\[143b.5\]]me la klog tu gzhug par bya'o/_/gal te de nyid yin na ni rim gyis 'bad pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/yang na ci ste gzhan na ni sngags bzlas pa kho nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/yang na yi ge'i yan lag nyams pa'am/_lhag pa byin ni dang po sgrub pa kho na la 'grub par the tshom med 
[\[143b.6\]]do/_/de ltar slob dpon gyis sngar bris pa'i sgrub pa gsum gyis nges par 'grub par the tshom med do/_/de bzhin du dang pos ni rig pa'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la dbang bskur ba ni gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor du lha thams cad la bstabs pa'i sngar gyi bum pa 
[\[143b.7\]]des dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/spyi bo la sngar gyi cho ga ci lta ba de nyid kyis byas na sdig pa'i rnyog pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gnang zhing /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]las 'das pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /_dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa la byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur zhing /_slob dpon du dbang bskur ba sbyin no/_/dkyil 'khor gsum pa la ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_nyan thos 
[\[144a.2\]]thams cad la phul ba'i bum pa gang ba de nyid kyi cho gas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags rgyud dag 'don pa dang /_dkyil 'khor bri ba dang ston 
[\[144a.3\]]pa dang phyag rgya dang spyod pa ston pa dang rang nyid spyod cing ston par khyod la rjes su gnang zhing brjod par bya ba yang tshe 'di nyid la yin la/_phyi nas skye ba brgyud pa dag la ni sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ba yin no/_/de bzhin du rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i dbang bskur ba yang sngar bstan 
[\[144a.4\]]pa'i cho gas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sngar phul ba'i bum pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la phul ba'i bum pa gang bas kyang de bzhin du dbang bskur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang /_nyan thos rnams 
[\[144a.5\]]kyis kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya zhing khyod la rjes su gnang ba yin no/_/'byung po thams cad kyis rab tu thub par dka' zhing lus can thams cad kyis mi pham pa dang sngags pa thams cad las khyod rgyal ba dang ci ltar 'dod pa sgrubs shig pa'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon 
[\[144a.6\]]gyis re re la yang ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dbang bskur ba lnga sbyin par bya'o/_/sems can rnams la yang lnga po nyid kyis bya'o/_/de dag mthar gyis dkyil 'khor la bcug ste/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid phul nas dkyil 'khor la bskor 
[\[144a.7\]]ba lan gsum byas te slar gtang bar bya'o/_/de las gzhan pa'i nyin zhag la mthar gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la bslab par bya zhing sbyar bar bya'o/_/skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sngar phul ba'i bum pa 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]gang ba blangs nas dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de dag la chu khyor ba gsum shar du mngon par blta bar byas la blud par bya'o/_/'di skad du brjod par bya ste/_kye byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig las 'das par gyur na bsod nams ma yin 
[\[144b.2\]]pa mang po skye bar ma byed cig_/sngags thams cad kyang 'dor bar ma byed cig_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang slu bar ma byed cig_/bla ma mnyes par gyis shig_/gzhan du dam tshig las 'das par gyur na sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur zhing /_bsod nams 
[\[144b.3\]]ma yin pa mang por 'gyur ro/_/zhes de ltar smras la gtang bar bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis kyang zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sA lu dang 'bras thug po che'i sreg blugs kyis yi ge brgyad pa'i snying po dang sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas langs nas 
[\[144b.4\]]dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su zhugs te/_sngar bstan pa'i me tog gis/_sngar bstan pa'i cho gas lha thams cad yid la byas te mchod yon dbul lo/_/bdug pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos thams 
[\[144b.5\]]cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri za dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_srin po dang /_sha za dang /_'byung po dang /_rnal 'byor pa dang grub pa dang /_drang srong rnams dang sems can thams cad yang dag par 
[\[144b.6\]]bdug nas me tog gtor te/_tsan+dan dang gur gum gyis bsangs la sngar bstan pa'i cho gas slar gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/_sems kyis thams cad btang ba yin no/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bshos dang gtor ma dang /_sa tshon thams cad chu bor dor 
[\[144b.7\]]bar bya ba'am/_srog chags sdug bsngal ba rnams la sbyin par bya'o/_/sa phyogs de legs par byugs shing 'jam par byas te/_legs par phyag pa byas nas ba lang gi lci bas byug tu gzhug pa'am/_chus byug par bya ba'am/_shin tu gtsang ba'i sas byug 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]pa'am/_bye mas gtor bar byas la/_de nas ci ltar 'dod par 'gro bar bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa des bdag nyid 'o ma dang /_'bras chan gyi zas sam/_lha la dbul ba'i kha zas bza' bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal 
[\[145a.2\]]po'i dbang po las/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i le'u rab 'byam las/_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bstan pa ste le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal 
[\[145a.3\]]med khang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa la gzigs nas/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal te/_yi ge gcig pa mchog tu gsang ba dug thams cad 'joms par byed pa/_las thams cad byed pa sngags dang dkyil 'khor chung 
[\[145a.4\]]ngu sgrub pa'i thabs dang /_las phran tshegs thams cad la nye bar sbyar bar bya ba smras so/_/de yang gang zhe na/_na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM dza/_grogs po dag 'di ni 'byung po thams cad nyon cig_/sngags 'di nyid ni yi ge gcig gi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i cho 
[\[145a.5\]]ga thams cad du dgos pa/_khru brgyad dam khru bzhi sa'i phyogs yang dag par byas la tshon sna lnga'i phye mas rang nyid kyis bri bar bya ste/_gzhan gyis ni ma yin te/_gang de dang de dag tu yang 'dir ni nges pa med do/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mnyam pos nye bar mdzes pa/_gtsug 
[\[145a.6\]]phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang por re zhig bri'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ut+pa la'i phyag rgya dang /_mche ba'i phyag rgya dang zhal gyi phyag rgya dang dbyug pa'i phyag rgya ste/_phyag rgya 'di dag dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar gyi char bri bar bya'o/_/de nas pad+ma dang rdo rje 
[\[145a.7\]]dang ut+pal dang phyag mtshan dang ba dan dang gdugs dang rta babs dang /_shing rta dang glang po che dang rta dang glang dang ma he dang /_swa sti ka dang rma bya dang ra dang lug dang /_skyes bu gzhon nu'i gzugs can phyi rol gyi sgo'i rtsa bar bri bar bya ste/_mthar gyis rim pa la brten nas 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]bris te/_dkyil 'khor gsum la brten nas de ltar bri bar bya'o/_/de nas yi ge gcig pa'i sngags nyid kyis shar lho'i phyogs kyi char me'i las bya ste/_shing a pa marga'i yam shing zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /_mar la btags pas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas me 
[\[145b.2\]]tog gi mchod yon dbul lo/_/yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyis ci ltar 'dod par gtor ma dang lha bshos dang mar me dang bdug pa dang spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol ba rnams bya'o/_/de nas rgyal srid 'dod pas ni grong khyer gyi dbus su bri bar bya'o/_/longs spyod 'dod 
[\[145b.3\]]pas ni shing a mra'i drung du'o/_/bu 'dod pas ni bo de tse'i shing gi drung du'o/_/chung ma dang glang po che dang rta 'dod pas ni glang po che'i bres skyu'am/_rta'i bres skyur ro/_/chu 'dod pas ni mtsho chen po'am klu'i gnas su'o/_/nyin bzhi pa'i rims sam/_rtag pa'i rims sam/_
[\[145b.4\]]rims thams cad la rtag gcig pa'am/_grong gi g.yas phyogs su'o/_/srin pos zin pa ni dur khrod dam khang pa stong par bya'o/_/yang srin pos zin pa la ni ba ru ra'i shing gi drung ngam/_e raN+Da'i shing gi drung du bya'o/_/ma mo thams cad kyis zin pa la ni bzhi mdo'am shi ba'i khyim 
[\[145b.5\]]dang bu btsas pa'i khyim du nye bar bya'o/_/tshangs pa'am srin pos zin pa la ni ta la'i shing drung du'o/_/sbyar ba'i dug 'byin pa la ni yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyis chu la lan gsum bsngags pa byas te/_dkyil 'khor de nyid du blud pa byas na grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bud 
[\[145b.6\]]med dam skyes pa grags pa 'dod pa la ni bzhi mdo'am bram ze gnas par bri bar bya'o/_/bu shi ba la ni shing 'bras bu can nam 'o ma can gyi shing drung du'o/_/'bras sA lu smin pa'i sa dang zhing gi dbus su ni bu med pa la bri bar bya'o/_/nad rnam pa gsum bdag gir byas pa dang gzhan gyis 
[\[145b.7\]]nyams pa la ni 'jug ngogs la sogs pa la'o/_/nad chen pos btab pa la ni dkyil 'khor chu bo'i ngogs dang 'gram du bya'o/_/nad thams cad kyis thams cad du btab pa la ni ri'i rtse mor bri bar bya'o/_/mkha' 'gro mas byas pa la yang bram ze'i ldum ra'am/_khang pa stong 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]pa'am/_gnas dben par gzhol ba'i sa phyogs su bya'o/_/de bzhin du las thams cad la nam phyed dam dus thams cad du mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/yi ge gcig pa de nyid kyi sngags kyis me tog gi mchod yon phul te gshegs su gsol lo/_/dkyil 'khor la chus 
[\[146a.2\]]gtor ba byas na nad thams cad bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur te nad thams cad las grol bar yang 'gyur ro/_/bu med pas ni bu rnyed cing /_/skal med rnams kyang skal ldan 'gyur/_/dbul po rnams kyis nor 'thob pa/_/dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis so/_/skyes pa'am yang 
[\[146a.3\]]na bud med kyang /_/thos nas the tshom med byas na/_/ci 'dod rnam pa sna tshogs ni/_/thob 'gyur rtag tu phun sum tshogs/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi cho ga rab 'byam las/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba las kyi dkyil 'khor gsum pa'i le'u ste gsum pa rdzogs 
[\[146a.4\]]so//_//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma la gzigs nas/_gzhan yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus pa la yang gzigs te/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs gnyis la btud nas zhal 'dzum pa 
[\[146a.5\]]dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir sngags kyi spyod pa'i cho ga'i sgrub pa'i rgyu mthun pa/_chos kyi char ci ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'i cho ga rab 'byam las ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga bsod nams bla na med 
[\[146a.6\]]pa skyed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon mngon par sgrub par byed pa/_mdor na bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa sngags thams cad kyi 'bras bu la rab tu sbyor zhing 'bras bu dang bcas par byed pa/_don med pa ma yin pa grub cing sgrub par byed pa/_byang 
[\[146a.7\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i go cha bgos pa/_bdud thams cad kyi stobs zil gyis mnan cing rgyab kyis phyogs par byed pa bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i phyir de legs par bshad du 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]gsol/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang /_'jig rten la snying 
[\[146b.2\]]brtse ba'i phyir gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so legs so/_/de shin du legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas bshad par bya'o/_/khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam sngags thams cad sgrub par byed pa la rab tu 'jug pa mthar gyis ngas bshad 
[\[146b.3\]]par bya'o/_/sngon yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan te da ltar yang ngas bshad par bya'o/_/dang por re zhig sa'i phyogs gtsang ba rdul med pa las ras bal yang dag par blangs la/_dam tshig la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyis ras bal de yang dag par byas te/_yang 
[\[146b.4\]]sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor gyis brgya rtsa brgyad tu bsngags par bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/_bo d+hi sa twa a pra ti ha ta ga ti ma ti pra tsA ri NAM/_na maHsaM shod+ha na duHkha pra sha ma nen+d+ra rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM sho d+ha ya saM sho d+ha ya/_sarba big+h+naM g+ha ta 
[\[146b.5\]]ka ma hA kA ru Ni ka ku mA ra rU pa d+hA ri Ni/_bi kurba bi kurba/_sa ma yam nu sma ra tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/_de nas grong gi chos mi shes pa'i gzhon nu ma/_bram ze'i rigs dang rgyal rigs su skyes pa dang /_rje'u'i rigs su skyes pa dang rigs ngan pa'i skyes gnas yongs su spangs 
[\[146b.6\]]pa/_/dbang po ma tshang ba med pa/_yan lag thams cad mdzes pa pha dang mas rjes su gnang ba/_gso sbyong byas pa/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_bzhin dkar ba/_kha dog gzhan rnam par spangs pa/_mdor na bud med kyi mtshan nyid rab tu zhi ba'i 
[\[146b.7\]]mtshan nyid kyis mtshan pa/_shin tu nyin zhag shis pa dang /_zla ba yar ngo dang gza' bzang po bltas te/_du ba dang khug rna med cing sprin dang bral ba rlung med cing gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su sngar bstan pa'i gzhon nu ma khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos te/_gos kyis legs par 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]bkab pa byas pa la sngags 'di phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas bsrung bar bya ste/_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_gur gum srog chags med pa'i chu dang sbyar bas ras bal de dang bu mo de sngags de nyid kyis yang dag par sbyangs te gtor la/_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_gur gum 
[\[147a.2\]]gyi chus steng dang 'og dang phyogs bzhir yang gtor bar bya'o/_/tsan+dan dkar po dang gur gum dang ga bur gcig tu byas pa'i bdug pas bdug par bya ste/_rang nyid kyis sbyin pa'am/_sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi slob dpon gyis sbyin par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 
[\[147a.3\]]sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams/_ras kyi dog pa 'di la lhag par gnas par mdzod cig ces lan gsum brjod par bya'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dgongs su gsol zhes byas nas/_
[\[147a.4\]]bdug pas bdug pa de'i dus su rma bya dang /_khrung khrung dang ngang pa dang bzhad dang ngur pa rnam pa sna tshogs bya dge ba thang la gnas pa'am/_chu la spyod pa rnams nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ba'am/_dge ba'i skad 'don na las 'di ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no zhes sgrub 
[\[147a.5\]]pa pos shes par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bdag gi ras skud 'di la byin gyis brlabs te/_bdag gi skye ba dam pa ni legs par 'tsho ba yin te/_bdag gi sngags sgrub pa 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnga pa Ta ha 
[\[147a.6\]]dang rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang dung dang pi bang dang gling bu dang khar rnga dang rdza rnga chen po'i sgra thos pa'am/_bud med dang khye'u'am/_bu mo'am skyes pa rnams bcos ma'am bcos ma ma yin pa de'i dus su blo bur du 'di skad ces/_rgyal ba dang grub pa dang sbyin pa dang byin pa dang khyer cig 
[\[147a.7\]]ces pa dang /_dpal dang 'bras bu dang /_'bras bu yod pa dang /_cho ga dang brgya byin dang /_mang po dang de dag la sogs pa'i sgra gzhan rab tu dge ba 'don pa'am dril bu'i sgra dang dga' ba'i sgra thos na/_des na rig pa 'dzin pas shes par bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]'das dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni 'di yin te/_don yod pa'i grub pa ni 'di yin zhing gzhan du ma yin no zhes so/_/ci ste de'i dus su ma rungs pa'i tshig 'don pa khyer cig zo shig zung shig_/nyams pa rnam par nyams pa/_kyi hud ring ba shin 
[\[147b.2\]]tu ring ba med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra 'don pa'am/_spre'u dang ma he dang ce spyang dang bong bu dang byi la dang /_ba lang dang dud 'gro smad pa rkang gnyis sam rkang bzhi pa'i sgra 'don par gyur na/_des ni sgrub pa pos bdag gi dngos grub ni med pa yin no zhes shes par 
[\[147b.3\]]bya ste/_skabs der brtul bar bya zhing yang snga ma bzhin du yang brtsam par bya'o/_/de bzhin du lan bdun gyi bar du byas la/_bdun pa'i las kyi bya ba la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sgrub pa pos gzhon nu ma de bsrung ba byas la ku 
[\[147b.4\]]sha'i khres la gzhag par bya ste/_shar ram byang phyogs su phyogs par bzhag la bdag nyid srung ba dang lha la dbul ba'i kha zas zas su sbyin no/_/sngar sbyang ba byas pa'i ku sha'i khres de nyid kyi cho gas ras bal la yang bya'o/_/dog pa de 'jam pa dang legs par bsgrims 
[\[147b.5\]]pa dang sngar bslabs pa'i bu mos yang dag par blangs te/_gcig dang gsum dang lnga dang brgyad la sogs pa nas bcu drug gi bar ram/_kar sha'i grangs legs par bgrangs pa dang ldan pas bya'o/_/de la rab ni bcu drug bya/_/de bzhin brgyad ni bar ma ste/_/phran tshegs 
[\[147b.6\]]las la sgrub pa ni/_/gcig dang lnga ni tha ma'o/_/las rnams kun la sngags rig pas/_/ci ltar nus pa bzhin du bya/_/de nas brtsams te gang cung zad/_/sdig pa sngar ni byas pa dag_/dog par sems kyis dmigs pa na/_/de yi mod la 'jig par 'gyur/_/
[\[147b.7\]]dog pa 'di dag yang dag blangs/_/gtsang ma'i snod du gzhug par bya/_/de nas bzhag pa byas nas de/_/ga bur gyi ni bdug pas bdug_/srog chags yan lag byung ba'am/_/gur gum tsan+dan la sogs dang /_/me tog ma le tsam pa ka_/dri zhim sogs pas yongs 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]su bsgo/_/bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas ni/_/gtsang ma'i phyogs su yang dag bzhag_/sngags rig las kun shes pa yis/_/shin du mnyam gzhag bzlas pa bya/_/de nas tha ga par song nas/_/ci 'dod pa yi rin sbyin no/_/rang dbang yan lag ma nyams dang /_/dkar 
[\[148a.2\]]po'i chos la rtag tu dad/_/rgan min nad kyis gdungs pa min/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde ba spangs/_/ma ning smad pa ma yin dang /_/'phye bo ma yin skra dkar spangs/_/kun gyis bkur ba'i mtshan nyid ldan/_/rab bsngags blta na sdug pa dang /_/blo dang yang dag spyod pa dge/_/'jig rten pa 
[\[148a.3\]]yi tshul la brten/_/dngos grub 'dod pas de la ni/_/ras bzang btags pa'i ched du bskul/_/grogs po rigs bzang rab bsngags shing /_/blo ldan bzo ni mkhas pa dang /_/shin tu khyad par mchog gyur pa'i/_/ras thag bzang la bskul bar bya/_/rab ni rab tu bsgrub par bya/_/'bring 
[\[148a.4\]]ni 'bring la bsgrub par bya/_/tha mal phran tshegs las la ni/_/dman pa nyid ni thams cad la/_/bzo bo ci ltar smra ba bzhin/_/rin ni de ltar sbyin par bya/_/dang po'i tshig ni yang dag 'byung /_/bzo bo la ni sngags rigs pas/_/de nas myur du rin byin pa/_/dpa' bo'i tshong zhes 
[\[148a.5\]]de la brjod/_/don du gnyer med de la ni/_/rin du smra byed sgrub pa po/_/'di ni myur du 'grub byed pa'i/_/ras ni bzang po bla na med/_/las kun byed cing mchod pa ste/_/lha dang mi yi bde ba sbyin/_/'byung po kun gyi dpal 'gyur zhes/_/yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[148a.6\]]gsungs/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pas tha ga pa la rgyu skar bzang po'am/_cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed dam nyin zhag dge ba'am gza' dge ba bltas te gso sbyong sbyin/_yang na dus kyi mchog dpyid kyi dus kyi zla ba yar gyi ngo la shing a mra'i me tog skyes shing shing gi mchog rnams kyi 
[\[148a.7\]]yal ga dang me tog rgyas pa de'i dus mtshams su/_snga dro nyi ma 'char ba la sngar bstan pa'i tha ga pa lha la dbul bar 'os pa'i kha zas bsten cing /_gos gtsang ma bgos la mgo la cod pan bcings nas khrus legs par byas te/_tsan+dan dkar po dang gur gum gang yang rung 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]bas lus byugs nas ga pur gyi dris kha la bsgos te yid dga' ba dang bkres pa dang skom pa med par byas te/_thags kyi lag cha tha ga pa la sogs pa'i yo byad thams cad kyang sar pa la sa dang ba lang gi lci bas bkrus te/_yang ba'i rnam lngas bkru bar bya'o/_/de nas srog chags 
[\[148b.2\]]med pa'i chus kyang bkru bar bya'o/_/tsan+dan dkar po dang gur gum gyi chus kyang gtor bar bya'o/_/gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su ca co med cing skye bo dang bral ba dben pa'i gnas su bkab pa dang gsang bar me tog gis mchod do/_/de nas sgrub pa pos yang dag par dag par byed pa'i sngags 
[\[148b.3\]]kyis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i yungs kar gyis phyogs bzhi steng 'og phyogs mtshams su gtor bar bya'o/_/de nas tha ga pa la yungs kar gyis gtor bar bya zhing /_phyag rgya chen po gtsug phud lnga bcings te/_gtsug phud bcing ba byas na srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[148b.4\]]gal te ras ris rab yin na ni/_zur bzhir zheng du khru bzhi chur khru brgyad de/_tha ga pas de tsam la yongs su goms par bya'o/_/'bring ni zheng du khru do chur khru lnga pa'o/_/tha ma ni zheng du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang chur ni khru brgyad kyi phyed do/_/de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[148b.5\]]kyi mtho gang la ni yul dbus kyi skyes bu tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gcig ste/_'di la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho zhes bsgrags te/_tshad 'dis tshad du bstan pa yin no/_/ras ni rab kyis dngos grub mchog_/'jig rten gang zag mchog gis gsungs/_/thub pa mya ngan 'das 'og tu/_/
[\[148b.6\]]rgyal srid 'dod la bar ma yin/_/longs spyod che 'dod skyes bu dang /_/lha mi lha min gdengs can ni/_/tha ma la ni grub par bshad/_/'bring gis 'bring ni grub pa'o/_/las rnams phran tshegs dag la ni/_/ras ni tha mas rtag tu 'grub/_/rdzas rnams kun la rtag tu ni/_/las 
[\[148b.7\]]rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/ras gsum gyis kyang bstan pa ni/_/skal 'dod mi la 'grub pa yin/_/brgya byin bde sogs bdag po la'ang /_/cho ga nyams na 'grub mi 'gyur/_/cho ga yang dag ldan na ni/_/mi yi skye ba tha ma la'ang /_/las rnams thams cad 'bad med 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]par/_/myur ba nyid du 'grub par byed/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho sras dag gis/_/lam 'di dag ni yang dag bstan/_/phongs pa mgon med sdug bsngal ba'i/_/sems can kun la legs sbyin pa'o/_/byang chub lam ni ma lus kyang /_/de nyid gzigs pas bstan pa ste/_/byang 
[\[149a.2\]]chub rgyu yi chos 'di ni/_/sngags kyi lam gyis bstan pa yin/_/'jig rten dkyil 'khor ma lus dang /_/'jig rten 'das pa'ang 'grub 'gyur te/_/dkyil 'khor gang dag bstan pa yis/_/'bad pa med par sngags rnams 'grub/_/gang zhig byang chub rgyu 'dod pas/_/de la rtag tu 
[\[149a.3\]]dngos grub 'gyur/_/'gro la phan sems rtag med pa/_/gzhan la 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid chen po 'jam dpal ni/_/gzhon nur gyur pas khyad par du/_/byang chub 'jug pa'i khyad sems la/_/ras ris 'grub par gsungs pa yin/_/bya ba myur du 'grub pa'i phyir/_/
[\[149a.4\]]thams cad 'dir ni thob pa yin/_/de nas mthar gyis bzo bos ni/_/ras ni 'bad pas btags par bya/_/nyin zhag lnga dang brgyad dang ni/_/bcu drug gnyis dang bzhi dang ni/_/nyin zhag gcig gis myur du ni/_/myur bar ras kyi tha ga bya/_/grub pa mchog ni 'dod pa yis/_/nyin 
[\[149a.5\]]zhag gcig pa dge ba yin/_/gtsang sbra'i spyod pa phun sum tshogs/_/bzo bo rtag tu byin brlabs ldan/_/gnas nas thag ring song nas ni/_/bshang dang gci ba yongs su dor/_/de nas gos bcas khrus byas te/_/gos gzhan dag kyang bgo bya zhing /_/gos dkar phreng ba ldan par 
[\[149a.6\]]'chang /_/yang dang yang du nye reg bya/_/lus ni tsan+dan dkar pos byugs/_/bzo bos lag pa gnyis kyang byugs/_/legs 'jam rtag tu dri med par/_/'bad pas kyang ni tha ga bya/_/de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba 'am/_/gzhan ni rgyal bas gsungs pa dang /_/rnam dpyad rang bzhin
