[\[149a.7\]]'bad pa yis/_/ras ni ma lus tha ga bya/_/ras kyi tha ga zin pa dang /_/sngar gsungs las kyis legs byas pa/_/tshad ldan nyams pa med pa ni/_/nyin zhag bzang la bltab ste bzhag_/yar ngo'i shin tu bzang po la/_/de la sngags ni gzhug par bya/_/ras ni yongs su gsal 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]byas pa/_/kha tshar mthar ni mdud mdzes bya/_/'od ma'i shing la btags nas ni/_/de nas ras ni blangs te 'gro/_/bzo bo bde legs byas nas ni/_/nor mang pos ni bgo bsha' bya/_/brtul zhugs bzang po legs spyod pa'i/_/sngags pa ci ltar 'dod song nas/_/me tog dri 
[\[149b.2\]]zhim gyis mchod de/_/gtsang ba'i phyogs su gzhag par bya/_/'di nyid kyi ni sngags kyis su/_/srung ba'i cho ga rab tu bya/_/sngon ni ras bal gang de yis/_/lan mang du ni yongs sbyangs la/_/bdag nyid dang ni ras dag la/_/de nyid kyis ni bsrung bar bya/_/dpa' bo chen po 
[\[149b.3\]]'jam dpal gyis/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa gsungs pa dang /_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas mang po dang /_/ngas kyang da ltar gsungs pa yin/_/de nyid sngags ni thams cad kyi/_sngags kyi ngo bos rnam par spyod/_/brtson 'grus che zhing gzi brjid che/_/sngags kyi don kun 
[\[149b.4\]]sgrub byed pa/_/cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs byed/_/skyob pa rnam pa sna tshogs rgyu/_/'dzam gling gnas pa'i sems can rnams/_/rmongs pa spyod cing sems pa med/_/ma dad phyin ci log par byed/_/log spyod shin tu brkam chags kyis/_/rdzas rnams ma lus pa dag dang /_/
[\[149b.5\]]sngags rnams kyis kyang 'grub mi byed/_/'khor ba'i mun pa'i btson rar ni/_/de nyid kyis ni 'khor bar 'gyur/_/gang yang rtag tu yi dag cing /_/dad ldan bkra shis dag la dga'/_/sngags rnams kun la spro ba dang /_/rtag tu 'dzin dang 'chang ba dang /_/bdag nyid chen 
[\[149b.6\]]po dngos grub 'dod/_/spro ba che zhing gzi brjid che/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags dag ni/_/'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur/_/dad pa med pa'i skye bo la/_/dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste/_/sa bon tshwa sgor btab pa la/_/myu gu skye ba med pa bzhin/_/dad pa'i rtsa 
[\[149b.7\]]ba rtag tu chos/_/chos don gzigs pas gsungs pa ste/_/chos don spyod pa de dag la/_/sngags rnams rtag tu 'grub par gsungs/_/de nas sgrub pa pos bzo bo legs par bslab pa'i ri mo mkhan nam/_bdag nyid 'dri ba la mkhas pas/_tshon ma 'dres shing 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]kha dog gsal ba dang ldan pa'i tshon rtsi rnams blangs te/_sngar tha ga pa la byas pa'i cho ga ci lta ba de nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas/_ri mo mkhan la snga ma bzhin sbyar bar bya ste/_sngar ci ltar tha ga pa la byas pa de nyid kyis ras la ri mo 'drir gzhug go/_/yang na bdag nyid 
[\[150a.2\]]kyis bri bar bya'o/_/ga pur dang tsan+dan dang gur gum la sogs pa'i dris tshon rtsi la bsgo bar bya zhing bdug spos bsregs te/_de nyid kyi sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa la yang bzla ste/_me tog nA ga ge sar dang pun nA ga dang ba ku la dang tsam pa ka dang dbyar gyi me tog dang 
[\[150a.3\]]d+hA nush+ka ri dang mA la ti'i me tog la sogs pas ras de gcal bkram pa byas la/_shar du mngon par phyogs pas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste blo legs par gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs pa'i sems kyis pir phra mo lag par blangs nas/_
[\[150a.4\]]'khrug pa med pa'i sems kyis ras de la bri bar bya'o/_/dang por re zhig bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bri bar bya ste/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mtshan pa/_sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar mdzes pa rin po che'i 
[\[150a.5\]]pad+ma la bzhugs pa kun nas 'od 'bar ba/_sku 'od 'dom gang gis nye bar mdzes pa chos 'chad bzhin pa/_sku dang zhing rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma bai DUr+ya'i sdong bu can 'og na ni klu'i rgyal po gnyis kyi gdan chen po'i pad+ma'i sdong bu la 
[\[150a.6\]]'dzin cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba/_lag pa g.yas pas phyag 'tshal ba/_mdog dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mi dang 'dra ba/_phyed sbrul gyi gzugs can dga' bo dang nye dga' bri bar bya'o/_/kun nas pad+ma'i mtsho pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang me 
[\[150a.7\]]tog cung zad kha bye ba dang /_rnam par kha bye ba dang chu las skyes pa'i srog chags rnams dang /_bya dang nya la sogs pas khyab pa yangs shing mdzes par skyes pa bri bar bya'o/_/gang bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i sdong bu de las 'phros pa'i yal ga las pad+ma'i me tog 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]du ma mthar gyis mtho ba bya'o/_/g.yon gyi phyogs su pad+ma'i me tog brgyad byas te/_pad+ma de dag la byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi gzugs bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/_/dang po la re zhig 'phags pa 'jam dpal cung zad kha dog pad+ma'i ge sar bzhin du ser skya'am 
[\[150b.2\]]gur gum mam gser gyi mdog 'dra ba gzhon nu'i cha byad byis pa dang /_khye'u'i gzugs can skra zur phud lnga dang ldan pa/_gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_lag pa g.yon pa na ut+pal sngon po bsnams pa/_lag pa g.yas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byed pa/_
[\[150b.3\]]sku mdzes pa zhi ba'i cha byad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba/_bzhin cung zad rgod pa 'od 'bar ba dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor kun du khyab pa bri'o/_/pad+ma gnyis pa la 'phags pa zla ba'i 'od shin tu gzhon sha can de bzhin du bri bar bya'o/_/gsum pa la ni nor bzang 
[\[150b.4\]]ngo /_/bzhi pa la ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o/_/lnga pa la ni nam mkha' mdzod do/_/drug pa la ni sa'i snying po'o/_/bdun pa la ni sdig med do/_/brgyad pa la ni spyan bzang yin te/_de dag thams cad kyang gzhon nu khye'u'i cha byad can/_gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bri bar 
[\[150b.5\]]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su ni/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad byams pa ma gtogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_'phags pa byams pa ni bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar bri bar bya ste/_tshangs par spyod pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa/_mgo ral pa'i cod 
[\[150b.6\]]pan bcings pa/_mdog gser 'dra ba/_ga sha dmar po gyon pa/_dar la dmar po'i stod g.yogs byas pa/_thal ba'i thig le gsum gyis mtshan pa/_gzugs mdzes pa dang ldan pa dbyig pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa kriSh+Na sa ra'i pags pa thal gong g.yon 
[\[150b.7\]]par bgos pa/_lag pa g.yon pas phreng ba 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byed pa/_der gtod pa'i lta ba sems kyi spyod pa bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can no/_/pad+ma gnyis pa la 'phags pa kun du bzang po mdog me tog pri yang ku ltar 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]sngo sangs/_lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_lag pa g.yon pa na nor bu rin po che thogs pa/_lag pa g.yas pa na bil ba thogs shing mchog sbyin pa/_gzugs mdzes pa dang ldan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o/_/gsum pa la ni 'phags pa spyan 
[\[151a.2\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug 'dam bu'i mdog 'dra ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/_mchod phyir thogs dkar pos byas pa/_'phags pa 'od dpag med gzugs mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba/_stobs bcu dang ldan pa/_ral pa'i mthar 
[\[151a.3\]]skyil mo krung gis bzhugs shing cod pan du byas pa/_lag pa g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa/_lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa/_sems kyi spyod pa bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can/_lus kun nas 'od kyis gsal bar byas pa'o/_/bzhi pa la ni 'phags pa 
[\[151a.4\]]phyag na rdo rje lag pa g.yon na rdo rje 'dzin pa/_lag pa g.yas na bil ba thogs pas mchog sbyin pa mdog gser 'dra ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_gzugs mdzes pa/_zhi ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa dang /_dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas lus nye bar dkris pa mu tig gi phreng bas 
[\[151a.5\]]mchod phyir thogs byas pa/_cod pan rin po che 'bar bas rnam par 'phro ba gos g.yo ba dang ldan pa bgos pa dar la dkar po'i stod g.yogs byas pa'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang kun du bzang po'i na bza' stod g.yogs kyang 'di bzhin du 
[\[151a.6\]]bya'o/_/cha byad ni ci ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin bya'o/_/de bzhin du pad+ma lnga pa la ni 'phags pa blo gros chen po/_drug pa la ni blo gros zhi ba/_bdun pa la ni rnam par snang mdzad snying po/_/brgyad pa la ni ngan song spong ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag bri bar bya ste/_
[\[151a.7\]]bil ba'i 'bras bu dang glegs bam lag na thogs pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis shin tu mdzes pa/_dar las stod g.yogs byas pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_g.yo ba dang ldan pa'i gos bgos pa'o/_/de dag gi steng du'ang rang sangs rgyas brgyad bri bar 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]bya ste/_dge slong gi cha byad 'dzin pa lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/_chos gos dmar po gyon pa/_skyil mo krung gis nye bar gnas pa/_rin po che'i ut+pal la 'dug pa cha byad zhi ba'i bdag nyid kun nas 'od 'phro ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/_me tog dri zhim pos gcal 
[\[151b.2\]]bkram pa la 'di lta ste/_me tog mA li ta dang dbyar gyi me tog dang /_d+hA nuSh+ka ri ka dang pun nA ga dang nA ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog gis ras ris kun nas gcal bkram par bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon phyogs su 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng 
[\[151b.3\]]du rin po che du mas nye bar spras pa/_shin tu yangs pa'i gzhal med khang gi dkyil 'khor brag gi tshogs kyis shin tu nye bar mdzes par byas pa/_rin po che'i ut+pa las shin tu bkab pa ri'i rnam pa lta bu bri bar bya'o/_/gnas der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad bri 
[\[151b.4\]]bar bya ste/_'di lta ste rin chen gtsug tor can rin po che bai DUr+ya'i 'od rnam par 'phro ba/_kun nas 'od 'dom gang ba/_rin po che pad+ma rA ga dang in+d+ra nI la dang /_margad la sogs pa dang /_bai DUr+ya dang asma gar b+ha la sogs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i bye brag kun nas 'od 
[\[151b.5\]]'phro ba dang ldan pa nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lhung bzed dang chos gos dang bla gos dang ldan pa/_skyil krung gis bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa/_na bza' ser po mnabs pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis sku la khyab pa/_dpe byad bzang po 
[\[151b.6\]]brgyad cus sku nye bar mdzes pa/_zhi ba'i gzigs pa dang ldan pa/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can bri bar bya'o/_/gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po kha dog gser 'dra ba bri bar 
[\[151b.7\]]bya'o/_/gsum pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor pad+ma'i ge sar dang 'dra ba chos 'chad pa bri bar bya'o/_/bzhi pa spyan bzang po yang bri bar bya'o/_/lnga pa bsnyen par dka' ba dang /_drug pa rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad dang /_bdun pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang /_brgyad pa de bzhin 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]gshegs pa sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i spyan gyi rgyal po bri bar bya'o/_/'di dag thams cad kyang gser gyi mdog can de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs su bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi steng gi phyogs su g.yas g.yon nas sprin 
[\[152a.2\]]gyi gseb nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis lus mi snang bar me tog gi char 'bebs pa bri bar bya ste/_bar snang la gnas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o/_/rang sangs 
[\[152a.3\]]rgyas thams cad kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po brgyad byang chub sems dpa'i mgo la 'dug pa spangs te bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/_gnas brtan shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu chen po dang 'od srung chen po dang /_rab 'byor dang sgra gcan 'dzin dang /_dga' bo dang bzang ldan dang /_
[\[152a.4\]]ka pi na'o/_/rang sangs rgyas dag kyang 'di lta ste/_spos kyi ngad ldang dang dman pa dang nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang /_dkar po dang dkar po'i tog dang /_mu khyud dang mu khyud bzang po'o/_/'di dag thams cad kyang shin tu mdzes pa/_zhi ba'i cha byad kyi bdag nyid can 
[\[152a.5\]]shin tu dul ba'i cha byad can no/_/nyan thos chen po dag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lta ba'o/_/steng du gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gzhan gnyis nye bar kun nas gos kyi bla re chu zhing yangs pa shin tu mdzes pa 'dzin cing sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[152a.6\]]thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi steng du lha'i gos dang phreng ba 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng dbu'i steng du mu tig gi phreng ba dang /_thag gu dmar po pad+ma rA ga dang /_in+d+ra nI la la sogs pa'i 
[\[152a.7\]]mdud pa byas pa rin po che'i thag gu'i tshogs bya'o/_/de la yang gos kyi bla re shin tu legs par kun nas bkod pa dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba 'phyang bas mdzes pa bri bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu ni pad+ma'i mtsho las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]zhabs drung dang nye ba na/_klu'i rgyal po nye dga'i phyogs su rin po che chen po'i ri bo pad+ma'i mtsho las mngon par 'thon pa rin po che'i myu gu dang phug dang ri sul dang byi ru'i yal ga dang rin po che'i shing gis yongs su bskor ba/_drang srong chen po'i gnas dang grub pa dag gis de la brten 
[\[152b.2\]]pa/_ri'i rtse mo'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed shin tu mi bzad pa'i gzugs can/_lag pa g.yas pa na zhags pa thogs pa/_lag pa g.yon pa na gzhu thogs pa/_bzhin khro gnyer dang ldan pa/_bka' nyan cing 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyogs 
[\[152b.3\]]te lta ba gsus pa 'phyang ba/_skra gyen du brdzes pa/_mig sman nag po dang sprin nag po dang 'dra ba/_kha spu ser ba sen mo ring ba mig dmar ba/_mgul ba'i phyogs sbrul gyis brgyan pa/_stag gi pags pa mnabs pa bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa rab tu mi bzad 
[\[152b.4\]]pa chen po khro bo'i rgyal po chen po kun nas 'bar ba khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed bri bar bya'o/_/ri de'i 'og tu rdo'i steng na 'dug pa/_lus sa la btud de spos kyi snod lag na thogs pa/_cha byad dang dbyibs ci lta ba bzhin rtags 'dzin pa/_ji ltar rjes su mthun pa'i 
[\[152b.5\]]spyod pa dang /_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rjes su lta ba'i sgrub pa po bri bar bya'o/_/klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye bar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'og de'i g.yas ngos su pad+ma'i mtsho las mngon par byung ba'i rin po che'i ri'i rgyal po/_ji ltar sngar ri'i rgyal por bstan 
[\[152b.6\]]pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed med pa lha'i me tog gis khyab pa bri bar bya'o/_/ri de yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu bri'o/_/ri de yang shin tu mtho ba rin po che pad+ma rA ga'i them skas 'dra ba/_bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin rtse mo myu 
[\[152b.7\]]gu 'dra ba bri bar bya'o/_/de la brten pa'i lha mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje'i ngo bo 'phags ma sgrol ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_dar la dmar pos stod g.yogs byas pa kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gos can/_bud med kyi rgyan 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]thams cad kyis lus brgyan pa/_lag pa g.yon pa na ut+pa la thogs pa/_gser gyi kha dog can rked pa phra ba ha cang yang mi skem ha cang yang mi sbom ha cang yang mi rgan/_sems bsam gtan la zhugs pa/_bka' nyan cing 'dug pa/_lag pa g.yas pa 
[\[153a.2\]]mchog sbyin pa/_cung zad gdong dang lus 'dud pa/_skyil krung gis 'dug pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la cung zad lta zhing 'dug pa/_kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi phreng bas yongs su bskor ba/_der yang bai DUr+ya rin po che'i rtse mo la shing pun+n+nA ga'i yal gas 
[\[153a.3\]]kun nas bskor ba/_yal ga dag la yang me tog 'phel zhing kha bye bas legs par rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma mngon par bkab pa/_yal ga mngon par 'dud pa de nyid kyang shin tu kha dog sna tshogs pa byi ru'i myu gu'i 'brel ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ngo bo'i tshon 'bar ba na/_
[\[153a.4\]]lha mo sgrol ma mngon du phyogs shing lta ba bri bar bya'o/_/lha mo bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms/_/'jigs pa sel bar byed pa'i mchog_/sgrub pa po ni srung don du/_/des ni dam pa sbyin zhing dge/_/stobs bcu ldan sras thugs rje ni/_/bud med gzugs 'chang lha mo yin/_/
[\[153a.5\]]'byung po kun gyi dpal don dang /_/mchog sbyin byed pa bri bar bya/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs can 'od chen ni/_/gzhon nu'ang lha mo 'di la dgyes/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bsal ba'i phyir/_/sgrub pa pos kyang yang dag bkur/_/mi yi bdag po srung don dang /_/dpal 
[\[153a.6\]]sgrub phyir yang ri mo bri/_/khro bo'i rgyal po gang yin te/_/ri yi rtse mor gzhag bris pa/_/bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir/_/rgyal ba mchog dang sras kyis gsungs/_/mi bzad chen po 'khyil ba che/_/gtum chen 'od chen ldan pa po/_/ma rungs sems can tshar 
[\[153a.7\]]gcad phyir/_/sgrub pa la ni rab tu brtags/_/sgrub pa po ni srung ba dang /_/bgegs rnams thams cad sel bar byed/_/mi bzad khro bo'i ngang tshul can/_/sngags kyi lha dag 'gugs par byed/_/shin tu mi bzad drag po'i gzugs/_/brtse ba med pa thams cad 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]'dul/_/sdig dang drag por spyod pa rnams/_/dbang du mi 'gyur dbang du byed/_/mkha' spyod sa la spyod pa dang /_/sa 'og spyod pa thams cad kyi/_/thub pa'i bstan la 'gal byed gang /_/ma rungs thams cad 'dul bar byed/_/ras ni kun nas gru bzhi dang /_/zur bzhi 
[\[153b.2\]]dag tu bri ba yin/_/ras kyi 'og tu tha mar ni/_/chu bo rgya che'i gnas bya ste/_/klu yi gdengs ka yan lag can/_/gcig ni kun du bya ba yin/_/yan lag bzang po dkar po dang /_/lus phyed mi yi rnam par skyes/_/byang du mgo ni gzhag bya ste/_/rtag tu thal mo sbyar byed 
[\[153b.3\]]pa/_/stobs chen gdengs ka bdun dang ldan/_/mtha' yas zhes ni bya ba yin/_/de bzhin gshegs la nges par lta/_/nor bu rin chen gyis mdzes pa/_/legs par mdzes dang gzugs mdzes dang /_/rin chen rgyan gyis yongs brgyan pa'i/_/'bar ba'i phreng can bri ba ni/_/
[\[153b.4\]]klu rgyal chen por rnam par grags/_/'jig rten kun la phan par brtson/_/sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu zhugs/_/bgegs rnams thams cad rnam gzhig phyir/_/chu bo la brten bri bar bya/_/ras kyi cho ga dam pa 'di/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs pa yin/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[153b.5\]]pas sngon gsungs pa/_/rgyas bstan ngas ni mdor bsdus yin/_/mkhas pa gang zhig 'dri byed pa/_/de yi bsod nams mtha' yas 'gyur/_/bskal pa bye bar byas pa yi/_/sdig pa shin tu mi bzad pa/_/sa steng ri mo mthong ba tsam/_/de yi mod la 'byang bar byed/_/
[\[153b.6\]]mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang /_/tshul khrims nyams dang smad pa dang /_/sdig pa kun la 'jug pa dang /_/'khor ba'i mun par spyod pa dang /_/'gro ba'i skye gnas ngan pa dag_/der ni ras ris gzhag mi bya/_/ras ris mthong ba'ang don ldan zhes/_/thub pa'i dbang pos 
[\[153b.7\]]gsungs pa yin/_/mthong ba tsam gyis dag 'gyur te/_/de bas skad cig de tsam gyis/_/yid dag lus ni dag 'jug dang /_/rjes su bzlas pa byed pa dang /_/sngags rten nyid la rtag brtson pa'i/_/mi rnams grub 'dod smos ci dgos/_/bskal pa bye bar sangs rgyas la/_/mchod 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa/_/sa steng ras ris 'dri ba yi/_/sngags pas bsod nams de 'thob 'gyur/_/gang gA yi ni bye ma dag_/tshad du bstan pa gang yin pa/_/de dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/rang rgyal dang ni byang chub sems/_/bse ru nyan 
[\[154a.2\]]thos 'jig rten na/_/lan mang dag tu mchod ston byas/_/ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis ni/_/mi yis de bzhin bsod nams 'thob/_/cho ga klog pa tsam dang ni/_/mchod dang rjes su yi rang ba/_/cho ga thams cad rab brtags pa/_/de la sngags kyi dngos grub des/_/'jig rten 
[\[154a.3\]]sngags rnams ci snyed pa/_/gang dag rgyal ba skyes mchog dang /_/de'i slob bse ru byang chub sems/_/bdag nyid chen pos gang gsungs pa/_/ri mo 'di ni mdun bzhag na/_/sngags rnams ma lus grub par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen 
[\[154a.4\]]po'i mdo sde las/_ras ris chen mo dang po'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhan yang khyod kyi 'bring gi 
[\[154a.5\]]ras kyi cho ga de ngas bshad par bya yis/_legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig_/dang por re zhig sngar bstan pa'i dog pa dang /_sngar bstan pa'i cho ga dang /_sngar bstan pa'i bzo bo dang sngar gyi tshad bar ma dang ldan pa/_ras shin tu bzang ba dang 'jam pa dang shin 
[\[154a.6\]]tu bkrus pa kha tshar dang bcas pa dang /_tshon ma 'dres pa dang skra la sogs pa med par byas la/_tshad ma gtogs pa dang po ci lta ba de bzhin du byas pa'i ras de la phyi nas bri bar bya ste/_dang por re zhig gnas gtsang ma kun nas mdzes pa/_rin po che shel gyi rang bzhin 
[\[154a.7\]]lta bu mu tig dkar pos brgyan pa/_de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bri bar bya ste/_rin po che'i seng ge'i khri la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa'o/_/g.yas phyogs na 'phags pa 'jam dpal pad+ma'i ge sar ram/_gur 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]gum mam/_nyi ma'i mdog 'dra ba g.yon pa'i dpung pa'i phyogs su ut+pal bsnams shing thal mo sbyar bas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba/_bzhin cung zad rgod pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can/_zur phud lngas mgo mdzes par byas pa/_byis pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis 
[\[154b.2\]]brgyan pa/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga dang mgo 'dud pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon logs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog ltar dkar ba/_snga ma ci lta ba de bzhin du bri bar bya ste/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab 
[\[154b.3\]]g.yob par bya'o/_/de'i phyogs su 'phags pa byams pa dang /_kun du bzang po dang phyag na rdo rje dang /_blo gros chen po dang zhi bar gshegs pa dang nam mkha' mdzod dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ste/_'di dag kyang snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o/_/
[\[154b.4\]]dang po ci lta ba de bzhin du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bri bar bya'o/_/'di dag gi steng du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad bri bar bya ste/_bzhengs pa dang lag pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa dang /_sku la na bza' ser pos stod g.yogs byas pa/_lag pa 
[\[154b.5\]]g.yon pas chos gos kyi dkyil nas 'dzin pa/_chos gos kyi kha dog cung zad dmar ba mnabs pa/_kun nas 'od dang ldan pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa la 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po dang /_rin chen 
[\[154b.6\]]gtsug tor dang /_gtsug tor can dang /_thams cad skyob dang /_log par dad sel dang /_gser thub dang /_'od srung dang /_spyan bzang ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi 
[\[154b.7\]]mdun du 'khor chen po'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/_nyan thos chen po brgyad dang /_rang sangs rgyas brgyad snga ma ci lta ba de bzhin du bri ste/_'on kyang 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_shA ri'i bu ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la rnga yab kyis g.yob pa 'greng 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]bag tu bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu bri bar bya'o/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang 'thab bral dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang dag pa dang /_dri ma med pa dang 'jam pa dang mi gdung ba dang 'od gsal dang /_tshangs pa mi 
[\[155a.2\]]mjed kyi bdag po dang 'og min dang de la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs na spyod pa dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag mthar gyis bri bar bya'o/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal dang nye bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor legs par dgod par bya ste/_rang rang gi gzugs dang cha byad du bri 
[\[155a.3\]]bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu ni/_rgya mtsho chen po las mngon par byung ba'i kun nas rin po che'i ri bo ras kyi mtha' mar bri bar bya'o/_/ras ris kyi phyogs gcig gi mtha' la sgrub pa po cha byad dang dbyibs ci lta bu'i rnam pa pus mo'i lha nga dang mgo btud pa/_
[\[155a.4\]]spos snod lag na thogs pa bri bar bya'o/_/rin po che'i ri bo de'i steng 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed ci ltar bstan pa de ltar bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 
[\[155a.5\]]zhabs drung dang nye ba der/_rin po che'i ri bo'i steng du lha mo sgrol ma sngar ci ltar bstan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya ste/_ras ris de'i kho ra khor yug tu me tog gtor ba bri bar byas la gcal bkram par bya ba la me tog tsam pa ka dang nI lod pa la pad+ma dang dri mchog dang mA la ti dang /_
[\[155a.6\]]bAr shi ka dang d+hA nu Sh+kA ri ka dang pun nA ga dang /_nA ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog gis ras ris de la kho ra khor yug tu gtor bar bya'o/_/ras ris kyi steng gi mtha'i zur gnyis su lha'i bu gnyis me tog gi tshogs 'thor ba/_gzugs rnam par bkra ba bar snang la gnas pa/_char 
[\[155a.7\]]'byin pa'i sprin gyi nang nas mgo tsam 'thon pa lding bzhin pa/_kha dog dkar po bri bar bya'o/_/ras ris 'bring du gsungs pa 'di/_/dpal don gnyer la yang dag 'byung /_/sa yi steng gi mi rnams la/_/grub pa 'bring ni 'di la brten/_/'khor bar sngon chad 'khor ba na/_/sdig pa cung 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]zad gang byas pa/_/'dir ni ras ris mthong tsam gyis/_/de yi mod la rnam par 'jig_/'gro ba lngar ni 'khor ba na/_/sems can rmongs pas mi shes te/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ras ris ni/_/'bring po mthong bar mi byed pa'o/_/mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang /_/sdig pa'i rnyog 
[\[155b.2\]]pa byed gyur pa/_/sngags rnams sna tshogs gsungs gyur pas/_/tshul khrims nyams pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/_/myur du rtogs pa'ang 'grub pa ni/_/bzlas pas thob par byed pa yin/_/ras ris 'bring po mthong bas ni/_/nad pa dag kyang nad las thar/_/dbul po dag kyang nor thob 
[\[155b.3\]]byed/_/bud med rnams kyang bu 'thob 'gyur/_/de tshe mthong ba tsam gyis ni/_/bsod nams rgya chen thob par 'gyur/_/nges par lha dang mi rnams kyi/_/bde ba mi yis bsten par 'gyur/_/skye ba gzhan du nges par ni/_/sangs rgyas nyid ni nges thob 'gyur/_/klog dang 'dri ba nyid dang ni/_/
[\[155b.4\]]de bzhin mchod dang phyag 'tshal dang /_/mthong dang reg pa tsam gyis ni/_/sdig pa'i rnyog pa kun las grol/_/ras ris 'di ni mthu chen la/_/don du gnyer dang bskul bas ni/_/myur du skye ba don yod 'thob/_/rjes su yi rang de bzhin no/_/ras ris mthong ba'i skye bo yi/_/bsod nams 
[\[155b.5\]]thob pa don yod pa/_/bskal pa bye ba rnams su yang /_/brjod par yang ni mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po rgya che ba'i mdo las/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo le'u lnga pa'i cho ga rab 'byam las ras ris gnyis pa'i cho ga 
[\[155b.6\]]rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gzhan yang khyod kyis ras ris gsum pa'i cho ga rab tu gsungs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_gang sems can rnams la 'bad 
[\[155b.7\]]pa med par 'grub par 'gyur ba sngar bstan pa'i bzo bo dang /_cho ga dang bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang tsam thad kar de bzhin du kun nas zur bzhi snga ma bzhin du ras la ri mo bya'o/_/sngar bstan pa'i tshon gyis dang por re zhig 'phags pa 'jam dpal seng ge'i khri la bzhugs 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]pa snga ma bzhin du byis pa khye'u'i gzugs mdzes pa'i gzugs can 'od zer 'phro ba dang ldan pa chos 'chad pa bri bar bya'o/_/g.yon gyi phyogs su 'phags pa kun du bzang po rin po che'i ri la gnas pa/_rnga yab lag na thogs pa lag pa g.yon pa na nor bu rin po che 
[\[156a.2\]]thogs pa/_me tog pri yang ku ltar sngo sangs snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snga ma bzhin rin po che'i ri la gnas pa/_rnga yab lag na thogs pa lag pa g.yon pa na pad+ma 'dzin pa/_lus kun 
[\[156a.3\]]nas 'od dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o/_/seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu rin po che'i ras ris kyi mtha'i bar du bri bar bya'o/_/ras kyi mtha' ma dang nye ba'i zur du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi seng ge'i khri'i 'og g.yas phyogs su khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o/_/
[\[156a.4\]]de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya ste/_spos snod lag na thogs pa thams cad kyang snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po bri bar bya ste/_rin po che'i ri'i phug sor 
[\[156a.5\]]bcu drug gi tshad tsam gyi nang na bzhugs pa/_ri'i stod kyi cha khang pa brtsegs pa 'dra ba bri bar bya'o/_/ras ris kyi kho ra khor yug tu ri'i rnam pas yongs su 'khor ba bri bar bya'o/_/steng gi ras kyi mtha' gnyis la gnas pa'i ri'i stod kyi cha la lding ba bzhin du me tog gi 
[\[156a.6\]]tshogs 'thor ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag pa dang rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba gnyis snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya zhing /_/ras la me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gcal bkram pa yang bri bar bya'o/_/rnam gsum ras ris mtshan nyid ni/_/thams cad 'dir ni 
[\[156a.7\]]bstan pa las/_/'di ni tha ma zhes bya ste/_/phran tshegs las rnams dag la shes/_/bskal pa bye bar mi bzad las/_/ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis grol/_/ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis ni/_/skad cig de la grol bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag ni/_/
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]mthong ba tsam gyis grol 'gyur te/_/ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis kyang /_/de yi mod la grol bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag la/_/blo dang ldan pas bsnyen bkur bas/_/ras ris tha ma mthong ba ni/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/sangs rgyas skyob pa kun la 
[\[156b.2\]]ni/_/mchod byas bsod nams gang yin pa/_/mkhas pas bsod nams gang thob de/_/ras ris mtha' ma mthong ba'i yin/_/dge ba dag gi las rnams la/_/longs spyod phyir yang 'dir spyad do/_/sngags rnams gang dag ci yod pa/_/tshangs dbang drang 
[\[156b.3\]]srong gis bshad dang /_/nam mkha' lding gis gang bshad dang /_/chu lha nyi ma lus ngan dang /_/nor sbyin sogs dang srin po dang /_/lha min dbang po lto 'phye dang /_/zla ba rlung dang gshin rje sogs/_/khyab 'jug lha chen sogs bshad pa/_/sngags rnams 'dir ni bkug 
[\[156b.4\]]pa dag_/ras ris mdun du dngos grub 'gyur/_/'dir ni zhi ba bya ba ste/_/de bzhin du ni rgyas pa bya/_/'dir ni mngon spyod spang bya ste/_/thub pa mchog gis smad pa yin/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa las/_'jam 
[\[156b.5\]]dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo le'u drug pa'i cho ga rab 'byam las/_ras ris chung ngu gsum pa'i cho ga rdzogs so//_//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 
[\[156b.6\]]lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa ni legs so legs so/_/rig pa thams cad kyi 
[\[156b.7\]]brtul zhugs spyad pa'i don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa ston pa/_phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro bar byed pa/_byang chub 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyud nges par byang chub sgrub par byed pa/_sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/_bdag gi gsang sngags 'di skye bo thams cad la rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi bla ma 'das pa na/_de bzhin 
[\[157a.2\]]gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i rigs nub pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad spangs pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mun par gyur pa dang /_snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par 'jig pa dang 'phags 
[\[157a.3\]]pa'i lam dang /_rig pa thams cad dang sngags dang sman dang /_nor bu rin po che med pa dang /_skye bo dam pa rnams kyis 'jig rten na yongs su ma zin pa dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/_le lo can dang dran pa nyams pa dang /_ma dad pa dang mi 
[\[157a.4\]]srun pa dang mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang /_slu ba spyod pa de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas skrag par 'gyur te/_le lo la mngon par 'dod cing dad par mi 'gyur la/_'dod pa tshol zhing yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/_/log pa'i 
[\[157a.5\]]lta ba skye zhing bsod nams ma yin pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med par gzhol zhing shin tu mi bzad pa'i yang shin tu mi bzad pa 'thob pa sdug bsngal ba de dag gi don dang dbang med pa la dbang du bya ba'i don dang /_dbang du gyur pa la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyir dang /_thabs 
[\[157a.6\]]mkhas pas bsdu ba'i sbyor ba/_sngags kyi ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga gang de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[157a.7\]]gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyi mchog tu gsang ba rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod pa'i le'u ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam yod de/_snying po mchog rnams kyi don mchog tu gsang ba dam pa don chen po sngags thams 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]cad kyi cho gar gyur pa drug po 'di dag yi ge drug gi snying po'i mchog_/the tshom med pa de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur te/_sems can de dag gdul ba'i phyir dang /_thabs la mkhas pa la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa'i phyir dang /_nges par yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'i 
[\[157b.2\]]phyir/_sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa drug gis sngar gsungs shing da ltar yang ngas bshad de/_ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la phan pa'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas bshad par bya'o/_/de gang zhe na/_de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sngags 
[\[157b.3\]]gsungs pa/_oM bAkye \u0f85r+tha dza ya/_oM bAkye she sha swA/_oM bAkye baM dza ya/_oM bAkye ni Sh+the ya/_oM bAkye ya na maH/_oM bAkye daM na maH/_de ltar 'di dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod kyi sngags drug dang yi ge drug pa mthu chen po dang stobs mnyam pa/_snying 
[\[157b.4\]]po dam pa mchog tu grub pa/_sangs rgyas bzhin du 'byung ba sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rab tu gsungs pa/_dam tshig nyams pa dang dam tshig g.yos pa rnams kyi las thams cad byed pa/_byang chub kyi lam rjes su ston pa/_
[\[157b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sngags kyi mchog tu gyur pa/_mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma gsum la rab tu sbyor ba/_legs par sbyangs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa sbyin pa/_bstan pa nub pa'i dus su yang dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/las kyi tshul 
[\[157b.6\]]dang bcas pa la yang dag par gzhol ba la/_skad cig gis don bsgrub par 'gyur ba de dag myur du shin tu myur bar de'i tshe dang de'i dus su 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/nyam sad pa'i phyir yang snying po dam pa 'di dag bsgrub par bya ste/_mdor na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de 
[\[157b.7\]]ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/des na ras ris kyi cho ga 'di bya ba yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jigs pa chen po dang /_snyigs ma la sems can bsod nams chung ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_grags pa chung ba dang /_tshe thung ba dang longs spyod chung ba dang /_chos spyod pa 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]chung bas shin tu rgya che ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga'i sgrub pa la sogs pa rtsom par mi nus te/_de dag gi phyir shin tu mdor bstan par bya'o/_/dang por re shig dpa' bo'i tshong gis dog pa srang gcig gam srang phyed kyis nyos la chur khru gang /_zheng du khru phyed tsam gyi ras 
[\[158a.2\]]kha tshar dang bcas pa thag pa la 'thag tu gzhug go/_/yang na skra med pa'i ras kyi dum bu sar pa gzhan steng dang 'og tu ci ltar 'dod pa khru gnyis dang bzhi dang drug dang lnga dang bcu dang brgyad pa'i ras blangs te/_ci ltar 'dod pa'i ri mo bas ri mo bri bar bya'o/_/tshon ma 'dres pa dang tsan+dan dang 
[\[158a.3\]]ga pur dang /_gur gum gyis bsgos te/_ras kyang tsan+dan dang ga pur dang /_gur gum gcig tu byas pa srog chags med pa'i chu rdul med pa dang bsres te/_snod sar pa'i nang du bkrus la zhag gsum gyi bar du legs par bkab ste/_bzhag nas gtsang ba'i phyogs su 
[\[158a.4\]]srung ba byas shing bdag nyid kyang gtsang bar byas te/_zla ba yar ngo'i tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la ras snod kyi mdun du shar du mngon par phyogs te/_ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas/_sngags kyi tshig lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya ba la 'di lta ste/_oM he he b+ha ga bAn ba hu rU ba d+hA ra di bya tsak+Shu 
[\[158a.5\]]She/_a ba lo ka ya/_a ba lo ka ya/_mAM sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ku mA ra rU pa d+hA ri Ne/_ma hA bo d+hi sa twa kiny+tsi rA ya si hUM s+pha Te s+pha Te swA hA/_sngags 'di bzlas pa byas la de nyid du nyal bar bya'o/_/gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du 'grub pa 'am mi 'grub pa ston par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[158a.6\]]de nas langs nas rmi lam du grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong na ring po mi thogs par ras ris bri bar bya'o/_/gal te grub pa'i mtshan ma rmi lam du ma mthong na/_ras de snod de las phyung la nyi ma la bskams nas yang snod sar pa gzhan du bcug la/_shin tu dben par legs 
[\[158a.7\]]par bsrung ba byas la bzhag go/_/de nas yang snying po'i mchog de dag las gang yang rung ba'i sngags blangs la/_gang 'dod pa'i yi ge drug pa yang yi ge 'bum bzla bar bya'o/_/des na ras mi dge ba yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dang por re zhig ras de blangs la cho 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]'phrul gyi zla phyed dam/_yar ngo'i nyin zhag la rgyu skar bzang po dang ldan pa'i grangs bzang po la/_'phags pa 'jam dpal byis pa khye'u yi gzugs can mgo zur phud lnga dang ldan pa/_byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa mdog gser 'dra ba/_na bza' sngon po g.yo bzhin 
[\[158b.2\]]pa mnabs pa/_na bza' dar la sngon pos stod g.yogs byas pa/_chos 'chad pa seng ge'i khri la skyil mo krung phyed pas bzhugs la/_zhabs g.yas pas rin po che'i zhabs rten la bzhag pa/_g.yon pa seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa/_rgyan thams cad dang 
[\[158b.3\]]ldan pa bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa dang bcas pa/_sgrub pa po la lta ba bri bar bya'o/_/g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa kun du bzang po rnga ma dkar po g.yob pa/_pri yang ku'i mdog ltar sngo bsangs lag pa g.yon pa na nor bu rin po che thogs pa/_yan lag thams cad mdzes 
[\[158b.4\]]pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_na bza' sngon po g.yo ba mnabs pa/_mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs pa/_pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi g.yon phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[158b.5\]]phyug ston ka'i zla rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar ba/_na bza' sngon po g.yo ba mnabs pa/_yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs byas pa/_lag pa g.yon pa na pad+ma dkar po 'dzin pa/_lag pa g.yas 
[\[158b.6\]]pa na rnga yab gser gyi yu ba can dkar po thogs pa/_zhi ba'i cha byad can 'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta ba/_de bzhin du 'phags pa kun du bzang po pad+ma dkar po la gnas pa/_gnyi ga yang de ltar bri bar bya'o/_/de nas sdong bu gcig las skyes pa'i pad+ma 
[\[158b.7\]]gsum la dbus kyi rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i ge sar la ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi seng ge'i khri dang rin po che'i zhabs rten no/_/gnyis pa'i pad+ma la ni 'phags pa kun du bzang po'o/_/gsum pa'i pad+ma la ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go/_/pad+ma'i sdong bu mdzes pa rin po che 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]margad 'dra ba/_pad+ma'i me tog du ma kha ma bye ba dang /_phyed tsam bye ba dang kha bye ba dang ldan pa/_mtsho chen po ma dros pa las skyes pa klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis pad+ma'i sdong bu la 'dzin pa/_klu'i rgyal po de dag gi kha dog dkar ba/_gdengs ka bdun gyis nye bar 
[\[159a.2\]]brgyan pa/_lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_lus kyi stod mi la sbrul gyi gdengs kas mtshan pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta ba/_lus phyed chu'i nang du nub pa nor bu rin po che dang gos kyis nye bar mdzes pa bri bar bya'o/_/mtsho chen po kun gyi 'og tu sgrub pa po ras ris kyi 
[\[159a.3\]]g.yas phyogs kyi mtha'i zur du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor la lta ba/_spos snod lag na thogs pa mgo dang pus mo'i lha nga 'dud pa/_cha byad dang kha dog snga ma ci lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng ras kyi zur gnyis su lha'i bu me 
[\[159a.4\]]tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa/_nam mkha' la lding ba/_sprin gyi nang nas byung ba/_me tog gi tshogs chen po 'thor ba shin tu mdzes pa bri bar bya'o/_/ras ris kyi 'khor yug tu me tog nA ga ge sar la sogs pas rab tu gtor bar bri bar bya'o/_/ci ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs de bzhin du 
[\[159a.5\]]bri bar bya'o/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal chos 'chad pa dang /_'phags pa kun du bzang po dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs lag na rnga yab g.yob pa bri bar bya'o/_/yang na sgrub pa po ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du ras ris kyi gzugs nges par bri bar bya ste/_ci ltar 'dod 
[\[159a.6\]]pa'i cha byad dam/_ci ltar 'dod pa'i dbyibs sam/_sgrub pa po ci lta ci ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar bri bar bya'o/_/dbus su 'phags pa 'jam dpal g.yas g.yon du 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /_kun du bzang po ci ltar 'dod par nges par bri bar bya'o/_/yang na 
[\[159a.7\]]ci rnyed pa'i ras kyi dum bu mtho gang ngam/_khru gang la bdag nyid dam gzhan gyis sam/_ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas pa'am gso sbyong ma byas pa dad pa'am ma dad pa'am/_gtsang ba 'am mi gtsang ba 'am/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am tshul khrims 'chal pa'i ri mo mkhan 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]gyis kyang bri bar bya'o/_/bdag nyid dam sgrub pa pos nges par sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa dang /_dad pa dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni nges par bya'o/_/de ltar byas na sngags 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du sdig pa'i las can gyis ni mi 'gyur te/_de ltar dad pa dang de ltar gyur pas 
[\[159b.2\]]bsgrub par bya'o/_/sngags kyi rgyal po dang sngags kyi lha dag 'dir dad pa dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no/_/gang phyir dad pa theg pa mchog_/gang gis rnam par 'dren pa mchog_/dad pa med pa'i mi la ni/_/dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye 
[\[159b.3\]]ste/_/sa bon tshig par gyur pa las/_/myu gu sngon po ci bzhin no/_/dad dang ldan pa'i mi dag la/_/sangs rgyas las ni 'grub 'gyur te/_/sngags rnams thams cad khyad par du/_/dad pa med la mi 'grub bo/_/gang yang 'jig rten lha dag dang /_/de bzhin 'jig rten 'das 
[\[159b.4\]]pa dag_/dad ldan kun la 'grub 'gyur te/_/sdig pa dag dang bral phyir ro/_/byang chub der song yid kyis ni/_/de dag myur du nges 'grub ste/_/gzhan la 'grub par mi 'gyur zhing /_/bstan pa 'di la rnam par bzlog_/ras ni chung dang chen po dang /_/'bring du nye bar 
[\[159b.5\]]bsgrags pa yin/_/las rnams kun la sgrub pa ni/_/da ni rab tu bstan par bya/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bdun pa'i le'u rab 'byam las/_ras ris kyi cho ga 
[\[159b.6\]]bzhi pa'i le'u rab 'byam rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nu gang khyod kyis bstan pa'i sems can de dag gi phyir/_le'u'i cho ga rab 'byam 'di thabs sla bas 
[\[159b.7\]]'grub par 'gyur ba ngas kyang bstan te/_de dag gi don gyi phyir yon tan rgya che ba'i bye brag gi dbye ba/_las rnam par 'byed pa sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir yang dag par bshad par bya yis/_de legs par shin tu rab tu nyon cig dang bshad par 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]bya'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gi tshig gi nus pa gsal bar mdzad cing /_sngags kyi spyod pa'i yon tan grub par mdzad pa ni legs so legs so zhes gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[160a.2\]]'das de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du de bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_
[\[160a.3\]]ser po dang ljang gu dang shel gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/_'od zer de byung ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/_rgyu skar gyi 'od dang ri bo'i tshogs thams cad 
[\[160a.4\]]kyi 'od dang /_gang 'di zla ba dang nyi ma rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba de dag gi 'od kyang zil gyis mnan te/_mi gsal zhing 'od med par 'gyur ba dang /_rnam par mdzes par mi 'gyur zhing gsal bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nor bu thams cad dang /_sngags dang sman dang /_rin po che'i 
[\[160a.5\]]'od thams cad 'od med par byas nas slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgor nub par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'khod par gyur pa de stan las langs nas/_
[\[160a.6\]]rings pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_
[\[160a.7\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_phyag na rdo rje de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ci skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu med pa dang /_rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/_rgyu yod rkyen 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]yod do/_/gang zhig mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga rig pa'i spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa las sgrub pa'i thabs la yang dag par gzhol ba/_chos kyi sprin la rten pa la yang dag par 'jug cing rjes su 'brang bar byed pa dang /_'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_klog 
[\[160b.2\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_dad par 'gyur ba dang /_glegs bam la 'dri ba byas nas mchod par 'gyur ba dang /_tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang byug pa dang /_bdug pa dang /_phreng ba dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs pa'am/_tshig gi bye brag gis sam/_sil 
[\[160b.3\]]snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_pheg rdob pa dag gam tha na rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgyud la thob pa 'am/_ba spu ldang bar byed pa 'am/_rig pa'i mthu thos nas dga' ba skyes pa 'am/_rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba 'am/_spyod pa thob par 'gyur ba de dag ni ngas 
[\[160b.4\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur bar lung bstan te/_des na rgyal ba de ltar 'dzum pa mdzad kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no/_/'dir dang por re zhig cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la dam tshig mthong ba sngon du bya ba rnams byas pa dang dbang bskur ba 
[\[160b.5\]]thob pa/_rtsa ba'i sngags sam snying po 'am nye ba'i snying po 'am/_sngags gang yang rung ba bzung nas yi ge gcig pa 'am/_gang 'dod pa dgon pa chen por song ste 'bum phrag gsum bzla bar bya'o/_/'bras bu dang chus 'tsho ba 'am/_rtsa ba dang /_lo ma'i bza' ba 
[\[160b.6\]]byas na/_sngon du bya ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs nas ras ris chen po'i tshad nub phyogs su mngon du lta ba bzhag pa byas la bdag nyid shar du bltas te/_ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas/_pad+ma dkar po la tsan+dan dang gur gum gyis btags te/_bcom ldan 
[\[160b.7\]]'das shAkya thub pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos dag la 'bum phrag gcig ri mo'i ras ris kyi 'og tu dbul bar bya'o/_/ga pur gyi bdug pa yang ci 'byor pas bdug go/_/lha'i bu dang klu rnams la yang ci rnyed 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]pa'i me tog gis mchod par bya'o/_/de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus su cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed kyi zla ba nya ba la/_ras ris kyi mdun du pad+ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i me thab byas pa la/_tsan+dan dkar po'i shing gis me sbar nas/_gur gum dang ga pur bsres pas sreg blugs ci 
[\[161a.2\]]'byor pas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas bsrung ba bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las 'od zer byung ste/_ras kyi ri mo'i 'khor yug nas gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur te/_sgrub pa pos gur gum dang /_tsan+dan gyis btags pa'i tsan+dan dkar po'i me 
[\[161a.3\]]tog gis mchod yon dbul lo/_/de nas sgrub pa pos rings pa'i tshul gyis ras ris la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la phyag byas nas/_sgrub pa pos 
[\[161a.4\]]bris pa'i ras ris kyi mtha' ma'i phyogs nas 'jigs pa med pas ras ris gzung bar bya'o/_/de nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'phur te/_se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du phyin par 'gyur te/_me tog can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rab tu gnas par 'gyur 
[\[161a.5\]]te/_gang du bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal yang mngon du mthong ngo /_/chos kyang thos so/_/byang chub sems dpa' du ma dag kyang 
[\[161a.6\]]mthong zhing /_de dag la bsnyen bkur yang byed de bskal pa chen po stong du rga ba dang 'chi ba med cing gnas par 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyang de na gnas par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis byin gyis 
[\[161a.7\]]brlabs par yang yang dag par shes so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong yang 'da' bar byed do/_/lus stong yang ston par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu du ma yang 'byin par byed do/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro/_/nges par byang 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po rgya che ba'i mdo las/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo rab 'byam sgrub pa'i thabs mchog gi las kyi le'u brgyad pa las dang po rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[161b.2\]]shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag khyed cag nyon cig_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor sngags sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las byed pa/_sgrub pa po bsrung ba'i phyir/_mchog tu 
[\[161b.3\]]gsang ba dam pa snying po dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bzlas pa gang gis sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyur te/_kye lha'i tshogs dag 'di ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/_rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[161b.4\]]yang rig pa'i rgyal po 'dis 'gugs shing dbang du byed la/_'byor pa med par byed na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad dang /_bgegs thams cad kyang 'jig par byed de/_'di ni stobs 
[\[161b.5\]]che ba dang mthu che ba dang dpa' bo gcig pa dang sngags thams cad kyi mchog gcig tu bstan pa dang /_yi ge gcig pa rnams kyi nang na gcig par bstan pa dang /_yi ge gcig gis don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/_bya ba thams cad byed pa/_sngags thams cad gcod par 
[\[161b.6\]]byed pa/_ma rungs pa'i las rnams kyi sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa/_sngags thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_dge bar byed pa dang /_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags rnams kyi gong nas gong du 'dug pa/_thogs pa med pa de bzhin 
[\[161b.7\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de gang zhe na/_oM n+thI grogs po dag 'di nyid ni mchog tu gsang ba dam pa las thams cad byed pa/_yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa/_sems can 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]thams cad kyis thub par dka' ba 'byung po thams cad kyi bkra shis pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad sgrub par byed pa/_sngags thams cad kyi mnga' bdag 'jig rten thams cad kyi dbang phyug_/rnam par sdang ba rnams la byams pa'i bdag nyid dang skye bo thams 
[\[162a.2\]]cad la snying brtse bar byed pa/_bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa ste/_mdor na ci lta ci ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las byed de/_bsgrubs pa med kyang las 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sngags 'di bzlas la reg pas de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gos la bsngags nas 
[\[162a.3\]]gyon na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/_/so shing la bsngags na so nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/ka ra bI ra dkar po'i so shing la/_lan bdun bsngags te zos na don du ma gnyer bar yang kha zas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mig gi nad la rgyam tshwa btags te lan bdun mngon 
[\[162a.4\]]par bsngags la mig bkang na mig gi nad sel to/_/rna ba'i nad la 'brug sgrogs pa las skyes pa'i rtswa tsha tri ka zhes bya ba/_glang po che'i rgyab tu reg par byas la/_rang gi lo ma'i nang du btums nas me chung ba la bsregs te shin tu 'jam par byas la/_rgyam tshwa'i phye ma chu 
[\[162a.5\]]dro 'jam tsam dang sprus te lan bdun bsngags pas rna ba bkang ba dang /_skad cig de nyid la rna ba na ba nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med bu 'byung ba'i dus su mngal nas mthon te/_na zhing nyam thag pa la ni shing A DA ru sha ka'i rtsa ba srog chags med pa'i chu la btags te lte ba'i 
[\[162a.6\]]phyogs su bskus na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshon nang du lus pa'i skyes bu la ni mar rnying pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te/_btung ba'am byugs na phyogs de nas de'i skad cig la zug rngu med par 'gyur ro/_/ma zhu ba dang gsud pa dang /_'khru ba'i nad la ni 
[\[162a.7\]]lan tshwa nag po 'am rgyam tshwa 'am tshwa gzhan gang yang rung ba la lan bdun bsngags te zos na nad de las grol bar 'gyur te/_de nyid kyi nyin par bde legs su 'gyur ro/_/ldan pa'i nad kyi tshad pas 'khru ba 'am/_'khru ba la ni ma du lung ga'i rtsa ba btags te/_lan gcig gam 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]gnyis bzlas pa byas nas srog chags med pa'i chu dang 'thungs na gnod pa med par de las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med mo sham bu mi skye ba skye bar 'dod na/_a shwa gan d+ha'i rtsa ba mar bzang po dang lhan cig bskol la/_ba'i 'o ma dang lhan cig bskol te ba'i 'o ma dang bsres 
[\[162b.2\]]la lan nyi shu rtsa lngar bzlas la zla mtshan gyi dus su blud la khrus byas pa'i 'og tu khyim bdag gzhan gyi chung ma spangs shing 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pas/_rang gi chung ma la mngon par song na rang gi khyo dang 'dra ba'i bu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lo gsum mam lo lnga'i bar du bu 
[\[162b.3\]]btsa' ba'i dus su khrag 'byung ba 'am/_lo du ma'i bar du bu ma chags pa 'am/_gzhan gyi sngags rgyud dang sman dang gzhan gyi phyag rgyas bcings pa dang /_gzhan gyis ma rungs par byas pa'am/_bu zla ba ma tshang bar byung ba 'am/_nad las yang dag par byung ba 'am/_
[\[162b.4\]]gzhan gyi sbyor bas yang dag par byung ba 'am/_gzhan gang yang rung ba cung zad gzhan gyis byas pa'i nad dang /_gnas pa dang 'gro ba dang bcos ma dang /_bcos ma ma yin pa'i dbyig dug la sogs pa byin pa 'am rtsa ba dang sman dang sngags thams cad 
[\[162b.5\]]dang /_mdza' ba dang mi mdza' bas sbyor ba byas pa la lan nyi shu rtsa bdun bsngags te/_mar rnying pa la rma bya'i sgro zla ba 'dra ba dang bsres te btags la de nas shin tu zhib par byas la sha kha ra dang lhan cig sbyar te/_a ru ra tsam bza' bar bya'o/_/zhag bdun gyi bar du 
[\[162b.6\]]kha ra dang ldan pa'i bskol ba btung bar bya ste/_yang dang yang du sngags kyang bzla bar bya'o/_/mgo bo'i nad la ni khwa'i gshog pa la lan bdun bsngags te byabs na bde legs su 'gyur ro/_/bud med la spyad drags pa la sogs pa'i nad ni shing a la ma bu sa'i rtsa 
[\[162b.7\]]ba'i lo ma dang lhan cig btags nas/_sman ni li ka'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te 'o ma de dang bsres la btung bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du rims nyin gcig pa dang nyin gnyis pa dang nyin gsum pa dang nyin bzhi pa dang /_ther zug pa'i rims dang /_
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]rtag pa'i rims dang rims mi bzad pa la sogs pa la 'o thug mar dang ldan pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te blud pa byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis zin pa dag la ni/_bdag nyid kyi gdong la lan 
[\[163a.2\]]brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te nad pa la bltas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ma mo dang byis pa dang lus srul po dang ro langs dang gzhon nu'i gdon la sogs pa mi ma yin pa'i mi bzad pa'i gdon thams cad kyis zin pa la ni/_bdag nyid kyi lag pa la lan 
[\[163a.3\]]brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas gdon gyis zin pa'i mgo la reg par byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig bzlas pas bdag nyid bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/lan gnyis bzlas pas grogs po bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/lan gsum bzlas pas khyim bsrung 
[\[163a.4\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/lan bzhi bzlas pas ni grong bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/lan lnga bzlas pas ni grong gi spyod yul gyi 'gro ba bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du lan stong gi bar du bzlas na dmag gi tshogs bsrung ba byas par yang 'gyur ro/_/de dag dang gzhan yang ma bsgrubs par las 
[\[163a.5\]]thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste sgrub par 'dod na ni las phran tshegs rnams bya ba ma yin te/_gcig pu dben pa'i gnas su song nas rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo 'byung ba'i gnas dang /_rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang chu bo gang gA'i ngogs dang /_gzhan gang yang rung ba'i chu 
[\[163a.6\]]bo chen po'i ngogs la brten nas/_gtsang ma'i gnas su lo ma'i spyil po byas te/_khrus lan gsum bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes la/_thub par gnas shing slong mo'i kha zas bza' ba'am tshod rngad dam/_khyor gang tsam mam 'o ma 'am/_'bras bu za zhing bzlas pa sum 
[\[163a.7\]]'bum byas te/_grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong na de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o/_/phyogs de nyid du ras ris chen po bzhag la/_ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas te/_mar me'i snod gser ram dngul lam zangs sam sa'i rang bzhin la/_shing du ru ska'i 'bru mar gyis bkang ba'am dri 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]zhim po'i 'bru mar gyis bkang ba 'am ba'i mar gyis yongs su bkang ba'i mar me ras kyi dum bu sar pa'i snying po byas te ras ris kyi mdun du 'bum phrag gcig gi mar me dbul bar bya'o/_/kho ra khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba phul ma thag tu ras ris las 'od 'byung ste/_'od byung ma thag tu 
[\[163b.2\]]ras ris kyi kho ra khor yug tu 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun nas khyab par 'gyur ro/_/steng gi nam mkha' bar snang las rnga bo che'i sgra sgrogs shing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra yang thos te/_de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings pa'i tshul gyis sgrub pa pos ras ris kyi mtha' la sngar bris pa'i 
[\[163b.3\]]ras ris kyi mtha' nas mchod yon gsol/_lan gsum bskor ba byas te sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas gzung bar bya'o/_/de nas de bzung ba tsam gyis mar me thams cad 'dzin pa'i sems can rnams gcig gis lhag pa'i gzhal med khang 'bum dang lhan 
[\[163b.4\]]cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i sil snyan dang yang dag par ldan pa dang /_glu snyan pa'i sgra la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_gar dang ldan pa'i rig pa 'dzin ma 'khor yug tu khyab pa dag gis mar me thogs pa dang lhan cig sgrub pa po rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur 
[\[163b.5\]]ba'i rgyal por dbang skur bar byed do/_/rga ba dang 'chi ba med pas rol par 'gyur zhing /_bskal pa chen por gnas shing nyi ma dang 'dra ba dang /_lha'i yan lag lta bur mdzes pa dang /_gos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang /_'khor de dag dang yang 'di lhan cig tu 
[\[163b.6\]]spyad par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang 'di'i bran bzhin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/_rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/ring du 'tsho ba dang grub pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi bu mo rnams la 
[\[163b.7\]]mchog tu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/rdzas thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la bzhugs par 'gyur ro/_/skad cig gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro zhing brgya byin la yang bgrang ba med na/_rig pa 'dzin 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]pa gzhan lta ci smos/_'di ni mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur zhing /_'phags pa 'jam dpal yang 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang las kyi sgrub pa po yod de/_de nas shin tu brtson pas gcig pu dben pa/_skye bo med 
[\[164a.2\]]la 'dres pa med cing 'dres pa dang bral bas dgon pa chen por zhugs te/_gnas gang du pad+ma chen po yod pa'i mtsho dang ldan pa'i ri'i rtse mo gcig tu brten nas/_ri'i rtse mo de'i steng du 'dzegs te/_rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig pa 'jam dpal gyi cho ga las bshad 
[\[164a.3\]]pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_gzhan byang chub sems dpas bshad pa'am/_gang yang rung ba'i sngags 'dod pa de dag bzung ste/_pad+ma'i rtsa ba'am 'o ma'i kha zas kyis 'tsho zhing /_rig pa 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug bzlas la/_bzlas pa'i mthar cho ga de 
[\[164a.4\]]nyid kyis sngar bstan pa'i ras ris kyi ri mo chen po rab tu bzhag ste/_me tog pad+ma la tsan+dan dkar po dang /_gur gum gyis btags la seng ldeng gi shing gi me sbar te/_sngar yongs su btags pa'i me tog gis stong phrag drug cu rtsa drug gi sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas sbyin 
[\[164a.5\]]sreg gi mthar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i ras ris las 'od zer 'byung ngo /_/de nas sgrub pa po snang bar byas te/_spyi bor zhugs par 'gyur la des reg ma thag tu sgrub pa pos mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par 'gyur/_lha'i 
[\[164a.6\]]lus kyis ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro bar 'gyur/_bskal pa sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum cu rtsa drug gnon par 'gyur/_de dag gi mthu yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas sum cu rtsa drug gi gsung rab 'dzin par 
[\[164a.7\]]'gyur/_de la mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/_mthar yang byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis byang chub kyi mthar thug pa/_mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen du yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/byang 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga dgu pa'i le'u rab 'byam las/_gnyis pa sgrub pa'i thabs dam pa'i las kyi le'u rab 'byam rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sgrub pa'i 
[\[164b.2\]]las dam pa gzhan yang gsungs te/_cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzung nas/_gang gA'i klung chen por zhugs te/_dkyil du gru'i bzhon pa la 'dug ste/_'o ma dang sbyar ba'i 'bras chan za zhing ci ltar 'dod pa'i nyi ma la bzlas pa sum 'bum bya'o/_/
[\[164b.3\]]de nas bzlas pa'i tha ma la klu thams cad mthong ste/_de nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya'o/_/gru'i steng de nyid kyi nang du me thab pad+ma'i rnam pa 'dra ba byas nas/_me tog nA ga ge sar dag gis ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas te/_ras ris chen po nub du bstan pas bzhag la/_
[\[164b.4\]]bdag nyid shar du bltas nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/_me tog nA ga ge sar re re la yang lan bdun bdun bsngags pa byas nas/_shing seng ldeng gis me sbar ba la sbyin sreg bya ste/_tsan+dan dkar po dang gur gum dang bsres pa'i me tog nA ga ge sar gyis lan stong phrag sum 
[\[164b.5\]]cu rtsa drug gi bar du bya ste/_gzhan gyis ni ma yin no/_/klu rnams mthong ba yang don yod pa yin te/_grub pa'i rdzas rnams la rab tu chags pas blang bar mi bya ste/_grub pa'i rdzas rnams la chags pas len par mi byed na/_des na sbyin sreg rdzogs pa dang gru'i bzhon pa 
[\[164b.6\]]dang bcas par 'phur bar 'gyur te/_rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur la/_klu'i rgyal po'i dbang po thams cad kyang su 'brang zhing bran bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/bar gyi bskal pa sum cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/'di rang dbang du'ang 
[\[164b.7\]]spyod par 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/spyi bo la phyag gis reg par mdzad de/_reg pa tsam gyis mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro/_/nges par sangs rgyas nyid kyang 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]'thob par 'gyur ro/_/las kyi mchog gzhan yang bstan pa ni bil ba'i shing gcig gi rang bzhin las gru'i bzhon pa shin du brtan pa dang /_legs par byas te de la zhon nas gang gA'i klung chen por zhugs te/_bil ba'i shing las rlung yor byas te/_de nyid 
[\[165a.2\]]kyis gru de rlung yor 'dzin pa mkhas pa gsal ba des phyag par bya'o/_/gang gA'i klung chen po mi dor bar yongs su thad ka'am/_chur phyag par bya'o/_/de nas gzhan gang yang rung ba'i sngags rtsa ba'i sngags sam/_'bru drug pa'am/_'bru gsum pa'am/_'bru brgyad pa'am 'bru 
[\[165a.3\]]gcig pa'am/_khro bo'am pho nya'am/_'khor gyi sngags bzung nas/_dang por ras ris chen po de nyid nub tu bltas pas bzhag la/_sgrub pa po shar du blta bar bya'o/_/de nas ci ltar 'dod pa'i 'o ma dang /_nas chan khyor gang ngam 'bras bu'i kha zas sam/_chu dang rtsa 
[\[165a.4\]]ba dang /_'bras bu'i kha zas kyis 'tsho la mi smra ba'i dka' thub dang /_dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes nas dge ba'i las bzang po yang dag par spyod pa dang /_blo dge ba bzang po dang ldan pa'o/_/dang por re zhig ras ris kyi mdun du sngar ci ltar bstan pa'i sngar 
[\[165a.5\]]bshad pa'i cho gas rig pa 'bum phrag drug cu bzla'o/_/bzlas pa zin pa na gru de rgya mtsho chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/sgrub pa po'i yo byad yang dag par blangs te sngar gyi gnas su gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas gru'i bzhon pa rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba na 'jigs par mi bya ste bzlog 
[\[165a.6\]]par yang mi bya'o/_/sgrub pa po ma gtogs pas zlog par nus pa yang ma yin no/_/de nas dpag tshad stong du gnas pa'i rgya mtsho chen por yang yud tsam gyis 'jug par 'gyur na/_lam thung ngu lta smos kyang ci dgos/_rgya mtsho chen po der phyin pa na sgrub pa pos bsgrub pa'i 
[\[165a.7\]]las brtsam par bya'o/_/de nas seng ldeng gi shing gi me sbar la/_sngar byas pa'i me thab bam/_rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i sa'i snod la/_me tog nA ga ge sar tsan+dan dkar po dang ga pur gyis bsres pa'i sreg blugs kyis shin tu nyung ba'am rab tu mang ba yang rung 'bum phrag 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]drug cu sbyin sreg bya'o/_/sbyin sreg byed pa na yang lang ka'i grong khyer na gnas pa'i srin po gzugs dang cha byad mang po 'dzin pa ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs pa dang /_klu'i grong khyer gdengs ka dang ldan pa na gnas pa'i rgyal po rnams langs par 'gyur te/_cha byad rnam pa sna 
[\[165b.2\]]tshogs 'dzin pa rab tu drag pa dang /_rab tu zhi ba'i klu de rnams dang /_srin po de rnams 'di skad du khyed bzhengs shig bzhengs shig_/bdag cag gi bdag po mdzad du gsol zhes brjod do/_/de bzhin du lha ma yin dang gnod sbyin dang /_lha dang lto 'phye chen po dang grub pa dang mi ma yin 
[\[165b.3\]]pa thams cad kyang rab tu chags par byed na ldang bar mi bya/_'jigs par mi bya'o/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngags zlo zhing /_lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mos sdigs mdzub byas na/_de nas phan tshun du 'gro ba dang 'byor ba dang 'bros par byed do/_/de nas sbyin sreg 
[\[165b.4\]]zin pa na gru de sgrub pa po des blangs na skad cig gis 'og min du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du yang 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang mthu mnyam par 'gyur/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang rdzu 'phrul chen po dang mthu 
[\[165b.5\]]chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'dis 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang rtag tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos ma gtogs pa/_klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang srin po thams cad 
[\[165b.6\]]dang gnod sbyin thams cad dang /_lha thams cad dang lha ma yin thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyang 'di'i bka' bzhin byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'di'i sngags grub pa de dag la yang byams pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur zhing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[165b.7\]]sems can thams cad kyis kyang mi thub pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang las sgrub pa'i thabs dam pa yod de/_shing bil ba chen po las gru'i bzhon pa byas la yang shing gcig gi shing gi tshogs las gnas chen po byas te/_gang gA'i dbus kyi gling 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]der gru'i bzhon pa'i gnas byas la/_der yang gru'i bzhon pa la zhon pa'i skyes bu brgya nyi shu rnams mar me lag na thogs pa/_gos dkar po bgos pa srung ba byas pa/_cho ga snga mas yang dag par bzhag pa'i ras ris mdun du gzhag par bya ste/_de nas ras ris 
[\[166a.2\]]la mchod pa chen po byas nas/_nA ga ge sar gyi phye ma tsan+dan dkar po dang gur gum dang ga pur gyis bsres pa'i sreg blugs kyis seng ldeng gi me la stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas sbyin sreg zin pa na/_skad cig gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 
[\[166a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu bar byed do/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur te/_mthong ba tsam gyis sa thob par yang 'gyur ro/_/mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob pa dang yun ring du 'tsho zhing bskal pa chen por 
[\[166a.4\]]gnas par yang 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar yang 'gyur ro/_/mar me 'dzin pa de dag kyang rig pa 'dzin pa 'di'i grogs por 'gyur te/_de dag dang lhan cig ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rgyu zhing rang dbang du 'gro bar yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[166a.5\]]ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed par mngon par dga' bar 'gyur zhing /_'phral yang sangs rgyas nyid du nges par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las dam pa yod de/_chu klung rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag gam/_/de bzhin ri bo kha ba can/_/ri yi 
[\[166a.6\]]rgyal po 'bigs byed la/_/las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya/_/ma la ya ri sa ha dang /_/spos kyi ngad ldang ar bu dang /_/ri yi rgyal po sum brtsegs la/_/las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya/_/de bzhin rgya mtsho chen po dang /_/ri ni shing ldan me tog yod/_/'di dag gi 
[\[166a.7\]]ni phyogs dag tu/_/sngags grub par ni rgyal bas gsungs/_/gtsang zhing bas mtha' dben phyogs su/_/grong gi chos ni rnam par spangs/_/de bzhin ri yi tshang tshing du/_/sngags kyi rgyal po thams cad 'grub/_/bas mtha'i gnas mal nyams dga' dang /_/rgyal bas 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]de bzhin bsngags pa dang /_/ma rungs sems can thams cad la/_/sngags kyi rgyal po thams cad 'grub/_/chos ldan rgyal po yod pa dang /_/gtsang sbra spyod pa'i skye bo yod/_/pha dang ma la gus pa dang /_/bram ze'i rigs ni yod pa yi/_/gnas der lha rnams 'grub 'gyur 
[\[166b.2\]]te/_/gzhan du 'grub pa ma yin no/_/chu bo gang gA'i 'gram dang ni/_/de bzhin legs mdzes ya mu na/_/sin+du nar ma dA nang dang /_/zla ba'i cha ni gtsang ngogs dang /_/de bzhin kA ba'i sa ra swad/_/chu bo chen po sI ta rnams/_/'di dag grub pa'i zhing du ni/_/stobs bcu ldan 
[\[166b.3\]]sras rnams kyis bshad/_/stobs bcu ldan pas bshad pa'i zhing /_/byang phyogs yod pa'i ri dag dang /_/kha che dang ni rgya yul dang /_/bal po de bzhin mang yul dang /_/rgya yul che dang li yul dag_/de dag ma lus grub pa'i zhing /_/byang phyogs la ni gnas pa dang /_/nas dang 
[\[166b.4\]]gro la spyod pa dang /_/ri dang chu bo dag la yang /_/bsod nams yul du bstan pa yin/_/sems can snying rje ldan gang gnas/_/de dag la ni nges 'grub 'gyur/_/dpal gyi ri bo'i ri chen ni/_/lho yi phyogs na yang dag gnas/_/dpal ldan 'bras phung mchod rten ni/_/rgyal 
[\[166b.5\]]ba'i ring bsrel gnas pa'i sa/_/thams cad don gyi gnas dag la/_/der ni sngags rnams myur du 'grub/_/mchod rten chen po rdo rje gdan/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor dang /_/thub mchog zhi bar rab gshegs pa/_/der yang grub par rab tu snang /_/lha las babs 
[\[166b.6\]]pa'i mchod rten dang /_/nai ka sha dang cho 'phrul bstan/_/grong mchog ser skya zhes bya dang /_/nags tshal lum bi nir 'khrungs la/_/sngags kyi rgyal po 'grub 'gyur zhes/_/rgyal bas rab bsngags brjod pa yin/_/bya rgod phung po'i ri dang ni/_/de bzhin sa steng 
[\[166b.7\]]bsil ba'i tshal/_/grong mchog me tog ces bya dang /_/rtag tu de bzhin ga sha dang /_/bcom brlag ka n+ya kub dza dang /_/sa steng grong ni 'phags rgyal dang /_/de bzhin yangs pa can mchod rten/_/mi thi la yi grong khyer sa/_/grong dang grong khyer mchog dag ni/_/
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]gang gzhan skye bo yang dag 'byung /_/rab bsngags bsod nams yul dag ni/_/de dag la ni bsgrub pa bya/_/de dang gzhan yang yul dag dang /_/grong dang ljongs dang ri bor dang /_/gnas dang grong mchog gtso bo ni/_/bsod nams gnas la rab brten nas/_/
[\[167a.2\]]der ni slong mos rjes 'tsho zhing /_/bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' ba dang /_/gnas khang bla gab med pa dang /_/rtag tu khyim ni stong pa la/_/sngags rnams las ni thams cad la/_/thog ma nyid du bya ba yin/_/sngags pas rtag tu yul dbus su/_/sngags bzlas mngon par 'dod 
[\[167a.3\]]pas bya/_/bzlas la rab zhugs rtag tu brtson/_/sngags rig gtong ba dag la goms/_/tshul khrims spyod cing shin tu dben/_/'byung po kun la phan par dga'/_/sngags spyod pa la dga' ba yi/_/sdom brtson gyis ni sngags bzlas bya/_/gtsang zhing gtsang sbra yod phyogs 
[\[167a.4\]]dang /_/kla klo rkun ma rnam par spangs/_/sems can sdig sbrul la sogs pa/_/spangs pa'i sa phyogs 'dod pa yis/_/'bras bu me tog yang dag ldan/_/dri med rab bsngags chu yod par/_/sngags rigs sngags ni brten byas na/_/sbyor ba thams cad rab tu 'grub/_/gzhan 
[\[167a.5\]]yang dur khrod chen po ni/_/der ni bzlas pa rtag tu bya/_/dri med chu dang 'bab chu ni/_/srog chags dag kyang rnam par spangs/_/der ni de nyid bzla bya ste/_/mnyam par bzhag pas sngags bzlas bya/_/'jig rten spyod pa'i bsod nams min/_/der ni cung zad mi mthong ste/_/
[\[167a.6\]]'on kyang sngags ni bstan pa yis/_/cung zad dus ni bstan pa'o/_/dam tshig tshogs pa'i rgyu ldan na/_/de las gzhan du'ang 'gro bya ste/_/der ni dam tshig thob bsten pa/_/cung zad dus te gzhan du min/_/de nas gzhan du'ang myur du ni/_/sngags rig pas ni ci nus 'gro/_/
[\[167a.7\]]bde gshegs mchod rten bzhugs pa yi/_/sa steng dag la rtag tu bsten/_/'jig rten mu stegs thams cad ni/_/lta ba log par ltung ba dang /_/gzhan yang stegs su gyur pa rnams/_/sngags rig pas ni rtag tu spang /_/rgyu ngan 'gro ba ngan yod par/_/sngags rig 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]pas ni der mi bsten/_/gang du rgyal ba mchog bzhugs dang /_/sa steng bse ru rang rgyal dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' skal ba che/_/nyan thos rgyal ba'i sras dag ni/_/de dag gnas pa'i phyogs dag tu/_/zlos pa sngags rig ldan pas bsten/_/'bad pas snga ma nyid du ni/_/
[\[167b.2\]]gnas de la ni rtag tu spyod/_/sngags shes cho ga mthong ba yis/_/yang dang yang du sngags zlos bya/_/lus can sdig pa ma lus dag_/bzlas dang sbyin sreg dag gis sel/_/de bas 'bad pa kun gyis ni/_/mnyam bzhag sngags ni bzla bar bya/_/las thams cad la 
[\[167b.3\]]gnas 'di dag gsungs pa las sgrub pa mchog gi las kyi thabs sgrub pa la gnas 'di dag ma rnyed na/_gang yang rung ba'i gnas de dag tu gtsang sbra byas te sngon du bsnyen pa byas la/_dad cing mos pas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi lam dam pa brtsam par bya ste/_dang por re zhig ras 
[\[167b.4\]]ris chen po nub tu bltas pas bzhag ste/_bdag nyid shar du bltas la/_grog mkhar gyi sa'am/_gang gA'i klung gi ngogs na yod pa'i sa blangs te/_rtswa u shi ra dang tsan+dan dkar po dang gur gum dang ga pur la sogs pas bsre ba bya ste/_rma bya'i gzugs byas la 
[\[167b.5\]]ras ris de'i mdun du bzhag go/_/ku sha'i rtse mo ma nyams pas phyogs gtsang mar skyes pa 'khor lo'i gzugs su byas te/_ras ris kyi mdun du lag pa g.yas pas bzung zhing /_lag pa g.yon pas rma bya bzung la/_yar ngo'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mor ras ris la mchod 
[\[167b.6\]]pa chen po byas te/_ga pur dang tsan+dan gyi dud pa bsregs la/_nam langs kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/_de nas nyi ma shar ba'i dus su lha'i rang bzhin gyi rma bya ni rma bya chen po'i rgyal mor 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo ni kun du 'bar bar 'gyur zhing /_bdag nyid kyang lha'i lus su 'gyur 
[\[167b.7\]]ro/_/de nas lha'i phreng ba dang gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra ba'i 'dod pa'i gzugs mdzes par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas/_ras ris la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas la/_ras ris blangs te rma bya'i stan 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]de la 'dug na yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gnon par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi 'khor du ma dang ldan pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/bar gyi bskal pa drug cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ltar 'dod par 
[\[168a.2\]]'gro zhing spyod par 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba la thogs pa med pa dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal yang mngon sum du 'gyur zhing /_de nyid 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro/_mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[168a.3\]]de bzhin du dbyug pa dang /_spyi blugs dang tshangs skud dang ldong ros dang gi wang dang ral gri dang /_lcags mda' dang mtshon rtse gcig pa dang dgra sta dang /_mtshon rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par sa'i rang bzhin nam/_rkang gnyis dang rkang bzhi dang bya dang bzhon pa'i bye brag seng 
[\[168a.4\]]ge dang stag dang dom la sogs pa'am/_grog mkhar gyi sa'i rang bzhin la dri zhim po'i dris bsres pa las/_gdan dang bzhon pa dang gnas mal dang /_gdugs dkar po dang cod pan dang rgyan gyi bye brag thams cad dang rin po che'i bye brag thams cad dang /_rab 
[\[168a.5\]]tu byung ba'i yo byad kyi bye brag phreng ba dang lham dang shing lham dang /_lhung bzed dang chos gos dang khar gsil dang khab dang /_gri la sogs pa lcags khyad par can gyi rang bzhin nam/_gzhan yang gang cung zad sems can gyi yo byad snod la sogs pa/_lcags bzang po'i 
[\[168a.6\]]rang bzhin nam/_grog mkhar gyi sa'am/_chu bo'i ngogs kyi sa las byas pa de dag thams cad pa'i rnam lngas bkrus pa'am/_chus gtor ba tsam byas la snga ma bzhin du yongs su dag par byed pa'i sngags sam/_yi ge gcig pa'i sngags sam/_gzhan gang yang rung 
[\[168a.7\]]ba'i sngags cho ga'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabs kyi sngags ma gtogs pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas te/_ci ltar 'dod par bdag nyid bsrung ba byas pa dang grogs po yang yongs su bskyab pa byas pa dang shin tu gsang ba'i sngags dang rgyud shes pa sngar bstan 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]pa'i gnas dag tu ras ris nub tu bltas pas gzhag la/_bdag nyid snga ma bzhin du byas te/_ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas ras ris chen po la ga pur gyi bdug pas bdugs te/_sngar bstan pa'i mtshon dang yo byad dang sems can gyi khyad par sngar bstan pa'i bcos 
[\[168b.2\]]mar byas pa la/_yar ngo'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo gong ma'i rdzas gang yang rung ba de dag blangs te/_mtshan mo nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi bar du bzla bar bya'o/_/bar 'dir 'od chen po'i phreng ba ras ris la yang dag par mthong la/_gal te bzhon pa'i khyad par sgrub pa pos 
[\[168b.3\]]gzung bar gyur na ni/_de la zhon nas ci ltar 'dod par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te rgyan gyi khyad par ram tshon gyi khyad par de blangs pas de bcangs na/_rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin par 'gyur te/_ci ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang /_nyi ma shar 
[\[168b.4\]]ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang 'od kyi phreng ba chen po dang ldan pa dang /_lus shin tu gsal bar 'gyur ba dang rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro/_/ring du 'tsho zhing bskal pa chen por gnas pa dang rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi 'khor du ma 
[\[168b.5\]]dang ldan pa dang /_lha'i nor bu rin po che'i gzhal med khang la spyod pa dang bzhon pa gang sngar yongs su brtags pa sa'i rang bzhin grub na/_de nyid 'dir mthu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te bzhon pa de nyid 'di'i grogs por 'gyur ba dang gzhan gyi sngags 'gugs par byed pa 
[\[168b.6\]]grub pa rnams kyi brten pa'i gnas su gyur pa/_bdag gi sngags kyi grub pa la yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa/_byams pa'i bdag nyid dang phan par 'dod pas rab tu 'brel ba gang 'di nyid kyi mtshon dang rgyan dang rin po che'i khyad par dang /_stan dang gnas mal dang sems 
[\[168b.7\]]can la sogs pa nyid 'di la srung ba chen po nyid dang sba ba dang sbed pa la rtag tu 'brang bar 'gyur ro mthu chen po dang brtson 'grus chen po dang lus chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing legs so zhes bya ba yang 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]sbyin par mdzad la/_spyi bo la reg par mdzad cing byang chub kyi snying po thob kyi bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen du sgrub par mdzad do/_/stobs bcu nyid kyang nges par thob par mdzad cing /_sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon cing mchod par yang 'gyur ro/_/'byung po 
[\[169a.2\]]thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa'i rgyud kyi mtha' gcod pa med par 'gyur ba dang sa thob par 'gyur ba dang stobs bcu dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa nges par thob par 'gyur te/_mdor na las dam pa thams cad gnas dam pa dag tu gnas nas/_ras 
[\[169a.3\]]ris dam pa dag gi mdun du mchod pa dam pa la mngon par dga' bas las dam pa gzhan dag kho na bya'o/_/rig pa 'dzin pa nyid du nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su zhugs pa dang mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dang sa dang sngags thob pa nyid dang lus 'di nyid 
[\[169a.4\]]kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu 'gro ba nyid dang stobs bcu'i rgyud yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /_'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong ba nyid kyi phyir dang 'bras bu yod par mthong ba'i chos ston pa mnyan pa'i phyir dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i 
[\[169a.5\]]phyir dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthar gyis rjes su thob pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_chos kyi sprin las byung ba'i sngags bzang po la 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_nyon mongs pa bskam pa dang bdud rtsi'i char gyis nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang /_'jig rten rjes su gzung 
[\[169a.6\]]ba la rab tu 'jug par rjes su sgrub pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_de bzhin du chos kyi tshul gzung ba'i phyir dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung don yod par bya ba'i phyir dang /_sngags kyi thabs kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga rab tu gsang ba nyid kyi phyir dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub 
[\[169a.7\]]sems dpa' thams cad dang rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos kyi bdag nyid chen po 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir/_cho ga'i rgyal po rab 'byam sngags kyi mthu dang rab tu rnam par ldan pa 'di ras ris chen po'i mdun du nye bar gnas la bsgrub par bya ste/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]las 'das pa'i sngags kyi cho ga dang /_sngags rgyud thams cad kyi cho ga'i lam gyi ste/_mdor na 'dir cho ga gzhan du gsungs pa'i las kyis kyang cho ga'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste/_myur du de dag gi sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/_gang ngas bstan pa de dag nges par 'grub 
[\[169b.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bcu pa ras ris chen po'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas yang gnas gtsang 
[\[169b.3\]]ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyi ras ris bar ma'i cho ga gzhan sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga yod de/_mdor bsdus nas bshad kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/
[\[169b.4\]]de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang ston pa sems can thams cad la phan par dgyes pa dang /_bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la 
[\[169b.5\]]gzigs nas/_de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na de bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal nyon cig dang por re zhig tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang /_gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang
