[\[169b.6\]]nges par sdom pa dang bzlas pa dang /_sbyin sreg dang bsam gtan dang cho ga gang du legs par rab tu gnas pa la sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa sgrub pa'i las 'bras bu dang bcas shing don yod par 'gyur te/_sngags thams cad kyi sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/ngas bshad 
[\[169b.7\]]pa de gang zhe na/_gzhon nu nyon cig_/dang por re zhig rig pa dang brtul zhugs dang /_tshul khrims kyi yi dam dang po nyid du blang bar byas la/_dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i dam tshig khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal por bstan cing sngar bshad pa 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]la rjes su 'jug par bya'o/_/blo gsal ba yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa/_slob dpon du dbang bskur ba khyod kyis bstan pa'i cho ga shes pa/_dge ba gsal ba'i chos dang ldan pa/_bden par smra ba spro ba chen po dang ldan pa byas pa gzo ba/_yid gzhungs 
[\[170a.2\]]pa dang ldan pa/_'dris brten pa ha cang mi rgan ha cang mi gzhon pa rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la chags pa med pa tshangs par spyod pa/_snying rje dang ldan pa rnyed pa tsam mam/_longs spyod kyi rgyu tsam mam/_rjes su chags pa'i rgyur yang rdzun mi smra na cung zad tsam mam/_
[\[170a.3\]]chags pa'am rmongs pa tsam gyis rnam par lta smos kyang ci dgos/_dam bcas pa brtan pa dang sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang /_snying rje dang ldan pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_sngon du spyad pa byas pa dang khyod kyi gsang ba'i sngags rjes su 
[\[170a.4\]]zlos pa dang snga ma nyid du rig pa goms par byas pa dang /_khyod kyi dkyil 'khor la mthar gyis yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_'jig rten shes pa dang cho ga shes pa dang yang dag par rjes su 'dzin par byed pa dang /_'bras bu dang ldan zhing mkhas pa dang legs pa la 
[\[170a.5\]]rab tu zhugs pa dang gzugs mdzes pa dang 'dod pa med pa dang /_chags pa med pa dang dpa' ba dang brtson 'grus brtan pa dang nad med pa ste/_nad gang gis las mi nus pa'i ngang tshul can gyi nad med pa dang rigs mthon por skye ba'o/_/yon tan de dag dang ldan 
[\[170a.6\]]na ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur la/_sgrub pa po yang de dang mnyam pa ste/_yan lag lhag pa'am ma tshang ba cung zad kyang med pa'o/_/de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la mchod pa byas shing don du gnyer bar byas te/_slob dpon dang lhan cig byang 
[\[170a.7\]]chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i dam tshig la rjes su 'jug par 'tshal na/_slob dpon gyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_phan pa'i thugs dang brtse ba'i thugs kyis de bshad du gsol/_de nas dkyil 'khor gyi 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]slob dpon des sngar bstan pa'i cho gas slob ma la snga ma ci lta bu bzhin du brtags nas rab tu gzhug par bya ste/_sngar ci ltar dbang bskur ba bzhin du phyis kyang sbyin par bya'o/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ci lta ba bzhin du dam tshig bstan te/_gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang rgyud dang sngags dang las 
[\[170b.2\]]kyang dus ring po nyid nas nges par brtags te/_bsam pa shes nas bstan par bya ste/_sngags la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang thams cad du gzhan du ma yin no zhes cho ga 'di ltar bstan pa yin no/_/de nas slob mas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la ci nus pas/_gang 
[\[170b.3\]]gis slob dpon dgyes pa bdag dang longs spyod rab tu dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des bu'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bya ste/_bu bzhin du bsgrub par bya zhing ma bzhin du yang longs spyod kyis nye bar bsdu bar bya'o/_/de nas sgrub pa po des 
[\[170b.4\]]sngags gang yang rung ba bzung ste/_gcig pu dben par song nas sngar bstan pa gong ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar te/_de dag nyid kyis sngags dag gis ni spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol ba dang /_mar me dang dri dang bdug pa dang gtor ma dang lha bshos dkyil 
[\[170b.5\]]'khor la gsungs pa nyid kyi cho gas rgya cher bya ste/_spyan drangs nas gdan dang mchod yon phul la/_dus mtshams gsum du khrus lan gsum bya zhing /_gos lan gsum brje zhing nyin re bzhin du bzlas pa bya'o/_/de la dus gsum zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo'i mtha' 
[\[170b.6\]]nas brtsams pa yin te/_zung tsam nas nyi ma 'char ba'i bar 'dir dang po'i dus su brjod do/_/nyi ma gung ni nyi ma gnyi ga'i gung tsam gyi tshad du nam mkha' la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ni nyi ma gung gi dus zhes brjod do/_/nyi ma nub pa'i dus su lhag ma zung 
[\[170b.7\]]tsam lus pa'i dus gsum pa zhes brjod do/_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag ldan/_/slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dang /_/mthon po'i rigs su skyes pa dang /_/rnam pa kun du brtson 'grus brtan/_/sngags rgyud dag la mngon brtson dang /_/bya ba kun la blo gros 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]dge/_/zhib cing mkhas la chog shes dang /_/chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu 'dzin/_/spro ba che zhing gzi brjid che/_/'jig rten chos la ltos pa med/_/thub mchog chos la dad pa dang /_/'jig rten na ni yongs su bsngags/_/dben pa shes shing bzlas pa byed/_/
[\[171a.2\]]sngon du bsnyen pas rjes bsnyen byed/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sngags shes shing /_/mthong bas nges 'dzin de mchog byed/_/sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams la/_/'jig rten pa yi sbyor ba shes/_/srung byed mthu ni brtan pa dang /_/rtag tu gtsang sbra'i spyod la dga'/_/
[\[171a.3\]]sangs rgyas bstan pa'i lam la ni/_/thams cad du ni 'jug par byed/_/rab bsngags rgyal bas bstod pa yi/_/sngags zlos pa la brtson par byed/_/las 'bras dag la rtag yid ches/_/'jig rten pha rol de bzhin no/_/sdig pa kun la 'jigs byed pa/_/shin tu 
[\[171a.4\]]phra ba'ang de bzhin no/_/gtsang zhing grims dang le lo med/_/yid gzhungs blta na sdug pa dang /_/stobs bcu ldan pas sngags bshad dang /_/de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras dang ni/_/gang dag 'jig rten sngags dag dang /_/rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag gis/_/de la rtag tu brtson byed 
[\[171a.5\]]dang /_/gzhung dang bstan bcos don klog pa/_/nad med pa dang stobs ldan dang /_/rgan dang gzhon pa rnam par spangs/_/sngags grub de bzhin shes nyen can/_/kun nas myur du byed pa dang /_/las mtha' mi ring nga rgyal chung /_/zur tsam gyis go khyad par can/_/tshangs par 
[\[171a.6\]]spyod cing shes rab che/_/gcig pu 'dre bar mi byed dang /_/'jam dpal gyis gsungs rgyud dag la/_/dbang bskur thob cing dpa' ba dang /_/bzlas pa'i mthar byas ldan pa dang /_/de bzhin rig pa goms byas dang /_/sems dpa' che zhing 'jig rten shes/_/'gro ba'i de nyid 
[\[171a.7\]]rjes sems dang /_/legs pa'i lam nyid rab sbyar byed/_/sbyin byed 'byung po phan la dga'/_/khyad par can de'i slob dpon la/_/rtag tu don du gnyer bar bya/_/dkyil 'khor de ni bris pa la/_/sngags rnams grub pa ster bar 'gyur/_/de nyid kyis ni dbang bskur na/_/'bras bu chen 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]po ster bar 'gyur/_/grub pa 'dod pa'i slob mas kyang /_/thub mchog de ni rtag tu mchod/_/de yi bka' ni mi 'gom par/_/slob mas 'bad nas bya ba yin/_/ci ltar 'byor pa yod pa bzhin/_/longs spyod de la sbyin par bya/_/nyung ba'ang yang na mang ba'ang rung /_/gang 
[\[171b.2\]]gis dga' ba thob 'gyur ba/_/lus dang srog gi don phyir ni/_/nor ni ci ltar sbyin pa bzhin/_/slob ma chos rig de bzhin du/_/slob dpon phyir ni nor sbyin na/_/tshe dang nad med de bzhin du/_/grags pa thob par 'gyur ba yin/_/slob mas bla ma de mchod na/_/dag pa'i 'gro 
[\[171b.3\]]ba thob par 'gyur/_/lam ni sna tshogs nyer bstan pas/_/de la sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/de la bsten dang bsnyen bkur byas/_/ri mo byas dang mchod pas ni/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang de bzhin du/_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams mnyes par 'gyur/_/bla ma rtag tu bsnyen bkur 
[\[171b.4\]]na/_/lha rnams thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/_/bla ma sngags rnams mthong ba yis/_/de ltar thams cad bstan pa yin/_/sgrub pa pos ni dang por yang /_/dam tshig la ni 'jug par bya/_/dma' ba'am de dang mnyam pa'ang rung /_/gal te khyad par gyur na yang /_/rmongs 
[\[171b.5\]]pa'am lhag pa yin yang rung /_/rtag tu bla ma brnyas mi bya/_/ci ltar de nyid rjes mthong la/_/sngags 'grub pa la bya ba yin/_/sngar bstan pa yi slob ma yis/_/de la phrag dog bya ba min/_/lus can brtse ba 'phel byed pa'i/_/mig ni gang la yod gyur pa/_/de ni 
[\[171b.6\]]slob ma nyid bya ste/_/slob dpon rgyur yang bya ba yin/_/gang du phan tshun rgyud la ni/_/brtse ba'i phreng ba yod pa dang /_/brtse ba'i rgyud ni 'dzin pa la/_/de la sngags ni sbyin par bya/_/slob dpon la ni slob ma 'am/_/bla mas slob ma mthong ba'ang rung /_/rtag tu spro bar 'gyur 
[\[171b.7\]]ba la/_/gnyi ga la ni grub pa gnas/_/de dag la ni rtag tu yang /_/sngags spyod lam ni bstan par bya/_/gnyi gas pha dang bur shes la/_/sngags ni 'bras bcas gnas pa yin/_/slob ma bla mas rtag tu ni/_/brtan dang dga' ba de bzhin thob/_/bu ni chos dang rjes mthun 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]la/_/'bad pas rtag tu bsrung bar bya/_/de dag la ni sangs rgyas chos/_/rtag tu rgyun mi chad par 'gyur/_/gal te de med mgon bral la/_/sngags rnams ci skad gsungs pa bzhin/_/sems can dbul po rnams la ni/_/khyad par du yang sngags byin na/_/
[\[172a.2\]]sems can kun la'ang sbyin pa bas/_/sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par 'phags/_/mchog dang bar ma tha ma ni/_/dus rnams kun du bya ba ste/_/rtag tu sems can kun la ni/_/rjes su gzung ba'i phyir bya'o/_/'gro ba'am skye gnas rnam brtags nas/_/'dod pa dag la sbyin par bya/_/
[\[172a.3\]]de ni ci ltar 'dod pa'i sngags/_/slob mas de la blang bar bya/_/de nyid kyis bstan lam yin te/_/gzhan du de lta ma yin no/_/'jig rten pha rol pa la ni/_/grub pa de las bslang bar bya/_/pha bzhin mgo bos phyag byas nas/_/de nas ci ltar 'dod bzhin 'gro/_/de nas gcig 
[\[172a.4\]]pu 'gro byas nas/_/mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas pa bya/_/slong mo slong bas rjes 'tsho zhing /_/thub pa dus gsum zlos par byed/_/sngar ni ci ltar bstan pa bzhin/_/lam du rab tu 'jug par byed/_/de la rjes 'jug bsten pa dang /_/'dug pa dang ni gnas pa'o/_/dben pa 
[\[172a.5\]]chen po ri rtse dang /_/de bzhin chu bo'i ngogs gtsang dang /_/ba lang gnas dang mtsho chen dang /_/dben pa skye bo rnam spangs dang /_/lha khang stong dang shing dang ni/_/mtshan gcig ri ni mthon po dang /_/rgya mtsho che ngogs dga' ba dang /_/gling rnams chen po dag dang ni/_/rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[172a.6\]]sngar bstan pa'i/_/yul ni yid du 'ong ba dang /_/'di dag las ni phyogs gzhan du/_/mnyam bzhag sngags ni bzla bar bya/_/grogs po mtshan nyid ldan pa ni/_/sngags don lugs dang tshad mar ldan/_/zur gyi rnam pa de nyid shes/_/bdag dang de yang 'dra ba'o/_/dpa' 
[\[172a.7\]]zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal dang /_/snying stobs che zhing bzod dang ldan/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i bstan pa dang /_/sngags kyi spyod pa la dad cing /_/sngags pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan la/_/bzod dang ldan pa'i grogs po la/_/de la 'bad pa med par ni/_/sngags kyi las 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]rnams 'grub par 'gyur/_/tho rangs mal nas langs nas ni/_/mtsho chen las byung chu bo las/_/byung chu srog chags skyon med pa'i/_/bzang pos khrus ni rab tu bya/_/sa dang lci ba phye ma yis/_/sngags shes pas ni lus dril bya/_/sngags kyis de bzhin dag byas pa'i/_/
[\[172b.2\]]dri med gtsang sbrar byas pa'i chus/_/sngags ldan bdag nyid khrus bya zhing /_/ha cang ring bar 'dug mi bya/_/de nas langs nas chu ngogs 'dug_/sa dag gis kyang lag gnyis bkru/_/bdun dang bdun dang yang bdun ni/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du 'o/_/de bzhin du yang nye reg 
[\[172b.3\]]bya/_/so shing dag kyang yang dag byed/_/so shing rnam par bor nas ni/_/de nas skyob la phyag kyang bya/_/'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal nas/_/mchod pa yid du 'ong bar bya/_/rnam pa sna tshogs mchod bstod dang /_/yang dag bstod pa yang yang bya/_/dri zhim me tog 
[\[172b.4\]]de bzhin du/_/ston la zlos pas mchod yon dbul/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang de'i slob la/_/spyi bos rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten mgon po de dag gi/_/mdun du sdig pa bshags par bya/_/ras ris bar ma'i mdun du ni/_/bdag nyid dag kyang dbul 
[\[172b.5\]]bar bya/_/ku sha'i khres ni byas pa der/_/legs par mnyam gzhag 'dug nas ni/_/des ni phreng ba thogs nas su/_/'bad pas bzlas pa bya ba yin/_/ci ltar rnyed pa'i sngags kyis bya/_/de tshe sngags gzhan bzlas mi bya/_/ha cang ngan pa spang bya ste/_/ha cang 
[\[172b.6\]]bzang po'ang de bzhin no/_/bar ma bar ma'i las dag la/_/sdom chen sngags ni rtag tu bzla/_/ha cang skad mthon 'bad pas spang /_/tshig ni dma' ba'ang ma yin no/_/bar ma dbus kyi yul dag tu/_/rjes mthun rgyal bas bsngags pa'o/_/ha cang skad mtho dma' ba'ang 
[\[172b.7\]]min/_/bar mas rtag tu bzlas pa bya/_/sangs rgyas snga ma kun gyis ni/_/tshig ni legs ldan yin zhes gsungs/_/rtag tu gzhan gyi rna lam dang /_/gzhan gyi drung du mi bzla 'o/_/dben pa'i phyogs su'ang bdag rig pas/_/sngags kyang bar ma bzla bar bya/_/
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]de ltar sngags bzlas rab sbyar na/_/sngags ni gang yang myur du 'grub/_/bar ma'i sngags ni 'grub 'dod na/_/yang dang yang du bzlas pa bya/_/de bas bzlas pa rnam bral dang /_/sngags kyi de nyid don legs thos/_/dben zhing gdung ba med par ni/_/
[\[173a.2\]]zlos pas sngags ni bzla bar bya/_/mtshan mo yi ni bzhi cha dang /_/de phyed de bzhin phyed nyid dang /_/skya rengs dmar po zung tsam la/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba na/_/dang po'i bar ma nyid du ni/_/thub pa mchog gis gsungs pa yin/_/zung tsam khru ni bzhi pa ste/_/bar mar 
[\[173a.3\]]yongs su bsgrags pa yin/_/de nas nyi ma phyed shar na/_/sngags bzlas de tshe spang bar bya/_/sngags bzlas de tshe btang ba na/_/sdom brtson mchod yon slar gshegs gsol/_/de tshe btang ba'i lhag dus la/_/thub pa'i bstan la dge ba bya/_/dam chos bklag 
[\[173a.4\]]la sogs pa ni/_/shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs/_/glegs bam sa bcu zhes bya ba/_/mchod dang bklag pa rtag tu bya/_/de nas dus la bab gyur na/_/rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang /_/thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal nas/_/de nas 'tsho ba'i don du 'gro/_/dus 
[\[173a.5\]]gsum spyod dang de bzhin ldan/_/dus su zas spyod dbang po thul/_/chos can sgrub la brtson pa dang /_/sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dad/_/mi smra grong gi nang du 'dug_/rtag tu gtsang sbra spyod la dga'/_/chos ldan sems can khyim du ni/_/slong dus rtag zlos 
[\[173a.6\]]byed cing 'dug_/srog chags med chos grub pa yi/_/zas ni gtsang bar grags pa dang /_/yang dag lta ba'i khyim dag dang /_/sangs rgyas bstan la dad pa yi/_/de 'dra'i khyim la rtag tu ni/_/slong ba'i don du slong mo blang /_/ci ltar dpa' bos go bgos 
[\[173a.7\]]te/_/nyam nga'i g.yul du 'jug pa na/_/rtag tu dgra ni 'joms byed de/_/dgra yis 'joms kyang mi nus pa/_/de bzhin sngags pa rtag grong du/_/slong mo'i 'tsho bas 'jug pa na/_/gzugs sgra la sogs bzang po ni/_/de ltar mthong bas chags gyur na/_/
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]'dod chags zhi ba'i don gyi phyir/_/dge ba mi gtsang bsgom par bya/_/lang tsho'i rnam pas brgyan pa yi/_/bud med gzugs ni mthong ba na/_/mi gtsang dri ngan bsgom bya zhing /_/shin tu smad pa rnag dang gcin/_/srin bus zos dang dur khrod gnas/_/lus 
[\[173b.2\]]ni mi rtag sdug bsngal yin/_/byis pa sngags la rmongs pa yis/_/'gro ba lnga po dag tu 'khor/_/las kyi skud pas bcings nas ni/_/yun ring dus su mya ngan byed/_/mi shes sgrib pas rmongs pas na/_/dmus long sdug bsngal rgyu yang yin/_/gang du blo ni 
[\[173b.3\]]phyin ci log_/skye bo chags pas phongs par 'gyur/_/rnam pa sna tshogs las gar gyi/_/rnam pa du mar chags byed pas/_/yun ring res kyis gnas nas ni/_/'gro dang 'ong bar spyod par byed/_/gar byed bzhin du spyod pa yis/_/bran bzhin du ni gtong 
[\[173b.4\]]bar byed/_/mi gtsang dga' ba'i sems can gang /_/yun ring lam du phongs par 'gyur/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i chu 'byung ba/_/zo chun gyi ni rnam pa bzhin/_/'gro ba de dag mi bzad pa'i/_/sdug bsngal chu yis khyab pa yin/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni bud 
[\[173b.5\]]med dag_/ma 'dres sdug bsngal rtsa bar gsungs/_/nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/rang rgyal thub pas de bzhin gsungs/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi 'khrugs pa/_/rgya mtsho 'di ni skam par dka'/_/bud med sems kyis bslus pas na/_/gang 
[\[173b.6\]]du sems can bying gyur nas/_/dmyal ba dud 'gro'i 'jig rten dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten lha ma yin/_/de bzhin mi yi 'jig rten dang /_/lha yi 'gro ba'i 'gro bar 'gro/_/bud med chags pas bslu pas na/_/kun nas yongs su 'khor 'gyur zhing /_/
[\[173b.7\]]'dam chen nang du 'bying 'gyur la/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho btson ra yin/_/bud med chags pa'i blun po'i mi/_/rul ba'i ro la wa bzhin no/_/gang du mi ni chags byed pa/_/shin tu mi bzad sdug bsngal bzod/_/dkar po'i chos ni des nyams byed/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]bstan la zhugs pas ni/_/sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho nyid/_/thams cad yongs su zlog byed cing /_/sngags zlos dga' zhing brtson pa dang /_/grags pa che zhing chags dang bral/_/gzi brjid ldan zhing kun dang mdza'/_/de dag la ni sdug bsngal med/_/
[\[174a.2\]]yang dag sdom dang tshangs bden shes/_/bla ma lha la mchod byed dang /_/ma dang pha la gus pa rnams/_/de dag la ni sdug bsngal med/_/dam pa'i don la brten na ni/_/mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang /_/de bzhin dbyig dug zug rngu bzhin/_/zlos pas bud med lus bsam bya/_/
[\[174a.3\]]blo ngan phung po'i lcags kyus zin/_/'khor ba las ni 'byung mi nus/_/rtag tu bud med chags gyur pa/_/de la grub pa yod ma yin/_/zlos pa 'di la tshul khrims nyams/_/de la grub pa mchog med cing /_/grub pa 'bring yang yod med de/_/grub pa tha ma'ang yod ma 
[\[174a.4\]]yin/_/tshul khrims 'chal la thub dbang gis/_/sngags grub par ni ma gsungs te/_/mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yi/_/yul dang phyogs kyang ma yin no/_/byis pa ngan pa 'di la ni/_/sngags grub pa ni ga la yod/_/skye bo tshul khrims 'chal 'di la/_/de la bde 
[\[174a.5\]]'gro ga la yod/_/mtho ris su yang mi 'gyur zhing /_/bde ba mchog tu'ang mi 'gyur na/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams ni/_/'grub par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos/_/ta la'i shing gi mgo bo ni/_/gang tshe bcad par gyur pa na 'ang /_/sngon po nyid kyi skal med na/_/
[\[174a.6\]]myu gu nam zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin sngags grub rmongs pa dang /_/tshul khrims nyams shing sdig las byed/_/rtag tu bud med chags pa la/_/'dir ni rab tu bstan pa yin/_/mi dge'i bshes gnyen bsten pa la/_/sngags kyi rgyal po ga la 'grub/_/
[\[174a.7\]]de bas dul dang rtag bzlas byed/_/bud med skyon ni rnam spyod la/_/de la chags pa rnam spang ba/_/de la grub par brjod pa yin/_/byis pa bud med la brgyal ba/_/gzhan la grub pa bsten pa min/_/blo ldan g.yeng ba med la dga'/_/gtsang zhing ma chags 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]shes nyen can/_/rigs mtho brtan dang dpa' ba dang /_/brtser ldan mthong na dga' ba dang /_/chos dang chos min rnam dpyod shes/_/de la grub pa rnyed mi dka'/_/de ltar sngags shes zhugs pa ni/_/grong du slong phyir rab tu 'jug_/sngar ni brtags pa'i gnas dag 
[\[174b.2\]]tu/_/ci ltar 'dod bzhin song nas ni/_/blo ldan dag pas bslang ba'i snod/_/gtsang ba'i phyogs su yang dag gzhag_/phyi rol song nas rkang gnyis bkru/_/de nas yang ni yan lag ste/_/de tshe srog chags med pa'i chus/_/lag pa g.yas pas byin pa g.yas/_/
[\[174b.3\]]lag pa g.yon pas byin pa g.yon/_/yang na gnyi ga dus gcig bkru/_/sa ni lag g.yon yang bzhag nas/_/sngar ni yang dag bzhag pa yi/_/bdug pa gtsang ma'i sa dag gis/_/lag pa gnyis ni rab tu bkru/_/de nas sngags kyi dag byas pa'i/_/dri med 
[\[174b.4\]]gtsang sbra dag snod la/_/ba ni ser skyas bor ba yi/_/lci ba sar pa blang bar bya/_/srog chags med pa'i chur sbyar bas/_/ston pa la ni dkyil 'khor bya/_/dang po thub pa mchog la ni/_/khor yug khru gang tsam du bya/_/gnyis pa rang sngags mgon po la/_/gsum 
[\[174b.5\]]pa rang rig lha la'o/_/sngags pa bzlas pa gang byed pa/_/rtag tu 'ang de nyid bya ba yin/_/yang ni sems can thams cad kyi/_/longs spyod phyir ni bstan pa yin/_/g.yas su 'jig rten mgon po yi/_/dkyil 'khor 'di ni rtag tu bya/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi 
[\[174b.6\]]dkyil 'khor ni/_/gru bzhi dag tu bya ba yin/_/gnyis pa rang sangs rgyas rnams la/_/gsum pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras/_/dkyil 'khor bdun po 'di dag ni/_/kun nas gru bzhir bya ba yin/_/khru gang ngam ni khru phyed du/_/nyin re zhing ni bya ba yin/_/sdig pa 
[\[174b.7\]]'jig byed bzlas pa ni/_/dben pa'i phyogs su nyin re bya/_/sngags pa de nas langs nas ni/_/'bad pas lag gnyis rab tu bkru/_/gtsang ba'i chu yis nye reg bya/_/dag cing srog chags spangs pa yi/_/dri med gtsang sbras 'bad nas ni/_/gtsang ba'i snod 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]ni de tshe blang /_/mtsho chen dang ni 'bab chu 'am/_/chu mig chu bo la gnas dang /_/gtsang ba'i phyogs nas byung ba yi/_/sems can dag pa lag blangs la/_/gnyis sam gsum du rtag tu yang /_/sngags pas nye reg bya ba yin/_/de nas chus reg gdong 
[\[175a.2\]]dang ni/_/de bzhin du ni rna khung dag_/mig dang sna dang lag gnyis dang /_/spyi bo lte ba'i phyogs reg bya/_/dge ba spyod pas lan lnga'am bdun/_/cho ga ji bzhin thams cad bya/_/gtsang sbra'i spyod pa legs ldan pas/_/zlos pa gtsang bar gyur pa yis/_/slong snod yang 
[\[175a.3\]]dag blangs nas ni/_/chu yi gzhir ni 'gro bar bya/_/gang du chu yi rgyun 'bab gnas/_/de bzhin du ni chu mig dang /_/chu bo rab tu 'bab pa la/_/rtag tu zas ni bkru bar bya/_/gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang du/_/de nas langs nas 'gro bar bya/_/gang du sngon ni 
[\[175a.4\]]brten pa dang /_/gang du gnas pa der 'gro bya/_/de nas zlos pas lhung bzed de/_/song nas phyogs ni der gzhag bya/_/de nas nye reg myur byas nas/_/de bzhin yang ni lhung bzed blangs/_/lhung bzed sa 'am lo ma 'am/_/dngul dang gser gyi snod dang ni/_/zangs 
[\[175a.5\]]ma shing shun dag kyang rung /_/ston pa la ni dbul bar bya/_/ston pa la ni bshos phul nas/_/rang sngags sngags kyi rgyal po 'ang brjod/_/'gron gcig sdug bsngal gyur 'ongs nas/_/ci nus par ni sbyin pa bya/_/rnam pa kun du kha zas ni/_/ha cang mang ba sbyin mi bya/_/
[\[175a.6\]]sngags rig lus gdung mi bya ste/_/rnam pa kun du ci rigs bya/_/lto ba'i tshad tsam gzhag byas te/_/lhag ma'i zas ni rtag tu sbyin/_/bkres dang skom pas nyen gyur na/_/sngags kyi don la rten mi nus/_/kha zas mang dang nyung zos na/_/sngags rnams mnyes par mi 
[\[175a.7\]]nus so/_/de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis/_/sems can zas kyis gnas pa'o zhes/_/lus can rnams la gsungs pa ste/_/gang gis mi rnams 'tsho ba dang /_/lha dang lha min dri za dang /_/klu dang gnod sbyin mi 'am ci/_/srin po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sha za dang /_/'byung po skar ma 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]gza' rnams dag_/gang zhig kha zas mi za ba/_/de ni gang yang yod ma yin/_/rags pa'i zas ni gang yin pa/_/kham gyi zas su rnam par bsgrags/_/sems can phra ba'i zas can yang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gsungs/_/bsam gtan zas can rnams la 
[\[175b.2\]]ni/_/gzugs kyi khams na spyod pa'o/_/gzugs med khams kyi lha dag ni/_/ting 'dzin 'bras bu la spyod pa'o/_/srid pa bar ma'i sems can rnams/_/dri yi zas su rab tu bsgrags/_/de bzhin 'dod khams sems can dag_/sna tshogs zas la spyod pa yin/_/de nyid 
[\[175b.3\]]phyir ni thub dbang gis/_/las kyi rgyu yis gsungs pa ni/_/sems can zas kyis gnas pa zhes/_/thams cad la ni rab tu bsgrags/_/zlos la rtag tu brtson pas ni/_/zas kyi tshod rig bya ba yin/_/gang phyir sngags brten nus pa ni/_/kha zas la ni rab tu gnas/_/
[\[175b.4\]]spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_/dge zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang /_/kha zas tshod ni rig pa la/_/de la grub pa rnyed mi dka'/_/ci ltar shing rta'i shing rta pas/_/mig ni yongs su bskus pa ni/_/yun ring dus su brten phyir dang /_/khal ni 'degs par bya phyir ro/_/de 
[\[175b.5\]]bzhin sngags pa sngags shes pas/_/kha zas gnas phyir 'dzin byed dang /_/lus kyang tshim par bya ba'i phyir/_/zlos pas rtag tu gso bar bya/_/sngags rnams bsgrub pa'i phyir dang ni/_/byang chub tshogs ni bya ba'i phyir/_/de bzhin du ni sngags bzla ba/_/mi yi 'jig rten 
[\[175b.6\]]bsrung bya ba'o/_/de nyid phyir na thub mchog ni/_/'od srung zhes bya sngon byung ba/_/de tshe de dus sa steng 'dir/_/'od chen ldan pa des gsungs pa/_/'byung po rnams la legs don du/_/sngags 'di rab tu gsungs pa ni/_/'jig rten ma lus sdug bsngal dang /_/dman 
[\[175b.7\]]dang dbul dang skyo ba dang /_/'bad rtsol dag la nyon mongs pa/_/de dag don phyir gsungs pa ni/_/'byung po rnams la legs don dang /_/de bzhin gnas par 'dod pa yang /_/'byung po rnams la zas don du/_/sngags mchog 'di ni gsungs pa yin/_/nyan thos dag 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]ni thams cad dang /_/byang chub la gnas thams cad nyon/_/bdag gis sngags 'di rab brjod kyis/_/nad rnams 'jig byed zung shig dang /_/gang yang bkres nad kyis nyen dang /_/gang yang sems can skom pa rnams/_/kun gyi sdug bsngal nyer zhi'i 
[\[176a.2\]]phyir/_/'byor pa 'dod rnams rab nyon cig_/'od srung 'od ni chen po pa/_/thub pa mchog gis de skad gsungs/_/nyan thos rnams ni yid dga' nas/_/khyab bdag la ni gsol ba 'debs/_/chos mkhyen sngags ni bshad du gsol/_/chos kyi rgyal po thub pa che/_/
[\[176a.3\]]sems can brtse ba'i mchog gyur pa/_/dus ni rab tu nye bar gnas/_/de skad gsol nas thub mchog gis/_/ka la ping ka'i sgra skad dang /_/rnga bo che yi sgra skad dang /_/tshangs dbyangs stobs ni chen po dang /_/tshangs shes rgyal ba sngon 'dren pas/_/'byung po'i tshogs 
[\[176a.4\]]ni gang su dag_/'dir lhags gyur pa kun nyon cig_/rkang med dang ni rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_/rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa/_/mdor na sems can kun gyi phyir/_/bde 'byung sngags ni bshad par bya/_/'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/_/sems can gang dag 'dir 
[\[176a.5\]]lhags pa/_/'byor pa 'dod rnams da nyon cig_/mdor na bdag gis rab bshad bya/_/na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M ga ga ne ga ga na gany+dza A na ya sarbaM la hu la hu sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_A kar+Sha Ni/_mA bi laM ba mA bi laM ba/_ya 
[\[176a.6\]]the pe staM me saM pa dA ya swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de skad ces gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis/_bar der rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig rgya cher gsungs pa na/_nam mkha' 
[\[176a.7\]]de thams cad chen po la 'os pa'i zas kyi sprin gyis yongs su khengs par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i dkyil kun du zas kyi sprin gyis khyab par snang bar gyur to/_/sems can gyi bsam pa ci ltar mngon 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]par 'dod pa'i bza' ba dang ci ltar 'dod pa'i zas de dag la char bzhin du bab par gyur to/_/ci ltar 'dod pa'i zas dang bza' ba'i bya ba ni bkres pa'i sdug bsngal zhi ba'i don dang /_skom pa rnams kyis btung bar bya ba ni/_yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun yid la 
[\[176b.2\]]'dod pa bzhin du der bab par gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi skad cig de nyid la bkres pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang skom pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang ngo mtshar dang rab tu dga' ba thob par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[176b.3\]]'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas su rnam par 
[\[176b.4\]]bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ngas kyang de'i tshe de ltar bshad cing rjes su yi rang bar byas so/_/sngags kyi rgyal po'i mchog 'di la sems can thams cad kyi don du bkres pa dang skom pa sel ba'i phyir dang /_sngags thams cad zlos pa dag la yang 
[\[176b.5\]]khyad par du sel bar 'gyur ro/_/dang por re zhig zlos pas sngags 'di bsgrub par bya ste/_gal te bsod snyoms la 'gro bar spro ba med na/_ri'i rtse mor 'dzeg ste 'bum phrag bdun bzla bar bya zhing /_zas dkar gsum mam 'o ma'i zas bza' zhing ri'i rtse mo 
[\[176b.6\]]de nyid du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi ras ris bar ma gong ma bzhin bzhag ste/_mchod pa chen po byas nas shin tu rgya che ba'i gtor ma phul te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'di nyid kyis gsungs pa'i sngags kyis seng ldeng gi yam shing gi 
[\[176b.7\]]me rab tu sbar te/_shing u dum bA ra'i yam shing la mar dang sbrang rtsis btags pa'i shing rlon mtho gang tsam mam/_bil ba'i 'bras bu'i yam shing stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas nam phyed kyi dus mtshams su sprin nag po chen po dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]byung na 'jigs par mi bya/_langs te gzhan du 'gro bar mi bya zhing /_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi yi ge brgyad kyi snying pos bdag nyid bsrung ba dang /_dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang grogs bsrung ba yang byas na/_snga ma lta bu'i sprin nag po chen po de dang 
[\[177a.2\]]rlung nag po de yang mi snang bar 'gyur te/_bud med yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis phyogs thams cad snang bar byas te sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dug nas smra ba ni/_kye sems can chen po longs shig_/khyod ni grub pa yin no zhes so/_/
[\[177a.3\]]de nas sgrub pa pos sna ma'i me tog gis bsres pa'i dri zhim po'i chus mchod yon sbyin no/_/de nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/gang de'i nyin mo nas bdag nyid dang grogs po nyi shu rtsa lnga'am/_yang na ci 'dod pa'i grogs po dag la ci 'dod pa'i kha zas dang ci ltar 
[\[177a.4\]]'dod pa'i yo byad rnams yang dag par ster bar byed do/_/de nas sgrub pa pos ras ris la gshegs su gsol ba'i mchod yon dbul te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas ras ris blangs te/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag byas nas/_
[\[177a.5\]]sngar bstan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs ci lta bu'i gnas dgon pa chen po'am/_ri'i rtse mo'am mi med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya'o/_/der lo ma'i spyil po byas te bdag nyid dang grogs po gnyi gar bcas te rab tu gnas par bya'o/_/der gnas pa dang gnas de la nam mkha' 
[\[177a.6\]]la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i las byas te/_de nas sgrub pa pos snga ma bzhin du ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas/_ras ris bar ma snga ma bzhin du bzhag ste/_seng ldeng gi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar la/_dus gsum du me tog pad+ma dkar po zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar 
[\[177a.7\]]gyis btags pa stong rtsa brgyad nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus su sbyin sreg gi mthar 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar yang 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' la 'gro 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]ba dang mi snang ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang rang sangs rgyas nyid dam nyan thos nyid dam/_tshe ring ba nyid dam rgyal srid chen po dang /_longs spyod chen po nyid dam rgyal po dga' ba nyid dam/_'phags pa 'jam dpal dang lhan cig rjes su spyod par 'gyur te 
[\[177b.2\]]mdor na gang 'dod pa de thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/gang don du gnyer ba de yang rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/grub pa'i rdzas thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sems can chen po rnams kyang 'gugs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/mdor na ji lta ji ltar brjod 
[\[177b.3\]]pa de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi las kyi nyes pa yang yang dag par sbyong bar byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gsungs so/_/gzhan yang las kyi thabs bar ma sgrub pa yang yod de dang por re zhig de ltar khyad par du gyur pa'i gnas sam gtsang ba'i 
[\[177b.4\]]sa phyogs sam/_chu bo'am chu gling gi ngogs su snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya ste/_ras ris nub tu bstan te bzhag la bdag kyang shar du mngon par phyogs par byas nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/_snga ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar byas nas dus gsum du yi ge drug 
[\[177b.5\]]pa bzla bar bya ste/_bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang dong ka'i me tog la tsan+dan dkar po'am gur gum gyis bsgos pas snga ma bzhin du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o/_/de bzhin du me sbar nas sbyin sreg gi mjug tu ras ris rab tu 'gul ba na ni blon po nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/ras 
[\[177b.6\]]ris las 'od kyi snang ba byung na ni 'od las rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/_/ras ris 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun du khyab na ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/_/ras ris las me stag byung na ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug brgya byin nyid thob 
[\[177b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/ras ris las chos 'chad pa'i sgra byung na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sa gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi phyag gis mgo la byug par mdzad na ni/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_sa bdun pa thob pa dang stobs bcu 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]la gnas pa mthar gyis thob pa yin no/_/de nas sgrub pa po la bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis gsungs pa'i sngags bsgrubs te/_bkres pa dang skom pa rab tu bas la ba'i don rjes su thob pa de nyid kyi 'tshog chas/_sngags spyod pa'i don sgrub pa'i 
[\[178a.2\]]thabs kyi chos la yang dag par rjes su bsgrub par bya'i/_gzhan du ni 'di 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mthar gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su 'jug cing /_mdor na nges par 'bad pa la ni rdzas dang sman dang yo byad kyi khyad par dang /_nor bu rin po che sngar ji 
[\[178a.3\]]skad bshad pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sngags rig sngags ni zlos pa dang /_/sems ni cho ga la mkhas pa dang /_/sngags pa de tshe de yul du/_/de tshe gtsang ba'i kha zas bza'/_/zos nas yid ni dga' ba dang /_/rtag tu dbang po rgyas pa dang /_/lhung bzed 
[\[178a.4\]]lhag ma blangs nas ni/_/chu bo gtsang ba dag du 'gro/_/dben par yongs su bor nas ni/_/sdom can gyis sbyin dud 'gro la/_/dud 'gro la ni byin nas kyang /_/'bad pas snod ni bkru bar bya/_/de nas 'bad pa byas nas ni/_/sa yi snod kyang bsreg par bya/_/lhag 
[\[178a.5\]]ma lhung bzed bya ba ni/_/snum med zas ni med pa dang /_/dri nyid yongs su spang bya zhes/_/lhag ma lhung bzed thub pas gsungs/_/gang du slong ba'i lhung bzed la/_/der ni kha zas mi spyad do/_/shing thog dngos rnams thams cad dang /_/bca' ba rnams kyang der 
[\[178a.6\]]mi spyad/_/pad+ma'i lo mar bza' mi bya/_/ut+pal snod la bza' ba min/_/me tog dri mchog la min te/_/sngags pas de la bza' mi bya/_/gang yang lo ma ku mu dang /_/p+lak+sha u dum bAr las byung /_/pa Ta shing gi lo ma'ang min/_/tsher ma'i shing dang ri khrod 
[\[178a.7\]]byung /_/a mra'i lo ma dag la'ang min/_/de bzhin pa Ta la las byung /_/sa la shri sha'i lo ma dang /_/byang chub shing las yang dag byung /_/gang du bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni/_/shAkya seng ge bzhugs pa yi/_/shing de 'bad pas spang bya ste/_/so shing du yang 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]bca' mi bya/_/klu shing gi ni ge sar dang /_/lo ma dag kyang mi btu zhing /_/gang du'ang nam yang bza' mi bya/_/mkhas pas de kun rnam par spongs/_/thub pa'i lo ma'i spyil po las/_/rmongs pas nam yang 'gong mi bya/_/sngags pa dam tshig nyams 'gyur 
[\[178b.2\]]bas/_/lo ma de dag la mi bza'/_/lo ma gzhan la bza' bya ste/_/sngags pas der ni bza' bar bya/_/sa dang zangs mar bstan pa dang /_/de bzhin dngul dang gser las byung /_/shel dang rdo yi rang bzhin las/_/rtag tu bza' ba blang bar bya/_/lo ma'i rgyab 
[\[178b.3\]]tu mi bza' ste/_/lag pa'i mthil du'ang de bzhin no/_/stobs bcu ldan dang de yi sras/_/gang yang rang rgyal bse ru dang /_/nyan thos gang zag dag la ni/_/phul ba'i lo ma gang yin pa/_/de dag zlos pas spang bya ste/_/rkang pas kyang ni mi 'gong ngo /_/zas 
[\[178b.4\]]snod rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/de bzhin btung dang bza' ba rnams/_/thams cad de ltar phul bas na/_/sngags pas 'bad pas blang mi bya/_/rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchog rnams dang /_/de bzhin nyan thos gang zag dang /_/dkon mchog gsum la phul ba 
[\[178b.5\]]yang /_/zlos pas de dag rtag tu spang /_/cung zad tsam yang lus can la/_/sngags rnams de la mi 'grub ste/_/bkra shis thams cad 'dod pa dang /_/legs pa bzang po smos ci dgos/_/rgyas pa dang ni zhi ba dang /_/bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa/_/
[\[178b.6\]]bshos ni za bar byed de la/_/de tshe 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/gtsang zhing shes rab tshul khrims ldan/_/snying rjes snying rje'i las can dang /_/gtsang sbra'i spyod la dga' ba nyid/_/sngags rnams kun du 'grub par 'gyur/_/sems can gzhan la sbyin pa'i zas/_/
[\[178b.7\]]zlos pas de ni bza' mi bya/_/gzhan gyis rab tu ma bstabs pa'i/_/zas gzhan bza' bar mi bya'o/_/cung zad tsam gyi kha zas kyang /_/rang la byin pa blang bar bya/_/sngags shes de ltar 'jug gang yin/_/de la grub pa dpag na gnas/_/zlos pa 'di yi cho 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]ga yis/_/sdom can bza' ba blang bar bya/_/thub pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yi/_/sngags rnams ma lus bsgrub par bya/_/mdor na cho ga mthong bas ni/_/bza' ba kun bya las rnams la/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/sngags kyis ma lus 
[\[179a.2\]]dbang du byed/_/de nas zlos pas nye reg byas/_/de tshe sngags ni bzlas par bya/_/sngags pas de tshe lan bdun du/_/lus sbyang phyir ni bzlas nas su/_/'byung po'i tshogs dang lha rnams dag_/de don rgya cher rab nyon cig_/lus kun nye reg byas nas ni/_/thub 
[\[179a.3\]]pa'i sngags 'di brjod par bya/_/na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba kilbi Sha nA sha ni/_nA sha ya nA sha ya/_sarba duSh+Ta pra yug+tan/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hU~M dzaHswA hA/_sngags 'dis bslangs pa'i zas ji ltar yongs su spyod 
[\[179a.4\]]pa'i kha zas la lan bdun du bsngags te yongs su spyad par bya'o/_/zos nas kyang snga ma bzhin du nye reg bya ste/_spyi bo la sogs pa lus thams cad tu nye reg byas nas/_de nas ngal bso bar bya ste/_ngal sos nas yud tsam gyi phyed dam thun gcig ste/_de nas 
[\[179a.5\]]ras ris dang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklag par bya'o/_/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_'phags pa zla ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'phags pa sa bcu pa dang /_'phags pa gser 
[\[179a.6\]]'od dam pa dang /_'phags pa rma bya chen mo dang /_'phags pa rin po che tog gi gzungs dang 'di dag las gang yang rung ba bklag par bya'o/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zung tsam gyi tshad kyi dus na/_de nas yongs su grub pa ni ji ltar nus pa de bzhin du bklag par 
[\[179a.7\]]byas nas/_glegs bam brtul ba'am gos gtsang ma bgos te/_dam pa'i chos la phyag byas nas/_de nas khrus kyi don du chu bo'i ngogs sam/_mtsho chen por song ste 'jug par bya'o/_/phyin nas srog chags med pa'i sa blangs te/_lan bdun bzlas 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]te de chu la gdab bo/_/de yang gang zhe na/_na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba duSh+TAM staM b+ha ya hU~M/_na di ba rA bA ra Ni/_ku mA ra kr-I Da rU pi Ne ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phaT phaT swA hA/_'dis bsrung ba byas nas phyogs rnams 
[\[179b.2\]]bcing ba dang /_grogs rnams dang dkyil 'khor dang thab khung bcing ba dang /_ma rungs pa dang rab tu ma rungs pa thams cad 'gugs par byed pa dang /_skud pa dkar po la lan bdun bzlas te rked pa'i phyogs su bcings na thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[179b.3\]]bzlas pa'i dus thams cad dang khrus kyi dus thams cad du yang bgegs ma rungs pa rnam par 'jig pa dang /_rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na/_des ni las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po 
[\[179b.4\]]dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o/_/las thams cad byed par 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no/_/de nas sgrub pa pos sa dang lci ba'i phye ma la sogs pa blangs te/_ci bde bar khrus byas te/_srog chags med pa'i chus kyang bkrus te/_las thams cad la yang srog 
[\[179b.5\]]chags med pa'i chus bya'o/_/de nas sa dang lci ba'am gzhan yang dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i yo byad kyi khyad par gyis byugs te de'i 'og tu khrus bya'o/_/chu'i nang du bshang gci yang dor bar mi bya'o/_/chu gtor zhing dor bar yang mi bya'o/_/chu la rtse bar yang mi bya'o/_/
[\[179b.6\]]snying rjes bdag dang sems can thams cad la so sor brtag par bya'o/_/bdag med pa dang stong pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyis khyab pa/_tshor bas mngon par gnod pa dang /_sdug bsngal thob pa bzhin du 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i sbyor bas sdug bsngal ba/_de bzhin 
[\[179b.7\]]du sems can sgrub pa dang bral ba/_sngags rig pas 'di lta bur 'jig pa dang rnam par g.yeng ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshogs kyis nye bar khyab pa/_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho brgal dka' ba la gnas pa'i bdag nyid du mthong 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]zhing gnas med pa dang /_skyob pa med pa dang skyabs med pa dang shin tu dman pa'i yid can du bdag nyid brtags la/_sgom pa pos mi gang tsam gyi chu'am lte ba tsam gyi chu la gnas te chu de nyid kyi dbus su sems rtse gcig tu nye bar gnas par bya'o/_/dang 
[\[180a.2\]]po re zhig pad+ma chen po'i rtsa lag la me tog pad+ma chen po dang ldan pa/_pad+ma chen po'i 'dab mas nye bar mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/_sdong bu rin po che bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin las byung ba/_pad+ma'i ge sar rin po che margad las grub pa/_'dab ma stong shel las byas pa/_shin tu 
[\[180a.3\]]rnam par kha bye ba/_de'i rjes su skyes pa'i shel dang pad+ma rA ga'i me tog gis mdzes par byas pa de'i steng du seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa rin po che du mas nye bar mdzes pa/_ras bcos bu zung gis rab tu bkab pa de'i steng du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[180a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das bsgom par bya ste/_chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa gser gyi mdog ltar snang ba/_kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba can 'od 'dom gang gi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/_sku'i tshad chen po nam mkha' la thug pa dang 'dra ba/_skyil mo krung gis bzhugs 
[\[180a.5\]]pa g.yas su'ang 'phags pa 'jam dpal rgyan thams cad kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa/_pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa rnga yab thogs pa/_bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i zur na gnas pa/_sku'i kha dog dmar skya'am gur gum bdar ba lta bu'o/_/g.yon du 
[\[180a.6\]]yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kha dog ston ka'i zla rgyu 'dra ba rnga yab thogs pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brgyad la 'phags pa byams pa dang kun tu bzang po dang sa'i snying po dang nam mkha' mdzod dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_ngan song 
[\[180a.7\]]sbyong ba dang 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje dang khams bzang can te/_byang chub sems dpa' bcu po de dag gi g.yas logs su rang sangs rgyas brgyad bsgom par bya ste/_tsan+dan dang spos kyi ngad ldang dang tog dang legs tog dang tog dkar dang 'dod pa dang nye ba'i 'dod pa dang mu khyud 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]de 'di brgyad do/_/de nyid du nyan thos chen po brgyad gnas pa la 'di lta ste/_'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang shA ri'i bu dang ba lang bdag dang ba ra dwa dza bsod snyoms len dang /_pi lin da'i bu dang 'phags pa sgra gcan 'dzin dang /_'od srung chen po dang 'phags 
[\[180b.2\]]pa kun dga' bo'o/_/nyan thos chen po de dag dang nye bar dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o/_/rang sangs rgyas dang nye ba na rang sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgom par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi gnas su yang byang chub 
[\[180b.3\]]sems dpa'i dge 'dun bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgom par bya'o/_/de bzhin du nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa bsgom par bya ste/_bdag kyang lte ba tsam gyi chu la gnas bzhin du lha dang mi'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa la me tog 
[\[180b.4\]]man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po dang /_d+ha nu ska ri dang bar shi ka dang ut+pal sngon po dang /_me tog rnam pa sna tshogs la tshad chen po dang /_tshan chen por gyur pa ri rab tsam gyi me tog gi snyim pas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par mchod 
[\[180b.5\]]de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lha dang mi'i phye ma dang gos dang /_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag dang mar me rab tu mang po bye ba khri phrag brgya stong yid du 'ong bas yang dag par mchod par byed la/_de bzhin 
[\[180b.6\]]du lha dang mi'i gtor ma dang /_bdug spos dang bshos la sogs pa bsnyen bkur thams cad dang yo byad rnams nye bar dbul bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spu nas kyang 'od zer byung ste/_bdag nyid dang phyogs thams cad kyang snang 
[\[180b.7\]]bas khyab par bsgom mo/_/zlos pa po bsam gtan la zhugs ma thag tu tshangs pa'i bsod nams dang mnyam pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur nges par byang chub la yang gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/de la sogs pa'i bsam gtan ni/_/'jig rten gang zag mchog gis 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]gsungs/_/'byung po kun la legs pa dang /_/sngags pa rnams la phan pa'i don/_/bsam gtan de tshe dang po'i gtsos/_/sngags pa rnams la phan don du/_/gsungs pa sems can rnams la ni/_/de nas thub mchog bdun pa yis/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[181a.2\]]rnam pa de nyid ni/_/gang yin dang po thub pas gsungs/_/gnyis pa yi ni dkyil 'khor yang /_/gsum par yang ni de las gzhan/_/dang po mchog gi grub pa yin/_/gnyis pa de bzhin de las gzhan/_/tha ma grub pa phra mo zhes/_/thub pa mchog gis nges par 
[\[181a.3\]]gsungs/_/mchog dang bar ma tha ma ni/_/de bzhin ras ris bar ma bsgom/_/mdor na rnam gsum sgom pa ni/_/sdig pa'i rnyog pa ma lus 'jig_/mkhas pas sgom pa'i rnam pa ni/_/de las gzhan du mi bsten te/_/sngags rnams de la 'grub par 'gyur/_/bsam 
[\[181a.4\]]gtan de la rab tu gnas/_/ci 'dod cho ga bstan nas ni/_/zlos pas bsam gtan byas nas su/_/sngags kyi lha ni gshegs gsol te/_/mchod yon gsol nas ci bde bar/_/chu bzhi de las byung nas ni/_/ci bde bar ni 'gro bar bya/_/gnas kyang sngar ni bstan pa yi/_/
[\[181a.5\]]cho ga legs dben mthong ba yi/_/sngags pas sngags ni de tshe bzla/_/ci bzhin las ni sngar bstan pa'o/_/rang gi lha ni spyan drangs pa/_/der ni sngags kyis gshegs su gsol/_/de nas rang nyid bsrung bya zhing /_/de bzhin grogs po dag kyang bsrung /_/dge ba'i 
[\[181a.6\]]las kyi de nyid shes/_/cho ga'i las la dga' zhing 'dod/_/bstod pa'i rnam pa mang pos mchod/_/gang zag mchog la bstod nas ni/_/rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang /_/nyan thos rang rgyal bse ru dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/'jig 
[\[181a.7\]]rten gsum la rjes gzung mdzod/_/sngags zlos pas ni gnas de nas/_/de nas kyang ni langs nas su/_/gnas ni thag ring song nas ni/_/phyi rol rlung ni rnam spangs par/_/snabs dang mchil ma rnam par dor/_/bshang dang gci ba'ang de bzhin te/_/nyin par byang du kha 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]bltas te/_/mtshan mo lhor ni blta bar bya/_/der ni don rnams mi bsam ste/_/sngags zlos nam yang bya ba min/_/der ni sngags kyang mi bzla zhing /_/las bcas rigs kyang bshad ma yin/_/rab sngags 'gros dang mtshan sogs kyis/_/de tshe sa la 'dug par bya/_/
[\[181b.2\]]gtsang phyir gos mtha' chur gzhug bya/_/chu gtsang gis ni nye reg bya/_/'bad pas rkang gnyis bkru bya ste/_/sa ni khyor ba bdun blangs nas/_/lan bdun sa de nyid kyis so/_/bshang ba la ni sum cus bya/_/mchil ma dor dang de bzhin du/_/snabs dor ba la re re 'o/_/de nas nye 
[\[181b.3\]]reg bya ba yin/_/sgra med de bzhin song nas ni/_/lam la sogs pa spangs pa'o/_/de nas gzhan yang ci 'dod par/_/lho phyogs mtha' ni phyi rol du/_/g.yang sa zhing dang tshwa sgo dang /_/de bzhin bye mas khyab pa la/_/chu bo spang zhing ngogs kyang spang /_/mi gtsang ba yang 
[\[181b.4\]]spang bar bya/_/rab tu bkab dang dben yid ches/_/bas mtha' skye bo rnam spangs pa/_/sngags pas de 'dra'i sa dag tu/_/mi gtsang ba ni dor bar bya/_/sngags zlos dus ni shes pa yis/_/ci ltar 'dod pa'i shugs dag min/_/de nas gtsang mtha'i phyogs song 
[\[181b.5\]]nas/_/bshang gci'i bya ba byas nas ni/_/de nas gnas su ci bder gnas/_/gsal ba'am dben pa'am g.yogs pa'am/_/skye bo med pa'i sa phyogs su/_/mi smra lus reg spangs nas ni/_/rtag tu bshang gci bya ba yin/_/bshang dang gci ba med byas nas/_/
[\[181b.6\]]sdom can gtsang sbra rtag tu bya/_/reg na 'jam dang 'dod pa yi/_/srog chags rnam par spangs pa yi/_/sa gsum yongs su blangs nas su/_/gcig gis bshang ba'i phyogs su bya/_/sa yi cha gnyis dag gis kyang /_/lag pa gnyis ni bkru bar bya/_/sngags 
[\[181b.7\]]pas sa dag rtag tu ni/_/sngar bstan pa dag blang bar bya/_/'bad pas rkang g.yon bkru bya ste/_/de nas g.yas pa bkru bar bya/_/phan tshun nyid du bshibs nas ni/_/zlos pas rkang pa bkru bar bya/_/sngags zlos pas ni gtsang sbra dag_/sngar ni rgya cher bstan pa yin/_/dri nga 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]med pa'i gtsang sbra yang /_/thub pas sngar ni bstan pa yin/_/sngags zlos pa yi gtsang sbra ni/_/'dir ni mdor bsdus bstan pa yin/_/dri ma bral ba'i gtsang sbra yi/_/gtsang sbra nyid ni rtag tu bya/_/rgyud rnams kun la snang ba zhes/_/thub pa'i dbang 
[\[182a.2\]]pos gsungs pa yin/_/de nas zlos pas nye reg bya/_/sdom can gyis grub las kyang bya/_/sngar bstan pa yi cho ga yis/_/yid ni nang gi dag pa yin/_/rgyud rnams kun la bsngags pa yi/_/gtsang sbra lnga yi cho ga gsungs/_/lus kyi dag dang ngag dag dang /_/
[\[182a.3\]]yid kyi dag pa yin par bstan/_/bzhi pa bden pa'i dag pa ste/_/chu yi dag pa lnga par bshad/_/bden pa'i chos can khro ba thul/_/de nyid shes shing bstan bcos mthong /_/phra ba'i de nyid don la mkhas/_/sngags shes las la grags pa dang /_/phyi dang nang la 
[\[182a.4\]]mkhas pa dag_/de la dngos grub rnyed mi dka'/_/bden pa'i chos ni rnam spangs pa'i/_/rdzun gyi tshig ni smra mi bya/_/de nyid thams cad rnam spangs pa'i/_/ma rungs rab tu ma rungs dang /_/rnam par sdang dang 'khrug bcas dang /_/rtsub dang gnad rnams smra ba 
[\[182a.5\]]dang /_/bden pa'i chos ni rnam nyams pa/_/sems can gzhan la gnod byed pa/_/phra ma nyon mongs can sems dang /_/chos kun rnam par spangs pa dang /_/rtag tu 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid dang /_/khrims 'chal chos min spyod pa dang /_/zlos pa'i sngags pas rtag 
[\[182a.6\]]tu spang /_/grong gi chos kyang de bzhin no/_/khro ba log par 'byung ba yi/_/'jig rten pha rol 'jigs rnams la/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/blo ldan rnams kyis yongs su smad/_/rtag tu rang rgyal bse ru dang /_/nyan thos kyis kyang rtag tu smad/_/
[\[182a.7\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa de bzhin 'jig rten na/_/sa steng grub pa 'dod rnams la'o/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa nye bar smra ba dag_/shin tu mi bzad dmyal bar 'gro/_/de bzhin dud 'gro [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten rtag tu 'gro/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ni nye bar smra ba yis/_/der ni rtag tu gnas pa yin/_/
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]blo ngan mi bzad ltung ba ni/_/thig nag rab tu tsha ba dang /_/yang sos ral gri'i lo ma dang /_/de bzhin shal ma li nags su/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba yi gang zag ni/_/bskal pa mang por der gnas so/_/log par smra bar gyur pa dang /_/rmongs pas log par brjod pa yis/_/
[\[182b.2\]]'byung po rnams la slu byed pa/_/de la sngags grub ga la yod/_/des na rmongs pa'i las de yis/_/sngags ni grub par ma mthong nas/_/'di skad du ni tshig smra ba/_/sngags las grub pa med do zhes/_/de skad kyi ni tshig smra ba/_/gang gis sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di/_/
[\[182b.3\]]sa steng 'dir ni spangs pa yin/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por yang /_/de la grub pa ga la yod/_/des na mi bzad dmyal bar 'tshed/_/mnar med 'jigs pa chen po dang /_/yang sos dang ni thig nag dang /_/rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar ni/_/dam pa'i chos la brnyas pa yis/_/
[\[182b.4\]]der ni bskal pa chen por gnas/_/gang yang dmyal ba mi bzad par/_/byis pa'i skye bo 'tshed byed pa/_/dam pa'i chos la brnyas byed dang /_/zhe sdang mun pas bsgribs pa'o/_/mi shes byis pa'i ngo bo 'am/_/rmongs pa log pa'i nga rgyal gyis/_/rig pa'i rgyal 
[\[182b.5\]]po brnyas byed pa/_/mi bzad dmyal bar 'gyur ba yin/_/de bas sdig pa mi bya zhing /_/log par smra ba'ang smad pa dang /_/dam pa'i chos kyang mi brnyas shing /_/lta ba log pa'ang smad par bya/_/de bas rtag tu dad gyur nas/_/sngags kyi cho ga rtag tu bsten/_/chos 
[\[182b.6\]]shes bden par smra ba dang /_/sems can rnams la phan par dga'/_/sngags dang sngags shes bsten gyur pa/_/nges par de la grub pa yin/_/mchog dang bar ma tha ma las/_/rnam pa sna tshogs las byed de/_/las ni bya bas byed pa ste/_/bya ba mi byed 
[\[182b.7\]]rtag tu ni/_/bya ba las ni ldan pa las/_/rtag tu de las grub par 'gyur/_/bya phyir las rnams thams cad phyir/_/las phyir rtag tu bya ba yin/_/bya ba'i don du bya ba min/_/bya ba las la sbyar ba yin/_/don bcas nyid kyi bya ba la/_/bya ba nyid kyis rtag tu 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]bya/_/bya ba las dang 'bras bu nyid/_/bya ba las 'bras rtag tu bya/_/'bras med pa las 'bras 'byung zhing /_/'bras bu nyid kyang rtag 'bras 'gyur/_/'bras med 'bras bur bcas pa yang /_/thams cad 'bras bu kho nar 'gyur/_/yang dag ldan 
[\[183a.2\]]pas sngags grub ste/_/yang dag ldan pas sngags grub pa'o/_/ldan pas rnam par bral ba ni/_/mi ldan ldan pa grub pa min/_/bsgrub bya sgrub pa med pa ni/_/de la grub pa mi 'grub bo/_/grub pa'i rdzas ni thams cad kyang /_/grub pa'i rgyu dang 'gal ba yin/_/sngags 
[\[183a.3\]]pa ma grub sgrub byed pa/_/sngags ni sgrub par byed pa yin/_/byed pa rab 'dod las yin te/_/las la 'dod pa bya bar 'dod/_/las min las ni thams cad la/_/las kyi rgyur ni mi bya'o/_/sngags dang rgyud kyi don ldan pa'i/_/'bras bcas las ni brtsam par bya/_/brtsam 
[\[183a.4\]]pa'i las ni brtsam par bya/_/las med nyid la brtsam mi bya/_/ma brtsams bya ba'i sngags rnams ni/_/lus can kun la 'grub mi 'gyur/_/sems can kun la thugs brtse bas/_/thub pa mchog gis sngon gsungs pa/_/sngags ni rgyu yi sgo dag nas/_/rgyal ba'i sras la 
[\[183a.5\]]dam tshig bshad/_/sgrub pa sngags ni kun shes shing /_/sngags kyi rgyal po mchog 'di ni/_/sngags kyi tshul du rab bstan yin/_/yang dag rdzogs lam rgyu yin pas/_/gang du rigs pa rtags yod la/_/sngags rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/dus ni ring po mi 
[\[183a.6\]]thogs par/_/mkhas pas grub pa thob pa yin/_/'byung po rnams la zhi don du/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab tu bstan/_/lam yang sngags kyi tshul gyis ni/_/mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yin/_/de bzhin rtag tu byang chub lam/_/las don thams cad rdzogs par 
[\[183a.7\]]byed/_/de yi mthar thug dpung gnyen ni/_/dang po'i gnas ni sangs rgyas nyid/_/de bzhin 'bad med grub pa ni/_/'di las 'bras bcas thob pa yin/_/sna tshogs las dang las shes yin/_/sngags bzlas dag ni byed par 'gyur/_/tshul khrims bsam gtan rnam 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]thar rnams/_/mdor bsdus 'di yis thob pa ste/_/don kun sgrub byed grub pa ste/_/rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs pa yin/_/nor rnams rgyas par 'thob 'gyur te/_/dam pa'i 'gro bar gnas pa dang /_/de bzhin rtag tu gnod sbyin spyan/_/lha mi'i rgyal srid byed par 
[\[183b.2\]]'gyur/_/mi lha lha min 'jig rten gyi/_/de bzhin bdag po thob 'gyur te/_/bdag po ma lus de dag gi/_/sngags pas thams cad 'thob pa dang /_/'bras bcas bya ba byed par 'gyur/_/gtsang sbra'i spyod dang ldan pa dang /_/tshul khrims bsam gtan rtag tu dga'/_/
[\[183b.3\]]rgyud rnams kun las gsungs pa yi/_/sngags pas bzlas pa rtag tu bya/_/sngags pa 'byor pa 'dod pa yis/_/las rnams sna tshogs bya ba ste/_/de bzhin mchog dang bar ma dang /_/tha ma nyid kyang bya ba yin/_/tha mas longs spyod 'phel pa'i gnas/_/'bring gis gong 
[\[183b.4\]]ma'i lus thob cing /_/mchog gis rab tu 'gro ba ste/_/zlos pas rtag tu thob par 'gyur/_/sngags pas zlos mthar ngal bso zhing /_/ji srid dus su bsdad par bya/_/zlos pas dus la bab pa na/_/der ni bsgrub pa bya ba yin/_/de ltar mod kyi de la sngags pas las 
[\[183b.5\]]rnams bsgrub pa na der rtag tu bzlas na/_skyes bu rnams kyi sdig pa zad par byed cing /_las rnam pa sna tshogs skye ba brgyud pa dag tu gang du gang byas pa de dag la grub pa gnas par nam zhig 'gyur zhe na/_skyes bus ji srid tshogs pa rnyed pa na/_sngags pa'i ngo bos sngags 
[\[183b.6\]]bzlas pa na sdig pa zad pa'i don dang las bsrabs pas sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/_de bzhin du mchog dang bar ma dang tha ma dang 'jig rten gyis mchod pa dang /_bzlas pas sdig pa mtha' dag zad par byed cing /_lus can thams cad kyi skye ba brgyud pa 
[\[183b.7\]]dag tu gang byas pa'i sdig pa de dag thams cad 'jig par byed de/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags bzlas na lus rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yid dga' zhing /_yon tan thams cad kyis grags par 'gyur ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyi 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]rgyal po nyid dang rtag tu don thams cad thob pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga rab 'byam las/_sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las kyi gnas bzhi pa 
[\[184a.2\]]las bzlas pa dang nges par sdom pa dang sbyin sreg dang bsam gtan dang /_gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang las thams cad kyi cho ga sgrub pa'i le'u rab 'byam bcu gcig pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med 
[\[184a.3\]]khang la gzigs nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal nyon cig_/khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags rjes su spyod pa/_sems can thams cad kyi don la rjes su brtson pa/_sems can rnams gang zlos par byed pa dang gang gis zlos par byed pa 
[\[184a.4\]]dang /_de'i phreng ba'i cho ga de thams cad rgyud thams cad kyi spyi sngags thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[184a.5\]]ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/bdag la thugs brtse ba'i don dang /_sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang dam tshig la zhugs pa rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi slad du de bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[184a.6\]]gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal nyon cig_/rnam par dbye ba rgya cher bshad par bya ste/_sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa na sems can thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed de/_dang por re zhig sngags su 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/_na maHsarba 
[\[184a.7\]]bud d+hA nAM/_a tsin t+yAd bud d+ha rU pI NAM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M ku ru ku ru/_sarbA r+thAM sA d+ha ya/_sarba duSh+TaM bi mo ha ni/_ga ga nA bi lam+pe bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/_sngags 'dis phreng ba thams cad la las bya'o/_/sbyang ba dang dgug pa dang blang ba dang rgyu ba la sogs pa'i las bya'o/_/
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]dang po phreng ba'i shing la ni/_/sngags kyis lan grangs nyi shu bdun/_/mngon par bsngags pa byas nas ni/_/sdom brtson rtag tu bsrung ba bya/_/mtshan gcig der ni nyal byas na/_/rmi lam nang du des mthong ba/_/mi ma yin gzugs grub pa ni/_/mi sdug mche ba 
[\[184b.2\]]gtsigs pa'o/_/sngags pa la ni des smras pa/_/nor ni ci 'dod khyer cig ces/_/sgrub byed nang par langs nas ni/_/shing de las ni 'gro bar byed/_/sngags pas shing de bor nas ni/_/gzhan dag tu ni 'gro byed na/_/mi sdug gzugs can 'jigs byed pa/_/rmi lam 
[\[184b.3\]]du yang mthong mi 'gyur/_/dang por ru drA k+Sha yin te/_/in drAk+Sha ni gnyis pa yin/_/tha ma bo de tse yin la/_/gzhan yang 'bras bu yod pa'o/_/shing la legs par 'dzeg mkhas pa'i/_/grogs dang lhan cig 'dzeg par bya/_/grogs po med par gyur na ni/_/rang nyid de la 
[\[184b.4\]]'dzeg par bya/_/steng gi yal ga'i 'bras gnas su/_/sdom brtson brtul zhugs can 'dzegs te/_/rtag tu de la bag yod pas/_/steng gi yal ga la byung nas/_/yal ga'i steng gi 'bras blangs te/_/steng gi las la sbyar bar bya/_/steng gi grub pa mchog tu ni/_/
[\[184b.5\]]gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin/_/bar ma bar ma'i grub pa ste/_/grub pa tha ma'ang tha ma'i yin/_/rtag tu srog chags ma zos pa'i/_/'bras bu yang dag blang bar bya/_/nub kyi yal ga las thob pa/_/rdzas kyi rgyur ni grub pa yin/_/byang gi gnod sbyin la 
[\[184b.6\]]sogs dang /_/lha rnams rtag tu 'gugs par byed/_/skad cig 'gugs par byed bsten pa'i/_/'byung po thams cad zhi phyir dang /_/lha dang lha min dri za dang /_/mi 'am ci dang srin po rnams/_/dbang du bya ba'i las byed de/_/'byung po kun yang rgyas par byed/_/
[\[184b.7\]]don yod las ni byed pa ste/_/las rnams sna tshogs ma lus byed/_/shar phyogs yal ga las skyes shing /_/yang dag 'byung ba'i 'bras bu ni/_/de tshe 'bad de byas gyur na/_/tshe ni ring ba'i rgyu yang yin/_/rtag tu sngags grub 'bras bu ni/_/rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]byed pa yin/_/gang zhig lhor ni 'gro ba yi/_/yal ga lo mar rab ldan pa'i/_/sngags pas de ni 'bad de spang /_/sems can rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed/_/lhor brten pa yi yal ga dang /_/'bras bu gang dag skyes pa ni/_/blangs na gdung byed dgra 
[\[185a.2\]]rnams kyi/_/srog ni 'jig par byed pa yin/_/zlos pas 'bad de spang bar bya/_/bsod nams ma yin mang po'i rgyu/_/yal ga 'og tu 'phyang gnas la/_/'bras bu gang zhig rab bsgrags pa/_/lha min bu mo gnas pa yi/_/sa yi 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur/_/
[\[185a.3\]]de yi 'bras bu'i phreng ba ni/_/blangs nas 'og tu 'gro brten pa/_/sa yi 'og tu gnas par ni/_/des na de ni 'gro bar byed/_/der zhugs lha yi bde ba ni/_/zlos pas thob par 'gyur ba yin/_/lha min bu mo chags bzhin du/_/bskal par de ni gnas par byed/_/me 
[\[185a.4\]]tog phreng ba kun blangs nas/_/de nas zlos pa slar log bya/_/grogs dang lhan cig bsrung byas nas/_/de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro/_/gnas nas thag ring song nas ni/_/de bzhin gtsang phyogs cho ga bzhin/_/de nas sngags pas rtag tu 'dug_/phreng ba yongs su 
[\[185a.5\]]sbyang bar bya/_/brtson pas phreng ba'i 'bras blangs te/_/kun nas yongs su dag byas nas/_/sngags pa bzang pos phreng ba dbug_/gsum bdun brgyad dang gcig gam ni/_/nyi shu dang ni rtsa gcig tu/_/sngags kyi de nyid shes pas bkru/_/snga ma'i sngags kyis rtag 
[\[185a.6\]]tu yang /_/bdun nam brgyad du bzlas par bya/_/de nas dag par yang dag 'dod/_/pad+ma'i rtsa lag dag las ni/_/bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa dag_/gsum dang lnga ldab byas pa yi/_/sdom can gyis ni phreng skud bya/_/sngags kyi de nyid shes pas brgyu/_/'bru ni phra 
[\[185a.7\]]zhing shin tu zlum/_/rtag tu srog chags bu ga med/_/legs 'jam smad pa'ang med pa yin/_/mdzes dang kha dog mdzes pa dang /_/de bzhin gas med bu ga med/_/ru drAk+Sha dang bo de tse/_/in drAk+Sha yi 'bras bu nyid/_/rtag tu lung tang mdzes pa dang /_/gzhan 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]yang 'bras bu 'dod pa dag_/'bad pa yis ni phreng ba dag_/sngags pas brtson byas de tshe brgyu/_/gser ram yang na dngul dag gam/_/nor bu shel las byas pa dang /_/dung dang mu sa ra dag dang /_/mu tig las kyang bya ba yin/_/byi ru rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/_/phreng ba dag 
[\[185b.2\]]kyang bya ba yin/_/gzhan yang rin chen bzang po yi/_/phreng ba legs par rab tu bya/_/sa ni rab bzlums ril bu dag_/mnyam par bzhag nas skud pas brgyu/_/gzhan yang ril bu cung zad gang /_/'bras bu 'byung khung dag las bya/_/ku sha'i rtse mo'i mdud pas kyang /_/
[\[185b.3\]]sngags pas 'bad de bya ba yin/_/brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu 'am/_/lnga bcu nyid ni bar ma yin/_/sngags pa mnyam par bzhag nas ni/_/tshad 'dis phreng ba brgyu ba yin/_/rtsa brgyad stong du bya ba ni/_/phreng ba'i mchog tu bya ba yin/_/phreng ba'i rnam pa 'di bzhi yang /_/sngags 
[\[185b.4\]]pas rtag tu brgyu ba yin/_/de ltar brgyu ba byas nas ni/_/rim pa gsum mam gnyis su bya/_/lcags bzang rang bzhin gdu bur bya/_/de bzhin gser dngul dag dang ni/_/de bzhin zangs ma'i gdu bu yis/_/phreng ba kun yang bcing bar bya/_/de nas yang mig kun mthar ni/_/
[\[185b.5\]]kun la'ang de bzhin gdags par bya/_/'bad pas dam du bcing bya ste/_/ji ltar dam por 'gyur bar ro/_/yongs su gsal bar byas nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba yin/_/de ltar sbrul gyi gdengs ka ltar/_/yongs su 'khor bas brgyan pa yin/_/mu 
[\[185b.6\]]tig phreng ba 'dra ba yis/_/mgul bar brgyan pa lta bur bya/_/chu bo dag ni dri med pa'i/_/chu gtsang dag gis khrus bya zhing /_/ji ltar [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]khrus byas nas/_/chu bzhi las ni ldang nas su/_/'bad pas de bzhin nye reg bya/_/phreng ba rjes su blangs nas ni/_/ba yi rnam lngas 
[\[185b.7\]]rab tu bkru/_/de bzhin sa yi phye ma dang /_/chu gtsang dag gis rab bkrus te/_/dri zhim dag gis rjes byugs shing /_/rab tu bsngags pa'i kha dog kyang /_/tsan+dan dkar dang gur gum mo/_/de nas de bzhin gnyi ga 'gro/_/'bad pa yis ni rab tu bkru/_/de bzhin khrus 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]byas song nas ni/_/gang na ras ris bar ma de/_/rgyal ba gtso bo thub mchog ni/_/shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog_/de bzhin rtag tu ston pa'i gzugs/_/sa steng rgyal ba'i ring bsrel can/_/de yi mdun du phreng ba ni/_/de dang nye bar gzhag par bya/_/de dang nye 
[\[186a.2\]]bar bzhag nas ni/_/de yi mdun du nyer gnas nas/_/stong phrag gcig dang brgyad dang ni/_/brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas nas kyang /_/nyin zhag gcig ni smyung byas te/_/bdun pa thub la phreng ba dbul/_/snga ma de bzhin bzlas byas nas/_/tshad kyang de dang mnyam par bya/_/
[\[186a.3\]]de nas phreng ba la bzlas nas/_/de yi mtshan mo nyal bar bya/_/ku sha bting ba'i sa la ni/_/sngags shes der ni nyal bar bya/_/gal te des ni rmi lam na/_/dge ba'i rmi lam mthong na ni/_/'bras bcas rmi lam ston pa ste/_/de la grub par bstan pa yin/_/sangs rgyas nyan thos 
[\[186a.4\]]bse ru ni/_/gal te 'di yis rmi lam mthong /_/sngags pa de yi bya ba ni/_/'bras bcas nges par 'grub par 'gyur/_/gzhon nu'i gzugs can byis pa ni/_/rnam pa sna tshogs mdzes mthong ba/_/gal te rmi lam nges mthong dang /_/phreng ba stsol ba'ang de bzhin te/_/don yod de 
[\[186a.5\]]ni 'grub 'gyur te/_/sngags kyi don rnams sgrub byed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las ras ris bar ma la brten pa cho ga rab 'byam las/_phreng ba'i cho ga rab 'byam bcu gnyis 
[\[186a.6\]]pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/_gzhan yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyi sngags mtha' dag rnam par dgod pa'i khyad 
[\[186a.7\]]par gyi cho ga dang sbyin sreg gi las la rab tu sbyor ba'i rig pa sgrub pa yod de/_me la nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga'i phyir/_gang gi rig pa thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can rab tu 'jug cing gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de gang zhe na/_gsang ba'i rig 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di lta ste/_o~M ut+tiSh+Tha ha ri ping ga la lo hi tA k+Sha/_de hi da dA pa ya hUM s+pha Ta s+pha Ta sarba big+h+NAM bi nA sha ya swA hA/_'jam dpal 'di ni me'i snying po'i mchog las thams cad byed pa 'dod pa thams cad ster bar byed pa yin te/_dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos me'i snying po 'di 
[\[186b.2\]]lan cig bzlas pas/_sreg blugs gsum gyis me la sbyin sreg byas nas me spyan drang bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rab tu sbyar na zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang /_drag po'i las dag la yam shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/_mya ngan med shing zhi don du/_/rlon pa nyid ni rab tu 
[\[186b.3\]]bsngags/_/mtho gang 'am ni khru gang tsam/_/sor gsum srid du bya ba yin/_/snum pa'i rnam pa rab tu bsngags/_/cho ga 'di ni bya ba yin/_/bu ga med cing nang stong min/_/de bzhin ne tso'i 'dab ma dang /_/ljang dang dkar ba'i kha dog gam/_/kha dog nag pa spang bar bya/_/
[\[186b.4\]]srin bu rnams kyis zos pa'ang spang /_/bu ga yod pa'ang rnam par bzlog_/gzhan yang kha dog rab bsngags min/_/tha ma nyid kyang rnam par spangs/_/ha cang skam min rlon pa'ang min/_/tshig min las ni brtsam par bya/_/rul ba dang ni yo ba'ang min/_/shin tu ring ba'ang 
[\[186b.5\]]spang bar bya/_/de nas me thab bya ba ni/_/kun nas gru bzhir bya ba ste/_/'og nyid du yang brko ba ni/_/'bad pas khru ni bzhi yi tshad/_/khru gsum dang ni khru gnyis dang /_/de bzhin khru gcig tshad du bya/_/rtag tu srog chags spangs pa dang /_/bye mas legs par sbyar 
[\[186b.6\]]ba gang /_/de nas pad 'dra'i lan kan ni/_/kun nas dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o/_/yang na 'bad pas zur bzhi yang /_/de bzhin lan kan dbyibs su bya/_/rdo rje'i rnam pa 'dra ba yi/_/rtse mo gnyis su'ang rtse gsum bya/_/me thab kyi ni thad ka la/_/khru gnyis thad kar bya ba 
[\[186b.7\]]yin/_/gtsang dang de bzhin gsal ba'i gnas/_/chu klung de bzhin chu dbus dang /_/shing gcig gi ni phyogs dag dang /_/dur khrod dang ni khang stong du/_/sbyin sreg legs par yang dag brtsam/_/de bzhin ri bo'i rtse dag tu'o/_/rtag tu lha khang stong pa dang /_/dgon pa 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]chen po'ang de bzhin no/_/gang yang sgrub pa'i phyogs dag tu/_/gang zag mchog gis rab gsungs pa/_/sbyin sreg gnas ni thams cad la/_/gnas de dag ni thams cad gsungs/_/ku sha'i khres ni khru gang tsam/_/de la 'dug par byas nas ni/_/
[\[187a.2\]]sngags shes der ni sbyin sreg las/_/khyad par du yang bya ba yin/_/gnas de dag la 'dug na ni/_/myur du 'grub par the tshom med/_/shar dang byang du bltas pas kyang /_/zhi ba dang ni rgyas par bya/_/lhor bltas nas ni drag po'i las/_/sngags pas de ni spang bar bya/_/
[\[187a.3\]]shar du bltas pas zhi ba 'grub/_/byang du bltas pas rgyas pa'o/_/'di yis sngags pa dus rtag tu/_/sngags kyi ngo bo yang dag brtsam/_/bil ba p+lag sha n+ya gro d+has/_/rgyas pa'i las ni yongs su bya/_/mngon spyod shing las bya ba ni/_/dkar dang tshwa dang skyur 
[\[187a.4\]]dang rno/_/de dag thams cad spang bya ste/_/thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu bkag_/zhi dang rgyas pa'i las la ni/_/shing rlon dag ni rab tu bsngags/_/drag po'i las la shing skam ste/_/thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu spangs/_/yam shing de dag med na ni/_/tha mal shing 
[\[187a.5\]]dag kun du brtag_/gnyi ga'i rtse mor bya ba ni/_/ku shas kun du yang dag dkri/_/sngo dang snum pa 'dra ba dang /_/rma bya'i mgrin pa 'dra ba dang /_/de 'dra'i ku shas rtag tu ni/_/zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa bya/_/margad rnam pa 'dra ba dang /_/rtswa skam gyis ni rtag tu yang /_/
[\[187a.6\]]sdig pa'i las rnams bya ba yin/_/'dir ni thub pa mchog gis bkag_/dri med chu ni yongs dag pa/_/srog chags dag gis rtag spangs pa/_/des ni kun nas gtor byas nas/_/g.yas phyogs su ni bskor byas te/_/sdom brtson gyis ni me sbar bya/_/cho ga ji 
[\[187a.7\]]bzhin nye reg bya/_/gtsang ba'i rtswa yi rtsa bas ni/_/me sgron tshad dang ldan byas nas/_/de nas chang par bcangs nas ni/_/'bad pas me ni spar bar bya/_/kha yi rlung gis mi bya ste/_/rtag tu gos kyi mthas kyang min/_/sham thabs bla gos rnam par spangs/_/gos gzhan 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]dag ni bkag ma yin/_/shin tu drag pas de mi bya/_/gnod par dga' ba'i ma yin na/_/rlung yab gtsang dang de bzhin gos/_/lo mas kyang ni rlung yab bya/_/rlung gis khyad du mi gsod pa/_/me ni rab tu sad byas nas/_/sngags shes pas ni me sbar te/_/sbyin sreg don 
[\[187b.2\]]du legs mnyam gzhag_/lag pa de ni g.yon pa yis/_/lan gsum bar du chus gtor nas/_/der ni ba yi mar gyis ni/_/sreg blugs gsum ni des sbyin bya/_/de nas kyang ni phyag bya ste/_/sangs rgyas kun dang skyob pa dang /_/rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po 
[\[187b.3\]]la/_/de nas ci 'dod phyag bya'o/_/de tshe me yi snying po yis/_/sngags kyis lan bdun rtag bzlas pa'i/_/dri zhim me tog dag gis ni/_/sdom brtson me ni spyan drang bya/_/sngags shes rtag tu spyan drangs nas/_/mkhas pas gnas ni sbyin par bya/_/gdan dang gnas 
[\[187b.4\]]ni sbyin byed na'ang /_/de nyid sngags yin gzhan pas min/_/zho dang mar gyis sbags pa dang /_/sbrang rtsis sbags pa'i yam shing gis/_/rgyas pa'i las ni bya ba'i phyir/_/sngags kyis kun du sbyin sreg bya/_/mar dang sbrang rtsir ldan pa 'am/_/yang na zho dang ldan pa yi/_/
[\[187b.5\]]yam shing rdzas dang ldan pa yis/_/gnyi ga la gnas de tshe bya/_/stong ngam yang na 'bum mam ni/_/yang na brgya rtsa brgyad du brtag_/de tshe sngags pas sngags bzung nas/_/lan re bzlas shing me la dor/_/'bar ba'i me yi phreng ba 'am/_/de bzhin me lce gcig gyur la/_/zhi 
[\[187b.6\]]ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg bya/_/dud pa med la rgyas pa'ang bya/_/dud bcas drag po'i las la bya/_/de ni rgyal bas smad cing spangs/_/gal te me ni mdog ldan na/_/sbyin sreg las ni rab tu sbyar/_/zhi la kha dog dkar po ni/_/rgyal ba mchog gis rtag tu bsngags/_/gal te 
[\[187b.7\]]me dkar sbyin sreg byas/_/der ni sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur/_/de bzhin rtag tu mdog dmar la/_/rgyas pa 'grub par 'dod pa yin/_/gnag dang du ba'i kha dog dang /_/ser skya la ni sdig ldan las/_/kha dog rnam gsum bstan pas ni/_/rnam gsum grub pa 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]'di dag yin/_/mdog gzhan sprin gyi kha dog gam/_/rnam pa sna tshogs mdog ldan pa/_/sa steng 'di la sngags rnams ni/_/grub pa yod pa ma yin no/_/de 'dra'i kha dog 'dra ba 'am/_/rnam pa sna tshogs mdog ldan pa'i/_/me ni 'bar ba de mthong na/_/las 
[\[188a.2\]]kyi sbyor ba'ang brtsam par bya/_/gal te sngags ni grub 'dod na/_/phyi rol me ni sbar bar bya/_/cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/_/phyir yang sbyin sreg rab tu bya/_/me yi sngags ni zlos pa yis/_/gshegs gsol spyan drang nyid kyang bya/_/dkyil 'khor 'dir ni cho ga bzhin/_/sngar ni rab 
[\[188a.3\]]tu brtags pa yis/_/de nyid kyis ni sbyin sreg bya/_/gshegs gsol spyan drang la sogs pa'ang /_/de nyid kyi ni las dag gis/_/las rnams thams cad nyid kyang bya/_/me yi las dang de bzhin gzugs/_/ras ris mdun du brtsam byas na/_/der ni sngags rnams 'grub 'gyur 
[\[188a.4\]]zhes/_/sngon gyi bde gshegs rnams kyis gsungs/_/rgyal bas bsngags pa'i las rnams dag_/der ni rnam pa kun du bya/_/sdig pa dag ni khyad par du/_/gang yang rgyal bas smad pa dang /_/'jig rten 'gro bas smad pa dag_/gzhan gyis smad pa'ang bya ba min/_/'khor los 
[\[188a.5\]]sgyur bzang nyid dang ni/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'thob dang /_/de bzhin mngon shes lnga 'thob dang /_/de nas lha nyid thob pa'o/_/ras ris la rtag brtson zhing gshegs/_/sbyin sreg las la 'jigs med dang /_/sa 'og gi ni bdag po 'am/_/yang na bar snang spyod par 'gyur/_/
[\[188a.6\]]sa bdag lha dang gnod sbyin nyid/_/rtag tu gnod sbyin mo 'gugs byed/_/rgyal srid bdag po nyid dang ni/_/yul nyid dang ni grong dag dang /_/rig pa 'dzin dang lha min nyid/_/sems can thams cad dbang du byed/_/bdag nyid che dang sems can che/_/'byung po rnams ni 'gugs 
[\[188a.7\]]par byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/sa bcu la ni yang dag gnas/_/sbyin sreg las kyis 'gugs byed na/_/sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos/_/sde dpon dag dang de bzhin du/_/khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur/_/dbang 'gyur cig car 'byung po 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]kun/_/de bzhin mi yi dbang po nyid/_/sems can kun la dbang don dang /_/yang na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur/_/de bzhin rtag tu las kun la/_/sbyin sreg gis ni kun du bya/_/thams cad kun la brtson bdag nyid/_/las kun las ni bsten byas na/_/de ni nges par 'grub 
[\[188b.2\]]'gyur te/_/las dge'i don ni dam pa yin/_/bar ma nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur/_/tha ma'i las kyang de bzhin no/_/rdzas rnams dag ni de bzhin du/_/grub dang ldan pa'ang rnam pa gsum/_/'bras dang bcas par grub snang ste/_/sbyin sreg las la rab tu bstan/_/phyag 
[\[188b.3\]]rgya gtsug phud lnga bcings nas/_/sngags kyang skra can mas byas na/_/las rnams kun ni bya ba dang /_/sngags pas bdag nyid bsrung ba bya/_/sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug pas/_/de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya/_/bdun nam brgyad du bzlas pa yis/_/las 'di 
[\[188b.4\]]la ni rtag tu bya/_/na maHsarba bud d+hA bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta ga tiM ga tA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M dz+wa la tiSh+Tha hUM ru ru bi shwa saM b+ha ba saM b+ha be swA hA/_sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/yang dang yang du shing la bzla/_/gnyis sam bdun du bzlas pa yis/_/sngags rig des ni 
[\[188b.5\]]sbyin sreg bya/_/me tog bdug pa dri yang rung /_/ma lus thams cad dag dang ni/_/chu la sngags rnams bzlas pa yang /_/'di nyid kyis ni sbyin par bya/_/las rnams kun gyi rgyu yi phyir/_/de nas cho ga brtsam par bya/_/las rnams dag ni thams cad la/_/snga ma'i 
[\[188b.6\]]sbyor ba nyid kyis bya/_/snga ma'i gtsug pud lnga bcings te/_/phyag rgya chen po grags ldan ma/_/snga ma'i gtsug pud lnga bcings bya/_/skra can ma nyid rab bzlas pas/_/des na srung ba byed par 'gyur/_/grub pa'i rgyu la 'jigs med pas/_/las rnams thams cad brtsam 
[\[188b.7\]]par bya/_/gal te la nye bzang mthong ba'am/_/rtag tu dge ba'i sgra thos na/_/de la sngags ni don yod de/_/ji ltar 'dod bzhin mchog stsol 'gyur/_/dang po'i las la rab sbyor dang /_/sngags kyi rgyu la rab 'jug na/_/thams cad 'bras bu bcas pa dang /_/de la grub 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]par brjod pa yin/_/rgyal sgra rnga ni pa Ta ha/_/rnga bo che yi sgra dag ni/_/brtson byas grub pa ma lus 'gyur/_/sbyin sreg las la yang dag bsten/_/gzhan yang la nye bzang po dang /_/'dab chags dge ba'i sgra dag dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs nges pa'i sgra/_/rgyal 
[\[189a.2\]]ba rnams kyis bsngags pa dang /_/bkra shis bzang po rab bsngags dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs yid 'ong sgra/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang /_/bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_/de bzhin mchod yon bum pa gang /_/mthong na 'grub pa'i rgyu rnams yin/_/rnam pa du ma'i 
[\[189a.3\]]kha dog gam/_/'jig rten gyis mchod rab bsngags pa/_/de dag mthong na 'grub 'gyur ba/_/sngags rnams du ma'i spyod yul yin/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bcu 
[\[189a.4\]]gsum pa ste/_sbyin sreg gi cho ga rab 'byam rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyi gsang ba'i rig pa yod de/_
[\[189a.5\]]sngags thams cad kyi sgrub pa po'i thabs/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yang dag par rjes su gnang ba/_chos kyi mdzod las byung ba/_chos kyi sprin gyi rjes su zhugs pa/_nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad kyi mnga' bdag shin 
[\[189a.6\]]tu gtso bor gyur pa/_gzhon nu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu brjod de/_shin tu gtso bor gyur cing dam pa yin la/_lha dang mi rnams kyi skyes bu khyu mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin no/_/gzhon nu de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal 
[\[189a.7\]]po 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bstan cing shin tu gtso bo yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa dag gis sngon gsungs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi snying po mchog tu gsang 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]ba kun nas bkra shis par 'dod pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bstod pa rab tu bsngags pa sems can thams cad yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed pa re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed 
[\[189b.2\]]pa de yang gang zhe na/_bar 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung bar gyur to/_/gang 'di phyogs bcu steng 'og thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bas 
[\[189b.3\]]khyab par mdzad de/_sems can thams cad kyi yid tshim par mdzad nas slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dbu'i gtsug tor du nub par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i lus can blta bar mi nus pa/_
[\[189b.4\]]sems can thams cad kyis mi thub pa 'od chen pos yang dag par 'phags pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis lus brgyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang ldan pa/_'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i gzugs can rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to/_/
[\[189b.5\]]byung nas nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad snang bar byas te/_rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba rig pa du ma bye ba khri phrag brgya stong 'byin par byed pa/_yi ge gcig pa'i sgra 'don cing 'od zer chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'byin pa steng gi phyogs nas bcom ldan 
[\[189b.6\]]'das shAkya thub pa la mngon du blta ba dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po yang snang bar byas nas bar snang la gnas par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas yi ge gcig pa rig pa'i 'khor 
[\[189b.7\]]los sgyur ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba'i snying po mchog tu rab tu gsang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog gis yang dag par thob pa/_sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]po dang 'od dpag med dang bsnyen par dka' ba dang spyan bzang dang tog bzang dang me tog dbang po dang gnyid mthar phyin dang 'jig rten thub pa dang /_gser thub la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba dang 'das pa'i yang dag par 
[\[190a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba de yang gang zhe na/_tad+ya thA/_oM b+h+ru~M/_'jam dpal 'di ni snying po dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog sngags thams cad kyi rig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba dag byed chen po 
[\[190a.3\]]'di yang dag par bsgrubs na sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/_gzhon nu gang yang khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po'i mchog la sngags thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa/_mchog tu gsang ba'i mchog yang dag par rjes su gnang ba las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par sbyong bar 
[\[190a.4\]]byed pa/_dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos nges par 'bum phrag gsum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas las rnams sngags dang bcas pa 'dir gzhon nu khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags dang rgyud rnams bsgrub par bya'o/_/'dis bsrung ba byas 
[\[190a.5\]]na 'byung po thams cad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bgegs thams cad kyis zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de gsungs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad 
[\[190a.6\]]rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang snang bas khyab cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/_gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang du 'khod par gyur to/_/sa bcu thob pa'i byang 
[\[190a.7\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad dang rig pa'i rgyal po rnams 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul nas lhags par 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na rnam par gnas pa'i sems can mang po dbang du gyur to/_/dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi ngan 'gro la gnas pa rnams 'od zer chen po'i snang bas reg cing snang bar byas pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i rgyun 
[\[190b.2\]]la gnas pa yid shin tu bde bas tshim zhing skyo ba med par gyur te/_nges par theg pa gsum la gnas par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[190b.3\]]nyon cig rig pa'i rgyal po 'di rdzu 'phrul che ba dpa' bo gcig pu las thams cad byed pa/_rig pa thams cad kyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa cho ga zhib mo thams cad yongs su rgyas pa/_khyod kyi 
[\[190b.4\]]sngags dang rgyud dang /_cho ga rab 'byam la yang dag par zhugs pa/_sngags thams cad sgrub par byed pa/_thun mong du gyur pa/_grags pa che ba dang /_spro ba che ba dang /_sems can sgrub pa po'i khyad par gyi thabs dang shes rab la mkhas pa byang chub kyi lam
