[\[231a.7\]]bu las byas nas bzhag ste/_mchod pa rgya chen po byas la ji srid 'gul ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur te 'gul ba na 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rgyab tu zhon na rna cha gdub kor dang 'dra zhing 'khyil ba'i skra dang bdag dang bcas pa'i 'khor lnga bcu dang nam mkha' la 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa ji lta bar lo stong phrag dgur 'tsho bar 'gyur/_rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du glang po che dang ma he bsgrub par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe seng ge seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa de'i tshe lha rnams stan las sa la ltung bar 
[\[231b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/pad+ma'i mtshor phyin nas pad+ma 'bum gyis mchod na sa kun gyi rgyal thabs thob par 'gyur ro/_/shing ka ra bI ra'i tog kha ma 'bus pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na rgyal po'i bu mo thob par 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i me tog 'bum gyis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu bo la 
[\[231b.3\]]sngags dang bcas pas gtor na/_gang 'dod pa'i bu mo thob par 'gyur zhing grub pa mchog thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba 'di'i sngags kyis ni de gang du 'ongs pa der dbang po yang de la stan stobs par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i rgyal po 
[\[231b.4\]]thams cad kyis kyang ring po nas mthong na 'jigs pas dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyi rgyal po thams cad du yang 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rgya cher bcom ldan 'das shAkya seng ge mi mchog gis gsungs pa yin no/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga_/
[\[231b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/_yi ge gcig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i las kyi cho ga dang ras ris bstan pa'i le'u rab 'byam las nyi shu pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang 
[\[231b.6\]]gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/_de na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_nyan thos dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal bstan pa 'di 
[\[231b.7\]]ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor du gyur pa/_chos kyi mdzod 'jig rten pa rnams kyi bsam pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa byed pa'i phyir nor bu rin po che lta bur gyur pa'o/_/dus kyi tha ma'i dus de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing sangs 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]rgyas kyi zhing dag stongs pa na dam pa'i chos kyi tshul nub pa'i dus tshod na/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi mdzod yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags dang rgyud rnams kyi cho ga'i rgyal po ni thun mong du gyur cing gter du gyur 
[\[232a.2\]]par 'gyur ba yin te/_sems can thams cad kyi bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa byas na thob pa yin no/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags dang rgyud rnams kyi 'di ni snying por gyur pa yin te/_gzhon 
[\[232a.3\]]nu khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po 'di ni mchog tu gyur pa yin no/_/yi ge gcig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba 'di bzlas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po gter du gyur pa/_snying 
[\[232a.4\]]por gyur pa/_mchog tu gyur pa/_gtso bor gyur pa/_yi ge gcig pa sngon byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'das pa'i dus dang 'das pa'i dus tshod du gang gA'i klung gi bye ma drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i 
[\[232a.5\]]rgyal po zhes bya ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas 
[\[232a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das gang gis dran pa tsam mam mtshan 'dzin pas kyang mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyang zad par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi mtshan thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can mang po nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur na sngags 'grub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_sngags zlos 
[\[232a.7\]]pa thams cad kyis kyang nges par tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la dang por ngag gis kyang phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin du de nas 'od dpag med dang rin chen tog la phyag bya'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas nas ci 'dod pa'i sngags bzlas pa byas na myur du grub pa stsol 
[\[232b.2\]]bar 'gyur te/_gang gi phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa dang phyag 'tshal bas ni bsod nams chen po 'phel ba'i phyir dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang phyag 'tshal bas ni nges par byang chub la gzhol ba dang dge 
[\[232b.3\]]ba'i tshogs 'di yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i grangs su 'gro zhing de'i sngags kyang myur du 'grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[232b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yi ge gcig pa'i sngags 'di gsungs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sngags dang rgyud thams cad kyi mngon par 'dod pa/_sngags thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/_'jam pa'i dbyangs khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po mchog tu 
[\[232b.5\]]gtsang ba dang gtsang ba dam pa dang 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/slob ma ma yin pa dang chos dang mi ldan pa dang de bzhin du ston pa dang bstan pa la ma dad pa dang gzhan gyis pham pa dang ma rungs pa dang nga rgyal can dang ston pa dang bstan pa la nyes pa tshol 
[\[232b.6\]]ba la ni nam yang rab tu sbyar bar mi bya'o/_/rgyal ba'i sras la rab tu mi dang ba dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang mchod pa dang rjes su gzung ba mi bzod pa de la ni ngas sbyin par mi bya'o/_/de la ni sngags grub pa mi snang ste/_dad cing zhi ba'i sems ldan dang /_/
[\[232b.7\]]sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dang /_/byang chub sems la rtag tu ni/_/mchod dang rjes bzung de gtsor byed/_/de la sngags 'di 'grub 'gyur zhes/_/cho ga 'dir ni yang dag bstan/_/sngags chen yi ge gcig pa ni/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis nges par sbyar/_/'jig 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]rten mgon 'dis sngags 'di ni/_/re ba skyed byed stsol ba yin/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yin/_/sngags rnams ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas/_/bdun cu rtsa drug bye ba ni/_/rang byung nyid kyis sngon gsungs pa/_/lus can sdig pas rmongs 
[\[233a.2\]]rnams la/_/sngags rnams dge ba'i don du yin/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams kun gyi sngags/_/ston pa'i gzugs su yang dag gnas/_/de dag la 'di snying por 'gyur/_/rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/_/yi ge gcig por rtag par gnas/_/ther zug 
[\[233a.3\]]tu yang 'di rab 'jug_/'dir ni chos kyi mthar gnas te/_/'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas yin/_/chos kyi tshul la yang dag gnas/_/'di ni yi ge gcig pa yin/_/sngags ni don rnams ma lus sgrub/_/rgyal po ma rungs zlog byed yin/_/las ni sna tshogs 
[\[233a.4\]]byed pa yin/_/las kun ma lus sgrub pa'o/_/las ni rtsa brgyad stong po rnams/_/nges par yang ni byed par 'gyur/_/cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/_/phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs ster/_/'jam dpal gyi ni snying po ni/_/yi ge ma dang yang dag ldan/_/
[\[233a.5\]]yi ge u dang rtag 'gro zhes/_/'jig rten na ni rtag 'jug 'gyur/_/tshe dang ye shes dpag med rgyal/_/dbang pos nges pa'i don du gsungs/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs la sangs rgyas kyis/_/dbang gi don du 'di rab sbyin/_/des na dus mtha'i 'jig rten 'dir/_/ston 
[\[233a.6\]]pa mya ngan 'das pa na/_/cho ga mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni/_/myur du grub par 'gro bar 'gyur/_/tshe ni dpag med ces bya bas/_/rnam par brtags par gyur pa yin/_/der ni bcom ldan sangs rgyas te/_/chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed pa/_/dpag med bskal par 
[\[233a.7\]]gnas pa dang /_/tshe la dbang bar byin gyis brlabs/_/de nyid phyir na de mtshan gyur/_/dpag med tshe dang ye shes des/_/'jig rten kun gyi rgyal po'i dbang /_/rdzu 'phrul che 'di de bzhin gshegs/_/de ni sngags mchog gtso 'di byin/_/sangs rgyas sras po blo dang 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]ldan/_/sras kyi gtso bo dam pa ni/_/rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs kyang che/_/de nas sras po de nyid kyis/_/'di ni kun tu bzang la sbyor/_/de nas sangs rgyas sras rnams la/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs dag gis/_/sngags rnams kyi ni mchog gyur pa/_/chos kyi 
[\[233b.2\]]rgyal pos gsungs pa ni/_/'byung po rnams la phan don du/_/sngags rnams ma lus gsungs pa yin/_/tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[233b.3\]]sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po tshe dpag tu med pa dang 'od dpag tu med pa dang rin chen tog la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum sngags bzla bar bya'o/_/yi ge gcig po de gang zhe na/_mu/_grogs po dag 'di ni tshe dang 
[\[233b.4\]]ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bzhugs te gsungs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang 
[\[233b.5\]]bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don dang ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo dag la gzigs nas bstan pa nub pa'i dus tshod du mkhyen nas dus kyi tha ma la dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa'i ma rungs pa'i rgyal po bzlog pa'i phyir dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[233b.6\]]pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi sras kyi gtso bo mthu chen po thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sbyin pa'i phyir dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kun tu bzang po la byin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po des kyang 'jam dpal 
[\[233b.7\]]gzhon nur gyur pa la byin no/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des kyang sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i dbang gis snying gi gnas su rang gi lus la bzhag go_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus la bltos nas dus kyi tha ma bstan pa nub pa'i dus tshod la 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i tha ma bdag gis kyang bstan te/_rtsod pa'i dus dang bstan pa 'jig pa'i dus su nga'i bstan pa yang dag par bsrung ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i cho ga gzhan yang mdor bsdus nas brjod par bya ba ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs 
[\[234a.2\]]gzhon nu nyon cig_/bdag nyid chen po'i cho ga rgya che ba 'di'i cho ga'i rgyal po'i dbang po brjod par bya ste/_dang por re zhig ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te/_'bum phrag sum cu bzlas pa byas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/'o mas 'tsho zhing mi smra ba'i brtul 
[\[234a.3\]]zhugs dang sngags gzhan la mi rten pa dang /_gzhan la mi sems pa dang /_skyabs gsum yongs su blangs pa dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_khrims lnga'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pas bzlas 
[\[234a.4\]]pa byas la des las rnams bya ba ste/_dang por re zhig ras la ri mo bya ba ni ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas la tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis bri'o/_/gtsang ma'i ras kyi dum bu gang yang rung ba'am dar la tsan+dan dang ga pur dang gur gum gyi chus gtor la/_gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su 
[\[234a.5\]]gtsang ba'i ri mo byed pa dkar gsum za zhing gos dkar po gyon pas zla ba nya ba'i [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su rnam par dag pa'i rgyu skar la nyi ma phyed pa'i bar du bri bar bya ste de nas bri ba spang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du nyin re zhing yang yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du bya'o/_/dang 
[\[234a.6\]]por re zhig ras la tshe dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bri bar bya'o/_/ras khru gang tsam mam bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad dam/_ras khru bzhi pa la khor yug tu tshe dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bri'o/_/pad+ma rA ga dang in+d+ra nI la dang 
[\[234a.7\]]shel dang rin po che margad kyi ras ris kyi 'og gi phyogs su mdzes par bya'o/_/de dag gi steng gi phyogs su rin po che'i gzhal med khang mdzes pa'i rnam pa dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan mdzes pa'i rnam par bsgreng ba dang de'i dbus su tshe dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/_kun nas 'od kyi phreng ba rab tu 'bar ba/_kha dog cung zad dmar zhing dkar ba/_g.yon phyogs su mthing shing gi rdo la bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen 
[\[234b.2\]]thob phyag g.yas na rnga yab thogs shing de bzhin gshegs pa la gtod pa'i lta ba dang lag pa g.yon na skyur rtsi chen po'i shing thog thogs pa/_me tog pri yang ku ltar sngo sangs gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis lus brgyan pa/_kun nas khor yug tu 'od 'phro ba/_g.yas ngos 
[\[234b.3\]]su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po rin po che'i ri la bzhugs pa/_lag pa g.yas pa na rnga yab thogs shing g.yob pa/_lag pa g.yon pa na rin po che thogs pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/_
[\[234b.4\]]me tog pri yang ku ltar cung zad dkar ba/_ras sngon po g.yo ba dang ldan pas g.yogs pa/_mu tig gi phreng ba dang rin po ches mchod phyir thogs byas pa/_khor yug rab tu 'bar bas 'brel ba de'i g.yas ngos su 'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i ri la gnas pa/_
[\[234b.5\]]gzhon nur gyur pa zur phud lngas mgo legs par mdzes par byas pa/_byis pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_gser gyi mdog dang 'dra ba/_dar sngon po g.yo ba can mnabs pa/_mu tig gi phreng ba dang rin po che 'dzin cing 'dres pa'i mchod phyir thogs byas pa/_de bzhin 
[\[234b.6\]]gshegs par song ba'i lta ba cung zad bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/_zhi ba'i rnam pa gzugs mdzes pa/_thal mo sbyar ba rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu rtags dang cha byad dang dbyibs 'dzin pa'i sgrub pa po me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin cing /_pus mo'i 
[\[234b.7\]]lha nga sa la btsugs nas yang dag par 'dug pa dang mgo mngon par btud pa ras ris kyi zur gyi mtha' ma'i phyogs su bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi bri bar bya'o/_/g.yas phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis bri bar bya ba la/_sA la'i 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]dbang po'i rgyal po dang rin chen tog khor yug tu kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa/_g.yon phyogs su gser thub dang 'od srung rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_me tog thams cad kyis gcal bkram pa/_pad+ma'i gdan gnyis la bzhugs 
[\[235a.2\]]pa/_ha cang mi ring ba na chos 'chad cing skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs pa/_sprin gyi nang nas ro stod byung ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nam mkha' la lding ba spyan mdzes zhes bya 
[\[235a.3\]]ba mngon par bri bar bya ba ni/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba dang ldan pa/_phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/_phyag g.yon pas chos gos kyi tha ma la 'dzin pa/_'di ni tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za 
[\[235a.4\]]ba'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ras ris cho ga bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyi mchog 'di yin te/_'di ni gtsug tor gyi rgyal po gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang rab tu 'gran 
[\[235a.5\]]pa/_brtson 'grus mtshungs pa/_stobs mtshungs pa 'di'i yon tan rgya che ba'i mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs che ba/_mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba yin no/_/yi ge gcig pa la cho 
[\[235a.6\]]ga rgya cher bstan pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang byed do/_/ma bsgrubs kyang bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang las rnams byed na bsgrubs pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/_ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang 'dod pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/yid kyis gang 
[\[235a.7\]]mngon par 'dod pa de ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nyid bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dbang pos byin gyis brlabs pa ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]pa thams cad kyi snying po zhes brjod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi rgyal po zhes brjod do/_/'khor los sgyur ba zhes brjod do/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po zhes brjod do/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po zhes brjod 
[\[235b.2\]]do/_/yi ge gcig pa zhes brjod do/_/mdor na 'di'i mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_gang gi phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/sgrub pa med pa dang sngon 
[\[235b.3\]]du spyod pa ma byas pa dang khyim gyi rtsom pa thams cad la rab tu gnas pa dang bza' ba thams cad sha dang chang dang grong gi chos la rab tu zhugs pa dag la yang 'grub ste/_dad pa med pa dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa med pa ni ma gtogs te 'di dag la ni grub pa med do/_/dkon 
[\[235b.4\]]mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dang de la zhugs pa la gnod pa byed pa dang 'di dag la yang las phra mo yang grub pa med na/_grub pa 'bring dang rab la ni lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'dod pa thams cad dang bza' ba dang spyod pa gtsor byed pa'i sgrub pa po la ni las stong rtsa brgyad 
[\[235b.5\]]kyi las phran tshegs la rab tu sbyar bas 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de dag kyang gang zhe na/_dang por re zhig lan gcig bzlas pas bdag bsrung ngo /_/lan gnyis bzlas pas gzhan bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/lan gsum bzlas pas srung ba dam par 'gyur ro/_/byang 
[\[235b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la rab tu gnas pas kyang yang dag par bskyod par mi nus na/_de las gzhan pa'i sems can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan bzhi bzlas nas rked par bcings na sa bon bsdams par 'gyur ba yin 
[\[235b.7\]]te/_rmi lam na yang 'di la sa bon 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rang 'dod pa ni ma gtogs te de nyin par ram mtshan mo gcig la gal te 'dod pa na nyi ma re re zhing bya'o/_/ci ste mi 'dod na thal ba la lan bdun bsngags pa byas nas lte ba'i phyogs su bskus na zhag bdun 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]phrag gsum du sa bon bsdams pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/lan lnga bzlas te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsgoms na gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/zla ba gzas zin cing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dzin pa na/_shing arka'i me rab 
[\[236a.2\]]tu sbar la ras ris med kyang shar du mngon par bltas te/_mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag bcus sbyin sreg bya'o/_/rgyal po'i pho brang dang nye ba chu bos bar ma bcad pa/_lha'i gnas su ma byas pa/_phyogs gang du rgyal po gnas pa de dang nye bar sbyin sreg rab tu sbyar na tho rangs 
[\[236a.3\]]rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gang smras pa de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/gal te dbang du ma gyur pa de'i tshe/_de'i sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba'am sems g.yeng ba thob par 'gyur na phyir yang bzlog par bya ste/_'o ma'i sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg 
[\[236a.4\]]byas na gang de'i dus de nas brtsams nas rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/las de dag ni dad pa dang ldan pa dang dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la ni mi bya ste/_gal te byed na shin tu bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po 'byung bar 
[\[236a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/gzhan dag la gnod pa byed pa/_ma rungs pa'i sems dang drag po'i sems dang ldan pa rnams la ni bya ba yin no/_/nyin re zhing yang mthong ba sbyin par byas na sems zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te zhi bar ma gyur na phung khrol chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/_srog gi 
[\[236a.6\]]lhag ma tsam lus par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang las su 'gyur ba ni zla ba gzas zin gyi dus su shing pa la sha'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar te/_mar gyi sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad byas na tho rangs yul gyi bdag po'i rgyal po spyan drangs par 'gyur ro/_/de dang lhan cig tu 
[\[236a.7\]]gros byas na bsam pa bden pa nye bar ston par 'gyur te/_de la bstan ngag byas na zla ba drug gi nang du bsod snyoms stong yod pa'i grong ster bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mtshan phyed du sbyin sreg byas na zla ba gsum gyis ster bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te thun thams cad kyi mtshan mo 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]sbyin sreg byas na zla ba gcig gis thob par 'gyur ro/_/gal te zla ba gcig gi mtshan mo re re la sbyin sreg byas na yul thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang na yul dang 'dra ba'i grong ngam yang na gzhan cung zad nor yod pa la yang dgra yod par mi 'gyur te/_gal te dgra yod na yang 
[\[236b.2\]]las rnams byas pa yin te/_zla ba gzas zin pa na shing a pa margas me rab tu sbar la/_shing pa la sha'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pas bram ze'i skra la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/de'i tha mar shing pi tsu marda'i lo ma la ske tshe'i 'bru mar gyis 
[\[236b.3\]]btags pa'i sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na tho rangs bram ze'i dgra zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te rgyal po sdang bar 'gyur na las gzhan yang yod de/_zla ba gzas zin la shing ci rnyed pas me rab tu sbar la mar gyi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas 
[\[236b.4\]]la sbyin sreg gi tha mar phyogs gang na rgyal po yod pa de'i phyogs su thal ba de gtor na de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dus gang la longs spyod gang 'dod pa rgya che ba de dag gi grogs kyang byed par 'gyur ro/_/grong nyung ba'am mang po rab tu ster bar 'gyur te/_nges par zla ba drug 
[\[236b.5\]]gis don yod par 'grub par yang 'gyur ro/_/de nas rigs bzhi las gang yang rung ba rtags gtso bo dang ldan pa'am lha gzhan nam 'jig rten pa la dad pa dag sems 'khrugs par gyur na/_phyogs gang na gnas pa der thal ba de gtor na yul gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur 
[\[236b.6\]]ba'am skyo bar 'gyur ba'am mtshan mo glal bar 'gyur ba'am nye du la gnod par 'gyur ro/_/de phyir gso ba ni 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas na sos par 'gyur ro/_/yang na gza' bzhi po nyid kyi cho gas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[236b.7\]]sku gzugs dang ras ris sam dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mam sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la gos gtsang ma bgos shing nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/_srog chags med pa'i chus las bya zhing me tog dkar po dri zhim po dang gur gum dang ldan pa dang ga pur gyi 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]dud pas bdug par bya'o/_/gang du las la sbyar ba ni bram ze'i dgra la ni shing pa la shas bya'o/_/rgyal rigs kyi dgra la ni shing a shwat+thas bya'o/_/rje'u rigs kyi dgra la ni shing seng ldeng gis bya'o/_/dmangs rigs kyi dgra la ni de las 
[\[237a.2\]]gzhan pa'i shing gi me rab tu sbar la de nyid kyi las bya'o/_/bram ze la ni shing pa la sha'i yam shing dang rgyal rigs la ni a shwat+tha'i yam shing dang rje'u rigs la ni seng ldeng gi yam shing dang dmangs rigs la ni a pa marga'i yam shing ngam de las gzhan pa ji snyed 
[\[237a.3\]]pas mar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de bzhin du las gzhan yang bya ba ni/_rgyal po chen po la ni shing a pa ra dzi ta'i rtsa ba'i yam shing dang mar gyi sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o/_/tha mar yang de nyid kyi thal bas gtor bar bya'o/_/gang gi phyogs nas 
[\[237a.4\]]sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'ong ba de'i phyogs su gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba yi ge gcig pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas gtor ro/_/yang na ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcings na de 'jigs nas ldog pa'am/_dmag gi tshogs nyams par 'gyur ba'am/_gzhan gang cung 
[\[237a.5\]]zad rnam par ltung ba chen por 'gyur ba'am/_'go ba'i nad chen po'am/_sems sdug bsngal bar gnas pa'am/_gang gis 'di'i ngag ldog par 'gyur ba'am/_'di dag dang gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/_/gos la mngon par 
[\[237a.6\]]bsngags te bgos na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/_/mig sman la mngon par bsngags te mig la bskus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/mig dang gdong la lan bdun bsngags pa byas la khros pa'i gdong la bltas na zhi ba dang dbang du 'gyur ro/_/me tog dang 'bras 
[\[237a.7\]]bu'am gzhan gang cung zad dri zhim pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas la rgyal po la byin na de bsnams pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gzhan sems can gang la la mthong ba tsam gyis de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/yan lag thams cad na ba la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]bzlas pa byas la/_chu dron pos khrus byas na bde legs su gnas par 'gyur te las 'di rnams ni bya ba yin no/_/sems can sdug bsngal ba thams cad dang /_mgon med par gyur pa dang /_bkren pa dang /_bstan pa 'di'i brtul zhugs can dang /_dkon mchog gsum 
[\[237b.2\]]la dad pa la ni 'di lta bu'i las mi bya'o/_/bud med la yang las mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du byis pa dang rgan po dang nad pa dang dbul po dang sdug bsngal ba dang sems can phra mo dang skye gnas ngan par skyes pa 'di dag la yang mi bya ste/_las 'di dag ni sems can chen po dag la rab 
[\[237b.3\]]tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/dpa' zhing brkam chags bab chol med/_/phyogs chen nor ni che ba dang /_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab gtum la/_/las ni 'di 'dra bya ba yin/_/bstan la zhe sdang khro ba dang /_/gzhan gyi nor ni 'phrog byed dang /_/sngags rnams kun dang sman rnams dang /_/
[\[237b.4\]]rnal 'byor ldan la ma dad dang /_/spyis brtsan gdug pa'i sems ldan dang /_/'jig rten gyis smad rgyal po ste/_/'di dag la ni las sbyar bya/_/chos dang ldan la rnam par spang /_/las rnams gzhan yang 'di skad brjod/_/blo yis de ni yongs su spang /_/de nyid 
[\[237b.5\]]khros pas thal ba ni/_/bzlas pas phyogs su gtor byas na/_/de rnams dgra ni rab khros dang /_/rgyal po dag kyang rnam 'jig 'gyur/_/nges par skye bo de dag kyang /_/yun ring nad kyis thebs par 'gyur/_/de dag phyogs su 'chi ba mang /_/'go ba'i nad kyang rab 
[\[237b.6\]]tu snang /_/shin tu nyon mongs cher gyur kyang /_/las rnams 'di dag bya min te/_/der ni skye bo'i bdag po kun/_/zhag bdun gsum gyis nyams par 'gyur/_/las rnams brtsams nas sngon du ni/_/bdun phrag gnyis la yang dag brtul/_/bdun pa dang pos 
[\[237b.7\]]sems rnams g.yeng /_/zhag bdun gnyis pas nad kyis 'debs/_/bdun pa gsum gyis 'chi bar 'gyur/_/de bas de ni yongs su spang /_/dang po 'di dag rnam par 'byer/_/gnyis par phyogs su rnam par 'khyam/_/zhag bdun gsum par rnam par 'jig_/
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]de bas las 'di bya ba min/_/sems can gdul bya'i don nyid la/_/'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa yin/_/sangs rgyas thugs ni dag pa yis/_/gdug pa'i las 'di gsung mi 'gyur/_/srog la gnod par byed pa'i las/_/sangs 
[\[238a.2\]]rgyas kun gyis smad pa yin/_/grub pa mchog ni rab 'dod pa'i/_/zlos pa de dag bya ba min/_/dmyal ba dag tu skye ba'i las/_/'di dag nyid la rab tu snang /_/dkar nag 'bras bur 'byung byed pa/_/'di dag kho na bstan pa yin/_/las rnams sna tshogs 
[\[238a.3\]]bdag nyid che/_/rkang gnyis mchog gis ji bzhin gzigs/_/rtag tu dkar las dkar ba byung /_/nag las nag pa rab tu smin/_/'dres las 'dres pa'i las rnams ni/_/'dres pa dag tu rnam par smin/_/de bzhin las 'di sna tshogs su/_/de nyid sangs 
[\[238a.4\]]rgyas gzigs pa yi/_/thugs rje can gyis gsungs pa'o/_/de las zlos pa spang bya ba/_/nag dang 'dres pa'i las nyid do/_/dge byed dkar po bsten par bya/_/dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu 'byung /_/srog gcod pas ni zlos pa dag_/yang dang yang du dmyal 
[\[238a.5\]]bar 'gro/_/de bzhin de las log pa'i chos/_/'tshe med las ni dam pa yin/_/dge ba'i blos ni sngags rnams dang /_/de bzhin mtho ris thar pa 'grub/_/legs byas las kyis thob pa yin/_/'gal ba'i las kyis 'gal bar gsungs/_/ji ltar chos dang 
[\[238a.6\]]chos min gsungs/_/thams cad mkhyen nyid spyod pa yin/_/zlos pa grub par 'dod pa yis/_/dge ba'i las ni brtsam par bya/_/zlos pa dge la gnas pa la/_/de yi sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/dkar po'i las la gzhol byed la/_/de yi thar pa mi ldog 
[\[238a.7\]]'gyur/_/sngags kyis dge ba 'grub 'gyur zhes/_/de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs/_/las rnams sna tshogs gsungs pa ni/_/sgrub pa rnams la bsdus don yin/_/ci 'dod las ni stong phrag brgyad/_/phra mo'i las ni byed pa na/_/sgrub pa po ni mi 'grub ste/_/
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]grub pa mchog ni mi 'thob bo/_/'bad pas bzlas dang sbyin sreg bya/_/grub pa 'bring ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/cho ga mthong ba'i las kyi ni/_/tha ma myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/mchog dang tha ma bar ma yi/_/las ni rnam pa gsum du bstan/_/dka' thub can ni zlos 
[\[238b.2\]]mchog gis/_/de bzhin grub pa mchog thob 'gyur/_/de bzhin bzlas pa bar ma yis/_/bar ma las grub thob pa yin/_/de bzhin zlos pa tha mas ni/_/tha ma'i las la yang dag brten/_/grub pa phra mo thob par yang /_/gzhan gyi grub pa thob ma yin/_/dus 
[\[238b.3\]]dang tshod dang bzlas pa dang /_/sbyin sreg mthong bas de bzhin 'grub/_/mchog gis mchog ni 'grub pa dang /_/bar mas bar ma'i grub pa snang /_/tha mas tha ma'i las dag la/_/phran tshegs grub pa thob pa yin/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang 
[\[238b.4\]]chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/_yi ge gcig pa rtsa ba'i rgyud 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying po'i cho ga rab 'byam las/_le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang 
[\[238b.5\]]gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gzhan yang khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga sgrub pa'i thabs la las thams cad kyi don sgrub pa nyon cig_/'di nyid kyi yi ge gcig pa'i snying po'i sngags sam yi 
[\[238b.6\]]ge drug po ma'i mtha' can khyod kyi sngar bstan pa'i yi ge drug pa'i snying po'am dang po na o~M yod pa'i yi ge gcig pa'i ras ris dang po 'di nyid kyi cho gar 'gyur ba ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[238b.7\]]stongs shing rtsod pa'i dus tha mar phyin pa na 'jig rten skyob pa med pa dang skyabs med pa dang gnas med pa dang /_dpung gnyen med pa na/_cho ga'i rgyal po 'di nyid skyob par gyur pa dang /_skyabs su gyur pa dang /_gnas su gyur pa dang /_dpung gnyen du gyur par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]dang por re zhig snga ma bzhin du ras ma nyams pa skra shad dang bral ba/_zhag bdun nam zhag bdun gsum gyi bar du thag pas btags pa kha tshar dang bcas pa/_gur gum dang tsan+dan gyi chus bsang gtor byas te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya 
[\[239a.2\]]thub pa pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gzigs pa bri bar bya'o/_/g.yas phyogs su nor bzang dang 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa dang 'jam dpal yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa/_gzhon nu'i 
[\[239a.3\]]gzugs can lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o/_/g.yon phyogs su kun tu bzang po dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang bzang skyong dang legs skyes kyang bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las shin tu chung bar 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/
[\[239a.4\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang nor bzang ni lag na rnga yab thogs par bya'o/_/'og tu ni sa'i lha mo rin po che'i za ma tog lag na thogs pa/_ro stod sa las byung ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/steng du ni rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon nu gnyis phreng ba 'dzin pa sprin 
[\[239a.5\]]gyi nang nas char gtong ba rig pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang lag na me tog thogs pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la rnam par lta ba dang rgyan dang ldan pa/_dang ba'i lta ba dang ro stod bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dud pa dang bcas 
[\[239a.6\]]pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/de 'di lta bu'i ras ris sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du nub tu bstan te bzhag la 'jam dpal 'di'i yi ge gcig pa bzlas pa 'bum bya'o/_/shing bzhin du mi smra ba'i dka' thub dang dus gsum du khrus byed pa dang gos lan gsum 
[\[239a.7\]]brje ba dang rtag tu gso sbyong byed pa dang /_tshod rngad dang nas chan khyor gang tsam dang 'o ma dang slong mo'i zas kyis 'tsho ba'o/_/zas kyang cha rnam pa bzhir bya ste/_cha gcig ni dkon mchog gsum la'o/_/gnyis pa ni 'jam dpal la'o/_/gsum pa ni sems can thams 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]cad la'o/_/bzhi pa ni bdag nyid nye bar spyad par bya'o/_/mi dub pa'i lus kyis bcom ldan 'das yid la bya ste/_sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i yid dang bdag nyid kyi don ci yang mi byed cing gzhan sems can thams cad kyi don 'dir bya'o zhes bsgoms 
[\[239b.2\]]nas bzlas pa bya'o/_/khrus dang dri dang me tog dang spos dang bshos dang mar me dag kyang dbul bar bya'o/_/khrus ni ras ris kyi grib ma'am gzugs brnyan la bya'o/_/dri ni 'og tu gtor bar bya'o/_/me tog dang bshos kyang rtag tu dbul lo/_/de nyid du 'di 
[\[239b.3\]]dag la sngar mchod par bya ste/_dang po dkon mchog gsum dang /_de'i 'og tu byams pa dang /_de'i 'og tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang /_nam mkha'i snying po dang /_'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa dang /_zla 'od gzhon nu dang /_sgrib pa thams 
[\[239b.4\]]cad rnam par sel ba dang /_'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin dang /_'phags ma sgrol ma dang /_'phags ma rma bya chen mo dang /_'phags ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang /_bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la dri dang /_me tog dang spos dang gtor ma dang mar me 'di 
[\[239b.5\]]dag thams cad la sngar mchod nas phyis ras ris la mchod par bya ste/_de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs 'ga' zhig tu sbrul dang rnga mo dang bong bu dang glang po che dang log 'dren gyi gzugs grog mkhar gyis las byas te de dag gi lhag ma sbyin par bya'o/_/sems kyis dran par bya ba ni til 
[\[239b.6\]]gyi tshigs ma dang gu gul gyi tshigs ma dang til las byas pa'i bza' ba dang rgya sran dang nya dang sha dang skyu ru ra dang bcas pa dang ba ra ta ka'i bza' ba dang pad+ma'i lo ma dang khar ba'i snod rnams kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/ku sha'i khres la 'dug cing de nyid du gnas nas/_sangs rgyas 
[\[239b.7\]]rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste yid kyis bzlas pa bya'o/_/dben pa'i gnas gzhan du ku sha stan du gding bar bya'o/_/ha cang btung ba mang ba dang ha cang bza' ba mang ba dang ha cang 'gro ba mang ba dang ha cang lta ba dang ha cang nyal ba spang bar bya'o/_/dus gsum du sangs rgyas 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]rjes su dran par bya'o/_/sa bon bsdam par yang bya'o/_/rmi lam bzang po rnams gzhan la rab tu bstan par mi bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar brjod par bya'o/_/de bzhin du mthar gyis ha cang mi myur bar yi ge gcig pa'i bzlas pa 'bum 
[\[240a.2\]]bya'o/_/tha mar yang bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma bklag par bya'o/_/bzlas pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das sam yang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i zhal du bltas la/_tshig dang yi ge ma 'khrugs pas bzlas brjod bya zhing bgrang phreng la 
[\[240a.3\]]phyag byas te dbul bar bya'o/_/cho ga 'dis sngon du bsnyen pa byas te/_gang du yid dge ba yod pa'i gnas dag tu ras ris de gzhag par bya'o/_/ras ris kyi cho ga dang po rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal tsan+dan dkar po las byas pa 
[\[240a.4\]]pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma phyag gcig na 'dzin pa/_phyag g.yas pa na ma du lung ga'i 'bras bu 'dzin pa bya'o/_/de gtsang ba'i phyogs gcig tu nub phyogs su bstan la gzhag par byas la de'i mdun du me thab byas 
[\[240a.5\]]te/_las thams cad la zur bzhi pa mtho do tsam gyi tshad du bya zhing 'og tu 'bru thams cad gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas de'i steng du bya ba ni cho ga 'dis me sar pa bskyed de/_shing a shwat+tha'am mya ngan med kyi yam shing dang mar dang 'bras thug po che'i chan dang 'o ma dang zho dang 
[\[240a.6\]]sbrang rtsi thams cad blangs te/_zangs ma'i snod du gzhag par byas la stong rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas shing blugs gzar gyis sbyin par bya'o/_/phyi nas nyin zhag gzhan la yar ngo'i tshes nas brtsams te las bya'o/_/shing a shwat+tha'i yam shing gi me rab tu sbar la du ba med par 
[\[240a.7\]]mthong na me spyan drang bar bya ste/_A gats+tsha ha ri ping+ga la/_dIp+ta dzi hwa lo hi tAk+Sha/_de hi da dA pa ya swA hA/_sngags 'dis sreg blugs gsum dbul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa spyan drang bar bya ste/_A gats+tsha/_A gats+tsha/_ku mA ra b+hU ta sarba satwAr+tha 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]mu d+ya to\u0f85 haM/_sA hA y+Yekalpa ya/_gan+d+haM d+hU paM tsa pra ti gr-ih+Na swA hA/_gang sbyin par byed pa de sngags 'dis sbyin par bya'o/_/byon na mchod yon dri zhim po'i me tog dang chu dbul bar bya ste de nas sbyin sreg bya'o/_/sreg blugs la lan bdun bzlas te lan cig gtor ro/_/
[\[240b.2\]]de bzhin du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du mar dang 'bras thug po che'i chan gyis tshim par bya'o/_/skabs 'dir nges par 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/tsan+dan gyi yam shing sor gnyis tsam gyi tshad kyis stong rtsa brgyad byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[240b.3\]]me tog pad+ma la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags nas sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na nor rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/shing shri sha'i me'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar la til gyi sbyin sreg byas na nor gyi bdag por 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu chus chu la sbyin sreg byas te nang par langs na 
[\[240b.4\]]skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/shing arka'i yam shing dang zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags la sbyin sreg 'bum byas na/_gang bsod snyoms stong dang ldan pa thob bo/_/shing ba hu pu tri ka zhes bya bas sbyin sreg byas na bu mo gang 'dod pa de rnyed do/_/shing a pa 
[\[240b.5\]]margas sbyin sreg byas na nad rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'o ma can gyi shing gi me rab tu sbar la til gyi sbyin sreg byas na gang sems par byed pa de thob bo/_/yul 'dod pas pad+ma'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na yul rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/nang gi sbyin sreg 'bum byas na zas mi zad 
[\[240b.6\]]pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gu gul dang me tog pri yang ku mar dang lhan cig sbyin sreg bya'o/_/shing arka dang sna ma'i me tog gis chu la sbyin pa byas na zhag bdun gyis grong thob par 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i me tog gi chu la me tog re re blangs te sbyin pa byas pa dang lhag ma dkyil 
[\[240b.7\]]'khor la bzhag na/_gang la snom du bcug pa de bsnams pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gur gum dang gla rtsi dang li shi'i me tog khar bcug ste/_bzlas pa byas na gang dang lhan cig gtam byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/na le sham la stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]te khar bcug na khros pa yang tshig gis dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gtsug pud la 'di nyid kyi sngags kyis bcings na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/yid la rjes su dran na dgras mthong na yang khro ba med par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas pa byas na skye bo thams 
[\[241a.2\]]cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/tho rangs chen po nas langs nas gtsang ba'i phyogs su sna ma'i me tog dang ldan par chu la sbyin pa byas na tshig btsun par 'gyur ba'i blon por 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa yang dag par byung bar gyur na yid la byas pas 'jigs pa med par 'gyur 
[\[241a.3\]]ro/_/pha rol khros par gyur pa la yang byams pa bsgoms nas rjes su dran zhing gdong la rnam par bltas na khro ba med par 'gyur ro/_/dri zhim po'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na gang gi ched du byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/tho rangs lan bdun chu la bsngags te 
[\[241a.4\]]'thungs na nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyang zad par 'gyur ro/_/lan bdun bsngags pa'i chus gdong rab tu bkrus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/me tog la lan bdun bsngags pas gzhan la byin na de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'bras thug po ches 
[\[241a.5\]]sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gcig byas na slob dpon nyid du 'gyur ro/_/til gyi sbyin sreg gis ni yul gyi bdag por 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma'i sbyin sreg stong byas na ti na ra stong thob par 'gyur ro/_/gu gul dang sra rtsi pog dang gan da ra sa dang ga pur rnams dpa' bo'i nyo tshong gis 
[\[241a.6\]]nyos nas gcig tu byas la/_sbyin sreg byas te tshes lnga lnga zhing zla ba drug yongs su tshang bar byas na stong 'gyur thob par 'gyur ro/_/dri thams cad pa'i gzugs brnyan byas te mtshon rnon po so gcig pas skyes pa yi ni rkang pa g.yas pa bud med kyi ni rkang pa g.yon pa bcad 
[\[241a.7\]]cing sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun la dus gsum du dar du ra ka'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na ba rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/arka'i me tog gis byas na 'bru rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/shri sha'i me tog gis byas na rta rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]shing mya ngan med kyis byas na gser thob par 'gyur ro/_/nad 'joms par byed pa'i me tog gis byas na gos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang de thams cad ni sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg byas na byed par 'gyur te/_me tog ci 'dra ba'i kha dog gis chu 
[\[241b.2\]]la nyi ma shar ba'i dus su sbyin sreg byas na de dang kha dog 'dra ba'i gos thob par 'gyur ro/_/mig sman la lan bdun bzlas pa byas te/_slong mo la 'gro na slong mo mi zad pa thob bo/_/rmi lam ngan pa mthong nas langs te bdag nyid kyis bzlas pa byas nas yang nyal na rmi lam 
[\[241b.3\]]bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po dbang du byed par 'dod na de'i rkang pa'i rdul rnams blangs te/_yungs kar dang til dang bsres nas zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byed na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal mo dbang du byed par 'dod na lcam pa'i lo ma 
[\[241b.4\]]dang shud ti dang sman ba ra hi rnams gcig tu byas te/_zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/blon po dbang du byed par 'dod na go bye dang til dang shu dag rnams kyis gzugs brnyan byas te/_zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na 
[\[241b.5\]]dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mdun na 'don dbang du byed par 'dod na spos pra ma tsa ri dang shu ti gcig tu byas te/_zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bram ze rnams dbang du byed par 'dod na ni/_'o thug mar dang lhan cig pas zhag bdun la 
[\[241b.6\]]dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal rigs dbang du byed par 'dod na/_'bras sA lu'i chan mar dang ldan pas zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o/_/rje'u rigs dbang du byed par 'dod na/_nas chan khyor gang bu ram dang ldan pas 
[\[241b.7\]]zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/til gyi tshigs sam mar gyis sbyin sreg byas na dmangs rigs dbang du 'gyur ro/_/thams cad gcig tu byas te sbyin sreg byas nas bzhi mdo'am khang stong ngam shing gcig pa dag tu gtor ma btang na nad pa 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]de de las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gdong la bltas te bzlas pa byas na nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gtsug pud la bcings na nad thams cad las yongs su grol lo/_/nad thams cad la ni skud pa la mdud pa bya 
[\[242a.2\]]zhing gtsug pud bcing ba byas te/_bzlas pa byas na nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/nad kyis btab pa la ni bzlas pa tsam gyis yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/mgul pa'i nad la ni grog mkhar gyi sa la bzlas pa byas te/_'de gus byug pa byas na nad 
[\[242a.3\]]las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/mig gi nad la ni zar ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg byas na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi cho ga'i las gzhan yang sngar bstan pa'i cho gas ras ma nyams pa/_skra med pa la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'drir gzhug par 
[\[242a.4\]]bya ste/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_kha dog dmar ba/_gzhon nu'i gzugs can/_pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/_g.yas ngos su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug_/g.yon ngos su kun tu bzang po 'phags pa 'jam dpal las cung zad chung ba/_
[\[242a.5\]]ras ris de bzhag la bzlas pa bye ba byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/tsan+dan gyi yam shing la gur gum gyis btags pas sbyin sreg 'bum byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i me tog mar gyis btags pas sbyin sreg bye ba byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshad 
[\[242a.6\]]dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i tshogs kyis sbyin sreg byas pa de'i tshad kyi ti na ra'i tshogs rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/ji srid du bzlas pa de tsam gyi tshad dang ldan pa'i ti na ra ma blangs pa de ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/go bye'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na ti na ra stong 
[\[242a.7\]]sbyin par byed do/_/nad 'joms par byed pa'i 'bras bus sbyin sreg 'bum byas na nor bdag chen por 'gyur ro/_/gu gul gyi yam shing stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas na nor dang 'bru rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu til gyis sbyin sreg byas na 'bru rgyun mi chad 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]par rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/ba glang gi lci ba las byung ba'i 'bras thug po che zho dang bcas pas sbyin sreg 'bum byas na ba stong thob par 'gyur ro/_/bo de tse'i 'bras bu dang sho ma'i 'bras bu gcig tu byas te sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa'i bu mo rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/sho 
[\[242b.2\]]ma'i lo mas sbyin sreg byas na 'dod pa thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro/_/zar ma'i me tog la 'o mas btags pas sbyin sreg bya ba ni bram ze dbang du bya ba la'o/_/shing ka ra bI ra'i me tog la shing 'o ma can 'o ma med pas sbyin sreg bya ba ni rgyal rigs dbang du bya ba 
[\[242b.3\]]la'o/_/dong ka'i me tog gis sbyin sreg bya ba ni rgyal po dbang du bya ba la'o/_/d+ha du ra'i me tog gis sbyin sreg bya ba ni dmangs rigs dbang du bya ba la'o/_/shing arka'i me tog la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pas sbyin sreg 'bum byas na nad thams cad las 
[\[242b.4\]]yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/'di nyid kyi cho gas me tog dri zhim pa la lan 'bum bzlas te/_zhabs kyi drung du bzhag na rtag tu bde bar 'gyur ro/_/shing a shwat+tha'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar la sha ma'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na/_rgyu skar gyi gnod pa nye bar zhi 
[\[242b.5\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/gi wang la sngags mngon par bris te spyi bo la bcings nas g.yul du 'jug na/_mtshon gyis reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ras ris glang po che'i mtshog ma la bzhag ste/_dpung gi tshogs kyi sngon du btang 
[\[242b.6\]]na mthong ba tsam gyis gzhan gyi dpung 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu'i gzugs can gser gyi rma bya'i gdan la bzhugs pa bya ste/_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags nas g.yul du zhugs na mthong ba nyid kyis gzhan gyi dpung 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i me tog la lan 
[\[242b.7\]]'bum bzlas te zhabs drung du bzhag la de nyid du ku sha bting ba'i stan byas na rmi lam du 'di la ji ltar 'dod pa ston par 'gyur ro/_/mar me stong la de bzhin du mar me re re la yang pad+ma'i skud pa'i snying po byas te/_shing mngar gyis dkri ba byas la me rab tu sbar nas phul na/_nges par 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ji lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi cho ga gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//gser ram dngul las gzhon nu'i gzugs byas te phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa dang /_g.yon pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha 
[\[243a.2\]]rol tu phyin ma'i glegs bam 'dzin pa 'di lta bu sku gdung gi za ma tog mdun du bzhag la yi ge gcig pa'i bzlas pa 'bum bya'o/_/mchod pa rnams ni nyin par bya'o/_/zhabs g.yon pa'i mdun du bu mo la kha zas sbyin par bya'o/_/glu dang rol mo dang glegs bam bklag 
[\[243a.3\]]par yang bya'o/_/bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang me tog gsum gyis mchod yon gsol te slar gshegs su gsol lo/_/cho ga snga ma bzhin du spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/_/pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni bzlas pa bya'o/_/rgya mtshan gyi phyag 
[\[243a.4\]]rgyas ni spyan drang bar bya'o/_/bkra shis ldan gyi phyag rgyas ni bzhugs su gsol lo/_/gang ba'i phyag rgyas ni mchod yon no/_/rtags gcig pa'i phyag rgyas ni me tog dbul lo/_/yid la re ba'i phyag rgyas ni mar me'o/_/g.yo ba'i phyag rgyas ni spos so/_/
[\[243a.5\]]rma bya'i gdan gyi phyag rgyas ni dri'o/_/srog shing gi phyag rgyas ni bshos so/_/cho ga 'di nyid kyis mtshan mo dang nyi ma re re zhing ji srid bzlas pa rdzogs kyi bar du bya'o/_/phyi nas ni las rnams bya'o/_/sna ma'i me tog gis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu bo la 'bum gyis gtor na yul 
[\[243a.6\]]thob par 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo sna ma'i me tog gi tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du byas nas nyal na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor ba chos 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi don du byed pa de nyid kyi las bya'o/_/gso sbyong byas 
[\[243a.7\]]shing yar ngo'i tshes nas brtsams te/_ga pur sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa'i spos kyis sbyin sreg byas na rgyal thabs thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzlas pa bye ba byas na 'jam dpal rang nyid mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/chos 'chad par yang mdzad de/_de dang lhan cig smra ba dang mngon sum du snang 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]bar yang 'gyur ro/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi cho ga gsum pa rdzogs so//_//tsan+dan dmar po las byas pa'i gzhon nu'i gzugs can phyogs gcig na gnod sbyin dga' bar byed pa/_phyogs gnyis pa na ni 'phrog 
[\[243b.2\]]ma shing mya ngan med kyi rtsa na 'dug pa de 'dra ba bzhag la/_lan tshwa dang yungs kar dang ske tshe dang bsres pa'i tsan+dan dmar po'i gzugs brnyan byas nas bcad cing bcad cing sbyin sreg byas na gang gi ming bzung ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/shing u dum bA ra'i 'bras bus gang 
[\[243b.3\]]gi ming bzung zhing sbyin sreg byas na de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rgya shug gi 'bras bus sbyin sreg byas na gang gi ming bzung ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/khwa dang 'dra ba'i shing u dum bA ras sbyin sreg byas na gang gi ming bzung ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/shing sring ga ta gas sbyin sreg 
[\[243b.4\]]bya ba ni bram ze dbang du bya ba la'o/_/pad+ma'i rtsa ba ni rgyal rigs dbang du bya ba la'o/_/ut+pa la'i rtsa bas sbyin sreg bya ba ni dmangs rigs dbang du bya ba la'o/_/lan tshwa dang sha kha ras sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad nyi ma bdun la dus gsum du byas na gang gi ming gis sbyin sreg byas 
[\[243b.5\]]pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/nim pa'i lo ma la yungs mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs kyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad zhag bdun la dus gsum du byas na gang gi ming gis byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/thams cad kyi sbyin sreg byas na thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/sman bri ha ti'i me tog 
[\[243b.6\]]gis sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gser rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/shing ka lany+dzA ri ka'i me tog la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na grong chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/ba ta la'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na 'bru mi zad pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/bil ba'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na 
[\[243b.7\]]gser rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/shu dag la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags te sbyin sreg byas na rgol ba thams cad la lan 'debs nus par 'gyur ro/_/sman bram hi'i khu bcud mar dang ldan pa zangs ma'i snod du bzhag la/_bzlas pa khri rdzogs pa'i bar du bzlas nas de nas 'thungs 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]na rgol ba thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/shin tu zhe sdang ba la ni stong rtsa brgyad bong ba la mngon par bsngags te khros pa'i mdun du bor na khro ba med par 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi cho ga bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//ras mnyam pa skra med pa la 
[\[244a.2\]]ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas pa/_tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis 'phags pa 'jam dpal pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/g.yon phyogs su 'phags pa 'og pag chen mo/_g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[244a.3\]]gzugs can ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_gos dkar po bgos pa bri bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu pad+ma'i mtsho me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab pa na klu'i rgyal po gnyis ro stod chu'i nang nas byung ba/_pad+ma'i sdong bu la lag pas 'dzin pa'o/_/'phags pa gzhan gyis 
[\[244a.4\]]mi thub ma phyogs gcig tu bri bar bya ste/_log 'dren gyi bgegs 'jigs par byed pa/_me 'bar bar mngon par 'byin pa/_spyan khro gnyer can du byas pa/_phyogs gzhan du ri khrod ma lo ma gyon pa/_zhags pa dang dgra sta lag na thogs pa/_kha dog nag pa/_mig 
[\[244a.5\]]dmar ba/_rma bya'i rgyab tu zhon pa/_sgrub pa po la srung bar byed pa bri bar bya'o/_/sgrub pa po yang pad+ma'i phreng ba lag na thogs shing /_bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi zhal la rnam par blta bar bya'o/_/steng du ni rnga yab dang me tog gi phreng ba dang rnga 'dzin pa'i lha'i bu rnams bri 
[\[244a.6\]]bar bya'o/_/ras ris de nub tu bstan te bzhag la sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du bzlas pa bye ba bya'o/_/bzlas pa'i mtha' mar me'i mchod pa chen po bya zhing /_bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma bklags la bzlas pa stong phrag bcu 'jam 
[\[244a.7\]]dpal gzhon nu'i zhal la lta zhing bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas ras ris 'gul bar gyur na rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i mig thob cing rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba chen por yang 'gyur ro/_/bzlas shing bzlas na byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]sa dang po thob par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i chos ston pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/ras ris de nyid kyi mdun du ba ser mo be'u yod pa'i mar khu blangs la zangs ma'i snod du bzhag nas ji srid du dro bar 'gyur ba dang du ba 'thul bar 'gyur ba dang rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ba de srid du 
[\[244b.2\]]bzlas pa byas na/_dro bar gyur pa na 'thungs na ni mchog tu yid gzhungs pa dang thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/du ba 'thul ba na 'thungs na ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rab tu 'bar ba na 'thungs na ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/kham phor so ma btang ba kha 
[\[244b.3\]]sbyar la shu dag sna ma'i me tog gis dkris pa bzhag la/_ji srid myu gu 'byung ba de'i bar du bzlas brjod bya ste de zos na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/bzlas brjod gzhan bye ba byas na 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong zhing chos ston pa yang thos la de la dad par yang 'gyur ro/_/
[\[244b.4\]]gser gyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyar bya ste/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_ji srid 'bar gyi bar du bzlas pa byas na de blangs pa tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/ldong ros sam ba bla'am lig 
[\[244b.5\]]bu mig gam bil ba'i lo ma chu la bcug ste ji srid khu la khu la zhes bya ba'i sgra byed pa de srid du bzlas na/_de blangs pa tsam gyis sa la spyod pa'i srin po dang sha za rnams kyi bdag po dang mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshan nyid dang ldan pa rma med cing ma 'dres pa'i ral gri blangs la ji srid 
[\[244b.6\]]sbrul gyi gdengs ka bzhin du byas te/_'dug pa de srid du bzlas pa byas la de nas de blangs na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal par tshe gnas pa dang gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/ldos ros lcags gsum gyis dkri ba byas te khar bcug la ji 
[\[244b.7\]]srid tsu lu tsu lu'i sgra byung ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na thub pa med par 'gyur ro/_/dgra thams cad 'joms par byed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs thams cad dbang du byed de 'dod pa dbang du byed pa ni ma gtogs so/_/shing sha mi las skyes pa'i shing a shwat+tha'i snying po blangs la/_lcags 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]gsum gyis dkri ba byas nas khar rab tu bcug na ji srid tsu lu tsu lu'i sgra 'byung ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/dngul gyi 'khor lo byas te lha ma yin gyi khung bu'i sgor bzhag la/_ji srid du 'khor los lha 
[\[245a.2\]]ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor bcad nas rab tu 'jug pa de'i bar du bzlas pa byas na de'i mod la lha ma yin gyi na chung rnams byung nas/_de dang lhan cig rab tu zhugs nas bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/lcags las byas pa'i mdung rtse gsum byas te/_khung bu de dag gi sgor 
[\[245a.3\]]bzlas pa byed na/_der 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing /_ji snyed sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dang lhan cig 'dod pa de snyed dang lhan cig rab tu 'jug cing bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/byams pa yang bzhugs shing de mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/_/ras 
[\[245a.4\]]ris kyi cho ga lnga pa'o//_//shing arka dkar po las mthe bo tsam gyi bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal byas la/_shing arka'i me tog 'bum phul na blon po chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/shing ka ra bI ra dkar po'i rtsa ba las mthe bo tsam byas te/_'di nyid kyi me tog bye ba gcig 
[\[245a.5\]]phul na bka' la gtogs par 'gyur ro/_/shing ka ra hA Ta las mtho gang gi tshad tsam du byas la de'i me tog 'bum phul na dmag dpon thob par 'gyur ro/_/tsan+dan dkar po las mtho phyed tsam gyi bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal byas la sna ma'i me tog 'bum phul na mdun na 
[\[245a.6\]]'don thob par 'gyur ro/_/shing a shwat+tha las sor gcig tsam gyi tshad du byas la/_rnyog pa med pa'i chus bum pa bkang ba phul na skye bo mang pos bkur bar 'gyur ro/_/dri thams cad las byas la me tog thams cad phul na gang 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[245a.7\]]rtag tu yul ma ga d+hA'i yam shing ma nyams pas sbyin sreg byas na blon po skye bo mang pos bkur bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas pa byas na mtshams med pa lnga yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/shi ba'i dus su yang 'jam dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'di la chos ston par 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]yang mdzad do/_/langs shing langs shing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na sems can thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/mig la yongs su bzlas na bdag po mthong zhing bka' drin stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi ched du las byas pa nyin zhag bdun gyis de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[245b.2\]]grong gzhan du gnas pa la ni zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis so/_/yul gzhan la gnas pa la ni zla ba gnyis so/_/gzhon nu'i bdag po'i cho gas yin gyi/_/sngags gzhan gyi cho gas ma yin na/_las ma lus par byed par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa dang mngon spyod dbang du 
[\[245b.3\]]byed pa ni ma gtogs so/_/cho ga drug pa 'di bstan pa/_/dus kyi mtha' la sems can rnams/_/bsod nams chung la phan don du/_/thub pas sngon ni bstan pa yin/_/shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi/_/bstan pa nub par gyur pa na/_/dus ni mi bzad 'jigs pa 
[\[245b.4\]]na/_/de tshe grub par 'gyur ba yin/_/cho ga'i rgyal po bde byed pa/_/bdun pa 'dir ni bshad par bya/_/de tshe dus ni mi bzad la/_/cho ga 'di ni nga yis bshad/_/sems can bsod nams chung ba la/_/lam ni 'di dag rab tu bstan/_/byang chub tshogs kyi rgyu don 
[\[245b.5\]]du/_/theg gsum lam la rab tu gzhol/_/de yi dus su sems can la/_/thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa yin/_/sred pas rmongs pa'i sems can dang /_/'dod chags zhe sdang gis 'khrugs pa/_/srid pa mthar ni gtug bya'i phyir/_/de dag la bstan lam 'di 
[\[245b.6\]]yin/_/sred pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa la/_/dge ba'am dge ba'i las kyi rgyur/_/grub dang sgrub dang de bzhin rdzas/_/sngags dang rgyud ni nga yis bstan/_/sgrub pa zlos pa rnams la 'dir/_/cho ga'i rgyal po bdag nyid che/_/sems can rnams ni gdul don du/_/
[\[245b.7\]]'jig rten 'dren pa rnams kyis gsungs/_/shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog_/thub pa mchog gis de gsungs nas/_/de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/_/grub pa don yod bstan pa dang /_/sngags dang rgyud kyi stobs dang ni/_/brtson 'grus rgya che ldan bstan nas/_/de tshe gnas 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]gtsang lha tshogs la/_/rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs pa ni/_/cho ga'i rgyal po rgya che ba/_/'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bstan pa la/_/grogs po de ni nga yis bstan/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho 
[\[246a.2\]]ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/_cho ga'i bya ba 'jam dpal gyi cho ga rab 'byam las/_le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med 
[\[246a.3\]]khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u las ras ris kyi cho ga bdun pa yod de/_gang gis dus kyi mtha' ma de la bsgrub par gyur na de la don yod par 'grub par 'gyur te/_'bras bu dang bcas pa bde 
[\[246a.4\]]ba 'byung ba/_bde bar rnam par smin pa/_mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba/_ngan song thams cad las zlog par byed pa/_nges par byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po gsungs 
[\[246a.5\]]pa ni/_yi ge drug pa 'gro ba drug las grol bar byed pa'i bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_mi mnyam pa/_zla med pa/_rdzu 'phrul che ba/_srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad dang sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal las grol bar byed pa/_'byung po thams cad kyis bzod par dka' ba/_
[\[246a.6\]]'jig rten thams cad kyis ma gos pa/_'byung po thams cad kyis mi thub pa/_sred pa'i las thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par byed pa/_ma rungs pa thams cad zlog par byed pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bar 
[\[246a.7\]]mdzad pa/_phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed pa/_'jam dpal gyi bstan pa la sngags thams cad kyi mchog de gang zhe na/_o~M bA kye da~M na maH/_'di'i cho gar 'gyur ba ni/_tshod rngad dam/_nas chan khyor gang ngam/_slong mo'i zas kyis 'tsho la/_dus gsum du khrus 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]byed cing gos lan gsum brje bas yi ge 'bum byas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/kha tshar gyi rtse mo ma bcad pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas pas/_tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis 'phags pa 'jam dpal pad+ma'i gdan la chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa/_rgyan 
[\[246b.2\]]thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_gzhon nu'i gzugs su 'dug pa bla gos phrag par gzar ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/_g.yas su ni 'phags pa kun tu bzang po/_/steng du ni rig pa 'dzin pa 
[\[246b.3\]]gnyis phreng ba thogs shing sprin gyi nang nas byung ba bri bar bya'o/_/'og tu ni sgrub pa po lag na spos snod thogs pa'o/_/khor yug tu ni ri'i rtse mo'i 'og tu ni pad+ma'i mtsho 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang ras ris nub tu bstan te rab tu bzhag 
[\[246b.4\]]la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas mar gyi mar me yang rab tu sbar zhing sna ma'i me tog la re re la yang mngon par bzlas nas me tog stong rtsa brgyad 'jam dpal gyi zhal la gtor ro/_/de nas zab pa chen po'i yi ge hU~M gi sgra thos pa'am ras ris rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur ro/_/yi ge hU~M gi 
[\[246b.5\]]sgras ni sa kun la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/ras ris 'gul bas ni rgol ba thams cad la lan 'debs nus pa dang /_'jig rten pa thams cad kyi bstan bcos shes par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste ma grub kyang las thams cad la nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni cho ga dang 
[\[246b.6\]]po'o/_/a ga ru'i yam shing sor phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad la/_tu ruSh+ka'i thang chus sil ha ras btags pas seng ldeng gi mdag ma du ba med pa la mtshan thog thag tu sbyin sreg byas na/_skya rengs 'char ba tsam na 'phags pa 'jam dpal mthong bar 'gyur zhing /_de ci 'dod pa'i 
[\[246b.7\]]mchog stsol bar 'gyur te/_'dod pa dbang du bya ba ni ma gtogs so/_/de nyid kyi ras ris kyi mdun du tsan+dan gyi spos kyi rgyun chad pa med par mtshan thog thag tu bdugs te/_bzlas pa byas na de'i 'og tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du gshegs te zab mo'i chos 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]ston pa de la mos par 'gyur ro/_/mos nas kyang nad thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_dbang thob par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/_/tsan+dan dmar po las byas pa'i pad+ma rtsa lag dang bcas pa sor drug tsam 
[\[247a.2\]]tsan+dan dmar po'i 'de gus bskus nas/_lan stong bsngags shing dgang gzar gyis lan stong blug pa byas la/_zla ba nya la ras ris kyi mdun du pad+ma'i snod bzhag la lag pas bzung nas ji srid rab tu 'bar ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na/_de bzung bas lo bcu drug gi na tshod 
[\[247a.3\]]dang mdog gser btso ma 'dra ba dang nyi ma bas lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang lha gzhon nu lta bur 'gyur ba dang rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis phyag byas pa dang bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/lus zhig nas mngon par dga' bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/zla ba gzas 
[\[247a.4\]]zin pa la shu dag dkar po blangs la ba'i rnam lngas bkrus te/_shing a shwat+tha'i lo mas bkab pa byas la ji srid drod dang du ba 'thul ba dang 'bar ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/_dro ba byung bas ni skye bo thams cad dbang du 'gyur ba dang rgol ba thams cad las rgyal bar 
[\[247a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang ba dang stong phrag sum cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/'bar bas ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/ba ser skya'i be'u dang bcas pa'i mar khu blangs la/_zangs ma'i snod du shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma bdun gyis bkab ste 
[\[247a.6\]]bzhag la/_ji srid grub pa rnam gsum thob pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas la de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin pa dang mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/sman pu skar mU la'i sa bon zla ba gzas zin pa la khar bcug na ji srid du tsu lu tsu lu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ba de srid 
[\[247a.7\]]du bzlas pa byas la/_sman de phyung nas lcags gsum gyis yongs su dkri ba byas la yang khar rab tu bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sman de skyugs na ni snang bar 'gyur ro/_/li shi dri zhim po khar bcug la bzlas pa 'bum byas na gang dang smra ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'o ma dang nas chan khyor 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]gang za zhing bzlas pa 'bum phrag bcu gnyis byas na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/slong mo'i zas kyis 'tsho la shing bzhin du mi smra ba'i dka' thub byed cing bzlas pa 'bum byed na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bzlas pa bya ba byas na ji ltar srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'phags 
[\[247b.2\]]pa 'jam dpal chos ston pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas pa byas na don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi gzugs brnyan dri thams cad pas byas la bcad cing sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gu gul gyi ril bu rgya shug gi tshig gu'i 
[\[247b.3\]]tshad tsam la mar gyis btags pas brgya phrag stong gi sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/til la zho dang mar gyis btags pas sbyin sreg 'bum phrag stong byas na thams cad kyi dam pa'i khyim gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur ro/_/ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor 
[\[247b.4\]]byas la/_de la me tog gis gcal du bkram ste/_bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas la de nas dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklag par byas na/_zla ba gcig gis mchog tu yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/_/gi wang la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te dpral bar thig le byas na skye bo thams cad 
[\[247b.5\]]dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gtsug pud la lan bdun bzlas pa byas na sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa med par 'gyur ro/_/me tog gi ri ma las sbyin sreg 'bum byas na nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin re zhing bzlas pa bdun bdun byas na nges par myong bar 'gyur 
[\[247b.6\]]ba'i las rnams zad par 'gyur ro/_/bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/le'u bdun pa'i ras ris kyi cho ga'o//_//'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po 
[\[247b.7\]]che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las 'jam dpal gyi ras ris kyi cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam las/_nyi shu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyi sngags dang rgyud dang rig pa'i rgyal po dang 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor la sogs pa dang sngags thams cad kyi grub pa'i gnas yod de/_de yang mdor na byang phyogs 
[\[248a.2\]]su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur te/_rgya dang rgya ni che nyid la/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab 'grub 'gyur/_/gang yang de yi sngags rnams ni/_/der ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/_/gtsug tor rgyal po thams cad dang /_/de dag 
[\[248a.3\]]tu ni grub par snang /_/kA bi she dang bag kha la/_/o Ti ya ni 'khor yug yul/_/kha che dang ni sin d+hu'i yul/_/kha ba can gyi mtshams kun dang /_/byang phyogs su ni gnas brten la/_/dge ba'i sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/gang yang sangs rgyas sngon gsungs 
[\[248a.4\]]dang /_/da ltar yang ni gsungs pa dang /_/ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /_/zhi ba'i rgyur ni gsungs pa ste/_/kha ba can ri'i nang byung ba/_/der ni thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/skye bo skal ldan bzang po ni/_/zhi ba'i las ni rtsom par byed/_/de bzhin 
[\[248a.5\]]sngags ni yul dbus su/_/pad+ma'i rigs ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/mdzod dang nor bu'i rigs dag kyang /_/der ni 'grub par rab tu snang /_/gnod sbyin lngas rtsen dag dang ni/_/'phrog ma gnod sbyin skye gnas dang /_/gang dag dri za'i sngags rnams ni/_/de 
[\[248a.6\]]dag tu ni grub par gsungs/_/de nas rtag tu ku sha'i grong /_/ma ga d+hA ni khor yug dang /_/ngogs dga' chu bo snar ma dang /_/bang ga'i yul ni thams cad du/_/de bzhin nor bu'i rigs gsungs pa'i/_/dzam b+ha la ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho dang na gling 
[\[248a.7\]]ngogs dang /_/chu yi gzi ni thams cad dang /_/dga' ba'i grong khyer sing ha lar/_/sngags kyi lha ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/sgrol ma khro gnyer can dag dang /_/dpal chen ma dang grags chen ma/_/gdugs dkar rnams kyi sngags rnams dang /_/zla ba'i 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]grong khyer rgya mtsho dang /_/shar gyi yul ni kho ra yug_/der gnas pa la 'grub par 'gyur/_/'bigs byed ri nang gnas pa dang /_/yul ni mchog dbang khor yug tu/_/smin drug bu bzhin 'jam dpal ni/_/khor yug tu grub pa yin/_/ri rtse tshang tshing nang 
[\[248b.2\]]dang ni/_/ri sul dang ni nags bcas la/_/log 'dren bgegs ni byed pa yi/_/bzlas pa dag ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/glang po'i cha byad yang dag ldan/_/mche ba gtsigs pa gzi brjid che/_/de bzhin rta gzugs du ma dang /_/du ma'i rnam par grags pa yin/_/
[\[248b.3\]]lha ni dbang dang ldan pa'i bu/_/rnam pa sna tshogs bgegs byed pa/_/de bstan sngags dang ldan pa yi/_/grub pa'i zhing du rab tu snang /_/ma mo mi bzad rnam sna tshogs/_/gza' nyid shin tu mi bzad dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]skye gnas bstan pa yin/_/mi yi zas byed bden bral 
[\[248b.4\]]dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rgyal por bstan pa dang /_/de dag zhing du grub par gsungs/_/de la sogs pa'i 'byung po kun/_/grub pa'i zhing du gsungs pa yin/_/rdo rje khro bo brtson 'grus che/_/de dag phyogs su grub pa yin/_/lha min sngags kyi gtso bo dang /_/gang gzhan de bzhin 
[\[248b.5\]]'jig rten pa'i/_/sngags rgyud lho phyogs dag tu ni/_/brten pa dag la 'grub par 'gyur/_/rtag tu [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rgyal po dang /_/gshin rjes kyang ni bstan pa dang /_/zhi ba khyab 'jug gis bstan pa'i/_/sngags gzhan dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur/_/gdug cing gdug 
[\[248b.6\]]pa'i las dag ni/_/lha yi gnas su bstan pa yin/_/sngags rnams gdug pa'i las rnams ni/_/lag na rdo rjes bstan pa dag_/lho yi phyogs la bsten na ni/_/sdig pa'i las ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/de dag gi ni phyogs dag tu/_/myur du yang dag 'grub par snang /_/
[\[248b.7\]]nyi mas bshad pa'i sngags rnams ni/_/nyi ma'i sngags zhes rab tu bsgrags/_/nub phyogs na ni gang yod pa/_/sngags dang rgyud ni rab tu 'grub/_/gnod sbyin dbang po rdzu 'phrul che'i/_/der ni rang sngags 'grub par 'gyur/_/byis pa rnams ni rmongs pa yi/_/'byung 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]po kun la nor sbyin zhing /_/cho ga mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni/_/skye bo rnams la nor sbyin byed/_/longs spyod ldan zhing mdzod 'phel ba/_/nub kyi phyogs su 'grub par 'gyur/_/nor sbyin zhes bya'i ming gis ni/_/sa yi steng du rnam par grags/_/gnod sbyin 
[\[249a.2\]]lag na rdo rje rang /_/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/_/sngags pa mchog ni dam pa ste/_/rang nyid sa bcu'i bdag po yin/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag gi/_/de dag sngags ni grub pa yin/_/de bzhin rigs brgyad sngags dag ni/_/phyogs brgyad dag tu gnas 
[\[249a.3\]]pa yin/_/rgyal ba'i rigs kyi sngags dag ni/_/byang gi phyogs su 'grub pa yin/_/pad+ma'i rigs las byung ba'i sngags/_/de bzhin shar gyi phyogs su 'grub/_/lho yi phyogs su gnas pa la/_/rdo rje'i rigs ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/nub phyogs su ni 
[\[249a.4\]]mdzod 'grub gsungs/_/phyogs mtshams dag tu rin chen rigs/_/de bzhin nub byang mtshams su ni/_/de dag 'grub par rab tu brtags/_/lho nub kyi ni mtshams dag tu/_/de bzhin gnod sbyin rigs kyang 'grub/_/shar lho dag gi cha dag tu/_/nyan thos 
[\[249a.5\]]rnams ni gzi brjid che/_/de dag rigs su snang ba ni/_/der gnas pa la 'grub par 'gyur/_/byang shar dag gi cha dag tu/_/rang rgyal rnams su yang dag 'byung /_/rigs ni 'jig rten kun gyis mchod/_/de dag der ni 'grub pa yin/_/'og gi phyogs kyi 
[\[249a.6\]]cha dag tu/_/'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams 'grub/_/sa 'og 'jug par gyur pa'i sngags/_/rigs brgyad kun la 'grub par 'gyur/_/de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa'i sngags/_/gtsug tor la sogs rab bsgrags pa/_/steng du 'gro ba'i grub par ni/_/rgyal ba 'khor 
[\[249a.7\]]lo sgyur bas gsungs/_/thad kar kun nas khor yug tu/_/rdo rje can gyi 'grub pa yin/_/de bzhin gzhan yang sngags rgyal kun/_/pad+ma'i rigs las byung ba ni/_/thams cad du ni thams cad 'grub/_/sngags rnams kun kyang longs spyod ster/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang /_/
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]dus rnams kun tu 'grub par 'gyur/_/'di dag zhing du bstan pa ste/_/de yi dus ni yongs su bstan/_/rgyal ba'i rigs kyi sngags grub pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams la sngon byung ba'o/_/pad+ma rdo rje'i rigs dag ni/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar ma'i dus/_/gzhan gyi dus su 
[\[249b.2\]]sngags dag ni/_/de las gzhan pa'i rigs 'grub yin/_/de dag grub pa'i dus su gsungs/_/dus gzhan rab tu bstan ma yin/_/dka' thub kyis ni grub pa mchog_/skye ba gsum gyis thob par 'gyur/_/rtag tu sngags rnams zlos pa dang /_/der dang yid ni der 
[\[249b.3\]]sems dang /_/rgyal sras rnams la rab dang ba/_/skye ba 'di la'ang 'grub par 'gyur/_/dkon mchog gsum la gus pa dang /_/byang chub sems kyis brgyan pa dang /_/shes rab che zhing sdom la gnas/_/sngags dang rgyud la 'jigs pa med/_/byang chub sdom la 
[\[249b.4\]]gnas pa dag_/'bad pa med par sngags rnams 'grub/_/sems can rnams kyis las grub dang /_/bdag kyang grub par nyer bstan pa/_/rtag tu sngags nyid grub pa yin/_/rmongs pa'i sems can 'grub pa med/_/de nyid phyir na rgyal dbang gis/_/cho ga'i rgyal 
[\[249b.5\]]po gsungs pa ni/_/sangs rgyas gtso bo bdun pa yis/_/sngags rnams rgya che'i las dag bstan/_/sangs rgyas sras kyi thu bo ni/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs ni gzi chen la/_/thub pa'i zla ba rdzu 'phrul che/_/des ni gsung mchog rab tu bstan/_/sngags rnams kyi ni mthar 
[\[249b.6\]]thug mthu/_/gzhon nu rab tu nyon cig dang /_/gang tshe sangs rgyas rtag tu ni/_/'jig rten 'dren pa bzhugs gyur pa/_/de tshe de bzhin grub pa ni/_/gtsug tor la sogs rab grags pa/_/de bzhin 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_/gzi brjid phung por rab bstan dang /_/rgyal 
[\[249b.7\]]ba gtsug tor gdugs dkar po/_/rgyal bas mang por gsungs pa ni/_/de la sogs pa'i gtsug tor ni/_/de yi tshe ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/gang tshe 'khor los sgyur ba ni/_/'dzam bu'i gling du 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/chos kyi rgyal po rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/rkang gnyis dam 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]pa bzhugs pa na/_/sngags rnams ma lus bshad pa dag_/de yi tshe na 'grub par 'gyur/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/_zhing dang dus kyi cho ga nges pa'i le'u 
[\[250a.2\]]rab 'byam las/_nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ras ris ni sngar bstan te/_
[\[250a.3\]]sems can la yod pa'i spyod pa dge ba dang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma rnams ni bshad par bya yi nyon cig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos btud nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[250a.4\]]sems can rnams ni gzhan gyi lus la 'jug pa'i sems can rnams te/_'phags pa dang lha'i skye gnas dang grub pa dang dri za dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang sha za dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa las sna tshogs kyis byas pa'i lus rnam pa sna tshogs la brten cing gnas pa/_cha byad 
[\[250a.5\]]rnam pa sna tshogs dang rtags sna tshogs dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dang 'byung po thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa bcom ldan 'das bstan pa'i dus lags/_bde bar gshegs pa bstan pa'i dus ni lags te/_de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na legs par bshad du gsol/_de 
[\[250a.6\]]skad ces rgyal ba'i mchog 'jig rten gyi 'dren pa gau ta ma bdun pa la gsol ba btab nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa cang mi smra bar gyur te/_rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang 
[\[250a.7\]]mtshan ma shes pa dang rtags dang dus gsungs pa/_gzhan gyi lus zhugs sems can ni/_/sngags kyi sbyor bas drang bar bya/_/kha cig zas la chags pa yi/_/sa steng mi ni 'dzin par byed/_/gzhan dag khro ldan sems kyis ni/_/sa steng dag tu mi bzad pas/_/
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]rtag tu chags dang bral ba dag_/snying rje'i dam tshig dag gis ni/_/mi yi 'jig rten dag 'jug pa/_/dge ba'i mi la 'dzin par byed/_/rab bsngags dge dang g.yo ba med/_/mi rnams kyi ni mdog kyang sgrub/_/nyi ma dag ni 'char ba la/_/de dag 'jug par brjod pa 
[\[250b.2\]]yin/_/mi rnams nyi ma nub pa yi/_/de yi dus su 'jug par 'gyur/_/mtshan mo'i thun gyi dang po la/_/yar ngo la ni snang bar 'gyur/_/rab bsngags dge ba'i las dag dang /_/rtag tu gang zhig chos ldan mi/_/gang zhig shes nyen ldan pa ni/_/de dag la 
[\[250b.3\]]ni 'jug par snang /_/'dod chags bral ba rdzu 'phrul che/_/des na mi la 'jug pa yin/_/phyogs gtsang skye bo gtsang ba dang /_/rgyu skar skar ma bzang ba dang /_/nyin zhag sngags dang zla res bzang /_/yar ngo dge ba'i nyin zhag dang /_/gza' bzang yang dag ldan pa dang /_/
[\[250b.4\]]tshes grangs rdzogs dang yang dag ldan/_/de bzhin zla ba nya ba la/_/de dag la ni 'jug par snang /_/chags bral rdzu 'phrul chen po ni/_/'jug par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma yang /_/nam mkha' la ni ta la tsam/_/sa las 'phags te 'dug pa yin/_/de ni skyil krung 'dug 
[\[250b.5\]]nas kyang /_/nam mkha' la ni gnas par snang /_/tshig kyang bzang po mtshungs med dang /_/tshangs dbyangs de bzhin rnar snyan dang /_/gang du 'dod chags bral de gnas/_/sems dpa' chen po de dag smra/_/gtsug tor phyag rgyas drangs pa yi/_/sa yi steng du 'dug par 
[\[250b.6\]]gyur/_/sa steng de la 'dug pa na/_/de yi mod la mchod yon sbyin/_/sna ma'i me tog dag la ni/_/tsan+dan bzang po gur gum bsres/_/bsres pa'i chu dang chu gtsang ni/_/de yi mod la dbul bar bya/_/sngags pas sa la rab btud nas/_/phan pa'i blo yis gsol ba gdab/_/
[\[250b.7\]]dpa' ba'i rang bzhin sems kyis ni/_/sems can des ni gsol ba gdab/_/tshig ni bzang po 'don byed cing /_/rnar snyan de bzhin rmongs pa med/_/sngags shes cho ga 'jigs med pas/_/de nas ji ltar 'dod pa 'dri/_/'jam dbyangs yang dag dran nas ni/_/de yi dus su 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]'jigs med bya/_/gtsug pud lnga pa'i phyag rgya 'am/_/gtsug tor las byung gzhan pa'ang bcing /_/de nas phyogs ni bcing bya ste/_/steng dang 'og tu'ang de bzhin no/_/de nas de yi 'byung ba kun/_/bar dang tha mar rab tu brjod/_/de bzhin dang po bar ma'i 
[\[251a.2\]]dus/_/byung dang ma 'ongs dus dag dang /_/de bzhin da ltar byung gyur pa/_/'od ldan des ni ston par 'gyur/_/de bzhin 'dzum med mig gis ni/_/chags bral des zin rab tu lta/_/gang yin des bstan tshig gis ni/_/bden par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/_/de bzhin grub 
[\[251a.3\]]dang bsgrub bya'i rdzas/_/gang zhig tshogs kyi rnam pa dang /_/rang rgyal byang chub dgra bcom dang /_/nges par byang chub chen po'ang de/_/nges par sangs rgyas nyid rig nyid/_/de bzhin byang chub sems rigs dang /_/rigs med nyid dang dus dang ni/_/sems can skal ldan 
[\[251a.4\]]brjod pa'ang yin/_/dam tshig gis ni mngon mtshon pas/_/bden pa kun ni des ston 'gyur/_/skad cig tsam ston rnal 'byor la/_/dus ring dus su sdod ma yin/_/skad cig de la gang cung zad/_/yid la bsams shing don du gnyer/_/myur du sngags grub kho na la/_/
[\[251a.5\]]de dag thams cad ston par byed/_/ci 'dod mngon par re ba dag_/phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob/_/sngags pas slar ni gshegs gsol ba/_/myur du mchod yon phul nas 'gyel/_/cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/_/snod ni yang dag bsrung ba bya/_/sems can 
[\[251a.6\]]lus ni 'gyel ba yang /_/sa yi steng du nyal ba nyid/_/gtsug tor sngags dang ldan pa yi/_/sngags ni cho gar gsungs pa dag_/de nyid kyis ni bsrung ba dang /_/phyag rgya gtsug phud lnga yis so/_/de tshe lus ni bde legs 'gyur/_/sa yi steng las ldang bar 'gyur/_/
[\[251a.7\]]sems can kun la'ang 'jug pa yi/_/srung ba 'di ni rab tu brtag_/snod la brten te 'tshe byed par/_/gdug pa'i sems can gyis mi nus/_/skye bo snod du gyur pa la/_/'di ni srung ba chen po yin/_/de yi tshig ni bar mar gnas/_/dbus kyi yul gyir rab tu bsgrags/_/
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]lha yi skye gnas la brten pa'i/_/'og min gzugs dang ldan pa dang /_/de dang de yi rtags rnams dang /_/gzugs ni rab tu snang ba yin/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug dang /_/'dod dang ldan pa'i lha dag dang /_/de las dman pa'i 'gro ba'i rtags/_/tshig 
[\[251b.2\]]nyid kyang ni shin tu snyan/_/de nas sa la gnas pa dang /_/gzhal med khang gnas lha rnams kyi/_/tshig ni ku sha'i grong khyer mtshungs/_/ma ga d+hA yi gnod sbyin tshig_/de bzhin ang+ga'i yul gyi tshig_/lto 'phye chen por rab tu bstan/_/gzi brjid chen po nam mkha' 
[\[251b.3\]]lding /_/de dag shar phyogs tshig tu 'gyur/_/bang ga'i yul du yang dag skyes/_/gang dag tshig tu bstan pa ni/_/de bzhin mi'am ci yi tshig_/de yi tshig tu rab brtag bya/_/rtag tu piN+Da'i tshig gyur pa/_/grub dang ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin/_/de tshig rig pa 'dzin 
[\[251b.4\]]pa dang /_/drang srong 'dod pa'i gzugs can yin/_/de tshig mngon shes lnga dang ni/_/drang srong rnams kyis yongs su brtags/_/gang yang yul tshig ma ga d+hA/_/gang yang ha ri ki la'i tshig_/mi gsal mi dod nyid dang ni/_/yi ge ta la shin tu brten/_/la yi yi ge 
[\[251b.5\]]mang ba'i tshig_/sha za'i tshig tu brjod pa yin/_/las tshon zhes bya'i gling dang ni/_/na li ke ra 'byung ba'i gnas/_/gling ni rtsub par byed nyid dang /_/gcer bu stobs ldan bu gnas kyang /_/sems can dag byed gnas pa dag_/de bzhin 'di dag gling las byung /_/
[\[251b.6\]]yi ge la mang tshig dag dang /_/tshig ni gsal ba'i rnam pa med/_/mi gsal bsri ba med nyid dang /_/khro bcas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]skye gnas tshig_/lho phyogs pa yi tshig dag dang /_/an+d+ra kar Na dra bi DA/_/sems can ko sa la 'brog gnas dang /_/sing ga la yi gling 
[\[251b.7\]]dag na/_/yi ge ga dang rar bcas pa/_/de ni srin po'i tshig tu shes/_/de dag gling la gnas pa de'i/_/ming ni gang zhig brjod pa yang /_/ma mo rnams ni gzi brjid che/_/de yi tshig 'dir gsungs pa yin/_/tshig ni nub phyogs phyogs mtshams dang /_/ma la ba yi tshig 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]dag dang /_/be'u nya dang rgya mtsho'i tshig_/shur se yi rnam brtags dang /_/rgya mtsho bcu 'dus chu bo 'dus/_/dpal mgrin dang ni ko dz+wa ri/_/'di dag tshig ldan 'jug pa ni/_/nyi ma la sogs gza' mchog gdon/_/de las gzhan gdon gtso bo ni/_/
[\[252a.2\]]yul ni ba ri ya tra'i tshig_/yul ni ar bu ta sa h+ya/_/ri ni mA la yar gnas dang /_/lang ba'i yul du yang dag skyes/_/tshig ni ci 'dra yod pa yi/_/de 'dra'i tshig tu smra ba ni/_/grul bum skye gnas 'dzin pa yin/_/yi ge sha Sha sa dang ni/_/ra la ba las yang dag byung /_/
