[\[252a.3\]]yi ge g+ha dang ldan pa'i tshig_/lha ma yin du nges par bstan/_/kha che'i yul las byung ba dang /_/skye ba'i gnas ni ka bi sha/_/gnod sbyin rgyal po'i rigs las byung /_/phyag na rdo rje'i rigs su bstan/_/de dag lnga yi gtso bo ni/_/kun gyi tshig tu 'dod pa yin/_/de bzhin dbus 
[\[252a.4\]]kyi phyogs gnas dag_/pad+ma'i rigs kyi skye gnas rten/_/tshig dang 'gros dang mtshan ma yang /_/pad+ma'i rigs su snang ba yin/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis rnam brtags pa/_/snga ma nyid du bstan pa yin/_/'dod chags bral ba'i mtshan ma gang /_/rgyal ba'i mtshan mar rab tu 
[\[252a.5\]]'byung /_/yul phyogs gang gi tshig smra ba/_/der gnas 'gros dang spyod pa yin/_/der bstan sems can nyid dang ni/_/'gros dang mtshan ma'ang kun tu bstan/_/kha ba can gyi nang gnas pa/_/dri za drang srong skye bo'i tshig_/gang gA'i ngogs kyi byang phyogs pa/_/gnod sbyin tshig 
[\[252a.6\]]tu rab tu snang /_/ri ni 'bigs byed la gnas pa/_/gang gA'i 'gram gyi lho phyogs dang /_/dpal gyi ri bor skyes gyur dang /_/gang yang skye bo rnam dag ni/_/srin po skar ma [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_/ma mo cha lugs ngan pa dang /_/mi bzad gzugs can bgegs chen po/_/gdon ni 
[\[252a.7\]]shin tu ma rungs pa/_/brkam zhing gzhan gyi srog 'phrog byed/_/de yi tshig ni yang dag 'byung /_/gang dag yul ni de dag brtag_/de dag yul gyi 'gros dang spyod/_/de dag tshig tu smra ba ni/_/ma rungs gdon 'jug rnam spyod yin/_/'di dag gzhan yang mang po ni/_/gang gi 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]spyod 'gros spyod pa dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs tshul dang ni/_/rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan nyid dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs sems can gtso/_/rnam pa sna tshogs skye gnas 'dod/_/de ltar gdon 'jug mtshan ma ni/_/mtshan nyid 'gros dang spyod pa yin/_/mi rnams kyi ni bde skyed 
[\[252b.2\]]pa/_/sems can du yang bya ba ste/_/gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag 'byung /_/bsrung ba'i don du rab sbyar bya/_/yi ge drug pas bya ba ni/_/phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa'i/_/sngags nyid kho na bzlas byas na/_/bsrung ba chen por 'gyur ba yin/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal 
[\[252b.3\]]gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/_gdon 'jug pa'i spyod pa'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam las/_nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/_gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i 
[\[252b.4\]]gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyi sngags rnams rgyud thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pa/_rig pa thams cad la 'os pa/_dus dpag tu med pa'i yon tan ma lus pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba yang rjes su 
[\[252b.5\]]'brel ba'i mtshan ma'i tshad yod de/_de 'grub par bya ba'i rgyur bshad pa ni 'di lta ste/_skye ba gzhan gyis 'grub pa nyid/_/dus kyi rgyus ni 'grub pa med/_/de yi tshad dang sbyor ba ni/_/sngon byung rgyu las byung ba yin/_/rtse gcig bdag gir byed pas 'grub/_/grub pa rigs 
[\[252b.6\]]pa rnam dpyod pa'o/_/rigs pa gzhon nu khyod bsten na/_/lus can kun la rab tu snang /_/mthar gyis byas pa'i las rnams ni/_/rigs pa zhes ni bya ba yin/_/dpa' bo'i rigs ldan de sbyor bas/_/grub pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/grub med bsgrub bya'i 
[\[252b.7\]]las rnams med/_/las rnams med par 'grub pa'ang med/_/las dang byed par yang dag ldan/_/yang dag ldan pas grub pa 'thob/_/cho ga ldan pa'i rgyu yis ni/_/gnas pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/sngags pa sngags ni mi sgrogs na/_/sngags min pa yang 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]sngags par 'gyur/_/thub pa'i las ni yang dag spyod/_/grub pa rgyas pa thob par 'gyur/_/rigs kyi sa bon la brten na/_/blo yi mchog la gnas par 'gyur/_/gnas mchog dam par nges sdom na/_/dang po'i bgrod pa thob par 'gyur/_/blo dang bsam 
[\[253a.2\]]pa legs gnas na/_/nad med go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/_/gang gi dus dang mtshan ma las/_/dus min grub par 'dod pa ni/_/mdor na brgya byin yin na yang /_/de yi sngags rnams mi 'grub bo/_/'byung po skye bo mi phan dang /_/dus min par yang rtsom pa yang /_/
[\[253a.3\]]bdag nyid chen po tshangs pa yang /_/de la grub pa mi snang ngo /_/snyom dang sred dang yang dag ldan/_/dregs dang nga rgyal ldan pa dang /_/lhod dang yun ring 'thab la dga'/_/grong gi skye bo la rtag dga'/_/le lo phan tshun sbyor ba la/_/'di la grub pa ga la yod/_/gang 
[\[253a.4\]]yang lha yi bla ma dang /_/gang yang rtag tu lha min bla/_/sngags rnams de dag gis bsgrub kyang /_/cho ga spangs na nus med yin/_/de bzhin cho ga'i las nyams na/_/sems ni rnam par rmongs par byed/_/de bas sngags ni bzla mi bya/_/cho ga med par rigs pa min/_/byis 
[\[253a.5\]]pa rnams kyis mthong ba rmongs/_/de lta bus ni skyed par 'gyur/_/de bas byis pa rmongs pa yang /_/shin tu dka' ba'i 'gro bar lhung /_/de nas de dag sngags spyod pa/_/de las de dag drang ba yang /_/mthar gyis de dag grub pa ni/_/dge ba 'gro ba rab tu 'thob/_/de las 
[\[253a.6\]]zlos pa'i sngags pas ni/_/mi g.yo zhi ba'i gnas su 'jog_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags bzlas pa/_/de ltar sngags rnams don yod de/_/sems can mig zur gyis bltas pa'ang /_/rjes su gzung ba nyid du 'gyur/_/de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/_/'di dag 
[\[253a.7\]]sems can mnyes gshin pa'o/_/'di dag grub par bstan pa ste/_/theg gsum mnyam pa nyid zhi ba/_/de bas rnam kun rab 'bad nas/_/mnyam par bzhag cing sngags zlos bya/_/sngags zlos rab tu sbyor byed pa/_/sngags ni cho ga med par spyod/_/yun ring dus su 'khor ba na/_/
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]nam zhig cig na grub par 'dod/_/shin tu yun ring dus song nas/_/sngags rnams grub par snang ba'o/_/cho ga ldan pa'i sngags kyis ni/_/myur du grub pa rab tu 'thob/_/'bras bu 'grub par mthong ba ste/_/'bras med sngags ni gsung ba min/_/gsang sngags 'bras 
[\[253b.2\]]bu ldan pa ni/_/tshe 'di nyid la grub par gsungs/_/grub byed 'bras bu las ma yin/_/las med par yang 'bras mi 'dod/_/'bras bu las dang yang dag ldan/_/'bras bcas las su bstan pa yin/_/de bas skye dang rga spangs pa/_/de ltar yang dag byung gyur pa/_/
[\[253b.3\]]'jig rten zhi bar gsungs pa ste/_/zhi ba srid las rnam grol yin/_/bdag nyid chen po der 'gror gtogs/_/sangs rgyas chos ni rjes su bstan/_/'jig rten phyin ci log dus su/_/de la grub pa rab tu snang /_/tshe 'di nyid la'ang grub 'gyur te/_/tshe rabs gzhan 
[\[253b.4\]]du'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhi ba'i lam ni 'dus ma byas/_/mthar thug zhi ba'i bar du 'gyur/_/gang du 'jig rten rnam bstan pa/_/zhi ba'i gnas ni dri med bzang /_/sangs rgyas nyid ni legs bstan pa/_/rgyal bas kun tu bstan pa yin/_/de la mthar ni de dag phyin/_/
[\[253b.5\]]sngags grub par ni gsungs pa yin/_/rang rig so so'i rgyal ba yis/_/sngags 'di bstan pa ma yin te/_/thub zla rdzu 'phrul chen po yis/_/'jig rten dag la sngags bstan to/_/tshe 'dir lus can rnams la ni/_/mngon sum du ni grub pa bstan/_/de nyid stong pa rig 
[\[253b.6\]]pa yis/_/sngags ni sangs rgyas nyid du ston/_/rtsod dus tha ma'i dus dag tu/_/zhi ba'i de nyid khyad par du/_/sngags 'grub par ni mi 'gro zhing /_/myur ba'i las la'ang 'grub pa med/_/de yi dus su sbyor ba ni/_/cho ga mthong ba'i las dag gis/_/sngags rgyud shes 
[\[253b.7\]]pas sgrub bo zhes/_/bstan pa 'di la thub pas gsungs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na/_/grub mchog myur du grub par 'dod/_/de bzhin bar ma'i dus dag tu/_/bar ma'i grub pa nye bar bstan/_/tha ma'i dus la brten nas ni/_/tha ma'i grub par gsungs 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]pa yin/_/bzang po yi ni dus dag la/_/de bzhin nam mkhar 'gro ba dang /_/sngags rnams kun ni rab 'grub par/_/'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa yin/_/de dus rgyal ba'i dbang po ni/_/rigs kyi mchog de rab tu 'grub/_/pad+ma'i rigs ni 
[\[254a.2\]]bar mar 'grub/_/dus kyi mtha' la rdo rje'i rigs/_/kha cig smon lam dbang gis ni/_/thams cad du ni sngags rnams 'grub/_/spyan ras gzigs dang 'jam dpal dang /_/sgrol ma khro gnyer gnod sbyin rgyal/_/rin chen rigs spyod gnod sbyin ni/_/dus rnams 
[\[254a.3\]]kun tu 'grub par 'gyur/_/lha rnams kun gyi sngags gzhan ni/_/gang yang chags can gyis rab sbyar/_/rtsod pa'i dus su 'grub 'gyur zhing /_/'jig rten pa yi bstan pa'ang 'grub/_/lha dang mi dang lha min gyi/_/dbang po gnod sbyin srin po dang /_/drang srong nam 
[\[254a.4\]]mkha' lding dang ni/_/sha za 'byung po gza' tshogs dang /_/mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_/'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa yi/_/bsod nams ldan pa rdzu 'phrul che/_/ma rungs las ni mi bzad ldan/_/brgya byin tshangs pa drag po dang /_/dbang ldan de bzhin gzhan dag kyang /_/
[\[254a.5\]]khyab 'jug 'byung po thams cad dang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po'i sngags bstan pa/_/de dag dus kyi tha ma la/_/bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/_/de dus 'jigs pa chen po la/_/sdang ba'i las ni de bzhin 'grub/_/'byung po dbang dang dgug bya ba/_/sa steng sha za'i las dag 
[\[254a.6\]]'grub/_/don med grub par snang ba ste/_/'jig rten pha rol dag tu smod/_/des na rgyal ba'i dbang po yi/_/de dus 'jigs pa chen po yang /_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag bstan/_/kun la rjes gzung gtsor byas nas/_/zlos pa la ni sngags gzugs kyis/_/
[\[254a.7\]]zlos pa bstan pa la dad cing /_/dkon mchog gsum la mchod byed la/_/de tshe sems can sngags gzugs kyis/_/gdul bar byed par 'gyur ba yin/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]cho ga nges par sdom pa'i dus kyi le'u rab 'byam las/_nyi shu rtsa drug pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[254b.2\]]khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings kyi mdzod/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po/_chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa'i rjes su spyod pa/_mdo chen po'i mchog_/rin po che'i le'u de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mchog rjes su gnang ba/_sngags kyi mchog sgrub pa la rgyu mtshan 
[\[254b.3\]]shes pa dang rtags dang dus gzhan shes pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rnams nges par bstan cing yang dag par bstan no/_/'byung po thams cad kyi sgra sgrogs pa dang sems can dang sems can ma yin pa'i ming gi sgrar 'gyur ba ni/_sgra las byung ba'i ming du shes pa dang sgra las byung ba ma 
[\[254b.4\]]yin par bstan pa dang de bzhin du 'dren ma dang ldan pa'i sngags rnams ni rnam pa gsum du bya ba yin te/_sgra bzang yang dag ldan pa dang /_/rtag tu don dang rab tu 'brel/_/zur chag tshig dang rtag tu bral/_/legs par sbyar don gyis brgyan pa/_/phyi rol grub mtha' yod ma yin/_/
[\[254b.5\]]'phags pa'i sngags su rab tu bsgrags/_/rtag tu tshig don ldan pa ste/_/rnam pa gsum gyi dbye bar 'gyur/_/ring dang thung dang de bzhin du/_/bar ma'i yi ges brgyan pa'ang yin/_/sngags kyi lha mor gyur pa ni/_/dbyangs yig sdeb sbyor gyis brgyan pa/_/ngag ni legs sbyar 
[\[254b.6\]]legs sbyar min/_/ci ste don dang don med min/_/don ldan tshig dang don med tshig_/sngags don rnam par gsungs pa yin/_/rnam rtog mang po'i tshig dag ni/_/'jig rten pa rnams kun gyi sngags/_/gcig dang gnyis kyi yi ge dag_/sdeb sbyor dbyangs yig bzang po'i gzhi/_/
[\[254b.7\]]gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug_/de bzhin bdun pa brgyad pa yin/_/dgu pa bcu pa de bzhin du/_/yi ge dag ni grub par 'dod/_/yi ge bcu dang yang dag ldan/_/yi ge rnams kyi gnas pa mnyan/_/ji srid 'di dag bcu 'gyur ni/_/sa steng 'di la yi ge mthong /_/yi ge drug 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]dang nyi shu dang /_/yi ge gcig gi bar du 'gyur/_/'di tsam tshad kyi yi ge ni/_/sngags kyi tshig ni rtag tu sbyar/_/rkang pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan/_/sngags ni don kun sgrub pa'o/_/mchog ni rab mchog don ldan pa/_/sngags ni gang zhig rgyal bas gsungs/_/
[\[255a.2\]]de sras rgyal ba'i sras dag gis/_/gsungs pa dag ni bar ma yin/_/'jig rten kun gyis bstan pa yi/_/sngags ni tha mar gyur pa yin/_/bden bral gyis bstan ngan pa'ang yin/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad bdun nam nyi shu 'am/_/brgya dang lnga bcu dag gi bar/_/'di tsam 
[\[255a.3\]]tshad kyi sngags rnams ni/_/rgyal ba 'phags pas gsungs pa yin/_/gcig dang gnyis kyi yi ge dang /_/lnga brgya'i yi ge'i bar 'gyur ba/_/de tsam tshad kyi sngags rnams ni/_/byang chub sems dpas rab tu gsungs/_/de nang tshig ni dgod pa dang /_/sngags dang ldan 
[\[255a.4\]]par brjod pa yin/_/sdeb sbyor ldan zhing dbyangs yig ldan/_/khams kyi don gyis rnam par brgyan/_/tshig dang legs par rab ldan dang /_/rgyud dang rigs par ldan pa dang /_/sgra dang dbyangs yig rnam bral ba/_/nam zhig na ni grub par 'gyur/_/legs par rab ldan sgra rnams 
[\[255a.5\]]kyang /_/skye bo drod gnas rkan dang ni/_/so mchu lkog ma'i sgra dag ni/_/sbyar ba bzhin du rim gyis 'byung /_/mi gsal brjod las ldog gyur pa/_/legs par rab ldan brjod pa yin/_/yongs rdzogs tshig dang sgra dag dang /_/yang dag ldan pas bsgrub par 'gyur/_/sgrub 
[\[255a.6\]]pa nyams dang bya ba nyams/_/sgra dang don dang rnam bral na/_/myur du sngags rnams mi 'grub ste/_/yun ring dus su 'gor ba yin/_/de la grub pa yong med min/_/log par yang ni de mi byed/_/skye ba gzhan du'ang snang ba ste/_/sngags grub mchog kyang ster bar 'gyur/_/
[\[255a.7\]]yun ring dus su bzlas pa yi/_/de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/_/sngags rig skye bo'i sngags de ni/_/don med las ni byed ma yin/_/sngags rnams kun kyi tha ma ni/_/mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten pa/_/'byung po kun ni ser snar bcas/_/gang yin des ni sngags bstan pa'o/_/yi 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]ge gang dag des bstan pa/_/gcig dang gnyis kyi grangs dag dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs kla klo'i skad/_/yul gyi skad du bstan pa ste/_/phreng du bsdebs dang ldan pa dang /_/sgra ni 'dres par gyur pa yin/_/de dag yi ge gcig pa nas/_/rtsa brgyad stong gi bar du 'o/_/
[\[255b.2\]]tshig rkang bzhi dang rkang med dang /_/rkyang pa tshigs su sbyar des bstan/_/tshigs bcad rgyun chags cha dag dang /_/tshigs bcad tshigs su brjod pa yin/_/yang dang yang ni brjod don ldan/_/gsal ba'i don gyis brgyan pa yin/_/zur chag legs sbyar sgra 
[\[255b.3\]]nyams kyang /_/don ni rab tu brtag pa yin/_/mi gsal gsal ba med pa dang /_/yi ge nyams kyang 'dod pa yin/_/'gro ba yul dang rnam bral ba/_/de la'ang sngags ni 'grub par brjod/_/de ltar sngags rnams kun la ni/_/rtag tu phan pas rigs par gsungs/_/zag 
[\[255b.4\]]med zag bcas thams cad kyi/_/sngags rnams 'di yi mtshan 'di yin/_/gang la yi ge sa mang zhing /_/o~M ni ta yis brgyan pa ni/_/de las de yi mod la ni/_/de dag la ni nges 'grub 'gyur/_/dang po sngags ni yi ge o~M/_/mtha' na yi ge ma yod la/_/yi ge sa ni rkang par 
[\[255b.5\]]ldan/_/de bzhin ta yis bar mdzes shing /_/ta yi rnam pa zur bzhir ldan/_/mtha' gnas yi ge rnam par spangs/_/ra gnyis ldan pa yi ge ta/_/sngags rnams kyi ni grub pa byed/_/dang por ra gnyis mang ba dang /_/yi ge hU~M gi yon tan yod/_/yi ge tsa ni gru bzhir snang /_/de 
[\[255b.6\]]dag yi ge sgrub par brjod/_/yi ge b+ha ni rar ldan zhing /_/yig mthar ma dang yi ge gnas/_/dang por ma dang mang yi ge/_/de ni sngags kyi mchog tu bstan/_/gang yang yi ge na mang zhing /_/rgyud rnams kun la snang ba yin/_/sngags de dag ni zhi bar gsungs/_/gshin rje hU~M 
[\[255b.7\]]gis brgyan pa yis/_/yi ge b+ha ni mang ba de/_/dbang po rlung gi phyogs su gsungs/_/yi ge ba ni chu lhar gsungs/_/'jig rten phan zhing rgyas byed yin/_/sngags gang yi ge e mang ba/_/dbang chen de ni rab tu snang /_/dang po dkon mchog gsum skyabs 'gro/_/gang 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]yin sngags ni de bzhin du/_/phyag 'tshal ba la rab 'jug dang /_/zhi ba'i rgyu dang bde ba byed/_/de las gzhan pa'i lha rnams la'ang /_/phyag 'tshal don du rab tu sbyar/_/sngags dang rgyud la rang gi sngags/_/rang sngags las ni thams cad pa/_/gang 
[\[256a.2\]]la yi ge ra mang zhing /_/mtha' na yi ge phaT hU~M bcas/_/'di dag sngags ni gdug pa che/_/gzi brjid ldan zhing gzi mdangs che/_/mi zhi srog gcod byed pa ste/_/gdug pa'i sems can dag la sbyar/_/khyad par du ni sdig yod pas/_/de bas las de mi bya'o/_/rtag 
[\[256a.3\]]tu thub pas spangs pas na/_/'bad de zlos pos spang bar bya/_/sngags ni zhi dang rgyas pa dag_/gnyis kyi don ni 'grub 'gyur te/_/las la ji srid gsungs pa dag_/skad cig gis ni thams cad 'grub/_/'di dag sngags ni legs bzlas na/_/gzi brjid ldan zhing rdzu 
[\[256a.4\]]'phrul che/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags kyis ni/_/zhi ba'i las ni bya ba yin/_/rin chen rigs kyi bya ba ni/_/rgyas pa'i las ni thams cad do/_/gang dag sdig pa'i las rnams kun/_/mngon spyod la ni rab tu sbyar/_/mngon par spyod pa'i las rnams ni/_/rdo rje'i rigs 
[\[256a.5\]]kyis bya ba yin/_/'jig rten mgon gyis bkag na yang /_/gnod sbyin dbang la rab tu bstan/_/sems can rnams ni gdul ba'i phyir/_/sngags kyi che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs/_/rigs gsum nyid kyis thams cad du/_/rnam pa gsum du bstan pa yin/_/thub pa nyid kyis 
[\[256a.6\]]rigs dag ni/_/gang yang brgyad du yang dag bstan/_/grub pa de dag rnam gsum 'gyur/_/rnam pa gsum du yang dag bstan/_/mchog dang bar ma tha ma ni/_/de dag rnam pa gsum 'byed pa/_/zhi dang rgyas pa dag dang ni/_/mngon spyod par ni 'dod pa yin/_/sngags 
[\[256a.7\]]dang ldan pa nyid dag dang /_/rgyud dang ldan pa kho nar bstan/_/sngags kyi 'gro ba'i bdag nyid che/_/mngon par spyod la sbyar ba yin/_/'di dag las ni mi 'dod de/_/thub pa mchog gis smad pa yin/_/shin tu nyam ngar gyur kyang ni/_/srog la gnod las mi bya'o/_/
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]mdor bsdu na ni ma 'dres par/_/las kyi bdag nyid chen por bstan/_/der ni rigs dang cho ga sngags/_/las ni rgya che rgya che ba/_/cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la gsungs/_/rgyud gzhan dag la'ang snang ba yin/_/las nyams rnams ni mi bsten cing /_/sngags rnams kun la 
[\[256b.2\]]rigs par ldan/_/'jig rten sngags rnams ji snyed pa/_/de bzhin cha bcas cha med pa'o/_/'jig rten 'das pa thams cad kyang /_/'di 'dra'i yon tan shes par bya/_/sngags grub grangs ni med gyur kyang /_/de grangs yongs su brjod par bya/_/dang po grangs gcig 
[\[256b.3\]]'byung ba ste/_/de bzhin nyi shu'ang ldan par 'byung /_/de nas mdor na sum cu ste/_/de las gzhan yang bzhi bcu yin/_/de phyed bsnan na drug cu ste/_/de bzhin bcus bsnan bdun cu yin/_/de steng bcus ni bsnan pa la/_/brgyad cu'i grangs su gsungs pa yin/_/de la bcus 
[\[256b.4\]]bsnan dgu bcur gsungs/_/bcu gzhan gyis bsnan brgya yin te/_/brgya yi grangs kyis bgrang ba yi/_/de dag bcu la stong phrag gcig_/stong phrag bcu la khri yin te/_/khri bcu la ni 'bum phrag gcig_/'bum phrag bcu la sa ya ste/_/sa ya bcu la bye ba yin/_/bye ba 
[\[256b.5\]]bcu la dung phyur ste/_/dung phyur bcu la ther 'bum yin/_/de bcu ther 'bum chen por bstan/_/de bcu la ni shu rdog ste/_/shu rdog bcu la mchog nyal yin/_/mchog nyal bcu la rkyang phye ste/_/rkyang phye chen po de bcu yin/_/de bcu la ni khyad phyin yin/_/khyad phyin chen po de bcu 
[\[256b.6\]]yin/_/de dag bcu la sgyu mar brjod/_/sgyu ma chen po de bcu yin/_/de bcu la ni mtsho yas zhes/_/'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa yin/_/mtsho yas chen po de dag bcu/_/mtsho yas chen po de bcu la/_/dug chen pa yi rgya mtsho yin/_/de dag nyi shu'i phyed la ni/_/dug 
[\[256b.7\]]chen rgya mtsho chen po yin/_/dug chen rgya mtsho bcu la ni/_/mchog yas zhes ni brjod pa yin/_/mchog yas bcu zhes bstan pa ni/_/ban bun dag tu rab tu bstan/_/ban bun de dag bcu la ni/_/de ni ma lus pa zhes brjod/_/de dag nyi shu phyed la ni/_/ma lus chen po zhes 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]su brjod/_/de tshe grangs kyi tshad du ni/_/'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa yin/_/bcu yi grangs kyis bcur byas na/_/grangs ni grangs med ces su brjod/_/grangs med bcur ni bsgyur byas na/_/de las gzhan du dpag med yin/_/dpag med stong du bsgyur 
[\[257a.2\]]byas na/_/'jig rten zhes ni yongs su bstan/_/'jig rten de bcu 'jig rten che/_/'jig rten chen po bsgres byas na/_/de 'og mun pa zhes su brjod/_/mun pa las ni snang bar brjod/_/snang ba chen po de dag bcu/_/de bcu la ni phung por brjod/_/phung po de bcu bsgres 
[\[257a.3\]]na ni/_/phung po chen por de brjod do/_/phung po chen po de bcu la/_/'di ni zab pa zhes brjod do/_/zab pa las ni brtan par brjod/_/brtan pa la ni rab brtan 'gro/_/de nas gong du mang ldan yin/_/mang por 'dod pa gnas su brjod/_/rtsis shes dam pas gnas su brjod/_/
[\[257a.4\]]de nas gnas ni chen por 'gro/_/chen po'i gnas zhes 'dod pa yin/_/dpag dang dpag med mnyam byas nas/_/de don chen por yongs su bsgrags/_/don chen rab 'byor gnas dang ni/_/de nas rgya mtsho chen por 'gro/_/dang po rgya mtsho chen por bstan/_/dang po'i dang por phan 
[\[257a.5\]]pa dang /_/dang po mchog ces bya bar bstan/_/mchog las gtso bor brjod pa ste/_/gtso las khyim gyi ming yin no/_/de ni bsam mi khyab par brjod/_/bsam mi khyab las mi bzad gzugs/_/mi bzad gzugs las rgyal thabs 'dod/_/rgyal thabs las gzhan 
[\[257a.6\]]gter yin te/_/de yi 'og ma dge ba yin/_/dge ba'i pha rol sems las byung /_/de las gzhan pa sems byung che/_/sems las sems ni rnam par g.yeng /_/brjod pa zhes ni de la bya/_/brjod pa las ni brjod med nas/_/bsnyad yas su yang brjod pa yin/_/bsnyad 
[\[257a.7\]]yas las gzhan bsnyad yas che/_/de tshe phyar phyur zhes kyang brjod/_/phyar phyur las ni phyar phyur che/_/shu rdog de bzhin shu rdog che/_/rtsis kyi pha rol phyin pa'i gnas/_/dge zhing zhi ba zhes su bstan/_/de nas bgegs chen mthong ba ste/_/chu 'byung zhes ni de las brjod/_/
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]chu 'byung de las sems 'phrul nas/_/de las gzhan pa dam pa yin/_/de las pha rol sangs rgyas yul/_/de las gzhan ni 'phel byed sa/_/'jig rten mi yi rtsis dag ni/_/bgrang bar yang ni mi nus so/_/de las gzhan du sangs rgyas kyi/_/go 'phang dang ni spyod 
[\[257b.2\]]yul yin/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni gang gA'i klung /_/bye ma snyed du brjod pa ni/_/bsdus nas rdul gyi tshogs dag ni/_/'dren pas bstan pa mdzad pa yin/_/'di dag dper ni byas pa ste/_/tshad ma shes pa'i spyod yul min/_/rgyu yis dngos po bsgrub bya ste/_/rtsis kyi pha 
[\[257b.3\]]rol phyin mi nus/_/'di tsam rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/_/sngon ni nga yis bsnyen bkur byas/_/dpag med bskal pa dag tu ni/_/de dag la ni mnyes byas nas/_/de tsam dus kyi mthar thug par/_/nga ni byang chub sems dpar gyur/_/sems can don ni bsgrub bya'i 
[\[257b.4\]]phyir/_/sangs rgyas nyid du'ang yang dag bstan/_/de dang der ni bdag gi sngags/_/cho ga rgya chen bstan pa yin/_/cho ga yi ni rab mchog 'di/_/sangs rgyas 'di dag kun gyis gsungs/_/'di tsam tshad kyi sangs rgyas kyis/_/sngon chad 'di ni gsungs pa yin/_/
[\[257b.5\]]dus kyi tha ma'i skye bo la/_/gzhon nu nga yang nga yis bstan/_/ji snyed 'jig rten sngags rnams dang /_/cho ga'i rgyal po'i snod dang ni/_/de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dang /_/mi dang lha dang lha min dang /_/thams cad kun gyi sngags rnams ni/_/rgyud dang rigs par rab 
[\[257b.6\]]tu bstan/_/cho ga'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/_/gang du kun gyis yongs su bkur/_/de dag cho ga zhib mo yis/_/'jam pa'i ngag ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi cho ga ni/_/'di nyid kyi ni zhib mo zhes/_/de dag 'grub par gsungs pa ste/_/thams 
[\[257b.7\]]cad kun pas mthu ldan 'gyur/_/gang yang mi yi 'jig rten dang /_/gang gzhan sngags kyi lha mo dang /_/'jig rten 'das pa'i sngags kun dang /_/'jig rten rdzu 'phrul che dang bcas/_/'di nyid tshul gyi cho ga yis/_/cho ga'i rgyal pos 'grub pa nyid/_/sngags 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]rnams kun dang cho ga kun/_/'di yi dbang du 'gyur bar bstan/_/cho ga'i rgyal po bla med 'di/_/gang du 'jam dpal gyis rab bzhed/_/gang yang bzo ni rnam par shes/_/'jig rten pa yi 'jig rten 'dod/_/rgyu mtshan shes dang la nye bzang /_/skar ma'i 
[\[258a.2\]]dpyad kyi rtags dang ni/_/rgyu mtshan shes dang spyod pa dang /_/sgra skad dge dang mi dge dang /_/'byung po kun gyi skad shes dang /_/spyod dang sems kyi spyod pa dang /_/zur gyis shes pa dag kyang bshad/_/de bzhin gter lta nor sgyur byed/_/rtsis dang brda sprod 
[\[258a.3\]]bstan bcos dang /_/gos kyi rim pa'i cho ga dang /_/nang rig gso ba rig pa dang /_/de nyid thams cad phan dang bde/_/gtan tshigs lugs kyi bstan bcos dang /_/gzhan yang sgra yi bstan bcos bstan/_/sdeb sbyor rig byed dri za'i glu/_/spos sbyor dag kyang 
[\[258a.4\]]bstan pa yin/_/bdag gis byang chub sems kyis ni/_/sems can don phyir bshad pa yin/_/bdag ni byang chub sems sngon gyur/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshor sngar gnas tshe/_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/bdag gis su ni bshad pa yin/_/'khor ba'i dgon pa'i 
[\[258a.5\]]tshang tshing du/_/bdag ni yun ring dus su gnas/_/ji ltar gdul bya'i sems can la/_/de ltar bdag gis de bzhin byas/_/ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams/_/phan pa'i las ni len pa dag_/phan don las kyis dge ba'i gzhi/_/de lta de ltar 'di dag byas/_/sna tshogs las 
[\[258a.6\]]kyis bsgyur ba yi/_/sems can 'gro ba'i skye gnas dag_/'di dag bya ba sna tshogs byas/_/sna tshogs skye gnas rab tu bstan/_/las rnams sna tshogs ldan pa yis/_/sna tshogs don gyi bstan bcos bstan/_/rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs ldan pas/_/'di la de bzhin 
[\[258a.7\]]byas pa yin/_/sna tshogs 'gro ba'i skye gnas su/_/bdag gis de bzhin cha byad byas/_/phan pa'i bsam pas sems can la/_/sna tshogs gzugs ni bdag gis sprul/_/dbang phyug brgya byin tshangs pa sogs/_/khyab 'jug nor sbyin bden bral dang /_/sna tshogs gza' yi 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]gzugs sogs kyang /_/de tshe sngon ni nga yis sprul/_/thugs rje chen po'i dbang gyur thugs/_/sems can bsam pa'i spyod yul can/_/de dag la ni rim gyis su/_/zhi ba'i gnas la bzhag pa yin/_/'khor bar phan tshun 'gro ba na/_/yun ring dus su thogs pa ni/_/
[\[258b.2\]]sems can rnams kyi don bsgrub phyir/_/sngags kyi tshul gyis bstan pa yin/_/yun ring 'khor ba'i skye bar ngas/_/sangs rgyas rigs la brten nas ni/_/ye shes sngags dang cho ga ni/_/mthar gyis bstan par byas pa yin/_/byed pa dang ni bdag po'ang rung /_/nga la 
[\[258b.3\]]gang yang yod min te/_/nges pa'i rigs la brten nas ni/_/nga ni sangs rgyas byang chub mchog_/bde ba nad med yang dag zhi/_/dri med mya ngan med zhi ba/_/ngas thob mya ngan 'das zhi ba/_/skye ba'i 'ching las nga rab grol/_/yang na 'khor lo rab bskor zhing /_/yang dag 
[\[258b.4\]]mtha' la brten nas ni/_/sngags kyi tshig ni rgya chen dang /_/cho ga 'di ni nga yis bstan/_/las dang cho ga rgya che ba/_/zlos pas don med mi bya'o/_/'jig rten ji snyed sngags rnams dang /_/cho ga dag kyang rab bstan pa/_/de kun mchod cing ri mor bya/_/de dag la ni brnyas 
[\[258b.5\]]pa spang /_/cho ga rgya chen de dag kyang /_/des na sngags pas brnyas mi bya/_/rgyu mtshan shes dang rig pa dang /_/skar ma'i dpyad shes skad shes pa/_/'di dag don med mi bya ste/_/bkra shis don du bstan pa yin/_/mthong ba'i chos kyi don du yang /_/grub pa'i rdzas sogs 
[\[258b.6\]]sman dang ni/_/zang zing bcas par mig sman 'grub/_/de las bkra shis 'grub pa yin/_/rab bsngags rgyal ba'i tshigs bcad dang /_/bde legs tshigs bcad kyis brgyan pa/_/rab bsngags zhag ni bzang po dag_/yar ngo dag gis legs mtshan pa/_/gza' 
[\[258b.7\]]mchog dkar ba dag ldan la/_/sngags sgrub pa ni brtsam par bya/_/de la sogs pa'i dge dang ldan/_/mi dge dag kyang spang bya ba/_/nga nyid kyis ni sngon bstan te/_/de bas zlos pas gzung bar bya/_/'jig rten ji snyed gang su dag_/skar ma'i dpyad la mkhas pa dang /_/
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]gzhan gyi rgyud la mkhas pa dang /_/lugs kyi bstan bcos gtan tshigs bcas/_/rig pa'i bstan bcos legs 'brel ba/_/sems can rnams la phan byed gang /_/de kun nga yis sngon gsungs te/_/sngags zlos pas ni gzung bar bya/_/lam 'di 
[\[259a.2\]]grub pa'i rgyu yin par/_/de nyid gzigs pas bstan pa yin/_/grub pa'i mtha' ni mtha' dag kun/_/gang yin thar pa'i rgyur gsungs pa/_/sngags kyi lam gyi grub pa'i rgyur/_/nga nyid kyis ni byas pa yin/_/sngags kyi rig pa mtha' dag ni/_/zlos pas don 
[\[259a.3\]]med mi bya'o/_/'jig rten pa yi sngags kun dang /_/dam par yang ni rab bstan dang /_/de bzhin 'jig rten 'das bzang po/_/thams cad kun la rab sbyar bya/_/sems ni log par mi bya ste/_/yid kyis nam yang sun mi dbyung /_/sngags rnams kun la mchod 
[\[259a.4\]]byed pa/_/dam tshig shes pas rab tu bstan/_/sangs rgyas dgongs shing phan pa yin/_/de bzhin ston pa'i bstan pa la/_/rab zhugs rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyang /_/zhugs par rab tu shes pa yi/_/thub zla'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni/_/'di ni dam tshig shes 
[\[259a.5\]]par gsungs/_/rtag tu sngags rnams don yod de/_/yang dag bsams pa thob pa yin/_/gzhan dbang ngas ni ma byas te/_/brnyas pa dag kyang spyad ma yin/_/sngags rnams 'phags pa ma yin pa'ang /_/de dag don med byas min brjod/_/'jig rten ji srid 
[\[259a.6\]]sngags rnams sam/_/yang na gzugs su byung ba'ang rung /_/kun nas nyon mongs mthong lam mtha'/_/de dag 'bras bu yod par bstan/_/khros dang zhe sdang ldan pa yis/_/don med par ni mi bya'o/_/mi 'dod gus pa med pa yi/_/las ni mi bya 'bras bu med/_/de dang 
[\[259a.7\]]'brel ba'i sems la ni/_/nam yang de la sbyin mi bya/_/rtag tu mnyam par bzhag nas ni/_/sngags tshig ldan par bzlas byas shing /_/cho ga ji bzhin gzung byas na/_/'bras bu mtha' dag thob par 'gyur/_/yid ni g.yo med byas nas kyang /_/sngags gcig de ni bzla bar bya/_/sngags 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]ni don kun sgrub pa ste/_/rtse gcig sems kyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/rmongs pa'i bdag nyid g.yeng ba'i sems/_/de la grub pa 'grub mi 'gyur/_/gang la yid ni dag pa dang /_/bstan pa la ni rab dad pa/_/'bras bu mtha' dag 'grub pa ste/_/'gro ba dam pa 'thob par 
[\[259b.2\]]'gyur/_/dkon mchog gsum la dad pa ni/_/'dod pa'i grub par nye bar bstan/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/_las dang bya ba dang cho ga dang rgyu mtshan shes pa'i le'u rab 'byam 
[\[259b.3\]]las/_nyi shu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyi phyag rgya dang sngags rab 'byam mchog tu shin 
[\[259b.4\]]tu gsang ba nyon cig_/ma dad pa'i sems can dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mngon par dad pa med pa dang /_dam tshig med pa dang /_gnang ba med pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun gcod par byed pa dang /_mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su 
[\[259b.5\]]zin pa dang /_bsod nams mi 'dod pa dang /_skye bo sdang ba dang /_'grogs shing 'dres pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang chos las thag ring du gyur pa dang /_cho ga 'di la 'bras bu med par gyur pa dang /_slob dpon gyi man ngag med pa dang /_
[\[259b.6\]]gzhon nu khyod kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la dbang ma bskur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dam tshig ma mthong ba dang /_skye bo mngon par mi 'dod pa dang /_snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la bstan par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas chos la ma dad dang /_/byang chub lam ni 
[\[259b.7\]]ring gyur la/_/de la phyag rgya mi sbyin zhing /_/rgyud nyid kyang ni bstan mi bya/_/bag med rmongs par gyur pa'am/_/yang na gal te chags pas byin/_/zlos pa phyin ci log byed la/_/de la sngags ni mi 'grub bo/_/phyag rgya nye bar mi 'gyur zhing /_/sngags nyid kyang ni gzhan du 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]'gyur/_/myur du grub pa mi 'thob cing /_/de yi lus kyang nyams par 'gyur/_/zhi zhing dad pa'i sems ldan dang /_/der ni dam tshig mthong ba dang /_/rgyud dang sngags la rab zhugs la/_/phyag rgya rgyud ni bstan par bya/_/dkon mchog gsum la 
[\[260a.2\]]mchod byed dang /_/rgyal ba'i bstan la rab dad dang /_/cho ga'i sbyor ba mthong ba dag_/de dag la ni phyag rgya bstan/_/byang chub sems kyi cho ga shes/_/byang chub sems kyis rnam par brgyan/_/rtag tu byang chub lam la gnas/_/de dag la ni phyag rgya bstan/_/
[\[260a.3\]]sngags dang rgyud la rab brtson zhing /_/phan tshun brgyud pas dam tshig mthong /_/byang chub chen por dam bcas pa/_/de la phyag rgya rab tu bstan/_/rgyal ba'i sras po dag dang ni/_/de bzhin nyan thos rang rgyal dang /_/mthong ba'i chos kyi 'bras thob gang /_/de 
[\[260a.4\]]la phyag rgya rab tu bstan/_/chos rnams la ni rnam rtog med/_/dad cing ser sna bral ba dang /_/ston pa'i bka' la rigs par shes/_/de la phyag rgya rab tu bstan/_/rtsa brgyad brgya yi tshad du ni/_/'di dag phyag rgya phyag rgyas btab/_/lhag dang nyung ba ma yin par/_/
[\[260a.5\]]mngon sum sangs rgyas kyis rab bshad/_/'jam dpal gang gi cho ga la/_/sngags kyang de dang mnyam pa yin/_/brgyad bcas brgya zhes gsungs pa dang /_/sngags rnams de dang mnyam par bstan/_/phyag rgya'ang brgya ni rtsa brgyad du/_/thub pa mchog gis 
[\[260a.6\]]sngon gsungs so/_/'di tsam tshad du cho ga la/_/phyag rgya sngags ni yang dag 'byung /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod nyid ni/_/sngags kyi mdzod du nye bar bstan/_/phyag rgya sngags ni mnyam ldan na/_/yang dag ldan pas las myur byed/_/'khor lo med pa'i shing rta ni/_/
[\[260a.7\]]rigs par 'gro bar mi 'byung ste/_/de bzhin sngags rnams ma lus pa/_/phyag rgya med par las mi byed/_/sngags dang phyag rgya mnyam ldan zhing /_/yang dag ldan pas myur las byed/_/lha dang lha min bcas pa yi/_/'jig rten gsum kun 'gugs byed na/_/las 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]gzhan dag gis legs sbyar ba'i/_/mi yi 'jig rten smos ci dgos/_/mthong chos 'bras bu 'di dag gi/_/phyag rgya sngags la snang ba yis/_/gnyi ga ldan zhing dag pa dang /_/cho ga ldan pa'i don bstan na/_/rgyal ba mchog dang sras rnams dang /_/'byung po rnams ni 
[\[260b.2\]]'gugs par byed/_/sngags dang phyag rgya dka' thub nyid/_/rnam gsum las ni legs gnas dang /_/ci 'dod phun sum tshogs pa kun/_/de bzhin zlos pas thob par 'gyur/_/sngags rnams phyag rgyas phyag rgya btab/_/sngags kyis kyang ni de rgya btab/_/sngags ni phyag 
[\[260b.3\]]rgya med pas min/_/sngags kyang phyag rgya spangs pas min/_/phyag rgya sngags ni mnyam ldan na/_/yang dag ldan pas las kun byed/_/'di dag phan tshun 'bras bu ste/_/phan tshun 'bras bu 'byung ba yin/_/sgrub pas rigs ldan sbyar byas na/_/bsgrub bya min pa'i las rnams med/_/
[\[260b.4\]]phyag rgya ldan pa'i zlos pa pos/_/sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par 'gyur/_/cho ga mthong bas rab brtson zhing /_/sngags dang phyag rgya kun byas na/_/gang du 'gugs 'gyur mi 'grub pa/_/de gnas de ni yod ma yin/_/srid rtse mnar med bar dang ni/_/'jig rten khams kyi 'gro 
[\[260b.5\]]ba gzhan/_/gang du mi 'bebs mi 'gugs dang /_/bsgrub bya ma yin gang yang med/_/sems can skye gnas las skyes dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' mi snang ba'ang /_/cho gas bskul nas mi 'gugs pa/_/de ni gang yang yod ma yin/_/srung ba'i cho ga'i rgyud dag gam/_/las 
[\[260b.6\]]'grub bzlog par bya ba la/_/sa bcu la ni gnas pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang mi nus/_/sngags dang phyag rgya la gnas la/_/'byung po kun gyis mi tshugs so/_/dka' thub bzlas pa cho ga'i lam/_/sbyin sreg las la rab sbyar na/_/'di las skye zhing de las grub/_/
[\[260b.7\]]phyag rgya sngags la snang ba yin/_/zlos pa rtag tu 'bad brtson zhing /_/rtag tu de dag la gnas na/_/sngags rnams grub par 'gyur ba ste/_/don yod 'gyur bar thub pa'i bka'/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung dag ni/_/de dag gis ni gzhan du byed/_/sngags dang rgyud ni rigs 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]pa la/_/gang zhig rtag tu mi 'jug pa'o/_/sngags dang phyag rgya mtha' dag ni/_/gang zhig cho ga ldan byed pa'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nu 'di dag ni/_/yang dang yang du bstan pa yin/_/sngags kyi rig pa mtha' dag ni/_/phyag rgyas sngags ni 
[\[261a.2\]]phan pa 'byung /_/de srid las la cho ga'i rgyal/_/'dis ni 'bras bu rgya chen 'byung /_/'jig rten gsang mchog phan pa dang /_/sngags dang phyag rgyas dam bcas pa/_/de nas rigs ldan 'jam dpal te/_/khyab par byed pa byis pa'i gzugs/_/cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin 
[\[261a.3\]]gyur gnas/_/gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag 'byung /_/byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus che/_/sa bcu la ni gnas pa yis/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen gyur pa/_/thub pa mchog la rab tu zhus/_/bcom ldan sngags kyi rgyud dag ni/_/gang yin 'di ni 'jig rten 
[\[261a.4\]]bstan/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag gis kyang /_/de yang bdag la gsungs pa yin/_/de ltar shAkya seng ge yis/_/ci yi phyir na rab tu gsungs/_/bdag ni de ltar the tshom 'tshal/_/thub pa mchog gis bdag la gsungs/_/blo ldan ka la ping ka'i skad/_/tshangs pa yi ni 
[\[261a.5\]]gsung dbyangs kyis/_/sa bcu la ni rab gnas pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' la gsungs pa/_/sngon ni bskal pa mang po ru/_/nga ni 'khor bar 'khor ba na/_/thub dbang me tog kun skyes las/_/cho ga'i rgyal po'ang nga yis thob/_/de dang der ni sems can la/_/phan pa 
[\[261a.6\]]mang po byas pa yin/_/thugs rje'i dbang du song nas ni/_/de tshe bdag gi smon lam byas/_/sangs rgyas mchog tu de tshe bdag_/dus kyi mthar ni yang dag byung /_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas ni/_/bstan pa'i don ni byas pa yin/_/phyi ma yi ni dus dag tu/_/de tshe nga ni mya 
[\[261a.7\]]ngan 'da'/_/de na cho ga'i rgyal dbang po/_/khyod kyi drung du nga yis bstan/_/nga yang 'jig rten mya ngan 'das/_/'dzam bu'i gling ni rab stongs shing /_/de bzhin ston pa'i chos kyi mdzod/_/rtsod dus thag ring gyur pa na/_/sems can rnams la bstan pa'i don/_/cho ga'i rgyal 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]po gcig byed 'gyur/_/cho ga'i rgyal po rgya chen la/_/de bzhin 'di ni yang dag 'jug_/sems can rnams ni don la brtson/_/de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de dus 'jigs su rung ba yi/_/de tshe sems can chos ldan min/_/rtag tu lus la mi gnas shing /_/
[\[261b.2\]]rgyal po rnams ni ma rungs yid/_/mi dang mi ma yin rnams ni/_/kun kyang bstan la rnam par sdang /_/ngas bshad chos kyi mdzod rnams ni/_/nga yi thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/_/de dag gdul ba'i don gyi phyir/_/sngags kyi mdzod ni nye bar bstan/_/bskal pa bsam mi 
[\[261b.3\]]khyab par sngon/_/gzhon nu khyod kyi smon lam 'di/_/sangs rgyas ji snyed gang su dag_/'jig rten gnyen gyur mya ngan 'das/_/de dag bstan pa'i don du ni/_/dus dang dus su bya'o zhes/_/bdag ni byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs/_/dus kun tu ni rnam par spyod/_/sngags 
[\[261b.4\]]kyi gzugs kyis sems can la/_/de dang der ni rnam par 'dul/_/gzhon nu khyod kyi smon lam 'di/_/sngon chad du ni byas pa yin/_/nga ni byis pa'i gzugs thob gyur/_/des na khyod la bshad par bya/_/skye bo skyabs ni med pa dang /_/sangs rgyas zhing ni stongs pa na/_/
[\[261b.5\]]sngags kyi gzugs kyis sems can la/_/byis pa'i tshul gyis yang dag shod/_/sems can mang po 'dul byed cing /_/phun sum tshogs pa sbyin byed pa/_/dus kyi tha ma de la ni/_/sems can kun la mchog sbyin byed/_/'jig rten nga ni mya ngan 'das/_/sa yi steng ni stongs 
[\[261b.6\]]gyur na/_/khyod nyid byis pa'i gzugs kyis ni/_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/_/de tshe dgon chen rab dga' ba/_/kha ba can nang yod pa yi/_/chu bo gser dang ldan 'gram du/_/nga ni mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub 
[\[261b.7\]]sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/_phyag rgya bskul ba'i cho ga 'jam dpal gyis yongs su zhus shing bstan pa'i le'u rab 'byam las/_nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i mdzod yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spu nas 'od zer du ma bye ba khri phrag 
[\[262a.2\]]brgya stong grangs med pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa byung ste/_/'od zer gyi dra ba du ma des sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma gsal bar byas nas/_sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par bskul nas/_phyir yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spur zhugs par gyur to/_/
[\[262a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par bskul ma thag tu nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil du bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sangs rgyas thams cad la 
[\[262a.4\]]mchod nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal phyag rgya'i le'u'i cho ga'i mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa bshad kyis nyon cig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs la btud de phyag 
[\[262a.5\]]'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod kyi phyag rgya mchog tu shin tu gsang ba gang yin pa de dus la bab par mkhyen na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni legs te bshad du gsol/_skye bo mang po la 
[\[262a.6\]]phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir dang lha dang mi rnams dang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang bde ba'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[262a.7\]]shAkya thub pa la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba btab nas/_phyag rgya thams cad la gzigs shing sangs rgyas thams cad la mkhyen par byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pa/_'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa/_'phags pa'i sngags rnams la yid brtson par byed pa la yang dag par gzengs stod pa/_ma rungs pa thams cad zlog par byed pa/_'jigs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa/_'khor bar gnas pa dag la bde 
[\[262b.2\]]ba dang shis pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'jog par byed pa/_sems can sdug bsngal ba thams cad la bde ba'i don gyi phyir phyag rgya'i le'u'i cho ga ngas bshad kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nu nyon cig_/dang po gtsug phud lnga pa ni/_/de ni phyag rgya chen por 'dod/_/
[\[262b.3\]]gnyis pa gtsug phud gsum pa yin/_/ral pa gcig pa gsum pa ste/_/bzhi pa ut+pa lar gsungs pa/_/rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/lnga pa bkra shis ldan du brjod/_/drug pa rgyal mtshan zhes su brjod/_/bdun pa gang ba zhes bstan te/_/sngags 
[\[262b.4\]]shes dag la legs mdzes shing /_/brgyad pa srog shing zhes brjod pa/_/sngags shes dag la legs mdzes yin/_/dgu pa gdugs zhes bstan pa ste/_/bcu pa mdung du brjod pa yin/_/de bzhin bcu gcig sangs rgyas kyis/_/kha sbyar zhes ni yang dag bstan/_/
[\[262b.5\]]bcu gnyis pa ni phub ces gsungs/_/bcu gsum pa ni da pus yin/_/bcu bzhi pa ni ral grir bshad/_/de bzhin dril bu [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa/_/bcu drug pa ni zhags par bstan/_/bcu bdun pa ni lcags kyur shes/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa ni bzang po'i gdan/_/bcu dgu pa ni gdan 
[\[262b.6\]]du brjod/_/nyi shur bstan pa rma bya'i gdan/_/nyi shu gcig pa paT+Ti saM/_/rtags gcig nyi shu gnyis pa ste/_/rtags gnyis nyi shu gsum pa yin/_/de bzhin phreng ba nyi shu bzhi/_/nyi shu lnga pa gzhu yin te/_/nyi shu drug par gsungs pa ni/_/lcags mda' dag tu rnam 
[\[262b.7\]]par brtags/_/nyi shu bdun par gsungs pa ni/_/rtags kun dag tu rab tu bstan/_/nyi shu brgyad pa gsal shing ste/_/nyi shu dgu pa tho ba yin/_/sum cu pa ni mda' bo che/_/sum cu gcig pa mche bar bstan/_/sum cu gnyis pa de bzhin kha/_/sum cu gsum pa ras 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]kyi gos/_/sum cu bzhi pa bum pa ste/_/sum cu lnga pa 'khar gsil yin/_/sum cu drug pa bya ma bum/_/sum cu bdun pa gtun shing ste/_/sum cu brgyad pa skyil krung yin/_/sum cu dgu pa pa Ta ha/_/bzhi bcu par ni rab bstan pa/_/chos kyi dung zhes 
[\[263a.2\]]nye bar bstan/_/bzhi bcu dag ni gcig pa yang /_/lcags thag ces ni yongs su bsgrags/_/gnyis par 'dod pa mang por gsungs/_/gsum pa yid la re ba rdzogs/_/bzhi pa skyed byed snang ba ste/_/shes rab pha rol phyin par 'dod/_/lnga pa ma mo zhes bshad 
[\[263a.3\]]pa/_/rkang gnyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/drug pa rta babs zhes byar gsungs/_/bdun pa rta babs bzang po yin/_/brgyad pa sgra skad dag tu bstan/_/dgu pa rgyal ba'i sgra yang yin/_/lnga bcu pa ni rnga bo che/_/lnga bcu gcig pa chos kyi rnga/_/lnga bcu gnyis pa 
[\[263a.4\]]ba lang bshad/_/gsum pa lag pa mchog yin te/_/lnga bcu bzhi par shes bya ba/_/phyag rgya de ni 'khrul med yin/_/lnga bcu lnga pa mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]yin/_/lnga bcu drug pa mda' yin te/_/bdun pa dag ni dgra star bstan/_/brgyad pa 'jig rten gyis mchod yin/_/
[\[263a.5\]]lnga bcu rtsa dgur shes bya ba/_/mdor na mtshon ni rtse gcig yin/_/drug cu par ni 'gyur ba yang /_/mdor na gshol du shes par bya/_/drug cu gcig pa pad+ma ste/_/drug cu gnyis pa rdo rjer bshad/_/chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed pa/_/'jig rten drug cu gsum par 
[\[263a.6\]]gsungs/_/drug cu bzhi par shes bya ba/_/mdor na pad+ma dkar po yin/_/drug cu lnga par shes bya ba/_/phyag rgya mchog sbyin dam pa yin/_/de nas drug cu drug pa ni/_/theg pa'i phyag rgyar sangs rgyas gsungs/_/drug cu bdun par 'jig rten du/_/mkhas pas mdung du 
[\[263a.7\]]bstan pa yin/_/drug cu brgyad par bya ba ni/_/rdo rje dbyug pa'i phyag rgyar gsungs/_/drug cu rtsa dgur 'gyur ba ni/_/dgra 'joms byed par rab tu bstan/_/bdun cu par ni shes bya ba/_/mdor na klu yi phyag rgya yin/_/bdun cu gcig par gsungs pa ni/_/gzhal med 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]phyag rgya mchog bzang yin/_/bdun cu gnyis pa mdor bsdu na/_/shing rta zhes ni de la brjod/_/mdor na bdun cu gsum pa ni/_/'jig rten mgon gyi gdan du gsungs/_/de bzhin bdun cu bzhi dang ni/_/bdun cu lnga ru bstan pa dag_/tshes brgyad zla ba pi 
[\[263b.2\]]bang dag_/phyag rgya gnyis su bstan pa yin/_/bdun cu rtsa drug 'jig rten du/_/phyag rgya pad+ma 'dra ba yin/_/bdun cu bdun pa'i phyag rgya mchog_/ut+pa la ni 'byung ba'i gnas/_/bdun cu brgyad pa'i phyag rgya ni/_/phyag 'tshal ba zhes bstan pa yin/_/bdun 
[\[263b.3\]]cu rtsa dgu mchod yon rgya/_/dgra bcom phyag rgya brgyad cu pa/_/mar me brgyad cu gcig par shes/_/thal sbyar brgyad cu gnyis par 'dod/_/gsum pa phreng ba zhes bya ba'o/_/bzhi pa gdan zhes gsungs pa yin/_/lnga pa gnas kyi phyag rgyar bstan/_/drug pa rab 
[\[263b.4\]]gnas gsungs pa ste/_/bdun pa dbang gi phyag rgyar brjod/_/brgyad cu brgyad pa mchog tu 'dod/_/dgu dang dgu bcu'i grangs dag ni/_/phyag rgya gnyis ni dge ba mchog_/kha sbyar zung gi phyag rgya ste/_/grangs ni dgu bcu 'byung ba ste/_/dgu bcu rtsa gcig ces gsungs 
[\[263b.5\]]pa/_/me tog gi ni phyag rgyar bstan/_/gnyis pa gtor ma'i phyag rgya ste/_/gsum pa rtag tu spos kyi yin/_/bzhi pa dri yi phyag rgya ste/_/lnga pa mar mer shes par bya/_/drug pa sbyor bar shes par bya/_/bdun pa skyil krung phyed kyi gnas/_/brgyad pa dag ni bong ba ste/_/
[\[263b.6\]]dgu pa dag ni gshegs su gsol/_/de bzhin brgya rdzogs phyag rgya ni/_/thams cad pa yi las shes bya/_/brgya las rtsa gcig gsungs pa ni/_/phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ste/_/gtsug tor 'jig rten mgon po ni/_/rtag tu bla ma 'khor los sgyur/_/phyag rgya de ni dang por 
[\[263b.7\]]gsungs/_/gnyis pa gdugs dkar las byung yin/_/gsum pa rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs su snang ba yin/_/bzhi pa chos kyi mdzod kyi gnas/_/chos kyi phyag rgyar shes par bya/_/lnga pa dge 'dun zhes bya ste/_/de ni phyag rgya chen po'ang yin/_/drug pa 'byung 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]po zhi byed pa/_/rang rgyal lag pa'i phyag rgya nyid/_/bdun pa byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/sa bcu dag la zhugs pa yi/_/phyag rgya pad+ma'i phreng ba ste/_/phyag rgya chen por de shes bya/_/'jig rten pa ni thams cad kyi/_/phyag rgya sngags rnams mchog sbyin 
[\[264a.2\]]byed/_/mthu chen gtso bo chen po ste/_/gtso bo 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod/_/brgyad pa yang dag rab sbyar ba/_/phyag rgya srid gsum skye gnas yin/_/phyag rgya rnams kyi grangs bstan pa/_/rgyud 'di las ni rab 'byung ba/_/brgya gcig de bzhin rtsa brgyad du/_/phyag 
[\[264a.3\]]rgya'i grangs su brtags pa yin/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis 'di tshad du/_/sa steng sngon ni bstan pa yin/_/ston dang bstan pa 'jig pa na/_/lus can rnams ni rab spyod 'gyur/_/dang po re zhig lag pa gnyis/_/thal mo sbyar te rtse mo sprad/_/sor mo phan tshun nang du gshib/_/
[\[264a.4\]]sor mo phan tshun sbyar nas ni/_/de nas yang dag sbyar nas kyang /_/lag gnyis yang dag ldan pa la/_/gtsug pud lngas ni legs mtshan bya/_/sor mo rnams kyi rtse mo dag_/de nas de dag rnam bzlog pa/_/phyag rgya gtsug pud lngar shes bya/_/gtsug pud lnga pa nyid dag ni/_/
[\[264a.5\]]phyag rgya chen po zhes su bsgrags/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dbu la yod/_/'di ni phyag rgya mthu bo che/_/rab sbyar las kun byed pa yin/_/'jam dpal gyi ni sngags dag gam/_/snying po nyid ni rab tu sbyar/_/skra can ma yi sngags dag gam/_/rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rtag tu bya/_/cho 
[\[264a.6\]]ga mthong bas sbyar ba'am/_/sngags rnams kun gyis byas na ni/_/las rnams kun ni don yod par/_/thub pa'i bkas ni bstan pa yin/_/de bzhin lag pa rnam bkod nas/_/de yi lag pa kha sbyar bya/_/de bzhin rtse mo gsum bya ste/_/sor mo rnams ni rab sbyar nas/_/lag 
[\[264a.7\]]gnyis mthe bo spyod pa dang /_/rab tu phyung ste drang por bya/_/gung mo dang ni srin lag dag_/phyin ci log tu 'brel pa bya/_/'di ni gtsug pud gsum zhes bya/_/ral pa gsum pa zhes bya'ang yin/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi/_/phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/_/gang dag cho ga 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]mthong ba yi/_/las rnams kun ni byed pa yin/_/'jam dpal gsang sngags gang yin pa/_/de dag kun la sbyar bar bya/_/zlos pa yid la gang 'dod pa/_/don de myur du grub par byed/_/lag pa de bzhin rnam bkod nas/_/de bzhin gtsug pud gcig par bya/_/
[\[264b.2\]]sor mo gung mo yang dag sbyar/_/nges par gtsug pud gcig par 'gyur/_/rgya 'di phyag rgya chen po ste/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/_/gzhon nu'i sngags ni rab bkod dang /_/gang yang 'jig rten kun gyi yang /_/de dang sbyar na 'grub 'gyur te/_/
[\[264b.3\]]myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/_/de bzhin 'di yis bsgrub bya ni/_/sngags mchog rgyal bas bshad pa yin/_/cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/_/'di don myur du bsgrub par bya/_/de bzhin lag pa yang dag sbyar/_/sor mo'i rtse mo dgug cing dgod/_/mdzub mo 
[\[264b.4\]]gnyis ni rtse sprad dgug_/sor mo gzhan ni rang bzhag la/_/mthe mo gnyis ni rab gshib nas/_/gung mo gnyis ni rab brkyang bya/_/srin lag gnyis ni rtse sprad bkug_/ut+pa la ru bstan pa yin/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/rtsa ba'i sngags ni brjod cing bya/_/
[\[264b.5\]]gtsug pud lnga par bstan pa yi/_/las rnams gang yin de dag nyid/_/de kun ut+pa la yis ni/_/myur du sgrub par byed pa yin/_/'di ni mchog sbyin phyag rgya ste/_/myur du longs spyod sgrub byed pa'o/_/rtsa ba'i sngags dang ldan byas na/_/myur du nor ni byed par 'gyur/_/lag 
[\[264b.6\]]gnyis de bzhin sbyar byas nas/_/lag pa gnyis po rab bkan la/_/kho ra yug tu sor mo yis/_/de nyid kha ni yang dag sbyar/_/bkra shis ldan pa'i rnam par 'byung /_/mdzes pa'i rnam par dgod par bya/_/gung mo'i sor mo'i dbus su ni/_/mthe'u chung gnyis ni 
[\[264b.7\]]yang dag sbyar/_/mthe bo gnyi ga rnam sbyar ba/_/phyag rgya bkra shis ldan du brjod/_/don kun byed pa'i phyag rgya 'di/_/zhi ba'i las la rab tu sbyar/_/snying po'am yi ge drug ldan pas/_/las rnams kun ni byed par 'gyur/_/de bzhin lag gnyis sbyar nas ni/_/sor mo phan tshun rab sbyar ba/_/
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]'gro ba'i khyad par mkhyen pa yis/_/gang ba bzang zhes gsungs pa yin/_/rtse mo'i phyogs kyi sor mo rnams/_/kun nas yongs su 'gyed byas pa/_/gang ba bzang zhes sangs rgyas kyis/_/zlos pa rnams la gsungs pa yin/_/de 'di sdug bsngal dag dang ni/_/dbul 
[\[265a.2\]]ba'i sdug bsngal rab zhi byed/_/rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskul byas na/_/myur du nor gyis phyug par byed/_/'jig rten mkhyen cing legs spyod pas/_/phyag rgya gzhan yang gsungs pa ni/_/lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/_/g.yon pa phab cing de la brten/_/lag pa g.yas 
[\[265a.3\]]pas bya ba ni/_/de yi sor mo dgug cing gzhag_/mdzub mo gung mo nyid dag ni/_/bsgreng ba rgyal mtshan zhes brjod de/_/rgyal mtshan phyag rgya zhes grags pa/_/bsgreng bas dgra ni zlog par byed/_/phyag rgya 'di yi bya ba ni/_/rim gyis gtor ma sbyin sreg sogs/_/phyag rgya 
[\[265a.4\]]'di yis bya ba ni/_/rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rab bskul na/_/'di ni las kun byed pa yin/_/lag pa de bzhin rnam sbyar ba/_/thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya ste/_/bgegs rnams ma lus rnam 'jig cing /_/sngags shes mnyam par brjod pa ni/_/rim gyis las rnams byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[265a.5\]]cho ga mthong ba'i ldan pas ni/_/myur du don ni sgrub par byed/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi snying po ni/_/snying gi gnas las yang dag byung /_/'jig rten ma lus bsam pa yi/_/las rnams yang dag ldan pas byed/_/lag pa de bzhin sbyar byas nas/_/g.yon pa'i steng du g.yas pa 
[\[265a.6\]]bzhag_/g.yas kyi mdzub mo blangs nas ni/_/g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng byas pa/_/'di ni srog shing phyag rgya yin/_/dgra rnams kun ni zlog byed cing /_/mi bzad shin tu 'jigs rung ba'i/_/bgegs rnams thams cad zhi bar byed/_/sngags zlos pa yis bstan pa ni/_/
[\[265a.7\]]ma rungs thams cad gsad don phyir/_/rtsa ba'i sngags dang yang dag ldan/_/myur du las ni byed par 'gyur/_/de bzhin lag pa sbyar byas la/_/srog shing 'dra bar btsugs byas nas/_/de steng lag g.yas brkyang byas pa/_/phyag rgya gdugs zhes bya bar brjod/_/phyag rgya 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]'di yis bya ba ni/_/bdag gi spyi bor bsrung bar bya/_/sngags rnams kun gyis byed pa ste/_/las ni srung bar byed pa yin/_/dgra rnams kyi ni gdong 'gebs shing /_/mi 'dod pa dag rengs par byed/_/mi ma yin dang ma rungs pa/_/ci ltar 'dod par byed pa 
[\[265b.2\]]yin/_/gdugs kyi phyag rgya de mthong bas/_/bgegs rnams kun ni rnam par 'jig_/lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/_/lag pa dag ni mdzes sbyar nas/_/mthe bo mdzub mo rtse sprad ldan/_/gung mo gnyis ni rab brkyang zhing /_/srin lag gnyis ni rtse sprad 
[\[265b.3\]]bkug_/gung mo'i tshigs gnyis sbyar bar bya/_/de nyid mdung gi phyag rgyar bstan/_/ma rungs thams cad zlog par byed/_/srin po gdon rnams 'jig byed nas/_/'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa yin/_/khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed/_/khros pas rab 
[\[265b.4\]]tu bstan pa yin/_/mi bzad sdig pa'i las byed pa'i/_/'jig rten la ni rab myur byed/_/srog la gnod par byed pa'i las/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis spangs pa yi/_/las 'di dag ni mi bya ste/_/'jig rten dam pas bkag pa yin/_/yang na kun 'gro'i sngags 
[\[265b.5\]]sbyar ba'i/_/mdung gi phyag rgya dam pa yin/_/gang dag 'jig rten sngags rnams dang /_/de bzhin rgyal bas rab bshad pa/_/de dag gi ni sngags rnams sbyar/_/mdung gi phyag rgya legs mnyam bzhag_/sngags kyi mchog ni mi bzad mthong /_/bden bral thams 
[\[265b.6\]]cad 'jig par 'gyur/_/sha za skar ma [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_/srul po dang ni ma mo dang /_/byis pa'i gdon dang mi sdug gzugs/_/byis pa rnams la gnod byed pa/_/gang dag gdug pa'i las ldan pa/_/ma rungs thams cad 'joms par byed/_/de bzhin lag 
[\[265b.7\]]ni sbyar byas nas/_/thal mo'i rnam par byas pa dag_/de nyid rnam par bzlog bya ste/_/sor mo phan tshun 'byar ba ni/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas pa zhe sdang bral/_/de nyid kha sbyar zhes ni gsungs/_/yi ge gcig pa'i sngags dang ni/_/phyag rgya 'di yi las kyis bya/_/'di 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]nyid phyag rgyas phyogs kun bcing /_/de ni phyogs bcing zhes bya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di ni bsrung ba che/_/kha sbyar byas nas 'dug pa yin/_/gzhan yang gang dag gnod byed pa'i/_/ma rungs thams cad 'jig par byed/_/lus dang sems can 'khor 
[\[266a.2\]]dang ni/_/spyod yul dag kyang 'dzin par byed/_/gang du zlos pa rtag gnas pa/_/ma lus tshogs ni srung bar byed/_/de la sdig pa ci yang med/_/phan pa med pa'ang 'byung mi 'gyur/_/bde dang lo legs nad med na/_/pha rol dmag tshogs 'jigs pa gang /_/
[\[266a.3\]]de nas lag gnyis yang sbyar nas/_/bzlog par yang ni bya ba yin/_/g.yas pa 'og tu byas nas ni/_/g.yon pa'ang steng du bkan par bya/_/lag gnyis phan tshun bsnol ba 'di/_/rgyal ba mchog gis mchog sbyin gsungs/_/sdig pa yang dag 'byung byed pa'i/_/ma 
[\[266a.4\]]rungs dgra rnams zlog par byed/_/yi ge gcig gnyis gsum dag gi/_/yi ge ldan pa brjod pa dang /_/sngags ni 'dod pa dang ldan pas/_/'di ni myur du las rnams byed/_/dgra las byung ba'i sdig dag la/_/don gyi las rnams sna tshogs byed/_/rtsa ba'i sngags 
[\[266a.5\]]dang ldan pa yis/_/sbrul gyi dug ni sel bar byed/_/yang na gzhan gyis sbyar ba yi/_/lus can skyon ni sel bar byed/_/sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog dag gis/_/'di ni phyag rgya mchog tu gsungs/_/lag pa de bzhin sbyar byas nas/_/sor mo rnams ni sbyar 
[\[266a.6\]]ba las/_/de tshe da pus 'dra bya ba/_/rtsa bar yang ni bcing ba ste/_/mthe bo gnyis kyi dbus su ni/_/mthe'u chung dag gis legs par dkri/_/sor mo drug gis bya ba ni/_/rtse mo sbyar te legs mdzes bya/_/'di ni da pus phyag rgyar gsungs/_/lha min thams 
[\[266a.7\]]cad 'joms par byed/_/lha ma yin dang gdug sems ldan/_/mthong bas sems ni zhi 'gyur zhing /_/phyag rgya brjod na 'jig par 'gyur/_/da pus phyag rgya legs mchod pa/_/rtsa ba'i sngags ni rab sbyar na/_/myur du don rnams byed cing zhi/_/de bzhin ral gri 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]bstan pa yang /_/srin lag mdzub mo bkug pas so/_/de bzhin lag gnyis byas nas ni/_/rab brkyang dang po dgug par bya/_/sor mo dag gis 'khor yug tu/_/kham phor mnyam pa'i dbyibs su bya/_/dril bur sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen cing /_/lus can rnams la yang 
[\[266b.2\]]dag bstan/_/lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar nas ni/_/gnyi ga kha sbyar rab bcings nas/_/phan tshun bsre ba byas nas ni/_/de bzhin gung mo'i sor mo gnyis/_/dkyil 'khor 'dra bar byas pa yis/_/zhags pa 'dra bar 'byung ba ni/_/de nas mdzub mo gnyis po dag_/dbu ma'i tshigs su 
[\[266b.3\]]bcing bya ba/_/'di ni zhags pa zhes bya ste/_/rgya 'di sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o/_/sems can rnams ni gdul don du/_/mi bzad 'ching ba byed par gsungs/_/gang yang ma rungs gdug pa'i gza'/_/gang yang gnod sbyin srin po rnams/_/'di ni cung zad rab bskul 
[\[266b.4\]]bas/_/'dir ni ma mor bcas pa 'ching /_/chings shig chings shig ces brjod pas/_/brgya byin bcas pa'ang 'dir 'ching na/_/sha za sha ni za ba dang /_/mi yi 'jig rten smos ci dgos/_/lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/_/de ni gnyi ga mnyam byas nas/_/de bzhin 
[\[266b.5\]]lag pa g.yas pa ni/_/g.yon pa'i steng du yongs su gzhag_/gung mo dang ni mdzub mo dag_/de nyid lcags kyu 'dra bar bya/_/tshigs ni bar ma la brten nas/_/mdzub mo nyid ni lcags kyur bya/_/rtsa ba'i sngags la 'di rab sbyar/_/lcags kyur 'di ni rab tu bya/_/yid la gang 
[\[266b.6\]]zhig zlos par 'dod/_/myur du las ni rab tu byed/_/myur du lha dbang tshangs pa sogs/_/brgya byin bcas pa'ang 'gugs par byed/_/phyag rgya gtso mchog rab sbyar ba/_/lcags kyu 'gugs pa dge ba yin/_/lag gnyis de bzhin rab sbyar nas/_/bzlog pa'i rnam pas nang 
[\[266b.7\]]bcings la/_/g.yon pa'i lag pa'i sor mo ni/_/gung mo srin lag dgug par bya/_/g.yas pa'i lag pa'i sor mo ni/_/gung mo srin lag rnam par dgug_/mdzub mo mthe'u chung dag kyang ni/_/gnyi ga sdigs mdzub bya ba ni/_/de nas rnam bzlog bzhag pa la/_/mthe bo gnyis ni 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]dgug cing sbyar/_/de nyid bzang po'i gdan gsungs pa/_/phyag rgya mchog ni dge ba yin/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gdan yin te/_/khro ldan sems can zlog pa yin/_/rgyal ba mchog gi rigs las byung /_/sngags rnams kun la rab tu sbyar/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[267a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'joms byed cing /_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag_/thams cad g.yo ba med byed pa'o/_/bzang po'i stan ni de nyid la/_/gung mo la ni yang dag brten/_/steng du rnam par dgod pa ni/_/gung mo srin lag rab brkyang ba'o/_/
[\[267a.3\]]de nyid gdan du gsungs pa ni/_/thub pa dgra rgyal seng ges so/_/de bzhin lag gnyis sbyar nas ni/_/sor mo rnams ni bcing bar bya/_/de nas yal ga 'dra bar ni/_/'og tu mthe'u chung rtse mor sbyar/_/gung mo yang dag dgug bya zhing /_/pad+ma'i 'dab ltar yangs pa bya/_/
[\[267a.4\]]mthe bo gnyis ka sbyar bzhag nas/_/rtag tu bsgreng ste bzhag pa yin/_/zhe sdang bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/'di ni rma bya'i gdan du gsungs/_/'di ni blo ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di yi ni/_/byis pa rtag tu rtse byed pa'i/_/gdan du thub pa 
[\[267a.5\]]mchog gis gsungs/_/mthu chen phyag rgya chen po 'di/_/rang byung rnams kyis sngon bshad pa'o/_/'jam dbyangs sngags kyis rab bskul na/_/rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams byed/_/sha za sha ni za ba rnams/_/gdug pa rnams ni 'jig par byed/_/nyi shu de bzhin tshang bar 
[\[267a.6\]]ni/_/de dag phyag rgyar 'dod pa ste/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas pa rkang gnyis mchog_/'jig rten gtso bos gsungs pa yin/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/phyag rgya rnams kyi cho ga rnams/_/lag pa dge zhing dag pa dang /_/dri med chu yis bkrus pa dang /_/tsan+dan dkar dang 
[\[267a.7\]]ga pur dang /_/gur gum chu dang ldan pa yi/_/dri yi khyad par mang po yis/_/byugs shing me la bskams pa yi/_/lag pa ma nyams gtsang ba dang /_/ma smad shu ba med pa yis/_/dang por phyag bya rkang gnyis mchog_/de yi phyag rgya bcing bar bya/_/sa la me tog kun skyes 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]dang /_/'od dpag med dang rin chen tog_/dpag med tshe shes mi g.yo dbang /_/'jig rten mgon po nyin byed dang /_/bde byed 'jig rten mgon po dang /_/spyan bzang chos kyi tog dang ni/_/'od kyi phreng ba zhes grags pa/_/gtso bo mchog ni dam pa dag_/'di dag ga 
[\[267b.2\]]pur sangs rgyas ni/_/rkang gnyis mchog la phyag byas nas/_/gtsang ba'i gnas su gtsang byas nas/_/zlos pa'i dus su phyag rgya bcing /_/slob dpon la ni yang dag dris/_/the tshom don las rnam par grol/_/de 'dra'i spyod pa de ldan na/_/ci ltar bde bar phyag rgya 
[\[267b.3\]]bcing /_/rnam sbyangs rnam par dben pa dang /_/gnas kyang mngon par bsngags byas pa/_/khros min zas lhag bcas pa min/_/gzhan dag gis ni sems g.yeng min/_/sol ba thal ba'i nang dag tu/_/nam yang phyag rgya bshad mi bya/_/gzhan gyi bud med la chags dang /_/
[\[267b.4\]]gzhan nor chags la'ang bshad mi bya/_/langs dang nyal ba dag la ni/_/phyag rgya bde 'byung bshad mi bya/_/lhor bltas 'dug la'ang ma yin te/_/nub tu bltas te 'dug par min/_/steng dang 'og gi phyogs dag tu'ang /_/phyag rgya bcing bar mi bya'o/_/byang dang shar du bltas 
[\[267b.5\]]pa dang /_/phyogs mtshams dag ni de dag tu/_/dkyil 'khor bdag po'i sngags dran nas/_/sngags shes pas ni phyag rgya bcing /_/phyag rgya ma lus bcing ba la/_/cho ga mchog 'di 'dod pa yin/_/de yi 'og tu brjod bya ba/_/phyag rgya nyi shu gcig pa yin/_/lag gnyis mnyam 
[\[267b.6\]]par byas nas ni/_/sor mo rnams ni sbyar bar bya/_/de nas sor mo gung mo ni/_/rtse mo sbyar bar bya ba yin/_/mdzub mo dang ni mthe'u chung gi/_/rtse mo tshigs ni bar mar gzhag_/phyag rgya shes pas rtag bya ba/_/mthe bong gnyis ni bkug rten cing /_/rtse mo gsum sbyar 
[\[267b.7\]]yang dag ldan/_/paT+Ti saM du mkhas pas shes/_/phyag rgya 'di ni mchog yin te/_/myur du gzhan gyi sngags rnams gcod/_/de nas gzhan gyi phyag rgya gcod/_/ma rungs sems can la sbyar bya/_/gza' dang ma mo srul po yi/_/'byung po kun ni skrag par byed/_/las rnam sna 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]tshogs byed pa ste/_/zhi ba'ang myur du 'gugs par byed/_/drag po khyab 'jug tshangs pa dag_/gang dag rang gis smras pa'i sngags/_/cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/_/sngags shes pas ni de dag gcod/_/bdag nyid chen po paT+Ti sa'i/_/phyag rgya dang ni ldan pa 
[\[268a.2\]]dang /_/rgyal ba'i zhal nas byung ba yi/_/sngags nyid dang yang ldan gnas na/_/rnam pa sna tshogs las byed de/_/de bzhin gcod dang dral ba'i las/_/sems can gzhan gyis byas pa'i skyon/_/ma lus mtha' dag 'jig par byed/_/lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar nas ni/_/gung mo srin 
[\[268a.3\]]lag bsgreng bya ste/_/lag gnyis yang dag ldan pa ni/_/mtshan dang 'dra bar yang dag 'byung /_/sor mo bzhi ni yang dag ldan/_/mtshan gyi phyag rgya zhes 'dod do/_/lha yi bu ni dbang phyug che/_/rang gi rgyas ni phyag rgya btab/_/thub pas sngon ni bkug pa la/_/rgyud 'di las 
[\[268a.4\]]ni gsungs pa yin/_/cho ga mchog 'dir dam tshig dang /_/bdag nyid sngags ni ma lus dag_/de bzhin phyag rgya rgya cher bcas/_/bkug nas rab tu bstan pa yin/_/phyag rgya yi ni rab mchog 'di/_/'jig rten dag la rab tu bstan/_/phyag rgya dag ni gang ji snyed/_/
[\[268a.5\]]drag pos sa steng rab bstan pa/_/de dag gi ni bdag po mchog_/phyag rgya 'di ni rtags gcig yin/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan pa/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/_/dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bsdus pa ste/_/sbyin sreg las ni rab sgrub pa'o/_/gang dag ji snyed 
[\[268a.6\]]gdug pa pa/_/sa yi steng na rgyu ba yi/_/gdon dang sha rjen sha za dang /_/ma mo dang ni lus srul po/_/drag pos bgegs ni byas pa dag_/de dag bzlog pa'i don ched du/_/mtshan mo gtor ma'i las dag la/_/phyag rgya mchog 'di gsungs pa yin/_/sangs rgyas byin rlabs rdzu 
[\[268a.7\]]'phrul gyis/_/las rnams ma lus byed par 'gyur/_/de bzhin de ni rnam gnyis byas/_/rtags ni gnyis su yang dag bstan/_/de bzhin sor mo phreng bar byas/_/phreng ba zhes ni yongs su bsgrags/_/de nyid phreng ba yang dag bsdus/_/kha sbyar 'dra bar yang dag 'byung /_/mdzub mo 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]gnyis kyi rtse sprad pa/_/gzhu dang 'dra bar bya ba yin/_/mthe bo gnyis ni chang par gnon/_/de ni gzhu yi phyag rgyar mtshon/_/de bzhin sor mo byas nas ni/_/g.yas pa'i mdzub mo nges par brkyang /_/g.yon pa'i mdzub mo'ang brkyang byas te/_/mthe bo'i tshigs ni chang 
[\[268b.2\]]pas gnan/_/lcags mda'i phyag rgya zhes bstan te/_/mtshan ma mnyam par yang brjod do/_/de bzhin lag gnyis byas nas ni/_/sor mo rnams ni phan tshun bcing /_/mdzub gnyis bslang bar yang dag sbyar/_/mdung dang 'dra bar byas pa yang /_/ma rungs thams cad 
[\[268b.3\]]rjes skrag pa/_/'di ni mdung zhes rab tu gsungs/_/de bzhin lag gnyis byas nas ni/_/gnyi ga'ang khu tshur bcing bya zhing /_/mthe bo gnyis ni bsgreng byas pa/_/tho ba'i phyag rgyar bstan pa yin/_/kha sbyar tho ba de nyid las/_/cung zad rab tu bskyod pa ni/_/mda' chen mchog 
[\[268b.4\]]tu gsungs pa ste/_/phyag rgya dgra ni 'jig byed pa'o/_/de nas ut+pal bcings byas te/_/de bzhin mthe'u chung sor mo gnyis/_/mthe bo'i 'og gi nang dag tu/_/dgod cing mdzub mo bstan par bya/_/'di ni mche ba zhes gsungs te/_/rnam par bye ba zhal zhes brjod/_/sor mo 
[\[268b.5\]]dag ni kun nas kyang /_/de dag mnyam par byas nas su/_/g.yas pa'i lag pa'i dkyil dag tu/_/g.yon pa'i lag bzhag ba dan brjod/_/lag pa dag ni gnyi ga yang /_/kha sbyar dag ni mdzes par gzhag_/sor dang sor mo dag kyang ni/_/phan tshun rtse mo dag sbyar bya/_/
[\[268b.6\]]de nas srin lag rtse gnyis dgug_/bum pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag bstan/_/de nyid khu tshur sbyar nas ni/_/mdzub mo gnyis ni sngon du bsgreng /_/rtse mo dgug pa'i rnam par bya/_/'khar gsil 'dra bar 'gyur ba yin/_/phyag rgya 'di ni yang dag bstan/_/'khar gsil sgra ni 
[\[268b.7\]]sel bar byed/_/'khar gsil de nyid cung zad tsam/_/legs par rab tu btud pa ni/_/mthe bo gnyis la rnam par sbyar/_/de 'dir bya ma bum du brjod/_/mdzub mo dang ni srin lag gnyis/_/bsgreng bar yang ni bya ba ste/_/de dag gi ni rtse bzhi sprad/_/gtun shing 'dra bar yang 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]dag 'gyur/_/sngags shes yang dag ldan pa yis/_/gtun shing gi ni phyag rgyar bshad/_/lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar nas ni/_/gung mo srin lag 'og dang ni/_/steng du de dag rnam par dgod/_/g.yas pas g.yon pa bcing bar bya/_/sor mo mdzub mo 
[\[269a.2\]]mthe'u chung dag_/phan tshun du ni yang dag sbyar/_/khor yug skyil krung 'dra ba yi/_/phyag rgyar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/_/'di ni skyil krung phyag rgya zhes/_/'jig rten kun tu grags pa yin/_/phyag rgya 'di dang ldan pa dang /_/de bzhin sngags dang rab ldan pa/_/
[\[269a.3\]]rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs pa dang /_/rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs las byung /_/'di dag gi ni sngags ldan 'di/_/zhi ba'i las kun byed pa yin/_/gtun shing la sogs mdung gi bar/_/gang yang phyag rgya de bzhin gsungs/_/thams cad khro bo'i rgyal po ni/_/gshin rje gshed 'di'i 
[\[269a.4\]]bstan pa yin/_/mtshon cha drag po 'di dag ni/_/thams cad gdul phyir sprul ba yin/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/_/de tshe bsgrub bya sgrub pa yin/_/gdul bya gdug pa thams cad la/_/bum pa la sogs phyag rgya gsungs/_/lag gnyis de bzhin bkod nas ni/_/
[\[269a.5\]]pa Ta ha yi rnga 'dra bya/_/sor mo rnams ni mnyam par sbyar/_/thams cad kyis kyang rim par bsnol/_/mthe bong yang ni rim par bya/_/de nas lag pa'i nang du gzhug_/gung mo mdzub mo gnyis po ni/_/gyen du bsgreng ba dag tu bya/_/'di ni pa Ta ha zhes bas bstan/_/phyag rgya ma rungs 
[\[269a.6\]]zlog byed pa'o/_/lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/_/sor mo rnams ni legs par sbyar/_/gdub kor 'dra bar mdzes pa yi/_/mdzub mo gnyis ni rnam bkug la/_/mthe bo gnyis ni 'og mthar bya/_/mthe bo gnyis kyang smad par bya/_/gung mo sbyar la rab gzhug gzhag_/dung 
[\[269a.7\]]ni mdzes par 'gyur ba yin/_/'di ni chos kyi dung zhes pa'i/_/lag pa'i phyag rgyar rab tu bstan/_/thub mchog gsungs pa'i sngags ldan na/_/las ni thams cad byed pa yin/_/rnam pa sna tshogs las byed pa/_/rtsa ba'i sngags dang rab sbyar na/_/mche ba'i dug can thams cad 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]dang /_/sbrul gyi dug rnams thams cad sel/_/rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/_/phyag rgya dung ni 'bud bzhin bzlas/_/dug gis brgyal ba'i skye bo ni/_/myur du dug ni med par 'gyur/_/phyag rgya mchog ni rdzu 'phrul che/_/bzhi bcu dag ni yang dag bstan/_/de nas gzhan 
[\[269b.2\]]yang phyag rgya yi/_/mtshan zhing yang dag bshad bya ba/_/lag gnyis de bzhin rnam bkod pa/_/sor mo'i rtse mo legs par sbyar/_/g.yon min lag pa'i nang du ni/_/'bad pas lag g.yon gzhug par bya/_/thams cad 'og tu byas pa yi/_/lu gu rgyud du bstan pa yin/_/
[\[269b.3\]]'di ni phyag rgya rab mchog ste/_/gdug pa ma lus 'ching bar byed/_/thub pa mchog gis gsungs pa yi/_/sngags 'di dag dang ldan byas na/_/gza' dang ma mo sdig ldan rnams/_/'byung po ma lus 'ching bar 'gyur/_/lag gnyis de bzhin kun bsdus nas/_/bkrol zhing rim 
[\[269b.4\]]par yang dag bsgreng /_/gung mo'i tshigs su mthe bo ni/_/'di nyid cho gas gzhag par bya/_/mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang /_/gung mo'i bar tshigs yang dag sbyar/_/me la mngon phyogs bstan byas nas/_/me yi sngags dang legs par sbyar/_/me yi las la thams cad du/_/
[\[269b.5\]]me la spyan ni drang bya ste/_/me yi phyag rgya rab sbyar na/_/myur du me ni spyan drang 'gyur/_/phyag rgya sngags kyis gshegs su gsol/_/mdzub mo'i rtse mo nyid la ni/_/mthe bo'i rtse mo rab sbyar bas/_/me yi lha ni gshegs gsol ba'i/_/phyag rgya 'di ni kun gyis bzhed/_/me yi las 
[\[269b.6\]]ni rab sgrub pa'o/_/zlos pa sngags ni gang 'dod pa'i/_/lha rnams dag ni spyan drang 'gyur/_/phyag rgya kun gyi bzhed pa 'di/_/sangs rgyas byin brlab gsungs pa yin/_/sngags mchog dang ni ldan pa yis/_/las rnams rnam pa sna tshogs byed/_/lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/_/
[\[269b.7\]]sor mo tshang bar sbyar nas ni/_/sor mo'i rtse mo'i mthong dbye zhing /_/lhod cing zlum par yang dag bya/_/de nas pad+ma yongs rdzogs pa/_/kha ni bye bar ma gyur bya/_/'di ni re ba rdzogs byed pa'i/_/phyag rgya don kun sgrub byed ces/_/phyag rgya 'di ni rab mchog ste/_/sngon gyi de bzhin 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]gshegs pas gsungs/_/sems can rnams la phan 'dod nas/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar ba yin/_/sems can yid la 'dod pa dag_/yid la re ba'i phan 'dod gang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po sngags ldan pas/_/myur du de dag sgrub par byed/_/phyag rgya 
[\[270a.2\]]'di ni rab mchog ste/_/yid la re ba rdzogs zhes brjod/_/'di ni phyag rgya rab mchog ste/_/las kun rab tu sgrub byed pa'o/_/myur du sngags rnams sgrub byed cing /_/rgya che nyid kyi rdzas dang bcas/_/thub pa'i zla ba de yis ni/_/zla ba'i 'od la rab tu bstan/_/zla bas 
[\[270a.3\]]pad+ma'i rigs dag la/_/des ni phyag rgya 'di la sbyar/_/sngags mkhan ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/_/rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams byed/_/lag gnyis de bzhin bsdu byas nas/_/mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya/_/gung mo'i sor mo'i rtse mo gnyis/_/cung zad smad pa rta babs 
[\[270a.4\]]yin/_/de nyid yang dag bsgreng byas na/_/rta babs bzang por gsungs pa yin/_/de nyid phan tshun sbyar byas pa/_/sangs rgyas ru dung sgra ru bstan/_/mthe bo'i gtso bo bsgreng byas pa/_/mkhas pas rgyal ba'i sgra ru shes/_/lag gnyis de bzhin yang dag sbyar/_/mdzub mo'i 
[\[270a.5\]]rtse mo yang dag dgug_/sor mo thams cad sbyar byas la/_/cung zad yangs par 'byung ba ni/_/de ni sangs rgyas rnga chen mkhyen/_/chos kyi rnga ni bsgreng byas pa'o/_/de nas lag gcig thal mo ni/_/g.yas pa g.yon pa'i steng du bsgreng /_/'og tu rab tu sbyar ba ni/_/glang po'i 
[\[270a.6\]]rnam par yang dag sbyar/_/g.yas pa'i gung mo'i sor mo ni/_/glang po'i sna 'drar rab tu bya/_/'khor ba'i pha rol phyin pa yis/_/phyag rgya de ni glang por bstan/_/phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab tu bstan/_/las rnams mtha' dag byed pa ste/_/
[\[270a.7\]]'jig rten kun gyis mchod pa yin/_/lag g.yas brkyang zhing rab bsgreng ba/_/de ni mi 'jigs sbyin par brtags/_/lag pa g.yon pa brkyang byas pa'i/_/mkhrig ma'i tshigs la rab bzhag pa'o/_/gung mo mdzub mo sbyar byas la/_/mthe bo gnyis ni bar du gzhug_/
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]gung mo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya/_/'khrul pa med pa'i rgya de yin/_/de nyid sor mo rnam sbyar zhing /_/mthe bo steng du gnas byas te/_/tshigs kyi 'og tu rab bzhag pa/_/mjug [{]rings kyi [,]ring gi [}]ni rgya zhes bas bstan/_/de nyid mdzub rtse rab bsgreng ba/_/mda' yi phyag rgyar bstan pa yin/_/
[\[270b.2\]]mdzub rtse gnyis ni yang dag ldan/_/phan tshun rtse mo rnam sprad cing /_/de gnyis tshigs su mtheb gnyis sbyar/_/mthe'u chung gnyis ni yang dag brkyang /_/de nyid dgra star bstan pa ste/_/phyag rgya don kun sgrub byed pa'o/_/thams cad yang dag bsdu ba yang /_/phyag rgya kun 
[\[270b.3\]]gyis mchod pa yin/_/de bzhin du ni rab bsgreng ba/_/mdzub gnyis rtse mo sbyar byas pa/_/de ni mtshon cha rtse gcig rgya/_/de bzhin 'khor lo mda' chen gshol/_/mdzub mo 'khor lo bzhin bya dang /_/phyag rgya dam pa gshol yang bya/_/phyag rgya drug cu 'di dag ni/_/cho ga dang 
[\[270b.4\]]bcas gsungs pa'ang yin/_/'di dag ma lus mtshon cha'i rgya/_/sngags dang yang dag ldan par gsungs/_/dman pa kun gyis byas pa'i skyon/_/gza' dang grul bum ma mo dang /_/srin mo kun gyi gtso bo rnams/_/byis pa'i sems can 'jigs byed pa/_/phyag rgya'i mtshon cha 
[\[270b.5\]]las byung bas/_/de dag thams cad des 'jig 'gyur/_/phyag rgya drug cu 'di dag gi/_/mtshan nyid nye bar bstan pa yin/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/phyag rgya'i cho ga yang dag 'byung /_/lag gnyis de bzhin rnam bkod pa/_/pad+ma 'dra bar yang dag bsgreng /_/sor mo 
[\[270b.6\]]thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa/_/phyag rgya pad+ma zhes bya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di ni mchog ces bya/_/pad+ma'i rigs la yang dag sbyar/_/pad+ma'i rigs ni ji snyed pa/_/sngags dang ldan pas dge bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas byin rlabs las byung ba/_/myur du las rnams byed par brjod/_/
[\[270b.7\]]ji snyed pad+ma'i rigs gsungs pa/_/sngags rnams ma lus sgrub par byed/_/pad+ma rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di/_/phyag rgya'i pad+ma zhes su brjod/_/lag gnyis yang dag sbyar nas ni/_/mdzub mo gnyis ni yang dag bsgreng /_/gung mo'i sor mo sbyar byas nas/_/rdo rje rtse gsum yang dag 'byung /_/
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]gung mo'i sor mo'i tshigs dbus su/_/mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar/_/de nyid rdo rje zhes gsungs te/_/phyag rgya dam pa tha ma yin/_/ji snyed rdo rje'i rigs kyi sngags/_/de dag phyag rgya 'di sgrub 'gyur/_/cho ga ldan par rab zhugs na/_/myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/_/
[\[271a.2\]]sgrub pa las dang yang dag ldan/_/bsgrub bya rtag tu sgrub pa na/_/grub mchog tha ma bar ma ni/_/de la rtag tu 'grub par 'gyur/_/'jig rten sngags rnams ma lus pa'ang /_/the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/_/lag gnyis yang dag sbyar byas nas/_/gung mo gnyis ni yang 
[\[271a.3\]]dag bsgreng /_/srin lag mthe bo dag kyang dgug_/mthe'u chung gnyis ni sbyar byas la/_/mdzub gnyis rtse mo sprad nas ni/_/mdzub mo'i dbus tshigs gnyis dgug bya/_/gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar/_/'khor lo 'dra bar yang dag 'byung /_/'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo ste/_/'dir 
[\[271a.4\]]ni phyag rgya'i rgyal por bstan/_/de tshe chos rgyal gyis gsungs te/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/thub pa'i zla ba bdun pa yis/_/de tshe zhi ba'i 'khor lor gsungs/_/phyag rgya'i rgyal po rab sbyar nas/_/dus gsum rgyun mi chad bzlas na/_/'jig rten pa yi sngags 
[\[271a.5\]]kun dang /_/khyab 'jug dbang ldan gyis bshad pa/_/zlos pa phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/_/mthong ba tsam gyis de dag gcod/_/'di ni phyag rgya rab mchog ste/_/chos kyi dbyings las rnam par byung /_/sems can rnams ni ci 'dod pa/_/thams cad las ni byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[271a.6\]]chos kyi rgyal pos zhi don du/_/phyag rgya 'di ni yang dag bstan/_/cho ga'i rgyal ba'i mchog 'di ni/_/las rnams ma lus rab tu sgrub/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bstan pa la/_/chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya 'di'o/_/ma zhi ba yi phyag rgya kun/_/zhi ba'i las la rab tu sbyar/_/
[\[271a.7\]]sngags pas rtag tu mgo bor ni/_/'khor lo'i phyag rgya brtag par bya/_/lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/_/kha sbyar 'dra bar bya ba yin/_/sor mo lhod cing yangs par bya/_/lag gnyis sor mo'i rtse dgug pa/_/'di ni pad+ma dkar po yi/_/phyag rgya sems can don sgrub shes/_/
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]de las lag pa gcig btang nas/_/khu tshur phye zhing sor mo bsrings/_/lag pa brkyang ba lta bu ni/_/mchog sbyin gyi ni phyag rgyar brjod/_/lag gnyis kyang ni de bzhin byas/_/kun nas sor mo rnams kyis ni/_/phreng ba bzhin du gshib byas pa/_/rgyal ba'i phyag rgyar 'di 
[\[271b.2\]]brjod do/_/de bzhin lag gnyis sbyar nas ni/_/gung mo mdzub mo gnyis dag ni/_/khab kyi rnam par bya ba yin/_/de las gzhan pa'i sor mo ni/_/cung zad dgug par bya ba yin/_/de nas mdzub mo gnyis dag ni/_/gnas pa'i rnam par legs dgod bya/_/de yang yang 
[\[271b.3\]]dag sbyar byas te/_/srin lag gi ni tshigs su brten/_/'jig rten mang po'i 'dren pas ni/_/rus sbal phyag rgyar 'di bstan to/_/de bzhin lag gnyis rnam par dgod/_/sor mo dag ni kun nas kyang /_/gnyi ga khu tshur mnyam byas nas/_/mdzub mo gnyis ni sbyar bya ba/_/
[\[271b.4\]]mkhas pas phyag rgya de nyid ni/_/rdo rje dbyug par yang dag brjod/_/lag gnyis de bzhin yang dag par/_/kha sbyar 'dra bar byas nas ni/_/phan tshun sbyar ba la brten nas/_/sor mo'i thal mor rnam par dgod/_/mthe bong gnyis ni nang gzhug pa/_/dgra 'jig phyag rgyar 
[\[271b.5\]]brjod pa yin/_/de nas lag gnyis mnyam byas te/_/de nas thal mor byas nas ni/_/kun nas gzhol bar rab tu bya/_/gru yi bzhon par rab tu 'byung /_/'jig rten gsum gyi skyob pa yis/_/gru yi phyag rgyar 'di rab bstan/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las/_/'byung po 
[\[271b.6\]]rnams ni yang dag sgrol/_/sor mo de nyid bsgreng nas ni/_/de tshe lag gnyis sna tshogs bya/_/phyag rgya gzhal med khang zhes bya/_/sems can steng du rjes su 'dzud/_/de bzhin lag gnyis yang dag bsdus/_/shing rta zhes ni de la brjod/_/theg gsum 'gro ba'i gtso bo ste/_/skyob 
[\[271b.7\]]pa rnams kyis shing rtar gsung /_/zlos pa sngags ni 'dod pa la/_/'byung po kun ni 'dren par byed/_/theg pa mchog la brten nas ni/_/sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob par byed/_/de nyid lag gnyis rab bsgred nas/_/gnyi ga yang ni kha sbyar bya/_/lag mthil gnyis ni mnyam byas 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]brkyang /_/lan kan 'dra bar yang dag 'byung /_/'di ni phyag rgya rab mchog ste/_/'jig rten mgon gyis legs mchod pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas rnams su/_/thub pa'i zla bas yang dag gsungs/_/gang du 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/ma 'ongs da 
[\[272a.2\]]ltar bzhugs pa dang /_/mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings la bzhugs/_/gang du gnas mal la bzhugs pa/_/phyag rgya gnas mal zhes bya bar/_/'jig rten 'dren pas de 'dir mkhyen/_/lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/_/sor mo rnams ni yang dag sbyar/_/kha sbyar du ni 
[\[272a.3\]]rnam par dgod/_/g.yas pa'i mdzub mo gcig gis ni/_/g.yon pa'i rtse mor gtug bya ba/_/de ni zla ba phyed du brjod/_/lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/_/g.yas pa'i sor mos khu tshur bya/_/lag pa g.yon la yod pa yi/_/sor mo kun ni mnyam bsgreng ste/_/sor mo'i 
[\[272a.4\]]rtse mos khu tshur bcing /_/g.yas dang g.yon pa ldan pa yi/_/sor mo rnams ni sbyar byas nas/_/mthe'u chung gnyis ni brkyang byas pa/_/pi bang phyag rgyar nye bar bstan/_/lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/_/sor mo cung zad kha bye yang /_/mthe bo gnyis kyi bar du ni/_/mdzub mo 
[\[272a.5\]]gnyis ni brten par bya/_/'di ni pad mtsho'i phyag rgya ste/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis 'gro la gsungs/_/rtag tu mthe bo gnyis brkyang ba/_/ut+pa la yi phyag rgya zhes/_/rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas kyis/_/'jig rten du ni gsungs pa yin/_/de nyid thal mo sbyar byas pa/_/
[\[272a.6\]]'gro ba phyag 'tshal 'dra ba ste/_/bla ma phyag 'tshal rgya 'di zhes/_/'jig rten kun tu rnam par grags/_/rgya de nyid ni bsngam byas na/_/lag gnyis zung du yang dag 'byung /_/rgya 'di lag pa gnyis gzung zhes/_/'jig rten gsum du rnam par grags/_/cung zad mthe bo rtsar 
[\[272a.7\]]bzhag ste/_/mtheb rtsar phan tshun legs gnon pa/_/de ni kha sbyar rgya ru 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'khrug pa rnam par 'jig_/gang dag mtshon cha las byung rnams/_/phyag rgya 'di dag gsungs pa yin/_/me tog gdan dang bzhon pa dang /_/gzhan yang gdon ni 'jigs byed pa/_/
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]thams cad las kun byed ldan pa/_/skyob pa'i sngags kun thams cad yin/_/tshes grangs dang ni rgyu skar dang /_/smyung ba dag kyang mi bya ste/_/phyag rgya sngags su rab ldan na/_/las rnams myur du grub par byed/_/zlos pa dka' thub ldan pa dang /_/sngags zlos pa la mkhas 
[\[272b.2\]]pa dang /_/phyag rgya sngags su rab ldan na/_/bsgrub bya min pa'ang cung zad med/_/lag pa gnyis po bya ba ni/_/phan tshun thal mo yang dag sbyar/_/mthe'u chung srin lag mthe bo yi/_/tshigs ni bar ma sbyar bar bya/_/gung mo sbyar ba'i tshigs gsum par/_/mdzub mo 
[\[272b.3\]]bkug ste sbyar bar bya/_/rigs gsum gyi ni spyi la yang /_/mchod yon gyi ni phyag rgyar bstan/_/sor mo zung ni gsum po dag_/de bzhin phan tshun yang dag sbyar/_/mdzub mo'i rtse gnyis yang dag sprad/_/mthe bo gnyis kyi 'gram du bskum/_/thal mo 'dra bar yang 
[\[272b.4\]]dag ldan/_/me tog phyag rgyar bstan pa yin/_/lag pa'i thal mo bkan byas nas/_/mthe'u chung sbyar byas rgyab tu ni/_/srin lag yang dag sbyar bar bar bya/_/de yi rgyab tu gung mo sbyar/_/mdzub mo gnyis ni sbyar bar bya/_/sa la thal sbyar bya ba yin/_/mthe bo gnyis 
[\[272b.5\]]ni 'gram bzhag pa/_/chos kyi phyag rgyar bstan pa yin/_/thal mo gzhan gyi sbyor ba yis/_/mdzub gnyis cung zad bkug pa ni/_/gtor ma spyi yi phyag rgya ru/_/'jig rten skyob pas de gsungs so/_/ji ltar cho ga bzhin du ni/_/nang du me tog gzhug byas na/_/gtor 
[\[272b.6\]]ma kun gyi las la ni/_/gsang sngags kun la byin par 'gyur/_/g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i lag_/g.yon pa'ang de bzhin bya ba yin/_/mkhrig mar sbyor ba'i bya ba yis/_/g.yas g.yon dag ni bsnol bar bya/_/'di ni sngags rnams ma lus pa'i/_/dri yi phyag 
[\[272b.7\]]rgyar brjod pa yin/_/lag g.yas khu tshur bcings nas ni/_/mthe bo dang ni gung mo gnyis/_/de nas rab tu sbyar bar bya/_/mar me'i phyag rgyar brjod pa yin/_/srin lag dang ni mthe bo nyid/_/bgrang phreng dag tu yang dag gnas/_/rtag tu mthe'u chung rnam par brkyang /_/de 'og 
[\[273a\]]
