[\[292b.2\]]bza' dang bcas 'jigs pas/_/bdag gis kyang ni mngon par bsrung /_/rigs pa bzlas nas bya ba ste/_/gzhan du cho gar brjod pa min/_/ras ris yongs su gsal byas pa'am/_/yid la 'dod pa byas mthong na/_/gdug pa'i dgra rnams 'joms byed 
[\[292b.3\]]pa'i/_/las ni thams cad byed par 'gyur/_/ras ris mchog blangs 'gro ba ni/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'am gar 'dod pa'o/_/phyogs chen rgyal po chen po dang /_/sems can de ni dregs bcas dang /_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal nga rgyal che/_/gdug dang gdug pa'i 
[\[292b.4\]]las rnams dang /_/dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang /_/chad par smra dang sngags spangs dang /_/sngags rnams mchod par mi byed dang /_/de la dad rten smod pa dang /_/gang yang zlos pa smod byed dang /_/de bzhin mchod rten khyad du gsod/_/cho ga mthong ba'i las 
[\[292b.5\]]kyis ni/_/de dag la ni sbyor ba bya/_/sems can kun dang skyob pa la/_/rtag tu de bzhin chos mi ldan/_/de dag la ni las rab sbyar/_/'phral du srog ni 'gag par byed/_/lung tang 'bras bu sngags bzlas blangs/_/rtsa ba dang ni shun pa'ang blang /_/'bras bu'i rang skyur 
[\[292b.6\]]yang dag ldan/_/mi yi rus phye legs btags dang /_/yungs mar dang ni dug nyid dang /_/star bu dad ni lang tang tshe/_/ske tshe dang yang khrag nyid kyang /_/mi las yang dag byung ba dag_/thams cad blangs nas yang dag ldan/_/ras ris dben pa'i phyogs su 
[\[292b.7\]]bzhag_/sgrub po lho phyogs mngon bltas nas/_/ras ris kyang ni byang du bstan/_/me thab ji 'dod byas nas ni/_/tsha zhing skam pa'i shing dag gis/_/me thab de la mnyam bzhag nas/_/dur khrod me yi sbar bar bya/_/thams cad ldan pas bsreg byas na/_/cho gar 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]bstan pa'i sbyin sreg yin/_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags kyis ni/_/me lha dag ni spyan drang bya/_/las rnams dag ni kun la'ang 'dir/_/mdung gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya/_/me thab la ni khror bcas pas/_/rtsa brgyad stong gis sreg blugs sbyin/_/
[\[293a.2\]]dang por bu dag 'chi ba ni/_/sems can zhugs nas de bzhin 'gyur/_/gnyis pa la ni chung ma dang /_/'khor dang gtso bor bcas pa'ang yin/_/de la gsum par 'chi ba ni/_/gang gi ched du de byas pa'o/_/gang tshe mtshan phyed bzlas pa ni/_/ras ris mdun du byed pa 
[\[293a.3\]]yang /_/dgra rnams gsad par bya phyir te/_/de ni de dang mthun par 'gyur/_/de yi yul 'khor 'jig par 'gyur/_/dpung yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/_/mes tshig rlung ni chen po dang /_/char chen dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/thams cad bsdus pa'i tshogs dag ni/_/pha rol 
[\[293a.4\]]tshogs kyis gnod par 'gyur/_/de la gnod pa sna tshogs dang /_/nad chen dag gis yang dag khyab/_/rgyal po de yi lus kun kyang /_/skam par 'di la the tshom med/_/de yi khyim ni thams cad kyang /_/mi ma yin pas yang dag dkrugs/_/mal du brtan 
[\[293a.5\]]pa mi rnyed cing /_/sa yi steng du'ang 'khor bar 'gyur/_/srin po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sha rjen zas/_/de yi khyim ni yongs su bskor/_/thams cad du ni nyam thag 'jigs/_/sdug bsngal drag pos sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/sa steng lha yi dbang phyug sogs/_/de yi srung 
[\[293a.6\]]ba byed mi nus/_/'jig rten skyong ba tshangs sogs dang /_/brgya byin sogs pa sum cu'i dbang /_/sngags kun lha dang bcas pa dang /_/'jig rten kun las byung ba'ang rung /_/nga rgyal gyis 'khrugs ma rungs dgra/_/de yi 'tsho ba de mthar byed/_/mtshan phyed nyi ma 
[\[293a.7\]]gung dag la/_/gang du khros nas zlos byed pa/_/gshin rje khros pa mngon sum ltar/_/bsrung bar yang ni rung ma yin/_/mar ngo'i zla phyed ci 'dod par/_/sa steng ras ris bzhag nas ni/_/gtor ma mchod pa che bya ba/_/dur khrod dgon pa'i gnas dang ni/_/shing 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]gcig de bzhin rtags dang ni/_/brag dang bas mtha' phug kyang rung /_/gcig pu gnyis su med par yang /_/rtag tu las rnams yang dag brtsams/_/dgon pa chen po dben pa dang /_/lha yi khang pa stong pa dang /_/khang stong dang ni chu bo dang /_/rgya mtsho'i 'gram 
[\[293b.2\]]la brten pa dang /_/grong khyer de dang nye ba dang /_/der gnas yang na ci 'dod par/_/dpag tshad brgya yi tshad tsam nas/_/rtag tu las rnams bya ba yin/_/gtsang ba'i yul ni brgya dag dang /_/tshad med yul du gnas pa'ang rung /_/sngags kyi rdzu 'phrul bsam 
[\[293b.3\]]mi khyab/_/zlos pa'i grub pa bsam mi khyab/_/las ni bsam mi khyab par snang /_/'bras bu'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/gshin rje gshed ni bdag nyid che/_/khro bo'i rgyal po bsam mi khyab/_/las dang rdzu 'phrul yul dang ni/_/rnam par 'phrul ba che 'byung 
[\[293b.4\]]ba/_/bsam gyis mi khyab zlos pa yis/_/sa steng 'di la grub pa snang /_/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/_/kun gyis bsrung bar yong mi nus/_/'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams dang /_/gza' dang ma mo smos ci dgos/_/dbang ldan dang ni khyab 
[\[293b.5\]]'jug gam/_/skem byed dang ni brgya byin dang /_/rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras dag ni/_/dam tshig 'dzin par byed pa dang /_/sa bcu la ni yang dag gnas/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/_/gang zhig dgra bcom rang rgyal dang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen 
[\[293b.6\]]po chags bral ba/_/dam tshig sngon byas de dag gis/_/bsrung bar yang ni mi nus so/_/mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/_/'byor pa 'dod pas mnyan par gyis/_/zlos pa sems ni ma dang na/_/gzhan gyis nus par mi 'gyur ro/_/sngags pa 
[\[293b.7\]]mchog ni mi dga' na/_/de 'dir zhi ba ga la yod/_/bdag nyid chen po gshin rje gshed/_/khro bo'i rgyal po zlos pa po/_/gang tshe yid ni dang ba dang /_/gang tshe snying rje brlan gyur pa/_/de tshe de ni zhi thob pa'am/_/brtan pa'am 'tsho ba 'dzin par 'gyur/_/
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]pirtsu marda yungs mar dang /_/rang skyur dug dang ldan pa ni/_/khrag dang mi yi sha dang ni/_/lan tshwa tsha ba gsum dang ni/_/ske tshe dug gi phye ma dang /_/star bu dang ni sram gyi sha/_/lang tang tse yi rtsa ba dang /_/de bzhin ko sha ta ka'i dang /_/e ren da rtsa nas 
[\[294a.2\]]tshig thal/_/le brgan rtsi dang gze ma dang /_/po son cha yi rtsa ba dang /_/de bzhin sgog skya ke'u dang /_/gzhan gyi zhag dang chu dang ni/_/kun dong chang ni btung bar bcas/_/'di kun cha mnyam byas nas ni/_/ras ris nye bar sbyin sreg bya/_/sbyin sreg stong rtsa 
[\[294a.3\]]brgyad byas na/_/zla ba phyed kyi nang du ni/_/bu dang gnyen sdug bcas pa yi/_/dgra rnams rtsad nas 'jig 'gyur te/_/'khor kun ma lus 'joms par byed/_/gnyis pa'i nang du sbyin sreg byas/_/de yi rtsad nas 'byin par byed/_/zlos pas me nang sbyin sreg 
[\[294a.4\]]byas/_/gsum pa'i dus su phyin pa na/_/de yi grong rdal bcas de la/_/mu ge dag ni 'byung ba dang /_/char mi 'bab cing 'chi ba mang /_/srin pos kun tu khyab pa dang /_/mes tshig rdo yi char 'bab dang /_/rdo rje dang ni thog kyang 'bab/_/ljongs dang phyogs dang 
[\[294a.5\]]yul dang ni/_/ji snyed rgyal po de la yod/_/'tshe ba mang po rab 'byung zhing /_/de bzhin gzhan gyi dmag tshogs 'byung /_/de yi yul du 'tshe ba ni/_/du ma mang po dag kyang 'byung /_/dpal min mang po rab ston pa/_/rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/_/lad 
[\[294a.6\]]tang rtsa bas sbyin sreg byas/_/de la rims nad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/tsha bas rtag tu sbyin sreg byas/_/tsha ba chen po skye bar 'gyur/_/shin tu skyur bas sbyin sreg byas/_/grang ba'i rims ni yang dag 'byung /_/ma rungs rgyal po stobs kyis dregs/_/de yi lus 
[\[294a.7\]]la de dag 'gyur/_/phyogs che nor dang ldan pa dang /_/gdug cing dpung chen yang dag ga gnas/_/de yi 'tsho ba tha ma ni/_/nub gnyis yang na bdun gyis so/_/gang zhig gang la dad lha'am/_/skyes pa'i skar ma ming yang rung /_/ras ris mdun du gzugs bya ba/_/
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]dur khrod sol bas bris pa la/_/mgo la rdog pas mnan nas ni/_/khro bas bzlas pa brtsam par bya/_/glo bur rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/_/mi yi bdag po zug gzer 'byung /_/nad chen pos ni thebs 'gyur te/_/de yi mod la'ang 'chi bar 'gyur/_/yang na dgra stas 
[\[294b.2\]]gcod pa'am/_/yan lag kyang ni mi tshang 'gyur/_/sdig can mi ma yin pa yi/_/srin po gdug pas za bar 'gyur/_/bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa dag_/sha rjen za dang srul po dang /_/sha za [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma mo yis/_/de yi mod la'ang gsod par byed/_/de nas 
[\[294b.3\]]dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang /_/de tshe 'khor la 'di skad smras/_/sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal nas/_/de nas cang mi smra bar gnas/_/'jig rten rnams la phan 'dod phyir/_/'di skad du ni yang smras pa/_/gnod sbyin mo ni thams cad dang /_/gnod sbyin kun tshogs 
[\[294b.4\]]bos nas ni/_/de tshe gnod sbyin bdag po ste/_/byang chub sems dpa' smras pa ni/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyis ras ris smras/_/'dod pa kun dang nye bar ldan/_/'gugs par byed dang dbang byed kun/_/zug rngu ma lus yang dag 'byin/_/sngags pa gang tshe 'khrig pa 'dod/_/
[\[294b.5\]]'dod chags ldongs pa'am rmongs pa'i blos/_/bder gshegs bkas kyang bzlog pa dang /_/gnyen pos kyang ni mi nus so/_/thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba nas/_/shin tu sdug bsngal rgyu sngon byas/_/de dag sdug bsngal sdug bsngal bar/_/snying rje chen pos 'gro ba gdungs/_/
[\[294b.6\]]tshangs spyod dbang po dul bas ni/_/bde 'gro dag ni thob par 'gyur/_/bzang po shis par bstan pa dang /_/mthar ni zhi ba'ang thob par 'gyur/_/theg pa gsum la brten nas ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa legs pa 'thob/_/bzlog pa blo ngan gyis zin pa/_/'dod chags kyis 
[\[294b.7\]]ldongs bka' thub med/_/'khor ba mi zad tshang tshing gi/_/'gro ba lngar ni 'khor bar 'gyur/_/de dag sdug bsngal ldan don du/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod rjod par byed/_/khro bo 'di ni mnyes byas na/_/sdig pa kun las ldog par 'gyur/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/_khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi mngon spyod dang legs par sdom pa'i le'u rab 'byam las sum cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[295a.2\]]dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur pa de stan las langs te/_sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs gnyis 
[\[295a.3\]]la btud de/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje de la bltas nas tshig 'di smras so/_/phyag na rdo rje gang khyod sems can thams cad la gnod par byed pa dang /_'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sngags dang rgyud bshad na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[295a.4\]]chen po rnams kyi nges par chos 'di ni ma yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang gi phyir snying rje chen pos rab tu phye zhing /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/_phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu zhugs na 
[\[295a.5\]]'khor ba'i 'ching ba las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang sems can la gnod par byed pa'i chos ston pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi ched du gsungs 
[\[295a.6\]]pa ma yin te/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu zhugs pa yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la smras pa/_ji ltar khyod smras pa dang 
[\[295a.7\]]ji ltar khyod rab tu ston pa de bzhin du zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya/_de bzhin du bsgrub par bya/_ji ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bstan par bgyi'o/_/don dam par ni yang dag pa'i 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]mtha' la yang dag par brten nas chos kyi mtha' las grol ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can mtha' ni bsam mi khyab/_/rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab/_/sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab/_/byang chub spyod pa'ang bsam mi khyab/_/gdul ba'i sems can 
[\[295b.2\]]la brten nas/_/phan pa'i spyod pa bsam mi khyab/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams/_/bsam mi khyab par yongs su bstan/_/rgyud rnams kun la rgyud 'di yi/_/mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab yin/_/gshin rje gshed ni bdag nyid che/_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i 
[\[295b.3\]]sngags dag dang /_/yul gsum dag kyang bsam mi khyab/_/rtogs pa'i bdag nyid bsam mi khyab/_/zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'i sgrub pa yang bsam 
[\[295b.4\]]gyis mi khyab bo/_/zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' sngags zlos pa na 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/_'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can 'dod pa la lhag par chags pas bsod nams ma yin pa shin tu rab tu mang por 'phel bas dmyal ba chen por skye zhing 
[\[295b.5\]]sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu mang po 'di 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can 'di dag byang chub rnam pa gsum gyi skal ba med par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/_zhi ba'i bla gros de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sngags zlos pas sems nye bar gzhag par 
[\[295b.6\]]bya zhing thabs mkhas pa 'di la mngon spyod kyi las rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/las thams cad la yang mtshan mar 'dzin par mi bya'o/_/mi dge bar 'dzin par mi bya zhing snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis sems can gdul ba'i thabs la yang bslab par bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[295b.7\]]gzhan yang chos dang chos ma yin pa dang /_dkar po dang /_nag po dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_'gro ba'i bdag nyid chen po sems can 'dul ba'i thabs sgrub pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings sgrub pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu rtogs par 'gyur te/_
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]de nyid chos ston pas sems can smin pa'i thabs kyang rab tu sgrub par byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du bdag cag gis bslab par bya zhing /_'di lta ste/_sems can gdul ba dang sems can smin pa dang bstan par bya ba'i phyir dang de la rgyal ba'i 
[\[296a.2\]]sras khyed cag gang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dam tshig chen po la zhugs pa de thams cad kyis mnyan par bya/_dad par bya de nyid dge ba dang mi dge ba tshol ba nyid du bya ste/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa la mngon par dga' bar bya'o/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[296a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la rnam par bltas nas cang mi smra bar gyur te/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes yid la byas nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rnam par lta 
[\[296a.4\]]bzhin du rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la rnam par bltas nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i cho ga yang smras pa/_gang dag lha'i tshogs dang sems can gyi khams la brten pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs khyed 
[\[296a.5\]]cag nyon cig_/dang por re zhig bsrung ba byas la khro bo'i rgyal po'i ras ris de yongs su blangs la/_gnas dben par song nas dbang phyug chen po'i rtags gcig pa'i gnas su rtags de la dug dang khrag dang ske tshe dang /_rang skyur gyis gtor la shing bi tsu mar da'i me tog gis 
[\[296a.6\]]mchod cing mi'i rgyu ma rlon pa dag gis bdag nyid la mchod phyir thogs byas la/_mi'i mgo bo'i thod pa g.yas pa'i lag pa na thogs pas brdegs pa lta bur byas la/_lag pa g.yon pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis mtshon gcig po la sdigs pa bzhin du byed cing gtsor khro ba'i 
[\[296a.7\]]dbang du gyur pa dang rgyal po ma rungs pas brnyas pa chen po'i sems kyis byas pa'am/_gzhan skyon can gyi skyes bu phyogs chen po dang ldan pa dang nor chen po dang ldan pa dang rab tu gtum pa chen po dang gtso bo chen po dag gis khyad du gsod par 'gyur na/_sgo bcad pa byas 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]la/_gcer bur byas shing skra bshig pas dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan la khro bo'i sngags ji srid dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan dkyil du gas par gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/_/dum bu gnyis su gyur na yi ge hU~M gi sgra chen po yang thos par 'gyur te de la 'jigs par yang mi bya'o/_/
[\[296b.2\]]de thos pa'i dbang gis rgyal po ma rungs pa'am gzhan gang la la dpung chen po dang ldan pa'i dgra de'i mod la rims chen pos zin par 'gyur ba'am/_srin po la sogs pa mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur ro/_/de nyid du ji srid yud tsam du bzlas pa byas na de'i mod la dgra rnams 
[\[296b.3\]]kyi 'tsho ba ni tha mar 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mtshan mo bzlas na ni gza' 'khor dang bcas pa 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang las su 'gyur ba ni de bzhin du dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su nyi ma phyed la song ste/_nim pa'i lo mas mchod cing sha chen po'i spos kyis bdug la ji 
[\[296b.4\]]srid dgra'i khyim du mes tshig pa'i bar du bzlas pa byas na dgra yang 'dar ba'i rims chen pos thebs par 'gyur ro/_/yang na khros pas bzlas pa ma btang zhing g.yas phyogs su rtags kyang yod na dgra de 'chi bar 'gyur zhing rigs rgyud 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/ji ste slar gso bar 
[\[296b.5\]]byed na ni rtags de chus phyir yang rab tu bkrus la shin tu bsil ba'i 'o mas khrus byas na slar yang sos par 'gyur ro/_/las gzhan yang yod de dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan g.yas phyogs su bzhag la po son cha'i shing dang tsher ma can gyi shing gis me rab tu sbar la/_shing pA ka~M ta ka'i 
[\[296b.6\]]yam shing la dug dang khrag dang ske tshe la mngon par btags la stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg byas na/_dgra thams cad nad chen pos thebs par 'gyur te/_las thams cad kyis kyang nus pa med par 'gyur ro/_/zhag gnyis pa la ni rims nad chen po dang zug gzer chen pos thebs 
[\[296b.7\]]pa'am nad rnam pa sna tshogs sam mi ma yin pas zin cing mthar 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag gsum pa la grangs gsum gyis byas na ni 'tsho ba thams cad kyi thams cad du 'dor bar 'gyur ro/_/slar gso bar byed na ni 'o ma'i sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ba ni yul mi thams 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]cad dang dgra thams cad kyang sos par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du lha thams cad dam lha mo thams cad dam 'byung po thams cad gang zhig gang gi lha la dad pa de rkang pas mnan pa'i las bya ba'am/_/yang na de'i rgyu skar ram sngags sam ming dag la rkang pas mnan 
[\[297a.2\]]la las bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig pa ni ma gtogs te/_thams cad kyis kyang zhabs kyi mthe bo g.yon pa bzung ste las bya'i/_mnan par yang mi bya ba gom par yang mi bya'o/_/gang yang 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi sngags ni mnan nas las bya'o/_/khro bo'i 
[\[297a.3\]]rgyal po'i bzlas pa ma grub pa nyid kyang bzlas pa tsam kho nas las rnams byed par 'gyur/_sngags thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/_dgra thams cad 'joms par 'gyur/_sngags thams cad nus pa med par 'gyur ro/_/mdor na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das 
[\[297a.4\]]pa'i sngags kyi cho gas kyang ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar thams cad sgrub par 'gyur/_bzlas pa tsam gyis re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags 'di bzlas pa tsam kho nas grub pa nyid de grub pa dam pa'ang rjes su rab tu sbyin no/_/
[\[297a.5\]]yid la 'dod pas dgra rnams 'joms par byed do/_/mdung rtse chen po'i phyag rgya dang ldan par byas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/las gzhan du'ang 'gyur ba ni nyi ma phyed la dur khrod du song ste/_sreg pa'i sar mtshan gcig smyung ba byas te/_mar ngo'i bcu bzhi la dur khrod 
[\[297a.6\]]kyi shing gis me rab tu sbar la/_dug dang khrag gis btags pa'i ske tshes sbyin sreg byas na/_de las ha ha zhes pa'i sgra sgrogs shing /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur na 'jigs par mi bya zhing dgra la gnod par gyis shig ces byas na/_de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas mi snang 
[\[297a.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yud tsam gyis dpag tshad stong du yang song nas/_dgra rnams 'joms par byed cing rigs rgyud kyang rlag par byed do/_/de la sogs pa'i las mang po byed par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang las su 'gyur ba ni dben pa'i phyogs gtsang mar gos gtsang ma bgos 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]te/_/khang stong du rab tu zhugs nas mi'i rus pa'i sreg blugs kyis stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas te/_de nas thal ba de lag pa gnyi gas blangs la/_gos gtsang ma'i dum bu la so sor bcings te thum po gnyis su byas la/_kham por kha sbyar gnyis kyi nang du so sor 
[\[297b.2\]]bzhag la/_bdag nyid srung ba chen po byas nas rdzas de blangs la/_khyim du slar zhugs nas mtshan mo dur khrod chen por song nas/_mar ngo'i bcu bzhi'am tshes brgyad la mi sreg pa'i sar bzhag cing lho phyogs su bltas nas kham por kha sbyar gnyis blangs la langs shing 
[\[297b.3\]]gcer bur byas te skra bshig pa dang khro ba dang bcas pas 'jigs pa med par bya ste/_rig pa stong phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na thal ba de grub par 'gyur ro/_/mi gang su dag rdzas de slong bar gyur na sbyin par mi bya'o/_/gal te tshan khar slong bar byed na ni khro bo'i rgyal po dran 
[\[297b.4\]]nas yi ge hU~M rab tu sbyar ba byas na de'i mod la 'byer bar 'gyur ro/_/bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pa yang cho ga 'di nyid do/_/lag pa g.yon pa dang g.yas pas blangs pa'i thal bas ni rtags mtshan bya zhing bag yod pas bsrung ba yang bya la/_tho rangs nyi ma 
[\[297b.5\]]'char ba'i dus su slar 'ong bar bya ba na khrus byas shing gtsang zhing gtsang ba'i gos bgos te rang gi khyim du 'jug par bya ste/_rang gi gnas sam ji ltar 'dod par 'gro bar bya'o/_/de nas lag pa g.yas pa gang gis blangs pa'i thal ba des mi dang rkang gnyis dang rkang bzhi 
[\[297b.6\]]dang srog chags 'byung po thams cad dang /_lha dang bcas pa'i klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyi spyi bor gtor na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gang lag pa g.yon pas blangs pa'i thal ba des ni mi'i bud med thams cad kyi spyi bor gtor na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/lag pa g.yas pas blangs pa'i 
[\[297b.7\]]thal ba gang yin pa des mi rnams kyi lte ba'i phyogs sam/_pho mtshan gyi phyogs su gtor na grong pa'i chos bsten pa la nus pa med par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig bud med la mngon par chags pa de'i gsang ba'i gnas su thal ba'i phye mas gtor na skyes bu gzhan brten pa la nus pa med 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu gzhan brten pa na rma med par yang 'gyur ro/_/ji srid rang gi skyes pa nyid thob na ni phyir yang de'i rma'i sgo de rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod pas log par g.yem pa bsten pa la yang nus pa med par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du skyes pa 
[\[298a.2\]]la yang skyes pa'i dbang po la lag pa g.yas pas thal ba'i phye mas gtor na/_de yang gzhan gyi bud med la 'gro ba'i nus pa med par 'gyur te/_yongs su rnying pa bzhin du de'i de nyid 'byung zhing gnas par 'gyur ro/_/ji srid du rang gi chung ma de nyid dang yang phrad na phyir yang 
[\[298a.3\]]rnying pa med par 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa'am bud med gang la thal ba gtor bar gyur pa de med par 'gyur ba'am med par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/yang na ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byed do/_/gal te nan gyis byed na ni gsang ba'i phyogs su srin bu rnams rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_
[\[298a.4\]]de dag gis zos pa na 'tsho ba yang 'gag par 'gyur la/_zla ba gcig gi nang du rul par 'gyur te/_dri mi zhim zhing ro myags pa 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/gcin sri ba'i nad la sogs pas skyes bu zin par 'gyur la/_skrangs nad chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur te/_gang 
[\[298a.5\]]de dag gi nad kyis dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/yang na gzhan gyi bud med la bsten par 'dod na yang nus pa med par 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/gal te gtor bcom gyis thal ba dang phrad par ma gyur na/_mthong ba'am 
[\[298a.6\]]ma mthong ba la yang mthun pa'i rlung dang sbyar te thal ba gtor te/_de la thal ba cung zad kyang babs par 'gyur ba'am gtor bar byed pas yid kyis bsams te thal ba gtor na/_gang brtsams par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyi las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid 
[\[298a.7\]]dam gzhan gyi lag pas gtor na ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad kyi las byed par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no/_/ji ste gnas mal la sogs pa dang stan dang gos la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs sam bzhon pa dang theg pa dang lham dang gdugs la sogs pa yo byad thams 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]cad dang lhag ma ni bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bca' ba la sogs pa dang lus thams cad la dgos pa'i cha byad thams cad dang /_me tog dang so rtsi dang 'bras bu dang spos la sogs pa 'di dag thams cad la thal ba'i phye mas gtor na dgra de dag gi lus 
[\[298b.2\]]la shig dang ma ku ta'i srin bu rnams kyis kun nas khyab par 'gyur te/_shing ji lta ba bzhin du za bar 'gyur ro/_/rmi lam ngan pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun gyis kyang 'chi bar 'gyur te/_sman pa thams cad dang lha thams cad kyis kyang bzlog par mi nus so/_/
[\[298b.3\]]sngags thams cad kyis kyang bsrung bar mi nus te/_gang gis thal ba gtor bar byed pa ni ma gtogs so/_/ji ste slar gso ba byed na ni shing mngar dang ut+pa la sngon po dang tsan+dan dkar po gcig tu byas la chu grang mo la btags te/_de nas spyi bo nas bzung ste rkang pa'i mthil 
[\[298b.4\]]gyi bar du de'i lus la byugs shing 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas na sos par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang bud med rnams la las su bya ba ni/_mthun pa'i rlung gi phyogs gang du 'dod pa der song nas bud med mkha' 'gro ma ma rungs pa nga rgyal can thams cad la 
[\[298b.5\]]yang sbyor ba bya ste gzhan la ni ma yin no/_/mthun pa'i rlung yod pa de nyid la gnas nas/_bcom ldan 'das yid la bsams te thal ba gtor na mo mtshan dang nu ma thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa la'ang kha spu dang ba spu med pa dang mo mtshan dang nu ma yang 
[\[298b.6\]]rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bur rnam pa mang po du ma'i las kyang byed pa'am/_gzhan byed du gzhug par 'gyur ro/_/yang na gang dga' ba skye ba de byed du gzhug par 'gyur ro/_/bud med dam skyes pa gang la sems dga' ba skye ba de la thal ba de byin na ji 
[\[298b.7\]]ltar 'dod pa'i las byed du gzhug par 'gyur ro/_/sbyor ba'ang bslab par bya'o/_/de ltar nad chen po dag gis kyang 'debs su gzhug par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das yid la bsams nas/_thal ba'i lag pas spyi bor reg na klad pa zug gzer skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]kha la reg par byas na kha'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mthar gyis snying gi bar du rig par byas na snying gi nad dam/_lto ba'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rkang pa gnyis dang rje ngar gnyis la reg par byas na'ang khrag las byung ba'i nad khrag 
[\[299a.2\]]khrug pa la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'debs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/mdor na 'chi bar byed pa dang dbang du byed par yang 'gyur te/_ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar de thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing /_gsad pa dang dgug pa dang dbang du byed par yang 'gyur ro/_/shin 
[\[299a.3\]]tu thag ring po na gnas kyang las thams cad byed do/_/mkhar shin tu bgrod dka' ba dang nye ba mthun pa'i rlung yod par gnas par byas la/_lag pa gnyis kas thal ba de nyid blangs la yang dag par gtor na/_rab dang sgo khang dang yang thog kyang rab tu ltung bar 'gyur te/_
[\[299a.4\]]mkhar srung ba yang ltung bar 'gyur zhing mes tshig pa chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_dpung rnams kyang 'jig par 'gyur/_rnam par 'tshe ba chen pos kyang nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur/_thams cad bor nas rab tu 'byer bar yang 'gyur/_yang na skyabs su mngon 
[\[299a.5\]]par 'gro bar 'gyur/_de ltar gzhan gyi dpung la yang mthun pa'i rlung yod pa'i phyogs su thal ba gtor na/_dpung dang sde chen po yang 'jig par 'gyur zhing /_tshig pa chen po'am/_nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur ba'am/_glang po dang /_rta dang /_shing rta dang /_
[\[299a.6\]]rkang thang la sogs pa'i sde dpon yang 'jig par 'gyur ba'am skyabs su mngon par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rnam pa du ma'i ci 'dod pa rnams kyi dgra rnams 'jig par bya ba'i phyir las byed par 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid dang rang gi dpung ngam grogs po dag la yang srung ba chen po'i 
[\[299a.7\]]don du 'gyur ro/_/ji ste slar gso ba byed na ni thams cad du 'o ma'i zas kyis 'tsho zhing /_thams cad la ras ris kyi mdun du 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong gis sbyin sreg byas na sos par 'gyur zhing mi snang bar yang 'gyur ro/_/ji ste gnod sbyin mo bsgrub par 'dod na/_gar byed 'dud ma rje btsun 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]ma/_/nam gru mar yang rnam par grag_/mdzes ma mun pa snang byed ma/_/'og pag ma dang 'og pag bzang /_/brgyad po 'di dag gnod sbyin mo/_/'dod pa thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/_/gar byed ma'i sngags ni/_oM na Ti ma hA na Ti A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/_di bya rU pa NI swA hA/_'di'i 
[\[299b.2\]]cho ga ni spang leb bam ras la mngon par bris la sha'am 'o ma'i zas za zhing rig pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bya zhing /_a mra'i shing gi rtsa bar gnas shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sngo sangs su gnas pa bri bar bya'o/_/ro smad gos gcig pa skra bshig pa mig gnyi ga dmar ba cung 
[\[299b.3\]]zad bzhin 'dzum pa lag pa g.yas pas sgrub pa po la sdigs mdzub byed pa/_lag pa g.yon pas shing gi yal ga 'dzin pa yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/_dar la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gos bgos pa/_khro bo'i rgyal po de nyid kyi ras ris kyi mdun du bdag byang du mngon 
[\[299b.4\]]par bltas te 'dug la shing pa la shas me rab tu sbar la gu gul gyi ril bu dag la zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar dag gis btags la dus gsum du zhag bdun gyi bar du sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas la/_de nas zhag bdun pa la gtor ma rgya chen po byas la mar gyi mar me yang rab tu sbar la/_
[\[299b.5\]]ji srid nam phyed pa de'i bar du bzlas pa byas te 'dug na/_de'i 'og tu gnod sbyin mo de rang nyid snang ba chen por byas te/_rang gi gzugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/'ongs nas kyang smra bar bya ba ni ngas ci zhig bya zhes so/_/de nas sgrub pa pos brjod par bya ba ni/_khyod nga'i 
[\[299b.6\]]chung mar gyis shig ces bya'o/_/de ltar bgyi'o zhes byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bzung nas chung mar gyur te rang gi gnas su khyer nas 'dod pa thams cad ster bar byed cing bcud kyis len yang rab tu ster bar byed de/_gang 'thungs pas lha'i gzugs su 'gyur zhing /_gnod 
[\[299b.7\]]sbyin chen po dang rab tu 'gran par 'gyur ro/_/gal te ma 'ongs na ni lan gnyis pa la khro bo'i sngags dang lhan cig bzlas pa byas na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te ma 'ongs na ni khro bo 'chol ba'i rgyal pos 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/'dud ma'i sngags ni 'di yin te/_oM na T+Te 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]shu klA mA ba ra mA l+ya d+hA ri Ne mai thu na pri ye swA hA/_'di'i cho ga yang 'di nyid do/_/rje btsun ma'i sngags ni 'di yin te/_o~M b+had tre b+had tre a ba lo ki ni kiny+tsi rA ya si/_e h+ya hi A gats+tsha A gats+tsha ma ma kA r+yaM ku ru swA hA/_de nyid kyis ni ras ris med kyang 'grub par 
[\[300a.2\]]'gyur te/_ri'i rtse mor dkyil 'khor byas la gu gul gyi du bas bdugs te/_gcig pu mi smra bar gnas shing gtsang sbra byas te sgo bcad la rig pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas na/_zla ba gcig gi mtshan mo nges par 'ong bar 'gyur zhing 'ongs nas kyang 'dod pa 
[\[300a.3\]]spyod par byas na/_chung mar 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te de khyim du zhugs na ni lo stong phrag lnga'i bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te ma zhugs na ni 'dzam bu'i gling du lo lnga brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing rnam par spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de dang 
[\[300a.4\]]lhan cig rtse bar byed cing lung thams cad la yang dag par 'grub par byed do/_/de dang lhan cig gang du 'dod pa der 'gro zhing bcud kyis len rab tu sbyin par byed la/_sdug pa'i chung ma bzhin du phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yang rab tu byed do/_/nam gru ma'i sngags ni/_na maH
[\[300a.5\]]sarba yak+Shi NAM/_oM rak+te rak+tA ba b+hA si rak+ta rak+ta le ba ni swA hA/_gnod sbyin mchog ni nam gru ma/_/sbyor ba la dga' rjod par byed/_/cung zad dmar ba'i gos gyon zhing /_/sngo zhing 'khyil ba'i skra yang yod/_/yan lag kun mdzes gnod sbyin mo/_/'dod pa spyod la rtag tu 
[\[300a.6\]]dga'/_/'dod dang longs spyod rtag tu sbyin/_/mchog sbyin par ni rtag tu ston/_/snga ma bzhin du ras la mngon par bris la 'di'i khyad par ni 'di yin te/_dar la dmar po gyon zhing dar la dmar pos stod g.yogs byas shing /_kha dog dmar bar yang snang ba yin no/_/'og 
[\[300a.7\]]pag ma'i sngags ni/_oM me kha le ma hA yak+Shi NI ma ma kAr+ya~M sam+bA da ya swA hA/_'og pag ma bzang mo'i sngags ni/_oM me kha le su me kha le ma hA ya k+Shi NAM sarba ar+tha/_sA d+ha ni hU~M/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra Ne swA hA/_snang ba ma'i sngags ni/_a~M A lo ki ni lo ka ba te swA hA/_
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]'di dag ni cho ga yang de nyid do/_/mun pa mdzes ma'i sngags ni/_oM shrI Nu gu h+ya ke shrI Nu gu h+ya ke e h+ya hi gu h+yai hi guh+ya ke swA hA/_'di'i cho ga la ni ras ris kyi cho ga ni 'di la med do/_/dang por re zhig gtsang zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te/_zla ba nya ba la gnas 
[\[300b.2\]]dben par 'dug nas sgo bcad de snang ba med par mun pa'i gnas su rig pa stong phrag bcu bzlas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sgrub pa pos brtsam par bya ba ni zla ba nya nas brtsams nas zla ba nya gnyis pa'i bar 'dir las su bya ba ni/_mtshan mo nyal ba'i 
[\[300b.3\]]dus su mal du 'dug nas mi snang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs su gcig pu sgo bcad la/_dong ka dang bA na ka'i me tog legs par kha 'bus pa yungs mar dang bsres pas/_lag pa dang rkang pa la byugs la/_lag pa g.yas pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa 
[\[300b.4\]]bya ste/_mi smra ba'i dka' thub kyis bzlas pa bya'o/_/de bzhin du nyin re zhing ma chad par zla ba nya'i bar du byas na de nas mtshan phyed tsam na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/'ongs nas kyang mi smra bar bya zhing /_cang mi smra bar gyur pas 'dod pa bsten par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe zla 
[\[300b.5\]]ba drug na smra ba de'i tshe smra bar bya ste/_de nas bzung nas chung mar 'grub par 'gyur te/_'dod pa thams cad ster ba dang 'di la lha'i reg pa bzang po yang sbyin par byed do/_/nyin par ma mthong ba kho nar yang las thams cad sgrub par byed do/_/ro dang bcud kyis len 
[\[300b.6\]]rnams kyang rab tu ster bar byed do/_/rgyab tu zhon na ni ri rab tu yang khyer bar byed do/_/mtshan mo 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu yang 'khor bar byed do/_/dpag tshad brgya na yod pa'i dgra de dag kyang 'joms par byed do/_/ji skad bstan pa de thams cad sgrub par byed do/_/gzhan 
[\[300b.7\]]gyi bud med la 'gro ba ni ma gtogs so/_/gzhan gyi bud med la 'gro bar byed pa'i cho ga ni 'di dag thams cad la yang sbyar te/_de nyid dang lhan cig yang dag par bsten par bya'o/_/gal te gzhan gyi bud med la 'gro bar 'gyur na ni 'chi ba skyed par yang 'gyur ro/_/
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]'di ni mun nag mdzes ma zhes bya ba gnod sbyin ma stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor bas sgrub pa pos 'grub par 'gyur na nyin re zhing gnod sbyin mo'i bran mo re re gtong bar byed do/_/blon po'i 'khor du ma dang ldan pa dang gnod sbyin mo thams cad na yang rdzu 'phrul che ba 
[\[301a.2\]]dang mun pas bskor ba 'di dag thams cad kyang cho ga tha dad pa ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang gzhan de dag ni mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mun nag chen po na gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin mo rdzu 'phrul che ba dang phug gnas ma dang mi'i dpa' mo dang gzhon nu ma 'jig rten rnam par 
[\[301a.3\]]grags pa dang /_mna' ma gnod sbyin mo dang yid du 'ong ma dang bdun pa lha mdzes ma dang 'di dag ni gnod sbyin mo bdun dag ste/_sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'o/_/sa rnams ma lus dag tu ni/_/'jig rten 'dir ni yongs su rgyu/_/cung zad kyi ni 
[\[301a.4\]]dus dag tu'ang /_/lha'i gnas su yang 'gro bar byed/_/lha dang lha min g.yul dag tu'ang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'thab par byed/_/chos ldan snying ni brtse ba dang /_/sems can 'dod cing mnyes gshin bzang /_/sems can phan pa'i 'dod don du/_/sa steng 
[\[301a.5\]]dag tu yongs su rgyu/_/de la bsgrub dka' cung zad med/_/dge ba'i las rnams ma lus byed/_/sems can longs spyod don du ni/_/byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin/_/phug gnas ma'i sngags ni/_oM gu hi li gu ha pa ti gu ha bA si ni A na ya b+ha ga ba 
[\[301a.6\]]ti ma mA ti ka~M sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/_seng ldeng gis me rab tu sbar la/_pri yang ku'i me tog la mar gyis btags te/_zla ba gcig gi bar du dus gsum du sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i 'og tu sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/_
[\[301a.7\]]dang por re zhig byang bu'am ras sam rtsig pa la tshon ma 'dres pa snod sar pa dag gi nang du bcug pa'i pir dag gis ri'i rgyal po ri rab zur bzhi dang rtse mo bzhi dang ldan pa/_ri bdun gyi phreng bas yongs su bskor ba/_ri de dag gi mtha' mar ri bo dag la brten pa'i phug kun tu bri 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]bar bya'o/_/der gnas pa lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_gcig pu gnod sbyin ma phug gnas ma zhes bya ba ro smad dar la gon pa/_stod g.yogs dar la gyon pa/_gser gyi mdog can rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs mdzes pa bri bar bya ste/_de lta bu'i 
[\[301b.2\]]ras ris bri bar bya'o/_/gtsang ba'i gnas su gtsang bas 'o ma'i zas kyis 'tsho zhing /_rig pa stong phrag bcu bzlas par bya ste/_ci nus pa'i mchod pa chen po byas na bzlas pa'i tha mar lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin mo snang ba chen po dang ldan par byas nas rang nyid 'ong 
[\[301b.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/'ongs pa na sna ma'i me tog dang tsan+dan dkar po bsregs nas mchod yon dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas des bu ci zhig bya/_zhes smra bar byed do/_/des smra bar bya ba ni bdag gi mar mdzod cig ces so/_/de bzhin du bya'o zhes byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur 
[\[301b.4\]]ro/_/de la sems 'gyod par ni mi bya ste/_de la 'dod pa dang ldan pa yang don du gnyer bar yang mi bya'o/_/de la 'phags ma rdzu 'phrul che ba don du gnyer na 'grub par 'gyur te/_de phan cad de la ma dang 'dra bar bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/'khor brgyad 
[\[301b.5\]]brgya dang bcas pa la zas dang gos rab tu ster bar 'gyur ro/_/gnas yang ba las kyang skyob par byed do/_/dgon pa chen po dang ri'i steng du gnas na yang las thams cad yang dag par sgrub par byed do/_/bza' ba ci 'dod pa yang rab tu sbyin no/_/ro dang bcud kyis 
[\[301b.6\]]len la sogs pa thams cad kyang rab tu sbyin zhing ci 'dod pa yang rjes su sgrub par byed do/_/khang pa dang khang pa rtseg ma yang mngon par sprul par byed do/_/gser stong phrag kyang nyin re zhing rab tu sbyin par byed do/_/de nyid kyi nyin par thams cad zad par byas te/_
[\[301b.7\]]gal te mi byed na rnam par chad par 'gyur te/_thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang 'di'i las ni ras ris 'di nyid kyi mdun du seng ldeng gi me rab tu sbar la/_'bar ba dang du ba dang bral ba'i mdag ma la lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du ldong 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]ros kyis gzugs brnyan du bris te/_skyes pa'am bud med kyi ming lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil du bris la me mdag gi phung po de la bdugs shing sngags bzlas pa byas na dpag tshad brgya na gnas kyang 'ong bar 'gyur te/_gang smras pa de thams cad 
[\[302a.2\]]byed du gzhug par 'gyur ro/_/tho rangs ni de nyid du khyer bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'di nyid ni mtshan mo bya ba yin gyi nyin par ni ma yin no/_/mi dpa' mo'i sngags ni/_oM na ra bI re swA hA/_de bzhin du 'di'i ras ris kyang bri bar bya ste/_phug gi gnas ni ma gtogs 
[\[302a.3\]]te/_shing mya ngan med la brten pa bri bar byas la 'di'i khyad par ni 'di'o/_/las gzhan thams cad ni phug gnas ma de bzhin du bya'o/_/'di la ni sring mo zhes kyang brjod par bya'o/_/'di la las gzhan yang yod de/_zla ba gzas zin pa la btsag yug snam gro ba 
[\[302a.4\]]la btums te khar bcug nas ji srid du zla ba gzas btang gi bar du bzlas na/_de nas btsag yug snam gyi bud med dam skyes pa gang gi ming bris pa de dpag tshad brgya na gnas kyang de nas 'ong bar byed do/_/tho rangs ni de nyid du khyer bar byed do/_/sring mo bzhin du bya ba rnams 
[\[302a.5\]]kyang byed do/_/phongs pa'i dus su yang srung ba chen po byed do/_/bzlas pa tsam gyis bud med thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/_/mi'i dbang mo'i cho ga ni 'di'o/_/gnod sbyin gzhon nu ma'i sngags ni/_oM yak+Sha ku mA ri ke swAhA/_'di'i cho ga ni gro ba la gi 
[\[302a.6\]]wang gis bri bar bya ste/_gzhon nu ma mgo'i skra phyed bcings pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_gos gcig pa lag pa g.yas pa na ma du lung ga'i 'bras bu 'dzin pa lag pa g.yon pas shing mya ngan med la 'dzin pa/_de lta bu'i gro ba'i 'dab ma mgo'i gnas kyi steng 
[\[302a.7\]]du gzhag par byas nas/_dgon pa'i phyogs su gcig pu nyal bar byas te/_tsan+dan dkar po'i lde gus dkyil 'khor byas la dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog gis gcal bkram par byas la gu gul gyi bdug pas bdugs nas/_rig pa stong rtsa brgyad zla ba 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]gcig gi bar du bzlas te/_de nas zla ba nya ba la sna ma'i me tog gis mchod pa chen po byas la/_mar gyi mar me dang lha bshos kyang phul nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas/_ji srid du rnam thos sras kyi bu mo rang gi gzugs nyid kyis gzhon nu ma lnga brgyas 
[\[302b.2\]]yongs su bskor ba 'ong zhing phyogs de thams cad snang bar byas nas/_rang gi gzugs kyi nam mkha' la 'dug par 'gyur zhing /_de yang 'di skad du bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smras pa dang /_de nas sgrub pa pos smra bar bya ba ni/_mchog gsum las gang 
[\[302b.3\]]yang rung ba gcig don du gnyer bar bya ba ni/_ma nyid dang sring mo nyid dang chung ma nyid do/_/gal te mar gyur na ni sems la 'gyod par mi bya ste/_'gyod na ni rnam par 'jig pa 'byung bar 'gyur bas ma bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/_/ma des kyang bsams pa 
[\[302b.4\]]tsam gyis 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa'i zas dang /_gos dang rgyan gyi khyad par thams cad kyang yang dag par sgrub par byed do/_/nyin re zhing yang ti na ra stong ster bar 'gyur zhing gal te 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du rnam par rgyu na yang thams cad yang dag par sgrub 
[\[302b.5\]]par byed do/_/gang gi tshe sring mor gyur na yang de'i tshe dpag tshad brgya las kyang bud med 'gugs par byed cing de nyid du yang khyer bar byed de/_sring mo'i las thams cad kyang yang dag par sgrub par byed do/_/ci ste chung mar gyur na ni rang gi khyim du khyer zhing lo 
[\[302b.6\]]stong du 'tsho bar yang byed do/_/gang gi tshe 'chi bar gyur pa de'i tshe yang rigs bzang por skye bar 'gyur te/_ngag thams cad kyang chung ma bzhin du yang dag par sgrub par byed do/_/chung ma gnod sbyin ma'i sngags ni/_/o~M niH/_chung ma gnod sbyin mo 'di'i cho ga ni 
[\[302b.7\]]tsan+dan dkar po'i lde gus lag pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa gur gum gyi lde gus nye bar byugs la/_lan stong du mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/_mtshan mo gcig pu mi smra ba'i dka' thub dang dben pa'i sa phyogs su sgo bcad la/_ba ru ra'i 'bras bu lnga'am 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]brgyad til mar gyi nang du bcug la btsos te/_til mar de las ba ru ra'i 'bras bu blangs nas de la yongs su bzlas te/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_zangs ma dang /_sa las byas pa'i snod sar pa la bcug nas/_nyal ba'i rkang pa'i mthar bzhag 
[\[303a.2\]]la/_gnod sbyin 'di nyid kyi sngags yi ge gcig pa stong gis mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/_gnas dben zhing mun pa'i phyogs su me tog gis gcal bkram pa la nyal bar byas na/_mi ma yin pa 'ongs nas rkang pa gnyis la lha'i bde ba'i reg pa 'jam pa'i 
[\[303a.3\]]lag pa'i mthil gyis bsku zhing byug par byed de/_gang gis reg pa tsam gyi lha'i bde ba'i reg pas gnyid 'byung bar 'gyur te/_gang gi nyi ma shar na yang mtshan mo'i mthar dka' ba'i gnyid sad par 'gyur te/_rab tu sad na yang de nyid sems par 'gyur te/_de 
[\[303a.4\]]dang lhan cig 'dod pa spyad par yang mi bya smra bar yang ma byas na zla ba drug gis 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i bag ma sar pa 'dra ba/_g.yog 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba/_lag na mar me thogs pa/_'jig rten rnams 'od bzang 
[\[303a.5\]]po dag gis gsal bar byas pa/_mal stan yongs su 'dzin pa/_rgyan sna tshogs 'bar ba dang ldan pa 'ongs nas kyang tshig rjod par byed la/_'dod pa la longs spyod pa'i yo byad yongs su 'dzin pa 'ongs nas kyang /_sgrub pa po la mgul pa nas 'khyud 
[\[303a.6\]]par byed de/_de nas bzung nas chung ma sdug pa bzhin du rjes su mthun par byed do/_/'ongs na yang 'dod pa la brten par bya'o/_/mtshan mo yongs su spyad nas tho rangs mi snang bar 'gyur te/_gser srang stong ri ba'i mu tig gi phreng ba mal du nyin re zhing yongs 
[\[303a.7\]]su bor nas 'gro bar yang byed do/_/lhag ma ma lus par thams cad nyin re zhing zad par byas te/_gal te cung zad 'jog par byed na yang yod par mi 'gyur ro/_/su la yang brjod par mi bya ste/_gal te rjod par byed na phyir yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]yang na 'chi ba'i mtha'i bar du phung khrol byed par 'gyur ro/_/'di dag ni mchog tu gsang zhing mchog tu sba bar bya ba ste/_sems can gnyis pa la brjod pa ni bzod pa ma yin te/_tha na ma dang pha dang /_gnyen bshes dang bdag po la yang smra bar mi bya'o/_/dud 
[\[303b.2\]]'gro'i skyes gnas su song ba'i phyugs kyi srog chags la yang brjod par mi bya ste/_'di ni mchog tu gsang ba yin te gsang ba pa thams cad dang gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi'ang mchog 'di nyid do/_/gal te gzhan la brjod na ni grub pa yang mi 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[303b.3\]]ro/_/bud med gzhan dang rang gi chung ma la yang 'gro ba rtag tu spang bar bya'o/_/yid du 'ong ma'i sngags ni/_oM ma no ha re mdot+sa ba ka ri pi tsi tra ru bi Ne mai thu na pri ye swA hA/_de'i cho ga ni skyed mos tshal shing mya ngan med kyi rtsar shin tu dben par khang pa byed du 
[\[303b.4\]]bcug la shin tu rab tu dben par bya zhing /_ra ba shin tu mtho ba la gser gyi sgo 'phar bya zhing gtsang mar byas la/_bzlas pa 'bum phrag gcig byas nas de nas las brtsam par bya ste/_zhag chen po blangs la dur khrod kyi skras snying po bya zhing sgo bcad la mar me sbar bar 
[\[303b.5\]]bya'o/_/ras kha tshar dang bcas shing skra dang bral bar ba tu gsar pa sgo'i phyi rol tu bzhag na/_mtshan mo de gcer bur 'ongs nas gos de bgos nas nang du 'jug cing /_mi'i bud med kyi gzugs su byas shing de nas sgrub pa po de dang lhan cig ji srid mar me 
[\[303b.6\]]'bar gyi bar du dga' bar byed do/_/mar me zad nas ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de la gos gcig bcings te gos yongs su bzhag nas mal stan nas 'gro bar byed do/_/yang na sgrub pa pos lag pa'i sor gdub bzhag pa las sor gdub gnyis pa yang 
[\[303b.7\]]bzhag nas 'gro bar byed do/_/yang na gdu bu dang rked pa'i 'og pag dang rkang pa gnyis kyi rkang gdub dang mgo'i nor bu dang de bzhin du gzhan dang /_gzhan lha'i rgyan gcig cig gang de khyer ba de dang de rjes su ster bar byed do/_/'gro ba dang 'ong ba yang don med par mi byed 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]do/_/de bzhin du nyin re zhing yang ma lus par thams cad zad par bya'o/_/de bzhin du zla ba drug na smra bar byed na/_de'i tshe smra bar byas na chung mar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu gnas na bcud kyis len yang rab tu sbyin zhing /_gang 'thungs pas dus 
[\[304a.2\]]rings por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/yid kyis bsgoms nas seng ldeng gi phur bus sa brkos na lha'i gzhal med khang 'byung bar 'gyur la phyung na ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'di'i sngags gnyis pa yod pa ni/_oM ma hA nag+ni nag+ni dze swA hA/_de nyid kyis mar me rab 
[\[304a.3\]]tu sbar la/_sngags 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/phur bus mngon par bsngags pa byas nas brko bar bya'o/_/phur bu phyung zhing mar me zad na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/phur bu dang mi'i zhag gi mar 
[\[304a.4\]]dang ba'i rwa'am ma he nag po'i rwa dang dur khrod kyi ras kyi snying po 'chang na/_yul gzhan du gang ci 'dod pa de yang ster bar byed do/_/yang na rang nyid bya ste sngags kyang gzhan la mi sbyin no/_/ci ste byin na ni rig pa chad par 'gyur ro/_/gang la byin pa de'i phun 
[\[304a.5\]]sum tshogs par 'gyur te/_gang 'dod pa de yang gnas dben par byed na 'di'i grub pa don med par mi 'gyur ro/_/yang na gzhan dang rtse bar ni byed de/_'on kyang de dang lhan cig smra bar ni mi byed do/_/bud med gzhan dang phrad par mngon par 'dod pa'am yid 
[\[304a.6\]]la sems na yang de'i tshe zlos pa de'i gan du 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/_bud med gzhan dang ma phrad pa de'i dbang du 'gyur ba yin no/_/lha mdzes ma'i sngags ni/_oM su ra sun+da ri swA hA/_'di'i cho ga ni seng ldeng gi shing gis me rab du sbar la/_mar gyi sreg blugs 
[\[304a.7\]]kyis zla ba gcig la dus gsum du sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya zhing /_de nas yar ngo'i zla ba nya la bsang byed kyi khres la 'dug ste/_gtsang zhing gtsang ba'i sa phyogs dben par ji srid nam phyed pa de srid du sngags bzlas pa byas na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur zhing 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]de nas ma dang sring mo dang chung ma sngar ji lta ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur te/_thams cad kyang rgya cher brjod par bya'o/_/bdun po 'di dag gnod sbyin ma/_/phyag na rdo rje'i bka' yis kyang /_/lha dang lha min khams gsum du/_/sa rnams kun tu yongs su rgyu/_/
[\[304b.2\]]mi yul dag na sbyor bar dga'/_/snying rjer ldan zhing rnam par rgyu/_/kha cig phag ma byis pa dang /_/gnod sbyin ma gzhan blun pa'o/_/gzhan dag phan byed 'tshe ba yang /_/de bzhin mtshan mo yongs su rgyu/_/byis pa'i 'tsho ba 'phrog pa'i phyir/_/bskam 
[\[304b.3\]]zhing sha ni za byed gzhan/_/gang phyir 'dzam gling 'ongs pa ni/_/de bzhin khrag la chags byed pa'o/_/rtag tu srog la gnod byed pa'i/_/khrag la dga' ba'i gnod sbyin mo/_/srung byed 'chi dang bcas gyur pa'i/_/khyim ni kun tu yongs su rgyu/_/de 
[\[304b.4\]]dag tshar bcad bsgrub don du/_/dam tshig 'di ni rab tu bstan/_/ji ltar 'dod chags 'ching ba la/_/byis pa rnams ni bsdus pa'i don/_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/de ltar 'di kun gsungs pa yin/_/'dod chags kyis ldongs 
[\[304b.5\]]sems rmongs pa'i/_/gang tshe sngags pa 'khrig don gnyer/_/sngags kyis bkug byas longs spyad pa/_/gnod sbyin mo'am srin mo'am/_/klu mo'am yang na dri za 'am/_/mi 'am ci 'am lha min ma/_/lha min lha bas mchog gyur pa'i/_/sa 
[\[304b.6\]]'og gnas ni nyams dga' bar/_/gang du bud med grangs med pa/_/sngags shes der ni rab tu 'jug_/sngags shes sngags ni zlos pa dag_/der song bskal par gnas par 'gyur/_/byams pa zhes bya'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas chen po 
[\[304b.7\]]'byung 'gyur te/_/de tshe de ni dam chos thos/_/thos nas rab tu grol bar 'gyur/_/lha dang lha min bu mo dang /_/rig 'dzin bu mo dam pa dag_/sngags kyis bkug nas spyod byed cing /_/de tshe lha yi bde bas dga'/_/sngags pa 'dzam bu'i gling gnas 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]pas/_/de nyid du ni rtag 'dren pa/_/gang tshe gtsang gnas gsang ba dang /_/gtsang sbra spyod la rtag dga' ba'o/_/grub pa dam pa rmongs rnams la/_/nam yang sems la 'byung mi 'gyur/_/bshang gci mi gtsang gnas dang ni/_/rtag tu dri nga 
[\[305a.2\]]rul ba dang /_/nad kyis sdug bsngal mya ngan dang /_/tha mar 'chi zhing sdug bsngal snod/_/bral ba'i rnam par yang dag ldan/_/mi yi bud med reg mi bya/_/mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang /_/stong pa gsog dang ther zug med/_/byis pa rnams ni rjes brid dang /_/
[\[305a.3\]]kun tu rtogs las byung ba la/_/thog ma med las 'dod kun 'byung /_/sngags pas 'dod pa bsten mi bya/_/de dag chags bral zhes gsungs te/_/rnam grol de dag grub pa nyid/_/gang zhig 'dod la chags bral ba/_/'di yi sngags ni 'grub par 
[\[305a.4\]]'gyur/_/bshang gci khrag gis brlan pa dang /_/rul bas kun tu khyab pa dang /_/rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan bcas/_/mi yi lus la reg mi bya/_/rmongs pa'am chags pa'i sems kyis ni/_/der ni 'khrig pa brten mi bya/_/de dag rtag tu mi gtsang 
[\[305a.5\]]brten/_/sngags kyi grub pa rnyed mi 'gyur/_/sngags shes sngags kyi gzugs can dang /_/shes ldan dbang po thul ba dang /_/dpa' bo gtsang ba'i spyod la dga'/_/rtag tu de yi sngags kyang 'grub/_/pad+ma mtho ma rab dga' ma/_/mi pham ma dang rtag 
[\[305a.6\]]rgyal dang /_/sngo bsangs ldan pa'i gnod sbyin mo/_/rdzu 'phrul che 'di gnod sbyin mo/_/pad+ma mtho ma'i sngags ni/_oM pad+ma uts+tshe swA hA/_'di'i cho ga ni gang gA'i ngogs sam rgya mtsho'i ngogs sam skyed mos tshal gyi me tog gi ldum ra'i nang du lo ma'i spyil po byas te 
[\[305a.7\]]rab tu gtsang zhing bdag nyid kyang gtsang bar byas la/_rdo'am sa'i sgo glegs byas la de nyid du mtshan mo sgo bcad nas 'dod pa'i yo byad kyi longs spyod rnams bsogs te/_de nyid du bdag nyid dang nye bar gnod sbyin mo'i mal yang bsham par bya ste/_rig pa stong phrag bcu 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]bzlas pa byas la/_de bzhin du zla ba gcig byas na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/'ongs nas kyang 'dod pa la longs spyad par byas na/_mu tig gi phreng ba bzang po mal du yongs su bor nas tho rangs 'gro bar 'gyur te/_ji srid zla ba drug gi bar du nyin re 
[\[305b.2\]]zhing rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te mu tig gi phreng ba de len na ni de tsam kho nar yod par 'gyur la/_phreng ba rin po che chen pos nye bar mdzes par byas pa de ni ti na ra 'bum ri ba yin no/_/zla ba drug 'das nas ni rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/chung ma 'dod 
[\[305b.3\]]pa thams cad ster bar byed pa ji ltar rjes su mthun pa 'dod pa de ltar rjes su mthun par byas te/_nye bar gnas par byed do/_/sgrub pa pos 'dod pa bzhin du ji ltar 'dod pa bdag nyid kyis mngon par sprul bar byed do/_/gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi cho ga 
[\[305b.4\]]yang 'di yin no/_/ji ltar bstan pa 'di dang gzhan du yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/rgyal ba ma'i sngags ni/_oM dza ye su dza ye dza ya ma ti sarba kAr+yA Ni me ku ru swA hA/_gser mdog lus ni sna tshogs lus/_/sngo zhing 'khyil pa'i skra dang ldan/_/lha mo yan lag 
[\[305b.5\]]kun mdzes ma/_/zhi ba'i 'od ldan skal ldan dge/_/snyan smra sgeg ldan gtso mo ste/_/mu tig 'od ldan mthong na mdzes/_/rab bsngags gzugs ldan smin ma ma mdzes/_/'jig rten kun gyis legs par mchod/_/cung zad dmar ba'i gos gyon pa/_/de ni 
[\[305b.6\]]rgyal mar mngon par ston/_/'di'i cho ga ni dang po 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dgon pa chen por rab tu zhugs nas/_'bras bu'i zas za zhing ji srid du rang nyid kyi gzugs kyis 'ong ba de'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/_/
[\[305b.7\]]'ongs nas kyang smra ba ni ci zhig bya zhes so/_/gal te mar gyur na ni ma bzhin du re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_rgyal thabs ster bar byed la nor gyi bdag po chen po yang byed la tshe ring ba nyid du yang gnas par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste sring mor 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]'gyur na ni dpag tshad stong du gnas kyang ji ltar 'dod pa'i bud med 'gugs par byed de nyin re zhing yang ti na ra 'bum sbyin par byed de de yang zad par bya'o/_/ci ste chung mar gyur na ni rang gi gnas su khyer te/_lha'i gzhal med khang du 'dzegs nas/_de dang 
[\[306a.2\]]lhan cig dga' bar byed cing /_dus ring por lo stong phrag sum cu'i bar du ji ltar 'dod par rnam par spyod de/_gnod sbyin chen po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/rab tu dga' ma'i sngags ni/_/oM hr-i Sh+TI ma hA nag+ni hUM phaT swA hA/_'di'i cho ga ni mtshan phyed kyi bar du bzlas pa grangs 
[\[306a.3\]]med pa byas te/_phyir yang gnyid log par ma byas na zla ba gcig gi nang du nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/chung mar 'gyur na ni 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed de/_nyin re zhing ti na ra nyi shu rtsa lnga rab tu sbyin par byed do/_/rang gi mdzod nyid kyang ston par byed do/_/dus 
[\[306a.4\]]ring por yang 'tsho bar byed do/_/de bzhin du gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag du ma yang yod do/_/de bzhin du sha za mo dang sha za mo rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /_klu'i bu mo dang /_lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang /_lha'i bud med dang /_lha ma yin gyi bud med dang /_de bzhin du rig 
[\[306a.5\]]pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi bud med dang mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi sngags grangs med pa dag kyang yod do/_/de bzhin du gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_drang srong rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_yi 
[\[306a.6\]]dgas rnams dang /_srin po rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_ma mo rnams dang /_dbang mo dang /_rgan byad ma dang /_phag mo la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyang yod de/_so so so sor thams cad dam 
[\[306a.7\]]tshig gis 'dir bkug nas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyis zos pa dang dam tshig la bzhag cing /_'jam pa'i dbyangs la nye bar gtad nas rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/[ {]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du gnas shing bsnyen bkur yang byed do/_/thams cad kyi yang 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]mdor bsdu na 'khrul 'khor gyi gzugs sam de nyid kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi rig pa ci srid gzugs brnyan rab tu 'gul ba'am rab tu g.yo ba'am rdul 'byung ba'i bar du bzlas pa byas na rang nyid kyi gzugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur 
[\[306b.2\]]te/_gang smras pa de thams cad yang dag par sgrub par byed do/_/de bzhin du gang gzhan yang gzhon nu ma bzhi gnod sbyin ma chen po'i ming po tum bu ru zhes bya ba yang dag par rten pa/_gru'i theg pa la yang dag par zhon pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyis 
[\[306b.3\]]rab tu mchod pa/_sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin par byed pa de dag kyang cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o/_/dper na ras sam rtsig pa'am spang leb la mtsho'i dkyil du bri bar bya ste/_gru'i theg pa la zhon pa phu bo ming po'i rjes su 'gro ba bu mo bzhi po nyid kyang rgya mtsho'i 
[\[306b.4\]]nang du zhugs shing mnyam par 'dug pa'o/_/de dag mi snang gnas bzhag nas/_/khro bo'i bzlas pa yang dag brtsam/_/de tshe g.yo 'gul rdul 'byung bar/_/de dag kun ni skye 'gyur bar/_/de tshe grub pa yin shes nas/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa yongs su btang /_/
[\[306b.5\]]mtshan mo'i tha mar rang tshul nyid/_/dge dang mi dge ston par 'gyur/_/skad cig gis ni zlos pa yis/_/don rnams thams cad sgrub par 'gyur/_/khro bos bkug cing rgyas byas nas/_/smras pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/_/rtag tu nyi ma sogs kyi gza'/_/de 
[\[306b.6\]]bzhin drang srong srin po dang /_/nam mkha' lding dang sha zas kyang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag mchod/_/dbang phyug che sogs 'byung pos kyang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag mchod/_/de dag gis bshad cho ga dang /_/sngags rgyud rgya che bcas pa yi/_/thams cad 
[\[306b.7\]]de dag khro rgyal gyi/_/'bad pa med par dbang du 'gyur/_/gang dag sngags ni ci yod pa/_/khro bo 'chol ba rnyog 'byung ba/_/de kun khro bo'i rgyal po yi/_/de dag bsgo ba mnyan par bstan/_/gang yang 'phags pa'i sngags dag ni/_/thams cad kun 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]'gro'i khyad par can/_/mchog dang rab mchog drag po dang /_/gang yang de bzhin rgyal bas gsungs/_/de bzhin pad+ma 'dzin sngags dang /_/bdag nyid kyis kyang rab bshad dang /_/gang yang gzhan gyi sngags mchog ni/_/rigs lnga dag gis 
[\[307a.2\]]gsungs pa dang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jig rten pa'i/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis gsungs pa dag_/khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul ches/_/thams cad de dag yang dag 'gugs/_/sngags dang rgyud ni thams cad kun/_/bstan pa 'di la nges par 'brel/_/gang 
[\[307a.3\]]zhig gang dag cho gar bstan/_/de nyid 'dir ni nges par sbyar/_/gshin rje gshed ni khro rgyal gyi/_/las kun byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/sgrol ma khro gnyer can nyid dang /_/de bzhin gos dkar mo dang ni/_/de bzhin dkar chen rigs ma dang /_/rdo rje'i rigs 
[\[307a.4\]]'byung mA ma kI/_gtsug tor 'byung ba thams cad dang /_/lha mo spyan ni nyid dag dang /_/de bzhin gshegs kun rig pa dang /_/mthu chen thob dang kun bzang dang /_/pad+ma 'dzin pa'i mnga' bdag dang /_/bdag kyang 'jig rten gnod sbyin bdag_/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 
[\[307a.5\]]'phrul che/_/rgyal sras rmad du byung ba dang /_/dpung bzang 'jig rten rnam par grags/_/rdo rje'i sde dang sde bzang dang /_/blo ldan chos kyis 'phags pa dang /_/bdag gis kyang ni bshad pa'i sngags/_/zlos pas brnyas par mi bya'o/_/sngon du rtag tu mchod 
[\[307a.6\]]bya zhing /_/legs gsungs de dag bgom mi bya/_/khro bo'i rgyal po legs mchod cing /_/der ni zlos pas sbyar mi bya/_/dus rnams kun tu sngags dag la/_/de dag rig pa bcad mi bya/_/ji bzhin las ni kun la yang /_/'jig rten sngags kyi lha dag ni/_/
[\[307a.7\]]dka' zlog bde byed tshangs sogs dang /_/lha chen la yang legs par mchod/_/ji ltar rgyud la sngags rnams ni/_/de bzhin nyid du'ang kun la bya/_/thams cad sngags ni kun la yang /_/thams cad nyid du'ang yang dag bstan/_/sngags kun rab tu 'jug pa 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]yang /_/khro bo las ni yang dag 'byung /_/sngags 'di khro bo chen po ni/_/gshin rje gshed ces bya ming gis/_/bdag nyid chen po gshin rje yang /_/myur du bkug nas 'joms par byed/_/nyi ma'i bu ni gshin rje dang /_/brgya byin bdag nyid chen po yang /_/
[\[307b.2\]]bkug nas dbang med mi bzad pa/_/gdul dka' 'dul byed mnga' bdag yin/_/sngags 'di sngags ni chen po ste/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa yin/_/ma rungs las rnams thams cad byed/_/sngags kun rab tu sgrub par byed/_/de skad smras 
[\[307b.3\]]nas dpal ldan ni/_/lag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul ches/_/shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog_/dpa' chen sangs rgyas la btud nas/_/sngags 'khor rten pa'i rdo rje can/_/rdzu 'phrul can gyis sngags rnams gsungs/_/'byung po kun tshogs dge ba ni/_/sems can 
[\[307b.4\]]kun gyis mnyan pa yin/_/sngags rnams kun tshogs lta byed pa/_/sngags kyi mchog ni bdag gis bshad/_/blo dang ldan pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs/_/byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin/_/mi bzad gdul dka' 'dul byed pa/_/ma rungs thams cad zlog 
[\[307b.5\]]par byed/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/_gnod sbyin mo sgrub pa'i cho ga rab 'byam las le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/
[\[307b.6\]]sdug bsngal spang zhing bde bya ba/_/sdug bsngal spang zhes bstan pa ni/_/mdor bsdus na ni bzlog pa yin/_/de nyid theg pa rnam gsum du/_/nga yi 'di ni bstan pa yin/_/mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med dang /_/'dus byas thams cad skad cig nyid/_/gsob 
[\[307b.7\]]dang rtag tu kun stong par/_/'khor ba'i 'ching ba nges par bstan/_/de las chags bral rnam gsum 'gro/_/sems can dge la brten pa yin/_/byang chub sems dang sangs rgyas dang /_/rang rgyal byang chub la brten dang /_/'dod chags bral ba rdzu 'phrul che/_/
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]de bzhin gzhan dag dgra bcom nyid/_/nyan thos byang chub la brten nas/_/rnam gsum zhi ba thob par byed/_/chos 'di dag ni mdor bsdu na/_/dge dang mi dge bstan pa yin/_/rtag tu mi dge spang bya ste/_/dus rnams kun tu dge ba spyad/_/
[\[308a.2\]]'byung po kun la mi 'tshe bar/_/ngas ni chos kyang rab tu bstan/_/'gro ba lnga po'i lam nyid du/_/chos 'di nyid ni 'gyur ba yin/_/gang zhig zag med chos rnams ni/_/yang dag mtha' la yang dag brten/_/dang po'i sangs rgyas snga ma yis/_/'di nyid lam 
[\[308a.3\]]du gsungs pa yin/_/zhi ba mya ngan 'das 'gro bar/_/ngas kyang thams cad bstan pa yin/_/chos kyi mtha' la brten nas ni/_/yang dag mtha' ni thob pa yin/_/chos rnams kun gyi mtha' med pa/_/yang dag mtha' zhes brjod pa yin/_/chos 'di dag ni 
[\[308a.4\]]mdor bsdus nas/_/nyon cig lha ni thams cad dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/_/dgra bcom nyan thos dag kyang nyon/_/nga ni sa steng mya ngan 'da'/_/kha ba can gyi nang dag tu/_/sA la'i nags ni yang dag 'byung /_/gser dang ldan pa'i chu bo dang /_/
[\[308a.5\]]gyad rnams kyi ni nye 'khor du/_/sA la zung gi nags nang du/_/nga ni mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/grong khyer ming ni sdig pa can/_/cod pan bcings pa'i mchod rten dang /_/chu bo'i 'gram ni rtag nyams dga'/_/der ni sa steng mya ngan 'da'/_/byang chub sems 
[\[308a.6\]]dpa' thams cad dang /_/rdzu 'phrul che ldan nyan thos dang /_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_/'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul che/_/brgya byin tshangs bcas 'dab bzang dang /_/gzhan yang 'og min la sogs lha/_/der ni thams cad 'dus par ni/_/rab tu 'byung bar 
[\[308a.7\]]'gyur ba yin/_/der ni gyad kyi nye 'khor dang /_/gang gA'i byang phyogs 'gram dag ni/_/chu bo chen po de las gzhan/_/kha ba can ri'i lho phyogs char/_/sA la'i nags zhes bya ba 'byung /_/de tshe nub phyogs bltas pa'i mal/_/de yi gnas su 'byung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]de tshe chu bo rab dga' ba/_/bzang po gser ldan 'gram dag tu/_/lha rnams kun gyi tshogs la sogs/_/'dus pa dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mi dang rgyal po'i mchog rnams dang /_/mi dang mi ma yin pa 'byung /_/de tshe mi dang 'byung po kun/_/de tshe byis pa 'phags pa dang /_/
[\[308b.2\]]dga' ston chen po dga' chen ltar/_/gnas de la ni yang dag 'dus/_/rang lus zang zing bcas par ni/_/bzang po chen po'i bkod pa'ang byas/_/chos kyi mtha' ni yongs spangs nas/_/yang dag mthar ni yang dag zhugs/_/de tshe sngon gyi skye ba ni/_/ser skya'i grong khyer 
[\[308b.3\]]gzhi dag tu/_/shAkya'i rigs kyi gtso bo ni/_/nga ni 'khor ba'i btson rar skyes/_/bdag gi sdug bsngal bdag nyid kyis/_/khyim las nges 'byung yongs su spangs/_/de tshe mu stegs mang po bsten/_/bdud rtsi dag kyang thob ma gyur/_/dka' ba dag kyang bdag gis 
[\[308b.4\]]spyad/_/lus kyi gdung ba'ang yun ring ba/_/lo drug tu ni bsten pa yis/_/lus kyang zhig cing rnam par skams/_/shes dang shes bya gsal ba ni/_/ngas ni cung zad thob pa med/_/de nas nga ni langs nas kyang /_/'bras chen dkar ba'i zas kyang zos/_/lha rnams 
[\[308b.5\]]kyis mchod lam dag ni/_/der ni sa steng nga yis bgrod/_/chu bo nai rany+dza na'i 'gram/_/shing gi rgyal po legs mdzes pa/_/me tog rnam pa du mas khyab/_/de 'gram sa ni nyams dga' ba/_/nags chen 'bras bu ldan pa dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs shing dag 'byung /_/chu 
[\[308b.6\]]bo chen pos yongs bskor ba'i/_/shing gi rtsar ni nga yis phyin/_/sa yi cha ni mthong tsam gyis/_/bdag gi sems ni brtan pa thob/_/de lta'i shing ni bdag gis mthong /_/yal ga lo ma nyer mdzes pa'i/_/shing chen grib ma chen po ni/_/rtsa ba mi mngon nyer spyad 'os/_/
[\[308b.7\]]shing rtsa a shwat+thar 'dug nas/_/sems ni shin tu dang bar gyur/_/bsam gtan dang ni ting 'dzin dang /_/der ni brtan pa'ang mngon par 'thob/_/mtshan mo'i mthar ni skye mthar byed/_/der ni snang ba med pa'ang 'thob/_/bdud kyi bgegs ni rnam mang po/_/rnam 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]pa du ma rab tu sbyar/_/sde rnams bcom nas slar ldog cing /_/rang gi gnas su'ang de dag song /_/sngags dang rgyud ni 'di don du/_/rnam pa mang po'ang gsungs pa yin/_/rnam pa du ma'i sbyor ba dang /_/bsam gtan shes pa'ang bstan pa yin/_/der ni theg pa 
[\[309a.2\]]gsum yang spyad/_/gzhan dag sems can rten la 'dzud/_/nyes pa rnam pa gsum nyid kyi/_/gnyen po dag kyang rab tu bstan/_/de nas langs nas yang song nas/_/grong khyer lteng rgyas chu bzang gis/_/khrus byas der gnas drang srong rnams/_/slob mar bcas 
[\[309a.3\]]pa'ang rab tu phyung /_/sems can rnam mang don byas nas/_/de nas nga ni yang dag 'das/_/ka shi'i grong ni nyams dga' bar/_/mthar gyis su ni yang dag zhugs/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po sngar sangs rgyas/_/de yi gnas su'ang bzhugs pa yin/_/ka shi skye bo'i yul dag tu/_/
[\[309a.4\]]der ni rang bdag nyid gnas 'gyur/_/zhi ba mya ngan 'das byed pa'i/_/dam chos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_/'jig rten lha dang lha min bcas/_/'gro ba lnga la yang dag brten/_/'byung po kun la bde ba'i phyir/_/der ni chos kyang rab tu bstan/_/der ni snga ma'i 
[\[309a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyis/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med/_/de ni nga yis rab tu bstan/_/srid las grol zhing ba de don dang /_/sems can nyes pa bzlog pa'i phyir/_/bde zhing zhi bar gzhol ba'o/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/srid 
[\[309a.6\]]pa'i lam ni gzhig don dang /_/bden bzhi'i ting 'dzin las byung ba'i/_/'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/_/tshangs pa'i gnas bzhis rnam par brgyan/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung dang bcas/_/rnam pa bcu gnyis byas pa yin/_/ma rig 'gag par yang 
[\[309a.7\]]dag ldan/_/rig pa bskyed pa'i rim las byung /_/yang dag mtha' yi legs mthar skyes/_/de nyid mthar ni bstan pa yin/_/lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa dag_/tha mar bdag nyid rtogs chen skyes/_/sems can mang po thar don du/_/zhi ba'i 'khor lo yang dag 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]ldan/_/nyams dga' ka shi'i grong spangs nas/_/de tshe bdag ni mnyan yod song /_/de tshe mu stegs gdul bya'i phyir/_/cho 'phrul chen po'ang byas pa yin/_/mi yul dag tu rdzu 'phrul ni/_/de tshe yang dag bstan par byas/_/mu stegs mang po'i gnas dag tu'ang /_/
[\[309b.2\]]de tshe'ang rab tu dga' bar byas/_/yul ming me thab ces bya bar/_/lha las babs pa bzang po byas/_/sum cu rtsa gsum dag tu yang /_/chos nyid la ni brgya byin sbyar/_/de nas 'og min lha sogs dang /_/tshangs sogs brgya byin bcas pa dang /_/rnam thos gnod sbyin dbang 
[\[309b.3\]]dang bcas/_/rgyal chen bzhi yi ris dag dang /_/rtag tu myos dang gzhong thogs dang /_/pi wang gsum pa phreng thogs dang /_/lha dang gnod sbyin tshogs rnams kun/_/sa bla lha dang bar snang gnas/_/'phags pa gnod sbyin tshogs bdag dang /_/lha dang 
[\[309b.4\]]lha min thams cad kyang /_/chos kyi 'bras bu ldan par byas/_/mya ngan 'das gsum rjes 'gro byas/_/sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang /_/de tshe legs pa nyid la btsud/_/de dag rtsis kyi grangs med pa/_/'khor ba'i mtha' bzhin de mtha' med/_/stong 
[\[309b.5\]]chen po yi 'jig rten gyi/_/khams dang 'dra bar bsam mi khyab/_/rtag tu sems can mang po ni/_/bden pa'i don la yang dag sbyar/_/de tshe der ni nga 'ongs nas/_/gnas gtsang steng du gnas nas kyang /_/theg pa gsum la rjes 'jug pa'i/_/dam chos sngags 
[\[309b.6\]]ni rab tu bskor/_/sems can gdul bya la brten nas/_/nga yis cho ga'i rgyal po 'di/_/'jig rten mang la rab bstan nas/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs la'ang gtad pa yin/_/nga ni 'jig rten mya ngan 'das/_/sa steng stongs par gyur pa na/_/de nas 'jam dpal sems 
[\[309b.7\]]can la/_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/_/thub dbang yongs su mya ngan 'das/_/dam pa'i chos ni bsrung ba'i phyir/_/de tshe rtag tu srung bar ni/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'gyur ba yin/_/sngags ni rab tu dbye don du/_/cho ga rgya chen bstan pa yin/_/
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/_/ma rungs mi bzad chen po yi/_/mi bdag gdug pa chen po ni/_/phan tshun gsod pa dag la dga'/_/sdig pa'i las can spyod pa ngan/_/de tshe longs spyod chung ba dang /_/de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/_/'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom 
[\[310a.2\]]ma med/_/sA la zhes bya'i nags su ni/_/de dag mchod don rtsom par byed/_/chu bo gser ldan 'gram dang ni/_/cod pan 'ching ba'i mchod rten du/_/zhi ba'i dbyings la brten pa'i phyir/_/nga ni mya ngan 'das mal 'cha'/_/lus ni sreg pa'i shing la bzhag_/rdzogs 
[\[310a.3\]]longs spyod pa longs spyod spangs/_/de'i sngon mdzad pa nyid dang ni/_/nga yi rmad byung spyod mthong nas/_/nga yi gdul bya'i spyod yul dang /_/sangs rgyas gdul bya'i mdzad pa dang /_/spyod pa dge ba sna tshogs de/_/mi yi bdag po kun dran nas/_/thams 
[\[310a.4\]]cad mchod pa byed par 'gyur/_/lha dang lha min mir bcas pa/_/de nas sa bdag kun 'dus nas/_/de tshe nga yi drung du ni/_/dga' ston chen po mchod pa kun/_/byed par 'gyur bar the tshom ma med/_/sku ni shing la rab bteg nas/_/zang zing yon tan 'byung ba'i 
[\[310a.5\]]gnas/_/dge ba dang ni mi dge dang /_/bsod nams bsod nams ma yin spangs/_/yang dag mtha' don stong nyid mtha'/_/phung po lnga ni 'byung ba che/_/sems can mang pos de rjes mthong /_/bsod nams che ba'i don du sbyar/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod 
[\[310a.6\]]chags bral/_/nyan thos chen po bdag nyid che/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang /_/sa bcu la ni yang dag gnas/_/yang dag mtha' ni rtogs nas kyang /_/chos kyi mtha' la yang dag gnas/_/sems can kun la snying brtse bar/_/kun gyis yongs 
[\[310a.7\]]su bskor nas gnas/_/lha yi tshogs ni thams cad dang /_/'phags dang so so'i skye bo dang /_/'di kun bsod nams chen po'i gnas/_/mchod rten la ni 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi rtag sdug bsngal don gnas nas/_/dang ba'i sems ni rab tu thob/_/mchod rten 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]mtha' yi nyen kor du/_/'byung po'i tshogs kyang 'dug pa yin/_/mchod pa chen po byas nas ni/_/smre sngags 'don cing ngu bar byed/_/dbugs 'byin snying rjes brlan nas nas ni/_/mchi ma'i thigs pa'ang rab tu 'dzag_/smre sngags 'di ltar kun 'don pa/_/mi 
[\[310b.2\]]rtag sdug bsngal stong pa yi/_/sangs rgyas chos ni sngar ston mdzad/_/da ltar sa steng 'di la ni/_/de 'dir thub mchog dam pa ni/_/drang srong mchog gyur bdun pa dang /_/sems can kun mchog shAkya'i rgyal/_/de mthong ba yi tha ma yin/_/sdug bsngal mi 
[\[310b.3\]]rtag ston pa yi/_/bcom ldan de 'di gzims pa yi/_/mthong ba yi ni tha ma 'am/_/stong nyid don dam ston byed dang /_/thog ma nas zhi don ston pa/_/lha yi tshogs dag ci yi phyir/_/kye ma mnga' bdag sad mi byed/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po lha yi bu/_/thams cad 
[\[310b.4\]]'dir ni lhags par 'gyur/_/dpa' bo chen po chos don gnyer/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po nyan thos dang /_/sems can kun ni sdug bsngal ba'i/_/mi dang lha dang lha ma yin/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bskor ba'i/_/de yi dus ni 'di dag yin/_/bcom ldan khyod ni myur 
[\[310b.5\]]du bzhengs/_/sangs rgyas dus kyi rjes 'gro ba/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i dus bzhin du/_/thub pas de 'drar mi 'da' mdzod/_/yun ring dus nas brten mdzad pa'i/_/sems can mang po'i don mdzad stsol/_/zhi ba mya ngan 'das lam mam/_/bsam gtan rnam thar bstan du 
[\[310b.6\]]gsol/_/de ltar rnam pa du ma yi/_/smra ba mang po'i tshig brjod nas/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha yi tshogs/_/de nas thams cad cang mi smra/_/mtshungs med smre sngags byas nas ni/_/bdud dang bcas pas rab tu 'dug_/yun ring ngu zhing smre byas nas/_/'gul 
[\[310b.7\]]nas mchi bcas sgra 'dzer bcas/_/mya ngan yid mi bde dang bcas/_/tshangs sogs lha dang lha min bcas/_/mi dang mi yi bdag po kun/_/sa steng de la gnas par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang shAkya'i rigs skyes pa/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]bral/_/bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas ni/_/lha yi lha yi gnyen gyur pa/_/dge slong ma 'gags pa zhes bya/_/de gcung mi yi nang na dge/_/shin tu phra la mkhas shing gsal/_/chags bral lugs la mkhas pa dang /_/dgra bcom 
[\[311a.2\]]gtso bo rgyal po ni/_/du ma'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor/_/mya ngan gyis bskyed dbugs phyung nas/_/shin tu yun ring tshig kyang smras/_/snying rje yid mi bdes drangs pas/_/rgyal po dang bcas gyad rnams la/_/grogs po re zhig shing la ni/_/me ni 'jug par 
[\[311a.3\]]ma byed cig_/ji srid bcom ldan sras po ni/_/mchog gyur chos nyid las byung ba/_/de ni nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che/_/'od srung chen po zhes bya ba/_/thub pa chen po blo yi mchog_/bram ze'i rigs skyes zang zing med/_/ma ga d+hA yi mi nang skyes/_/ri bo der ni mnyam 
[\[311a.4\]]par bzhag_/grong khyer rgyal po'i khab mchog tu/_/pi ba la yi khyim du gnas/_/de ni myur du 'dir 'ong bar/_/byed kyi gzhan du ma yin no/_/lha ni gang zhig der dang ba/_/sku la me 'bar nges bzlog pas/_/de bar sku la me gtong ba/_/ngal ba don med ma byed 
[\[311a.5\]]cig_/ji srid rdzu 'phrul che ba'i mchog_/nyan thos thub pa thugs dgyes des/_/'jig rten gsum mchod sangs rgyas dang /_/ston pa 'jig rten gyis mchod la/_/zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_/bla ma g.yas su bskor byas pa/_/de tshe sku 'di sbar don 
[\[311a.6\]]du/_/der ni kun gyis rab byos shig_/gang tshe sngar ni sbar gyur na/_/kun tu 'bar ba'ang don med 'gyur/_/thams cad don med ma byed cig_/'dir ni ngal ba kho na 'byung /_/blo dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/_/kun la de skad smras nas ni/_/mi dang mi yi 
[\[311a.7\]]bdag po dang /_/gyad rnams kun kyang 'dug par gyur/_/mi yi rigs su nga skyes shing /_/mi rnams kyis kyang rab tu skyed/_/longs spyod rnam mang gzhan dang ni/_/bzo dang sgyu rtsal dge ba'ang bskyed/_/sa steng shing gi rtsa dag tu/_/mi yi gzugs kyis byang 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]chub thob/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad pa ni/_/mi rnams la ni chos kyang bstan/_/de nyid phyir na mi rnams kyis/_/sku sbyang don phyir me yang sbar/_/nga ming 'byung po kun gyi ni/_/mchog nyid du ni gyur pa yin/_/mi yi 'jig rten zhi ba dang /_/nga ni mya ngan 
[\[311b.2\]]'das par brtags/_/gang dag sangs rgyas thams cad ni/_/'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/_/thams cad mi yi 'jig rten du/_/mi yi lus su yang dag 'byung /_/skye dang byang chub de bzhin du/_/dam chos 'khor lo dge ba spyod/_/zhi ba yang dag kun gshegs par/_/
[\[311b.3\]]de bzhin rang rgyal dgra bcom pa/_/mi yi lus la brten nas ni/_/bla med zhi bar gshegs pa yin/_/bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par/_/de dag la ni ngas phan byas/_/nga ni phyi mar zhi ba dang /_/bsil bar gyur cing 'gog par gyur/_/sa steng stongs par gyur pa 
[\[311b.4\]]na/_/der ni sku gdung rab bzhag pa/_/mi rnams la ni phan don du/_/mchod pa rjes su gzung 'dod pas/_/'jig rten lha dang lha min bcas/_/mi dang gnod sbyin mkha' lding bdag_/srin po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]grul bum dang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po'i sha za rnams/_/
[\[311b.5\]]'byung po dag ni thams cad dang /_/gzar bcas ma mo rnams dang ni/_/de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad ni/_/grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab khams/_/srog chags thams cad nyid dag ni/_/mchod pa'i don phyir sku gdung dag_/sa steng stongs par gyur pa na/_/
[\[311b.6\]]de yi tshe na yang dag bzhag_/kha cig sa steng mi dag dang /_/lha yi rgyal po de bzhin gzhan/_/lha min dbang po rdzu 'phrul che/_/sa 'og gnas pa gzhan dag dang /_/de bzhin klu rgyal lha min dag_/sku gdung so so so sor ni/_/yon tan ldan pa rdzu 'phrul ches/_/phyogs 
[\[311b.7\]]nas thams cad bdag gir byas/_/rang gi gnas su khyer nas ni/_/de tshe mchod pa byed 'gyur zhing /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po sangs rgyas su/_/thams cad the tshom med par 'gyur/_/mchog dang tha ma bar gnas pa'i/_/sems ni dad pa rnam gsum gyis/_/'jig rten rnam 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]gsum 'gyur ba ni/_/sangs rgyas bse ru dgra bcom thob/_/theg pa rnam gsum 'jig rten gsum/_/rnam gsum yang dag bstan pa yin/_/theg chen la 'jug lam gyis ni/_/de la brten nas nges par 'byung /_/rang rgyal byang chub la brten pa/_/de 
[\[312a.2\]]bzhin 'jig rten 'gyur ba yin/_/de las gzhan pa nyan thos kyang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/_/de bzhin 'jig rten 'gyur ba yin/_/rnam gsum rigs kyis rnam par brgyan/_/sa bdag longs spyod chen po dang /_/bde chen don du 'khor los sgyur/_/
[\[312a.3\]]lha dang mi yi phun sum tshogs/_/yun ring de tshe rjes myong nas/_/mthar ni 'chi ba la brten nas/_/de dag zhi ba rnam gsum 'gro/_/dang por sngar ni sangs rgyas dang /_/da ltar ma 'ongs pa dag kyang /_/thams cad la ni 'di nyid de/_/'di ni yang dag ji bzhin bstan/_/mya 
[\[312a.4\]]ngan 'das pa'i sa de la/_/lha rnams thams cad 'dug nas ni/_/yid byung sems ni skyo nas kyang /_/skad 'dzer bcas pas smra ba ni/_/de tshe thams cad 'di skad smra/_/kye ma'o kyi hud mi rtag pa/_/'jig rten sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che/_/de 'dir yongs su mya ngan 'das/_/
[\[312a.5\]]lha yi rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/_/de dag kun gyis de smras nas/_/snying ni mya ngan bcas gyur nas/_/de nas cang mi smra bar gnas/_/ma ga d+hA yi skye bo mchog_/ku sha'i mchog gi grong gnas pa/_/de dang nye ba'i ri bo ni/_/phag rgod ces bya'i ming du grags/_/dge slong bsam 
[\[312a.6\]]gtan der byed pa/_/pi pa li yi phug zhugs pa/_/'di ni nyan thos nga yi bu/_/thugs skyes chos las byung ba gang /_/de ni 'od srung chen po yin/_/de tshe phug mchog la 'dug nas/_/de nas bsod snyoms la spyad de/_/'dug nas rang nyid sems par byed/_/dus ring 
[\[312a.7\]]bdag gis sangs rgyas la/_/bdag gis kyang ni de phyag byas/_/rang byung gyur pa mi yi mchog_/bdag gis da ltar de blta bya/_/shAkya'i rigs skyes thub pa mchog_/bcom ldan de ni ga la bzhugs/_/bram ze'i rgyal po 'od srung che/_/der ni yang dag dgongs par gyur/_/
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]thub pa'i thub pa kho na ni/_/sems kyis de ltar bsam par gyur/_/lha yi mig gis 'jig rten la/_/'jig rten ma lus lta bar byed/_/'og min de bzhin 'jig rten mtha'/_/srid rtse'i 'jig rten khams kyi bar/_/'jig rten ma lus thams cad dang /_/stong chen 
[\[312b.2\]]sred pa las byung ba/_/nyan thos spyod yul ji tsam par/_/lha yi mig gis blta byas na/_/mya ngan 'das gzims zhi ba dang /_/bsil bar gyur cing nad med pa/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po lha tshogs kyis/_/kun nas yongs su bskor ba dang /_/mi dang mi yi bdag po dang /_/
[\[312b.3\]]lha min gnod sbyin srin po dang /_/'byung po'i tshogs ni thams cad dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/_/grags chen nyan thos chen po yang /_/shes rab gtsor ni gyur pa dang /_/'dod chags bcas dang 'dod chags bral/_/lha dang bcas pa'i mi rnams kyis/_/
[\[312b.4\]]dpa' bo shing la bteg pa ni/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rigs las byung /_/de bzhin lha yi lhar gyur gtso/_/thub pa dam pa'i mnga' bdag ni/_/sa bdag gling la gnas rnams kyis/_/kun nas yongs su bskor gyur nas/_/mi yi dbang mchog gyad dag gis/_/lag na 
[\[312b.5\]]rtswa sgron yang dag thogs/_/de dag me sbar mi nus par/_/lha rnams kyis ni bzlog 'gyur zhes/_/dge slong ma 'gags pa yang ni/_/brtul zhugs can gyis de skad smras/_/'chi mas brnangs shing smre sngags 'don/_/sa rnams sgra ni chen pos gang /_/ha ha zhes bya'i sgra 
[\[312b.6\]]nyid dang /_/rnga bo che yi sgra yang thos/_/lha dang drang srong tshogs kyis khyab/_/lha yi bu mo'i tshogs kyis bstod/_/grub pa rig 'dzin klu dang ni/_/mi 'am ci klu rgya che ba/_/snyan pa'i sgra ni sgrogs par byed/_/bya yi skad ni dge ba dang /_/yid 'ong sna tshogs rol mo dang /_/
[\[312b.7\]]lha dang mi yis rjed pa dang /_/lha yi bu mo'i tshogs kyis gang /_/grub pa rig 'dzin dag dang ldan/_/de tshe sA la'i nags dag tu/_/rnal 'byor dag gis kun tu khyab/_/thub mchog gzims mal dam pa ni/_/kun nas yongs su bskor bar mthong /_/rdzu 'phrul chen 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]po mya ngan bral/_/de nas dbugs 'byin mya ngan bcas/_/de tshe bram ze 'od srung ni/_/mchi ma'i thigs pa'ang rab tu 'don/_/nga yi nyan thos mchog gyur pa/_/de tshe sa yi steng du 'gyel/_/tshig kyang myur du brjod pa ni/_/kye ma'o dka' ba rab tu byung /_/gang 
[\[313a.2\]]du sangs rgyas zhes bya ba/_/zag med mya ngan 'das gyur tam/_/mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa zhes/_/de nyid kyis ni 'dir gsungs pa/_/skye ba gzhan gyi rjes 'gro ba/_/bdag gis ston pa'i sku mi mthong /_/de nas langs nas myur du ni/_/ma ga d+hA yi rgyal por song /_/
[\[313a.3\]]sdug bsngal nyam thag ma skyes dgra/_/pha yi mya ngan gyis non pa'i/_/de tshe de yi phug 'ongs nas/_/mi yi bdag po de la smras/_/rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/rgyal po chen po mya ngan 'das/_/bzhon pa myur du sbyor mdzod dang /_/nga ni ston pa'i drung 'gro 
[\[313a.4\]]ba/_/sA lar gzims mal bzhugs pa ni/_/nad med sems dang rnam par bral/_/bstan pa thams cad las 'das shing /_/sku yi dam pa longs spyod rdzogs/_/ma rungs de tshig thos nas ni/_/rgyal po de yang sdug bsngal zhing /_/nyam thag smre bar gyur pa yi/_/de tshe 
[\[313a.5\]]tshig ni rgyal po 'don/_/ston pa dang ni pha dag dang /_/gnyi ga las kyang bdag nyams gyur/_/gnyen rnams kun gyis spangs pa ste/_/de tshe skye bo yid ches med/_/dmyal ba mi bzad ltung 'gyur na/_/bdag ni su yi skyabs la brten/_/nyan thos ston pa'i mchog gyur 
[\[313a.6\]]pa/_/dpa' bo chen po skyabs mdzod cig_/nyan thos chen po gzi brjid che/_/bdag gi 'tsho ba 'di na med/_/ma ga d+hA yi mi yi bdag_/de nas de skad smras pa dang /_/nyan thos mchog gi rkang gnyis la/_/de yi mod la spyi bos gtugs/_/der ni sems med brgyal 
[\[313a.7\]]gyur pa/_/de yi tshe na gzhon nu ni/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/_/dbugs 'byin pa ni byed par 'gyur/_/sems can rjes su gzung 'dod pas/_/'jig rten kun tu rgyu bar gyis/_/gang tshe sA la'i nags su ni/_/nga lus shing gi steng bzhag pa/_/byang chub 
[\[313b\]]
