[\[313b.1\]]sems dpa'i tshogs bskor nas/_/de tshe khyod ni 'dug par 'gyur/_/gang phyir nga lus mchod pa'i phyir/_/sa steng 'dir ni khyod kyis byas/_/'jig rten kun tu bltas nas ni/_/su zhig sdug bsngal gang las drang /_/gzhon nu zab pa'i blo ldan pa/_/de ltar sa la 
[\[313b.2\]]'gyel bar gyur/_/'jam dpal gyis ni de yi tshe/_/sa bdag de ni sdug bsngal ba/_/der gnas pa la khyod kyis ni/_/khyod nyid kyis ni de 'dul 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpas rtogs 'gyur gyis/_/lha dang drang srong rnams dang ni/_/nyan thos rang rgyal gzhan 
[\[313b.3\]]dag dang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen pos mi nus so/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis mi bdag ni/_/rmi lam gnas pa bzhin du mthong /_/khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul byin rlabs kyis/_/rgyal po mya ngan gyis brgyal des/_/de tshe de ni rmi lam du/_/mngon sum byis pa lta bur mthong /_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[313b.4\]]chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/_/gzhon nu bdag nyid sna tshogs pa/_/de bzhin chos ni rnam par 'phrul/_/byang chub sems dpa' byis pa'i gzugs/_/sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/_/'jam dpal gyis bstan sems dang byas/_/rgyal po mnar med 'gro ba las/_/
[\[313b.5\]]myur du de las ldang bar 'gyur/_/rnam pa sna tshogs las dang ni/_/ngan song mtho ris bzang po dang /_/'gro ba bdag nyid che yon tan/_/nyan thos thams cad rnam spangs pa/_/de nas rgya cher byas pa ni/_/mdo sde 'gyod pa sel ba ste/_/rgyal po ma skyes dgra yi ni/_/shin tu 
[\[313b.6\]]rgya cher gsal ba'o/_/rgya che don gyis brgyan pa yi/_/mdor bsdus nas ni 'di gsungs so/_/dang po bar ma tha ma yi/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung dag ni/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/cho ga rgya cher gsungs pa yin/_/de nas 'jam dpal dus kun tu/_/gzhon nu khyod 
[\[313b.7\]]ni de yi tshe/_/sdig pa'i las la rjes 'jug pa'i/_/sa bdag rnams ni 'dul bar 'gyur/_/khyod ni rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/_/gdul bya dag kyang bsam mi khyab/_/'byung po'i tshogs rnams ma lus pa/_/khyod ni 'dul byed nyid du 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas dpa' bos de gsungs 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]nas/_/'od chen ldan pa 'jam dbyangs la/_/gnas gtsang steng bzhugs de tshe gzigs/_/rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/smra ba'i mchog gis de la gsungs/_/bskal pa mang po 'das pa na/_/khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas par 'gyur/_/grangs 
[\[314a.2\]]kyis mnyam med bsam mi khyab/_/mi yis grangs dang mnyam med par/_/'jam pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rtag tu yang ni mthar gyis kyang /_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa de tshe byed/_/sems can mang po rnam bkrol nas/_/mya 
[\[314a.3\]]ngan 'das pa nyid du 'gyur/_/gzhon nu'i gzugs can rdzu 'phrul che/_/gzhon nu la ni de gsungs nas/_/brtse bas brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/_/yun ring dbugs phyung rnam par skyo/_/yun ring rdzogs sangs rgyas bltas nas/_/mchi ma'i thigs pa'ang rnam 'dzag cing /_/
[\[314a.4\]]thal mo sbyar dang bcas nas ni/_/de nas kyang ni 'dug par gyur/_/de nas de ni sa gnas pa/_/mi yi dam pa ma skyes dgras/_/rmad byung 'od srung chen po ni/_/bram ze la ni mgos btud nas/_/dran pa rnyed cing sems sad nas/_/rkang gnyis skyil krung bcas nas 
[\[314a.5\]]'dug_/de nas yun ring dbugs phyung la/_/don ni rgya cher nges bstan byas/_/dbang phyug chen po ma skyes dgra/_/rgyal po'i bu ni 'dug par gyur/_/de nas 'od srung ches smras pa/_/nga ni spur sbyong gnas su 'gro/_/mi rnams la ni phan phyir dang /_/mchod rten gzugs 
[\[314a.6\]]gnas mchod don du'o/_/nyan thos mchog ni gnas de ru/_/rdzu 'phrul nyid kyis nye bar lhags/_/de dang 'brel bar sems skye ba/_/bdag gi rdzu 'phrul rigs pa min/_/mchod rten chen po mthong bar ni/_/rkang gnyis bdag ni 'gro bar 'tshal/_/de nas lam gyi bar 
[\[314a.7\]]'dug nas/_/'khor ba'i stegs ni rab tu bstan/_/ji tsam de nas 'ongs gyur pa/_/dge 'dun kun dga' rar gnas pa'i/_/dge slong rgan zhugs gsar bu ni/_/sdig pa nyid kyis rnam rmongs pas/_/mthong nas rgan zhugs rnams 'khrugs te/_/gang phyir de dang nye bar 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]'ongs/_/grags pa che zhing skal ba che/_/sems can dag pa rims nad med/_/bram ze de yi drung lhags nas/_/de tshe rkang gnyis phyag byas nas/_/de la smras pa skal ba che/_/legs 'ongs khyod ni ci phyir byon/_/myur du khyod ni gang du 'gro/_/yid byung ci phyir rab tu 'dug_/
[\[314b.2\]]de smras khro ldan byis pa la/_/tshe ldan khyod kyis ma thos sam/_/rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'jig rten kun gyi ston pa ni/_/sangs rgyas bdag gi pha zhes smra/_/mar me 'bar bzhin mya ngan 'das/_/dpa' bo chen po nub par gyur/_/sa yi steng ni stongs par gyur/_/
[\[314b.3\]]de bzhin 'jig rten ma lus stongs/_/bdag gi phyogs rnams kun stongs gyur/_/byis de phyin ci log sems kyis/_/der ni rgan zhugs rab dga' nas/_/rab rgod tshig tu smras pa ni/_/rab tu ring de 'das gyur tam/_/phyag ring lus ni che ba dang /_/mgo ni gdugs 
[\[314b.4\]]kyi rnam pa 'dra/_/bdag cag rnams kyi gtso bo mchog_/bslab dang bslab min rjes su ston/_/da ltar de ni mya ngan 'das/_/ci 'dod bzhin du bdag cag spyod/_/rgan zhugs kyis ni de smras nas/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po rab 'khrugs nas/_/gdong la khro gnyer byas 
[\[314b.5\]]nas ni/_/yi ge hU~M ni rab tu sbyar/_/sdom brtson bag chags bslang nas ni/_/bram ze de mod rab 'khrugs nas/_/rkang pa'i mthe bos de ma thag_/sa yi steng du rab bsnun pas/_/sa rnams dang ni ri rab kyang /_/rab tu 'gul bar gyur pa dang /_/rgya mtsho rnams 
[\[314b.6\]]dang shing rnams dang /_/ri rab kun kyang 'khrugs par gyur/_/klu rgyal dang ni lha rnams dang /_/ri sul phug kyang rnam par 'gyel/_/zla ba dang ni nyi ma dang /_/sa steng de tshe snang ba nyams/_/rlung yang rgyu ba med par gnas/_/skar mda' dag kyang sa la ltung /_/de nas 
[\[314b.7\]]de ni sngags zhes brjod/_/nyan thos rnams kyi rigs las byung /_/yi ge hU~M de yi ge gcig_/las rnams ma lus byed cing dge/_/sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas tsam gyis/_/'di ni bzlas pa tsam gyis byed/_/'gro dang gnas pa'i dug dang ni/_/de bzhin dgra kun rengs par byed/_/
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]sems can gdug pa thams cad la/_/bzlas pa tsam gyis rengs par byed/_/rnam pa sna tshogs las byed cing /_/khyad par du yang gzhan nyid byed/_/rgan zhugs tshig kyal rab smras pa/_/der ni mi smrar mthur bltas 'dug_/de yi rdzu 'phrul la dad nas/_/
[\[315a.2\]]de yi mod la rnam par btul/_/de tshe nyan thos mchog gi ni/_/gdung sbyong shing gi drung du khyer/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/_/dge slong de ni rkang gis song /_/der song des ni thub pa'i sku/_/shing la yod par rab tu mthong /_/lha yi tshogs ni du mas kyang /_/mchod 
[\[315a.3\]]pa chen po byed pa dang /_/gau ta ma ni thub pa yi/_/sku ni shing gi steng bzhag mthong /_/'od srung chen po rmad byung ba/_/skal ba chen po de mthong nas/_/rdzu 'phrul chen pos dge slong rnams/_/thams cad smre sngags 'don par byed/_/lha dang 'byung po'i tshogs kun ni/_/
[\[315a.4\]]ha ha'i rnam pa rab 'don cing /_/de ltar mya ngan skyes pa yi/_/nyam thag sgra ni shin tu che/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po lha dang klu/_/de nas kun gyis rab bsu nas/_/rkang gnyis mchog la phyag byos zhes/_/skal ba che la'ang rab tu smras/_/lha tshogs mi dang bcas pa dang /_/'byung 
[\[315a.5\]]po kun gyi tshogs dag dang /_/mi bdag drang srong gnod sbyin dag_/khyod la sdod cing gzhol ba yin/_/shing la me gtong 'bad gyur kyang /_/sku sbyong shing ni sbar mi nus/_/de nas de ni skyon bral ba/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po skal ba ches/_/gdung sbyong shing gi smad cha la/_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[315a.6\]]chen po des phyag byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran nas/_/bskor ba dag kyang mang du byas/_/de tshe lcags kyi sgrom dral nas/_/zhabs gnyis dag kyang rnam brkyang la/_/yang dang yang du zhabs byugs nas/_/zhabs gnyis spyi bos phyag byas nas/_/thub mchog mchog 
[\[315a.7\]]gi zhabs gnyis la/_/lan mang dag tu rnam par bltas/_/des ni zhabs gnyis yang zhugs te/_/lcags kyi sgrom la yang dag gnas/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/_/de ni de nas langs 'dug pa/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/_/dgra bcom rnams kyis 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]yongs su bskor/_/ma ga d+hA gtso rgyal po yang /_/sku sbyong shing gi thad 'ongs pa/_/glang po shing rta bzhon rta dang /_/mthar gyis de nas theg pa yis/_/de nas dpung chen sa yi bdag_/kun kyang stobs dang bzhon par bcas/_/de tshe thub pa shAka thub la/_/de ni phyag 'tshal don du lhags/_/
[\[315b.2\]]sa steng zhi ba'i gzims mal du/_/bas mtha' dgon par mya ngan 'das/_/chu bo gser ldan 'gram dang ni/_/cod pan bcings pa'i mchod rten du/_/zhi ba'i dbyings la yang dag zhugs/_/yang dag mtha' la yongs su brten/_/ma ga d+hA yi rgyal po der/_/dpung chen ldan 
[\[315b.3\]]pas yang dag lhags/_/rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pa yis/_/de yang nga la stod par byed/_/phan yon che zhing stobs dang ldan/_/ngo mtshar sa yi rgyan gyur pa/_/thub pa'i sku sbyangs las byung ba'i/_/der ni sku gdung mchod rten byas/_/dge slong kun dga' bo zhes bya/_/slob pa 
[\[315b.4\]]nga yi bsnyen bkur ba/_/mi yi dam pa mnyes gshin pa/_/nga la rtag tu yongs su dad/_/yid ni zhum zhing mya ngan gdungs/_/de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nas 'od srung thad song nas/_/rkang pa gnyis la rab btud nas/_/sdug bsngal nyam thag 'dar ba yis/_/'di skad sgra ni 
[\[315b.5\]]'dzer bas smras/_/deng 'dir nga yi ston pa 'das/_/da ltar bdag ni mgon med gyur/_/nga yi rten dang gnas dang skyabs/_/khyod nyid du ni rab tu bstan/_/thub pa'i zla ba de nyid kyis/_/nye gnas khyod kyi ra lung yang bstan/_/nyon mongs kun ni rnam spangs pa/_/khyod kyi nye gnas 
[\[315b.6\]]dgra bcom pa/_/thun gyi phyi ma mtshan mtha' la/_/rgyal ba des ni bstan pa yin/_/nga nyid mya ngan 'das pa na/_/rtag tu khyod ni yod par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa'i don du ni/_/phan par 'dod pas khyod byed 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal can bdag spangs nas kyang /_/thub pa 
[\[315b.7\]]chen po zhi bar gshegs/_/blo ldan ma 'gags pa zhes pas/_/sdom chen de ni dbugs 'byin byed/_/khyod ni mya ngan du ma byed/_/mya ngan dag kyang ma byed cig_/gnas ni gang du'ang 'gro ma byed/_/'di nyid du ni gnas par gyis/_/'jig rten mig ni 'das gyur nas/_/'di nyid 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]ston par 'gyur ba yin/_/'dir ni ston pas lung bstan nas/_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/_/nga yang bcom ldan lhan cig tu/_/'od srung rjes su 'gro bar bya/_/ston pa gnyis po dag gi yang /_/sa yi steng na gzugs brnyan yin/_/rdzu 'phrul chen 
[\[316a.2\]]po'i nyan thos ni/_/'od srung chen po gtso bo ni/_/'tsho zhing yongs su gzhes pas na/_/khyod ni mya ngan ma byed cig_/rdzu 'phrul chen po snying rjes non/_/rnal 'byor chen po 'dod chags bral/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po thub pa'i sras/_/thams cad de bzhin smre bar byed/_/gyad dang 
[\[316a.3\]]rgyal po dag gis ni/_/pur sbyong shing la me btang bas/_/'khor yug kun nas me 'bar nas/_/pur sbyong shing de thal bar gyur/_/de mthong lha yi tshogs dag dang /_/gdengs can brang 'gro rnams kyis ni/_/pur sbyong shing gnas zhi ba'i phyir/_/tsan+dan chu yi rgyun dag 
[\[316a.4\]]gi/_/char chen rab tu gtong zhing gnas/_/de nas de yi mod la yang /_/sa steng du yang de bzhin du/_/me tog tshogs kyi char yang btang /_/rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod pa'i phyir/_/de yi mod la kun der lhags/_/thams cad phan tshun 'thab pa'i phyir/_/de yi 
[\[316a.5\]]mod la bya ba rtsom/_/tshangs sogs brgya byin 'thab bral dang /_/lha tshogs kun kyang de bzhin no/_/nyan thos chen po 'dod chags bral/_/rdzu 'phrul chen pos zlog par byas/_/sku gdung rgyal ba'i ring bsrel ni/_/'od srung chen pos rnam bgos pa/_/mchod pa'i don du 
[\[316a.6\]]thams cad la/_/cung zad cung zad nges par byin/_/theg pa gsum las mi ldog dang /_/zhi ba mthar phyin bya phyir ro/_/rnal 'byor de tshe 'od srung che/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/_/rgan zhugs kyis ni smras pa'i tshig_/de ni yongs su sems par byed/_/'dir 
[\[316a.7\]]ni gsung rab ma lus pa/_/yan lag bcu gnyis bde 'byung gnas/_/mdo dang 'dul ba mngon pa'i chos/_/nam mkha'i dud bzhin ma gyur tam/_/dpa' bo chen po nub gyur nas/_/bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur bas na/_/sangs rgyas gsung ba'i bka' 'di ni/_/
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]ma lus bdag gis bsdu bar bya/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/_/ma lus lhan cig bgro bar bya/_/ma ga d+hA yi grong mchog tu/_/grong khyer bzang po rgyal po'i khab/_/ku sha'i grong khyer nyams dga' dang /_/ri ni rdo 'jog mtho ba dang /_/yul bzang yangs pa can dang ni/_/mchod 
[\[316b.2\]]rten gnas ni legs mdzes pa/_/de bzhin rnam pa du ma'i gnas/_/bstan pa bsdu ba'i ched dag tu/_/'dus nas smra ba kun smra ba/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po byed par 'gyur/_/nga yang 'dir ni nub pa dang /_/de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/_/phan tshun gsod par dga' ba yi/_/sa bdag rnams 
[\[316b.3\]]ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/las kyi mtha' mang dge slong rnams/_/sems can rnams ni chags pas rmongs/_/de bzhin dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma/_/dus kyi mtha' la ma zhir 'gyur/_/phan tshun skyon ni 'tshol byed cing /_/phan tshun gsod la mngon par zhen/_/rma ldan skyon ni ma rungs ltar/_/
[\[316b.4\]]skyon la rtag tu rtog par byed/_/thub pa de dus nub pa na/_/dge slong rnams ni ma bsdams 'gyur/_/de tshe sa steng bstan pa ni/_/bsrung ba'i don du bzhag gyur pa/_/chags bral zag med 'jig rten du/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam pa brgyad/_/de tshe dgra bcom thu bo yang /_/sgra gcan 
[\[316b.5\]]'dzin sogs rab tu bsgrags/_/de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/_/de dag kyang ni snang ba med/_/sngags pa grub pa'i dus su ni/_/de dag mthong ba don yod 'gyur/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che/_/ngas kyang thams cad bzhag pa yin/_/grags pa chen po chad pa'i las/_/de dag 
[\[316b.6\]]la ni ngas bstan pa/_/de dag bka' las 'das pa 'am/_/cung zad bslab las rnam 'das na'o/_/ji srid dam chos yang dag mtha'/_/zang zing med par gnas par gyis/_/nga yi gsung gi bsod nams 'di/_/ji srid bstan pa stobs dang ldan/_/des na bdag nyid zhir 
[\[316b.7\]]'gyur zhing /_/zag med mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/de tshe thub pa'i bstan pa ni/_/yongs su nub par 'gyur ba na/_/dge slong rnams dang dge tshul rnams/_/dge slong ma rnams ser snar bcas/_/rtag tu ngan spyod g.yo sgyu can/_/de tshe yongs su ma dag pa'o/_/nga yi bstan 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]la mi gnas shing /_/khyim dang chung ma tshol bar byed/_/de yi tshe na dge bsnyen rnams/_/gzhan gyi bud med la rtag dang /_/lhag ma rnam pa bzhi po nyid/_/de tshe rtags dang ming tsam yod/_/'khon 'dzin thams cad goms byed cing /_/gcig la gcig ni rnam 
[\[317a.2\]]'tshe byed/_/phal cher mu stegs kyis non cing /_/lha rnams kun kyang gnod par 'gyur/_/de tshe bram ze'i rigs la ni/_/skye bo rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin log spyod rmongs pa dang /_/mi rnams srog chags 'tshe bar dga'/_/nga ni yongs su mya ngan 'das/_/
[\[317a.3\]]rtsod dus 'di la lung bstan yin/_/mi ni rnam mang gzhan dag kyang /_/rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med dga'/_/mi dge kun la dga' ba dang /_/dge ba'i don ni rnam spangs pa/_/nga ni sa steng zhir gshegs nas/_/sems can mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/nga yi sku ni mchod pa'i 
[\[317a.4\]]phyir/_/gzi brjid chen po lha tshogs dang /_/bdag nyid chen po mi rnams dang /_/de bzhin gnod sbyin 'byung po'i tshogs/_/lha min dang ni dri za dang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po mi 'am ci/_/de nas mkha' lding klu dang ni/_/de bzhin srin po drang srong rnams/_/rnal 'byor pa dang grub 
[\[317a.5\]]pa dang /_/gzi brjid chen po gza' rnams dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs skye gnas dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs sems can rnams/_/srid pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa dang /_/blo ldan 'ching ba bcad pa dang /_/sku gdung nad bral 'di la ni/_/de tshe mchod pa byed par 'gyur/_/chu bo 
[\[317a.6\]]gser ldan 'gram dang ni/_/sA la zung gi tshal dang ni/_/cod pan bcings pa'i mchod rten dang /_/gyad rnams kyi ni nyen 'khor du/_/nga ni der yang mya ngan 'da'/_/'jig med zhi bar yongs su 'gro/_/nga yi sku gdung de blangs nas/_/de bzhin gzhan gyis 'phrog par byed/_/
[\[317a.7\]]lha dang lha ma yin rnams dang /_/de tshe 'byung po'i tshogs kun gyis/_/so sor cha ni rnam phye nas/_/rnam par gzhag pa byas par gyur/_/mi yi rgyal po dpung chen ldan/_/ma ga d+hA yi ma skyes dgra/_/rdzu 'phrul che ldan nyan thos ni/_/kun la'ang gsol ba rab 'debs pa/_/bsod 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]nams bdag gis ma byas pas/_/bdag gi pha yang shi bar gyur/_/bdag ni sdug bsngal ltung gyur pas/_/bdag nyid chen pos drang du gsol/_/de nas blo ldan nyan thos mchog_/sangs rgyas thugs las skyes pa'i sras/_/'od srung chen po zhes grags pa/_/skye dgu rnams 
[\[317b.2\]]la phan byed pas/_/ma skyes dgra ni ngo tsha ldan/_/sems zhum gyur te mthong nas ni/_/rdzu 'phrul nyid la rab gnas nas/_/de yi dus su yang dag dgongs/_/rgyal ba'i ring bsrel sku gdung ni/_/cha gcig khyod kyis blang bar gyis/_/rgyal po gzhan ni stobs ldan 
[\[317b.3\]]gyis/_/gzhan dag rab tu khyer bar gyur/_/phan tshun bab col 'khrugs nas ni/_/gcig la gcig ni 'khon byas nas/_/de tshe nam mkhar sku gdung khyer/_/rang gi gnas su'ang bzhag par 'gyur/_/de tshe thub pa'i nyan thos mchog_/dge slong 'od srung chen po de/_/kye 
[\[317b.4\]]ma'o kyi hud sems pa ni/_/sa steng 'dir ni rab stongs pa/_/sangs rgyas dang ni rang rgyal dang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po'i nyan thos kyis/_/sems can 'jigs par snang ba ste/_/srid pa'i btson rar spyod pa yin/_/rnam pa sna tshogs sdug bsngal drag_/yun ring rjes su myong bar 'gyur/_/
[\[317b.5\]]'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yi/_/ring bsrel yang dag mchod byas nas/_/de dag lha yi 'jig rten du/_/yun mi thung bar bde ba myong /_/rgyal srid de nas longs spyod dang /_/rnyed par dka' ba'i sngags rnams ni/_/'gro ba sna tshogs spyod pa yis/_/rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[317b.6\]]phun tshogs 'dod pa 'jig rten mchog_/rnam thar gsum gyis rnam par brgyan/_/sku gdung rnams ni mchod byas na/_/grub pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/'jig rten rnams grags bram ze zhes/_/thub pa mchog ni nyan thos gtso/_/'od srung zhes ni bya ba yis/_/'di ltar de ni 
[\[317b.7\]]bsams nas ni/_/de tshe sa las ma phye bar/_/de yi sku gdung blangs nas ni/_/ma ga d+hA bdag ma skyes dgras/_/'bad nas cung zad yongs su byin/_/de bzhin rgyal po kun la yang /_/'od chen po ni ma mthong yang /_/nyan thos bdag nyid chen po des/_/kun la'ang thams cad rab 
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]tu byin/_/kun la'ang mi rtag 'du shes kyis/_/de na yang ni gnas par gyur/_/snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/_/sems can rnams la mya ngan byed/_/shAkya'i skyes mchog bstan pa ni/_/'jig rten dam chos nub pa na/_/bskal pa rnam pa mang por ni/_/
[\[318a.2\]]yun ring sems can dud par 'gyur/_/'di dag dud bzhin mi 'gyur bar/_/'di dag gsung ni bsdu bar bya/_/dpa' bo de las langs nas ni/_/sems kyi stobs ni nyams pa med/_/rgyal po ma skyes dgrar gyur pa'i/_/mi yi dbang pos mgron du bos/_/ston pa'i 
[\[318a.3\]]bstan pa bya ba'i phyir/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir/_/'bad pas sku gdung myur du ni/_/gser gyi snod kyi nang du bcug_/de dag sngon du yang dag btang /_/de tshe rgyal po'i khab myur 'gro/_/'od ma'i tshal du phyin nas ni/_/sku gdung dag ni yang dag bzhag_/'jig 
[\[318a.4\]]rten mgon po skyob pa yi/_/mchod rten rmad byung chen po byas/_/mchod rten de ni mchod byed pa/_/rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ni/_/phreng ba gos dang gdugs dang ni/_/dar la rol mo byug pa dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dang /_/mar me me tog phreng ba yis/_/phyag 
[\[318a.5\]]'tshal rjes song sems kyis ni/_/rgyal po rab tu mchod pa byed/_/mchod rten de la mgos btud nas/_/de yi tshe na smon lam btab/_/'jig rten mchog la mchod pa yis/_/bdag gi dge ba mang po gang /_/de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa 'dis/_/bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[318a.6\]]mchog thob shog_/de nas rgyal po langs nas ni/_/'od srung che la rab tu smras/_/mig ni mchi mas kun khyab nas/_/mig gi mchi ma phyis nas ni/_/snying ni brtse bas rab brlan nas/_/de tshe pha ni yang dag dran/_/shes rab chen po 'phags pa khyod/_/khyod ni bdag 
[\[318a.7\]]gi dbang 'gyur mdzod/_/bdag gi sdig pa gang byas pa/_/nges par mnar med rab tu gzhol/_/ston pa'i bka' yi lam gnas pa/_/de 'dra'i chos kyi rgyal po yi/_/pha yi srog la gnod bcas pa'i/_/mya ngan bsal bar mi nus pas/_/'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]gyis/_/bdag la chos don bstan par rigs/_/de skad smras nas bdag nyid che/_/rgyal ba'i nyan thos mchog gyur pa/_/blo ldan 'od srung zhes bya bas/_/'di dag tshig ni rab tu smras/_/rgyal po chen po ma 'jigs shig_/khyod kyi dge ba mang du byas/_/skye ba brgya phrag du mar yang /_/
[\[318b.2\]]khyod la goms pa rab tu yod/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa na/_/rang rgyal gcig ni yang dag byung /_/grong khyer bA rA Na sI ru/_/de tshe tshong dpon bu zhig byung /_/mi shes byis pa g.yo ba yis/_/de tshe shing rta zhon nas byung /_/bcom ldan de nyid de ru ni/_/rang rgyal yongs su byung ba 
[\[318b.3\]]ni/_/'jig rten rjes su gzung 'dod pas/_/der ni slong mo'i don du rgyu/_/byis pa des ni de mthong nas/_/sems ni yang dag dang gyur nas/_/rkang gnyis la gtugs dris pa ni/_/dge slong khyod ni ci zhig byed/_/bse ru lta bur skye ba med/_/bcom ldan de ni mi smrar 'dug_/
[\[318b.4\]]de tshe byis pa de yi ni/_/gos la bzung nas yang dag gnas/_/'deng ngo 'deng ngo khyim bzang 'dir/_/rgyal mtshan gyis ni rab mtshan pa'o/_/'di ni bdag gi khyim yin te/_/zhabs bkrus nas ni bshos gsol te/_/ji ltar dus bzhin myur gsol nas/_/ci 'dod par ni rtse bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[318b.5\]]de nas nyes dang bral ba de/_/nyes gsum mthar byed 'joms pa po/_/gzhan dag rjes gzung de dag gtsor/_/mthar gyis kyang ni rab 'gro zhing /_/song nas sgo yi rtsa ba la/_/'od chen der ni 'dug par gyur/_/de nas byis pa nang zhugs nas/_/ma la yang ni 'di 
[\[318b.6\]]skad smras/_/ma ni bdag la 'bras chan stsol/_/bza' ba rnam mang dag kyang stsol/_/yun ring sa rdul la rtse ba'i/_/bdag gi grogs po 'dir 'ongs gyur/_/yun ring bdag ni dgar 'gyur ba/_/sgor ni 'ongs nas 'dug pa yin/_/de tshe de ni rab rings par/_/de yi mod la sgor 
[\[318b.7\]]yang byung /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po zhi ba'i gzugs/_/bdag nyid chen po de yang mthong /_/de tshe de ni myur 'ongs nas/_/snod ni bzang po blangs nas kyang /_/lag pa legs par rab bkrus nas/_/me tog spos sogs sngon 'gro bas/_/'bras chan gtsang ma blangs nas ni/_/du ma'i 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]ro yis rnam brgyan pa'i/_/rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba dang /_/dngul gyi snod du rab tu bcug_/de tshe myur du phyir byung ste/_/de yi lhung bzed la blugs nas/_/khyor bcas chos la dad pa yis/_/de yi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs/_/de yis bsod 
[\[319a.2\]]snyoms blangs nas ni/_/nam mkha' la ni mngon par song /_/de nas de ni rab 'bar zhing /_/mar me'i phreng ba bzhin du snang /_/bse ru ltar spyod gang yin pa/_/de dag ngag gis chos ston min/_/rdzu 'phrul 'od kyis sems can la/_/bdag nyid chen po ston par byed/_/
[\[319a.3\]]de yang lhag par snying rje can/_/sems can 'gro ba ser snar ldan/_/pha rol don du sems can la/_/de nas rdzu 'phrul ston par byed/_/de yi rnam smin las kyis ni/_/ma dang lhan cig byis pa yang /_/stong phrag lnga yi skye bar ni/_/lha nyid kyang ni byas par gyur/_/lha rnams 
[\[319a.4\]]kyi ni lha rgyal der/_/ma de nyid ni yang dag gyur/_/'khor los sgyur nyid mi rnams kyi/_/mi yi bdag por de tshe gyur/_/yun ring bde ba rjes myong nas/_/gzugs can snying po'i bur 'di gyur/_/gang gi bcom ldan de smras dang /_/gos kyi tha ma la bzung dang /_/tshig ngan 
[\[319a.5\]]smra ba smras pa ni/_/dge slong smra bas smras pa dang /_/sa rdul bdag dang rtse ba zhes/_/de tshe sngon ni khyod ces smras/_gi las ni de yis ni/_/mi 'dod pa dang tsha ba yi/_/drag cing rab tsha'i sdug bsngal ba/_/yun ring mang po rjes myong ba/_/mi 'dod sdug bsngal bzod 
[\[319a.6\]]dka' ba/_/mi bzad dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur/_/las kyi zhags pas bcings nas ni/_/sems can ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/rgod pas las ni byed pa yis/_/du bas rjes su myong bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin byis pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/nyan thos rgyal ba skyob pa 
[\[319a.7\]]la/_/tshig ni ma rungs rgya che ba/_/de yi las ni 'di 'dra 'o/_/dmyal ba las ni thar nas kyang /_/mi nyid du ni 'dir yang 'ongs/_/rnam smin skyes pa mi yi bdag_/dmyal ba yang ni dran par gyur/_/de yi khro ba bdo ba yis/_/khyod kyis pha yi srog kyang bcad/_/
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]rang rgyal dag gi spyod pa yang /_/sngon gyi bag chags kyis dran pas/_/sangs rgyas mngon sum mthong nas ni/_/skye dgu dag kyang de bzhin byas/_/de nyid rgyu ni dran byas pas/_/'dir ni rgyal thabs nyid kyang byas/_/de ltar 'od ma'i tshal du ni/_/phan tshun de dag 
[\[319b.2\]]sa steng smra/_/nga yi slob ma mchog 'di dang /_/gnyis pa mi yi bdag po yis/_/mchod rten lan brgyar phyag 'tshal nas/_/de tshe rang gi khyim du song /_/de nas slob ma'i mchog gyur pa/_/pi pal phug na gnas pa de/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/_/thub 
[\[319b.3\]]pa ma lus 'dus nas ni/_/gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis dang /_/'dul ba ma lus sdud par byed/_/gang zhig chos ni ngas bstan dang /_/de bzhin sngon gyi rgyal ba mchog_/de nas slob ma'i mchog des kyang /_/rnam pa gsum du yang dag bstan/_/'dul ba dang 
[\[319b.4\]]ni mngon pa dang /_/mdo sde'i dbye bas gzhung du byas/_/sems can 'ching ba gsum las bkrol/_/nyes pa gsum yang skem par byed/_/dpa' bo sdug bsngal gsum las 'grol/_/rtag tu theg pa gsum la dgod/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i don/_/
[\[319b.5\]]blo yi mchog ni byed par 'gyur/_/rgyal chen ma skyes dgra zhes pa'i/_/ma ga d+hA pa mi yi bdag_/ang ga ma ga d+hA dang ni/_/bA rA Na sI de las gzhan/_/byang du yangs pa can dang ni/_/rgyal chen stobs po che bar ni/_/the tshom med par 'gyur ba yin/_/bstan pa'i don ni 
[\[319b.6\]]byed par 'gyur/_/gzhon nu khyod ni 'dul byed cing /_/zhi ba dam pa ston par 'gyur/_/de yi bu yang rgyal po ni/_/yi ge u zhes bya bar bsgrags/_/de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni/_/myur du bstan pa'i don la brtson/_/des ni ston pa'i gsung rab 'dir/_/rgya cher 'dri bar 
[\[319b.7\]]byed 'jug 'gyur/_/mchod pa chen po'ang byas nas ni/_/phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par byed/_/phyir yang ngan song 'di mi 'gro/_/lhar skye bar ni de 'gyur ro/_/lo ni nyi shu sum cur ni/_/pha dang lhan cig 'grogs par 'gyur/_/grong khyer stobs ldan mtshan phyed du/_/rigs 
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]las skyes pa'i nad kyis ni/_/mngon par zil gyis non par 'gyur/_/nyin zhag sum cu rtsa drug tu/_/nad chen dag gis nyam thag 'gyur/_/nad rnams kun gyis btab nas de/_/rnam pa sna tshogs brgyal nas ni/_/rgyal po de myur shi 'phos nas/_/
[\[320a.2\]]lha rnams su ni skye bar 'gyur/_/de ni mthar gyis 'bad nas ni/_/nges par byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/'di dang gzhan yang mang po ni/_/'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs par/_/rang rgyal skyob pa dag la ni/_/rnam pa sna tshogs byas pa yis/_/de bzhin lha dang mi rnams kyis/_/'dod 
[\[320a.3\]]dang khyad par phun tshogs 'thob/_/de dag mthar gyis 'gro 'gyur ba/_/zhi ba nad med go 'phang 'thob/_/rgyal po mchog dang dman pa dang /_/mi yi bdag po bar ma rnams/_/rgyal po na hu sha la sogs/_/dang po'i dus su bstan pa dag_/des kyang de bzhin gshegs mchod 
[\[320a.4\]]dang /_/rjes yi rang bas mtho ris song /_/nges par de dag sangs rgyas gyur/_/kha cig nyan thos theg pa la/_/nges par kha cig nyan thos nyid/_/de kun thar la mngon par gzhol/_/dus kyi rnam gzhag rjes mthun par/_/tshe yang rnam par brtag pa yin/_/dam pa tshe yang 
[\[320a.5\]]ring ba ste/_/de bzhin bar ma bar ma yin/_/shin tu dka' ba'i dus mtha' la/_/dus kyi tha ma rtsod dus la/_/rgyal po rtsod pa la dga' bas/_/gzhan ni tha mar bstan pa yin/_/phan tshun kho na du 'dzin chags pas/_/gcig la gcig ni rnam 'tshe byed/_/dman pa'i 
[\[320a.6\]]skye ba thob pa dang /_/mtshon gyi reg pas 'chi bar 'gyur/_/mtshon gyis 'tsho bas yang dag dag dga'/_/de bzhin gzhan gyi bud med chags/_/rgyal po 'jig rten smod par ni/_/the tsom med par 'gyur ba yin/_/g.yon can las ngan can dang ni/_/de bzhin 'phags min ser sna 
[\[320a.7\]]can/_/de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/cha gnyis ldan dang rtsod dus bar/_/mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/_/gzhon nu de ni rtogs par gyis/_/dus gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba na/_/sa steng rgyal po 'byung ba yi/_/de dag gzugs dang mtshan ma dang /_/kha dog kyang ni rtogs par gyis/_/
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]ko sa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_/gzugs can snying po de bzhin gzhan/_/rgyal rigs gtso bo 'char ba dang /_/dmag brgya pa ni yang dag 'byung /_/lag bzang gzhu bzang zhes bya dang /_/de bzhin dbang chen tsa ma sha/_/de bzhin lits+tsha bIr skyes pa'i/_/shAkya'i 
[\[320b.2\]]rigs skyes seng ge dang /_/cher ldan gsal dang rab gsal dang /_/sde chen du yang bstan pa'o/_/de bzhin 'phags rgyal gtum po dang /_/ser skya'i grong gi rgyal po ni/_/zas gtsang zhes ni bya ba dang /_/dpa' bo zhes bya stobs chen dag_/'di dag rgyal po'i 
[\[320b.3\]]rigs su gsungs/_/sa srung ston pa mchod byed pa'o/_/shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog_/sangs rgyas mngon du lta bar 'gyur/_/de yang de nas chos thos nas/_/yun ring phun sum tshogs pa 'thob/_/nges par byang chub 'dod nas kyang /_/shi nas zhi ba 'thob par 
[\[320b.4\]]'gyur/_/sa bdag sa yi dkyil 'khor du/_/'di dag 'jig rten rnam par grags/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs dag tu bstan/_/'du shes ming gis mtshon pa yin/_/sa steng nga yis bstan pa'i tshig_/de dag mchod pa byed par 'gyur/_/gzhon nu byis pa'i gzugs 
[\[320b.5\]]can gyis/_/khyod kyis 'jig rten lung bstan pa/_/ma skyes zhes bya'i rgyal po de/_/nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/_/nga ni sa steng mya ngan 'das/_/lo brgya dag ni 'das pa na/_/snang ba med cing nyes par bcas/_/mi shes mun pas rab tu bsgribs/_/de 
[\[320b.6\]]tshe sa ni stongs pa ste/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis spangs pa yin/_/de tshe mi bzad chen po yi/_/grong khyer me tog can du ni/_/mya ngan med ces bya ba yi/_/rgyal po sa ni skyong byed pa/_/khro bcas las ni drag po byed/_/de tshe de ni snying rje med/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/_/
[\[320b.7\]]nad med ser sna bral ba dang /_/dge slong tshul khrims ldan pa yi/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen thad du lhags/_/sngon gyi bag chags rgyu dang ni/_/sa rdul byin pa'i byin rlabs kyis/_/rigs ni nges par 'gyur ba dang /_/rgyal po nor chen ldan par 'gyur/_/chos dang chos min rnam 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]dpyod cing /_/brtse ldan snying rje ldan pa dang /_/chags bral rdzu 'phrul chen po des/_/rgyu ni phye zhing bstan par byas/_/sngon ni khyod kyang rgyal po ste/_/mi shes byis pa g.yo ba yi/_/rgyal ba shAkya seng ge la/_/sa yi rdul ni snyim gang phul/_/zhing de la ni rab phul bas/_/
[\[321a.2\]]lha yul phun sum tshogs pa thob/_/lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/_/sa yi 'jig rten 'dir 'ongs gyur/_/'dzam gling nags tshal phun sum tshogs/_/rgyal po yi ni rgyal thabs spyod/_/bdag nyid chen po dzam b+ha la/_/gnod sbyin gyi ni sngags kyang bsgrubs/_/bdag 
[\[321a.3\]]nyid chen po sa yi bdag_/de nas gnod sbyin shing rta grub/_/de la gnod sbyin 'dug pa ni/_/bka' dang mthun par yid kyang 'jug_/klu rnams kyang ni 'dug pa ste/_/bran dang bka' bzhin byed pa'i rgyu/_/de ltar rdzu 'phrul che bdag nyid/_/de tshe stobs kyi 'khor sgyur 'byung /_/
[\[321a.4\]]ci 'dod de ni 'gro ba na/_/gang du'ang 'gog pa med par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchog sa la/_/gang yang sngon ni rab bzhag pa/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi/_/de tshe 'od ma'i tshal du'o/_/sku gdung mchog ni blangs nas kyang /_/dge ba la dmigs yid can gyis/_/
[\[321a.5\]]ji ltar sngon gyi byas pa bzhin/_/mchod rten de la mchod pa byas/_/sku gdung bum pa de blangs nas/_/de ni de bzhin rnam bgos nas/_/blo ldan des ni skad cig gis/_/de nas gnod sbyin la yang smras/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di ma lus pa/_/mchod rten rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_/
[\[321a.6\]]sa rnams sku gdung snying por ni/_/khyod kyis kyang ni rab tu bya/_/'bad pa yis ni mtshan phyed du/_/gnod sbyin gyis ni bka' yang blangs/_/mi ma yin pa'i bya ba byas/_/sa steng rdo yi srog shing bsgreng /_/ka ba stong phrag du ma ni/_/de tshe yongs su btsugs par gyur/_/mchod rten 
[\[321a.7\]]rnams la mchod don du/_/lus can rnams la mtshon par gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yis/_/mchod rten sna tshogs byas nas ni/_/skad cig gcig gis gnod sbyin rnams/_/rgyal po yi ni drung du lhags/_/de nas gnod sbyin rab btud nas/_/dben par tshig ni 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]rab tu smras/_/ji skad bka' stsal ma lus byas/_/sa bdag ji ste gzigs mi mdzad/_/de nas myur du sa bdag de/_/de tshe shing rta de la zhon/_/rnam pa sna tshogs mchod don du/_/rnam pa sna tshogs mdzes pa'i phyir/_/gser dang de bzhin dngul dag dang /_/rnam pa sna 
[\[321b.2\]]tshogs mchod rten brgyan/_/de nas gnod sbyin shing rta dang /_/myur du rgyal po rab tu song /_/gang na rgyal ba'i mchod rten yod/_/skad cig gis ni de yul du'o/_/rnam pa sna tshogs mchod pa yis/_/rgyal po des ni de la mchod/_/de tshe rgyal ba'i mchod rten gyis/_/
[\[321b.3\]]sa rnams ma lus mdzes par byas/_/bdag nyid chos rgyal mya ngan med/_/smon lam dag ni 'debs par brtson/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di don gyis/_/bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas shog_/de bzhin des kyang rig nas ni/_/rgyal po chos ni ston par byed/_/de ni shi nas lha ru 
[\[321b.4\]]'gro/_/nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/_/lo ni brgyad cu rtsa bdun du/_/sa steng mchod rten mchod par 'gyur/_/lo ni brgya dang lnga bcur 'tsho/_/gnod pa med pa'i rgyal thabs byed/_/de rang las las byung ba yi/_/lus la nad ni yongs su 'byung /_/nad 
[\[321b.5\]]des gnod cing sdug bsngal nas/_/shi nas mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/_/lha yi phun sum tshogs pa che/_/thob nas rjes su myong bar byed/_/de ni yid gzhungs rim gyis su/_/rnyed par dka' ba'i byang chub thob/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag ni/_/sngags kyang de tshe 
[\[321b.6\]]'grub par 'gyur/_/dzam b+ha la sogs gnod sbyin yang /_/'di yi bstan pa'i rjes su 'jug_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'phrog ma sogs/_/gnod sbyin mo yang yang dag 'grub/_/'khor los sgyur bas bskyed pa yi/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags kyang grub/_/gang dag rgyal 
[\[321b.7\]]bas bstan pa'i sngags/_/rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/_/gtsug tor la sogs thams cad dang /_/gang gzhan rgyal bas gsungs pa'ang yin/_/de yi dus ni rab bzang la/_/sgrub pa dam pa dag kyang bya/_/dam pas tha ma bsgrub mi bya/_/dam pa thob par bya 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]phyir ro/_/di lI pa dang na hu sha/_/nga las nu dang dug chen mtsho/_/rgyal bas bshad pa'i 'khor los sgyur/_/sngags ni de dag sgrub par byed/_/bdag nyid chen po na hu sha/_/de tshe gzi brjid phung po grub/_/rgyal po chen po dug chen pa/_/gdugs dkar po yang 
[\[322a.2\]]grub pa yin/_/de bzhin rgyal po di lI pa/_/yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyang grub/_/nga las nu ni 'jig rten dang /_/de bzhin gtsug tor dam pa grub/_/rgyal mchog d+hun du ma ra ni/_/de bzhin rgyal ba'i gtsug tor grub/_/de bzhin 'dam gyi rgyal po ni/_/rnam rgyal gtsug 
[\[322a.3\]]tor grub pa'o/_/de bu skye dgu'i bdag po ste/_/de yang sa steng spyan sngags grub/_/skye dgu'i bdag po skye ba ste/_/de yang mdzod spu'i sngags kyang grub/_/lte ba'i bu ni khyu mchog ste/_/de ni las grub brtul zhugs brtan/_/kha ba can gyi ri dag tu/_/de yang nor 
[\[322a.4\]]spyod gnod sbyin grub/_/khyu mchog bu ni rgyas pa ste/_/de yang de tshe sngags bzlas byed/_/de tshe sa steng de mthar gyis/_/dpa' bo chen po'ang rab tu grub/_/'di dag gzhan yang mang po yi/_/rgyal po 'jig rten rnam grags pas/_/sngags rnams rab tu bsgrubs nas ni/_/
[\[322a.5\]]rgyal srid byas nas lha yul 'gro/_/rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/_/rgyal ba'i dbang pos gang gsungs pa/_/de kun dus ni bzang po ste/_/lo ni stong phrag brgyad cu pa/_/sngags dang rgyud kyi don mkhas pas/_/grub pa dag ni sgrub par 'gyur/_/'di dag gzhan yang rab mang 
[\[322a.6\]]ba'i/_/sa bdag 'jig rten rnam grags pa/_/de nas stong phrag brgyad cu'i sngags/_/de bzhin yang dag bsgrubs nas ni/_/rgyal srid byas nas mtho ris 'gro/_/nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/_/de tshe bar ma'i dus dag tu/_/lha mo rdzu 'phrul chen mo 
[\[322a.7\]]dang /_/lha rnams kyi ni sngags dang ni/_/pad+ma'i rigs kyi sngags dang ni/_/blon po mi yi gtso bo dang /_/sa bdag sa kun bdag po'o/_/bA rA Na sI grong khyer na/_/rgyal po tshangs pas byin pa yang /_/'jig rten 'jig rten dbang phyug grags/_/phyag na pad+ma rab tu grub/_/
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]bdag nyid chen po brtson 'grus che/_/lhag par snying rje chen po de/_/sems can rnams la sngags tshul gyis/_/chos rnams ston pa byin pa yin/_/rgyal po yang ni tshangs byin gyis/_/mi yi bde ba rjes myong nas/_/de nas de ni sngags grub ste/_/lus dang bcas 
[\[322b.2\]]pas mtho ris song /_/de yi bu yang blo ldan ni/_/bsod nams las ni brtul zhugs brtan/_/brtson 'grus chen po rta mgrin zhes/_/rnam par grags pa de yang grub/_/de yis sngags kyi mthu yis ni/_/de tshe brgya byin las rgyal gyur/_/de bu dkar po zhes 
[\[322b.3\]]bya ba'i/_/rgyal po thams cad gtong ba 'byung /_/de yang nor ni sbyin pa'i sngags/_/dkar mo che zhes bya ba yang /_/sngags ni rab tu bsgrubs pas kyang /_/lo ni sum brgya dag tu 'tsho/_/de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/_/bde ba can tu yang dag 'gro/_/nges par byang 
[\[322b.4\]]chub 'di nges thob/_/de bzhin gzhan yang ngas lung bstan/_/de tshe bar ma'i dus dag tu/_/bar ma'i sngags ni rab tu 'grub/_/dka' ba tha ma'i dus dag tu/_/nga ni sangs rgyas nyid thob nas/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag gi/_/sngags kyang rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/_/
[\[322b.5\]]gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags dag ni/_/gang zhig sa steng sngon bstan pa/_/sngags ni longs spyod rgyu nyid du/_/de yang rab tu grub par 'gro/_/'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/_/phal pa dag gi sngags dag ni/_/mi sdug gzugs can rnyog par ldan/_/bar snang dang ni nam mkhar 
[\[322b.6\]]spyod/_/sa blar gnas pa'i gnod sbyin mo/_/de bzhin sna tshogs sha za mo/_/mi 'am ci dang mkha' lding dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]srin pos bshad pa rnams/_/sha za lto 'phye gnod sbyin dang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po klu rnams kyi/_/dus ngan de tshe tha ma la/_/sngags ni rab tu grub 
[\[322b.7\]]par 'gyur/_/gzhon nu'i gzugs kyi sngags dang ni/_/gzhon nu ma yi gzugs kun yang /_/dus ni 'jigs rung de yi tshe/_/de yang grub par rab tu 'gro/_/de bzhin sngags ni rnam pa gsum/_/sgrub pa'ang rnam pa gsum yin no/_/rnam gsum nyid kyis dus kyi ni/_/
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]rnam gsum grub pa 'dod pa yin/_/rgya che'i gtam dang ldan pa dag_/mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/_/gtso bo mya ngan med pa yi/_/de 'og rgyal po byung ba ni/_/mya ngan bral zhes rnam par grags/_/'jig rten chos kyis spyod par ldan/_/lha mo gos 
[\[323a.2\]]dkar mo yi ni/_/de yi sngags 'di yongs su 'grub/_/mya ngan rnam bral gyis bsgrubs nas/_/lha yi gnas su rab tu song /_/yun ring bde ba mtho ris su/_/rgyal po chen po rjes su myong /_/phyir yang mi yul phyin nas ni/_/blo ldan chos kyi ngang tshul ldan/_/
[\[323a.3\]]rgyal thabs rnam pa sna tshogs ldan/_/'od chen pos ni rjes su myong /_/lo ni bdun cu rtsa drug tu/_/dpal ldan mchod rten mchod pa byed/_/de nas de ni nad btab nas/_/lus zhig nas ni lha ris 'gro/_/de yi 'og tu rgyal po ni/_/dpa' bo'i sde zhes rab tu brjod/_/
[\[323a.4\]]chos la spyod cing rnam par grags/_/bstan pa 'di la mnyam par bzhag_/lha mo mchod rten dpal chen ma/_/de yi sngags kyang rab tu bsgrubs/_/des kyang ston pa'i khang chen ni/_/de yi tshe na byas par 'gyur/_/sa rnams rgyal mtsho'i mthar thug par/_/ma lus 
[\[323a.5\]]mchod rten rnams kyis brgyan/_/de la rnam smin las kyis ni/_/lus las skyes pa'i nad kyang 'byung /_/zla phyed gcig tu sdug bsngal nas/_/de nas shi 'phos lus zhig 'gyur/_/lo ni bdun cu dag tu yang /_/mi yi nang du rgyal thabs byas/_/shi 'phos 
[\[323a.6\]]de ni mtho ris 'gro/_/nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/_/de yi 'og tu rgyal po ni/_/dga' bo zhes bya 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dpal ldan grong khyer me tog ces/_/sde chen stobs ni che bar gnas/_/sha za pi lu zhes bya ba'i/_/sngags kyang des ni bsgrubs 
[\[323a.7\]]pa yin/_/de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/_/longs spyod chen po yod par 'gyur/_/rgya yi gtso bo zhes bya ba/_/'jig rten 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nor thob pas blon por 'gyur/_/'jig rten rgyal po nyid du'ang 'gyur/_/de yi dus su 'byung ba ni/_/
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]bram ze tshad ma shes pa'o/_/log pa'i nga rgyal dag la zhen/_/ma ga d+hA yi grong khyer gnas/_/log pa'i nga rgyal gyis dregs rnams/_/'byung ba nyid du the tshom ma med/_/de dag gis ni rgyal po bskor/_/de dag la ni des nor byin/_/nor ni mang po de dag gis/_/dge 
[\[323b.2\]]ba'i bshes la rab mchod nas/_/de yi nor ni zad par byed/_/ma 'dres de la goms pa dang /_/sbyin la zhum med rgyu yis ni/_/blo ldan de yi lha khang ni/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi byed du bcug_/grong khyer me tog ces bya bar/_/bdag nyid chen po blon po'i gtso/_/bram ze 
[\[323b.3\]]bzang po snying rjer ldan/_/de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po dang ni rab mdza' ba'i/_/chos kyi bdag nyid 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin ma ni dpa' mo ldan/_/sa steng de yi sngags kyang 'grub/_/des kyang sa steng dag tu ni/_/mchod rten bzang po byed du bcug_/
[\[323b.4\]]gnod sbyin ma yi mthu yis ni/_/shes rab rab tu che bar 'gyur/_/de yi bag chags las kyis ni/_/sngon gyi bag chags yong bskul nas/_/blo dang ldan pas mthar gyis ni/_/rnyed par dka' ba'i byang chub 'thob/_/mchog sred ces ni rnam grags pa'i/_/de tshe 'dod chags 
[\[323b.5\]]shas che 'byung /_/bud med byas pa'i skyon gyis ni/_/bram ze'i khye 'us 'chi ba thob/_/dpal ldan rgyal po dga' bo yang /_/snga ma'i las kyi nyes pa yis/_/me tog ces bya'i grong khyer gyi/_/mi rnams 'chad pas gnod par byed/_/blon po'i tshogs kyang ma dad 
[\[323b.6\]]gyur/_/stobs chen bden par smra ba yang /_/sngon gyi las kyi nyes pa yis/_/nad chen dag gis thebs 'gyur te/_/rims nad chen pos sdug bsngal gdung /_/nam phyed tsam na shi bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po de yi tshe tshad ni/_/de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa drug go_/de ni nyan thos byang chub tu/_/
[\[323b.7\]]rgyal po nges par 'gyur ba yin/_/de yi grogs po gzhan gyur pa/_/bram ze'i khye'u pa Ni ni/_/nges par nyan thos byang chub tu/_/nga yis lung bstan byas pa yin/_/'jig rten dbang phyug bdag nyid che/_/de yang de yi sngags grub pa'o/_/bram ze shes rab 'dod pas 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]kyang /_/khro bo ha la ha la bsgrubs/_/rgyal po de las gzhan pa yang /_/zla ba sbas zhes bya ba 'byung /_/gnod sbyin chu dbang grub pa ste/_/rgyal srid gnod pa med par byed/_/longs spyod che zhing bden par smra/_/chos kyi bdag nyid sa yi bdag_/mi dge'i 
[\[324a.2\]]bshes gnyen rab brten nas/_/srog chags mang po gsod par byed/_/las kyi rnam smin de yis ni/_/'brum bu'i nad 'byung rab tu brgyal/_/de ni mtshan phyed sad nas ni/_/rgyal srid la ni bu bzhag pa/_/snying po thig le zhes bya ba/_/blon po la sdang byis pa de/_/de nas 
[\[324a.3\]]zla ba sbas pa de/_/shi 'phos sa steng dus las 'das/_/mi yi 'gro ba spangs pa yi/_/de tshe [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten song /_/'gro ba las grol sngags goms pas/_/de nas lha yi gnas su song /_/dge ba'i sems kyis dmigs nas ni/_/sngags kyi rgyus ni yang dag bskyed/_/
[\[324a.4\]]rgyal po des ni mthar gyis kyang /_/nyan thos kyi ni byang chub 'gro/_/snying po thig le rgyal po yis/_/byis pa mi gsal blo yis ni/_/bye ma las byas srid gzhan du/_/sngon ni mchod rten dag kyang byas/_/de yi rnam smin mthu yis ni/_/ma smad lha yi gnas su song /_/
[\[324a.5\]]skye ba stong phrag lnga brgyar ni/_/lha yi nang du bde ba myong /_/mtho ris 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/_/mi yi nang du rab skyes pa/_/blo ldan zla ba sbas pa yi/_/rgyal po dga' ba'i rigs su skyes/_/byis pa nyid nas rgyal por 'gyur/_/yun mi thung bar bde ba myong /_'jigs 
[\[324a.6\]]med bstan dang yang dag rig_/spyi brtsan pa dang snyan par smra/_/de nyid rang dbang rgyal srid ni/_/lo ni bdun cur yongs su byas/_/skra can zhes bya'i sngags dag kyang /_/rgyal po de la rab tu grub/_/khyod nyid kyi ni sngags nyid kyang /_/de tshe grub par byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[324a.7\]]khyod nyid kyis bshad sngags dag kyang /_/de yi tshe na grub par 'gyur/_/byis pa'i tshul can sna tshogs gzugs/_/byis pa rnams la mthu dang ldan/_/sngags kyi gzugs kyis lus can la/_/the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sems can rnams la phan 'dod 
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]pas/_/gang zhig khyod kyis bstan pa'i sngags/_/de tshe de yi dus dag tu/_/brjod pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/blo ldan snying po thig le yi/_/rgyal po de yi blon po ni/_/tsa nag kya zhes rnam bsgrags pa/_/bram ze'i khye 'us khro bo 'grub/_/gshin rje gshed 
[\[324b.2\]]ces bya ba ni/_/blo ngan des ni de yang 'grub/_/des ni khro bas zil non nas/_/srog chags dag gi 'tsho ba bcad/_/de tshe rgyal po gsum gyi bar/_/shin tu mi bzad sdig pa byas/_/de ni dus ring 'tsho ba yi/_/bram ze ngan pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de yi sngags 
[\[324b.3\]]kyi mthu yis ni/_/lus des lha min brten par byed/_/lha min lus la zhugs nas ni/_/de ni dus ring 'tsho bar byed/_/de nas lus de zhig nas kyang /_/mnar med dmyal bar yang dag 'gro/_/de nas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de/_/blo ngan des ni rjes su myong /_/
[\[324b.4\]]dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa/_/mi 'dod de tshe las las byung /_/las gcig sdug bsngal des zad nas/_/khro bo'i sngags kyis rab bskul te/_/dmyal ba las ni de 'chi 'phos/_/dud 'gro dag tu nye bar skyes/_/klu yi skye gnas brten nas ni/_/
[\[324b.5\]]'jigs pa'i gzugs can dag tu 'gyur/_/khro ldan chen po klu yi rgyal/_/gdengs can dug gis dregs byed dang /_/mi bzad las ni rab byed pas/_/ma rungs las las de 'chi 'phos/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi/_/gshin rje'i rgyal por rab tu 'gyur/_/
[\[324b.6\]]de ltar sdug bsngal stong phrag ni/_/yang dang yang du rjes su myong /_/blo ngan de ni mthar gyis su/_/bram ze'i khye'ur sa steng 'ong 'ongs/_/mi yi skye bar 'ongs nas ni/_/'jigs pa yi ni gzugs can 'gyur/_/khro ba dang ni dbul ba nyid/_/grags pa chung ba 
[\[324b.7\]]nyid du 'gyur/_/gang yang 'jig rten rang sangs rgyas/_/'dod med bse ru lta bur spyod/_/dman pa la ni rjes brtse ba/_/sa yi steng na rnam par rgyu/_/sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir/_/bsod snyoms spyod la rab tu zhugs/_/de tshe gzhan sems rig 
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]pa des/_/blo ngan de ni rab tu mthong /_/snying rjes yin gyis gzhan min des/_/de yi thad du byon par 'gyur/_/des ni zan dron gsol ched du/_/bse ru lta bu la ni khyer/_/des ni sngags la rab brnyas nas/_/de tshe rgyu ni yang dag bstan/_/de las gcig 
[\[325a.2\]]gi bdag nyid la/_/bsod snyoms de ni yang dag bstabs/_/kye 'di rab byung ma lus pa/_/ji ltar bde ba bzhin du gsol/_/de la rjes brtse rang sangs rgyas/_/de tshe rdzu 'phrul bstan par 'gyur/_/de yi mthu yis yid bskyod nas/_/de nas ngo mtshar rab skyes te/_/
[\[325a.3\]]sangs rgyas bse ru lta bu la/_/spyi bos kun la rab tu btud/_/ji ltar 'dod par nyes bral rnams/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yi mthus/_/rang rgyal byang chub smon lam btab/_/bdag nyid chen po ci 'dra ba/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po zhi ba'i gzugs/_/sdug bsngal blo ngan mi 'gyur bar/_/
[\[325a.4\]]de 'dra bdag ni 'jig rten shog_/las kyi lhag ma zad pa dang /_/'chi 'phos de tshe mtho ris song /_/chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar gyis/_/nyan thos de ni byang chub thob/_/de bas sngags kyi sgrub pa ni/_/mngon spyod dag ni yong mi bya/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[325a.5\]]yis/_/mngon spyod rab tu bkag pa yin/_/snying rje mchog ldan sangs rgyas dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/_/sngags rnams mthu bstan don du ni/_/las rnams thams cad bstan pa yin/_/de bzhin nor bu lta bu'i sngags/_/gang zhig de bzhin gshegs 
[\[325a.6\]]pas gsungs/_/khro dang chags pas zil mnan pa'i/_/byis pa rmongs pa'i sems dag gis/_/de dag sngags ni mngon spyod la/_/phan tshun rab tu sbyor bar byed/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/blo dang ldan pas de bzhin bkag_/rnam pa thams cad sngags rnams 
[\[325a.7\]]ni/_/sems can longs spyod 'phel ba dang /_/de nas rgyal po dam pa dang /_/srung ba che dang dbang phyir dang /_/skye gnas sna tshogs la gnas pa'i/_/sems can rnams ni dgug don du/_/sngags kyang bsgrub par bya ba ste/_/'tsho ba dgag phyir ma yin no/_/dge slong 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]mang du thos pa ni/_/de yi tshe na 'byung 'gyur ba/_/ma khol zhes kyang bya ba ste/_/nga nyid kyi ni stod byed pa/_/ji bzhin yon tan bzang po ni/_/ji lta bzhin du brjod par 'gyur/_/kun nas sems ni rab dang zhing /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/_/sgrub 
[\[325b.2\]]dka'i sngags ni rab bsgrub cing /_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi de bzhin no/_/yon tan ldan zhing tshul khrims ldan/_/mang du thos shing chos kyang smra/_/dud 'gror sngon ni gyur pa na/_/nga yi bstod pa yongs su smra/_/nyams dga' grong khyer rgyal po'i khab/_/'od ma'i tshal 
[\[325b.3\]]gyi sa steng du/_/slob ma'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu/_/ji ltar bde bar bzhugs pa na/_/der ni bya rog cig yod pas/_/nga la sems ni rab dad byas/_/sems ni nga la dad byas pas/_/lus zhig nas ni mtho ris song /_/lha rnams las ni shi 'phos nas/_/mi rnams 
[\[325b.4\]]nang du nye bar skyes/_/mi yi nang du skyes nas kyang /_/nga yi bstan la rab tu 'byung /_/rab byung bdag nyid chen po de/_/ji bzhin de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ma khol zhes bya'i brtul zhugs can/_/de ni de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ji bzhin don ni bstod pas mchod/_/
[\[325b.5\]]rnam pa sna tshogs dpe dag gis/_/'byung po kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/legs par spyod pa rab byed pa'o/_/sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/_/bstod pa brjod pa de gtsor byed/_/dus mtha'i 'jig rten smad pa la/_/de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rnam par 
[\[325b.6\]]smin pa de yis ni/_/lus zhig nas ni bde 'gror 'gro/_/blo ldan de ni mthar gyis kyang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs bde myong nas/_/bsam gyis mi khyab mchog gsungs pa'i/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub thob/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nga 'das nas/_/lo ni bzhi brgya 
[\[325b.7\]]lon pa na/_/dge slong klu zhes de 'bod 'byung /_/bstan pa la ni dad cing phan/_/rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob pa/_/lo ni drug brgya dag tu 'tsho/_/rig pa rma bya chen mo ni/_/bdag nyid chen po des kyang grub/_/bstan bcos sna tshogs don dang ni/_/dngos po med pa'i don 
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]de rigs/_/gang tshe lus de bor ba na/_/bde ba can du'ang skye bar 'gyur/_/de nas mthar gyis sangs rgyas nyid/_/nges pa kho nar yang dag 'thob/_/thogs med ces bya'i dge slong ni/_/bstan bcos de ni don la mkhas/_/mdo sde des don drang ba'i don/_/rnam 
[\[326a.2\]]pa mang po'ang rab tu 'byed/_/'jig rten rig pa ston bdag nyid/_/gzhung byed ngang tshul can du 'gyur/_/de yi rig pa grub pa 'di/_/sA la'i pho nya mo zhes rjod/_/de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/_/blo ni bzang po skye bar 'gyur/_/bstan pa yun ring gnas pa'i phyir/_/mdo yi 
[\[326a.3\]]de nyid don sdud byed/_/lo ni brgya dang lnga bcur 'tsho/_/de lus zhig nas lha yul 'gro/_/'khor ba rnams su 'khor ba na/_/yun ring bde ba rjes myong nas/_/bdag nyid chen po mthar gyis de/_/byang chub thob par 'gyur ba yin/_/de ltar rnam pa mang po yi/_/nga yi bstan 
[\[326a.4\]]la dge slong rnams/_/shes rab ldan nyid chos kyang spyod/_/dus kyi mtha' la de tshe 'byung /_/phyi ma de tshe dus dag tu/_/dge slong dgra bcom zhes bya ba/_/de ni sngags don bdag nyid ldan/_/rgyud shes de bzhin mang du thos/_/gnod sbyin sngags ni rab brjod pas/_/de la 
[\[326a.5\]]bum pa bzang po 'grub/_/sngon ni ngas ni gang bshad pa'i/_/theg pa chen po'i mdo sde yang /_/de yi tshe na bum pa las/_/dka' thub chen po 'dren par byed/_/glegs bam de la des bltas nas/_/de la sngags ni zlos pa na/_/gnod sbyin bsgrub pa'i bum pa la/_/der 
[\[326a.6\]]ni bsrung ba ma byas pa'i/_/bag med dran pa nyams pa yis/_/gtsug spyod kyis ni bum pa phrogs/_/de ni de nas sngags grub pa'i/_/dge slong sngags ni zlos byed pa'i/_/bum pa dag ni bltas pa na/_/der ni mngon par mthong ma gyur/_/de nas khro bas mig dmar zhing /_/
[\[326a.7\]]rnam g.yo tshig tu smra ba ni/_/tshangs pa dka' ba'i mthar gyur par/_/brgya byin sogs bcas dbang phyug che/_/sngags kyis ma bkug ma 'ongs na/_/sngags pa bdag min sngags rgyal min/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas sras sngags dang /_/rgyal ba mchog gis 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]sngags dag ni/_/tshar gcod don du gang gsungs pa'am/_/gdul dka' 'dul bar byed pa'ang rung /_/gal te kun rnams ma bkug na/_/sa steng ma lus de dag med/_/de nas sngags pa chen po langs/_/brtul zhugs brtan zhing las rnams grub/_/ji ltar sngags ni 
[\[326b.2\]]byas pa yi/_/sbyor ba mthong bas rgyud dag kyang /_/rkun ma dgug pa de don gtsor/_/sbyor ba rab tu byas par gyur/_/skad cig dran pa tsam gyis ni/_/sdom brtson de ni las myur byed/_/yi ge hU~M gi sngags gcig gis/_/tshangs sogs sa sa steng 'dren par byed/_/lha 
[\[326b.3\]]rnams ma lus rab bkug pa/_/tshangs sogs brgya byin dang yang bcas/_/ha ha zhes bya'i sgra 'don cing /_/nyam thag 'jigs pa'i sgra yang sgrogs/_/ci bgyi zhes bya'i blo byed cing /_/bdag cag 'dir ni nyes med smra/_/myur zhing rab tu rings par yangs/_/blo ldan 
[\[326b.4\]]dge slong 'jigs med pas/_/lha rnams la ni rab smras pa/_/'dir ni bum pa slar byin zhes/_/lha rnams phan tshun thams cad la/_/dge slong des ni rab tu smras/_/gang gis bum pa bzang po khyer/_/khyod kyis myur du rab tu smros/_/lha rnams kun gyis bltas pa na/_/
[\[326b.5\]]kun tu yang ni ma mthong gyur/_/bum pa 'di ni su yis khyer/_/lha yi dbang pos yang dag dgongs/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po/_/dpal ldan lag na rdo rje can/_/de yi bu ni mi bzad yod/_/khro ba che zhing shin tu gdug_/bgegs kyi gzugs kyis sngags pa la/_/
[\[326b.6\]]'gro ba kun la rnam par rgyu/_/bum pa de ni des khyer mthong /_/lha yi bdag pos de yang smras/_/rdo rje'i rigs kyi bgegs yod pa/_/sa steng rtse zhing rol par byed/_/'dis ni bdag la ma mchod pas/_/des ni bum pa de 'dir khyer/_/lha yi bdag pos de smras nas/_/phyir 
[\[326b.7\]]yang lha yi gnas su song /_/de tshe rang nyid sngags kyis ni/_/lha rnams ma lus slar gshegs gas gsol/_/skad cig yud tsam nyid kyis ni/_/shin tu legs par yang dag bkug_/de tshe dbang med bum par bcas/_/bgegs de nyid dang bcas par 'ongs/_/de nas 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]de ni bgegs de yis/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams la bum pa byin/_/de nas de yi bgegs des ni/_/tshig 'di dag ni rab tu smras/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten bum pa khyer/_/nga ni de la dga' ba med/_/sngags pa des ni dka' ba dang /_/dka' bas btud de bgegs 
[\[327a.2\]]la smras/_/song shig song shig bgegs chen po/_/phyin cad 'di ltar ma byed cig_/de nas des ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag_/de yi mod la bkug par gyur/_/ltogs shing ngal ba'i sems dang ni/_/dman zhing de dag khab tsam kha/_/shin tu mi bzad chen po de/_/nyam thag 
[\[327a.3\]]skad kyang rab tu 'don/_/snying rje'i tshig tu smra ba ni/_/bdag nyid chen po yongs su skyo bas/_/khyod kyi bum pa 'dir 'ongs kyis/_/ji ltar 'dod bzhin bdag la byos/_/sngags pa snying rje cher ldan pas/_/yang dag 'dar ba rab tu skyes/_/snying rjes brlan pa'i sems 
[\[327a.4\]]kyis ni/_/tshig ni 'di dag rab tu smras/_/khyod kyi 'jig rten sdug bsngal ci/_/yun mi ring par rab tu smon/_/dman pa'i yid kyis de smras pa/_/bkres pas yang dag gdungs par gyur/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten skom pa yis/_/bdag nyid chen po yin yang 
[\[327a.5\]]rung /_/dge slong snying rje chen pos ni/_/de dag la ni bum pa byin/_/de nas de dag yid dga' nas/_/myur bar rang gi gnas su song /_/de dag bsam pa tsam gyis ni/_/bum pa las ni bza' btung byung /_/dge slong dga' bo'i 'og tu ni/_/tsan+dan skyong ni 'byung 
[\[327a.6\]]bar 'gyur/_/de tshe dus ni tha ma la/_/lo ni sum brgya dag tu 'tsho/_/bdag nyid chen po byang chub ni/_/bgegs med myur du rnyed dka' thob/_/rgyal po btsun pa zhes bya ba/_/nga yi bstan pa nub byed pa/_/dus kyi tha ma de yi tshe/_/the tshom med par 'byung 
[\[327a.7\]]bar 'gyur/_/shar phyogs nas ni brtsams nas su/_/kha che'i yul gyi bar dag tu/_/rmongs pas lha khang mchod rten rnams/_/de tshe de bzhin 'jig par 'gyur/_/dge slong tshul khrims ldan pa rnams/_/blo ngan des ni gsod par byed/_/byang gi phyogs 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]su brten nas ni/_/de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/_/mi ma yin pa nyid 'khrugs nas/_/yul 'khor phyugs dang gnyen rnams dang /_/ri yi dum bus bcom par 'gyur/_/blo ngan de ni sa 'og 'gro/_/de ni 'og nas 'og tu 'gro/_/dmyal las dmyal ba rab drag par/_/
[\[327b.2\]]sdug bsngal sdug bsngal drag par ni/_/mi bzad par ni yang dag ltung /_/mnar med zhes ni bya ba yi/_/sdig pa'i las kyis dmyal ba ni/_/de nas bskal ba cher 'tshed pa/_/bdag nyid ngan pa go mi shan/_/mi dge'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/_/sdig pa shin 
[\[327b.3\]]tu mi bzad byas/_/de ni nga yi bstan pa la/_/rnam pa kun gyis 'bad nas ni/_/sems ni ma lus rab btang nas/_/phun sum tshogs dang de nas spyod/_/nges par sangs rgyas nyid lam ni/_/yan lag brgyad kyi theg pas ni/_/de tshe de ni rab 'gro zhing /_/mya ngan nad med 
[\[327b.4\]]dam pa thob/_/de yi 'og tu sa srung ba/_/sangs rgyas phyogs zhes rnam par grags/_/phyogs che gtong ba che ba dang /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/_/de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/_/'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/thams cad mngon dga'i rgyal po ste/_/ston 
[\[327b.5\]]pa'i bstan pa de gtsor byed/_/kun dga' ra ba mchod rten gnas/_/ston pa'i gzugs brnyan bla na med/_/mtshe'u rdzing dang khron pa dang /_/mtsho rnams dag ni du ma dag_/rgyal po chen pos byas nas ni/_/tshe zad lha yi gnas su song /_/des kyang sa steng grub pa ni/_/pad+ma 
[\[327b.6\]]'chang ba brtson 'grus che/_/bdag nyid chen po sems dpa' la/_/sa yi bdag por don du gnyer/_/de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/_/lo ni sum brgya dag tu 'tsho/_/de yi las kyi lhag ma yis/_/myur du byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/_/de yi bu ni rgyal po yang /_/sde 
[\[327b.7\]]chen stobs ni che ba yi/_/zab mo'i phyogs zhes rnam par grags/_/grong khyer sa ni lnga len 'byung /_/rig pa'i bdag nyid rgyal po de'ang /_/de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang dang /_/mchod rten rdzing dang khron pa ni/_/'od chen 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]sa yi bdag po de/_/du ma byed par the tshom med/_/blo dang ldan pa 'jam dbyangs kyi/_/sngags kyang des ni rab bsgrubs pa/_/de dag yi ge drug ces bya/_/don chen longs spyod 'phel byed pa'o/_/de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/_/de ni longs spyod che bar 
[\[328a.2\]]'gyur/_/blo dang ldan pa mthar gyis ni/_/myur du byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan 'di la/_/rnam pa sna tshogs bya ba byed/_/byang gi phyogs la brten nas ni/_/de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/lha ldan yul zhes bya ba yi/_/gangs can ri 
[\[328a.3\]]yi nang gnas pa'i/_/rgyal po mi yi lha zhes pa/_/lits+tsha bI rnams rigs su byung /_/de yang sngags kyi don bsgrubs te/_/longs spyod che dang ldan par 'gyur/_/rig pa longs spyod ldan zhes bya/_/mi yi bdag pos de yang grub/_/lo ni brgyad cur rgyal srid byas/_/des 
[\[328a.4\]]ni rkun ma rnam par spangs/_/rgyal po de ni srog spangs nas/_/der yang sngags ni myur 'grub ste/_/zhi dang rgyas pa bsil byed pa'o/_/'jig rten sgrol ma zhes grags dang /_/lha mo gos dkar ma dang ni/_/dkar mo chen mo gzhan phan brtson/_/rtag tu yid ni mi skyo 
[\[328a.5\]]ba'o/_/de la sogs pa gsungs pa yi/_/de bzhin rgyal po mang po ni/_/rnam pa du ma mang po dag_/kha dog sna tshogs sna tshogs gzugs/_/kha ba can gnas kla klo'i rgyal/_/de yang ston pa mchod byed pa'o/_/khyu mchog khyu mchog bzang po dang /_/sa 'od de 
[\[328a.6\]]bzhin sa 'od bzang /_/de bzhin pha rol gnon nyid dang /_/rkang pa'i 'gros zhes bstan pa yin/_/sa srung dang ni be'u dang /_/'od ldan nyid ni phyi ma yin/_/tha mar char rgyal ngang tshul te/_/kla klo rnam pa sna tshogs yin/_/de 'og lugs ni rnam zhig cing /_/phyi rol 
[\[328a.7\]]skye dgus nye bar spyod/_/de tshe bal yul bdag po ni/_/mtshon gyis 'thab pas rnam par 'jig_/kla klo'i rkun po bsten pa yi/_/der ni rgyal po rnam par 'jig_/sa bdag du ma gsungs pa rnams/_/sna tshogs lha dang bram ze dag_/de yi tshe na 'byung bar 
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]'gyur/_/rgya yul kun la brten pa yi/_/rgyal po dbyig gi snying zhes bya/_/sde chen stobs kyang che ba dang /_/blon po rgya che nyid dang ni/_/skye bo rtsa lag rab tu mang /_/kla klos btud dang rnam par rgyal/_/ston pa'i bstan pa de gtsor byed/_/gzhon nu bdag 
[\[328b.2\]]nyid chen po nyid/_/de yi sngags ni rab bsgrubs pa/_/mthu ni chen po dang ldan pa'i/_/rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge brgyad/_/dpa' bo che zhes rnam par grags/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas chen yin/_/de yi byis pa'i blo yis ni/_/rgyal srid phyir ni rab 
[\[328b.3\]]smon byas/_/gang gis dran pa tsam gyis ni/_/sangs rgyas nyid du nges 'gyur ba/_/mi bdag rgyal thabs nyid kyi phyir/_/de ni skal ba mi nyung 'gyur/_/mchog gi sbyin pa bla na med/_/bsam pa tsam gyis thob pa nyid/_/tshangs sogs lha rnams thams cad 
[\[328b.4\]]la/_/ma lus lung ni rtsol byed na/_/lha ngan phal pa dag dang ni/_/mi yi 'jig rten smos ci dgos/_/lo ni brgya dang lnga bcur 'tsho/_/grags chen lha yi gnas su 'gro/_/chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar gyis/_/byang chub dam pa thob par 'gyur/_/gzhon nus 
[\[328b.5\]]yongs su bshad pa yi/_/rig pa 'di ni de yul du/_/de ni myur du 'grub 'gyur gyis/_/rig pa gzhan ni nam yang min/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo che/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'od chen po/_/mngon sum de yi yul dag na/_/byis pa'i gzugs kyis bzhugs 
[\[328b.6\]]pa yin/_/grub pa'i zhing mchog dam pa la/_/mi ni yongs su sgrub par 'gyur/_/rgyal po tu ruSh+ka zhes bya/_/byang phyogs la ni yang dag brten/_/sde chen brtson 'grus che ba ste/_/de yi gnas su 'byung bar 'gyur/_/shing shun gyon yul ma gtogs pa/_/kha che'i 
[\[328b.7\]]mthar thug ka shir bcas/_/de ni dpag tshad bdun brgya dang /_/'bum phrag gnyis kyi sa bdag tu/_/de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/_/de tshe the tshom med par 'gyur/_/de yang sngags ni grub pas na/_/lo ni sum brgya dag tu 'tsho/_/blo ldan mi yi spyan gyur pas/_/
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]skra can ma yi rig pa bsgrubs/_/bdag nyid dge bar bya ba'i phyir/_/lha khang dag ni mang po byas/_/stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig gi/_/mchod rten mchog ni de bzhin byas/_/theg pa chen po mchog chos dang /_/de bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/_/'jig 
[\[329a.2\]]rten shes rab pha rol phyin/_/de yi yul du rab gnas byas/_/rgyal po de ni lus zhig nas/_/mtho ris 'jig rten 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sa bdag de ni mthar gyis su/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med 'thob/_/de 'og sa bdag rgyal po ni/_/chen po tu ruSh+ka zhes bya/_/
[\[329a.3\]]blo ldan mang pos bkur zhes bya/_/rtag tu dge zhing mchod la dga'/_/lha mo sgrol ma rdzu 'phrul che/_/de yi sngags kyang rab tu bsgrubs/_/des kyang sngags ni rab bsgrubs pa/_/sa steng rgyal po'i ched du'o/_/phyogs che dpung ni chen po dang /_/rgyal po grags 
[\[329a.4\]]pa chen po ste/_/gnyen dang rigs dang rgyal pos kyang /_/de ni bkur ba nyid du 'gyur/_/rtsa brgyad stong gi gtsug lag khang /_/de yi dus su yod par 'gyur/_/de yi sngags kyi mthus yis ni/_/lo ni nyis brgya dag tu 'tsho/_/gang tshe de lus zhig pa na/_/dga' 
[\[329a.5\]]ldan du ni skye bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/_/lha yi bus kyang bkur bar 'gyur/_/chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar gyis/_/byang chub yan lag mngon rdzogs nas/_/'bad pas de ni mthar gyis kyang /_/mnyam med byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[329a.6\]]dus kun de yi yul du ni/_/gsung rab mang po gnas 'gyur ba/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba dag gis gsungs/_/da ltar ngas kyang gsungs pa yin/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po klu dang ni/_/'dod chags bral bas rnam par gnas/_/de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang /_/gnod 
[\[329a.7\]]sbyin bstan pa srung byed dang /_/sa steng dam chos srung byed pa/_/de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de ltar rnam pa mang po bstan/_/sa bdag 'jig rten rnam grags pa/_/bstan dang ston par 'gyur ba yin/_/nub phyogs yul ni mtha' yas pa/_/'phags rgyal 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]zhes bya'i pha rol tu/_/la da'i yul gyi skye bo ni/_/ngang tshul zhes bya'i rgyal po yod/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/_/grong khyer phyin nas yang dag zhugs/_/chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba ste/_/mchod rten sna tshogs 
[\[329b.2\]]gtsug lag khang /_/de bzhin srog chags dge bar ni/_/sa bdag chos la mnyes gshin pas/_/rig pa'i bdag nyid byed par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i gzugs brnyan yid 'ong la/_/rnam pa sna tshogs mchod pa byed/_/'jig rten mgon po grags chen gyi/_/mchod 
[\[329b.3\]]rten mchog la'ang mchod pa byed/_/des na de ni sngags kyang grub/_/rgyal po las skyes kho na ni/_/de yi yul du yang dag grags/_/dge slong bsod snyoms byed pa ni/_/tshul khrims ldan zhing blo dang ldan/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/_/
[\[329b.4\]]bdag nyid chen po dus su rgyu/_/de ni bsod snyoms rab zhugs rgyu/_/rgyal po'i khab bzang rab mthong ba/_/rgya che skye bos gang ba la/_/bslang ba'i don du der yang zhugs/_/bkres pa dang yang yang dag ldan/_/ngal zhing ltogs pa'i yid gyur kyang /_/
[\[329b.5\]]de tshe bsod snyoms rnyed ma gyur/_/rgyal po'i skyes bus de myur bzung /_/khyim de las ni phyung bar 'gyur/_/de nas de ni yid byung nas/_/rgyal po'i mi la rab khros te/_/grong khyer de las nges byung nas/_/mod la de yi rang gnas phyin/_/ltogs shing 
[\[329b.6\]]skom pa nyid gyur pas/_/sdug bsngal yid mi bde bar gyur/_/de nas de ni zas chad nas/_/mtshan phyed du ni langs gyur nas/_/sdom brtson de ni sems chud pas/_/de tshe srog ni gtang bar rtsom/_/de tshe smon lam byed pa ni/_/la da'i yul gyi bdag por 
[\[329b.7\]]shog_/de nas dge slong dus las 'das/_/spu gri zhes bya'i rgyal rigs su/_/bdag nyid chen po de skyes gyur/_/ston pa'i bstan pa mchod par byed/_/lo ni sum cu dag tu yang /_/rgyal srid gnod pa med par byas/_/brkam chags rang mi'i sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]ma zhu'i nad kyis btab par gyur/_/de tshe rgyal po lus zhig nas/_/dus byas lha yi gnas song ba/_/byams pa gang du bzhugs pa yi/_/dga' ldan lha yi gnas mchog tu/_/bdag nyid chen pos chos 'chad par/_/de nyid du ni skye bar 'gyur/_/
[\[330a.2\]]'od chen byams pa chen po la/_/bsnyen bkur byed cing chos kyang nyan/_/bdag nyid chen po de mthar gyis/_/rnyed par dka' ba'i byang chub thob/_/tshul khrims zhes bya'i rgyal po'i 'og_/g.yo ba zhes bya 'byung bar 'gyur/_/lo ni lnga bcu rtsa lnga dang /_/de 
[\[330a.3\]]bzhin zla ba lnga ru 'tsho/_/de srid rgyal srid des byas nas/_/mtshon chas 'tsho bas rab bsad pa/_/bud med byas pa'i skyon nyid kyis/_/de ni mtshon chas bsad par 'gyur/_/de yi nu bo brtan zhes bya/_/brtan pa chos ni brtan par 'gyur/_/sngon ni bkren pa zham 
[\[330a.4\]]ring gyur/_/yul ni la da'i bdag por gyur/_/lhag ma rgyal po thams cad dang /_/skye dgu kun kyang zham ring pa'o/_/tshul khrims zhes bya rab 'das nas/_/de ni de dag kun gyi sngar/_/sa bdag thams cad 'byung 'gyur ba/_/dpa' bo rgya mtsho'i pha rol 'gro/_/
[\[330a.5\]]rgyal po dbang po zla mdzes dang /_/de bzhin du ni gzhu dang tog_/me tog gzhu dang rgyal po'i bu/_/res ldan grong las byung ba yin/_/dang po'i dang po snga ma dag_/ba la'i grong du 'byung ba yin/_/'od ces bya ba stod rnams dang /_/de bzhin khyab 'jug ces bya 
[\[330a.6\]]ba/_/rgyal po mtha' yas gsungs pa ni/_/ya nga ba yi rigs su 'byung /_/de dag phyi ma'i rgyal po ni/_/khyab 'jug ces ni bya ba 'byung /_/grong dang skye bo gnyen dang bcas/_/drang srong dmod pas gnod gyur pas/_/blo ldan rgyal po med par 'gyur/_/grong khyer chu 
[\[330a.7\]]yis rab tu gang /_/de tshe de yi res ldan grong /_/rgya mtsho chen pos rab tu gang /_/byang gi phyogs ni thams cad du/_/rtsom pa sna tshogs ri zhol brtan/_/sna tshogs rigs la gnas pa yi/_/rgyal po rnams ni mtha' yas gsungs/_/nyi shu gcig dang sum cu 
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]yi/_/mi yi rgyal por shes par bya/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad sa yi bdag po zhes/_/bar ma'i sa kun bdag po yin/_/mtha' yas klu yi sde la sogs/_/de las tha ma rnam par zhig_/de nas khyab 'jug 'phrog byed dang /_/mdung zhes bya ba 'phrog byed gzhan/_/dbang ldan dang 
[\[330b.2\]]ni phreng kun dang /_/bza' dang brtul zhugs bzang po gzhan/_/dus kun chos lugs rnam par nyams/_/rgyal po de dag dus las 'das/_/des ni bram ze rigs byung ba/_/de tshe longs spyod che nor dang /_/bar mthar yi ge dang po b+ha/_/de tshe blon po gnyi ga gtso/_/gnyi ga 
[\[330b.3\]]nor ldan dpal ldan grags/_/bstan pa la ni phan par dga'/_/gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags rgyal po/_/blon pos de tshe sngags kyang bzlas/_/de nas bzung nas sa yi bdag_/gnyi ga mi yi dbang phyug gyur/_/bdun dang brgyad dang de bzhin gsum/_/de tshe dpal mgrin 
[\[330b.4\]]gnas na 'dug_/ston pa nyi ma zhes bya ba'i/_/gnas na dbang phyug rab tu gnas/_/thams cad gnas su sa yi bdag_/'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom ma med/_/yi ge ha zhes rab gsungs pa/_/sa rnams kun la mi yi bdag_/de yi yul du sngags 'di dag_/de tshe 
[\[330b.5\]]grub par 'gro ba yin/_/zhi dang rgyas pa'i rig pa rnams/_/gang zhig chos rgyal gyis gsungs pa/_/longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs tshogs/_/de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs ldan/_/sna tshogs gzugs kyi gzungs dang ni/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po gnod sbyin mo/_/de tshe dus 
[\[330b.6\]]kyi tha ma la/_/der ni grub par 'gyur ba yin/_/lho yi phyogs la yang dag bstan/_/rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi sa dag la/_/rgyal po dkar dang zla mdzes dang /_/sa la yi ni bzhon pa dang /_/dbang chen dang ni bde byed dang /_/sa bdag de bzhin yid du 'ong /_/longs 
[\[330b.7\]]spyod skra bzang skra zhes su/_/lho yi phyogs su rnam par grags/_/bkra shis dang ni rnyed sla dang /_/ba lang rnyed dang khyu nyid dang /_/gru bzang de bzhin gru dag dang /_/dbang chen dang ni zla ba nyid/_/ba lang srung dbang zla ba'i sde/_/'dod lha de bzhin ma ga d+hA/_/grong 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]byed bde byed nyid dang ni/_/stag dang seng ge gza' lhag dang /_/sangs rgyas dag pa bum pa dang /_/bum pa ma lus nyid du brjod/_/mnyam dang legs par 'jam pa dang /_/skra bzang skra ni ldan pa dang /_/lho yi phyogs su sa yi bdag_/mtha' yas mang 
[\[331a.2\]]por bstan pa yin/_/'das dang ma 'ongs pa dag dang /_/da ltar dag tu rtogs par gyis/_/rnam pa sna tshogs nad btab nas/_/'di dag rnam pa sna tshogs 'chi/_/mtshon gyis 'debs dang mu ge yis/_/'chi zhing kha cig phyogs gzhan 'gro/_/de ltar 'di dag rgyal po 
[\[331a.3\]]rnams/_/kan tsi pu rar gnas par bstan/_/de bzhin stong phrag rnam grags pa/_/de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/_/de dus de tshe phyogs dag tu/_/sngags rnams grub par 'dod na ni/_/khro bo rdo rje'i rigs bstan pa'i/_/sngags 'di dag ni bsgrub par bya/_/mngon par spyod pa'i 
[\[331a.4\]]las dag dang /_/de bzhin dbang gi don yang 'grub/_/gzhon nu byis pa'i gzugs can ni/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs ni bdag nyid che/_/de tshe dus mthar phyin pa na/_/de tshe yul der 'grub par 'gyur/_/ri bo 'bigs byed la brten nas/_/rgya mtsho ba tshwa can 'gram du/_/gdong 
[\[331a.5\]]drug ces ni yang dag bsgrags/_/sems can rnams la mchog sbyin byed/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo dang ldan/_/byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/_/sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir/_/lho yi phyogs su gnas par gyis/_/gdong drug gang gi sngags dag ni/_/
[\[331a.6\]]'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rab bstan pa/_/de tshe de phyogs de dus su/_/grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/de tshe dpal gyi ri bo'i phyogs/_/'bigs byed nang dang ri zhol dang /_/gling nyid rnam pa thams cad dang /_/ka ling ka zhes rab bsgrags dang /_/yon tan gsum 
[\[331a.7\]]dang kla klo dang /_/kho ra 'khor yug ko sa la/_/rgya mtsho'i nang dang 'gram dag tu/_/rgyal po dag ni mtha' yas yod/_/cha shas kA ma rU zhes pa/_/kha ba can gyi nang na gnas/_/o Da yul gyi mtshams kun na/_/rgyal po rnams ni mang po gsungs/_/sna tshogs kla klo'i 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]rgyal po ni/_/ston pa mchod byed de gtso byed/_/dbang po zla ba dga' ba yi/_/rgyal po kla klo'i gnas na gnas/_/de las rgyal po gnyis dag ni/_/bstan pa la ni lo brgyad dang /_/ston pa'i sku gzugs mchod byed pa'o/_/de las skyes pa thams cad ni/_/rgyal ba'i 
[\[331b.2\]]bstan la rab dad par/_/the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/shar gyi phyogs la brten pa yi/_/rgyal po'i mchog ni mang po gsungs/_/gang zhig 'das dang ma 'ongs dang /_/da ltar byung ba thams cad du'o/_/dang po'i rgyal po mchog bshad bya/_/go DA'i rgyud du sa steng 
[\[331b.3\]]skyes/_/grong khyer 'phel byed nyams dga' bar/_/grags ldan de ni rab tu skye/_/de ming 'jig rten zhes bya ba/_/rgyal po go DA 'phel byed byung /_/nga ni 'jig rten skyes med 'dir/_/de ni chos la sems pa byung /_/sa bdag mang po rnams mnan nas/_/zho shas 'tsho ba dag 
[\[331b.4\]]tu byas/_/bar ma'i dus su 'di dag mnyam/_/bar ma bar ma'i chos dang ldan/_/rtsod pa'i dus kyi tha ma la/_/mi yi dbang po de nyid nyon/_/rgyal po rgya mtsho zhes bya dang /_/rnam par gnon pa nyid dang ni/_/rgyal mchog gtso bo dbang chen dang /_/de 'og yi ge sa zhes bya/_/lha yi 
[\[331b.5\]]rgyal po zhes bya ste/_/tha ma'i dus la 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po'i gtso bo sna tshogs zhes/_/blo ldan chos ni 'phel byed pa'o/_/de yi nu bo byis zhes bya/_/bstan pa 'di la phan zhing dga'/_/shar phyogs rgya mtsho'i mthar thug par/_/mchod rten gyis brgyan mdzes 
[\[331b.6\]]pa ni/_/de tshe sa rnams ma lus par/_/byed par 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/lha khang kun dga' ra ba rdzing /_/skyed mos tshal dang bkad sa ni/_/de tshe dpal ldan byed 'gyur zhing /_/gzings dang zam pa byed pa po/_/de tshe ston pa'i gzugs brnyan mchod/_/de la zhugs pa'ang 
[\[331b.7\]]mchod par byed/_/rgyal srid sa yi bdag po byed/_/gnod pa med cing 'gran zla med/_/lo ni sum brgya dag tu'ang 'tsho/_/zhag ni sum cur rab byung nas/_/pha rol rgol bas pham byas te/_/de nas rgyal pos rang srog bcad/_/de 'og de nas lus zhig nas/_/
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]dmyal ba dag tu rab skyes te/_/zhag gsum dang ni gcig dag tu/_/dmyal ba dag gi 'gro bar gnas/_/de nas dmyal ba'i lus bor nas/_/rtag tu rgyal po lha gnas 'gro/_/lha rnams legs sa spyad 'jig rten du/_/gtsang ma'i gnas zhes rab tu 
[\[332a.2\]]dran/_/der ni lha rgyal zhes byar 'gyur/_/dag pa'i bdag nyid byang chub gzhol/_/brgya phrag dang ni stong phrag tu/_/lha yi bde ba rjes su myong /_/phyir yang mi lus thob nas ni/_/srid pa gzhan la sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/skye ba gzhan du sems can la/_/de nyid 
[\[332a.3\]]kyis ni las kyang byas/_/grong khyer 'phags rgyal zhes bya ba/_/de tshe ma la bar skye'o/_/de ni tshong dpon mchog gyur pa/_/ma la bar skyes nor chen ldan/_/'jig rten stong zhing gnas med pa/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba med dus su/_/rang sangs rgyas ni 'jig rten du/_/rdzu 
[\[332a.4\]]'phrul chen po rnam par rgyu/_/sems can rnams la phan don du/_/sa yi steng du rnam spyod de/_/grong khyer 'phags rgyal phyin nas ni/_/bsod snyoms spyod la rab tu zhugs/_/bdag nyid chen po tshogs spyod pas/_/de tshe lam chen grong bar ru/_/de tshe tshong pa de 
[\[332a.5\]]nyid kyis/_/thub pa mngon du mthong bar gyur/_/'bras chan la ni mgron bos nas/_/de tshe rang gi khyim du khyer/_/de nas thub mchog myur khyer nas/_/stan dag la ni bzhugs su gsol/_/zas kyi dus ni nyer gnas pas/_/bcom ldan de ni dgongs su gsol/_/
[\[332a.6\]]bdag nyid chen po de dag kyang /_/de tshe cang mi smra bar gyur/_/de tshe tshong pa de la ni/_/lhung bzed dag ni zed par gyur/_/tshong pa zur gyis go ba dang /_/de tshe blo dang ldan gyur pas/_/rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba yis/_/lhung bzed rnams ni yongs su bkang /_/de nas des 
[\[332a.7\]]ni rang lag gis/_/de dag la ni 'bad pas byin/_/thogs nas de dag thams cad ni/_/mar me'i phreng ba bzhin du mthong /_/nam mkha' la ni lus brten nas/_/de dag de yi mod la song /_/de nas ba spu langs nas ni/_/de tshe skyo ba mang po gyur/_/yid ni rdzu 'phrul la dad 
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]nas/_/sa de la ni rab tu 'gyel/_/smon lam de tshe byed pa yang /_/ji ltar tshig tu smra ba ni/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yis ni/_/de ring bdag gis gang thob pa/_/des ni thub pa rab mchog ni/_/'jig rten blo yi mchog 'gyur shog_/de tshe sa steng 'khor los sgyur/_/
[\[332b.2\]]skye ba stong phrag bcu ru 'gyur/_/de nas de yi lus spangs nas/_/bye ba drug cur lha gnas 'gro/_/der ni yun ring bde myong nas/_/lha gnas skye ba yongs bor te/_/de tshe mi yi skye ba ni/_/gzhan gyi dbang gis 'dir yang phyin/_/de ni rgyal po'i rigs skyes pa/_/
[\[332b.3\]]thams cad du ni 'dir yang 'gyur/_/rgyal po byis pa zhes bya de/_/shar gyi phyogs su 'byung bar 'gyur/_/skye ba stong phrag brgyad du ni/_/bde ba sgrib med thob 'gyur ba/_/dpal ldan rgyal pos thob pa'o/_/thams cad mkhyen nyid mthar thob 'gyur/_/de ltar 
[\[332b.4\]]rnam mang sems can dang /_/de bzhin phun tshogs rgya che ba/_/de tshe mchod dang skul byed pa/_/ston pa la ni su mi byed/_/rig pa dge ba byed pa yi/_/byang chub lam la nges par sbyor/_/de las gzhan pa'i rgyal po ni/_/go DA nus pa'i ngang tshul can/_/gzhon 
[\[332b.5\]]nu zhes bya'i rgyal por gsungs/_/de yang shin tu chos dang ldan/_/de nas gzhan pa dpal ldan bcas/_/yi ge u zhes rnam par grags/_/de las gzhan ni rnam 'byed cing /_/de bzhin phan tshun 'jigs par byed/_/de dag go DA drag sems kyis/_/'di dag 
[\[332b.6\]]'byed pa chen por byed/_/de nas lha zhes bya ba yi/_/rgyal po lam ni byed par shes/_/dgra rnams kun gyis yongs khyab nas/_/de ni dgra yis bsnun nas shi/_/de'i 'og zla ba zhes ni bya/_/des ni rgyal po nyid kyang byas/_/sngon gyi las kyis bskul nas ni/_/de 
[\[332b.7\]]nas mtshon gyis rmas nas shi/_/de yi bu ni bcu gnyis grangs/_/lo brgyad bcas pa dag tu 'tsho/_/de yang mtshon gyis rab btab nas/_/de tshe byis pa nyid du shi/_/de dag gcig la gcig sems shing /_/drag po phan pa med la dga'/_/rgyal mchog yi ge ta 
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]zhes bya/_/de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/go DA'i 'jig rten rnams kyi gtso/_/chen po'i nad kyis yang dag btab/_/nad de nyid kyis nyam thag nas/_/dus byas nas ni 'og tu song /_/de 'og yi ge da zhes bya/_/nyin zhag cung zad rgyal po byed/_/go 
[\[333a.2\]]DA'i yul du byung gyur pa/_/gang gA'i 'gram du yang dag gnas/_/de 'og yi ge b+ha zhes bya/_/zhag gsum du ni rgyal po byas/_/de nas sa srung rgyal po ni/_/thams cad du ni de tshe 'byung /_/rgyal po de ni snyan par smra/_/byas pa gzo zhing stobs kyang che/_/bud med dbang 
[\[333a.3\]]'gyur bkren zhing glen/_/dgra las rgyal zhing mi phyed 'gyur/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/_/de tshe gtong ba chen por 'gyur/_/mchod rten nyams dga' gtsug lag khang /_/kun dga' ra ba rnam mang po/_/rdzing yang chu ni phun sum tshogs/_/bsod nams gang ni 
[\[333a.4\]]legs mdzes pa/_/de dag mang po ston byed cing /_/grags dang snyan pa'i don la brtson/_/lha yi stegs ni nyams dga' dang /_/phug dang gnas khang dag kyang byas/_/ya mtshan can gyis yang dag gnon/_/sna tshogs mu stegs gnas kyis ni/_/rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi 
[\[333a.5\]]mthar thug par/_/phyogs de thams cad rnam par gnon/_/brtse ldan longs spyod ldan dpag med/_/rgyal po de ni chos la dga'/_/shar gyi phyogs su rgyas par ni/_/the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rtag tu cho gar yang dag ldan/_/ka ba nye bar gnas gyur tshe/_/
[\[333a.6\]]gang gA'i 'gram la yang dag brten/_/de tshe rgyal thabs byas pa ni/_/lo ni sum cu dag dang bdun/_/lo ni brgyad cu dag ni 'chi/_/de nas de yi lus zhig nas/_/lha rnams dag tu nye bar skye/_/de nas dpal ldan klu yi rgyal/_/chos kyi bdag nyid chos la dga'/_/
[\[333a.7\]]mchod rten gang zhig 'di byas dang /_/ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid du 'ong /_/de tshe sa steng dge 'dun ched/_/logs su gtsug lag khang dag byas/_/rnam par smin pa de yis ni/_/srid pa tha ma la brten nas/_/nges par sangs rgyas nyid lam dang /_/mi g.yo go 
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]'phang thob par 'gyur/_/de yi 'og tu go DAr ni/_/de dag gtsor ni mu stegs gnon/_/shar gyi phyogs su 'byung ba ni/_/grong khyer du ni mu stegs gnas/_/rgyal po'i ming ni bcom ldan zhes/_/go DA'i nang na mthu dang ldan/_/brtul zhugs can ni mthur ldan pa/_/
[\[333b.2\]]sbyin gnas zhes pas dbang yang bskur/_/der ni rgyal srid byas nas su/_/nub kyi phyogs su yang dag song /_/ci 'dod sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i/_/grong khyer nyams dgar rab tu zhugs/_/ma zhu pas ni rab btab nas/_/phyir yang rab tu log par 'gyur/_/shar phyogs 
[\[333b.3\]]rgya mtsho'i mthar thug bar/_/rkun ma rnams kyis yang dag khyab/_/mtshon gyi gnod pas rab bshig nas/_/shi nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'gro bar song /_/sa bdag rgyal po mi mang ba/_/des ni lo gsum bar du byas/_/de nas de ni rkun pos bas bsad/_/rdzu 'phrul che ba'i 
[\[333b.4\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]song /_/de nyid du ni lo gsum bar/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rgyal thabs yongs su byas/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten mi bzad pa/_/de nas de ni lus kyang btang /_/skye ba de las rnam grol nas/_/rtag tu mtho ris 'jig rten song /_/de yi 'og tu rgyal po ni/_/rgya 
[\[333b.5\]]mtsho zhes ni bya bar grags/_/blo ngan lo ni gsum gyi bar/_/blo gros ngan pas rgyal srid thob/_/de yi nu bor rnam grags pa/_/thal ba zhes bya'i rgyal po 'byung /_/srog gcod pa dang yang dag ldan/_/bab col chen po rab tu byed/_/'bad pas rang gi lus la yang /_/
[\[333b.6\]]brtse med bag ni med pa'o/_/byis par gyur pas 'di nyid sems/_/pha rol don ni de mi sems/_/mi dge'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/_/sdig pa'i las ni mang po byas/_/g.yo ldan de bzhin bkren pa yi/_/bram zes rgyal srid dag kyang gnon/_/mi dang mi ma yin 
[\[333b.7\]]dag gi/_/longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs phun sum tshogs/_/rgyal po des kyang rab tu thob/_/de ni mthar gyis song ba dang /_/rgyal po nub kyi phyogs dag tu/_/kha che'i sgo yi mthar thug bar/_/byang gi phyogs la brten nas ni/_/der yang 
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]g.yul las rnam rgyal nas/_/rgyal thabs de tshe byas pa ni/_/bcu gnyis lo dang zla ba lngar/_/sa la rgyal srid de tshe byas/_/de nas de ni nad kyis btab/_/yang dang yang du brgyal bar gyur/_/sdug bsngal chen pos zil mnan nas/_/lus ni zhig nas shi 
[\[334a.2\]]'phos 'gyur/_/rgyal srid phyir ni rab chags nas/_/de dag phan tshun zhe sdang zhing /_/mtshon chen tshogs kyis 'phen pa ni/_/de dag phan tshun byas par 'gyur/_/yi ge sa ming byis pa khye'u/_/de tshe rgyal srid dbang yang bskur/_/mtshan ma tsam zhig de byas nas/_/
[\[334a.3\]]phyir yang de ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bram ze'i gtso bo gnyis kyis ni/_/de dag phan tshun phye nas ni/_/ma ga d+hA yi yul phyin zhing /_/u dum bA ra'i grong zhes par/_/bram ze'i gtso bo byis pa gnyis/_/sa steng rang gis dbang yang bskur/_/de nas mthar gyis de song 
[\[334a.4\]]nas/_/shar phyogs su ni yang dag brten/_/go DA'i yul gyi mir yang phyin/_/de tshe 'gran zla med par gyur/_/bdag nyid ngan pa'i rtsod rgyal gyis/_/byis pa'i gtso bo de gnyis pos/_/mi dge'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/_/srog chags mang po rab tu bsad/_/
[\[334a.5\]]gang zhig sngon gyi rgyal pos bkur/_/dpa' bas nga rgyal byed pa gang /_/go DAr skye bo gnas pa dag_/thams cad dag ni gsod par rtsom/_/de nas rgyal po zla ba zhes/_/dpa' bo gcig pu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gang gA'i 'gram gyi mthar thug dang /_/bA rA Na sI de las gzhan/_/ston pa'i 
[\[334a.6\]]gzugs brnyan nyams dga' ba/_/blo ngan gyis ni 'jig par 'gyur/_/chos kyi stegs ni mi nyung ba/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis sngon bstan pa/_/blo ngan dag gis bsreg 'gyur zhing /_/mu stegs rnams ni gsod par dga'/_/de nas de ni khro dang chags/_/mi
