[\[334a.7\]]sdom log pa'i nga rgyal can/_/mchod rten kun dga' ra ba gnas/_/sa steng gcer bu'i gnas dag kyang /_/de nas thams cad 'jig byed cing /_/'tsho ba 'gog pa'ang byed par 'dod/_/yul gyi dbus su rgyal po gzhan/_/de yi dus su 'byung 'gyur ba/_/
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]yi ge ra ming rigs bdag nyid/_/rje rigs kyis 'tsho de las gzhan/_/ston pa'i bstan pa 'di la dad/_/zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal mchog des/_/gcer bu'i rigs gyur rgyal po ni/_/da yang rab tu bsad par gyur/_/yi ge ha ming de'i nu bo/_/dpa' bo gcig pu 'byung bar 
[\[334b.2\]]'gyur/_/dpung ni chen por yang dag ldan/_/dpa' zhing zil gnon rnam par gnon/_/rgyal po yi ge ha bya bas/_/zla bar rnam grags gnas las bton/_/de nas rgyal po rje'u rigs spyod/_/sde chen stobs ni che ba dang /_/de tshe shar gyi phyogs dag ni/_/
[\[334b.3\]]bsod nams che ba'i grong mchog song /_/rgyal rigs chos la gnas nas ni/_/chos kyi don shes brtser ldan pas/_/de ni nga rgyal khro tshul gyis/_/srog chags mang po gsod byed cing /_/sems can gnod pa byed pa dang /_/chad pa byed la rab dga' zhing /_/las 
[\[334b.4\]]ngan rjes su spyod byed pa'i/_/zla ba zhes bya pham par byas/_/zla ba zhes bya de phyung nas/_/rang gi gnas na rab tu 'dug_/yi ge ha ming slar log nas/_/kla klo'i rgyal pos rab tu mchod/_/yi ge ha bya dge dang ldan/_/dge ba'i don gyi las kyis ni/_/ji ltar 
[\[334b.5\]]'dod pa'i 'gros dag gis/_/rang gi yul ni nyid du phyin/_/de nyid kyis ni las byas pas/_/rgyal srid dga' dang ldan pa thob/_/yang na rgyal srid spyod gnas pas/_/longs spyod rab tu thob ldan pa/_/snga mar rang sangs rgyas la ni/_/bza' dang gos ni byin 
[\[334b.6\]]pa dang /_/de tshe lham ni byin pa dang /_/gos kyis brgyan pa'i gdugs kyang byin/_/de yi las kyi mthu yis ni/_/lha mi'i rgyal srid chen po thob/_/lha dang mi yi phun sum tshogs/_/longs spyod phun sum tshogs ldan spyod/_/zla ba zhes bya'i bram ze'i rigs/_/
[\[334b.7\]]longs spyod cher ldan gang phyir de/_/bram ze dag la longs spyod byin/_/de tshe rgyal thabs byed pa ni/_/lo ni bcu dang bdun dag dang /_/de bzhin gzhan ni zla ba gcig_/nyin zhag bdun dang brgyad dag tu/_/kha yi nad kyis yang dag btab/_/srin bu rnams kyis 
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]zos nas ni/_/dus byas nas ni 'og tu 'gro/_/mi ma yin pas zil mnan nas/_/de tshe grong de bshig par 'gyur/_/mi ma yin pas nyen pa yi/_/rims kyis nyam thag nad kyis brgyal/_/sngags kyi sbyor bas 'chi ba ste/_/de tshe rgyal po dus las 'das/_/
[\[335a.2\]]mnar med pa zhes bya ba yi/_/dmyal bar sdig pa'i las byed rnams/_/sdig pa'i las rnams rjes spyod pa/_/de ni de ru skye bar 'gyur/_/dmyal bar de tshe bskal chen du/_/ma rungs sems ldan 'tshed par 'gyur/_/de nas so thams kyi hud zer/_/yang sos 
[\[335a.3\]]dang ni thig nag dang /_/mi bzad ral gri'i nags tshal yang /_/yang dang yang du myong bar 'gyur/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten dud 'gro nyid/_/de bzhin gshin rje'i 'jig rten du'ang /_/de ltar skye ba stong rnams su/_/'khor bar yang ni 'khor 'gyur yang /_/des ni bde 
[\[335a.4\]]ba mi thob cing /_/rtag tu sdug bsngal bsten par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la/_/de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/_/sems ni kun gyis dad byas te/_/nad med phun sum tshogs par song /_/sangs rgyas phan 'dogs byed pa yis/_/'bras 
[\[335a.5\]]bu mtha' yas 'byung 'gyur bas/_/sangs rgyas la ni dang bar bya/_/chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin no/_/rgyal pos dkon mchog gsum mchod na/_/'jig rten gyi ni mchog tu 'gyur/_/rgyal thabs chen po'i grags pa thob/_/nor gyi dbang phyug longs spyod che/_/
[\[335a.6\]]rgyal pos phun tshogs rgya che ba'i/_/bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'thob/_/'jig rten mchog ni mchod byas na/_/'jig rten dbang phyug nyid du 'gro/_/de nas brgya byin 'thab bral nyid/_/tshangs pa nyid du'ang yang dang yang /_/nyan thos rang rgyal nyid dang ni/_/sa steng sangs 
[\[335a.7\]]rgyas nyid du 'gyur/_/theg pa gsum gyi mchog thob cing /_/theg pa la ni chags med 'gyur/_/de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bsam mi khyab/_/de dag 'bras bus bsam mi khyab/_/rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab/_/de nas gzhan 
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]yang rgyal po ni/_/zla ba sa steng med pa na/_/phan tshun 'khrug pa'i ngang tshul du/_/go DA'i rgyud ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/phan tshun ltos pa med par ni/_/de tshe mtshon ni 'debs par 'gyur/_/zhag ni bdun po gcig dang ni/_/de bzhin gzhan ni zla ba gcig_/de tshe 
[\[335b.2\]]tshogs kyi rgyal srid rgyud/_/de tshe sa steng byed par 'gyur/_/gang gA'i 'gram gyi grong der ni/_/gtsug lag khang gi gnas kyang byas/_/de nas zla ba zhes bya ba'i/_/bram ze'i khye'u de yi bu/_/zla ba brgyad dang zhag lnga dang /_/phyed dang gnyis zhag 'das nas 'chi/_/
[\[335b.3\]]de'i mthar rgyal po 'dug pa ni/_/klu yi rgyal po zhes bya ba/_/go DA'i yul gyi rgyal po 'byung /_/dang por dza ma'i rigs bram ze/_/kun nas rje'u rigs kyis bskor ba'i/_/klu zhes bya ba de yang 'byung /_/de yang mu ges gnod pa dang /_/de bzhin pha rol dmag 
[\[335b.4\]]tshogs gnod/_/de dag rgyal srid thob pa na/_/chom rkun chen pos kun tu khyab/_/des kyang de yi lugs nyams te/_/der ni lo ni lnga dang gcig_/rgyal srid kun nas 'khrugs bzhin spyod/_/srog gcod mang po byas nas ni/_/de tshe srog la gnod par byed/_/snga ma'i 
[\[335b.5\]]las kyi nyes pa yis/_/rje'u rigs spyod pa de dag byed/_/phan tshun 'khrugs pa'i ngang tshul du/_/de tshe de ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de dag de tshe nus ldan tshul/_/rgyal rigs spyod la gnas pa yi/_/go DA'i rgyud kyi mi yi bdag_/'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom 
[\[335b.6\]]med/_/kha cig de tshe mtshon gyis 'chi/_/nad rnams kyis kyang yang dag 'debs/_/de nas dus byas rgyal po rnams/_/dmyal ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bud med gtso bo'i byis pa ni/_/de yang phyis ni rgyal por 'gyur/_/de dag de bzhin zla phyed nas/_/
[\[335b.7\]]mtshon gyis bsnun nas de nyid bsad/_/mu ge chen po yang dag 'byung /_/pha rol dmag tshogs dag gis dkrugs/_/yid ni skrag par gyur pa yis/_/shar phyogs yul mi nyams par gyur/_/de yi yul du mi bdag ni/_/the tshom med par 'byung 'gyur ba/_/bcom 
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]brlag skyes pa'i rgyal po mchog_/yangs pa can gyi tshong pa sngon/_/de yang lus la mchod pa yi/_/ma ga d+hA yi rgyal por 'gyur/_/de'i yang nu bo yi ge b+ha/_/shar gyi phyogs la yang dag gnas/_/de bu yi ge pra zhes bya/_/shar phyogs nyid du yang dag 
[\[336a.2\]]skyes/_/rgyal rigs mchog tu skyes par bstan/_/legs par spyod pas byis par bcings/_/lo ni bcu dang bdun dag tu/_/'ching ba dag la yang dag bzhag_/glang rdzi zhes bya'i rgyal pos bcings/_/bcom ldan zhes bya des ni bkrol/_/yi ge ha zhes rgyal 
[\[336a.3\]]chen ni/_/nub kyi phyogs na yang dag 'ongs/_/shar gyi phyogs ni mtha' med par/_/gang gA'i 'gram du gnas par gyur/_/dmangs rigs gzi brjid che ba dang /_/sde chen stobs ni che ba dang /_/de ni de yul 'gram gnas nas/_/kun tu yang ni rab tu gnas/_/
[\[336a.4\]]go DA'i skye bo zhes grags grong /_/mu stegs zhes kyang rnam par grags/_/rgyal pos de ni rnam mnan nas/_/stobs chen de ni 'dug par gyur/_/der ni rgyal rigs byis pa de/_/tshong pa dang ni lhan cig 'ongs/_/der ni nam phyed zhugs nas ni/_/nam gyi mthar 
[\[336a.5\]]ni de yang mchod/_/dmangs rigs rgyal po zhes bya bas/_/slar nyid du ni ldog par byed/_/gang gA'i 'gram gyi mthar thug par/_/grong khyer dga' ba zhes bya bar/_/de tshe rgyal srid ma ga d+hAr/_/byis pa de ni bzhag par gyur/_/bA rA Na sI'i pha rol tu/_/
[\[336a.6\]]kA shi yul gyi mir yang phyin/_/stobs chen sa yi bdag po ni/_/dmangs rigs der ni zhugs par gyur/_/sdug bsngal nyam thag nad chen pos/_/de tshe bu ni dbang yang bskur/_/byis pa khye'u phug ces pa/_/de tshe rgyal thabs dbang yang bskur/_/chen po'i nad 
[\[336a.7\]]kyis zil mnan nas/_/de tshe sa yang 'khor bar mthong /_/de nas 'bad pas shugs nar phyung /_/lus zhig nas ni dud 'gror song /_/de tshe zla ba bdun dang brgyad/_/dud 'gro dag tu gnas par gyur/_/de yi skye ba las grol nas/_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du skyes/_/
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]de tshe skye ba nyi shur ni/_/lha yi phun sum tshogs pa thob/_/chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar gyis/_/rang rgyal byang chub thob par byed/_/sngon gyi skye ba'i dus dag tu/_/'di nyid las ni nye bar bsags/_/bdag nyid chen po rang rgyal la/_/gos kyis kun nas bkab pa dang /_/
[\[336b.2\]]glang po rta dang shing rta'i rgyur/_/lham ni rab tu phul bar gyur/_/de las blo ldan sems dang bas/_/de tshe de la bza' ba byin/_/rnam par smin pa de yis ni/_/lha yi rgyal po brgya byin du/_/skye ba bye ba phrag dgur ni/_/lha yi 'jig rten dag tu gyur/_/sa steng 'ong nas 
[\[336b.3\]]rgyal po ni/_/de nas skye ba 'di la gyur/_/gzhan gyis rjes bsgrubs rgyal thabs ni/_/rjes su spyod par 'gyur ba yin/_/de yi bu yang rgyal po ni/_/bA rA Na sIr rab tu gnas/_/chags 'og rgyal phran gyis bcom pa'i/_/rgyal thabs rnam 'jig 'byung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[336b.4\]]de yi rgyal srid dgra dang ni/_/bram zes phal chen gnod par 'gyur/_/bag med 'dod pa spyod pa dang /_/rgyal po de ni gdon gyis 'dzin/_/phyi ma yi ni dus dag tu/_/de nas mtshon gyi brgyab nas 'chi/_/ma ga d+hA rgyal de dag ni/_/phan tshun du ni gnod byed pas/_/
[\[336b.5\]]zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal po 'das/_/shar gyi phyogs kyi kun nas kyang /_/gang gA'i 'gram gyi mthar thug par/_/bA rA Na sI de las gzhan/_/yi ge pra zhes rgyal rigs ni/_/de yi tshe na rgyal po 'byung /_/gang zhig dmangs rigs gyur pa ni/_/yi ge ha yis yongs su mchod/_/
[\[336b.6\]]grong khyer dga' ba zhes bya bar/_/gang gA'i 'gram la yang dag rten/_/sngon gyi las kyis yongs bskul nas/_/rgyal rigs rgyal por 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nyid las byas byed bcug dang /_/rjes su yang ni yi rang byas/_/de tshe dus ni 'das pa na/_/gser thub ces 
[\[336b.7\]]bya'i ston pa 'byung /_/bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du/_/nor chen ldan pa'i tshong dpon yod/_/tshong dpon bu ni byis pa de/_/byis pa dag gis yang dag bskor/_/sa rdul dag la rtse ba'i phyir/_/lam chen dag tu zhugs par gyur/_/rang khyim mchod rten mchog mthong 
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]la/_/pha dang ma ni mchod byed pa/_/de nyid yid la bzung byas nas/_/sa rdul gyi ni mchod rten byas/_/de tshe me tog sman mas ni/_/mchod pa yang ni byed par gyur/_/sangs rgyas dad pa'i dran pa yis/_/sangs rgyas de la'ang bstod pa byas/_/byis pa 
[\[337a.2\]]rnams kyis yongs bskor nas/_/der ni byis pa rtse bar gyur/_/ston pa gser thub rgyal ba yi/_/nyan thos mchog de gcig pu zhig_/skyon bral bdag nyid grol ba dang /_/khams gsum las ni rnam grol blo/_/de tshe dang por skyon bral ba/_/bsod snyoms la ni rgyu bar 
[\[337a.3\]]gyur/_/bA rA Na sI legs mdzes pa'i/_/de tshe grong khyer rab tu zhugs/_/gang du sa steng byis pa yod/_/de tshe chags bral phyogs der phyin/_/der ni byis pa de kun gyis/_/kun nas yongs su bskor bar gyur/_/'dir gshegs dge slong 'dir spyon cig_/ston pa'i 
[\[337a.4\]]mchod rten phyag byos mdzod/_/bdag cag gis ni 'bad byas na/_/bzang po 'di la mi gzigs sam/_/de nas tshong dpon bu khye 'us/_/rtsa yi thag pa blangs nas ni/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po'i 'dod chags bral/_/rtse ba'i tshul gyis de bcings khrid/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po chags 
[\[337a.5\]]bral bas/_/der gnas rnams la yang dag dgongs/_/sa steng dag tu gzigs pa na/_/de dag gis ni mchod rten byas/_/byis pa'i spyi bor lag byugs nas/_/blo ldan de la 'di skad smras/_/gang du khyod kyi mchod rten byas/_/thong shig khye'u bdag cag 'deng /_/
[\[337a.6\]]gang du sa steng mchod rten ni/_/der yang thams cad 'ong gyur nas/_/de tshe byis pa dang lhan cig_/bdag nyid chen po des phyag byas/_/bsod snyoms don du ci 'dod par/_/dpa' bo de ni phyir yang chas/_/de nas tshong dpon byis pa yis/_/chos gos mtha' nas bzung 
[\[337a.7\]]nas ni/_/dge slong de ni bzung khyer ba/_/bshos gsol bya ba'i ched du'o/_/de nas tshong dpon gtso bo des/_/byis pa khye'u de mthong nas/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po chags bral ba'i/_/chos gos mtha' la 'dzin byed la/_/'jigs shing ba spu ldang ba dang /_/nga yi 
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]khyim du mchog kyang gshegs/_/myur du rkang gnyis la btud de/_/byis pa yis ni 'dzin pa btang /_/bu de yis kyang bzung byas la/_/'bad pa yis ni bzod gsol byas/_/skye bo'i mchog gyur phan 'dod pa/_/de yi lhung bzed blangs nas ni/_/sA lu'i tshod ma bza' ba yis/_/
[\[337b.2\]]lhung bzed dag ni bkang byas nas/_/bu la bos nas smras pa ni/_/yang dag long la 'di la byin/_/de nas byis pa shes ldan pas/_/'bad pas lag gnyis bkrus nas ni/_/lhung bzed gang ba blangs nas su/_/'dod chags bral ba la ni phul/_/phul nas myur ba nyid du ni/_/rkang pa 
[\[337b.3\]]gnyis la phyag kyang byas/_/'dod chags bral bas blangs nas ni/_/gtsug lag khang song zas la spyad/_/bde bar rig pa'i sems kyis ni/_/de tshe 'dod chags bral bar gyur/_/de las byis pa gzhan zhig ni/_/phrag dog sems su gyur nas ni/_/mu stegs rnams 
[\[337b.4\]]la rab dad nas/_/bstan pa la ni de mi mchod/_/khro ba'i sems ni kho na yis/_/'dod chags bral la nyin zhag gzhan/_/bza' bca' ba rnam mang po/_/khyer nas de la rab tu byin/_/khyod la byin pa'i bsod snyoms kyis/_/dge ba cung zad gang yod pa/_/tshong dpon bu 
[\[337b.5\]]ni de bas kyang /_/sa steng bdag ni dam par shog_/de nas mu stegs de kun dang /_/de tshe bram ze'i chung ma rnams/_/de nas thams cad 'dus nas ni/_/tha dad par ni 'thab mo'ang byas/_/byis pa khyed cag yong mi shes/_/ci phyir mgo reg gam du 'gro/_/'di dag 
[\[337b.6\]]bdag la'ang gnas med na/_/gzhan dag gang du mya ngan zlo/_/byis pa de yi sems can la/_/de lta bu yi zhe sdang skyes/_/ston pas nye bar bsngags pa yi/_/chos kyi zam pa grags pa dang /_/sa steng lha khang mchod rten mchog_/mu stegs rnams kyis de dag bshig_/
[\[337b.7\]]tshong dpon mchog gi bu de la/_/kun nas 'khrug pa'i sems kyang byas/_/mgo reg 'di la byin pa yi/_/sbyin pa'i 'gro ba gang du 'gro/_/ngan 'gro'i 'gro bas zin sems la/_/rnam par gnod pa bdag gis bya/_/gnyis pa byis pa gang yin de/_/zla ba zhes 
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]bya'i rgyal po yin/_/rnam smin de yis mi 'dod pa/_/yun ring sdug bsngal rjes su myong /_/tshong dpon mchog gi bu de ni/_/lus zhig nas ni bde 'gror song /_/de dang der ni lha gnas su/_/yun ring bde ba rjes su myong /_/de tshe de tshe de dang der/_/shi 'phos 
[\[338a.2\]]lha yi 'jig rten gnas/_/de tshe tha ma'i skye ba la/_/thams cad du ni 'ching ba gcod/_/tha ma'i skye ba thob pa na/_/mir gyur sa yi bdag por 'gyur/_/las kyis de tshe tshe 'phos na'ang /_/de tshe de tshe de dang der/_/'jig rten dag tu skyes gyur pa/_/sa steng mi yi bdag por 
[\[338a.3\]]byed/_/gang zhig me tog dman ma ni/_/byis pa g.yo ba des phul ba/_/des na longs spyod nyon mongs can/_/de 'di'i 'bras bu nyon mongs ldan/_/sdug bsngal longs spyod thob pa yang /_/rgyal po de yi bstan pa nyams/_/mi brtan byis pa'i rang bzhin dang /_/ji lta 
[\[338a.4\]]de ltar g.yo sems kyis/_/sa steng ston pa'i mchod rten la/_/mchod pa chen po yongs su byas/_/rnam par smin pa'i las de yis/_/byis pa rgyal po'i dbang phyug byed/_/med par rgyal po byed par 'gyur/_/yod pa rab tu 'jig par 'gro/_/byang dang nub kyi bar dag 
[\[338a.5\]]tu/_/de ni rgyal po byed par 'gyur/_/blo gros gang de bcings pa dang /_/byis pas yang ni rab dang ba/_/byis pas bcings dang grol ba yi/_/rnam smin las ni de yis su/_/skye ba dag ni lnga brgyar yang /_/byis pa bcings dang bkrol bar 'gyur/_/tha ma'i skye ba 
[\[338a.6\]]de yi tshe/_/thams cad du ni 'ching ba bcad/_/lo ni lnga bcu lnga dag gam/_/bdun cu rtsa bdun dag tu 'gyur/_/shar phyogs rgya mtsho'i mthar thug par/_/sa steng de ni rgyal por 'gyur/_/'bigs byed ri yi nang gnas pa/_/mtha' 'khob kla klo'i rkun ma rnams/_/de dag 
[\[338a.7\]]kun la dbang sgyur ba'i/_/yi ge ba ming rgyal por 'gyur/_/gangs can ri yi nang gnas pa/_/byang gi phyogs la brten pa yi/_/de tshe rgyal rigs rgyal po de/_/yul mi kun la spyod par 'gyur/_/mi shes byis par gyur pa yi/_/mchod rten sa rdul gyis byas pas/_/
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]'gran zla med cing gnod med par/_/ma ga d+hA yi rgyal por 'gyur/_/shar phyogs rgya mtshor brten nas ni/_/de 'di 'brog gi mthar thug par/_/blo ldan lo hi ta las gzhan/_/byang du de bzhin kha ba can/_/nub tu kA shi'i nyams dga'i grong /_/rtse mo zhes bya'i grong de bzhin/_/
[\[338b.2\]]'di yi nang du rgyal po ni/_/ston pa'i bstan pa gsal byed pa/_/de ni seng ge lnga zhes bya/_/pham nas rgyal pos gzhan yang pham/_/seng ge las skyes thams cad de'ang /_/de tshe rtsa nas rnam par bshig_/gangs can nang dang shar phyogs dang /_/rgya mtsho bcu yi 'gram 
[\[338b.3\]]gnas nas/_/de tshe rgyal rigs brgyad po de/_/yul mi dag ni kun la spyod/_/lha sogs seng ge rgyal po ni/_/g.yon can gzhan la brten pa dang /_/'bigs byed nang na gnas pa la/_/des kyang rang gi rgyal po byas/_/bgrod dka' zhes bya'i yul dbus su/_/dug 
[\[338b.4\]]chen rgyal bas rnam rgyal byas/_/byang shar kun la gnas pa yi/_/seng ge zhes bya de bzhin gzhan/_/zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal po 'das/_/de tshe go DA'i skye bo'ang 'jig_/de tshe rgyal rigs sa yi bdag_/'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/rgyal po mngon 'phel skye zhes bya/_/de 
[\[338b.5\]]yi longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur/_/de tshe rgan por gyur pa na/_/de yang g.yo ba med par song /_/lo ni brgyad cur 'tsho ba ste/_/de bzhin gzhan ni bdun dang bdun/_/de nas 'khogs pas zil mnan nas/_/dus byas lha yi gnas su song /_/yun ring lha yi bde ba ni/_/de 
[\[338b.6\]]tshe rgyal pos rjes su myong /_/sngon ni kun nas nyon mongs pas/_/las kyi yang ni shi 'phos te/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po klu yi rgyal/_/blo ldan dud 'gro'i nang du gnas/_/tshong pa sngags ni grub pa ste/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i blo byed cing /_/de tshe rig pa'i rgyal po dang /_/de tshe bde 'gro 
[\[338b.7\]]dag tu gyur/_/de yi tshe na 'khor los sgyur/_/sna tshogs tog ces rgyal por 'gyur/_/de bzhin du ni blo ldan de/_/de tshe rig 'dzin chos kyang 'chad/_/lo ni bye ba brgyad cu dang /_/de tshe dgu dang bdun du 'gyur/_/lha dang mi yi bde ba yis/_/'khor los sgyur bar 
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]'gyur ba yin/_/de yi 'khor du bu mo ni/_/bye ba drug cu skye bar 'gyur/_/de nas de ni lus zhig nas/_/lha mo sgrol ma mnyes byas te/_/lha rnams bdag por song nas ni/_/der ni chos kyang ston par byed/_/rgyal po de ni mthar gyis su/_/myur du byang 
[\[339a.2\]]chub gzhol bar 'gyur/_/de yang lo ni gsum dag tu/_/rgyal po'i dbang phyug byas nas ni/_/yi ge pa yi rgyal po 'das/_/de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/_/phan tshun rgyud ni byas nas su/_/rtsod pa chen po la yang gnas/_/de yi nu bo yig pa zhes/_/brtul zhugs can du rnam 
[\[339a.3\]]par gnas/_/lo ni gsum dang gcig dag tu/_/rgyal srid yongs su 'phel bar byas/_/de ma thag tu 'khru bas btab/_/'di dag gnyi ga 'chi bar gyur/_/'jig rten dus 'das shi nas ni/_/gnod sbyin dag gi nang du skyes/_/de gnyis mthar gyis chos ldan pas/_/rang 
[\[339a.4\]]rgyal byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/de'i yang nu bo yig pa zhes/_/rgyal rigs kyi ni chos la dga'/_/de yang rgyal po lo gsum du/_/mi yi bdag po byed par 'gyur/_/de'i yang nu bo rgyal po ni/_/yi ge dza zhes rnam par bsgrags/_/de yang yul ni 'di dag tu/_/sa 
[\[339a.5\]]kun gyi ni bdag por 'gyur/_/rta dang shing rta glang po dmag_/kun nas gru dang theg pa yis/_/g.yul du nye bar gnas nas ni/_/dgra yi tshogs ni kun las rgyal/_/des ni yul 'di ma lus dang /_/sa rnams thams cad nyid la ni/_/ston pa'i gzugs brnyan lha khang 
[\[339a.6\]]dang /_/de bzhin rgyal ba'i mchod rten dang /_/sa rnams dag ni thams cad la/_/thams cad mdzes par byas par gyur/_/de tshe sngon gyi rgyal po de'i/_/bram ze de bzhin shAg rigs skye/_/nga rgyal shes rab ldan zhing rno/_/byang chub mthar byed nga rgyal blo/_/de tshe 
[\[339a.7\]]dus kyi tha ma la/_/de nyid 'di yi grogs nyid 'gyur/_/rgyal po chos la dga' ba yi/_/rgyal rigs kyi ni mchog tu gsungs/_/lo ni nyi shu bdun dang brgyad/_/de ni de tshe 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/bud med byas pa'i skyon nyid kyis/_/dus byas nas ni lha gnas 'gro/_/blo 
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]ldan de ni mthar gyis kyang /_/bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/de nas grags pa dpal zhes bya/_/de bzhin sa yi bdag po ni/_/u DI ya na rgyal po che/_/chos la dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/u DI yan gyi grong mchog la/_/grong khyer yi ge pa zhes bya/_/der ni rgyal po 
[\[339b.2\]]byed pa ste/_/kun nas dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur/_/der ni de tshe brgyad dag gi/_/gtsug lag khang yang byed par 'gyur/_/bram ze'i gtso bo de bzhin ldan/_/shAkya'i skyes zhes yang dag brten/_/de yi grogs la brten nas ni/_/'khor yug tu ni rgyal srid byas/_/lo ni brgyad cu 
[\[339b.3\]]gcig bcas par/_/mi yi bdag po der 'tshor 'gyur/_/las byed skyon gyis chos bdag nyid/_/dus byas nas ni lha gnas 'gro/_/lha rnams kyi ni rgyal thabs kyang /_/de bzhin mthar gyis byed par 'gyur/_/de nas lus de zhig nas kyang /_/mtho ris las kyang mtho ris 'gro/_/
[\[339b.4\]]de yi byang chub rgyu dag ni/_/dge ba'i chos ni yongs rdzogs byas/_/de yi bran nyid rgyal po ste/_/rgyal srid gnod med byed par 'gyur/_/yi ge'i dang po ya zhes bya/_/sa yi bdag po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/lo ni bdun dang gcig dag tu/_/de yi dus su rgyal srid byed/_/de 
[\[339b.5\]]gcig bud med rnams kyis ni/_/brdegs nas kyang ni shi bar 'gyur/_/yi ge pa rgyud yang byung ba/_/rgyal rigs rgyal por 'gyur ba yin/_/des ni bran tshogs rnams bsad nas/_/rang dbang du ni yongs su gyur/_/mi dge'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/_/rnam mang srog 
[\[339b.6\]]ni gcod pa yin/_/dpa' zhing 'byor la rmongs par ni/_/'jig rten kun la 'byung bar 'gyur/_/g.yo zhing myur du byed pa na/_/chang dang g.yo sgyu can la dga'/_/chang gis bag med rnam rmongs nas/_/des na de ni sa la nyal/_/dgra rnams kyis ni brtson byas nas/_/
[\[339b.7\]]mtshon chas bsnun nas de gsod 'gyur/_/de nas de ni lus zhig nas/_/dus byas nas ni 'og tu 'gro/_/de yi spun zla gnyis pa ni/_/ming ni yi ge ra zhes shes/_/nyin zhag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad du/_/de tshe sa la rgyal srid byas/_/bram ze rnams la nor byin nas/_/the tshom 
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]med par dus kyang byas/_/de nas gzhan yang sa bdag ni/_/de tshe rgyal po bzang po byung /_/de yang dmangs rigs skye nas ni/_/yan lag ma tshang ngan pa nyid/_/chos min phal cher tshul khrims 'chal/_/'thab pa la yang rtag tu dad/_/bram ze'i tshogs 
[\[340a.2\]]dang rgyal phran dang /_/sdom brtson de bzhin rab byung ba/_/kun la yang ni gnod byed cing /_/rtag tu tshar gcod dag la'ang dga'/_/drag pos 'dul bar byed pa dang /_/de bzhin rkun ma rnams kyang gsod/_/ma rungs thams cad gnod byed cing /_/ya mtshan can gyi brtul zhugs 
[\[340a.3\]]sten/_/rnam par grol la'ang sbyin mi byed/_/de tshe rgyal srid byed par 'gyur/_/lo ni bcu dang bdun gyi bar/_/der ni sa bdag 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/mdze yi nad kyis sdug bsngal nas/_/de nas dus byas dud 'gror 'gro/_/dud 'gro dag las klu rgyal du/_/gdengs ka che 
[\[340a.4\]]ldan mgyogs par 'gro/_/mchog tu 'jigs rungs lus ldan zhing /_/de tshe sgra ni drag par sgrogs/_/de la lor ni mi 'dod pa/_/yun ring sdug bsngal rjes su myong /_/sa srung 'jig rten 'phel byed pa/_/'jig rten kun gyis shes pa ste/_/lus can shar phyogs gnas pa yin/_/
[\[340a.5\]]rgyal po yi ge pa zhes pa'i/_/rgyud rnams rgyud du skyes pa gzhan/_/rgyal rigs dpa' bo rnam par gnon/_/de bzhin rgya mtsho gsum gyi bdag_/bde chen stobs ni che ba dag_/shar gyi phyogs su 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ston pa'i mchod rten bzang po dang /_/gtsug lag khang 
[\[340a.6\]]dang 'dug gnas khyim/_/rnam pa sna tshogs skyed mos tshal/_/rdzing dang khron pa bkad sas bskor/_/de bzhin rtag tu bsod nams khang /_/sa ni mdzes par byed par 'gyur/_/de nas thub mchog dam pa dang /_/theg pa bla na med la brten/_/shAkya'i rab byung de nyid 
[\[340a.7\]]ni/_/rtag tu de ni rab gnas byed/_/mi khom rnams ni spong byed cing /_/dal ba nyid kyang legs par thob/_/yi ge ka zhes rnam par bsgrags/_/'jig med dran dang ldan pa nyid/_/lo ni nyi shu gcig bar du/_/sa skyong rgyal srid byas par 'gyur/_/de nas gsud nad kyis 
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]btab ste/_/dus byas nas ni lha gnas 'gro/_/blo ldan de ni mthar gyis su/_/myur du byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/_/de yi lhag ma'i rgyud las kyang /_/gzhan la rab gnas 'tsho byed pa/_/de yi 'og tu sa skyong ba/_/sa srung 'tsho bas gnas pa yin/_/bram ze bkren pa'i 
[\[340b.2\]]skye bo ni/_/the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de yi dus su chos min ldan/_/ston pa'i bstan pa nges par nyams/_/sngags kyi bstan pas sems can rnams/_/dge ba'i don du nges par sbyor/_/gang zhig gzhon nus bstan pa yi/_/sngags ni longs spyod 'phel byed pa/_/
[\[340b.3\]]rgyal po'i dbang phyug don du ni/_/de tshe de'i yul phyogs su yang /_/grub pa mchog ni bsgrub bya min/_/chos kyi 'khor lo nyams dga' dang /_/de bzhin 'od ma'i tshal chen dang /_/gang du bcom ldan de zhi bar/_/phung po med par rab zhugs pa/_/sngags gnyis 'di dag bsgrub bya 
[\[340b.4\]]ba/_/lha mo sgrol ma khro gnyer can/_/rtag tu rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang ni/_/snying po med pa'i 'bab chu mchog_/gang gA'i 'gram ni thams cad du/_/pad+ma 'byung ba bsgrub par bya/_/sa bcu thob pa'i bdag po ni/_/gang yang byang chub sems de yang /_/sems can rnams ni 
[\[340b.5\]]'dul byed pa/_/zla ba zhes ni rnam par bsgrags/_/rig pa'i rgyal mo rdzu 'phrul che/_/de ni sgrol ma zhes kyang bstan/_/bud med gzugs 'chang lha mo ni/_/'gro ba kun tu rnam par rgyu/_/snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/_/sems can rnams la phan don du/_/mi mjed 
[\[340b.6\]]'jig rten khams gnas nas/_/bud med ming gis 'jug par byed/_/sa bcu la ni rab gnas thob/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/_/sems can rnams ni 'dul byed pa/_/lha mo sgrol ma zhes su bstan/_/'di ni 'bad med grub pa ste/_/srung dang skyob dang 
[\[340b.7\]]sbed par byed/_/longs spyod dbang phyug 'phel byed pas/_/'di ni lha mo bsgrub par bya/_/byang chub tshogs kyi ched du ni/_/skyed pa nyid nas brtsam par bya/_/snying rjes brlan pas lus can la/_/de tshe lha mo rjes 'brang ba/_/sngags kyi gzugs kyis sems can la/_/byang 
[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]chub tshogs ni bya phyir ro/_/re ba thams cad dga' rgyas phyir/_/shar gyi phyogs su gnas pa yin/_/bdag nyid rnam pa stong dang ni/_/rnam pa mang por byas nas kyang /_/rgya mtsho bzhi yi mthar thug par/_/sa rnams kun tu rnam par rgyu/_/de nas shar gyi phyogs 
[\[341a.2\]]su 'am/_/yang na bA rA Na sIr 'grub/_/lha mo de yi zhing du ni/_/shar gyi phyogs su rab tu bstan/_/'od chen po ni dzam b+ha la/_/gnod sbyin rgyal po yang dag 'grub/_/de tshe longs spyod ma lus 'dod/_/de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/_/lha mo sgrol ma gnod sbyin rgyal/_/de nor 
[\[341a.3\]]rgyas pa 'dod pas sgrub/_/de tshe khro bo'i sngags dag ni/_/lho phyogs dag tu bsgrub par bya/_/kla klo rkun ma'i gling dang ni/_/de bzhin rgya mtsho'i nang du ni/_/stobs chen sgrol ma gnod sbyin rgyal/_/de bzhin du yang 'grub par 'gyur/_/ha ri kel ka da raM tsa/_/kA ma rU pa gA dA 
[\[341a.4\]]hA ya hi/_pho nya mo tshogs rnam mang dang /_/gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen mo 'grub/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis gang gsung sngags/_/longs spyod kyi ni rgyur 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin yul der grub pa ste/_/gzhan yul de bzhin ma yin no/_/shar phyogs dang ni phyogs 
[\[341a.5\]]mtshams su/_/rnam pa sna tshogs sngags kyi rgyur/_/de yi dus su bstan pa ni/_/lus can rnams kyis bsgrub par bya/_/dbus kyi yul du de bzhin sngags/_/de bzhin sa srung mang po ni/_/rgya che thams cad nyam chung ba'i/_/blo chung rnams kyis rtogs par byed/_/rgyal 
[\[341a.6\]]po'i gtso bo mdor bsdus nas/_/ming ni 'di dag nges par brjod/_/dang po'i yi ge sha dang na/_/dang po'i yi ge par yang bstan/_/dang po'i yi ge ba dang e/_/dang po'i yi ge ar yang bstan/_/dang po'i yi ge har bstan te/_/dang po'i yi ge par yang bsgrags/_/dang po'i yi 
[\[341a.7\]]ge dza dang ba/_/dang yig d+ha ni zla ba'i rigs/_/yi ge ha nyid rnam bsgrags dang /_/de bzhin yang ni dang po'i a/_/dang po'i yi ge sa la yang /_/bud med rigs min 'jig rten sdang /_/dang po'i yi ge a dang ma/_/'jig rten rnams la mthu dang ldan/_/rim gyis rim gyis 
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]]rigs dag ni/_/bram ze rje'u rigs dag tu 'jug_/phal cher chos min las byed cing /_/rnam sdang bud med la brkam chags/_/sa srung skyon ni rab mang bar/_/de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/_/yul gyi dbus su mi yi bdag_/'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/dus kyi tha mar 'di dag 
[\[341b.2\]]tshe/_/lo ni brgya dang nyi shu nyid/_/de yi tshe na mi rnams kyi/_/tshe ni ring bar rab tu bstan/_/de dag bar ma bzang po las/_/khyad par ring dang thung ba yin/_/rgyal po rnams ni tshe thung bar/_/de tshe dus su bstan pa ni/_/gang gA'i 'gram gyi ngogs dang ni/_/gangs can gyi ni ri zhol dang /_/de tshe kA ma 
[\[341b.3\]]rU yul du/_/de 'dra'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dang po bar ma tha ma yi/_/rigs kyi lhag ma brjod bya ste/_/dang po'i gtso bo chen po ni/_/rna can rgyal por rab tu bsgrags/_/tha ma ang ga'i bdag po dang /_/der ni 'byor bzad 'byor pa dang /_/legs byin srid pa byin pa ni/_/kA ma rU pa'i 
[\[341b.4\]]yul du byung /_/tha mar legs 'byor gzhon nu dang /_/yi ge ba dang tha gnyis ni/_/yangs pa can du yang dag byung /_/gang du thub pa de skyes pa/_/ser skya zhes bya'i grong mchog tu/_/tha mar zas gtsang shAg rigs kyi/_/nyi ma bu ram rigs skyes pa/_/tha mar zas gtsang rnam bsgrags pa/_/
[\[341b.5\]]shAkya shAkya'i rnam 'phel byed/_/sems can brtson 'grus chung bar ni/_/'jig rten skyes mchog bstan pa yin/_/gang zhig rgyal bas gsung sngags dang /_/de bzhin bran po'i tshogs kun dang /_/pho nya'i tshogs kun du ma dang /_/rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang /_/rgyud rnams kun gyi don rig pas/_/
[\[341b.6\]]bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/_/'jig rten kun gyi sngags dag ni/_/yul gyi dbus der grub par 'gyur/_/dbus yul gnas par khyad par du/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa bsgrub par bya/_/rnam pa sna tshogs rtags dang ni/_/rnam pa sna tshogs rgyud dag dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[341b.7\]]sbyor bar ldan/_/lus can rnam pa sna tshogs 'grub/_/dbus kyi yul du de bzhin sngags/_/longs spyod 'phel ba bsgrub par bya/_/de bzhin lus can bsrung don dang /_/skyob dang dbang dang dgug pa 'grub/_/dbus kyi yul du mi yi bdag_/'das dang ma 'ongs rab tu 
[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]gsungs/_/rnam pa sna tshogs rtags dang ni/_/rnam pa sna tshogs tshe dang rigs/_/rgyal po thams cad gsungs pa ni/_/mchog dang tha ma bar ma yin/_/de bzhin rnam gsum grub pa ste/_/dus kyang gsum du sbyar bar bya/_/de bzhin sngags kyang rnam gsum du/_/de bzhin 
[\[342a.2\]]thub pa mchog gis gsungs/_/rgyal po mtha' yas gsungs pa ni/_/dbus kyi yul dang nub phyogs dang /_/byang phyogs dang ni shar phyogs dang /_/de bzhin phyogs mtshams thams cad dang /_/rnam pa bzhi ru mtshon pa yi/_/gling dag de bzhin kun tu yang /_/sa bdag mtha' yas rab gsungs 
[\[342a.3\]]pa/_/mtha' yas sngags ni sgrub pa dang /_/mtha' yas yul la gnas pa dag_/mtha' yas sngags ni yongs su 'grub/_/thub pa'i bstan pa nub pa na/_/tshar gcad rjes su gzung bar byed/_/dus su rgyal po dag la sngags/_/'jam dpal gyis ni gsungs pa yin/_/rdzu 'phrul rtse dang 
[\[342a.4\]]rnam 'phrul dang /_/'dir ni dus kyi spyod pa'ang bstan/_/sngags kyi bdag nyid sems can gyi/_/'gro ba skye gnas rgyal po'i ming /_/sngags ni sgrub par 'dod rnams la/_/yul dang dus ni yang dag bstan/_/bstan pa nub pa'i 'og tu ni/_/zhar la rgyal po rnams kyis bstan/_/yon 
[\[342a.5\]]tan bdag nyid che sngags rnams/_/tha mar 'bras bu rtogs par byas/_/rgyal po gzhan ni theg pa dang /_/sngon ni 'gal ba med par bstan/_/dus kyi tha ma de dus su/_/rab tu gnas par the tshom med/_/de dag phyogs la gnas par ni/_/rgyal po thams cad gsungs pa yin/_/de bzhin 
[\[342a.6\]]shAkya'i gsung rab la/_/nges par rab byung gnas nas ni/_/'jig rten mig gcig gyur pa yi/_/thub pa mchog ni med pa na/_/rtag tu sngags smra la dad pas/_/bstan pa'i don ni byed par 'gyur/_/de dag gzhon nu bshad par bya/_/rtse gcig yid kyis mnyan par gyis/_/ston pa'i gsung 
[\[342a.7\]]rab sa steng du/_/dus mthar 'jig rten nyams pa na/_/sdom brtson rgyal po'i tshul gyis ni/_/'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/dper na ma khol zhes bya dang /_/me tog ces byar rnam par grags/_/yi ge ma zhes gzhon nu zhes/_/dang por tha mar chos la dga'/_/klus bos zhes bya rnam par 
[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]grags/_/rin chen 'byung zhes bya ming dang /_/yi ge ga zhes gzhon nu zhes/_/yi ge ba zhes chos sems byed/_/yi ge a ming bdag nyid che/_/ston pa'i bstan pa gces 'dzin byed/_/blo ldan yon tan kun gyis bkur/_/dang po'i yi ge la zhes bstan/_/rgyal po sangs rgyas pa yi phyogs/_/ston 
[\[342b.2\]]pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed/_/sdom brtson yi ge a zhes bsgrags/_/bram ze las ni rab tu byung /_/grong khyer gnas bcas gnas pa ste/_/de bzhin tshe ni brgyad cur 'tsho/_/dang yig yi ge a dge slong /_/lho yi phyogs su 'byung bar 'gyur/_/blo ldan tshe ni drug cur 'tsho/_/ka shi zhes bya'i 
[\[342b.3\]]grong du gnas/_/yi ge d+ha zhes sdom brtson nyid/_/lho yi phyogs su rnam par bsgrags/_/pha rol rgol ba bzlog nas kyang /_/de bzhin sdom brtson sngags kyang grub/_/gzhan yang rab byung dam pa ni/_/sing ga la yi grong na gnas/_/'phags pa min la 'phags pa'i ming /_/sing ga 
[\[342b.4\]]la yi gling na gnas/_/pha rol rgol ba bzlog nas ni/_/mu stegs rnams kyi sngags sun phyung /_/de dus 'jigs su rung ba yi/_/dus kyi mtha' las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/yi ge da dang la dang por/_/sdom brtson gang zhig rab gsungs dang /_/yi ge ra dang ba dang por/_/dge slong 
[\[342b.5\]]gang zhig rab byung gsungs/_/ston pa'i bstan pa gsal byed pa/_/'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/rgyal po nag po zhes bya bar/_/yi ge sa zhes sdom brtson 'byung /_/mchod rten kun dga' ra ba gnas/_/rdzing dang khron pa'ang thams cad du/_/ston pa'i gzugs brnyan de 
[\[342b.6\]]bzhin rtags/_/gzings dang zam pa nyid rnams ni/_/byed par 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/mtshon gyis lus zhig mtho ris 'gro/_/de nas yi ge sa dang ka/_/dang po dag tu brjod pa dang /_/de bzhin yi ge ra dang g+ha/_/dang po dag tu rab brjod dang /_/dang por yi ge ba dang ni/_/
[\[342b.7\]]legs byin legs de sde zhes bstan/_/sbyin byed sbyin par byed pa nyid/_/gzhan gyi grub mtha' sun byed pa/_/tshong pa sngon dang sman pa sngon/_/gnyi ga sbyin byed sna tshogs byed/_/yi ge ba zhes sdom brtson bsgrags/_/de las gzhan pa dang yi ger/_/dang por yi ge ba 
[\[343a\]]
[\[343a.1\]]grags dang /_/ston pa'i gzugs brnyan don yang byed/_/blo ldan dang por yi ge ma/_/de bzhin sdom brtson dad pa 'byung /_/rnam pa du ma sdom brtson gsungs/_/de tshe mtha' yas 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sdom brtson thams cad bsgrags pa yang /_/ston pa'i 
[\[343a.2\]]bstan pa gsal byed pa'o/_/bstan pa de tshe sa steng du/_/rnam par nyams shing snang med la/_/ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid du 'ong /_/byed par 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/thams cad byang chub lung bstan te/_/nga yi byang chub mchog thob 'gyur/_/de bzhin 'jig rten sbyin 
[\[343a.3\]]gnas 'gyur/_/srid pa gsum gyi mthar yang byed/_/sngags dang rgyud la mngon brtson pas/_/grags pa 'dzin par shes par bya/_/bram ze chos kyi ngang tshul can/_/de ni rab tu brjod par bya/_/sngags dang rgyud la mngon brtson pas/_/rgyal po'i lugs la nye bar 
[\[343a.4\]]gnas/_/de tshe mi bzad dus dag tu/_/'jig rten kun la 'byung bar 'gyur/_/yi ge ba zhes bram ze mchog_/phyug cing rig byed pha rol phyin/_/de 'dir sa rnams ma lus par/_/rtsod pa'i phyir ni rab tu rgyu/_/mtsho gsum sa yi mthar thug par/_/pha rol mu stegs 
[\[343a.5\]]rtsod la dga'/_/gang phyir dang po gtso bo'i tshig_/sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/_/gzhon nus yongs su gsungs gyur pa/_/yi ge drug pa'i sngags kyang zlos/_/cho ga rab 'byam 'di dag las/_/des ni de phan de la bsten/_/rgyal dang legs par rgyal ba dang /_/
[\[343a.6\]]grags ldan dge ba de las gzhan/_/rigs ldan chos dang ldan pa dang /_/brtson ldan legs pa khyab 'jug dang /_/sbrang rtsi sbrang rtsi bzang po dang /_/de bzhin grub dang dregs bral dang /_/ra g+ha ba dang dmangs rigs dang /_/de bzhin ka shir skyes pa gzhan/_/gzhon nu 
[\[343a.7\]]'di yi bzlas pa la/_/thams cad kun yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de dag kun kyang bzang po ste/_/blo ldan mang du thos pa yin/_/de kun sngags ni mngon du gyur/_/rgyal po'i 'tsho bas yang dag gnas/_/de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/_/bram ze dang po'i yi ge bi/_/
[\[343b\]]
[\[343b.1\]]grong khyer me tog ces bya bar/_/de ni khro bo grub par gyur/_/dbul bas yongs su zil mnan pas/_/rgyal po rnams ni tshar bcad byas/_/khro rgyal gshin rje gshed de yi/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dir gsungs pa/_/sems can ma rungs rnams dang ni/_/gdul 
[\[343b.2\]]dka' 'dul bar byed pa dang /_/phan pa min las bzlog don dang /_/phan pa nye bar 'phel phyir dang /_/sems can rnams ni rjes gzung dang /_/sems can srog 'chad dgag phyir ro/_/bram ze'i khye'u rmongs pa de/_/dbul ba khro ba chags pa yis/_/rgyal po'i srog la gnod 
[\[343b.3\]]pa'i phyir/_/khro bo'i sngags ni zlos par byed/_/de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/_/bram ze yi ge dang po a/_/chos don dge ba ldan bdag nyid/_/bden par smra zhing dbang po thul/_/mnga' bdag mang pos bkur ces pa/_/de tshe sngags ni zlos par 'gyur/_/sngags 
[\[343b.4\]]ni bsgrub par gyur pa la/_/dbang 'gyur yin gyis gzhan ma yin/_/'byung po dbang du gyur pa na/_/de tshe nor dang ldan par 'gyur/_/de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/_/bram ze chos don sems byed pa/_/de nas mthar ni dang yig sha/_/ma la'i yul du de ni 'byung /_/sa steng 
[\[343b.5\]]sngags ni zlos par grags/_/bstan pa mchog la'ang rab tu dad/_/rig pa rjes bzung ma rungs dang /_/tshangs pa'i srin po srin po dang /_/'byung po shin tu ma rungs bcas/_/rnam pa sna tshogs sha za dang /_/bstan dang 'gro ba sna tshogs ni/_/de dag ma lus de dbang 
[\[343b.6\]]'gyur/_/de bzhin bram ze'i mtshan ldan pa/_/thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur/_/de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/_/lho yi phyogs su bram ze ni/_/yi ge dang por ba bstan pa/_/ston pa'i bstan la de gtsor byed/_/mchod rten kun dga' ra ba gnas/_/ston pa'i gzugs 
[\[343b.7\]]brnyan yid 'ong gis/_/sa ni rgya mtsho gnyis mthar thug_/thams cad kyi ni rgyan du byas/_/de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/_/bram ze gtso bo nor chen ldan/_/dang po'i yi ge na zhes pa/_/lho yi phyogs su yang dag bstan/_/bdag nyid chen po sngags zlos ldan/_/nges par byang 
[\[344a\]]
[\[344a.1\]]chub gzhol bar 'gyur/_/dbus kyi yul du bstan pa ni/_/bram ze gang ba bzang zhes pa/_/'dul ba dang ni tshul bzang nyid/_/gang ba bcom brlag dag tu gnas/_/dang yig b+ha ni nor gyi spyan/_/rgyal po rnams ni sngags mchod byed/_/bram ze 'di dag 
[\[344a.2\]]bstan pa ni/_/ston pa'i bstan pa mchod byed pa'o/_/thog ma bar mthar gtso bo ste/_/rnam pa sna tshogs gnas dang rigs/_/sna tshogs phyogs kyi bram ze rnams/_/bram ze gzhan gyis mchod par byed/_/mu stegs sna tshogs rigs dang ni/_/rnam pa sna tshogs spyod 
[\[344a.3\]]yul spyod/_/gnas ni kun tu gsungs pa ste/_/bram ze'i khye'u mang thos yin/_/rang byung sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal/_/sems can kun gyi don sgrub pa/_/sems can rnams ni ma lus dang /_/lha gnas kyis kyang mchod pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi po yang /_/'jig 
[\[344a.4\]]rten kun la grags pa ste/_/'phags skyes po dang mig mi bzang /_/yul 'khor srung dang gnod sbyin rgyal/_/brgya byin de nas lha rnams kyi/_/nges pa'i tshig ni rab tu bsgrags/_/'thab bral lha yi bu dang ni/_/'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_/rgyal po dga' 
[\[344a.5\]]ldan gsungs pa dang /_/'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mchog_/gcig gi ming ni brgya byin sogs/_/de bzhin 'dod khams dbang phyug yin/_/de yang rtag tu gcig gnas te/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po gcig gi gzugs/_/de yang mtha' yas dag tu bstan/_/rnam 
[\[344a.6\]]pa sna tshogs gzugs 'chang lha/_/de las gong du thams cad mnyam/_/de yang thams cad rdzu 'phrul che/_/lha yi gtso bo ming gcig ste/_/'du shes med pa'i mthar yang bstan/_/de dag gtso bo med pa ste/_/mnyam pa'i tshul du yang dag gnas/_/'og tu mnar med 
[\[344a.7\]]mthar thug par/_/der ni rgyal po yod ma yin/_/'jam dpal de bas na/_de ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus su rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'di glegs bam du chud par byas te/_'dri bar 'gyur/_klog par 'gyur/_
[\[344b\]]
[\[344b.1\]]kha ton du byed par 'gyur ba'am glegs bam du byas te 'chang bar 'gyur/_/gus par byas te yid la byed par 'gyur/_/gos rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_phye ma dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_dril bu dang /_rol mo dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_
[\[344b.2\]]spos dang /_dri dang /_dri zhim po dag gis mchod par byed par 'gyur/_/ri mor byed par 'gyur/_yang dag par 'dzin par byed par 'gyur/_/yid rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis chos byed par 'gyur ba de la ni/_/phan yon bcu po 'di dag tu 'gyur te/_/bcu gang zhe na/_der 'di 
[\[344b.3\]]la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_/char 'bab pa mi mkhas pa dang gza' dang 'ching ba chen po'i 'tshe ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_/mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa'am/_der 'di la mi'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_/phyir rgol ba thams cad 
[\[344b.4\]]kyi 'jigs pa'am/_der 'di la nad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa'am/_der 'di la dus ma yin pa'i char gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/char ches pa'i 'jigs pa'am/_der 'di la rlung chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'jigs pa 
[\[344b.5\]]'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sha za thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'am/_der 'di la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du g.yon can rkun po'i 'jigs pa'am/_der 'di la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gshin rje'i rgyal pos khyer ba'i 'jigs pa'am/_
[\[344b.6\]]der 'di la chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za'i 'jigs pa'am/_der 'di la gzhan gyi sngags kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sbyar ba'i dug thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'am/_der 'di la nad kyi 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[344b.7\]]rims dang /_tshad par 'khru ba dang /_ma zhu ba dang /_yan lag dang /_nying lag gi nad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_phan yon bcu po 'di dag tu shes par bya'o/_/gang du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi cho ga chen po rab 'byam chos kyi mdzod 'di glegs bam du byas te/_bzhag 
[\[345a\]]
[\[345a.1\]]la 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_'dzin pa dang kha ton du byed na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu bzung zhing chos kyi mdzod mngon du 'gyur ro/_/dam tshig gi spyod pa la rjes su ma zhugs pa dang dam tshig mi shes pa gzhan dag la ni rnam pa 
[\[345a.2\]]thams cad du bstan par mi bya ste/_gang gi phyir 'di ni gsang ba yin pa'i phyir te/_'dis ni thams cad mtshon pa yin na sems can rnams kyi dran pa med par ma byed cig_/'on kyang khyod kyis shes par 'gyur mchod pa byed par 'gyur yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur zhing bsod 
[\[345a.3\]]nams chen po yang rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can skal ba med pa rnams la bstan par mi bya ste/_gzhan du na dbul ba dang /_nad dang /_mdze dang /_'tshe ba dang /_'go ba'i nad nyid byed par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na gzhan dag la yang bstan par mi bya'o/_/dam tshig dang 
[\[345a.4\]]gsang ba pa dang gsang ba'i sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la legs par bslab pa rnams dang legs par rnam par bzhag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa rnams dang /_chos kyi don la mkhas pa rnams dang bsam gtan la rab tu zhugs 
[\[345a.5\]]pa dang chos la gnas pa dang bden par smra ba dang sems can gyi spyod pa la rab tu gnas shing snying rje'i spyod pa dang rab tu ldan pa rnams te/_sems can 'di dag la bstan par bya'i gzhan dag la ni ma yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las 
[\[345a.6\]]langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_/thal mo sbyar ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci zhes bya/_/'di bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar 
[\[345a.7\]]bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zung shig_/ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi man ngag legs par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/byang chub 
[\[345b\]]
[\[345b.1\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa rgyud thams cad kyi mdzod ces bya bar yang zung shig_/theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa nges par bstan pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zung shig_/'phags pa 'jam dpal 
[\[345b.2\]]gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/chos thams cad kyi don rdzogs pa nges par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/'jig rten ma lus thams cad la/_/chos dang chos min rnam spyod cing /_/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/_/gang khyod kun tu rnam par rgyu/_/
[\[345b.3\]]de bzhin chos kyi dam pa mchog_/gsang ba gzhan ni ma mthong ngo /_/sngags rgyud don dang mdo rnams dang /_/'gro ba yul ni skyon med dang /_/byang chub chos la rab gzhol ba/_/dpa' bo gzhan ni ma mthong ngo /_/gang 'di bla ma gsang ba dang /_/drang don mdo yis yongs 
[\[345b.4\]]su brgyan/_/rnam pa sna tshogs mdo don dang /_/sngags dang rgyud kyi rjes 'jug pa/_/cho ga rab 'byam 'di las gzhan/_/ma byung gang yang yod ma yin/_/rgyal srid chen po longs spyod che/_/lha gnas dag tu'ang phun sum tshogs/_/de bzhin lha dang mi rnams kyi/_/grags 
[\[345b.5\]]pa rgyas pa'ang thob par 'gyur/_/mi khom brgyad ni spong byed cing /_/dal ba dag ni thob par byed/_/theg pa rnam gsum bdag po dang /_/de nges sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/_/mdo 'di 'dzin pa'i bsod nams dang /_/de bzhin du ni phan yon 'di/_/'di yi lus la mtshon 
[\[345b.6\]]mi 'byung /_/dug dang mes kyang ma yin no/_/ro langs dang ni gdon dang ni/_/de bzhin srul po ma mo dang /_/srin po sha zas 'tshe byed pa'ang /_/gang zhig mdo 'di 'don la min/_/'chang ba dang ni klog pa dang /_/yang dang yang du mchod byed dang /_/'jigs pa med pas 
[\[345b.7\]]mchod byed dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs mchod byed de/_/phan yon 'di ni rab bstan pa/_/'jig rten 'dir ni thob 'gyur ba/_/nad pa rnams ni nad las grol/_/sdug bsngal can ni bde bar 'gyur/_/dbul pos nor ni rnyed 'gyur te/_/bcings pa rnams ni 'ching 
[\[346a\]]
[\[346a.1\]]las grol/_/'gro ba lnga dang ldan pa yi/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ltung ba rnams/_/bde ba zhi ba mya ngan 'das/_/mi g.yo go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/_/rang rgyal sangs rgyas nyid dang ni/_/nyan thos mthar ni phyin par 'gyur/_/mdo sde 'di ni bklag 
[\[346a.2\]]pa yis/_/sangs rgyas sku mdog thob par 'gyur/_/gang gA'i bye ma mnyam pa yis/_/rgyal ba mchog ni mtha' yas pa/_/mchod pas thob pa'i bsod nams dang /_/mdo 'di bton pa'i bsod nams mnyam/_/'jig rten ji snyed gang su dag_/zhing ni bye ba mtha' 
[\[346a.3\]]yas pa/_/de srid phra rab rdul snyed kyi/_/sangs rgyas rnams la rtag mchod pa/_/rnam pa sna tshogs bza' btung dang /_/na ba rnams kyi gso sman dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs gnas mal rnams/_/rtag tu thams cad rab sbyin dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs gos dang ni/_/phye ma dag 
[\[346a.4\]]ni kun gyis kyang /_/bsod nams skye bos thob gang yin/_/'di dag 'chang dang klog pas so/_/gang zhig rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_/'jig rten nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/_/sa bcu la gnas de las gzhan/_/de rnams tshad ni de mnyam la/_/de dag 
[\[346a.5\]]mchod pa'ang de bzhin te/_/gang gi lag par glegs bam chud/_/mi yis de mnyam bsod nams thob/_/'jig rten ji snyed bstan pa yang /_/'jig rten khams na gnas pa yi/_/grangs med sems can ma lus pa/_/thams cad nad ni med byas te/_/skye bo 
[\[346a.6\]]gang zhig yang dang yang /_/bkur stir byas nas de mchod pa/_/chos mchog 'di la mchod na ni/_/blo ldan de yis bsod nams 'thob/_/bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par/_/rgyal ba mchog gis rtag par yang /_/'jig rten mgon chos mdzad mchog 
[\[346a.7\]]'di/_/mchod par yang ni mi nus so/_/chos mchog 'di ni sa steng du/_/yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra/_/'jam pa'i cho ga 'dir gsungs pa/_/bklags pa dang ni 'chang ba yis/_/des ni 'dod 'jo'i ba 'drar 'gyur/_/longs spyod che nor phun 
[\[346b\]]
[\[346b.1\]]sum tshogs/_/yid ni skyo ba med byas nas/_/sa steng 'di ni rab tu sgrub/_/sngags dang rgyud don drang ba'i don/_/don yod tshig ni rab bshad pa/_/bya ba dus la brten nas ni/_/sa steng rig pa 'dzin bsgrub na/_/rin chen phun tshogs rab gang ba/_/de yi phyogs 
[\[346b.2\]]kun dag tu gsungs/_/'bras bcas 'gro ba'i bdag nyid che/_/spyod pa bzang bar brjod pa yin/_/gang zhig cho ga mchog 'di las/_/rgyal po sngags gcig 'chang byed pa/_/rgyal srid phun sum tshogs don bcas/_/tshe ring phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_/rnam 
[\[346b.3\]]pa sna tshogs longs spyod tshogs/_/rgyal mchog dam pas 'thob par 'gyur/_/'gro dang gnas pa'i dug dag dang /_/gzhan gyis byas pa'i rig pa dang /_/ro langs sngags kyis sgrub pa dang /_/mtshon gyis kyang ni gnod mi 'gyur/_/gzhan gyi gnod byed gtsor 
[\[346b.4\]]byed pas/_/sa steng 'jig rten gnod mi byed/_/chom rkun nad ni gzhan dag dang /_/me yi 'jigs pa de la med/_/rgyal po skye bo dag kyang rung /_/su zhig de la mchod mi byed/_/gang zhig mdo sde dkon mchog 'di/_/'chang dang klog pa'ang de bzhin no/_/rgyal po rgyal 
[\[346b.5\]]rigs spyi bo nas/_/dbang bskur yul du nyer gnas tshe/_/mdo sde mgo la nges bcings nas/_/yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal na/_/de la rkun pos mi gnod cing /_/mtshon gyis de la phog mi 'gyur/_/gzhon nu'i gzugs su yang dag byung /_/rma bya'i gdan la 
[\[346b.6\]]legs bkod pa/_/glang po'i mtshog ma'i steng bzhag nas/_/g.yul du yang dag zhugs byas na/_/skye bo rnams sdang de dag kun/_/mthong ba tsam gyis ldog par byed/_/byis pa'i gzugs can bzang po ni/_/gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis yongs su brgyan/_/gser 
[\[346b.7\]]dang dngul dang ra gan gyis/_/rgyal mtshan yu ba bsgreng ba la/_/rgyal mtshan ba dan btags nas ni/_/legs dgad legs par mnyam par bzhag_/g.yul du dgras ni legs gang ba/_/mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs byed pa/_/thams cad g.yul du 'dus 
[\[347a\]]
[\[347a.1\]]pa la/_/de yi tshe na 'jug par bya/_/rgyal mtshan sgreng la gnas pa yi/_/gzhon nu las ni sna tshogs pa/_/rnam pa du ma'i gzugs dang ldan/_/bdag nyid chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/_/sa bcu'i bdag po'i bdag po ni/_/mthong ba tsam 
[\[347a.2\]]gyis 'jigs par byed/_/rgyal rigs rgyal po chen po ni/_/'jig rten sa srung sa gnas pa/_/dad ldan yid gnyis the tshom ni/_/rnam bral chos la mnyes gshin pa/_/bde bar gshegs la dad bskyed nas/_/snying rjes brlan pa'i yid kyis ni/_/'dir bshad 
[\[347a.3\]]'di dag bya ba ni/_/grub par 'dod pas rab tu bya/_/cho ga'i sbyor ba'i sngags dang ni/_/rgyud dang ldan pa sa steng du/_/chos dbyings tshogs pa'i rgyal ba yis/_/gsung rab 'di dag nges par bstan/_/chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam gnas pa'i/_/rgyal 
[\[347a.4\]]mchog snga ma grangs med pas/_/sa yi steng gi mi rnams la'ang /_/chos kyi mdzod ni gsungs pa yin/_/lha dang lha min sngon g.yul 'thab/_/pha rol 'jigs pa byung ba na/_/gang tshe brgya byin sngon gyur pa/_/dpung ni pham byas zhe sdang bas/_/de tshe gcig tu song nas 
[\[347a.5\]]ni/_/sa steng rnam par du bar gyur/_/rgyal mchog 'od srung de la ni/_/thub pa mchog la de tshe zhus/_/ji ltar bya zhes tshig tu ni/_/bde sogs bdag pos rnam par smras/_/mi bzad lha min gyis pham nas/_/bdag kyang 'dir ni yang dag lhags/_/de skad bcom 
[\[347a.6\]]ldan gsol nas ni/_/lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyis/_/de tshe thub mchog zhabs gnyis la/_/spyi bo'i gtsug gis rab btud nas/_/mig stong kau shi ka ni/_/de yi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur/_/de skad gsol nas thub mchog ni/_/bram zer gyur pa 'od srung 
[\[347a.7\]]gis/_/de tshe gsung du bka' stsal pa/_/ka la ping ka'i sgra skad du/_/rgyal ba mchog gis sngon gsungs pa/_/gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag byung /_/bdag nyid chen po 'jam dpal ni/_/rnyed dka' sku ni 'bum gyur pa/_/yang dag mtha' la gnas 
[\[347b\]]
[\[347b.1\]]nas ni/_/zab mo'i don gyi don ston byed/_/spros med rnam pa med pa dang /_/gnas med pa las gzugs byas nas/_/shin tu don ldan chos kyang ston/_/lha yi dbang phyug de ni dran/_/de nas de ni de dran pas/_/byang chub sems dpa' dran tsam gyis/_/gzhon nu sna 
[\[347b.2\]]tshogs gzugs can ni/_/der ni de yi mod la lhags/_/der ni bcom ldan 'das dang ni/_/bcom ldan lha yi dbang phyug bcas/_/lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' des/_/de tshe rgyal ba mchog la btud/_/rgyal ba mchog kun phyag 'tshal nas/_/'od chen 'od srung 
[\[347b.3\]]la yang btud/_/de tshe thub pas rjes gnang nas/_/sngags kyi tshig ni 'di smras so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaH/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa ne b+h+yaH/_o~M ha na ha na/_sarba b+ha yot+sA da ya trA sa ya/_mo Ta ya/_tshin+da/_b+hin+da/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[347b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sa chen po 'di ri dang rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa dang bcas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi zhing mtha' yas pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs kyi mthar 
[\[347b.5\]]thug pa thams cad dang bcas pa yang rab tu 'gul bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'jigs pa dang bral nas ba spu langs te ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob 
[\[347b.6\]]nas/_mig gnyis phye ste/_stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas lan gsum bskor ba byas shing /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon du bltas nas sngags kyi tshig de dag bzung ste/_yid la byas nas phyir yang shing rta la zhon 
[\[347b.7\]]te/_lha ma yin gang yin pa de logs su phyin par gyur to/_/de nas lha ma yin thams cad rgya mtsho chen po'i mtha'i 'gram du gang rang gi grong khyer gang yin pa der mngon du phyogs shing song bar gyur te/_sems zhum zhing nyams la dpung gi 'jigs pas 
[\[348a\]]
[\[348a.1\]]sems dkrugs shing gdong gi mdog nyams shing nga rgyal dang dregs pa la sogs pa dang bral bar gyur la/_/mtshon cha dang bral zhing ri 'bigs byed 'bar ba bzhin du lha'i dbang phyug de mthong nas byer bar gyur to/_/de nas lha yi dbang po brgya 
[\[348a.2\]]byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa/_grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig_/ma 'jigs shig_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha ma yin las bdag cag nges par rgyal bas rang gi gnas su 'gro bar bya'o/_/rang rang gi gnas ci lta ba 
[\[348a.3\]]bzhin du song nas khyod cag rtse ba dang dga' ba yongs su spyod par gyis shig_/de nas lha de dag thams cad yid shin tu dga' nas phyir yang rang gi gnas su log par gyur to/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_
[\[348a.4\]]gang bdag gis gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyi gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa de byas la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la'ang btags na/_des na gang gi lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/zhes bstan to/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis chen po la 'os 
[\[348a.5\]]pa'i nor bu rin po che nang 'od dang ldan zhing gsal ba'i phreng ba blangs nas/_gzhon nu'i cha byad kyi gzugs brnyan byas te/_steng gi khang bzang du grong khyer chen po blta na sdug pa'i dbus na/_lha rnams kyi 'dun sa chos bzang gi rtse mor rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba 
[\[348a.6\]]legs par bkod pa byas nas bzhag par gyur to/_/de nas lha ma yin de dag rab tshim byed dang /_thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris la sogs pa de dag lha rnams kyi steng du mi 'gro zhing /_lha de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur la/_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[348a.7\]]las rnam par 'phrul pa'am/_g.yul mngon du phyogs par 'gro bar mi nus so/_/de ltar lo bye ba khri phrag du ma mi ma yin pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar yang lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du phan yon dpag tu 
[\[348b\]]
[\[348b.1\]]med pa bstan pa dang /_tshe dang /_nad med pa 'phel bar/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang sngon du gsungs pa yin no/_/de bzhin du phan yon gyi yon tan mchog 'di dag rgya 
[\[348b.2\]]che ba dang /_mtha' yas shing mu med pa sngon gsungs pa yin no/_/gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs sam/_rnam par rtog par byed na/_bsod nams ma yin pa dpag tu med pa 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /_dmyal bar yang skye bar 
[\[348b.3\]]'gyur la/_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi skye ba ngan par yang 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/sman dang /_sngags rnams med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/de rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po rdzu 'phrul 
[\[348b.4\]]che ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul ba yang med do/_/cho ga rgya che ba yang med do/_/'phags pa ma yin pas bshad do/_/zhes byas nas spang ba'am/_/yang na 'gro zhing 'di nyan par mi nus so/_/zhes gnas de las gzhan du 
[\[348b.5\]]'gro na/_de dag la bsod nams ma yin pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste blo chung ba gang gis chos 'di ni thub pa mchog dang /_thub pa'i sras blo dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/zhes rab tu spong bar byed do/_/mi de dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur 
[\[348b.6\]]zhing /_/de nyams nas ni dud 'gror 'gro/_/thig nag dang ni yang sos dang /_/spu gri so dang me ma mur/_/ro myags chu bo rab med skye/_/de nas phyir yang spu gri sor/_/lo ma ral gri lta bu'i nags/_/yang na kyi hud zer de bzhin/_/'jig rten grags 
[\[348b.7\]]pa so thams thams/_/sdig pa'i las kyi dmyal ba ru/_/gang gis chos ni sun byed pa/_/de ni skye ba de dag 'gro/_/'jig rten smad par rab bstan pa/_/mi bzad mnar med pa zhes bya/_/ma dad sems kyis chos spangs pa/_/sdig pa'i las can gnas yin te/_/
[\[349a\]]
[\[349a.1\]]gang zhig chos ni 'di 'jigs pa/_/de la skye bo de 'tshed 'gyur/_/kun gyi mthar thug mnar med pa/_/de nyams de bzhin dmyal chen skye/_/dmyal ba'i sa mtha' mtha' yas par/_/rtag tu blo med de ni 'gro/_/mdo sde de ni rgya cher bcas/_/
[\[349a.2\]]chos kyi nor kun rab spangs nas/_/de ni 'jig rten ngan par 'gro/_/dbang med rtag par dbang du 'gro/_/gang zhig mdo sde'i cho ga 'di/_/sngags dang rgyud kyis legs par brgyan/_/grub pa sna tshogs brgya rnams 'thob/_/yang dag mtha' 
[\[349a.3\]]ni sgrib pa med/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi sku nyid yin/_/dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/cho ga cho ga rgya chen bcas/_/le'u rab 'byam 'dis 'dren byed/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs ni legs dgod pa/_/phun tshogs dpal dang blo gros mchod/_/
[\[349a.4\]]rtsa ba'i cho ga mi nyung ba/_/rgya che mang por bstan pa yin/_/rtag dang chad dang thog mtha' ni/_/gnyi ga'i mtha' don rnam par spangs/_/rim bcas rim ni nges par bstan/_/sngags kyi lus ni btus pa yin/_/me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang /_/stong 
[\[349a.5\]]pa'i de nyid legs gsungs pa/_/spangs pa rtag tu 'gro ba ni/_/'og nas 'og tu de tshe 'gro/_/bskal pa rnam mang gsum gyi grangs/_/de tshe bsod nams yongs bsags nas/_/de tshe byang chub thob nas ni/_/bdag dang rgyal ba mchog rnams 
[\[349a.6\]]kyis/_/sngags dang rgyud kyi don gsungs pa/_/'gro ba yul ni sdig med la'o/_/rtsa ba'i cho ga dag byed dang /_/sdig pa med cing bkra shis pa'i/_/le'u rab 'byam rab gsungs pa/_/nges pa'i mdo sde bzang po yin/_/sa bdag yon 
[\[349a.7\]]tan bdag nyid che/_/yul dang dus kyi sbyor ba dang /_/rgyal sras mi ru skyes pa yis/_/sa steng dam pa'i chos bstan ces/_/'jig rten gtso bo thub pa ni/_/rgyal ba bdun pas bstan pa yin/_/cho ga rgya cher gsungs pa ni/_/blo dang 
[\[349b\]]
[\[349b.1\]]dpal ni mngon par 'phel/_/rtsa ba rab 'byam le'u zhes/_/sngags dang rgyud dang ldan pa de/_/gang zhig mdo mchog gtso bo 'di/_/rgyal bas mchod pa'i chos kyi mdzod/_/sa steng mis ni spong byed pa/_/de ni mnar med dmyal bar 'gro/_/
[\[349b.2\]]bskal pa chen por de 'tshed ces/_/rnam pa du mar dbye bar bstan/_/nam zhig gang du 'byung ba ni/_/mi yi lus su skyes na yang /_/dbul zhing nad mang glen pa dang /_/kla klo dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten smad par 'gro ba ste/_/de ni 
[\[349b.3\]]mdze can nad par 'gyur/_/lkugs shing 'on pa yan lag nyams/_/blo nyams long ba nyid dang ni/_/rtsub cing rtag tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/sa steng [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lta bur snang /_/gos ngan sems ni zhan pa dang /_/sen mo dang ni lus kyang ngan/_/
[\[349b.4\]]srin bu rnams kyis zos pa dang /_/shu ba g.yan par yang dag ldan/_/mdo sde 'di ni rab spangs na/_/gang dang gang gis 'gro bar 'gro/_/de dang der ni skye ba na/_/blo ngan rmongs par skye bar 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[349b.5\]]chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_mig phye zhing mi 'dzums par thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha'i 
[\[349b.6\]]bu rnams dang /_'byung po'i tshogs du ma chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngo mtshar te/_mchog tu legs par gsungs pa 
[\[349b.7\]]lags na/_de la bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can mi rigs pa'i chags pas zil gyis non pa slu bar byed pa nga rgyal can ma dad pa gya gyu can dmu rgod tshul khrims 'chal pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag sngags rnams kyi rtog pa'i 
[\[350a\]]
[\[350a.1\]]bdag nyid chen po rgyas pa grub pa dang /_dus dang /_yul dang /_nges par sdom pa dang /_sngags dang /_spyod pa dang /_/sbyin sreg dang /_bzlas pa nges par sdom pa dang /_cho ga rab 'byam dag la ma dad par 'gyur/_yid la mi byed 
[\[350a.2\]]par 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no/_/zhes byas nas spong bar 'gyur te/_de dag nyon mongs pa'i sems su gyur nas dus byed par 'gyur zhing /_sdug bsngal drag cing tsha ba'i tshor ba myong zhing de dag dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[350a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ba'i sems can de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la spyi bor byugs nas bka' stsal pa/_/
[\[350a.4\]]'jam dpal khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir rab tu zhugs pa khyod yang legs so legs so/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa de khyod yang legs so/_/'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[350a.5\]]nur gyur pa de'i phyir legs par shin tu rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams dang /_'jig rten la rab tu brtse ba'i phyir ngas khyod la 
[\[350a.6\]]bshad do/_/spyod pa thams cad la zhugs pa dang /_byang chub kyi lam dang /_thams cad shes pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang /_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sku la gnas par 'dod pa rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal po mchog tu gsang 
[\[350a.7\]]ba/_gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang 'di dran par bya'o/_/de gang zhe na/_na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wa ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_ar had b+h+yaH/_samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/_o~M ku mA ra rU pi Ne/_bi shwa saM b+ha ba/_A gats+tsha/_A gats+tsha/_la hu la hu/_
[\[350b\]]
[\[350b.1\]]b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M/_dzi na dzika_many+dzu shri ye/_su shri ye/_tA ra ya mA~M/_sarba duHkhe b+h+yaH/_phaT phaT/_sha ma ya sha ma ya/_a mr-i tod+d+ha ba/_pA paM me nA sha ya swA hA/_'jam dpal 'di ni khyod kyi snying po dam pa yin te/_zhi ba thams cad byed pa/_sdig pa 
[\[350b.2\]]thams cad zad par byed pa/_sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu grol bar byed pa/_tshe dang /_nad med pa dang /_dbang phyug dang /_skal ba bzang po mchog dang /_ngag gi dbang phyug skyed par byed pa/_rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad gzengs 
[\[350b.3\]]stod par byed pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'di gsungs ma thag tu sa chen po ri dang rgya mtsho dang bcas pa/_sems can dang snod nye ba'i mthar thug pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/_/'gro ba thams cad de [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[350b.4\]]kyi 'gro ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_dmyal ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu sbyangs shing /_bde ba rnams kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur la/_'jam dpal rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yang yid la byed cing /_
[\[350b.5\]]de'i tshe dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems kyang med par 'gyur na/_bdud sdig to can gyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur la/_bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang 'byer bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar yang sems bskyed par bya ste/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[350b.6\]]ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas dang /_chos ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_bsam pa'am/_gzhal ba'am/_spang bar ni bdag gis ci zhig nus te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal 
[\[350b.7\]]gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/_phan yon dang nyes dmigs kyi nus pa rab 'byam bstan pa'i le'u sum cu rtsa drug pa rdzogs so//_//bcom ldan 'das 
[\[351a\]]
[\[351a.1\]]kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i steng na gnas pa'i lha'i bu'i tshogs rnams dang /_sems can bye ba 
[\[351a.2\]]khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_grub pa dang /_rig 'dzin dang /_drang srong mchog dam pa du ma dang /_'jam dpal 
[\[351a.3\]]gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_spyan ras gzigs dang /_byams pa dang /_mthu chen thob dang /_mthu chen gnas dang /_phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang /_
[\[351a.4\]]chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra bar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[351a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams thugs rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//_//dpal lha 
[\[351a.6\]]btsan po lha btsun pa byang chub 'od kyi bkas/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge bsnyen chen po ku mA ra ka la sha dang /_sgra sgyur gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//_//
